title: Little Cockatoo Cafe
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Outdoor seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Alcohol","enabled":true},{"name":"Beer","enabled":true},{"name":"Coffee","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true},{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true},{"name":"Seating","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true},{"name":"Cozy","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Whitney Bee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWUpCHpQw9t28OfKhr7N_38-v3xiAMq2FEIM7zR2elX7xcEVO6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Picked up take out from Little Cockatoo Cafe. The pljeskavica here is pretty much an open faced burger with a meat patty that is well seasoned - the meat is so tender and juicy. I’m trying not to drool as I write this review. I also tried their cvari which is the Balkan version of pork rinds. I can’t comment on their ambience and restaurant decor but their food is definitely 11/10.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTouyOsLgIn2wjmYv7BAffM4ljLZ3ZKLWkUsqv&fid=0x0:0x1883fee644a6e217"],"When":"2019-4-26"},{"Name":"Diego Aviles","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLd1C9Gr5_19-RtFOj7Ylur0DHPT0rJrP-ewPHbv48LSZei6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a great hole in the wall. Owner and cook is very nice. One man show. Worth the wait for our food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYbssIv1GI6JFeRv2e-lnTe-e0NQiU-ya6a1fd&fid=0x0:0x1883fee644a6e217"],"When":"2024-1-28"},{"Name":"Kelvin Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYlOJ0ZWKycRqx5ZOzHhnjusnD1vSd-Gno_8IQ4mNi6hmtCYtiSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Delicious! Lots of meat. So if you are in the mood for grilled meats, beer, bread cheese and euro soccer, this is your place to visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOW9e_kF03RvU7b502gIJGlL7Yhp5yQJAw4BxTD&fid=0x0:0x1883fee644a6e217"],"When":"2022-12-1"},{"Name":"charlie goff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUAoLpdqWD8KtdupT8iXNWlndRPOdbArcOWpEZTbvkI76jV2hOO=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Being from Texas and enjoying BBQ this was definitely a different but amazing experience! Great food and great service. There’s a reason they have such a good reviews.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnz9xq_Yap0kTdvGpdhDDr1jum4UpcWVCB90oS&fid=0x0:0x1883fee644a6e217"],"When":"2023-8-7"},{"Name":"Simon Bort","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUuruoEPpIaCU8Iph5JQrlDL1FCejWX0z7Y-ZrpMfcbquA7xPMCSw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Let this amazing man seduce your taste buds. The sausages and meats are made by the grill master/owner himself. Everything we tried was super tasty. Good prices and portions.

More people should know about this.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWfC_1cl63qYzDpvGvu3L7aRoNTq7zHi40do0v&fid=0x0:0x1883fee644a6e217"],"When":"2022-8-11"},{"Name":"Sean C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKle1H3U_yb0rWRIsaUg4PFRlzNPbW3ErM52REVu0iehb-oMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The cevapcici (mixed pork and beef) served at Little Cockatoo are tender, juicy, and flavourful. The bread and kajmak which accompanied the cevaps were superior to those served at competing Southeastern European restaurants in Burnaby. This restaurant also offers all-beef cevapcici for those who don't eat pork, or simply prefer beef.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-6mym9Bykp1BIsMEnhoYRC3N9JUglDAHFmb-s&fid=0x0:0x1883fee644a6e217"],"When":"2023-2-28"},{"Name":"Sil Knezevic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmC1oMDgcJPYWexS2hvVeWfMHffqzyTfXmne5kYixFylhsyYtp2w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place exceeded all my expectations. If I could give them 6 stars I would. We ordered a meat platter, and 6 sides. My goodness, it was like being teleported back to grandma's house. The meats were juicy and packed with flavour. The sides were all perfectly balanced and the salads were fresh and vibrant.
The ordering process was quick and simple, the owner is a pleasure to speak with! I wish I had known of this place earlier as I believe it's the best Balkan food around. Do yourself a favour and try it out!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Edmond Kan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhs8-Bq6r9RXlToNM1Zb4RaXApUjRArZ6BuqgjWMteHJSBo252=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is not your normal restaurant. This is more like a casual hangout cafe. Walked in to order because I couldn't find a menu online. 0rdered the platter for one and sausage, it was more than enough for 2 people. Platter comes with lots of different favorful meats served with rice and grilled veggies. Try it! Call ahead to pickup!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kathy Lok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8siZehNvbFPO3538jSK2MrlvowVJiCLBEYOSr_fYcqjUo0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I met with a few friends for lunch at this Peaceful location & was pleasantly pleased with the food we ordered.  The star attraction were the Beef Rolls.  The stuffed slices of tasty beef had the taste of being freshly roasted & the wrap was equally crispy.  YUMMY!  Street parking is available.  If no spots available, try the surrounding residential parking or the parade across the street. Service at the restaurant was attentive.  Limited seating/tables but we managed to arrive before the lunch crowd came - 11:30 am on a Friday.  Definitely, we will come back to this location.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTQ6k9vEUa9zYea82b-l73YYNK4ke972LJIRW9&fid=0x0:0x75a643b49f4d0f4c"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Frankie R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5m88fsVsLKCEOEmlz70FyNTpMxenrU-xsm9e1SBN-apNOiSHd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great service, and the best most flavourful tofu I have ever eaten. If your a vegetarian get the potato roll!! Thank me later. My friends had the The beef roll and said it was heavenly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbGuAMwIdsHpk1ZejZPmzE5PMAa8VJgSyVypMH&fid=0x0:0x75a643b49f4d0f4c"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"Chelsea Vancouver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHVWaXfVBGL-NRGFFbHN7eiAD3hCGrOaEohFBcpGwJyjbv0CUl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Restaurant is new so I’m hoping they will add some more ambiance to the place. Otherwise the food was delicious and good vegetarian options! Had the Mah Po Tofu (vegetarian version) and the Mu Shu stir fried noodles and both were great!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyXcI2HuVchuqdjBDZbKv9A4fmDnkv6CovQf0&fid=0x0:0x75a643b49f4d0f4c"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Jasmine Spearing","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLea3HOtIepYcjinessfe-zYJGncosikoXsUbMgrKTajqby5w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I've been eating at Peaceful Restaurant for many years now and I was excited to see there was a Burnaby location. Unfortunately the quality isn't up to par. I ordered the Dan Dan Noodles, and these clearly aren't the delicious hand-pulled noodles that I've had from other locations. It doesn't even taste the same. Pretty disappointing, I hope you're able to do some quality control and remedy this.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnl5gMeYDKuPqcBLKf5OQE0kcqa3DQTROdt4i1&fid=0x0:0x75a643b49f4d0f4c"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Heather Chatterton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL7IfedKSn_eOIC8drcusP2ZP2fmQV5HK2K0Y50okRIFlF0Xg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant on Edmonds St. deserves a FANTASTIC‼️‼️‼️✅️✅️ review. We have been here several times now, and have ordered takeout from them- MORE than long enough for us now to KNOW that the food here IS SO tasty! Their lunch menus are great- and generous portions too.. Their crispy tofu and xo sauce is to die for- I was not that big a fan of tofu- until I tasted THIS -and now-you could crave it😛! We have had Szechuan green beans-REALLY GOOD😁, sweet and sour pork🤯, pastry beef rolls😄, Szechuan string beans🤭, different fried rice dishes-great 😀, chicken and seasonal vegetables💖, a wonderful  sauteed cabbage spicy dish😊, spicy ginger beef😃 beef noodle soup, pork dumplings, and  Northern curry chicken 💞. ALL beautifully done.💗👍👍 Excellent..in taste, quality, quantity AND FRESHNESS-really important! VERY reasonable pricing. This is a clean place with excellent service, and waitresses as well! There are delivery options. Just newly opened. If you try it-I canNOT see HOW you could be disappointed‼️ (The computer menu pictures here actually look LIKE the food that arrives at your table🤗✅️✅️.)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXrxznzs2vaH6lPIW2OKDW3aT2B040xMuaWlue&fid=0x0:0x75a643b49f4d0f4c"],"When":"2024-3-7"},{"Name":"Thomas Tsang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_KgOCsAYZEAPWYf0eObzyiIRzeRK0EV1N6wMnE8JPvioznw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It is rare to find a restaurant that still takes their work seriously in 2023 ! Every dish is delicious, and I don't want to use any other adjectives because there is no need ,they are simply delicious !
Service is Five ⭐ ⭐⭐⭐⭐.Their sweet soy glazed spararib and Beef wrap are both out -standing !
I heartily recommend it to everyone and you will not be disappointed 👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyBxenXp2uM2XbnJDxUhLWRGcQHEkZPNhQM_1M&fid=0x0:0x75a643b49f4d0f4c"],"When":"2023-12-11"},{"Name":"Anona Budden","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJIAGzbCl2SfnnUp05xLIM37ZdcTvkhjXOEeW-Fu_R0Xf9E2w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This location was new to me. The Dan-dan here has to be my favourite! The place was small so I think our timing was perfect to get a table. There was only one waitress but there were only 5 tables. The food was fast and delicious and the service great! This will be my go to Peaceful restaurant to visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCL2EZleYv2c1JHfpK7TuDeBGMK5JkSnbWoWdw&fid=0x0:0x75a643b49f4d0f4c"],"When":"2024-4-29"},{"Name":"Gavin Chow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLYrTbqj_2uUHbmcJPrUf3Vu3sazf2tFppTHcx6-ZJ-aZOVVsEl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was so happy to see this open in our neighbourhood. The food and service was great. The team was friendly and the food had great “wok hei”

The spicy deep fried tofu was crispy and hot!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsYwNb6RMIia-RIyTb8EMs-5rhoLHXL0S95kun&fid=0x0:0x75a643b49f4d0f4c"],"When":"2023-12-4"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Cheryl Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKRqwGsiyntapcBOAHD9FtzNPiBoZCzUhMf_hjWst1Da_zYAf8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you want a meat fest, Balkan House is the place to go! It is open for both lunch & dinner. Exterior of the restaurant looks like an Alpine Lodge, interiors is nice with lots of seatings for small & large groups. Service was good, they are attentive and checking on us during our dinner. We ordered the Balkan platter for 2, plenty of food for 4 people. Meat was cooked nicely, flavour was great. Their mashed potatoes was so yummy.
There’s actually a buffet on the weekend, I have never tried but I heard there’s a lot of meat choices in the buffet. Well, the Balkan platter was plenty enough for us. Do check it out, you won’t regret it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKjcW6WMuYV68ArA37RIE4YnOCgnwicrqFVtni&fid=0x0:0x457de6980e085ea9"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Kim Ngo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVUW51_JD2gdhn69RUo1eSblKz6hTdynmiwsfhIJkcwOR-VDzhSw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We enjoyed ourselves. The service was fast, the food was delicious and came in a big portion that was good for its price. I got the Vienna Schnitzel, and I was too full to finish my plate. It was great. Unfortunately, my picture doesn’t show how big this schnitzel was due to the angle, but it was huge. The restaurant is very clean and quiet on a Sunday evening, and the decor definitely felt European.

If you like French fries, do get them here. They have a wonderful crunch that stays crunchy along with a fluffy, full inside—a combination that I don’t often have in other places. These are some of the best fries I have had to date.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSnQ_SRvwPGaxPa0lv0DNUmFXZWFfIZgWmk3bs&fid=0x0:0x457de6980e085ea9"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"kawaii hatchiko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLtom4JJghW2UnkOsI7GKr-J96yxZfSX4SBdkTaAQaNBfKVBVT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Haven’t been back in a while and forgotten how good the food is. We ordered the schnitzel and sausages. The food was flavourful and fresh. It came with a warm chicken noodle soup, rolls, and salad. We really enjoyed the tender chunks of chicken in the soup and the noodles make it extra comforting.  Way back when the schnitzel was served with scalloped potatoes. It now comes with a side of mash. I can’t wait to come again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAu0tXlBRjg59cJPShrRylyaKchEZXHRyfitgz&fid=0x0:0x457de6980e085ea9"],"When":"2024-4-1"},{"Name":"Dunja Meckic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkvelRZ9n6usKq8Ijq2JeTfIGJ2_ycj3xC_t6f754feiULCvK5-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It is what you'd expect it to be. The Balkan music is there, screaming running kids are there. Meat is good, fresh crispy, juicy, salads are good as well, but the sides eeerh rice and mashed potatoes are a miss for me, all in all if you're getting nostalgic it's a place for you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7MZXE7GsHzIY99rqjhRVTV6P9En7No355hZqk&fid=0x0:0x457de6980e085ea9"],"When":"2024-5-19"},{"Name":"Atena Razmpoush","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDTwnpwsyCMQv83dsdwlkz2BAvureQHzZZxo2_BIzfjtUBCR_R=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super tasty food, good amount of food per portion, friendly staff, and quick service.

It was a bit loud because of the next room’s group of guests talking loudly, and there wasn’t any music to balance the noise but the food made up for it😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOo-L9YQqfMx8v_Om-prmDn5XDIxMxd7qbLjsBG&fid=0x0:0x457de6980e085ea9"],"When":"2024-4-6"},{"Name":"Dave Basi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLrktnQEMtDlAtoL3M85BvDuQuI8sB11Y5ThfCIdepXQcozyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered dinner for 11 guests at our home. Food was delivered on time and piping hot. Everyone enjoyed and complimented on it. I recommend Balkin House for any catering needs. Will definitely use them again in the future.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Laura Ruiz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLLZ_MBqEbJtPkrmfIwr3pnOqvGflUhpGtb6nLoQWDj8S5ybw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food and kind service. Food was very good, just the entree bread was a little hard, everything else was so tasty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMecEw8Jt1hwWgz7VYi5tFL2lxmbeuJ58LiDIU5&fid=0x0:0x457de6980e085ea9"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"AO S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKze7UdX-4TjLx-T14PcVCVqQZ78AnuFyVUy9vOcpOmeWvay9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A taste of home… mmmm yum! Every time we go to Balkan house we are welcomed with warmth and genuine service. This place has a great atmosphere and welcomes everyone, so wherever you may be from you will feel at home at the Balkan House.. and the food is delicious! We love this place and our family has been a guest there for years. Highly recommend! Also they have great concerts and parties with live music from time to time and over holidays…","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Sushi On Burnaby (Edmonds st)

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Karen Calitis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI_4zqJD5HXDvTynl9izJSzwt84ua2Y43YvGoB07YjQi_QmJw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A place that is well worth visiting. The quality and value you get with each order was impressive. The sashimi platter was definitely our favourite. Portions were very big and filling. Would definitely recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmHE1QDWWD2qxMBcBwurLhopWQtdLm-5LUfH18&fid=0x0:0xb4357ce5a3060d53"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Peyman Sadr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqWFn0ePe18uaG7kAYgUMrxS50pUSoy6sVewCdKiGzix56M_e-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The vibe is super cozy and inviting, making it a great spot to relax and enjoy a meal. The sushi is fresh, flavorful, and just hits the spot every time. The staff are friendly and attentive, adding to the overall great experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMW4bEBJ0JdkDf7mci2bElJGk7n4U0SO2i5ixp5&fid=0x0:0xb4357ce5a3060d53"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Nick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGjptqH3FdoeLfdSjPWQygL5KEsM_ui4pClg77BekGUD0E-Q_8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food here deserves 5 stars but I had to take 1 star away due to the inattentive staff. Let's start with food first. It came to our table fairly quickly so that's always a plus. Sushi was great, slightly expensive but tasted great. My only concern was the staff wouldn't even come around or look in our direction so that we could ask for other dishes on the menu. They just brought the food to our table and went away towards the front counter, never came back again, constantly kept looking down at the ground trying to avoid eye contact. We were very surprised to see that kind of behavior in service industry.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7YAmp8WmWkToac7os3D42BRay-HAPskg82mB7&fid=0x0:0xb4357ce5a3060d53"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"DANICA DG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj8yVKC3dNCSLVLekHGiPlGf0ppRbR1ZDLgf-FYq7onHLSuVle=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Friendly staff, magma roll was tasty I could have two orders of it lol. I wanted a different based roll so I ordered the BC ROLL which is widely known for its salmon skin…… well it wasn’t what I expected as shown in the picture it was mostly crab meat and the skin was barely in it. Dont recommend it at all, it had that charcoal after taste too :/

Anyway, they have special rolls that looked very good on the menu. The price is not too expensive and the rolls are size just right!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLbdQYyvodk5tldbkRPhXPqVv607TMN1pgxod-&fid=0x0:0xb4357ce5a3060d53"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"Danny Chow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ7uIYz7vEyRlzc_sXf7AZKfTfm0JEbWhx8kEmQrYQim7HLQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food portions were generous, which was a highlight of the experience. However, the service felt rushed as the server seemed eager to accommodate another table of customers. This affected the overall dining atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHzL2hC5dgZy76Cej87XV62uXGxdaTbM7r7PGv&fid=0x0:0xb4357ce5a3060d53"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Devineah Prasad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXX1DFa9bRk6bvv1_M-orvwe0-273w8OFGry_kkVxXgLnOAtjdI1w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow! That's all I can say.  It was my first time at this sushi restaurant, and it was amazing. The sushi was so delicious and fresh. It tasted so good. I really enjoyed it. The service was good. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The atmosphere was beautiful and clean. I would definitely recommend coming to try the sushi here. It's totally a five out of five.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKPMKCev6Qg11_kZsIActg0jwlJngIc8eJlxpF&fid=0x0:0xb4357ce5a3060d53"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Маргарита Гербина","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfXwd1xFuwLN-wD90A-uQiq7Wn2K56ljOwyp-eQ0rKL43OM-J1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very tasty rolls, beautiful serving and the institution in general. I definitely recommend it. This place is now in my top 3🥰🤤
best places to eat rolls. The menu with pictures is already four stars😁

For four, the check came out without taking into account the tip of $166","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqaro4o2R8RSqTWNaGUaIio6koOkaMBTobl1u2&fid=0x0:0xb4357ce5a3060d53"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Anthony Plaxen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0TosyGAQWTqM_XvTHaXfq2jDGHv6ifKWBgTGcJKYnap3ceipL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time coming here and will come again to try out other rolls! I was so excited to try this place out finally and now I have to come back again!

The food was delicious! The sushi rolls are massive and well worth your money both in quantity and quality. The sushi is fresh and the salmon is very tasty!

Ordered the Angry Bird Roll and is by far one of the tastiest rolls I’ve had in awhile. Salmon sashimi was delicious on top of their house roll and it was nice and tangy and spicy. The miso soup is quite good too.

It’s nice seeing a wonderful place like this in the Edmonds area of Burnaby. Great service and excellent portions will have me coming back again when I’m craving that delicious sushi roll.

Update: Angry Roll is still very tasty!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOiLEI74V6x0ilgJvGMwaw2d_4www63mkNDtzHr&fid=0x0:0xb4357ce5a3060d53"],"When":"2024-3-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Maria M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmuhUB-INQ3XCbE2M9HT-MdzILSuqxW6ls6tLvy0JgUoxl1f3wCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Brazilian food with love! Couldn’t recommend it more, everything tastes fantastic. Have 1 of everything, and take some paçocas home!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhZjx1oH6TFZwF-aqI_8cURZV4qLvI7yos76y3&fid=0x0:0xf45db0143e0c59e3"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Tina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUAKiC5J1ql1LsLTTfBwgvAj6sVGUusHXghumDKVG9ZTQ8QjcD_1w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time trying Brazilian food and the Feijoada is SO good!! We got the Feijoada, Beef a Cavalo, and Churros. They made a fresh batch of churros for us and it was divine.

It was also my first time having the Guarana soda — I think i’ve found my new fav sugar free soda.

It’s an unassuming little restaurant with a few seating inside and patio seatings outside. They also sell some Brazilian groceries in store.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhM3JyVwBqlOwu3dh80TsbpDQMHhQhka6_U1De&fid=0x0:0xf45db0143e0c59e3"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"Jade Fawkes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjEGhdRCBx1U0rQYjiJQ6V7_OE6RQT10IYirqb1CXWTXWIE7k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is awesome. The owner is very sweet and helpful. The food is terrific! the treats are my husbands absolute favourite right now. He can be picky so that means its legitimately very good. The deep fried croquettes are addictive! I’ve been here twice and I’m sure ill be coming back many more times. The smell when you walk in is fantastic and just makes you hungry!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Fernanda Soldera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJwuF3TZlrcQqrD7qkPlFPxvT8CSwW_QLGoKa0YZ-TxsK0Vvt0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"AWESOME place, excellent service and even better food. They’re regular food is awesome and they adapted the gnocchi for a veggie plate! The sweet desserts were addictive <3","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJJdyiAhz4B_auWHD7QU2APUWWUAJ6kn7ArZ7g&fid=0x0:0xf45db0143e0c59e3"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"Luiz Henrique Stockler de Oliveira","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKjrsSysOJoQonN1TzsNtjc8CT0okbGQHPYf6-fjndVfYPzD-wz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"DELICIOUS AUTHENTIC Brazilian food, with a Minas Gerais twist, prepared with care by a talented chef! Fantastic. You can assemble your own plate or order  la-carte. Eat-in or take out, a great find here in Vancouver: we will be back for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWPEisC_hZm4c8NPLEy73Wuoqn3MEUc45vb9nY&fid=0x0:0xf45db0143e0c59e3"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Marina Shcherbakova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyLcc8GZsJdQZpxpX6MKq7M68TDSvo70nMESQn_e-1N4B3YVk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I had a great experience at this shop! They offer a small menu of delicious Brazilian dishes and also sell desserts and a variety of Brazilian products, including rice, beans, candies, farofa, coffee, and pop.

During my visit, I ordered the Feijóada, and it was absolutely delicious! The small portion was generous enough, especially if you're not too hungry.

The only thing I would suggest improving is providing dine-in customers with actual cutlery and plates instead of plastic ones. It was a bit challenging to enjoy the meal with plastic utensils, especially cutting the food with a plastic knife.

Overall, I highly recommend this Brazilian shop for its tasty food, friendly service, and authentic products. It's definitely worth a visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP70hVA2j6HSB13HZIElJTM4x_o8DDCARSmPSIC&fid=0x0:0xf45db0143e0c59e3"],"When":"2024-4-21"},{"Name":"Ruth Kelyne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI1hxuafalVGICZx0d35UVyNusmsx89ftzRvqCsycx_rJysKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food there is to die for, especially the desserts. Passion fruit mousse and chocolate cake is my favourite. The name speaks by itself “Mineiros” one of the best culinary in Brazil, original taste.
Price is fair. Service is excellent and friendly. The only improvement point is a small room for dine in.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gisele Lackeski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5rjrkWGZYDjutFPmexc0GNDleiFffVIooFtp4FN1FZY3ZDw4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place offers an incredible dining experience with both outstanding food and exceptional customer service. The staff is extremely friendly and attentive, making us feel welcome from the moment we stepped in. Their desserts are the highlight, with the cakes being absolutely delicious. I highly recommend trying the passion fruit mousse with chocolate – it’s a perfect blend of flavors and an absolute must for dessert lovers!  this place won’t disappoint.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"1961pocoloco","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKUbZ9PaXJo4xzkoAqh4HXKfKgRZ-9UZ_Ejcd0meZuO8sfAVA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was very good from the pasta to the Slovakia, reasonably priced like most of past houses in Burnaby and new Westminster. Service was excellent. Overall I gave a four because I really don’t know what a five is.
If you order a large pasta, be prepared to take home leftovers for the next couple of days.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSNe_YNPIuZ0U6SllMHiFxC73Nki8GJ7wp7CIH&fid=0x0:0x5835d24b106dab11"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Luke Weng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXn1tdfwXfRnZVszKV8bZBNwooyRqfHv0VT8T0EAQWyUrqTrrO6aQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Today we went here to celebrate my sisters birthday. Man, I honestly had no idea how it would turn out, but our experience at Amoroso has exceeded our expectations!

Eugenia was very kind and went above and beyond to serve us, filling our waters every time we needed more. She told us the restaurant has been open for 32 years. I saw regular customers ordering "the usual". Like a scene out of a movie.

The atmosphere is dark and ambient- very romantic. They offer a free birthday pasta (you bring ID for proof), and have HUGE servings!! They were as big as Anton's!

The price is reasonable with the gigantic portions. The cheesecake is a must-have. It's double baked and comes with a candle if it's your birthday!

I'm definitely coming back here again, and I 100% recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpvYhinmsA3_gc3V0-thwQ1nUw5hQwkyd8p-y4&fid=0x0:0x5835d24b106dab11"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"desmaniak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWur6zZS9hmIvUyr8h8l0mKQ2Tyvu3P6fpkdaqZFvVXYrNlvnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"When I initially saw the menu I thought wow $20 pasta that’s kinda expensive, but the portion size was huge and the pasta was flavourful with great sauce. The service was very welcoming. The double layer sauce was delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPL41z7MEeGc9c8l146tK2YD_hwjF6TR8xmxe19&fid=0x0:0x5835d24b106dab11"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Sylvia Wunder","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLWnKi7DdZM7EeOp25GCd1l8J1-L_rYXXZI7qi-_AM1rn-2I7t=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a great locally owned restaurant!! Started supporting this fabulous find before the pandemic and haven’t looked back. The food is prepared to please your palette and fill your belly. The pasta portions are quite large almost guaranteeing leftovers. Why go far for flavour when it’s so close to home?","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Leon Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPOnBvlGz2k_WzxOhCiURR3aRaAE5ffHXfUBJJ4GP7GBC5Wn8K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Their portion size is very good for the price, and I really liked their soup! Though I wasn't a fan of their pasta, as it was quite watery and blend despite the sheer amount of pepper I added in. The restaurant atmosphere kinda gave a Kitchen Nightmare vibe, but I would come here for a very large portion of pasta :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQ2q-Tb_f1mS91WamledeROFdyErkviliM7WyP&fid=0x0:0x5835d24b106dab11"],"When":"2024-2-23"},{"Name":"Darlene Swanson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKIlUeEyk_dlQoSEEu-fFpfdD9KbZknlh9YlLGaTKMBn-YRNeI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went last night with my 2 sisters.   We shared mussel appetizer in a beautiful tomato broth.    We totally loved it.   Portions are excellent.  Pasta dishes as wonderful as remembered.   Service great  lovely atmosphere.  Highly recommended","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brian Shaler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVanm_SU1M6cSuCRW78pg1T2oWnXPERDUCzn8bF70zKPszCwZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"(Updating my review from 3 years ago.  Still love this place and it’s a shame we have to come from Richmond because there isn’t really anything like it there.  The servings are still great value, especially the lamb shoulder under $30) A great little neighbourhood pasta house.   The service great, the food better.  A generous serving of pasta at very fair prices.  Not that much more than Spaghetti Factory but way better.  I light the sauces as they feel very rich but not heavy.   Another bonus is the very reasonable drinks menu.  From pop to wine, enjoy one for less than almost any other restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKT-aawnSC2EhS1_KefKN3hALSoHzGd-mQb-bD&fid=0x0:0x5835d24b106dab11"],"When":"2024-3-11"},{"Name":"Ron Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4C9fuu3Pgu102q3bAxHKivkiOQqwqKjJditkVdy4zIZ628gCE7g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pasta was excellent, it tasted fresh and the sauce was quite creamy.

Portion size was just enough, not bad but it wasn't huge either.  I ordered a size of scallops but they were whole scallops sliced thin which was disappointing.

Calamari was excellent, done just right.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAy5yZ7xxlsZ0M1NnCYE_n1HX7P562U9fSLOas&fid=0x0:0x5835d24b106dab11"],"When":"2022-9-29"}]

title: HanSang Korean Cuisine

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"David","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLMVNrelwnKYV3EAFXn5yFTrrNDpu5H9f8WpsH0l1WWE5BxoQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was passing by and saw the reopening sign so stopped in.  I’m so glad I did. Wanted to try everything on the menu but we needed up ordering the Deungppyo Jjim which translates to “stewed pork”. We had the teriyaki flavouring which was amazing. And they give you so much “banchan” (side dishes) here and everything tastes so authentic.
The new owners are very friendly and the atmosphere is a nice mix of westernized and traditional Korean with the round drum tables. This place is a great spot for affordable Korean food in Burnaby!! Amazing food !! I will definitely be back for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNh6r1LEEHbyBT0BobyC7-Aa3iPKeFy1hSOfZ3_&fid=0x0:0x5f8791e68c4ba15c"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Shash VanC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3iGzFdLTEcacdijcoaukbFgvw1WCQgx4rhm1LK-aDXXCK1MUiLw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a wonderful experience at this Korean restaurant! The waiter was incredibly friendly and attentive, which made the dining experience even better. The food was delicious, and I especially loved their bulgogi—it was flavorful and perfectly cooked. I’ll definitely be coming back to try more dishes. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkvR_NWLIbF-v23hIzR8fuRkpwoPDfSKiXgLZn&fid=0x0:0x5f8791e68c4ba15c"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Irene K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIsUUc3e6rqEZAOXhocl_ekEtudMIKY8dhGU2ewI2rKuSqx-g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I heard that the ownership of this restaurant changed recently. so I try it yesterday. I tried their daily special menu, and I was pleased with both the quality of the meat and the variety of tasty side dishes. I’d like to come back on another day to try more. I’m really happy to have a great Korean restaurant near my home!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQ5CbFI043vA2gvl2Ad7NrqN4evd278Ra6M1Vq&fid=0x0:0x5f8791e68c4ba15c"],"When":"2024-11-8"},{"Name":"William Liong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIF02Gj0Ex4PDfouQqnt1Xn01E_35GnmLfSqxwKRASK_g2xNg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The fried chicken is really fresh as well as juicy and crispy. ^_^
The spicy pork has a nice flavor and not too spicy as well, the rice complemented nicely with the pork.
Their Tteokbokki is also very delicious. It has a good spice and sweetness and become a great sauce for the chicken. :)
The server is also very kind and attentive.
Highly recommend this place and will come back here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMA0snzwZx6H1u4f02xVuXQ4PEMSHzLszzDYfyh&fid=0x0:0x5f8791e68c4ba15c"],"When":"2024-3-10"},{"Name":"Garros Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVqCZ5SrEVCeWca2p4Fwp9tYk5yO9Jvw1K6t9iksNnZEwBFCHr=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"New Korean restaurant in the Edmonds, Burnaby area with modern, spacious interior. Server is friendly, snowing cheese fries chicken is crispy & juicy with nice cheese smell. The tofu soup is tasty and rich flavor as well. Tteokbokki is chewy and spicy. Overall, pretty good dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN16IZz9zHmq6psWNJp-CBs362IMWPnIlsiMk2x&fid=0x0:0x5f8791e68c4ba15c"],"When":"2024-3-18"},{"Name":"Matt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUN9SJRiPEwkviADxJD5-VN-Wr5flnHBuPUJjis-Li0oTjGjX8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The fried chicken is very tender and juicy on the inside and crispy outside. The server is very nice, suggested that I order the ghost pepper sauce on the side. The ghost pepper sauce is very spicy but tasty, perfect if you can dip. The bean sprout soup is very rich, even without meat in it. And we really like the picked radish.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJkDDmmExwiSnxrdKYsGQ6tcN3Q8OK5HD8NGBz&fid=0x0:0x5f8791e68c4ba15c"],"When":"2024-3-2"},{"Name":"ItzVanice_Keung_show KT","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVF6KSDUr5GK1XYVVrgiIBV9kQ0NJRVC3DBARA1KxpFG5Br7MY9=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This place is spacious, and very comfortable to dine in to, the food is very delicious. The Tteokbokki is very moist and it has the perfect amount of spice level and got a tint of sweetness which is perfect for a frigid weather. My family and I also love their round Skillet Combo, this is a must try for people who love Korean spicy food. The portion is very filling as well as the boneless fried chicken, for this chicken I recommend choosing the sweet chilli flavor remember to request for mixed in, it’s kinda crispy , but can work on it like over fried it so it can balanced with the sauce. Overall this place is a wonderful place for people who loves Korean food as much as I do❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEribvf_L54Tn4h3AmTi0EQwFjuSAc2Dpd0lGN&fid=0x0:0x5f8791e68c4ba15c"],"When":"2024-3-9"},{"Name":"Don Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKNdS3a0JX5rJRoa2AJZjvFJexGHZCF_jcoEpAYYMdr9pMMrHWF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is excellent!  Fried Chicken is juicy and tender. The Home made dumpling soup also surprisingly good. Will definitely come back to try other items on the menu. Excited to see new restaurants with quality food in the neighborhood.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpUK-rSBOfG_H-IoKal7pQU8Q8ezP0j3fEwSgA&fid=0x0:0x5f8791e68c4ba15c"],"When":"2024-3-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dean Vernooy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK8MXWMJ2_4gEbhR-cVkXSWYa1inHZmPdpzVwWpQdIs5cxOuw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent food(when the Owner-Chef cooks!! I had the lamb entre today, which was a sizeable solo portion, it wasn’t too heavy considering that the dish mainly consists of meat, onions, broth and authentic spices! My dish exceptionally tender and the African bread served with the entree soaks up the stew sauce as expected, making it for a very satisfying meal! And beyond the food, the all day hookah is always delicious and acutely taken care of my the kind serving staff, which prolongs the satisfying big clouds of smoke! I tried the tea for the first time and LOVED it! I very much look forward to my next visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipON8TgU_Vji4rkN15EIOyXTGH8g4EUyi_lBbk8j&fid=0x0:0xce9b6b28a25b0033"],"When":"2024-4-25"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved it! Ethiopian food here is amazing! Tried the Veggie Combo platter to go which came with 4 veggie stews and one salad along with a generous portion of injera bread. The injera bread was moist, bubbly, and airy and paired excellently with the spiced vegetables. The variety of flavours and textures included with the veggie combo was awesome and allowed me to continue switching up the flavours in my mouth. Loved the generous portion size allowing you to eat to full satisfaction and beyond. It was a veggie feast with a nice kick and made you feel good after eating it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsXx8u177Rk7aA6daDo2-N7SKgcBBsXG6rJaDs&fid=0x0:0xce9b6b28a25b0033"],"When":"2023-4-22"},{"Name":"Jesse Saunders","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1hClt0UxOXZlyU4I46SBwJPzo1Z4B4RS95VJYdU2n7VSDAcechg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a great time here with a friend. The menu wasn't overly large, so it was easy to find something to eat. Everything is authentic and tasty. We had the Hummus and this chicken dish where you use the dough to scoop it up like a spoon. Super tasty and loved the spicy kick to it! I love trying new foods and would recommend this to anyone.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5DZu3pbHtNKRWG0tNvNo6j3-sagGPLgXAnYrc&fid=0x0:0xce9b6b28a25b0033"],"When":"2020-10-26"},{"Name":"nastaran Abt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXkGXjQOjymaHFEJUAy762NKL03ItMfNFebc05LqCE-eDW8v7AV=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a great experience there. The food and hookah were excellent, and the host was very kind. It was a unique and enjoyable experience for us.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mike","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrTugvVk7Qf75kP_xca5EJ52m4ZHxbO-3uW0ZrYPus-vrHUJVgRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tried tsada Tibs man its filling, taste delicious and you really feel great afterwards too. Great service and staff. Atmosphere was not my fav because there's a bit of smoke as it's open Hookah lounge in the evening around 9/10pm and a little opportunity to improve is lowering down the volume of music as it was loud, it would make the atmosphere a little more calm and chill to hangout. But overall the food is amazing.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jameela A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIGmIjT4W8Bo17-ggNSzxcoDgtO-KQSSmnpYgy_oZo7qm1k2w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"My boyfriend took me out for our anniversary and we came here for dinner (7:15 ish pm on a Tuesday, maybe about 10 people in the restaurant including us).
I've never tried Ethiopian food and was really looking forward to it. The moment we came in, the music was blaring loud, the bass turned all the way up, and you couldn't hear anyone talk. My boyfriend and I had to text each other to talk 🤨.

This place is also a hookah lounge but has zero ventilation and we couldn't breathe properly. Doors and windows closed completely as well.

We asked numerous times if they could turn the music down, and the waitress said she would every time, but then said that "they" keep saying no and won't let her.  So we asked to get our dinner to go since we already ordered it.

Food was delicious, but instead of a nice anniversary dinner, we ate at home, again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chris Roche","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZ3EOkgzq4HzWMd46dKtzXAwGKVn2ZGvsETXCsK_73-CfYd37mnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've never tried Ethiopian food before and I was very surprised of how good it was! Delicious and flavourful.

Service was also great. Staff are friendly.

Price as well is amazing. For what you pay you get a lot! And it isn't overly expensive.

Would definitely recommend trying this place out","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMU6GymFnUiK8nVGbdEqsSZCEvjT1BwTUGmW8yN&fid=0x0:0xce9b6b28a25b0033"],"When":"2021-3-28"},{"Name":"Wayne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8QJBi6QcTRAi7AdEdYaGH_JW0AEF7e6HzgNdEU0sa_JSuPyNJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Tried this restaurant based on the high rating on Google map - Unlikely to return.

a pickup order.

Something minor: the ordering process on the phone was a bit unsmooth, resulting in wrong order.

The interior has its own characteristics, but looks somewhat dated.

Overall, we hope the menu could explain a bit more about the foods and provide more options for different food preferences.

I've never had Ethiopian food before.
Not sure if I ordered the wrong dish,
but the Chicken and Lamb Tibsi both come with lots of (too much) thin 'bread' that look interesting but taste sour.

The chicken meats are soaked in sauce with lots of (too much) oil. No greens come with any of the Tibsi's; the website images show otherwise. The tastes are not bad, but a bit too strong for us.

Also tried Hummus Caramalized Onions. The bread tastes ordinary / dry, which is ok. I would prefer having this bread to go with Tibsi's. The sauce seems to be made of beans with added oily sauce.

Ended up with leftover of lots of those thin sour 'bread' for Tibsi's that we don't know whatelse to go with.

Value wise, it depends on how you like the thin sour bread;
but for us it's way too much, and we are more interested in the meats which are not enough compared to other restaurants.

Free street parking available on Edmonds and 6th.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtEbbqL83S0c1h6HLggfhw4mSyzN7_HM_K9sPa&fid=0x0:0xce9b6b28a25b0033"],"When":"2021-7-4"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ting-Yu Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlodVKIQ8_dmfGPXSY9bPBrYe1KhcRgWKeM1WOBzrhDpGlDdnb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We got spinach lamb and coconut chicken. Spinach lamb has stronger taste and a little spicy for people like us who don’t eat spicy at all, but we like it. The coconut chicken is very soft, a bit sweet.

Garlic naan bread is a must-eat here‼️I recommend order two different flavors here so you don’t get tired of it because they are all very heavy.

We came here on a weekend night. Chill and quiet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZ78IRqS_QfIj2Xi5oqyN-5MII720AvjT0oOXp&fid=0x0:0xf07b16d84b298098"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Hillbillytc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV833YeKMKJfxtYeKhRHVRSrikZoFOcCapKBwyEFBOnxiCMeXAZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The naan bread was very tasty. We have tongo back to try the rest. The server was very friendly. The atmosphere was a little disappointing it had l a disc feel. Would be nice if they had Indian music instead.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLPV7qHgooy0vAch51vhx0I9k9KEZrPMBFec4x&fid=0x0:0xf07b16d84b298098"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Celina Arenillo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLPvcNqjpmtihcb5J8miFlC4lw0H-EdaSQUtLM4u3kh0_GMHA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I had dinner here and ordered Garlic Naan, Butter Chicken, Lamb Masala, Coconut Rice, and the fried cheese for appetizer.

Everything was good, fresh and tasty. There was actually meat in the butter chicken and lamb masala so you know they did not scrimp on ingredients.

Service was attentive too. Will definitely go back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMotl39XOTcsL7O2B93DEJwH9NYMFmfXGmW8Jle&fid=0x0:0xf07b16d84b298098"],"When":"2024-5-30"},{"Name":"Charles Gunawan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJAa61dKuhHFezm-qZJ1MyugjaBCJmNyJRMF5s0VQhcOp2D1ZF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good tasty food, good price, decent atmosphere, free parking, free wifi. I recommend goat biryani, and chicken Naan.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4cK96gTgA0sreTxPJutyCz2QYxXIqoWCFVT0&fid=0x0:0xf07b16d84b298098"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Lister Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWbNvO55wOzkDRxCcJ-fMoCcdWyut5hlx-H_zUreRnwso9_V0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had lamb curry and friend had combo with lamb, chicken, rice, naan, dessert . Also ordered garlic naan and mango ice cream. Quick service and delicious","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBJpJuWatPzETHkDd__uAGPQtU6xgbbCWLZLbp&fid=0x0:0xf07b16d84b298098"],"When":"2024-3-5"},{"Name":"Heather Chatterton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL7IfedKSn_eOIC8drcusP2ZP2fmQV5HK2K0Y50okRIFlF0Xg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"✅️✅️✅️‼️THIS Edmonds St restaurant IS a GREAT place to eat!🥰 We have now tried their already recommended coconut rice- OH! Delicious and moist! 💕Their regular moist rice comes, with a side of peppers, cucumbers, carrots, etc.  Then, their garlic naan-OH MY-for US a first time -and it was SO good!  I have not seen it on other Indian menus nearby-but it was really tasty. Even "regular" naan was just great and fresh!  Then we shared a wonderful tasting lamb Rogan Josh dish, chicken Masala, and Vindaloo chicken , and vegetables Jalfrezi- I believe. It was  ALL GREAT- every mouthful!  Spicy🤯 -or not🙃-however YOU want it😁-is available for you❗️ ✅️✅️Prices are very VERY fair-we check everywhere  ALways first! Their menu is nicely varied as well!😊  It is also veghan friendly.  Right UP there as one of the BEST Indian genuine foods restaurants around that we have been to! It is clean, has adequate seating, and the server was VERY helpful and friendly. We will ALL come back HERE for more! It left us,wanting more! 😛","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOg6QWvc0Bf-W0rmyajA8HlcYNTojDkv9Jqbey1&fid=0x0:0xf07b16d84b298098"],"When":"2024-1-5"},{"Name":"Ratcha K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLFcWm_B-ffn4GucsbPW6GI777Uy20c9aLdJ3pIEIZp61zRKg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is a hidden gem! The food, especially the lunch special, doesn't miss. You get a choice to two meat curries and a veg. Ohhh mannnn. The palak paneer was the definition of creamy. She thick and flavorful. I also got the lamb curry and chicken curry. Both delicious. Aloo gobi? Fire 🔥

I did take out and had to come back and dined in two days later cause I couldn't stop thinking about the lunch special. It's giving Indian buffet without the gorging.
I left happy and full for less than 15 dollars.

Peep the chai. 2.50","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzjYOAD0SCzpbV6xNnFZCYsbxnAxo68XmZ82KO&fid=0x0:0xf07b16d84b298098"],"When":"2024-3-2"},{"Name":"Caryl Bayle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBEtfqVCb60AE85bCSLz6fEjOC55fzETps4cLKDG4992svci1s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tried this place out for the first time last night and was very impressed. Ordered the lamb korma, butter chicken, vegetable pakora & garlic naan and all were very tasty. Definitely one of the better Indian restaurants in the area, also love how they actually put a good amount of meat in the lamb korma & butter chicken unlike most places. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Sushi Modo
descriptions: Informal strip-mall eatery offering Japanese fare from sushi rolls to sashimi & tempura plates.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a great dinner experience here. It was better than what I expected. I thought of just getting the basic crunchy rolls, salmon oshi, plain udon, and chicken terriyaki and boy it’s better than the average ones I’ve had elsewhere in Vancouver. So went furthermore going for the mango tango roll and the hotate gai nigiri and boy, I was speechless as it was again better than what I expected. And lastly was the price. My son said I bet if it’s under a $100, he’ll pay for it…. And guess what? I just had a free dinner. Lol! Price point is good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGCslGdRD1okX58Vfd3PL1mqdk84YrYtoOP50t&fid=0x0:0x87560d80f0c4d107"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Lucy Lei","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWqMDQPy8Rdj2ck6AFqBEF6oKEHn-aaEjadtV4H6wI1nduavxw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We had a lovely experience here! Quick and attentive service and good sushi! We got the Oshi Platter with 5 types of aburi: beef, scallop, tuna, salmon, and shrimp. It was delicious, I just wish the fish slices were thicker so we can taste more of the star of the show rather than the rice, which was too overpowering. The mentaiko cream udon was rich and creamy. The udon texture was perfectly chewy but the mentaiko amount present was quite little compared to other locations.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMn3tNpV9aezpEd9unYgfZfQxFDh0NfwRyCVlp&fid=0x0:0x87560d80f0c4d107"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Ryan Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQl1j9sZTOT0V9bUqpH9in_0GIVVfG0l3j5RhhcMAIo39qi9zA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This was my first time trying Sushi Modo. I've been searching for a good Katsu Don in Vancouver, so I looked it up on Yelp and found this place nearby.

Surprisingly, this restaurant seems to be genuinely Japanese-managed rather than Chinese. The venue is clean and tidy, and the waitress served me politely with a big smile, reminiscent of restaurants in Japan.

In my opinion, the Katsu Don is a 3.5/5. The rice portion is just right (about 1/4 cup, if you're familiar with rice cookers, you know what I mean). The pork cutlets with egg topping were decent, in the traditional Katsu Don style. The sauce was a bit salty but still acceptable. I'm not sure if it would be juicier if I dined in, as my pork cutlets were a bit dry inside, though the coating was still crispy and tasty.

The miso soup was tastier than the usual powdered versions. It included tofu, which added to the flavor and made the soup more enjoyable.

The 9-piece California roll was decent and worth the price.

I will try again next time and see if dining in makes a difference.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLiATEpTI21zBp9NbhYaNaXXP1fsfDDstLl5e4&fid=0x0:0x87560d80f0c4d107"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"Ellen Sun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKkjdruPSIFv65dsKIMMRNGR-izc6K1STFginUcbAMqwRUvOLA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Honestly one of my favourite go-to sushi places. I always get the salmon oshi sushi! The chicken karaage was fresh and crispy. Also got the sexy salmon and the volcano roll. Both did not disappoint. In short, this is a place I keep coming back to because of the quality and service. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6TaheMqzomp4RcQS4BWfBeE5npFnJyp-HnYas&fid=0x0:0x87560d80f0c4d107"],"When":"2024-5-15"},{"Name":"San Wayne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjFb2dB41O9n_VFwgfqlyajgDnGhNggu7YKnObZ04VikDc3OZS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It is a bit disappointed. The Chirashi is not fresh enough. It is more like western Japanese food more than real Japanese food. When I finished the dish, it took away all my plates and give me the bill immediately. That time was only 7:00pm that no one is waiting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUdskFqEBRMQ42r546vc3uoFDsiSkH1i-eT7l-&fid=0x0:0x87560d80f0c4d107"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Gabe Labbe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJIh3OBlLpa34iHkjKjoqdJFX-R_kRjR3U8-EF_gxT2cNfZ7g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We love Sushi Modo! Our family has been coming here for 2 years and it’s replaced the sushi spot in our neighborhood. Yes, it’s definitely worth the trip to come here for sushi. Try everything once I promise you won’t be disappointed. The staff is wonderful, food is great and the experience is top notch! Sushi Moto is A+","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNALx3DxMAIx5pE54Zw0lr4oIS9pw3ciIoHNx3W&fid=0x0:0x87560d80f0c4d107"],"When":"2024-3-17"},{"Name":"Elisha Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0IHL8y2Cihe-JHsbY1GhIycs9GwfOt-fl6abGIYZXEFDBXD7N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cream udon was fantastic. It felt like experiencing a traditional Japanese meal. The beef in the beef tataki was so fresh. The staff were also very friendly. Enjoying a delicious meal was a great joy for me today. I hope many others can enjoy this excellent taste together.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOypFrSq1Ucnlp6JlbC3caGa9c9SYEWc1XnGabR&fid=0x0:0x87560d80f0c4d107"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Danton Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgueQRlMAVPZgav3xijeolhWbmHHzpOUs8-3foTTu2gNBOWTMe=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Japanese food for us is a great 9.5/10 round it up!

Great service came to do refills and ask how food was doing !

Nice homey feel! Not too bad I would 9/10 this :)

Couldn’t take pictures before kids just dove right in :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMH_AtdwGihA3Hjm3B5SLhIXjnkJ7SXabvatmTr&fid=0x0:0x87560d80f0c4d107"],"When":"2024-5-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Leslie Chiang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlSTPdK4YoHC1wq3c1pvrfzBxW0giV_P5-Oe8ZtB3P5KMZ8y1m=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been frequenting this place for the past year and I have to say it’s my new fav local sushi restaurant for both dine in and take out! This is a humble little sushi place; the calibre of the food is high and service is great. The dishes are always presented in such a beautiful manner, like it’s art- and that even goes for their take-out. You can just tell they put so much care in preparing every order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOInzuRmBq5nGmpQ44HTFknYChCKm5biqW_oqLd&fid=0x0:0x9a16ebe17952adb"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Cleo Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVc_okNOTVNmiNZXdFIf_9KhM-Bpn0aLuJNoEv6eRke0OqUyhQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been here several times now and can highly recommend. Quality food with large menu selection, great service is the highlight and we will definitely continue to come back. We always get to choose where we’d like to sit, they give you space and do not rush for bills at the end. If you’d like to sit and chill for a while, they will just continue to fill your tea. We love it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgGYZ4tJysm3sCGn2juDLEobfzURINBjQbRmuY&fid=0x0:0x9a16ebe17952adb"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"Dylan Yang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocILge3FsOoUO_BSWHfBHV9qlpCGOZggPikSm2I5vpjbQV3Psw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant offers an exceptional dining experience with fresh, authentic Japanese cuisine and beautifully crafted dishes. The sushi and sashimi are incredibly fresh, and the flavors of each dish are perfectly balanced. The restaurant’s atmosphere is warm and inviting, with a modern yet traditional Japanese aesthetic. The staff is friendly, attentive, and knowledgeable, making excellent recommendations and providing outstanding service. Whether you're a fan of sushi or exploring new dishes, this place is a must-try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1BD4df19fs3gAoygFCU7PtMqk3Nga3z_UNglL&fid=0x0:0x9a16ebe17952adb"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Masood A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViB6B7TXwuDNaTX-_aXg7pXl55lHGKC1gJq5yiy0IKloPDSAdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Watashi Sushi & Kitchen on Edmonds Street in Burnaby offers a delightful dining experience with fresh, well-prepared sushi and a variety of other Japanese dishes. The service is friendly and efficient, and the restaurant maintains a cozy, welcoming atmosphere. Whether you’re dining in or taking out, the quality and taste of the food are consistently impressive. The menu offers a good range of options, from traditional rolls to more creative choices, making it a great spot for sushi lovers. Highly recommended for anyone in the area looking for delicious, authentic Japanese cuisine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXrDRJanSyj6xxAqZfeFnX1jKdIDUYgNJLSLPW&fid=0x0:0x9a16ebe17952adb"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"NC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUi7i4NwNpNEzIszjhbxKRN43HbVvZt8x4BOGr2pmqSj3ZKyWTz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food looks much better than it tastes. The visuals and playing is beautiful. Taste wise, we were underwhelmed. I’m also not sure if the fish is fresh. I eat a lot of sushi, and the meal tasted off and lacking. The worst nigiri from my combo was the sockeye salmon, you can see it looks either old or bad…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNg1UNHioX_gS4k9XvDgNX-jAx1fl10plQIAkxN&fid=0x0:0x9a16ebe17952adb"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Estee I","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKkZ-MRBhDIrdxG3m2OgjhCFBx4IYvUNlZBeOWVR-w8JHtR15E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very bright and well decorated restaurant.
Awesome service and good food.
Chicken teriyaki is well made, not too greasy like how other nearby places made it.
Decently priced too.
Best sushi place in this neighborhood. 👍🏼","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJLYPFYY1jhQ__RYxbRKVv_gTMu6c_lGpClOZY&fid=0x0:0x9a16ebe17952adb"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Ellen B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLdarebUYq_obCJ5oYSrHq9IRVcl1zqWs_kDwbkdtogwJX8rA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favorite sushi spot in all of Vancouver! The chef’s incredible experience and skill truly shine through, offering high-quality food at a great price. The staff is also incredibly friendly! The sashimi is especially outstanding, with exceptional quality. The rolls are delicious, and the aburi sushi is simply unmatched—nothing compares! If you’re reading this review and wondering where to go, I highly recommend you give this place a try! You won’t be disappointed! I’m soooooooo happy I discovered this restaurant!😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOgCslQPLkrEwNUdqO3ktVpViRb-EKmAzCDh6S&fid=0x0:0x9a16ebe17952adb"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"Anthony Plaxen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0TosyGAQWTqM_XvTHaXfq2jDGHv6ifKWBgTGcJKYnap3ceipL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really enjoyed lunch here. I ordered a few special rolls. Both were really tasty, fresh and unique.

The lavender roll was really good. Purple yams deep fried are delicious and it was crispy! The legend roll was very interesting. It is kind of like a BC roll but with cream cheese and a mint mayo dressing on the top with gold flakes. It was really good and the torched salmon on the top was a nice kicker.

The staff were super friendly and attentive and the rolls were quite good. I would recommend this spot in burnaby if you’re looking for good unique sushi rolls. Will come back again and try out their other items on the menu!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNieb4axlXTQSlw8vSCE2XOQ08hFoHjGmZnamD7&fid=0x0:0x9a16ebe17952adb"],"When":"2024-6-1"}]
