user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Terri Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdHMQamP6ntk6cmD8m9VHj4cLgJWNXVSwfy5Jk1_ks8LpnASP1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm so so happy Nare offers raw marinated crab $29 (ganjang gejang)!! I don't have to go to Jejudo anymore! And the quality and freshness of the raw crabs were much much much better Jejudo!!! So happy!! Also no upset stomachs after the meal so the freshness of the crab was very good! Heard from word of mouth their jajang noodles were great too but imo it's ok. Their sundoobu was a tad bit spicy 🥵 so might ask next time to be mild. Overall strongly recommend! If possible maybe make reservations because it's quite a small restaurant with 6 or 7 tables of 4 seaters.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGThSiTf3jxysX7Q4iNVbqkhfdwThGd-kZN8_F&fid=0x0:0x55aba46be1d2484a"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"Carmen Aboytes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCCLFKJlS62-34BUpujZzDsaZV9yysTxPBmk8fhCY7OoETeMyS6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything we ordered was absolutely fantastic! We’ll definitely be coming back and highly recommend this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNY7Y57ppMPPPx-_1B5JEmMtravGYJ5_6RK32YA&fid=0x0:0x55aba46be1d2484a"],"When":"2024-11-21"},{"Name":"Melinda W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqFa91nGQX9-WVxFZ-rAUul10GF70bhWZFQZe97ymoPVUZrvFxnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I stumbled into Na-Re after visiting Oh! Zzhu Sam coz it is right across the street. There are actually quite a number of Korean restaurants on the same street. As a Korean food lover, I'm determined to try every one nearby.

Na-Re has a more modern decor. It makes it more appealing to young people I think. Their food is pretty good as well, but it just lacks a bit of the authetic touch to me. That said, the overall dining experience is very pleasant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNycTGJwyDi4EKa5MfhWBALqFO8DOiNU26fLxIS&fid=0x0:0x55aba46be1d2484a"],"When":"2024-5-12"},{"Name":"Amy Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvtm7hBqZHDYxXgP_oxkelx2FGhwfW-EuwTv9rdyjxo-_-_8Nq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was pretty good and tasted authentic. I enjoyed the gimbap and fried chicken the most. The food is a bit on the pricier side for the area, but we enjoyed our meal. We got to enter the contest for Taylor Swift tickets!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPR8-G9gaAJLku4yn2YO287ZOENufc9dIEY18JZ&fid=0x0:0x55aba46be1d2484a"],"When":"2024-1-7"},{"Name":"Lisa Tam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8LPK4S17-2F0yfXkAPDw6Ubrk4QeQ_NBYsPgKe_nMg3FDAjrgrg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious place for casual Korean food. We shared 4 dishes with 4 people and had almost a full dish to take home.  The kimchi here is so good and they had this sausage side dish too which was unique. Good food, great value.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXLJ1hnFdAqfHlhsXPum-G3UkGlZGDRAwhNuf2&fid=0x0:0x55aba46be1d2484a"],"When":"2024-3-12"},{"Name":"Michaella Pineda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXR5NPAlaNnN5J6ZAUVvcJPDCsTHG0UvPXjhuQs3DwEsiahkacd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've only heard about Na-Re from a friend and I have to say, I was really happy with all the food that we ate. The servers were also very thoughtful to cater to all our needs and requests 👌🏻 The only deal breaker for me was the space. We kinda had to wait for more than 30 mins to be seated but totally understandable because it was dinner time. The place was cozy and the tables were pretty small I guess. Food was served on big plates so it was challenging to fit them all in a single table. Overall, I really enjoyed it here and will definitely come back to try the other dishes on the menu 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlSRrKpNmdQsWZsuHom4r6-vIGtmlD-RsqHOlu&fid=0x0:0x55aba46be1d2484a"],"When":"2023-10-1"},{"Name":"Lily Beigi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUflC7kunUJIhfQxNbA6na6NiDbDwfbVJG2-me8GDHkExL_D-C-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The only issue was that the server wasn’t speaking English very well so they got my order wrong but they were really nice about it and changed it for me. The food was very fresh and delicious. It’s a little over priced compared to other Korean restaurants but very good quality.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSZSoTaIMxx64FTagvUSaXbyLocrNC6qOCrutS&fid=0x0:0x55aba46be1d2484a"],"When":"2024-3-8"},{"Name":"Tn23","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsGxbchcoLrkxVTBgH4SJUR2sfT2zAPoH5rGfegdO_5zjnqEz-eQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I typically don't give 5 star reviews but this place deserves this rating. It's a smaller family owned korean restaurant that has a very homey vibe. They have about 10 tables total and the environment is clean and fresh.
Food was spectacular,  some of the yummiest Korean food I've had in the lower mainland. The Korean fried chicken is to die for. Would totally repeat just for the fried chicken alone. Prices are pretty fair for quality and portion size of food you get. Services was superb and the server gave us free sauce to try with our fried chicken to experience the difference flavors. I'll definitely be a frequent customer at this restaurant!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfbQ4y-p44CdF_MmyltGjcgRxEXtnDUCZkelpr&fid=0x0:0x55aba46be1d2484a"],"When":"2022-1-13"}]

title: Oh! Zzhu Sam Korean Restaurant
descriptions: Low-key Korean joint with a traditional menu, including stir-fried octopus & beef short rib soup.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Alcohol","enabled":true},{"name":"Beer","enabled":true},{"name":"Late-night food","enabled":true},{"name":"Small plates","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true},{"name":"Seating","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true},{"name":"Cozy","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"Groups","enabled":true}]},{"id":"planning","name":"Planning","options":[{"name":"Accepts reservations","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"children","name":"Children","options":[{"name":"Good for kids","enabled":true},{"name":"High chairs","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Evan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocItqym_b8p4Y-FW9783yYhbbkXgbWq5yo1i3Fyi_bB9_Q1tlIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A very solid place to get Korean food. I have been here a few times and if you want Korean food this place will definitely get the job done.
I really liked their spicy creamy rice cake , the texture was really good and the sauce was on point. Though last time I had it the rice cakes weren't cooked as well as yesterday. The seafood pancake and cheese snow fries are all perfect. The ox bone soup is okay it could really use more stuff in it like it felt like 2 bites of noodles. The tofu seafood soup was perfect. Finally , The fried chicken was not really giving Korean fried chicken It felt more like kaarage.

Overall , a great Korean restaurant, the menu could use more stuff though like cold noodles.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVT40AX5nLdykjM4lWDnCTkUpiE2ud2UhVo4bL&fid=0x0:0x5eaf8667e36dfad2"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"Tina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUAKiC5J1ql1LsLTTfBwgvAj6sVGUusHXghumDKVG9ZTQ8QjcD_1w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"No frills korean restaurant. Their soft tofu soup and ox bone soup are 💯 . Good solid portion too. Their service could be a bit better.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXRwVjZbUOGcFWL_g-x-ZFrFeSr-TYPLgDzAtV&fid=0x0:0x5eaf8667e36dfad2"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Jonathan Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0XULAQTTICU9yubhxOf6QAazqu5J7u-JAt3dMp92YAVNOxfqk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great spot for Korean eats. Restaurant is very cozy and service was good. The

Zzhumak we got was really good, great spice level meat and intestines were tender.

A few parking spots in the rear but not much, would have to find street parking if it’s busy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFzFHyR70_z-IsfXmzTgMzhIKmI0BCjoY2K5Nn&fid=0x0:0x5eaf8667e36dfad2"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Shannon K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLxjI21y6OvOpQaUtVQbBMPN8zACLBZJNsUniJUWz2xEJus_A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food was pretty decent. My personal favourite is the beef rice. However the bathroom is very small the distance from the toilet to the door is about 10 inches. Service was pretty good we stay till closing time and staff didn’t rush us to leave. Overall was was good and service was good but they could fix the washroom.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNdmLioXIlEgy6sbw-4A6avMGble0Cv4kd0zHCZ&fid=0x0:0x5eaf8667e36dfad2"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Melinda W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqFa91nGQX9-WVxFZ-rAUul10GF70bhWZFQZe97ymoPVUZrvFxnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my favorite Korean restaurant. I went there 3 times in the past week. Their food reminds me of my time traveling alone in Korea.

The stir fried spicy baby octopus, pork belly and pork intestines is so flavorful. It's spiciness carries a little sweetness which makes the dish very addictive to eat. The spicy pork bones soup is another popular dish. The meat on the bones is so tender and it almost came off on its own.

Food tastes so good and authentic. Service is also good. I'm so happy that it is located only 10 min away from my home.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSrfNGsIbl3-z0E9v3g3Th7BfuYgDMiESB1ze7&fid=0x0:0x5eaf8667e36dfad2"],"When":"2024-5-12"},{"Name":"Kathy Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiyb_IZpx_WoUpDbNVrKDpyLmD7_rVs6LOSYuAzIVmUAcA7Ma7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"3.5/5 I saw the reviews so I give a try for the first time.
I ordered Better Corn , Kimchi Soup with pork and Japchae ( Grass noodle with onion).
The corn and Soup are good but the noodles was over cooked but taste okay.
The price is reasonable and I am spending around $50 for two people.

I came around 8pm it is hard to find parking.

I do recommend it to come to have a quick bite.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYPNHoZKTYwRYxoctV-82JrX4YKgV9rjn9SR8n&fid=0x0:0x5eaf8667e36dfad2"],"When":"2024-5-17"},{"Name":"Jonny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJShSgCHbmme6GLETHZczdb6MWGsJKCwpKUqZlkj3SXYWukfA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Been for several dinners at Oh! Zzhu Sam Korean Restaurant. Never a long wait for tables but always have to ask for tea, water and banchan refills.

- Miro bossam ($27.99) - pork belly was succulent. Good ratio of meat to fat. An over abundance of onion.
- Spicy pork don in hot stone bowl ($16.99) - legit dolsot bibimbap. Crispy rice, good spice.
- Seafood tofu soup ($17.49) - lacking depth, but sundubu jjigae was decent.
- Spicy cold noodle - no longer on the menu.
- Red crisp chicken ($27.99) - generous portion. Sauce coated the chicken nicely. Wish they had a half/half option.
- Gamjatang ($17.49) - good depth to the broth. Chunky pieces of pork meat. Solid.
- Tteok-bo-kki ($16.49) - standard fare.
- Kimchi soup with pork ($16.99) - broth was excellent; well balanced and homey.
- Jap-chae ($18.99) - glass noodles clumped together slightly. Flavours were bland.

One of the better Korean spots in Burnaby.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNE0mTdfpXuawVG3d685YJtanQFu9PGlp26xDL1&fid=0x0:0x5eaf8667e36dfad2"],"When":"2024-6-8"},{"Name":"Michelle M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWeetN-W20mnzvtvgZG8vAeDlWwG6zd354oPCvc1I4B_3Cjy_PI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our local favourite for Korean food. The cheese fried chicken is the best here! It’s savoury but sweet and juicy inside. We always get their seafood pancake and japchae as well. The sides with the potatoes is also one of the best here. My kids love their cheese fried rice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOy7RUsFZjqt20dvJO4lP6VCx4in-X8mMGs-zH&fid=0x0:0x5eaf8667e36dfad2"],"When":"2024-4-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Peter Au","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwBxrbZVtlTM1OV2SDGm3NwMn7yUHEw1MaS3fh_B2utP_W4kON=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Usually I was more skeptical about modern renovated Vietnamese restaurants, which I would doubt their authenticity and too much fusion stuff. This one is a surprise. Menu items were somewhat limited. But the soup base was very good for the noodles. The rice dishes tasted very authentic. Some non-traditional items were on the menu as well. Cocktails were served here. Servers were attentive like the western style restaurants. This was the second time here and would return for more.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONwfoGHmHFqQRQ_KuS8x7eRV_ekXmTuYEVs6Cm&fid=0x0:0xab40477bd079a0fb"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"Jagdeep Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJiS2D0z6B8L1ruEEG-L9JRlXJhBBgxWbnChN2M95BGTzvzVA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was incredible. Everything was full of flavour and cooked to perfection. This is the second time we've been here and it didn't disappoint. The service is also amazing! Everything was perfect. Hazel and Emma were fantastic servers and made sure we had everything we needed. Definitely coming again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuFe6KNCgnXGWAfBS0sk0DfYNKC31Qyy9f9lY2&fid=0x0:0xab40477bd079a0fb"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Therise Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVKZHxzjcL3eT0Mx1GC0V-PQKDHFoieCZFNNy-su0cQjVY6u6P=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food! We loved the beef stew, fish sauce chicken wings, and cassava cake. Thanks Emma for top tier service. Will be back soon! Mom enjoyed celebrating her birthday here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1v0btxHjLQPimjGjy4kYEg6naWh1Y05ysBZRn&fid=0x0:0xab40477bd079a0fb"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Shonnah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVryghpg_5X3Yv-cncwU7OGN26KCAvVhjXajvFLZ6BLUMNFRgyF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Vietnamese restaurants aren’t typically known for their service, but this place was an exception. Staff was polite and gave us great recommendations as it was our first time. The ambiance is very casual (typically Vietnamese place), but also quite clean.

We ordered the Frog Legs (fish sauce), Special Crab Soup and Lobster Tomato Soup - supposedly the 3 most popular items. The frog legs were fried well, having a nice crunch, not very oily and the meat was cooked perfectly. I will admit, I found it a bit too salty, but you get used to it and the pickled vegetables helped balance the flavour with acidity. It’s not that common to find frog legs within Vancouver from my experience, so I’d definitely recommend trying this - its relatively similar to chicken in terms of flavour. The special crab soup was probably my favourite of the two soups. The deep fried soft shelled crab was a nice touch and tasted like what you’d expect. The soup didn’t taste too fishy, but had a subtle seafood flavour and I appreciated the chunks of crab meat. It was my first time having tapioca noodles and they have a great chewy texture - I’m a fan. Lastly, we had the lobster tomato soup. Lobster was cooked well and presentation looked good, but I felt besides that it was quite average. Being that it’s a $32 bowl of noodles, they could’ve made the soup have a stronger flavour, it really tasted like a mild port tomato soup. There was really nothing to rave about.

Overall, the food was pretty good. It gave me a nicer viet restaurant vibe but I felt I paid for it through their prices as it is pricier than your typical Vietnamese lunch. I will admit we did order more of the specialty items and portions are definitely enough to make you full, but I think that’s what makes B&D stand out. If you come here, I’d definitely try the more unique items that you don’t find at every restaurant like the frog legs. I’ll be returning to try more of their items, but expect your bill to be around $40-50 per person depending on what you order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWI5xDmP1Co3ONQGQ0tK18ajgrRFAqpwNRuX7N&fid=0x0:0xab40477bd079a0fb"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"S J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFJgtQsTx2GqIorZzdULLXPFX8yaR7DrYrRftNOfTGqwP15U2i=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The lobster tomato soup was delicious, and the crab balls were the highlight! I’ll try a crab dish next time. The lemongrass chicken was flavorful and not too salty, though a bit more vegetables would be nice. (But still good) The rice portion was good, the drink was sweet, and the service was responsive. Overall, a great meal!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2Oy7DOsJ_v0efAFNLlg9LMnCIVlbt3-CmH7_7&fid=0x0:0xab40477bd079a0fb"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Sandra Tran Do","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9l6s1YZWB64Ki1thgUudvXKddmLpHe47fEzkyE5Wrayj1VfeG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I really enjoy B & D, my fav is their pho, bun Bo hue and crispy tofu and frog legs. Their bánh bột lọc is okay, the tapioca dumplings were not that great. I enjoy their drinks here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqBwZNLbhyzO8ogpZppJDMMZ8dEAO4l4InLZm5&fid=0x0:0xab40477bd079a0fb"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Sarah Fougere","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVDYw1x8W2luFzrbJzmDcEXlH3gV9z97b6CtIwnmZxaSUjfjDh=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The most flavourful amazing food. We had the Beef Carpaccio and Betel Beef Vermicelli and it was so good. The atmosphere and staff, especially Liam, are so warm and welcoming. I can't wait to come back. Thank you for such a beautiful meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOV2ulVQS0ecsRC7yxm59s75XuHPfQEOka2desn&fid=0x0:0xab40477bd079a0fb"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"35RedBackpack","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYwdtnQaa_JEBdiUNO5aSE529R0g42gIzsC7tfESxj3bFlFAd2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This neighbourhood place was recommended to us so our party of 5 tried a family meal here. Clean and bright. Service from a youthful crew was fine.
We all went for the 3 course dinner. We started with spring rolls, papaya salad, chicken wings and frog legs! The appies were hot and fresh. The special beef pho and lemongrass chicken were as expected. How could a duck leg become so dry and leathery by braising? This was a bowl of disappointment as the noodles were not satisfying either. The desserts were just enough to taste but nothing special. While everything was ok, we did not find the set menu at $38. pp delicious enough to hurry back to with so many other Vietnamese restaurants to try. Tricky finding a place to park too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaiMCFq5wSrDK8NeyH3GEDVnWcM_SYZbyG43RQ&fid=0x0:0xab40477bd079a0fb"],"When":"2024-5-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"actionj007","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3vSkBAqKJl0vg8_AMzQD5EEGhEVeYS2de8UbzcFClZ51w9xM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came here with family and the staff was very welcoming.

Ordered the Canh Ga Rang Toi ot (Deep Fried Spicy Garlic Chicken Wings), Bun Rieu Cua Phuong Nam (Special Crab Soup with Vermicelli) and Banh Xeo Phuong Nam (Crepe with Pork, Shrimp, Bean Sprouts, Onions & Rice Flour).

The wings were deep fried and seasoned well.  The crab soup was one of the better Bun Rieu we've had for a while.  The Banh Xeo was not too thick and was filled with lots of ingredients.

Will come back here again in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSilGn0HqzZYZsQHdx_d89XkKJfgQYzSnZo14u&fid=0x0:0x8e99b84cb3ceee3b"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Charlie San","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3aZwME3XRzmeB2q7qa9_oTnrvWhhLytF8WJbt9c8oHxZXYqyT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Taste good, the special crab soup with vermicelli taste better than Hoang Yen restaurant in my opinion. This shop use only crab roe paste instead of egg white which enhanced overall taste to it. Also recommend ice Vietnamese coffee.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMq19ODuOJVW_8_kFRJvfdHgyaq8KsFYuDFFB6f&fid=0x0:0x8e99b84cb3ceee3b"],"When":"2024-11-8"},{"Name":"Nathan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6aOctokU9KmE5fwo6-6THfOky0imQyJSKP9b0jCAM3iXNSZtK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"A friend recommended their bún riêu, to which my wife and I tried for our first time. We didn’t enjoy it as much as we initially thought, but the dish was still decent!

Only downside is the service. The younger waitress didn’t seem to know how to explain the dish properly, as it was our first time ordering it. The atmosphere was average, not too clean but not too dirty either.

Overall, 3/5 stars.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzrs9fEntFGLqljVm45ngWZeBED6NeAo0Rxwqc&fid=0x0:0x8e99b84cb3ceee3b"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"desmaniak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWur6zZS9hmIvUyr8h8l0mKQ2Tyvu3P6fpkdaqZFvVXYrNlvnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Whenever eating pho, I like to taste a small spoonful of the broth firsts. The initial flavour of the broth was very rich and savory, but not too salt that it’s undrinkable. The noodles were delicious and mixed well with the thin slices of beef. The onions in the broth were soaked in soap and flavourful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNiPNUjCwE74QVnJXiEpUfn4azZlxaHYtg73Sz&fid=0x0:0x8e99b84cb3ceee3b"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Hillbillytc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV833YeKMKJfxtYeKhRHVRSrikZoFOcCapKBwyEFBOnxiCMeXAZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The atmosphere is quiet, lots of windows. The server was friendly. The soup was amazing good nige portions. Lots of GF options","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdey_vSi0pdBmYipggYlxpwm8lGySTyVl4Eplx&fid=0x0:0x8e99b84cb3ceee3b"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"Jason K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnDM9NDLOmVFcuNU7ZHUub_sN3XonKLkRXACh_-_JhtcuBz4IHbw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Deep fried spicy garlic wings were below avg. Hard crunch on skin, under seasoned, minimal garlic taste.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOMeLZ-_6Q5LRIbwHkbWZn0f25YNhwK6ELBmrO&fid=0x0:0x8e99b84cb3ceee3b"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Kate Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjE4MSAa0c4Uqc8iOt1LfqIkJDL1ULa2Z17gRh4YDWMExQ1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Bun rieu - taste is good. Almost on par with hoang yen before hoang yen decided to make their soups saltier now. Not a lot of toppings in it though and bowls are definitely smaller compared to them.

Chicken wings - these wings are super plump! They came out piping hot. The lemon pepper juice was not very lemony - maybe not freshly made.

Prices are cheaper than hoang yen but it reflects the size of the bowls. So not a bad alternative.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqeDPAFe3k6d3DWVVXpy0630yk5c-37TbVcyTe&fid=0x0:0x8e99b84cb3ceee3b"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Wing Yee So","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLWdmA15qnuddJqDyC2Rm9Ut8opq8IFoLxk5yH22MkisIB4SQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been in Bun Rieu last and this week yo order a bowl of Special Crab Soup with Vermicelli was delicious and ingredients were so fresh and tasty soup.  Also, the restaurant is nice, clean and with friendly service.
…………

I ordered a special crab soup with vermicelli and spring roll combo during the very busy lunch time.  Very consistently delicious , fresh ingredients and with friendly service.
It’s a nice surprise and will definitely go back there again.

Best Wishes!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Belinda Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUn7TTMzcgQmmumaUE-aWmYGctragvugCfl1hNlTJMZXNxjoJwLTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The menu at this Bao shop features a diverse range of handmade Bao, including the fragrant BBQ Pork Bao, the rich and savory Pork Deluxe Bao, the sweet Taro Bao, and the creamy Custard Bao. Each Bao is freshly crafted with the highest quality ingredients, ensuring every bite is delightful. Their friendly and welcoming staff make this place a cornerstone of the community and one of the few spots where you can savor premium Chinese-Filipino cuisine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMn-_mu5EYhazwwW3o_WM0nn_9j9z5OhsHhno1G&fid=0x0:0xbd009cff3ace3484"],"When":"2024-6-12"},{"Name":"Katherine Vasilopoulos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUp10ey8BbMxYd-QmzO59Ao3ECwvxfw02LdG19q-Kua9a84DISd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The buns here are 10/10! They are large and fluffy and filled to the brim with incredible fillings. Our personal favourites were the purple yam, the curry beef, and the chicken bun","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPkfrEOMNhXQFAIJk3v9qIV_TkJp28dNinu50r&fid=0x0:0xbd009cff3ace3484"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"David 04 Make the World a Better Place","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXmkrAyRsAwad4uDl0EKEwpsCVMLq51IOxmbley55h_iwJzGo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"To be honest, I was a bit disappointed.
Staff don’t need to be overly friendly, but there’s no reason to greet customers with unpleasant expressions either.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvqR7t6ciSVcRuzLyJC1Yh_d_NxYjapH4nfoA&fid=0x0:0xbd009cff3ace3484"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The Pork Deluxe Bao here is my favourite of their offerings. It is more meaty with an egg inside. The veggie bao is good too with lots of umami mushroom flavour. The curry beef bao is also unique and tasty. All the baos I tried were good but lighter on the filling and more bready compared to some other baos I have had elsewhere. However, their steam bun dough is light and fluffy and very delicious being airy and not too dense.

It’s takes at least three baos to fill you up and they aren’t cheap. Each savoury bun ranges from $4.25 to $5.25 each but if you buy 6 you get 1 free.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEixyIw8drAzSSvpTe5UFwKR3dhFM1ki7hKqfQ&fid=0x0:0xbd009cff3ace3484"],"When":"2023-11-22"},{"Name":"Da Wanderer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6gUX2zsQKdIE8uVzYWBnKKtvYQAJfEKJppzMJqd4hE4TuUun8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am delighted to try this freshly made Buns with its tich flavorful taste. The pork deluxe was highly recommended by a friend and their taro bao which was a best seller. It is a must try for every Asian and Bao lovers out there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1VJr2Gp-xXCVwYIc6hDfHk9hriWlzR_G8Zz3Q&fid=0x0:0xbd009cff3ace3484"],"When":"2024-2-9"},{"Name":"Sebastian Busse","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUyk0sPfSVg60Ym9wEuBcAYPqE5lRs2yUuONQcGbMAykDCZjsCY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"i love the bao place so much. ever since i started going, which was at their original location across from metrotown a few years ago, i’ve been in love. they’ve been so consistent and reliable the last 3 years. after trying many places that make baos, i can confidently say that ‘the bao place’ has my all time favorite bao’s. the texture and subtle sweetness of their buns, the marinades for their fillings are so tasty (my go to being the bbq pork), and how fresh everything is.  i tried their vegetarian bao and sweet purple potato (ube) today and was so satisfied that i considered going back to purchase more. love love love this place and the people that make it so amazing","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGI2-ObQ_7FIxBbdvIpnZR08X-1lG2DWNKIy1b&fid=0x0:0xbd009cff3ace3484"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Randy Ho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKPZnX--8tTHY5oPlI_IYUhMDHMRFSkMidEvRu7ibro1a0HmQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I stumbled upon this delightful family-run steam bun bakery, and I can't rave enough about the deliciousness they serve! The taro bun is so delicious, bursting with the goodness of freshly made taro chunks.

The pork deluxe bun is a must-try – the filling is incredibly tasty. The reasonable prices make it an unbeatable deal for the quality you receive.

Whether you're a steam bun connoisseur or a casual fan, you need to check this place out. The warmth of the family running the bakery adds an extra layer of charm. I'm already planning my next visit because I know I'll be coming back for more of these delightful buns. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIEcfQHuYZtz83TOrKdhdK3bo3Msbb6FZ_Pter&fid=0x0:0xbd009cff3ace3484"],"When":"2023-12-2"},{"Name":"A L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL1-7ac9tpfBUECShkHhhDkfvpQSpPBpZeAQMG_5DxSwKALpA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Turned off by the expensive prices, Boa bakery beside Joyce station and in Chinatown are way better and cheaper. Only cheap bakeries would use boiled eggs inside the deluxe bao.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Al Katona","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNLO7w-yCYWMpsPCnVo6YiXTHG-BCUr-E0kSWmAnmIzhlTB-cQ9g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love it….highly recommended.\nClean, high-quality products for reasonable prices. The staff is accommodating. I called in the other day wondering about a product that always sells out fast. I was planning to be there to pick up some, but I was too late, and by the time I arrived, all sold out. Then the lady asked, “Were you a gentleman who phoned in earlier today for the product?  I said- “yes.” Then she pulled out a bag and handed it to me, saying -“I am not sure how much you wanted, but I set this aside for you.” Amazing people. Thank you so much. I wish my staff would be like this in my business. A customer forever.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tony Hrkac","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJ27S3mMc8YjqTfWuCzdiGSDNRBovIimpxsNevjukaFRF5nQMq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is such a gem. After returning from Croatia in October we were craving some good ćevapi and had heard about Jovo the Butcher. Keep going back now great quality of meats and other goods. Very helpful and friendly staff.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Zoran Simic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVEG6SWDf56KDerKwPzg5MgUjfv9WQw27Ay9_yEX2-oqkfJEH-Ydg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always fresh meat and deli products. Balkan style smoked meat, cheese and other imported goods. Waiting few minutes in lineup is worth. Good sign of constant quality.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stefan Pj","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIv6AgMHKjyHZeFhWOTdAy918hJYW5KyzR62CUI_OgmVDgI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Balkan store ever! Especially the cevapi. I've been going my whole life!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"KCC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLj5wzQTcDnxBu0v1WO2w0OV25o8MsEoPt4fsQJN4wx383upTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great little Balkan deli specializing in Croatian Serbian Bosnian delicacies. Highly recommend ordering the ćevapi, buying a jar of ajvar and then grilling on the BBQ when you get home.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOY6Z_eSR7rm71Qw5pD48QDCjZZ4inT2oeOj-JZ\u0026fid=0x0:0x8f7364904e4096c5"],"When":"2018-4-28"},{"Name":"Scott Fraser","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKzp2UERrVEhVvENp-2n_klbBSzwlAC5oNlBSYjovhbD1RRnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It is a very nice, clean and well organized shop. Also the customer service was top\nTier and They were so nice. (The chocolate was the best I ever had)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"La Vitta E Bella","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIlGJT3xyG2EabgGEj6KWQg7-6lhpSo03J4W_seHftgBoYdIIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic European grocery store and butcher shop","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7Qbx41ttd3JAPRVIGGI_x89uHwf4wPo_Vx_kj\u0026fid=0x0:0x8f7364904e4096c5"],"When":"2019-11-25"},{"Name":"Csilla Rosales","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUeyqsun2HaUvItF5dfCWZ0NNo_rxPIG3Ci0HjZMFmKZV2v7KDF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The products are from Europe, and the selection of cheeses and meat products are great. Most of the time the sales people are kind and friendly. We enjoy shopping there.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jessy J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLHNRFw0Z_JgaU0TxGr1Pv5X-w9V6JzR0bnCuTDlGr_7pfsbx_k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Seems like a family run type of restaurant. Good tastes great and very “home made” vibe.

We’re here for last minute quick dinner. It took about 55 min for us from ordering to finish the meal for 3 dishes.

Seafood pancake was the highlight! It’s crusty but also chewy.

Individuals size pork bone soup and beef bulgogi were also great options!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMV2rHf17y5lrfnkttVdWeg7K7S4SnAcfA5qsr-&fid=0x0:0x72131e51e6e0dd17"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"TS OS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrxJ8Fjd3bGSI8mWbF186RbFWyg_DW73VTS3OIkFaxPfXFBEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Price point wise, I can’t really complain.  Food are pretty solid, menu is diverse and covers good area of Korean food.  Parking is usually not full. Interior is definitely outdated and feels old school. Not your insta place but for a quick and decent Korean food, I would say this place is a great place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNC0Lb3nH5rlGmPDJarTaRWxJaR-U2bHGakS_O9&fid=0x0:0x72131e51e6e0dd17"],"When":"2024-4-15"},{"Name":"Kiran S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlL8MVaLkTsfsq-e3DjECHREsgUgRlVDc_sZT22tRm2fUnodY0XA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Been here 2 times now and had to write a review as it’s a local mom and pop restaurant.

Good food, it’s super fresh! I don’t care so much for the kimchi here it’s not that great. When you sit they give everyone a bowl of salad which is refreshing.

The fried chicken was good, the seafood pancake was good but wish it was more crispy. Dumplings were good as well.

It’s not exceptional but it’s good food! I’ll be back to support.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpAikyPhJ19e_fj5n7algvKfgBBBYQK2HCbcKM&fid=0x0:0x72131e51e6e0dd17"],"When":"2024-2-5"},{"Name":"Celina Arenillo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLPvcNqjpmtihcb5J8miFlC4lw0H-EdaSQUtLM4u3kh0_GMHA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The ambiance of the restaurant was very similar to how Korean Dramas are which is good.

I tried the hotpot, pancake, and gimbap. I like the hotpot and pancake, both were flavorful and big portion. Unfortunately, the gimbap was bland.

Service was prompt and friendly. Parking was easy.

Will dine here again for the hotpot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCwc1Vvgo9-cY_13ZPCUJYjLW8eYvV8XunzGUo&fid=0x0:0x72131e51e6e0dd17"],"When":"2024-3-14"},{"Name":"John Lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhI1Hf0V8OCEcXBGpPujzbbJsqXpD7ZNHTdg6WSYPk912CTMpx=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Owner was not attentive and the food was really mid quality, the cold noodles taste like the ones from T&T. The bimbimbap was alright, soju shot glasses smelled like kimchi and looked dirty. The water they provided was warm tap water. For a family owned restraints the cleanliness needs to improve there are flies everywhere and the entire experience is just bad overall.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sonia Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKubZsznd5kRyMnqAcfDIdpQizBeBs96xmiudp9OPdG9JsrAw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Been here and had good taste a couple years ago but totally changed this time.
Also see a bug in my container once I pull out the soup.
The food was salty, I am sorry but only can give it 1 ⭐","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWQM4hS9si_mBYWzN2oU_t1eOoMugOy0l4T0E-&fid=0x0:0x72131e51e6e0dd17"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Amir Alimohammadifar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrMzehyYKL2N5MygYIJn0Qq0Mw_ICezrph5kn4Lgaj3XeaBUPp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great Korea food
Very tasty soup, I tried the tofu seafood soup and the beef broth soup. Both of them were delicious. Great amount of fresh ingredients in them with noodles and comes with rice and side dishes and tea for free. The place is also clean and cozy and there's a free parking in front of the restaurant. Definitely recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJqoNd9Vs01Bojqz459zTapZsqPXifXXkCynHn&fid=0x0:0x72131e51e6e0dd17"],"When":"2022-6-16"},{"Name":"Simon L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViaRfv3PNavaP-94o5ORFy3wDNIEJ6Hn-sDa59sI_KE_zXlZOr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this place. The food is great and the prices are pretty good. They just renovated. I prefer what it used to look like, it felt more cozy. Prices have increased a little with inflation but this place is still great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkeXNdnFla4SddeDvPjBpI0AOjHsMQSj_-Ane_&fid=0x0:0x72131e51e6e0dd17"],"When":"2023-3-8"}]

descriptions: Retro fixture featuring made-to-order burgers, shakes & poutine, along with outdoor seating.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Deb PS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2JrjvxBJWPrjHCwBxV9NiRybb9V5GJpynDBuSW5sd6snYZiMa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been wanting to go to this restaurant forever and finally went. It did not disappoint. Now I know why it stays in business. The prices are quite reasonable and they make the food fresh for you. We did have to wait a while for order, but they make it right there as you order, so it was worth the wait. The milkshakes were not as good as I thought they would be but they were still good. Wish they were a little bit more thick. The portions are large enough that you feel like you’re getting your moneys worth the inside is nicely decorated. The servers were friendly and helpful but they’re also very busy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7XTFNZJTy49CAzKYk7ZIaSrj--R07v_ONI636&fid=0x0:0xdbb9c8827a53dea9"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Selina Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkhYkD3SpMETmescS1PYdIbdJEawmCXCZQlnmigsplBzK04eI7SA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Small classic burger diner with nostalgic burgers, hotdogs, shakes, and sides. Our burger experience was just alright — we enjoyed fries and shakes more. But when we went back to try the hotdogs, we absolutely loved it! Probably the best dressed up hotdogs I’ve ever had. The staff there are great too — down to earth, no frills. Love it","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOi6zZlViEHnx7sa44e0-uT2-AVX-Bjk_ST4FLP&fid=0x0:0xdbb9c8827a53dea9"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Ms G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQu5-rg_kkCcBgQf8GwQKyQ6yXa3mX_YLfeBYJXER1sG9_CCk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was too good to wait for a photo.  FRESH and HOT !  The fries and onion rings were delicious.  The two staff working were very friendly as well.
This is a tiny, mostly take out place that seems to seat about 12 people total.

My only suggestion is bring a jacket or sweater if it’s cold cause they didn’t seem to have heat in the seating area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNR6wQsDrfGNnaOqGRm6Tk5x8dJpdwsyK9tzsf4&fid=0x0:0xdbb9c8827a53dea9"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"WanderingNomadJunky","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLV5nGXazxvMsF1gu1JToxDjQdzN7lbcZ-wJLf6VmKi487Kmt5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Never been here. I disagree with others assessment of this joint. We got the LA king combo. Just be aware there is a book on the back wall as you enter with some combo deals. This one is two can dine for 26.99 plus $10 for inflation. Once upon a time it was that cheap. We added the gravey on top. I didn't think it was as greasy as others have said. Maybe the fries were but which fries aren't. The meat patty remember is made of sirloin so its texture will be different hence tougher. The mushrooms and bacon balanced out the shortcomings. Sauce was interesting. Bun is not dry. The Onion rings are interesting too. Kinda sweet in taste. Gravey was thick. I would come back if I'm in the area. Worker told us the area where we ordered was added 10 years ago otherwise it is almost original since 50s.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJxq0nxomLU07nMZxUgpFJFj5Yy0iy6g2KWxYg&fid=0x0:0xdbb9c8827a53dea9"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"Wesley Goodfellow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUlrDXo7gYOgUaIuz694850Fo-v4F0OA3jIBdiRHRzDG14SzbH=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Fries soggy and greasy (and spread of salt varies wildly), and the burger meat was tough. Every ingredient seemed not fresh; when im paying a premium price i at least expect things to be fresh and taste like it. The milkshake also, please do not buy. Possibly premade mix and plently of foam inside, and was far too thin haha. Avoid this place at all cost.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBKO2Fkl6OBhMnkEGPxy71PmXrgEUWb5hxjt7S&fid=0x0:0xdbb9c8827a53dea9"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"Rodrigo Amaya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7EjU9cUQJow2SlAxccaUEH3zNhsjX5UadVMXFWXqx6N5s9Np1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Probably one of the best burgers I've had in a while. Really well done!!!. Atmosphere is... not so nice, probably it has seen a better days, the service was ok. Honestly it's better if you order, pick-up and eat elsewhere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfKzK4JMhv9O9JKobadqotsIbd9VAR5m9xbCP6&fid=0x0:0xdbb9c8827a53dea9"],"When":"2024-6-15"},{"Name":"Grim Eater","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6PTwu2hn6AlzWUp8iqwg0vO72Zt0HGJTxU9PiA6j2bZPnT9A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The first thing I would like to address is that it's a very unique place and does fit the 50s theme. Otherwise, I will be talking about my experiences and will base my rating on the 3 categories (food, service, environment/atmosphere)

When walking into the restaurant, it was very tight and compact. No more than 6-7 people can fit inside, hence the seats outside and behind the restaurant. Restaurant holds the 50s theme inside and uses an old milkshake mixing machine, which was a nice touch. No washroom available, so make sure you have something to clean your hands with.

Service was neutral, nothing much to talk about. We order, wait, get the food, and eat. Honestly, it doesn't make a memorable experience, but my expectations weren't high.

The food, however, impressed me. Thick cut grandma fries were alright, and some don't maintain crispness for a long period of time. The LA burger, on the other hand, was very nice. Housemade bun held all the ingredients together and did not crumble. The patty was nicely seasoned and had the grill char flavor. The mushrooms, bacon,cheese, lettuce, and tomatoes combined nicely offer a perfectly balanced burger. One tiny gripe I had was that my burger had more mustard than anticipated.

When it came down to the milkshake, I was thoroughly impressed. Perfect balance of sweetness, and you can taste the ice cream, milk, and then the strawberry. Simply amazing!

Before I left, I decided to try the bulldog. It was alright, but bun held everything together but proved to be messy to consume. The amount of mustard added was again too much, and other than the sausage (which was nice and had a nice slight char smoky flavor and the casing pops) was all I tasted. I'm not too impressed with it compared to the burger.

Overall, it's an impressive burger spot and definitely hits the spot if you are looking for a quality burger. Probably would recommend eating on an outside table, bringing your own hand wipes, and don't expect an amazing customer service from the establishment. Would definitely come back if im passing by Burnaby and craving a burger and milkshake. Would recommend to friends and family!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIBne7BGJ3CNIClra2Ro7WSbGEfh_-nPuxW2q5&fid=0x0:0xdbb9c8827a53dea9"],"When":"2024-3-25"},{"Name":"Elie Khoueiry","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5oURLERNdcm9BvIr3fAC4qFZbtajTkrn7lvmppBB64F0YQgE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Honestly this place went down in service and quality very quickly. This business has been sold lately to Indians and they ruined the quality. Why would you purchase such restaurant and sell food not of your own and destroy the reputation of this restaurant. Fries were old, oily and not crunchy at all. They add weird flavour and extremely salty. I waited basically 15 minutes for simple fries order (check my photos). Never going back tot his terrible restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN6ClNms4GJLWmantRvYVX7BQAqSW5FG6amsGZQ&fid=0x0:0xdbb9c8827a53dea9"],"When":"2024-4-23"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Monica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLGgIU2jvOA6dZo_R-fDScmbPQKFMa9bNbD6fpKC_vMNnPtfA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My husband, my parents and I went here for dinner for the first time.  The food is pretty good and well priced. The service is horrible. It took 10 minutes for anyone to come to our table after we were seated and that’s only because I hailed someone down and asked if we would be served. When bringing our mains our plates from our appies were not cleared. I had to tell them to clear it so that the mains could fit. I also had to advise them to bring out new cutlery. It’s unfortunate that I had to provide significant direction for what I feel is basic service.  At the end when we finished eating was the only time the server came to us and asked if everything was good and if we needed anything.

Food we ordered:

Papdi Chaat was 9/10

Samosa Chana Chaat was 8.5/10

Chicken 65 saucy version was 4/10. It was described as medium hot and the server said she would ask the cook to make it less spicy. It came out very spicy and we have a high spice tolerance…

Rav Masala Dosa was 8.5/10

Rav Mys Onion Paneer Masala Dosa 8/10 (it’s heavy)

Just an fyi the Rav dosa are the only ones that are crispy.

Mango Lassi  9/10

The somber (I might be spelling it wrong) that comes with the Dosa for dipping was 7/10. It’s tomato based which is not something I’m not used too. Eating it with the dosa was good. Eating it on its own was ok. They provide refills.

Overall, the food here is pretty good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwno_GJJTfOLIgqp0iBsmXCae-SNxM16KQtyQ7&fid=0x0:0xd869064e8d58ea75"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Deb PS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2JrjvxBJWPrjHCwBxV9NiRybb9V5GJpynDBuSW5sd6snYZiMa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visited tonight as I was craving chicken biryani. Manjal’s food is so tasty and delicious. Tonight I noticed that the restaurant was packed. I ordered the chicken biryani 65 which is much hotter than the regular chicken biryani.  The servers told me that they just wouldn’t add green peppers to it and it was great for me. I don’t like when food is so hot that your mouth is burning rather than enjoying the taste. The chicken biryani 65 without the green peppers was just perfect, they also gave another sauce and raita to go along with it.  If I wanted it hotter, I could’ve just added the other sauce. It’s not actually a hot sauce but a biryani sauce I had takeout tonight, but I was reading other reviews that talked about how terrible the service was. the cashiers tonight were very friendly and helpful and had big smiles on their faces. I know that this isn’t always the case.  Also, in my opinion, sometimes in these more authentic restaurants, the service may not be the same as what you would expect in a Canadian or American food restaurant so if you want something, just ask for it.   It looks like they have recently upgraded the decor as well as I was pleasantly surprised when I walked in. It is a good place for families together and I did notice a lot of Indian customers so that is a good sign.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiTSipW4e_leg8Dm1Hzz2Cy8SXRdgaapKa8z2Y&fid=0x0:0xd869064e8d58ea75"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Jasmine Feng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhfTWkaOSn2EjKlPr8c4VLtzH6WYopbB6Nfh9GsOFmt92-1jHu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We were craving South Indian food, so we tried this place out on a day trip to the Vancouver area. It was quite good, though we would've preferred some of the flavors to be more intense. We got the idli, vada in rasam, rava onion mysore masala dosa, paratha, palak paneer and fish chettinad. The fish was very well cooked and the idli had great texture. The dosa was also good. The paratha was too greasy and the palak paneer was just ok. Everything else was definitely worth ordering again.

Inspired by another review, we tried the lemon terror drink and it was great!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0Hnm27uW6w4ZV3MOyn9KeuE46dcxqkhcMXwOI&fid=0x0:0xd869064e8d58ea75"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"Sathiyaseelan Suhashini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGCDhZwAvUF3Q8iMEpEx8TQCvKbwiXzYFJN0uOrenEt7v0wxGX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered Regular chicken Biriyani and I loved it as its mildly flavour.
It was great in portion and two of us  satisfactorily had it.

Loved thahi - curd/yoghurt with chopped onion and gravy came along with Biriyani.

Update - we had Chicken Kotthu Paratha today. I am just in love with their correct amount of spices. So tasty and the best so far in Metro Vancouver.

I tried their Rava Masala Dosai and Cheese Chili Masala Dosa. So crispy and perfect potato filling.

Their payasam is milky and awesome in taste. A must try dessert. I never miss it when I go by.

I had kallappam - I thought it's hoppers from Sri Lanka. But came as a dosa shaped one. Batter is the same as I expected that's made out of rice flour. Curries should separately be bought.

Their Indian Coffee is a final touch to this Indian food 🙂

Never go for their parotta. Too oily.

Never go for their rasam, it tasted more like a chicken soup.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBxSiU9844BNp_0mP0mjmffYMqBiA7NPbjqmoP&fid=0x0:0xd869064e8d58ea75"],"When":"2024-1-18"},{"Name":"hungry dog","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUU9eKcRttu0wNDyfzMLCM37gn5w1HsQy-g0S0eoiVV9Pp_bIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"most average food ever but portion sizes were smaller than expected. we ordered the lamb chettinad and the lamb tasted fine and it shoudlve been a little more tender, maybe 20 min more, but the sauce was missing something big, its liek eating a chocoalte chip cookie but its missing a chocolate chip... like otherwise its avrg. their mango lassi was small but normal- it just tasted like mango puree with cream, and half of it was ice. overall 2.5/5","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlxiYOMt34--uhuFnXguqTySlys1jv022psvkf&fid=0x0:0xd869064e8d58ea75"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Cynthia D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzFGMdo3bBPHijbaazjXe20m6rElJPE5Fl-JLr59WaYleW0x8_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Some of the best Indian food I’ve eaten! The dosas are fresh and ultra crispy, the palak paneer is super flavorful and creamy, and the mango lassi was perfection! Staff are super sweet and service was quick. Highly recommend and can’t wait to be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8iBFei5tTk-eN8TsAvoJkAm8Oip6NG1_0dcKf&fid=0x0:0xd869064e8d58ea75"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Faith Morante","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXijn8D-WHS1Xh7F2z1T6HBBe1Z-q4JMtdTh4AgdEZV_p6R-ADX=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Thought it would be a normal indian place but oh I was so wrong! We had Dosa, Vada and my fave - Lamb Curry. The lamb made me so happy, so tasty and I think was even good for 2 ppl. Definitely check this place out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNv7cSUys0iHO1vIkmjfhha7_M5yXZawtWcYtg&fid=0x0:0xd869064e8d58ea75"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"deepti mehrotra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIG3Unz5MkbvMwK2KS6hUYAZDNPkXRJJKmjevVmzbyORqeAcA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I came to the place really early in the morning and i liked it that the staff was preparing fresh food . As a starter I have only loved sambhar idly on the rainy day but I did not like podi idly and vedhu vada . Dosa was perfect so I would suggest please work on starters.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOv_dCBhIp7fBPQNBSeXxKuYLHEX0BAtyJbchi_&fid=0x0:0xd869064e8d58ea75"],"When":"2024-10-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jayson J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWh5xePACHGFMrujGyu-HBmelU_P6fuccz4VSAVxS0935C9YQ3k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Affordable, and reasonably proportioned dishes. We both ordered the pad Thai with level 10 spice, but got something around a level 3.

There’s a self serve water station available too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZZ8yFYgtw3gTnZCK8SYmOPmZBCL9YzQ5vAzQ0&fid=0x0:0x80090465fec08c32"],"When":"2024-7-31"},{"Name":"Fiona Bratvold","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkKVshxGxVMEEGCFFS3gcEVu3bxn4uRZ1N7p-__IzVtiTHsl7bdw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Lots of choices on the menu. I had the laksa with Chicken. It was a big bowl. The veggies were very good - cooked firm. Lots of tables. Very clean.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjupCkcPchajvwYT1DPVEd5byV5bSfSB4KrtKx&fid=0x0:0x80090465fec08c32"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Dr. Vaibhav Goswami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDCjYxWOWEBOVFBvh7bFf3bN2DhbTcDjUx4KxNhnVhANt8qIlYlQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My new regular.
Their food is so amazing. I was so under the weather the other day and had their laksa. Damn if their food can cure sickness they are doing amazing. Looks like their food is organic and they don’t use artificial flavourings.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPe7Ks5AHoXbjkyj-mJPiQLEQu3NDcPuKmXRY76&fid=0x0:0x80090465fec08c32"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Char De Silva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQTbGSeQ01dAPSlThONBrFkF2txWe4ttYKKKux0ABWWo7ko-NW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Recently ordered the Kung Pow with tofu through Uber eats and was disappointed at how their portion size has drastically decreased. I’ve ordered this same dish many times before (not through Uber eats but by calling and picking up my order) and never had any issue. Perhaps ordering through delivery apps is the deciding factor on portions which doesn’t seem right. I contacted Uber Eats for a solution but unfortunately it’s up to the restaurant’s discretion with portion sizes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8qZF_s0WyXQx2jdK-x3HriqUGObnUR8pLM0ky&fid=0x0:0x80090465fec08c32"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"이이진","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLbcuNb5s57kHLM8uW26aIZR90VtbXfZ3Qu192D0eOBKK7emg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Laksa soup is my favorite dish! The atmosphere is so nice, and the portions are generous, so I think I’ll come here often!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNa1H3TQyHlv0KIjXcmz6lwi83TmbO9PLK5wknp&fid=0x0:0x80090465fec08c32"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Kim Lovino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgFvPz1MLcDh2p7hkNMTeAwE3jmU0_hDAwvlUIGOia6_lY6RBkFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had lunch out with the family at Rice and Noodle. Supposed to be eating at Cora's but we were hungry and there was a long wait time to get seated.

- Food was tasty
- Portions were big, can be shared between 2 people
- Price is affordable
- Service was quick
- Self service water and take out containers available

Good Thai food if you're craving.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbK2rDSIiY0Hxp_Q4hOzuf61f_acyf6Dfg6FTW&fid=0x0:0x80090465fec08c32"],"When":"2024-5-15"},{"Name":"albert kwan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsHKujcWZYAEKVj8WRxklcAIZC2JYUJMgd5yPsw97gKzNedLBR3g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lord have mercy! The coconut soup noodle is the best coconut tom yum in town for this price! Can't beat it so join it! If you like Thai food and don't need a fancy decor this is the place. Everything is good everytime I've been here. My new fave!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQPXRRpVXi6Qlki4s-ReVJbBTrzpn3oDM9S6sV&fid=0x0:0x80090465fec08c32"],"When":"2023-5-6"},{"Name":"Simon Y.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIzlPazAGCqpeaRJ7UfJjctynd7aYRROS5qWkze8jgcQle1zw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant is a pretty good place to stop by after work and grab a little something to eat. This time, I got some Pad See Ew but other dishes like Pad Thai and the Pineapple Fried Rice are good as well","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPM4sChfDAbS_tWeINYB46MaykSGDEHu6V5OgKn&fid=0x0:0x80090465fec08c32"],"When":"2024-1-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jason Tribbiani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXpvlAY0NULhaj1b4k1yZZtRXFlzsqxg5gIO8-kzQ1-Qy-iq7d=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As a longtime customer, this is my first time leaving a review, but DooBoo truly deserves the praise. It has been our go-to spot whenever we’re craving authentic Korean cuisine, and it has never let us down. The service is consistently attentive, and the food is always excellent.

We keep coming back for the perfect combination of quality and fair prices, and every visit is a great experience. The staff and owner genuinely care about providing outstanding service, which makes the experience even more enjoyable. We’ll definitely be back for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5ODLM_AbB9-9uQ-Udko2u2muFm5_iS98X3VuM&fid=0x0:0x34cf9efc4648836d"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"W L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK3lEbwV8e2v5in0IhnFqBGUt83IWuJaaihBPoKpdmjx1Wi-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food is delicious.  The seafood tofu soup was wonderful, accompanied by a stone bowl rice.  They scooped out the rice, and they soaked the crusted rice with tea for you to enjoy later.  The beef short ribs were tasty too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4IrJkGjVV4UDy5I4DE1SlsU9ETOlwoT0tjyN_&fid=0x0:0x34cf9efc4648836d"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Toshiyuki Enzo Shirosaki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUD_24CqvwnpZ272t1lMbFqdPq5Yicn0-6hmHLPLDbUePqw_ASerw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had dinner at a tiny restaurant, DooBoo, one of my favourite Korean restaurants. We had Tofu soup. Tofu is very soft. In addition, they serve amazing stone pot white rice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHRxYUpnXo7XndgB1NXdIX5nSFtNGtTGOiRH6D&fid=0x0:0x34cf9efc4648836d"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Mikko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ_2uDYqjQuIG1JtrS7TtkR6L7CFtGlr_W2t-_6BSzqzMNFh474=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"RECOMMENDED.
My wife got Soft Tofu Soup and I got the Hot Pot Rice w/ Mayo.

This is our first time here and we've enjoyed the patience, hospitality, and their food. My wife and I are not familiar with the Korean cuisine having mostly spent our time in KBBQ restaurants. Their staff were incredibly kind and informative. It was great. Exactly what we needed.

Thanks for a great meal! We will definitely come again 😁","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZq_ysPsCfpz7TYZwXpxDAahLZDSdlSjCQ6HQ8&fid=0x0:0x34cf9efc4648836d"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Alice R.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnNxgS9DX-y3gmgAxmhqj178o3S78D2kd6IJ7JcGENqcpufQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very appreciate the fact that they have free parking! Most places around don't have parking so it was a relief that they had one. I ordered a pork tofu stew. It came with three side dishes -- kimchi,  onion?, and fish cake. They were ok, it felt grocery store quality. The stew itself was nice. I enjoyed the taste of the soup a lot but the pork itself was a little dry and tough. Overall, it was a good experience and I would come again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3pmWGE7OryyMlSZCKFAvrhR0fGm5ErxGFRamy&fid=0x0:0x34cf9efc4648836d"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"Evon Tsang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJvHujww9uFxgsiZ71CuzdL-Kn-UTJtwb3Erm1KkKgV_QrVSA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for lunch and ordered the Kimchi Stew and stone bibimbap. The Kimchi Stew came with a stone pot with rice. They poured tea to the scorched rice, making porridge. Delicious food and good portion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4MpjNSaJzKVcbFN0Ps45GFmnLfduNwgzoEue9&fid=0x0:0x34cf9efc4648836d"],"When":"2024-11-14"},{"Name":"Ande Che","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJm7p15pYXvv-QgIeaFwwgSKMLQ6HRJtVCgk9ZE66DrciJurA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I had dinner with my family last night.  We ordered seafood pancake and bibimbap.  I was astonished by the size of seafood pancake which was smaller in diameter (Was it because we had only 2 people?) It was terribly thin AND MOST OF ALL, there were barely any ingredients but only green onion and few bits of squid.  It was the poorest dish among the dishes I ordered in the past.  Did we eat mainly cooked flour?  The bibimbap, guess we were eating vegan bibimbap with few bits of beef.  I was very disappointed due to my craving of Korean cuisine but the restaurant was not UP TO PAR.  There are so many authentic Korean restaurants in South Burnaby but I picked the WRONG ONE AND WOULD NEVER GO AGAIN!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMK2RfWBhAbJ32ee6xPlPKUSDO5kNo9sBxbyRAJ&fid=0x0:0x34cf9efc4648836d"],"When":"2024-11-8"},{"Name":"Bingo Shum","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWifYZygoLs9lrHQQFS9KLQ3a8S5sYlwJjB1Jfyrt-xE_xUZJHq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love coming here for bibimbap (Korean Stone Pot Rice)

I don’t eat spicy.  So instead of adding chilies sauce.  They also have a beef sauce (I think) to add into the rice.  Juicy and so yummy!!

The stone pot cooked the rice crispy at the bottom at just the right amount.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNG-QehL7ogBftpfyIZe8ud93SuGYBeo1SQvb7j&fid=0x0:0x34cf9efc4648836d"],"When":"2024-9-5"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Jeremy Arnold","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKyvhaI9MKHiyRhn_w5262TL53ceiyE2pp5ozGkU-JXdJgYtQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I’ve always loved the food at this location, and the staff are really amazing too. I was kind of disturbed to find out that all the takeout containers and cutlery are stored in the public washroom, though. When I went to use the washroom, the toilet water was literally making its way to a box of forks. Most of the items on the shelves are stored off the ground, so it’s not too bad, but the boxes closest to the toilet are just placed on the ground.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnTn5bF1FyK-OOuY7h0lDzjYRWVUZQnHtABSW8\u0026fid=0x0:0x5e3ae08dccf2e998"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Rosina Jiwani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUo90bfldQMnoaCmqoHeJyETdkchDjtuNs-5JJFSWVsg6r4OhqY-A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is absolutely yummy. The service is really good too. I tried their beef plate with dill rice. So yummy","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkxeSWiblwYMi1gxjqHmr9DSLBIwLjsqr_IvE-\u0026fid=0x0:0x5e3ae08dccf2e998"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Camille Estrada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU47AuX_xbBITEK1xwE4RKQXxGw7oOUhbF53grHoYbTK3vNt_I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ive been coming here since they’ve opened! I love their food and the staff here is nice and friendly. My favourite is their spinach twist and their chicken plate with extra garlic sauce! 🥰","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtbAx_YpI5vzeearKbFqFkPrGeceEgTl1A_BAK\u0026fid=0x0:0x5e3ae08dccf2e998"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"Quan Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-pZoPYeXOZPMkFMWnt3iHTw-bLVVD4nPlpNeu5CixkZ08tZvrEw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"More authentic than some stores I've tried before. Foods quality is overall 8.5/10. Portions are great. Seasoning great. Drink varieties impressive. People keep coming in to order so quite chaos ,.prepare to fight for your order. The restaurant should improve the order system to make people easier to choose.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNdUQVvGT9xK5OpTft8jDCGWNx0XiME0ctFxsGG\u0026fid=0x0:0x5e3ae08dccf2e998"],"When":"2023-11-13"},{"Name":"Nicole Baquian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUczGj6SQxpmocPHJ4mJSrR6N1cx7hqCRqOAddlu38LhimEsak=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favourite places to eat of all time. My go to order is the beef plate with plain rice with pasta salad \u003e:D!! I also recently tried their donair poutine with beef and it was delicious!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMi_4XLCP1f0Op4rAoDiMWB020VIRWFa5q0Qa2W\u0026fid=0x0:0x5e3ae08dccf2e998"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Charlie Hagley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJfRZpzLpBPTFPLOIoemv3IGipfPXg2RtWmzQKqowvtz5jnxg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cashier/workers/greeters are very welcoming and inviting/friendly. The food is phenomenal! My favorite is the lamb shank, it's extremely supple and tender. Would extremely recommend if you are a fan of lamb.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Zabihullah Noori","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcFLGozCQHzogTJVQRH8Dy9-N1cBJobaq92DBLDQDn2S4Zc8Tz=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Outstanding experience at Mr. Greek Donair Shop! The lamb chops kebab was a true standout, perfectly cooked and bursting with flavor. Combined with excellent service and a welcoming atmosphere, it's a dining destination worth revisiting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLibpzuJ83ijD42_3-lh-7qog3d8dnhM_jLcBf\u0026fid=0x0:0x5e3ae08dccf2e998"],"When":"2024-3-15"},{"Name":"Omar Al-lheebi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqzbjT6bX3f6NfZ22T2gou97KcNPd1-wCe85lnBv-DbIFRaV4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice people and really good food. You have two different types of rice and 4 different types of salads to choose from. They also have variety of desserts.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuyDORp1i1-uzL8vFBeIr_fNqNrd6KGVeeySj3\u0026fid=0x0:0x5e3ae08dccf2e998"],"When":"2024-6-17"}]
