user_reviews: [{"Name":"jen h","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhCIsdNpI0zn0ln1R2W8y6FEnO7Rpwo3p2N6L3S94WtNoyzHf7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Truth be told my review is based heavily on the outstanding service that my family received when we went here for lunch and I think that goes beyond any dish I can order or any booth I can sit in. It was our first time coming to this location as it was the easiest for us and my niece and were able to order some easy lunch specials. From 11 to 2 they have lunch specials and then after that is happy hour until five I believe but they also have their menu online which is great to see beforehand. We ordered the crispy onion burger, the warm pastrami sandwich and the chicken clubhouse and they all came with fries. The dishes were flavourful and filling. Good portion and price was average for the specials (14-19$). The place is kind of more casual and its nature and half of the seats were filled with males drinking so they have a mixture of booth seating and table tops. There was only one server at the time and she was definitely working so hard and kindly to get everyone what they needed. The owner also came out and assisted, but in particular, he was so very kind to my niece and just very empathetic towards our table. I am so grateful for genuine service and anyone that takes care of my family wins my loyalty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOb4L71NGRdU-dB49lCYrdg2Mjm4W-2B7O9RFNW\u0026fid=0x0:0xb366ecf4f28cbbc3"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"Mia Duong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPAUy0Htbh5FTHA7CrcyalmfPE1fNra4l4o1y3j6EQjpz6Sdhn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love coming here for Wings special on Wednesdays and Sundays where a pound of wings cost $13.99 with the additional purchase of a refillable soft drink $3.75 or $4 ice tea. There’s a lot of flavours one can pick: honey hot, maple bourbon, Korean sticky sesame, thai chili, BBQ, honey garlic, buffalo, dill pickle, and more","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAIUSWWebb8f9gdMtstmfAKFbxvnBB6Svp0K5J\u0026fid=0x0:0xb366ecf4f28cbbc3"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"TS OS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrxJ8Fjd3bGSI8mWbF186RbFWyg_DW73VTS3OIkFaxPfXFBEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Wings were good here but found them little pricey even on Wednesday special and also to compare to other places.  I guess that is the price to pay for quality especially in this inflation.  The server was also very pleasant as she made us feel welcomed and comfy.  Definitely no complaint there.  We would like to try other dishes next time as their fries were also decent.  Parking’s aren’t that bad either as street parking’s are also avail in nearby neighborhood if the parking gets full.  I would say this location is one of the better Wings locations in the lower mainland however.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzT1B2tFOBnCBfJllOEWSGPLbPkkVaNPNtAtlQ\u0026fid=0x0:0xb366ecf4f28cbbc3"],"When":"2023-7-27"},{"Name":"Hank Ni","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXo1PN705fAvvmfUJHIwdyNbmOPoQTi0B_HxJDWqZ8bYCaN5oHpSg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"$31.8  for 4 wings and one dish. Waitress didn't remind sample only one piece. The menu doesn't label it. I didn't know either. There should be an assorted wings for people to choose from.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjUMv5hcFB3g0BnPWulpMk6Vi3SrXvrnr26Eu8\u0026fid=0x0:0xb366ecf4f28cbbc3"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Lee Raymond","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVf6loaomNEOhYV_o5bcgnlwCtVCdQ9cd0K7FqAf4zq9_7pvJfo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We enjoyed a brief visit to this little gem bar with some delicious wings and fries. Our Sangria hit the spot for our Thanksgiving day aperitif along with so many choices of flavors it took us awhile to make up our minds. I would recommend this place for some good food and great service. We will definitely be back. PS, Off sale as well.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYStB8Z1GJc0QGfDhIJmsPIQs2NpavRqZcjm96KgX5x6r1B4T9pw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food here is alright, we ordered mozza sticks and the happy hour wings 'n fries as well as a couple of drinks. Price seriously didn't match the taste or presentation of the items we ordered, they were bland and tasted like something you would get from costco frozen section.\n\nCredit to our server Selena and her colleague tho! They took care of us and were very fast at handling all the guests. Cheers!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8IRs63I2mdKd4qanTuhM671yR_kwZ-E-F0DeG\u0026fid=0x0:0xb366ecf4f28cbbc3"],"When":"2023-7-28"},{"Name":"j c","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUYwpzQgt7GknYhRMZS39X4dlPTiDbYLP-GQYXGk67Ubji9Mll=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The service was excellent ,foods are really good, wings are juicy and crisp. If you wanna relax and have some bites with friends this place is recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMH2SE0TdbF0sc1TYQ0pET4megmzEEfi-EDi-6r\u0026fid=0x0:0xb366ecf4f28cbbc3"],"When":"2024-2-22"},{"Name":"Matheus Depra Gudergues","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcVm6JtYBVtAZzoG34mCouZyJEO7cCmN7vHbPBH2AXZ1S9F-Fo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Seems like me and my coworker have been coming to the Kingsway branch almost every week recently. Their staff is very friendly and will remember you (and your preferences if they are consistent) if you come quite often. I recommend coming here for the Tuesday pasta special and the Wednesday/Sunday half price wings special. Just keep in mind that Wednesdays are very popular, so the service might somewhat degrade on that evening (especially during championships).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4hMkd4i9NsfslnCuUDR2T9PvW5Ij4WmW6ygvi\u0026fid=0x0:0xb366ecf4f28cbbc3"],"When":"2019-3-31"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Inder B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBGjvoZ-v5aq5ghs4Ae0U96UowTbhBrZcIHwDMqNcoZHfepNFrXg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I honestly did not expect it to be that great. The anjera was finger licking good. The food was fresh and well presented. The server was polite and helped me out with selecting what to get.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5Fm0yJ8nd5kOT6dXFVJduZ5JGCc_ku60jA5KM&fid=0x0:0x12d32754588609d"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Angela Jeffery","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtGyld6d4wIU2Lb7oe7xsoiq4r77iaBdF6nkFQ8ek01eF1q7c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"When we asked to eat in, the server was surprised. We had the Doro Tibs and meat/ veg combo. The food was quite good, but the service was iffy; we had to repeatedly ask for our bill. I think that took as long as preparing our meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrdjK0CQGDT56ELYJuKeyj1TqHHDCZJg8qz1uO&fid=0x0:0x12d32754588609d"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Kay Ren","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfgZL_8y90iMrshfCmhWsVq7vkiiLmOv0Y0jtmLSSv9yc-KYQt3Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The worst is inconsistency.  Especially when it comes to serving size.  The flavors are great that is at least consistent. That's why I had the vegetarian platter and it was so good that I had it again 6 days later.  The second time around there was a noticeable weight difference in my takeout. The first time I had it the takeout box was abundant and full. So much so that I had enough for leftovers the next day.  I was disappointed when I opened it when I had it the second time. It was placed very nicely I'll give them that, but there won't be any leftovers for another day. Will give it one more try and see how they do.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxXpSP7ZveU-pfRnTN298KU5lufHHyCbxp_JZx&fid=0x0:0x12d32754588609d"],"When":"2024-5-16"},{"Name":"Pearl Rose von Euw","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBzQjzzGHsxkUQyewt440jrpJ1s9xIXESPk355K3n1sZzmjq2Suw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious veggie platter! I ordered delivery so I can't review the restaurant itself but the food is wonderful! Flavourful, tender, gently spiced vegetable dishes and tangy, soft injera. My delivery order came with a mountain of injera, so good value as well. This is a great option for Ethiopian food in Burnaby and is just as good as some of the places I've tried in Vancouver. Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4DyqkB9bLC1a0Heq65qKSyt6f1DdYYDInOh4Z&fid=0x0:0x12d32754588609d"],"When":"2024-5-5"},{"Name":"Jocelyn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKwB_-hCcWOIFNtk_jL4ed9H3CcCAlNvPkKb03hpOfnP6SGfA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The chicken vegetable platter was really good
Especially the chicken sauce taste like Indian red curry not oily,it’s more spices ,sour and a little bit hot.
Also,the side of dish of veggies have different flavors from each! Try to mixed them as well!!!!!
Otherwise, the bred one I really like it! Sour, tender and light 👍👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8upwyBqXd-mud9B6qzVPN5237Aqa55-3WdVvP&fid=0x0:0x12d32754588609d"],"When":"2023-8-13"},{"Name":"Phyllis Ndlovu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIs77NAZ8ZzN6D1RKzhKYUaLxDNd647doI8gf9FP8e9IiRETQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Friendly women ☑️ however, I had a bad experience with their food. We given a menu but only after placing an order that most of what is on the menu is unavailable…when we finally ordered what was available it was pure disappointment. This was my first experience eating Ethiopian food. For my own experience this is a ZERO rating ❌ never coming back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shania","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVG6FujzDZeAS6ZPmSQmXNjIwVouBT9vSz15ysMZhB78LelE7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I am sad to share my experience with this restaurant. I called ahead before placing my order with skip the dishes to confirm that they can make the vegetarian platter vegan, the woman who answered the phone assured me it was no problem. I ordered the veggie platter and when I started eating it I seen there was a bit of meat in the platter. It was attached to a piece of cartilage and bone. As a person who doesn’t eat meat this made me sick. I called the restaurant immediately to let them know the situation and the person I was speaking with told me that it was IMPOSSIBLE for what I was saying to be true… my partner and I who have been meat eaters in the past know what meat looks like and am absolutely certain that this was a chunk of meat with bone + cartilage still attached. They offered to make me more food free of cost but I don’t have an appetite for businesses with poor customer service and mystery meats in clearly labelled vegetarian food. There are so many better ways to address a customer with feedback, a customer who wants small businesses to succeed and loves Ethiopian food. I will not be back, please do better.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNx4ZsQXkD31aII5TkYENpILLTzfqaXc_ce1C80&fid=0x0:0x12d32754588609d"],"When":"2022-12-4"},{"Name":"James","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzWP2DrtXrslakWP8pJK_Pn9_trJtzlNsLBSMuqMTdiumX0UhJNg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice fix for injera cravings. Flavorful dishes. I read that it could get noisy as it’s also a bar but I came late afternoon on a weekday so it was quiet and not many people there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOm7aRMM81iOMQYZbGyZMkI7xfojoP54QSn-CGj&fid=0x0:0x12d32754588609d"],"When":"2022-4-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Victor Faiz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGiHqpjxdqub1FJ7kXOOpTv74dgmnsakIE5wm5ZsQgNGMRLDsC=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Arbab Kabab House is easily one of the best restaurants in town, especially for those looking for delicious halal food. They offer a wide variety of dishes, so there's always something new to try, whether you're in the mood for kababs, rice dishes, or something else. The food is consistently flavorful, fresh, and cooked to perfection. What truly stands out, though, is the exceptional customer service. The staff is always welcoming, attentive, and ready to make recommendations if you're unsure what to order. It's a great spot for family gatherings, casual dining, or even a quick takeout. The ambiance is also comfortable and inviting, making it an all-around excellent dining experience. Highly recommended for anyone in search of authentic and tasty halal options!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Saaim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKo6i_dYF2LvmqcuGRMX18TFll7l1fAuSyKh12AAdhDVHB8-Qy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great food. The place could be brightened up a little more. An updated menu and more lively environment could definitely help. Decent location. The halal meat here was delicious and the portions were alright.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPw17-vrd-IvMpa0Qg0VoJbPCcyP09m6fUGprqf&fid=0x0:0x670333b76cdb15f8"],"When":"2021-8-16"},{"Name":"ali bitar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL2AWHb6JeCpJTw4cl2tE4-Zbn9qWlOALGGUFdenZHEUN0XHw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Meat seemed already cooked previously and just heated, super dry and hard.

Took 45 minutes to start getting my stomach going after eating and was puking all night.

Stay away from this spot.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"D C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3Swc8Bz_hi2fJOvfFDs23-7r0w5U6yBdIO1I-NuvtnzIoKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food and portion was much better when it opened. With the pandemic and inflation, prices are much higher with smaller portions.

Tastes will depend on the dish you order and the date and time you go (e.g. busy hours, you are likely to get overcooked food). The chicken breast this time was tender, not the barg steak was chewy and not the freshest meat.

Options for middle Eastern food is limited in the area, so this place is likely popular, especially with takeout. Interior is a bit drab and dingy with limited seating. Table looked like it wasn't wiped (dried rice on the table).

Personal preference, but I would rather have similar cuisine either in North Vancouver or Coquitlam, as the tastes, portion and prices are much better in these two areas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNK_0bkys7tvcercE7LsEpZadtO1eLovAGve62b&fid=0x0:0x670333b76cdb15f8"],"When":"2022-5-29"},{"Name":"Rodel Nacion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIj6JXu2MJzAmj4i9mH9dTAaA4MR4NGq62_i1leZ4jsW6u508=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my first time dining in at Arbab Kabab House with my favourite person. The food was great especially the Soltani. The meat was tender and juicy. My favourite person likes it and me too.

A recommendation to make the interior a bit more homey to feature middle eastern culture to attract more customers:)

I would recommend to visit and patronize their restaurant.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steven H.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXK62iJj1ZUFGa-U3A8AjtI1ckQk60_9MMp9OhTpvv0nDBllSzC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"This place had better days for sure.

I remember the first time eating here before COVID-19 and it was clean with large portions.

For sure, now the menu has shrunk by 80%, with food portions cut by at least 50% and prices increased by around 30%.

Tables are dirty, floors are dirty - just the overall general management inside the restaurant is poor.

Flavors are still great but it isn't enough to justify even a 3 or 4 rating as many other aspects have fallen far behind.

I'd rather they increase their price even a bit more and return to original portions and menu options. That or go straight into take outs and temporary quick bite dine-ins instead of full on restaurant.

The thing about running a business, especially a small business, is that when one can't really afford to provide something good to the customer, it will come through very quickly and the business will lose more business - at an exponential rate. It just gives customers a feeling of cheapness and that is deadly to a business.

One important thing to note is the Edmonds area isn't particularly high class living and people here put value above all else - sometimes even taste. Although rent is getting higher and higher, a business should still not show cheapness or else best to open in a location with more affordable rent.

Before the pandemic, I would have recommended this place as a hidden gem, but now it is more or less holding onto its future potentials of recovery by a thread.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuV4Dcij_DBaXx2Bztt7-n_EHECZLsOpHyYCUP&fid=0x0:0x670333b76cdb15f8"],"When":"2022-8-16"},{"Name":"Farzam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIooZPCPPfH5D4G1f5pX_06Fqf4UZb5reyqU1DQAFjZqgdcZ04=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great Food for order or take out! I do not recommend dine in!
Kebabs are high quality and delicious!!!!
5 star for food and service, 1 star for atmosphere.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steffi Powahs","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWb13s9FUJ--KE5nkm2p6k_Z_IVuyXIPy8AI7rjVImaVi3kr3DJwA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ok, this may seem like a very small mom n pop shop and people might see the place and think it's a dive. Looks are deceiving right?

I must say do not judge a book by it's cover!!

I have to say this restaurant has the best Persian Kebobs that I ever had!

I highly recommend the chicken, steak, and beef kabobs. These kebobs are cooked with perfection. The meat just melts and is the perfect tender. The meat is nicely marinated and will make you wonder how the cook prepares the meat because it is SO DELICIOUS 😍 The rice is good too. Not greasy.

The Persian tea was really good. Served in cute glass ware.

The only thing I didn't like was the salad dressing. Tasted like it was made out of goat milk? The bread is ok. Can improve on the Persian bread department.

The price is very decent. For the kebob combo that has beef, chicken, and steak the cost is $25 that serves two. Good value! 😍

I highly recommend trying this place out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-efluw1aNJVV3YOhQNuWjQwoOpcugMbdwsh3u&fid=0x0:0x670333b76cdb15f8"],"When":"2018-11-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"D0oGLe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPVbxy7nMLBuprpqLmEMBhVVg5HDpC1tm1ihxPfKhrSQpwjms=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went here 2 times in 1 weekend. Will be my go-to pub from now on.  It has 4 pool tables, a little gaming area in the corner, plenty of screens for sports, great music, well priced food and drink. The list goes on.  If you're looking for a cool hole in the wall pub, then this is the place for you","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbyyYhfgt2Or431ScK3NF6DjIPtQ_cHjyM7LmV&fid=0x0:0x512bf1c3d258a8b9"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Steffen Demmitt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFHHwpToI4QtRhXMiSkA17C_b6r3gpZ3AXPde1PoUCdnlOD0sW=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is my go to pub/place to have an event with friends. I have been going here for years and I absolutely love it. The last few times I have gone however, it feels off or weird. The older bald bouncer guy is kinda rude and kept my friends waiting at the entrance for over 30 minutes, until I arrive and pointed out clearly free tables. It was almost like a weird power trip over these girls who were there to celebrate a birthday. I also had a previous experience with an incredibly rude manager. Other than that the rest of the staff is absolutely amazing and always contributes to us having an amazing time. Some staff need to chill out a bit though, because they change the energy of an otherwise amazing place. The food is great for pub food and the drinks are great. Whenever I get the bill I'm always shocked how affordable it is compared to other bars (which I love). Overall good place with mostly amazing staff.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Len Brill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU33Dih6MaYBDPvUnWPw9Ehjv_Faia3wdOHtfpW_tZXdyY7V-evYg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Keep this place a secret.
I'm an "outsider" from Kelowna and this hidden gem.
I read a bad review and couldn't disagree more with that individual.
Some people NEED to be a victim and smear a good business.
This is a wonderful pub.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0lTVTGznFNNvMySyQRm_3_asFMC-PS0D3Aj-U&fid=0x0:0x512bf1c3d258a8b9"],"When":"2024-10-31"},{"Name":"Mark Meloche","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVza62_BMqR-z2U4OY9YNL5XPXJWR_G_bBiFzAmXnx-KgFoyFoIZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Through the grapevine we had heard about this place years ago described as 70's underground, or something. New to the hood and had to check it out. LOVE this place so we keep coming back. 'Local watering hole' comes to mind. We're not talking Cactus Club here. This is a clean, spacious and friendly "Wanna go watch the game and have a beer?" kinda place. The food? Big menu with lots of selection. The fries are amazing. Sarah, Chef Jon Jon rock. Definately worth a visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOX8ZZoL9BWzx61TYjH3k7WaBYo2DyaZFSeetc&fid=0x0:0x512bf1c3d258a8b9"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Nash “TheNashNetwork” Milani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDJgnwi2CTV0_Xaac1BqbovYDgg0zUKvokA1UwEsc5Gh8XoSSI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"All I gotta say is wowwwww. Lifelong Port Moody resident, I came across the restaurant while exploring the Lougheed Village Mall above it for the first time. Decided to give the restaurant a shot on the same day I found it, Saturday night. And I'll say it again, wowwww. Invited two friends as well, and it was well worth it. And maybe the most packed restaurant I've ever seen in the tricities with the best vibe! A hidden gem if there ever was one, complete with 4 pool tables, shuffleboard, air hockey, darts and an arcade! The beer and food was wicked, and we lucked into a steak dinner special! I loved every inch of this place. From the shape of the bar to the stage for live music. The potential is off the charts and I highly recommend a visit. It's so tucked away that letting people discover I think that is likely too rare an occurrence to rely on for business, and am amazed they are around still. Only comment is the nachos could've had more toppings! But overall, bravo guys! Bravo 👏🏽","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO12-mZeqzaFD5Evw6zK3mTJAP7dp9Jd1OGvDcN&fid=0x0:0x512bf1c3d258a8b9"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Rachel Solem","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYnENJuax6-NBscwGL1YGJ8ZKTgkcIPirsqYXVNSViJzJikcA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the coolest, nostalgic, authentic pubs around. Brings you back to the past with pinball machines, pool tables darts, and an authentic dark dive bar atmosphere. Definitely found one of my favourite places to go! Awesome deals on beer and food, and free bingo on sundays? Yeah ill be there 😉","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIbu1nuvFCDKkccjNzgelFJkMEDNNAVwWziBAI&fid=0x0:0x512bf1c3d258a8b9"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"Behzad Lajevardi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXq9GtY4jvtfB2iAc5CH_Qknnp1_n_AqQABfKX5jXh08CEKpX-n=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Incredible! You can't imagine how beautiful and cozy this bar and grill is. This week, we're planning to get together with my friends. You can enjoy darts, air hockey, billiards, and many other games. It's the best place for a hangout!

My second visit to this bar was unsettling, I had a disappointing  experience at this bar and grill due to the manager’s behavior. Instead of addressing our concerns professionally, the manager was rude, and even insulting. It’s shocking to see such a lack of respect for customers. Constructive feedback was completely ignored, and it was clear they didn’t care about providing good service.

The food and ambiance might have been decent, but the attitude of the manager ruined the experience. I won’t be returning and can’t recommend this place to others anymore.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Milad Firouzi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzrgrIGNGbel6o9MR69Ok-V4had6hrv3OGfRkMbkDP6QkTT80y2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently visited this pub with a group of 8 friends. While it was busy, one of the servers kindly informed us they could merge two tables to accommodate us. However, when the manager got involved, the experience took a sharp turn for the worse.

Despite showing him two empty tables that could easily be joined, he rudely dismissed the possibility, claiming it was "impossible." After some back-and-forth, he reluctantly agreed to seat us, only to refuse to join the tables—allegedly because a server needed to pass, despite ample space around us. His tone throughout was unnecessarily condescending and dismissive, leaving us feeling unwelcome.

This kind of treatment ruined what should have been an enjoyable outing. Customer service starts with respect, and unfortunately, this manager seemed more interested in asserting authority than providing a positive experience.

We ultimately chose to leave, and I can't recommend this establishment to anyone who values courtesy and professionalism. There are plenty of other pubs that treat their customers with the respect they deserve.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dana Sliman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLCGVuOanB5fZdK4mDXVlNu1FRWwlivE-0dO5Jtxe0XvekGJ21jg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Plenty of options and beautiful menu to choose from. As you enter the space it smells amazing like home cooking. I ordered a breakfast wrap. It was very delicious and oozing with sauce (to rich to my liking). I’m glad that I didn’t take it to go because it was dripping. I will try to come back and try something different and experience more of the menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN6TRgSSAWe6Gi5i3bP7VpvYn8j6B-_4mlJvQB5&fid=0x0:0x3332f77d0ceb5860"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Anthony Plaxen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0TosyGAQWTqM_XvTHaXfq2jDGHv6ifKWBgTGcJKYnap3ceipL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great spot to hit up for decent good eats and brunch. Decided to give their special of the day a try and it was good, solid and what you would expect from a cafe.

It’s nothing too special but it fill you up well. Came with some chips and soup which was nice. It’s a nice quaint little cafe in an industrial area with decent eats and overall I was quite satisfied. I’d come back again for a decent sandwich. Staff are very friendly and they’re open till 3 most days. I’d give their Benedict a try next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKGgSQEfVitCPRyAUV4ztglT_6YE6HgX0jlLYi&fid=0x0:0x3332f77d0ceb5860"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Mohammad M Islam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXuRqeYa0qeQvQy57V-9LRvbVMV5FXbbaQqt8771B7XbII3uUko6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been hearing great things about Oneway Café, and I finally had a chance to try it out. Based on the positive reviews online, I had high expectations, and they were mostly met! This little café is located in what looks like an office block.

The atmosphere is cozy and inviting, with a bohemian vibe that's perfect for a relaxed breakfast, brunch, or lunch. It’s nicely decorated, and the menu offers a handful of delicious options, from classic breakfast dishes to creative lunch plates.

I ordered the avocado toast with a poached egg, and it was okay. Maybe I have different taste buds. I’ll need to give it another try. The presentation was very nice, though.

The service was friendly and attentive, and the staff were happy to answer any questions I had about the menu.

There was plenty of parking around, at least on the weekend when we visited. It might be different on weekdays when the offices are open.

Overall, we had a good experience at Oneway Café and would recommend it to anyone looking for a delicious and cozy brunch or lunch spot in Burnaby.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOU1q_FYN2Z3CJf-bVxdhOGJ6cMbOI9jrXTe2Q1&fid=0x0:0x3332f77d0ceb5860"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Jessica Aranas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUG8N5f3Wd4GKt8zT_qaGsKHP4OREkobtyE2Xefb2cmdEv-KSHu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of the best brunch we’ve had so far, it is not as fancy as other restaurants but the food is so delicious. We ordered the Bulgogi Benedict but next time I’m gonna try other food on their menu. Maybe, they can design the place where you would want to stay and relax. Anyway, giving 5 star for good food, good service, and nice ambiance.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhqGsOzOFuDa8MJNV7PBEDq-g3GuU3DdX7kJRe&fid=0x0:0x3332f77d0ceb5860"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Kun Ho Yoon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7a_TkQUEpAcdGGNy9qU2vuDm2_Ypkj7DPW3ASPBDUd0z4TSse=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food here is simply amazing, I visited for the first time and I couldn’t have asked for better.
The service was really good and friendly. It was very welcoming. I ordered avocado Benedict and with the lentil soup and it was simply amazing, delicious. I’d love to visit again, you must try it in the cafe instead of take out because the vibe and the environment here is very relaxing and pleasing. I would love to visit again in the future, definitely recommended 10/10. Thank you so much!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0UPiGNH0-MWY3UI2P1K5KDL_c8aKMY1MNaAk3&fid=0x0:0x3332f77d0ceb5860"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Stephy Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV09N9nFBWqArIiOZROODXFgWotqMzNAOWY7bfqNJM_q_rhJ8yu=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was excellent! Staff are very friendly and everything is very fairly priced! Will definitely come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1btgaJ5BIR3VHBGX9Rsrz1iR2BDIRm94BKQ-4&fid=0x0:0x3332f77d0ceb5860"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"AH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbSDTBRb0i5Z-O9Llx_f4jUDvaC36Rpc_Ai8VCzOt_tM08rlqM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was looking for brunch near Coquitlam and found this place online. It was delicious! We tried the Bulgogi benedict and the shashu grilled panini. Both dishes were filling and very good! The taro slush was not fresh but I liked their pearls. Prices are kinda expensive but it’s worth it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOE2AQvy74mCjiYS3AA3iiRbOmc5ylV3lCW-Ucg&fid=0x0:0x3332f77d0ceb5860"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Fluffy Squirrel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL2-eZIWh01U6JMyfsAly6kLgc0p4QySV9zmMG41-1unvk4QA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was introduced to this place by my relatives and I can say I was really impressed. We ordered tomato soup, avocado toast, Wednesday special BLT and veggie bibibop. All dish had fresh ingredients, yummy flavour and no flavours were an overkill. The staff were very friendly and checked in with us a couple times to see how we were doing. Overall, it’s a place where I can comfortably bring anyone for a nice brunch / lunch and have a good warm meal. Highly recommend giving this place a try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPyCuX0uUpjqF4OOkmesBFJQs0r_hZD6_x-dzGn&fid=0x0:0x3332f77d0ceb5860"],"When":"2024-1-17"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jayden Goh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfxPbqGM6eAJPan1ykBxu1WdZiDSJ5H4jU_Lmw66QM6XcLJ4I0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly staff! Food is great and the atmosphere of this restaurant will make you feel like you are at a restaurant/ pub in Korea! Their signature dish is gop-chang (beef intestines) but i was craving jokbal (pig feet). Food was good!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOV2uVlS8GymmZnjLDJbkPPEYvofP0uccLq6D_F&fid=0x0:0x6702aa8ece2e8334"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"J Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOZEXIZ1NeuCNiksIy_WwGC41JKbTpUGMVU5GCFZKSfS4-Q__V=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Gobong88, a gem I found while traveling from Seattle. Their BBQ, particularly the intestines, is outstanding with generous portions. The 물막국수 (cold buckwheat noodles) is exceptional and pairs perfectly with the 곱창 (grilled intestines). However, I found their 내장탕 (intestine soup) to be just average. Overall, it’s a fantastic spot for a hearty and satisfying Korean BBQ experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipML1fTuDUMkklU7FE3XWy2y-ItyZJszanjxJ7Lp&fid=0x0:0x6702aa8ece2e8334"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Cat King","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVs0w4Gi6wbbwHozHIMXCxGOYXWgHMRV7NGZtPTmRmCUIubsOlj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went here with my sisters and my mom for a ladies night out. Given that we wanted to eat some greasy food and talk loudly while drinking some adult beverages, gobong 88 was a good choice. We ordered gopchang (grilled intestines), makchang (grilled bung), old school Korean tonkatsu (pork cutlet), seafood tofu soup, makgeolli and soju. Gopchang was good but personally I liked makchang. Should've ordered two of these. Every time I've ordered intestines, I always think I like bung more. Don't get me wrong. Both are heavy. I think I just like the taste and crispy texture of bung more. Don't think I like the gop in gopchang. Not sure what that is. Fat in intestines? I dunno. The old-school Korean tonkatsu was Surprisingly good. It was big and crispy.  We demolished this first. It was a good drinking food for sure. Us ladies were very hungry or something so we decided to order an additional seafood tofu soup. This tofu soup wasn't particularly outstanding. It was fine. It was spicy. Wished it had more tofu. It didnt beat the house Tofu down the street imo, but you don't come here for the tofu soup so don't listen to me. I think this is the second time I've come here makchang/bung and it didn't disappoint. Apparently this restaurant used to be hangang on Austin but it moved here? I remember hangang used to have good makchang/bung so I'm glad they kept their quality. Anyway. I kinda missed loud/dim Korean drinking places on north road from like 10-15 years ago lol. This place was as close as it could get. Was bustling on a Friday night. Grab a bowl of Chestnut makgeolli and a shot of soju in it if u wanna try something different. We'll be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjn_NZ141PlbVEotB9eqB5czQxMK1rk7_5QIgA&fid=0x0:0x6702aa8ece2e8334"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"cotton candy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKMmoOGXJIlT8jx0uCPFlNxGb2g2JZ9w1U-ngpkfzafqh4mlg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The service and food taste are good. I was lucky to go to the store because it was the first anniversary of its opening, so the owner gave me green onion pancake as a service. There is slush makgeolli, and if you like makgeolli, I recommend you to eat slush makgeolli. Peach makgeolli is not recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfh2zQ6NxG3SoudJK8OwkVDpvD0VZIhKCwJW8J&fid=0x0:0x6702aa8ece2e8334"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Byung Gab Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWN7CV-kMCm2w9BNLrj2pNfHwejZE1A5pRZgQwny7Y1RJNutpzL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We Played golfing ⛳️ at Burnaby mountain golf course. After Visited for dinner,
We ordered GamJa Tang, Nea Jang Tang and Korean Jinro soju.   Excellent serving 👌 and
Very delicious 😋 and medium economy price
Please refer. 6 Photos.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEysRTAQ4cPpTZ1gv4H-qRyOQkFwcXrUGlhWUN&fid=0x0:0x6702aa8ece2e8334"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"Charles Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJDuNuVR9_0iyXdhaclBKyzQyqHOYJRtLqTX3GZtWDdTGYzTA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had one of those meals that made you leave feeling happy and satisfied. Came on a Saturday night and the place filled up quickly and the K-pop music made the space lively (our 2.5y/o daughter kept dancing the whole night). Food wait was around 30 minutes, but when it came, everything came! The spicy beef intestine hot pot was awesome if you like organs, very well-seasoned. Everyone loved the seafood pancake, which was very crispy and had a loads of filling. Japchae portion was huge and very tasty. My favorite was the bossom and jokbal (braised pork hock) dish! Super tender, gelatinous and flavorful, highly recommend. The kettle Vanmak makgeoli helped us wash down all that food, which we had to pack half of it to go. Great meal and value, will definitely return!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjDfaoi_vbHtQpex44fdBFUDcZSAU1-jVXHGTN&fid=0x0:0x6702aa8ece2e8334"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"TS OS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrxJ8Fjd3bGSI8mWbF186RbFWyg_DW73VTS3OIkFaxPfXFBEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent Korean soup and dishes here. They are known for intestine dish/soup here. But king size tonkatsu surprised us as it was actually pretty tasty and fulfilling in portion size. If you want to try Korean intestine stuff, this perhaps is a very good restaurant. Ambience is not the top notch but it purposely isn’t as it is year 1988 style restaurant as their name says so. Go try retro, recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOa2YWnd8XJh7YpC9KnaONAer9nzS1-0MlU7T4&fid=0x0:0x6702aa8ece2e8334"],"When":"2024-3-9"},{"Name":"Linh Tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbP3plInkqXVOA2XJc8czoQ80aWBGnT8WS-yMiUPgvNShtt-y90A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was great, both quality and quantity. I love the grilled cow intestine and my husband got the bulgogi. We shared the gamja tang and the soup was amazing. If I could give 7 stars for service, I would do so. It was a Sunday, and they opened at 12pm but we arrived at 11.30. We were ready to wait (as it's our problem), but the waiter walked by and invited us inside because it was -10 outside. That's very kind of him! We appreciate the customer service that day!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLnMhV-g4je1Cw6RDZZBCkvIKkJexN52uylRKU&fid=0x0:0x6702aa8ece2e8334"],"When":"2024-1-20"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jamie Coo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMtT8SYH3ODglSdZyhsIz5N_cesns6jNpwE2VJCXq0WPBgF9EA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered the Cookie Croissant, Earl Grey Scone, and a Mocha Cube Loaf. For drinks we ordered a Spanish Latte.
We are really impressed by the quality of both the food and drinks here. Starting with the Cookie Croissant, slightly difficult to eat since the cookie part was quite crumbly, but the filling was generous and the flavour was rich and delicious. The scone was a big surprise to us - it was served a little warm, and the inside was super moist. The earl grey flavour was also very pleasant and strong. The Mocha Cube Loaf was moist - the texture is quite like a banana bread but mocha flavoured, but this probably has the most subtle flavour out of everything we ordered.
The Spanish Latte came with a very cute bear latte art. Coffee was strong and rich, and is easily one of the best Spanish Latte we have had.
We will definitely revisit this place for the rest of their menu!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHsy3VXVWPc0EglzzV1sjQYMnCz-1qh9Jff_8D&fid=0x0:0xbefc4217b6347d6"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Jack Bi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZ4Bsv7wnjfj756aRVvVyi5fPfQhBIMCe6kqNdp4pTbIyytg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Discover this little hidden gem that boasts an incredibly friendly staff ready to make your visit unforgettable! The relaxing atmosphere invites you to unwind, while the quality food, beautifully presented, will tantalize your taste buds. Come experience the magic for yourself!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPo3cdEHEaE146TNPhCu_Puo1iHKPtRxhC_8Zts&fid=0x0:0xbefc4217b6347d6"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Josh Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJwN2UTX5SU22zHdtHwOol-T1Tx2CdUZ3GytOPSGZ_wa4QkAjU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been to many cafes, but this one really stood out. The macarons were absolutely adorable and tasted amazing—each one was like a little work of art. The sandwiches were fresh and full of flavour, perfect for a light meal. The cozy atmosphere and friendly staff made it a great spot to relax. Definitely worth a visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0rPepiaI_U5rtdcULMftT0ij8QcobtQmcnexZ&fid=0x0:0xbefc4217b6347d6"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Jayden Goh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfxPbqGM6eAJPan1ykBxu1WdZiDSJ5H4jU_Lmw66QM6XcLJ4I0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a cute cafe! You can tell they put a lot of effort and love towards every baked goods and drinks they serve to their customers. They have the cutest looking macaroons, scones, loaves, cookies, and croissants🤍🍪🥐🍞✨ friendly staff and artistic owner🫶🏼","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqEk5Nm5-1PdV-HbjabRHq2f5bM-pbKiZjTMp9&fid=0x0:0xbefc4217b6347d6"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Kate Oh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ-qqECY5zyYXmAqCj-k4FLrMuqdLUFPr-e1buJmYYfmvaZsQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is like a hidden gem. I found it while searching for a place to have brunch. The mushroom avocado and salmon avocado sandwiches are on another level. The ingredients are so fresh and plentiful that it's hard to take a bite. The balance of the sauces and the crispy bread is excellent. I ordered a combo, which included a fresh salad and tomato soup with the sandwich, and it was a perfect match. My daughter's choice of the ham panini was also delicious. The vanilla latte was smooth and had just the right amount of sweetness. I'll definitely come back when I visit Vancouver again. Thank you to the friendly owner and the staff for creating such wonderful memories for our family!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzAIiFiNAlD-yA9l7Okn-Z-V_SbAP9AI3UriNO&fid=0x0:0xbefc4217b6347d6"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Kenny Poon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCkKTuOESfGudPEm0-BDzQVkIamalgjsSUzE_II9VRplB0iEEX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Visited this cafe in Aug 2024. Fancy little bakery. Good selection of coffee / non-coffee drinks, with small bites available.

We had an "iced latte" and a "real lemon tea" (but there wasn't tea I guess?), a cube loaf (Earl Grey flavour).

Drinks were decent, cube loaf caught us with a bit of a surprise. Warm, moist and rich in flavours.

Good alternative for chained stores like Starbucks or Tim Horton's. Likely to visit again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMApsVR7WXUTaE8Q_xKvvHp4jLrmmYNMx_k_AHE&fid=0x0:0xbefc4217b6347d6"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"Mattisse Weyler-Hubert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9gJNuDMC-TgqAXQXLf7KWHT1ycRW5rq4CfBrHxm8LTiT_0fjDNA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very cute cafe with some delicious looking baked goods that I have yet to try. I had the cranberry chicken sandwich and my partner had the salmon avocado. The presentation is beautiful! My small note would be to cut the tomato into slightly thinner slices and spread them through the sandwich so I don't have to unhinge my jaw like a snake to take a bit. Also my partner mentioned that her's could have used a bit more salmon, but that being said both were delicious!
We also ordered oat vanilla lattes which were very tasty. The service was great despite being busy and we'll both definitely be coming back to try more of the menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-VPi7f563T-CLwYFmWIgklnAoArFHSI0RuXSw&fid=0x0:0xbefc4217b6347d6"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Erica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUh3fEd3c7Qz7J80daKhFwS0w6Gog9YOVYUtlC7X3GBid9qw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been to this cafe over 8 times since they opened earlier this year.   The cafe is located across from Dollar Tree in Cameron Square.  Its a family owned cafe that specializes in baked goods.  They totally live up to their name ‘We Bake’.  All of their baked goods are delicious and reasonably priced.  The staff are very polite and professional.  All of the drinks that I have tried here are also very good.  Their sandwich combo includes soup and salad. It was very nice.  I can feel that they use good ingredients and put alot of thought and passion into their products.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPunhXtwOSQik-eH5dvt7q85hyNsUzuBbMzEgSv&fid=0x0:0xbefc4217b6347d6"],"When":"2024-5-23"}]

title: Green Leaf Sushi l Burnaby
descriptions: Modern Asian eatery featuring Japanese-Korean fusion fare & sushi with sake shots & full bar.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Vancouver Foodie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8w6jkWQhHhs1Z246avVvoKQqrR4N6KZDvvFaklq629YACSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Yummy aburi platter and various sushi

Kani bibimbap is a bit dry and lacks a bit of flavor.

Saba miso yaki was a bit disappointed with its taste.

Yuzu chashu udon was great but the yuzu flavor wasn't too strong.

The add on tonkatsu was great.

Green leaf used to be very busy when I visited in the past but it wasn't the case recently.  Very easy to find seats and the servers were very attentive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFBGbNmNMO7t5eIO9UXtRCL1BeMB89I96e64T5&fid=0x0:0xf17d5c35330d7c16"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Joseph","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXbztcvJy0AIdqJzTOyFSntteOTg-h_qvbqjBrQ7R6H-ALXJr1JA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Great, friendly service! I also appreciate their more unique menu when compared to cookie-cutter Korean/Japanese sushi spots!

Karaage was very tender and juicy. And  the Yuzu Chashu was light and balanced, with a subtle brightness from the yuzu. The chashu was great.
The Oshi's (Salmon, and Basil Tiger Prawn) were both too saucy for my liking, completely drowning out the flavor and texture of the seafood. I also expected a stronger basil flavor for the latter, but the olive and cheese was much too strong.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-RDhe5dTnOS5polZMv460fNTVhsHHX7zbtf5A&fid=0x0:0xf17d5c35330d7c16"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"Muh Ruri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkStAcVhSLoWZluIOVQ74c2fLDnRh9SyZ_LHSDWUY1b4U3yJnx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Green Leaf Sushi, tucked away in Burnaby, next to the Walmart  is more than just your typical sushi joint. While the name may suggest a focus on sushi, it’s their pasta and rice dishes that steal the spotlight, offering competition even to specialized donburi and pasta places.

One standout dish is their signature omelette rice. The egg is cooked to perfection—soft and runny, yet holding its shape, creating an indulgent texture that melts in your mouth. Topped with a generous portion of sauce, this dish is a harmonious balance of rich flavors and creamy textures, making it a must-try.

The Kimchi Cheese Udon is another dish that deserves special mention. It’s simple but absolutely delicious, especially when served piping hot. The salty cheese and sweet kimchi blend together to form an incredible flavor profile that keeps you coming back for more. And if you can’t finish it in one sitting, it’s great to take home and pair with some rice, as the dish often has an abundance of cheese and kimchi left over after the udon is gone.

Overall, Green Leaf Sushi offers a delightful and unique experience, proving that it’s not just about sushi—it’s a place where even pasta and rice dishes can shine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzokYKxFdAFcXDYSqnY0UjQ3doAZLiWlOMnluu&fid=0x0:0xf17d5c35330d7c16"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Devi C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIVGQckEvlyJkeQEJFuTg1VQJmMMvwWg5ldGYfQkiJC3QjqGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered the Mentaiko linguine, tornado egg, aburi platter. All were reasonably priced and tasted very good. Would definitely recommend and would come back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-VHSx3sWZds4NtnNoy5kuyuEVe2dWSFJqK_pI&fid=0x0:0xf17d5c35330d7c16"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"CJK S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ-X5MWI6fVajRpWeDcvYRrOl37FpawXBm_Tl_Q2kW3dPbsXg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We googled this place and wanted to try. BUT the servers told us this "Because you are a large group, (and we thought they were going to say 18%-20% gratuity automatically apply, etc, and we are okay with that) and then they said "we give you 1 and 1/2 hour limit!" WHAT??
We all work hard to earn money. Eating in the restaurant is a treat and we want to have a good time and enjoy each other's company. Instead, we have to rush about the time limit we have while paying for their expensive food.
Large party takes almost 1/2 hour to order, 1/2 hour for the food to arrive, so we have only 1/2 hour to eat??
They want to turn the table as many times as they could, it is understandable. BUT like this???? REALLY????
SO this was a big NO!!!!
We talked to the manager and asked why there is a time limit while it is NOT all-you-can-eat-buffet. The manager argued that she worked in "a lot of restaurants" and EVERY restaurant she worked in had a time limit!
We don't know what to say so we left!
Didn't want to eat there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPh6U2jR-Ns1fAbx2bKX5fVHmJuOBAXxJYaS-7J&fid=0x0:0xf17d5c35330d7c16"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"Antonio Neri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ_vAVpnvEiFy6z_h-WTJmrAXJqNMCOVCHeSW88mEcMU7VZbQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful Japanese restaurant. They serve Herr the tornado omelet rice which I haven't encountered anywhere else in Vancouver. Very similar to phones served in Japan. The aburi platter was awesome! There is also this unique robot server! Reminds of the movie Wall-E. Service was fantastic! Everyone makes you feel very welcome! Highly recommended! 2 thumbs up 👍 👍!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXFVu5WZTSPtW_AKJruo1NwJM8Bji0FhCEhnGk&fid=0x0:0xf17d5c35330d7c16"],"When":"2024-5-21"},{"Name":"Salicious Kim (Sally)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocInfzvmZm95_WrqVSbcEKA0Tgk4zl4fxg9m-xCs8Eo9eA95Zg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Overall, it was good. I think I would go back and be willing to try a different menu!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFilqHpLK1Mq5afCJvLKfEd-wmx2EhaEnK9VJG&fid=0x0:0xf17d5c35330d7c16"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Doris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLO1lWy0NbJv_aVua2j5ti6XMGo6lUA9_Biq89x51cRBKBlKR0s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"the servers were very friendly, and the food was delicious(especially the mango and salmon oshi 😋) personally not a fan of the sauce thats served with the tornado omelette but it was nice to try","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPA6vaJqenROFZdSdLNmsdg5b_38dB1L_vUdQv5&fid=0x0:0xf17d5c35330d7c16"],"When":"2024-8-24"}]

title: EGGBOMB+

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Freee27 (Freee27)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocItGEE6mSYhaV1mDVzl6RQpCu5typl6QMnqOSkOQmKhEQnCVQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The interior is very nice and there is a lot of table space. I think the unique layout and style of restaurant can confuse people who are used to it but the staff are nice. I was there at a busy time so I had to wait 10 minutes before someone took my order. The menu drinks are cute and the presentation of the meals are very nice.

The price is up there so expect to spend when you’re here but the overall atmosphere is nice. It almost feels like a cafe restaurant hybrid. If you’re looking for a different kind of eating experience, this is the place to go.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3fhRmVRgmFdVVFVyGbqfBGjih77SCeuJs83yj&fid=0x0:0x8227b0aaa721e9df"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Snoopy Kitchen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3h-I-trbYva-Tzrs-UNhkQe4Nn1jgsblAcoQ0hPrnUWvugM3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Korean managed restaurant newly opened.  First time i went was a weekday morning.  Experience was the best as the young male server recommended drink and food.  He came to check out how’s things at right time and i guess not as busy.

The next visit was a weekend and i made the right choice to make reservation as there are many people.  Restaurants were full of girls servers but they don’t seem very experienced.  They forgot to bring me extra sugar that i asked and ask us to get the bill before we were still eating.  The price and environment doesn’t seem to be a fast food restaurant so i didn’t expect to rush customers to pay.
Went third time Friday noon and servers seem very absent minded 😅 asked for an extra share plate twice when i noticed she simply forgot.  That is more management problem as well because the manager asked to do something when the servers were trying to help customers ending up two people doing the same tasks when no one taking care of customers.

Tried pistachio latte - a bit pricey with the size of the drink and very sweet
Egg sandwich- bread is toast well with soft inside. So as the egg is cooked very well.  Just not enough flavour
Benny is good and chicken is tendered.
I have no complaint with the croffles and price is fair.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQ-f7pga1Ikl55EzEQQVtu24g13ADlbw9dfWTj&fid=0x0:0x8227b0aaa721e9df"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Alan Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-QmMYfw75kgf5vonVt_7RAAdUJRl5hAF6Ijht6iC6ZE8aPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"First time trying this place. Sounds like it is newly opened. I didn’t have a lot of expectation coming here being my visit was more so out of convenience

Quality - the food quality was okay, but not worth the price. Much of my dishes didn’t have much flavour and at that price you just expect a bit more. I would like to come back for brunch as it seems that’s what they are known for more?

Service - the staff although was friendly when they did interact with us, I felt that they weren’t as attentive. Especially since it wasn’t that busy during our visit (dinner)

The restaurant ambiance was quite nice. Very spacious and futuristic in design","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGRiNtgArxYR-b-FaArDsaUNJS5LOZgFnlCoeY&fid=0x0:0x8227b0aaa721e9df"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"Colin Miller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK87JE1g9yRnsbr0VX8NxHru350U4Zs2d26nNtGKjpjxDHzyw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"100% HIGHLY RECOMMEND. Came with my family to check out the new location today and it’s safe to say that I was thoroughly impressed. From the drinks to the food, everything was both visually stunning and delicious. My personal favorites were the Chicken Run and the Basil Pistachio pasta. My kids also really liked the pasta. The service here is friendly and efficient as well. I highly recommend this place to anyone that’s looking for a place to dine out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4mpCYt8fjImIlHJO6j2bCP-UaWfkL0v_l_FHY&fid=0x0:0x8227b0aaa721e9df"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Jasmine Lemelin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUp2O60G-MgxaIbQ-rthWDtvTcAXkxz-sIlQ6XvxcwsoPVpPCgA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly recommend trying this place! The restaurant is bright and has a futuristic theme.
Bonus points for the giant Minion at the door! The service was great as well. Our server was very attentive and patient with us as we navigated the massive menu. They also have these little robots that come bring you your food.
Lastly, the food was tasty for a reasonable price. The breakfast sandwich was fresh and delicious. I’ll be back for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxDDBJIvl5Y9SOttCxPUTznSBfn6HAz3yoeBal&fid=0x0:0x8227b0aaa721e9df"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Ping Yu WONG (mushroom)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLOZjDh6EXKWhTwq8El1JQm9yCg2MDQ3qhyWKmDXjsFKDHokCSm=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a new restaurant in Coquitlam! 🌟 Trendy and modern, with a futuristic design. ✨ It's not just about the ambiance—it's also about the creative food. 🍽️ The drink ideas are amazing, especially the ones with rainbow candy! 🌈🍹 The people here truly make it special. ❤️ Giana, the manager, is like an angel 😇, ensuring everyone feels cared for with warmth and kindness while keeping everything running smoothly. 🌟 The co-workers are equally incredible, putting their hearts 💕 into everything they do.

This is a fantastic place to hang out with friends 👯‍♀️, family 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦, or even enjoy some quality time on your own. 🤗 You'll always feel welcome here! 🏙️🍴 I also noticed some students studying together 📚, and it’s a great spot to have a meeting with a client. 💼✨","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0Jc-FA-hfEpwqkC4waAR3bjwrqeQ7VTY-31PK&fid=0x0:0x8227b0aaa721e9df"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMV9cesFiCHCMuJTO5_OSXpItWvXgWtcUUMYN9xX4_V4bYIDu3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Eggbomb is a great place to grab breakfast or brunch, offering fresh and creative dishes that hit the spot. Their signature Korean-style egg drop sandwiches are a highlight—fluffy scrambled eggs, melted cheese, and tasty toppings like bacon or avocado, served on buttery toasted bread. The portions are filling, and the menu has something for everyone, from hearty sandwiches to croffles and unique drinks.

The food is consistently delicious, and the restaurant has a cozy atmosphere that makes it perfect for a casual meal. Prices are reasonable considering the quality, and it's an ideal spot for anyone looking to enjoy a satisfying and flavorful breakfast. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMja_V8y6n7KVima_ixklgTSvMzw-_uZ1DQ0Cyf&fid=0x0:0x8227b0aaa721e9df"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Oscar Gutierrez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQ7gBp7u024AZ-Lr2o64N2SqmFuPPavfI11yr8JXCdslyGu1cS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food here is quite good, and I would even say it’s the highlight of the place. I ordered the Teriyaki Beef, which was a generous portion for one person. The bread was soft and flavorful, the egg was perfectly cooked, and the beef was delicious, though the serving size was a bit small. I also tried the fruit croissant, but it was disappointing—the fruit was bland, and the croissant itself was not very tasty and a bit hard. I would only recommend the Teriyaki Beef.

The restaurant has a unique atmosphere that feels somewhat out of place. It’s meant to be a brunch/dinner spot, but the futuristic decor—with metallic chairs and Tron-like bathrooms—feels odd for a meal of eggs and avocado. As for the robot delivery, some tables got their food served by a robot, which seemed fun, but we weren’t lucky enough to experience that.

Unfortunately, the service was terrible. We had to flag someone down just to take our order, and the wait for the food was long. We even had to ask for the bill ourselves. To make matters worse, a couple next to us waited the entire time I was eating my brunch before anyone came to take their order. Despite this, they still expected a 15% tip—ridiculous!

Thinking of going? You might want to think twice. The food is good, but the poor service and odd atmosphere might not be worth it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4crxBteyqhkRt-iMOG9QwItLorRJTjlc6mecA&fid=0x0:0x8227b0aaa721e9df"],"When":"2024-9-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"S K (OxtailGravy)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIINjUguJePPet75HTnX-unbS8rsk4LQ_Ku9eCz7eh0Wy--ZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m from Toronto originally and we don’t have any Korean buffets, so this was a real treat. I loved all the options they had. Although I wish there were more but quality over quantity is important, so I really enjoyed everything Secret Garden had to offer.

Service was attentive and friendly.

Atmosphere was clean and well lit.

I’ve gone here about 5 times in a few months,  quality is consistent and the food tastes good and fresh.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNV58wngMz9q4DFjG52HUvvDasZlfYPkBykH1RU&fid=0x0:0x8e75bc21ed381e20"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Benjamin Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyrkRhrZBvgQ_1F9LHksUNGuV-VlZTD03IyS-1Bkq9EdQgJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Went for dinner buffet two weeks ago at around 7:37 pm. Was really looking forward to trying Korean buffet as there aren’t many in metro Vancouver. Plenty of hot pot and regular buffets. The service was good. The only reason for the three star rating was strictly on my experience dining at 7:30 pm. Their cut off time is 8 pm for closure of 9 pm on weekdays. However I did not expect the food to not be refreshed (I guess understandably given there weren’t any more guests after me.)

Great variety of Korean dishes and I especially liked the beef bone broth (very hearty and seems like real boiled beef bones. Nutritious) along with the kimchi fried rice (good flavour).

The only thing was the grilled meats were all cold when I arrived. Also, the pasta and rice cakes were looking pretty sad so I didnt even try it.

The fried fish was delicious but there was literally only one small slice left. The bugogi was freshly made on request but admittedly sub par; the beef is too thinly slice and since it’s likely frozen the texture was rather powdery. The salmon had a bitter aftertaste for some reason.  And the Korean fried chicken is the highlight but because it was likely out for some time, it was very soggy though the seasoning was nice.

The service was great and friendly. No problems there. The price is good as well

I guess just take this review to note that you MUST go early if you want fresh and hot food. Else I felt like I was eating cold left overs. It’s my fault; I had intended to come at 5:45 pm but got held up and arrived at around 7:45 pm. Didn’t expect the food to be cold though.

Would try again and frequent regularly but it’s an hour from where I am so the time cost for two hours doesn’t make it worth while except the once in a blue moon to fill cravings for Korean food. Great variety though and has good potential if the food is hot and fresh. Didn’t see the cheesecake till looking at my pictures lol (and ended up taking a stroll by Korean town to H-Mart and Hannuen Market to get some Korean bread and cheesecake after. Speaking of which, you can walk by Korean town after you eat to burn some calories and see the other restaurant and cafes)

Would probably try the lunch buffet next time as it’s only 25.99 to see the difference.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJCETovXUDFpAHlCI9StAT6D1-yy0Jrhpoi6hh&fid=0x0:0x8e75bc21ed381e20"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Nick (Neek)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1vFxY7J8TeGvCzfbDb-8G1ZKZ5NRu0re3I-xGPfKYIH_u9Mgytw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We went right at 11:30am when the buffet opened in order to get the freshest food. We went on a weekday for brunch, and the price was around $28. This price can vary depending on the day you go, as well as whether you're going for brunch or dinner. The restaurant was very clean and spacious inside, with very attentive staff - which was really nice. There was a good variety of foods to choose from, including meats, side dishes, condiments, and desserts. My favorites were the pork belly, pork katsu,  kimchi fried rice, and Korean fried chicken. It's all very tasty and fresh. For 3 people, we paid about $90 in total, so expect $30 per person for the brunch buffet. Overall, it is a decent price for really good food and very friendly staff. Will have to come back one day to check out the dinner buffet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPFDb_Me8cwN4xN4HuM937N8fu9VjF-6RmOC35&fid=0x0:0x8e75bc21ed381e20"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"F M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiAuxCOUxOthoh8wyw2iAy6CmojcgUKL0veulsM0a6veQ3OQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"To be honest, I had very low expectations for this place as all you can eat typically are mediocre at best with room temperature food risk of old food that has been sitting out all day. This place was incredibly clean and fresh. Service was polite and efficient. I would definitely come back here anytime. I love the barbeque meat, super flavourful. The inari with tuna and kimbap was really good. I loved the rosé pasta with seafood (such a random thing I wasn’t expecting to find, but it was actually so good) the fried chicken was probably the highlight for me and fried rice was also good! Jjang noodles were udon which I’ve never seen but loved the texture difference
And bonus for ice cream and cookies","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnyjoagrrgBlGV25bP34wn_hJ4hTvMYJ-0Hyes&fid=0x0:0x8e75bc21ed381e20"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Sinyo ganteng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVK6DhObLW3StVcJ_e9Ph42mdmAq5cSoW-d536hao-jSu7WAn8I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"OK, food. Restaurant looks very new, bright, and clean, except the washroom. not much varieties, even on weekend dinner  time. bone soup is the best
Price wise, for weekend dinner time, I think it is a bit expensive. I will go to regular menu Korean restaurant in area. Ice cream is good, fruit only watermelon and grape. The grape is a bit soft, not fresh. cakes is ok, not much.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyUxgXHR4TB6zd-OQ2IZUmIQmillIw5OIGktYl&fid=0x0:0x8e75bc21ed381e20"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"actionj007","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3vSkBAqKJl0vg8_AMzQD5EEGhEVeYS2de8UbzcFClZ51w9xM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came here for my wife's bday dinner as she wanted to try this all-you-can-eat (AYCE) restaurant after seeing it from an online post.

We believe this restaurant used to be a Red Robin and inside has been renovated a bit and is very spacious and comfortable.

The selection of the food was good from cold foods (e.g. sushi, kimbap, etc) to hot foods (e.g. grilled meats).  The highlight of the food for me was the fried chicken.  Also I quite enjoyed their japchae and the variety of soups that they had especially the beef radish soup and fish cake soup.  They also have a drink fountain that had Sujeonggwa (traditional Korean cinnamon & ginger drink) and it was very cinnamon-ly.

Overall it was a very good dinner.  The food is constantly refilled and the servers are attentive to removing your plates and refiling your water/tea.  However if you cannot eat a lot like me and struggle to eat 2+ plates then I would suggest not going for dinner as it is around $40.  Do lunch as it is cheaper ($28) however I'm not sure if the food selection is the same as dinner but assume it isn't.

Will be back for lunch for another special occasion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUFslpKKlQmlzk1KadZhFygxk8jEI3tyGqo6ZH&fid=0x0:0x8e75bc21ed381e20"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"Cat King","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVs0w4Gi6wbbwHozHIMXCxGOYXWgHMRV7NGZtPTmRmCUIubsOlj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We dropped by Secret Garden with my sister's family, my parents, My MIL, and my family. We actually heard that Secret Garden wasn't as good as people hoped, so we didnt really have high expectations.  Still, Secret Garden has been on our families' to-try-list for a while, so we finally came. It's quite hard to find a restaurant that can Accommodate 11 people without a reservation. However, Secret Garden did have space for us. The restaurant actually had lots of space for many more guests. We paid about 40 bucks per person, 35-ish for seniors, and children under two or something I think was free. Overall, we thoroughly enjoyed their food. Their fried stuff was fried really well. Their fried chicken was pretty good. Fried fish was pretty good. None of their fried  Stuff was soggy. They had good choices of Korean soup. They had other meats and some dessert options (Ice cream, small little cake bites, fruit ) It's been a while since I've been to a buffet, so I personally didn't know too much whether or not this was a good one, But I had a good experience overall perhaps because I was with my family. Family time is always good, so yeah. But my sister, who is visiting from out of town, she said that her and her kids enjoyed the food here. She said the food was clean. Anyway. I personally like having variations whenever I eat, so I enjoyed the experience at Secret Garden. The only thing they could use is perhaps a soft drinks dispenser or something. maybe there was one, but I couldn't find it. I wouldn't mind coming back again with my family later. It worked really well for a big size party","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMp1r99x37hcwEl5fbBDQaf4s3tCubvJeEGqdZ_&fid=0x0:0x8e75bc21ed381e20"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Dave Chao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL544JfNo-heg8UsP95fr9shcrTY9pTTKZqcIgOMgLc7F2usw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time in a Korean Buffett, really enjoyed it. Nice, clean and friendly staff. Large selection of stirfrys, fried foods, seafoods, soups, noodles, and desserts to chose from. Staff constantly checking in and removing used plates. Plenty of parking outside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWIsSLIh_mQwoGn-CZT5q62Z3nvfOCTqcbEu_K&fid=0x0:0x8e75bc21ed381e20"],"When":"2024-12-1"}]
