user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lauryne Arene","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVI1wyprdFrfJ7Gg44BLuJks92Ospyq75syZVULmeV7SrEk8wY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had ordered on Uber Eats a few times and wanted to see if an in-person experience would match my orders and I'm happy to say it did!!
The steak and salmon sushi was ABSOLUTE PERFECTION!! The ponzu sauce that came with it has to be the best sauce I've had so far.
My server Diane T. was the best and such an angel 🥺, and other staff would make sure you had all you needed even if they were simply walking past your table. The atmosphere was great and lively. However if you mind a noisy venue; I would suggest going earlier in the day maybe.
Thanks JOEY!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMm-Dha5qXL6NZy0PMmCkdWJEUWDMZOozfhkaup&fid=0x0:0x6cefb323c24b53"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Amber Dawn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGA66SYMOxP3MvLZBaDJOdTOaKB6Z8SsPSQ5wkbjCc9v3o4TIVWA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came in on my Birthday for some drinks and a bite to eat.  Our server was super friendly and had great energy I can t remember her name, but she was awesome.  We did have a slight issue with the fries coming out cold but our server got them replaced right away and took them off the bill for us.  The crispy Mash Potato spring rolls are my favorite definitely recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwd-VMTSLE6HW-aM-Sn0iCU5X7KTo0sPytSRki&fid=0x0:0x6cefb323c24b53"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Ananya Rao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5RWRI-JBTcMVfmQUo3asKTONhvqC2Tu39I_L0H9FAbwG9O0M=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nikayla was amazing! Food was great as always. One of our favorite restaurants to keep coming back to. They were very accommodating with our baby. Overall a wonderful experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPq9hXaZTPpELwQAhpYLIQIDMuyR6MfKwC7CmK9&fid=0x0:0x6cefb323c24b53"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Will Wing","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQqhOH_tV7Gsqj6fYLtbogZJ8B-P9-rASQDcJ9Zc1SIhVR_5I-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Joey's Burnaby is hands down our favorite location! The staff here are truly amazing—always welcoming, attentive, and genuinely invested in making your dining experience enjoyable. The atmosphere is vibrant and lively, making it the perfect spot for both casual meals and special occasions. Each visit feels special, thanks to the team's outstanding service and friendly demeanor. Highly recommend this location if you want great food and an even better experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBwLiSIeHXtkDJiqfm1F_0dtWtJyqDVvJP_qvu&fid=0x0:0x6cefb323c24b53"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Corolla Fleeger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWi9_GKprLzECmxxfslpQj0Ym4jcHKJeX1-79vh7mARtcTVHOiBUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Outstanding food flavors! My friend wanted to drink the sauce with the herb crush salmon. The herb topping was tantalizing on top of the perfectly cooked salmon. The sechzuan chicken lettuce wrap was a mouth watering explosion of flavor. Light but seasoned perfectly. We did knock off one star for the atmosphere because the music was quite bad and just worse and worse. Valentina was our server and the bartender but was patient with us and on top of it with the service! We will most definitely return here again and again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGfzSSUXa2x1Mk0RTu-06iVhactL_GElXceQ8r&fid=0x0:0x6cefb323c24b53"],"When":"2024-7-31"},{"Name":"Wariya Janpayom","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL48dKC5QgZnA274P7mgUL-82JxB3bG7Q9OiFI98ZiBVA8sUg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The atmosphere is great. The black chicken is amazing. I also love the tuna poke and ravioli bianco. Our server ‘Peter’ is nice and attentive. Great experience in Burnaby!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0QZlImAE9MIyUlCbHYuSSCs0YIVFrPQTJ9FMN&fid=0x0:0x6cefb323c24b53"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Dr Jamie Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2_0PQnVaeYAXdhsDWNzViKH8WZiTBIp7FZWdeTd7-92tvQX1tCw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Joey Burnaby is a superb place to grab a beer and some quality food if you find yourself in the Vancouver area. I recommend the lobster and prawn tacos and the apple pie dessert both of which are superb. The design and atmosphere of the restaurant is also excellent. Recommend a visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtrgS6qMnCWkmdwuwQuiCISJDdQ9_r7_TE-jdg&fid=0x0:0x6cefb323c24b53"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"S H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVvirkE9LgOQ0jJk8w3EtQ6zE4CmTI8PT7tQpHeC3MhOF2FxQw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a great dinner, our server Arjun gave us great recommendations for food and drink, he is very friendly and attentive. We had a wonderful experience because of him! Thank you Arjun!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuQl8Lyfm-4FBlpztQexIVgcbv1SDz2uiEIsya&fid=0x0:0x6cefb323c24b53"],"When":"2024-12-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rachel F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUTMk1beMs0P_8ZtNw1vXS6V_a5_RnR51BUAkElu27KCu9RHpBD=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered the chicken curry. It's super flavourful, mild spice and hearty. You get 3 drumsticks and a potato to go with your rice and the portions match each other so you're not left with too much of one by the end of your meal. Good selection of other foods available as well. Would love to try this place again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3RjabMHHTp0nOJUAnOVAEIdGT1JI2Dze8qNEd&fid=0x0:0x947815545affb9bf"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Shiok Express is located as a stall at the Lougheed Town Centre Food Court. It has a variety of dishes to choose from that are of Singaporean / Malaysian origin. We ordered the beef rendang and the Nasi Lemak at the counter which came to almost $30. The staff gave us a timer token to come back to the stall to retrieve the food once ready.

The beef rendang came with a mountain of coconut rice. The beef portion was good and the curry had a good spicy kick.

The Nasi Lemak dish came with a mountain of coconut rice, a fried chicken, a boiled egg, some sambal, and fried anchovies and peanuts. The sambal was really good and I wish they sold it so that we can buy some for home.

Overall, it was a good and hearty meal aided by the mountain of fragrant coconut rice. Would come back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHZqQJqkxqXg7DJfBpCX6GL2ZQLWrg4op5xjVO&fid=0x0:0x947815545affb9bf"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Gladys L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj4HD_rCmosBiTa0vnceZtMVeD2MW-78JaRGkQcsV2nqEMEBJxeQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered the seafood laksa to go. Loved the broth very tasty. The fish cakes were very thinly sliced as well as the shrimp. Portion size is ok for itsprice point. $13.95 for this bowl of noodles.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7tQkgjQpdq1MycabQQ--muRai_uX3vGfUHwbN&fid=0x0:0x947815545affb9bf"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"N. Richardson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0REuU_YLHAumapCjO9DkmysBWEea_o-ZIK1UQvWCav1MZwEuSPw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered the veggie coconut laksa (which I have had many times before at other restaurants). Before I ordered I confirmed it was not made with any meat or seafood as I am vegetarian.

Before tasting it, I noticed a very strong unpleasant fishy flavour but took a sip of the broth anyway just in case I was misinterpreting it. It was very very fishy.

I called the restaurant (as I had now left with my order) and explained and asked if there could have been some mistake where the wrong sauce was used - they said no, it was made fresh. I explained that it tasted very fishy and the employee laughed and just said “I don't know why”. No offer to refund my inedible dish or provide something else.

I’m not sure what the situation with the laksa was but the experience was very disappointing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgancrApXzip_n_5hejqd2cs9YMxlBw2gffCuZ&fid=0x0:0x947815545affb9bf"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Nowell Alcancia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLDqmFfelGK9VUjuTkW_fGkawlR7g8hmDyutgBrf42CtjnR7rw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I usually dine here when I’m craving Singaporean food. It may not be authentic hawker style, but the taste is good and gets my cravings satisfied.

My favorite is their Nasi Lemak which I usually pair with Iced Bandung. The chicken rice is good too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzJzyt581bMyhCBzP9IAZ-gu6hJWdvVEXJxOG1&fid=0x0:0x947815545affb9bf"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"JC Lok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVM0rajm6nHN5FjKdKZg4Ly9jBV6OXvI1jGEN5Tb5_EVLBPjBGi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered the laksa and chicken rice… it was great. Loved it (from someone who used to live in Singapore). Will be back to try more next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSgSa6UEVXNvarYS31_DFDW9RXiIo0bML08qIu&fid=0x0:0x947815545affb9bf"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Corbin Ly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK6tg_S2iYdOKUobfRZYLM17REyHl-YW0Xs2xafM86hRPFTRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The beef rendang is really tasty and delicious with plenty of meat, though I do wish they gave me more sauce to go with the mountain of coconut rice","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOq2_6kfC2BkdkRXBIgdOItge_StmJMiM1Fvv17&fid=0x0:0x947815545affb9bf"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Cheuk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViyaLSrOR53wIdh-1tPL1EO-fv4jJiDA_NDJQYVAHprBRcIndGIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As a person that stayed in Singapore for two years, this is the most authentic Laksa I have ever had outside of Singapore! Great taste and they cook it when you order so the noodles are not soggy and the temperature is hot!  Will definitely come back again and highly highly recommended!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQSZvbqpO5fjTeSq9n0lT3FUQJM8EhK4Bsfxw-&fid=0x0:0x947815545affb9bf"],"When":"2023-2-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"shahvir patell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUj-gStr-SxUMNYhYIxCv_SNQfWIklkoz0CSXuMVa8Jl-81PGZz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visited X-Site Grill & Bistro for the first time yesterday and tried their Monday steak deal—what a fantastic value! For just around $27+ tips, two of us enjoyed steak dinners and non-alcoholic drinks. The steaks were cooked just right, and the overall experience was great. I also found out they have different deals each day, so I’m definitely coming back to explore more of what they offer. The service was decent despite how busy it was. If you’re looking for an affordable and delicious meal, especially with their daily deals, X-Site is the spot to be!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3lapfoWk2RK_i0mmZlXWgt_MVr5vJsn9f9enl&fid=0x0:0xa39e1b8a0b5c5b98"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8uFSJcbQTrEEjCys2cjtAF4babUVY96Uqg-hJ0LaE6prB3Bfh9w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went here for dinner.
It's relaxed and already for the Xmas season. Nicely decorated.

I ordered the fettuccine Alfredo  which was a mistake as it had pesto in it. This was not a good combo. It wasn't creamy, it was watery and salty. Even my friend agreed.
I asked for more sauce thinking it would fix it and it didn't.
I would not order this again.

My friend had a veggie sub and it looked fantastic. Might have been a little dry.

The prices were great.

I'd come back and try another dish.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNiqta-A34wU-p54MACRdL-yHgYpPk2GhwNixl9&fid=0x0:0xa39e1b8a0b5c5b98"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Katarina Parafianovich","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXMWLRQY-q_bExjf8inJFyvBpIWTwQpKGIiKiNWBUO3hpsHn0H=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"X-site restaurant, clearly named after its excellent food and exciting experience. Owner is a friendly and memorable character.
Quite popular restaurant with often a line, on Mondays. Nevertheless, the line moves fast and tables are always spacious and clean. Food comes very quickly. I almost always get the peppercorn steak, medium rare and it’s phenomenal. The washrooms are even a highlight, as they smell great and are clean. I would recommend this place any day, as the drink specials, service and food are exceptional. When grabbing your bill, the price truly is the cherry on top. A lower budget for a quality dinner, ensures I always tip BIG. I am beyond grateful places like this exist, and I want to keep coming back to support them.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"actionj007","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3vSkBAqKJl0vg8_AMzQD5EEGhEVeYS2de8UbzcFClZ51w9xM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I came here with my son for lunch and this was our second visit.

A popular restaurant with their lunch specials at $7.95 when you purchase 1 beverage from their menu.  My son ordered the fettuccini alfredo + pop and I ordered the chicken souvlaki + pop.   The pop was $3.50 but even that is still a reasonable lunch for $11.50 + tax + tip.

Only complaint that my son had was the fettuccini alfredo was a bit watery and not creamy enough.

Other than that, everything else was great.  Our server was extremely friendly and we appreciate the attention she gave us to make our lunch more pleasant.

Will be coming back again in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOm1uAZE2yF78MmQawyBqaiT-Z8g7vl4fM-pmoW&fid=0x0:0xa39e1b8a0b5c5b98"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Bradley Jones","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQSjOdt_NCThfrgQQSPCAI9c1m2q4Cia70lWTZMyAGLNwKu8R3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lunch for $12? Served on an actual plate, no less! The value is real, so if you're looking for a satisfying meal and want to keep a few coins in your pocket, this is your spot. Just a heads-up—you'll need to grab a drink with that lunch. Cheers!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJw1CKVVtDBWihLZhV6_0P3XfU482BUdVvWBpR&fid=0x0:0xa39e1b8a0b5c5b98"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Kelvin Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYlOJ0ZWKycRqx5ZOzHhnjusnD1vSd-Gno_8IQ4mNi6hmtCYtiSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great neighborhood spot with fair prices and amazing weekday specials. The staff are super friendly, and it’s been a local favorite since my younger days.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDTIB7j2IHB-rZ-d1OAWSKONPMiGIJ8R7-fvAm&fid=0x0:0xa39e1b8a0b5c5b98"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"J Tsang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzr6Y0twlmtUXm9KeDl3Yec3FqKKWpE7LlW49p3XyuhSVOFIAH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is an easy 5 star for me, great fresh food, amazing daily special value @ $8.95 (+ the purchase of a drink), BIG portions.  Neighbours are lucky to live near here, I'd be here once a week!  Had the Souvlaki dinner this time, coming back for the Steak on a Monday night baby!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKEBAWo9Zr7T27lZw_L7XcF0fJPpUPO9aKFjyi&fid=0x0:0xa39e1b8a0b5c5b98"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"Jessica Ly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBi9k3ubtn2lBAdEeN41_YY0KE-Z-lUFKhdpOoJ23Ur0Ztul3FZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A go to, on weeknights for my wife and I. They have great dinner deals! The food portions are huge! There's usually a line in the evening but it's worth the wait! It also moves fairly fast! You can also order take out for the dinner deals ( I believe it's a dollar or so more but still well worth it!)","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"그래도","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkgdHPRGBi8WFCxl82aXKEMFff-3O7FRqSM7GCABZOMorgdr4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Three of us visited today and ordered the mackerel set meal and the stir-fried squid and pork set. We added cheese to the stir-fry, and it was such a great choice! The place is small, but really clean, and we could choose between cold water or hot tea when they served drinks at the start. The side dishes were plentiful and so delicious. The stir-fried squid and pork was especially amazing—the squid and meat were perfectly seasoned, and the cheese made it even better! The service was super friendly, which kept the atmosphere fun and pleasant the whole time we were there. I think this place might just become one of our regular spots!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvmv7EcByRJiJFeY7I6P0GdmiR4aoVW0a3zXHh&fid=0x0:0x13b566453b9ca18c"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Cony Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpC3y6mqLmfCIY77w3Bn7gViIGSQ3upVIX9SoD4nxR48AVQes4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered the stir fry spicy squid and pork belly with rice balls and beef rib soup. Both dishes are amazing!! This is probably one of the best korean meals that i have ever had. A little on the pricey side but the portion is huge!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMiuYZ_A1ipLhDoSAAL8INZbXNBxoz78oCAlaiM&fid=0x0:0x13b566453b9ca18c"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Jenna Bae","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUppHJ23JmEQJdeom5LFe1Y45e9vGBTd9XJYa_fwY4qbgYTXJU6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Probably the best Korean food in Coquitlam area!

The food overall is tasty, the servers are nice and they decorate the restaurant nicely during Halloween.
The atmosphere is not super appealing since it’s inside the complex where you can see other stores but I don’t mind that as long as food is great!

My favorite is Gamjatang and bibimbap here.
It’s pretty popular place so you might want to come here early during weekend lunch time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkKJ7cjSyhRhuuDNtCXGZVvcSOkqiBXLdBf8Rb&fid=0x0:0x13b566453b9ca18c"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Stacy Purum Jeon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJokIsJGL-fv0gSK_iI4jQxVk_jmrb_b6s-LN0DAYOqzSpY2xQLw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first time trying this restaurant and I was absolutely stunned that I hadn’t tried this restaurant before.

I ordered squid stone bowl bibimbap and it was really good. As you see, there were a lot of squid so delicately cut and well displayed and the veggies were so fresh.
All the side dishes were good as well.

I also ordered small side Bean paste soup, it was only $3.

Overall I would definitely come back here. And try more food!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2gpCaj4kmEbqO_A3l3etXZRbRL61_cgXbnixG&fid=0x0:0x13b566453b9ca18c"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Lisa Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfOhhb6hwyB_b9yB8WwM4VioTgX2J5nOOYJWvTqfGpNlQYYw7Y=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So… I rarely finish eating all the food. Especially the side dishes. It was just like food from home. No extra no less to ask for. If you want to try authentic Korean food and services, this place is ideal. I definitely would come often.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMI7QBk9Q7mzsEfrHzvIuH7iRfUw_Q54EU8EltI&fid=0x0:0x13b566453b9ca18c"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"hanni david","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXg4yT5kBscpsz78bdnACTnRQCKuXpiUrLp-PTUD4FM702U-8g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The bibimbap was really good, with plenty of squid as you can see. The portion was quite large, and it was absolutely delicious. My friend ordered the kimchi soup with beef, but I was hoping to get it with chicken or seafood. Unfortunately, they didn’t offer those options, so I didn’t get to try the soup.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5AN7W5wy5kUcHr1QjU5atlkAFNbNP7nN0gy9v&fid=0x0:0x13b566453b9ca18c"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Linda Vu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4Mt-fIM1ZKQuO_Y2ib9yo6xFV3B1mBRBjrbB_M80tp5QNaP0e=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time at this restaurant, it is right next to Hannam Market.

I tried the budae jjigae ramen - Sliced pork belly, sausages, spam, tofu, Korean rice–cakes, ramen noodles, and beans

The portion is huge and the spiciness level was perfect.

It came out piping hot and it’s full of meats.

Would love to come back again to try more dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMD1uOfJFxTmA1bafLZSKQto18siU4IyM8hPhqB&fid=0x0:0x13b566453b9ca18c"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Felix Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMSLxW2CVaZi9x1FwPxk5eHrnt5RDNMhxw4gL41vTJ4Ilxx1pC=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tucked away inside a small Korean shopping mall, this is a hidden gem! The food is super tasty. We ordered a kimchi fried rice with cheese and grilled Mackarel set. Both are super yummy and arrived hot and fresh. Highly recommend if just happen to be in the Lougheed area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNYdiRu_oggpyIYGGTOQ9FCDstmtaiiiqba2Xz&fid=0x0:0x13b566453b9ca18c"],"When":"2024-11-21"}]

title: Jejudo Restaurant
descriptions: Tabletop grills cook up Korean meat & seafood platters in an easygoing restaurant.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Christopher Suppa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzvGs8gP888XN9QfjfDACPqWfAi5-8OTC4hXwRRvcSZgqBGlCjTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Exceptional Service and Delicious Food with Minor Shortcomings

Our experience was exceptional overall. While they don’t accept reservations on weekends and operate on a walk-in basis, the hostess went above and beyond to accommodate our group and ensure we were comfortable.

The soy-marinated crab was exquisitely tender and perfectly balanced in flavor—an absolute standout dish. In contrast, the spiced crab fell short; it lacked the same depth of flavor and tenderness, suggesting it may not have undergone the same meticulous marination process.

The two meat dishes we tried—soy-marinated pork jowl and beef—were flawless. Both were tender, juicy, and bursting with flavor.

The green onion salad was another highlight. It was perfectly seasoned without being overpowering, making it a refreshing complement to the main dishes.

However, the side dishes were underwhelming. Having lived and traveled extensively in Korea, I feel Jejudo could elevate this aspect to better reflect authentic Korean dining standards.

The restaurant’s renovation is stunning, with upscale lighting and a modern, inviting interior. The washrooms were impressively clean and well-maintained, with the inclusion of an all-gender washroom standing out as a progressive and thoughtful touch.

Pricing is reasonable, especially considering the generous portions of sides and salads. Expect to spend $30-40 per person, which feels like great value for the quality. Don’t forget to order rice and a side of lettuce (often included).

Despite a few minor critiques, this is a solid 5-star experience. The food, service, and atmosphere make it a standout spot, and I’m far more impressed than not.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPLVuN49j9YUcLSgMuhhHGRbpqJvtY1DxpaMt7&fid=0x0:0xf07718804d2751b"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Scott Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHpW7vGME__Zs4wKjXR04Upnw88bkVVyz-H2288JsHocq9vI3r=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Recently renovated with the same fantastic food and service! We had their signature raw soy marinated crab, some pork jowls and marinated pork as well as assorted seafood for Korean barbecue. I also loved the corn cheese that came with the food and everything went so well with the extra rice that we ordered! Also don't sleep on the myriad of side dishes because they can refill them if you have a favourite.

They get pretty busy so be prepared to wait! But it's definitely worth it and I highly recommend this place to anyone who wants to try high-quality, authentic Korean food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJjAJNNS4Jo8RTkbxVimiH_wrS9rLyXFOZdJ9D&fid=0x0:0xf07718804d2751b"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"Yang Steven","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKJzIvB1BH7DFdtcVSc6j4gVl_OxO6XnkcDXdp1jvGveYfOeQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"love the food and service! Price is fair enough for this high end combo and the taste is awesome! Five of us(3 adults & 2 kids)were very full. Food decorations were fantastic!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPktsdgHhdVZj9CTJFECniTYgFaUaWZ3t6GRCR7&fid=0x0:0xf07718804d2751b"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Chinh Luong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMbhk5hAyFmD59TyKogEhQLnQzDnZlyfQmstD5DLWCx9kOspe6cg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had dinner here with friends. The food is delicious and price is perfect. We enjoy the open seating.  Although I would like to have the servers check in if we need anything. We had to stop the server twice to ask for more tea.  Other than that i think the server is still great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPv3k8OsJ-Lam2_O3g24k7aCicfaxiQi3wrZkxq&fid=0x0:0xf07718804d2751b"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Elysia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLAOPZpmxu06mh2VvFJHifji8p7NAZ9AdZhV-jfrj1KCMCkNw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered the Assorted Soy Sauce Marinated Seafood for a birthday dinner, and it was fantastic! The sauce was perfectly balanced, not overly salty, and the seafood was marinated to perfection. Although I was a bit concerned after reading mixed reviews about ingredient variations, I was relieved and pleased to receive exactly what was shown in the menu pictures. I’ll definitely be coming back for this dish. Thank you for such a wonderful experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNg3vwH2U0Ocvc70Q9AaNvjnLznDbGkvQcUM3gg&fid=0x0:0xf07718804d2751b"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Kitty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhMuwg_tl1TRTc24JxH5iTo3OJVTHqCQijM2P6PldLkYJ1Idkn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Got to try their 2 person lunch special. Definitely a lot of food and cannot finish it all with two girls. The raw marinated seafood was more on the “sweet” soy sauce side.
The atmosphere and service were really good. Worth a try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPucjJ4c0Q0geNNEjcWvnq16AviOCx_e8eAvQkU&fid=0x0:0xf07718804d2751b"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Colin Chau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKsZm0dxkoaNVpT_U5MSz6Hu71-aJgYtlTkTneFejPbF30OZkbOg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was great! Nice sandy beach / volcanic rock interior after remodelling.

It was bad form / poor etiquette for them to be playing Christmas music before Remembrance Day (11/11). In Canada, most businesses know not to play festive music before 11/11 to respect our fallen and those who have served in the military.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLKApTgWyG9X_a0-bplybBNzaK_hcZjy6p2NCa&fid=0x0:0xf07718804d2751b"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Jason P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwQ6VrAafrL568UtVUXBwRugwDfBdgtXm5PLgDAxdMUbNAFin6DA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Pretty good selection of meat for the grill and nice presentation for the platter. We also tried the marinated seafood and that was pretty decent. The servers were quick to offer more banchan when they see the plates empty and also quick to take away dirty plates as well. Overall, food was good, service is fast, efficient and friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFDE-NHR2CbmooMzAYiHGaO8Cd8SOxIL61JAfu&fid=0x0:0xf07718804d2751b"],"When":"2024-7-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYFex45bXw9yBskOBPtG9kbLb-3GIbV-NFNu3eawk58YIdeGkhHA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food: They always fill the bowl, and I do love all the extras you get. It is filling and value is as expected. One less star because I found the rice to be ever so slightly mushy for a poke bowl. Otherwise, happy with the ingredients.

Service: young Asian man was helpful, courteous and patient while we decided what we wanted

Atmosphere: to be expected for a “fast food” chain, but was clean, had indoor bar-height window seating as well as outdoor seating which is always appreciated.

Price: We both got a single scoop but because of the review, received a free scoop, it worked out to be $20.14 each, if you get a regular double scoop it would cost more. It’s a little on the expensive side as rice to topping is about equal, but still within the Vancouver price range.
They do give discounts if you bring your own container which I like.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNC3vrmFMe00ldapA7eKF5kVCL0OWCTwlz4GZSH&fid=0x0:0xcc7439254cced8f8"],"When":"2024-4-23"},{"Name":"Corey Zinger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV82isKGUntRlZNnI9zQqSVHTPsmJ3vp2B6JTmGSqHV-uQo84g1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great Poké, came with a lot packed into the dishes they serve with the many toppings you can add.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8tWX41qaK704iJhwRg7oCReNTFovGvrjTlk5N&fid=0x0:0xcc7439254cced8f8"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Feve Omipon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_0GEhwUjCKnwOJDNPpXV2CZS1bbyas601WD4tWnrTWQ_VGRs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Out of all the food places on campus, I enjoy Steve’s Poke the most. I like being able to pick what to put in my poke bowl. I enjoyed trying the ahi wasabi tuna and the ahi wasabi salmon, very flavourful. It’s a great healthy option and I will come back soon :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdFP-rfdXhCFiCDZJ6x9cNcb92j0ra4OOh-gc&fid=0x0:0xcc7439254cced8f8"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Valerie H M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUp_X5S4h44SF0ksbmohs3sTAsIFbULF6JNiuilUZujEUD49CApcQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love coming to Steve's poke for my lunch and dinner! Always fresh ingredients and healthy choices. Staff are awesome as well!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZD3H_ySYeZOWM1FdG-otpB2wcFAhVw1i0zMnw&fid=0x0:0xcc7439254cced8f8"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"Yan Fu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKjpzEV2pQK9T4E8izU8ablCcMfInJ-zrXBff6dJyVAtIgxA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I’m a frequent customer, the food was good, but avoid the new guy with curly hair. He only gave half scoop of protein and like 5 slices of cucumber. I had to ask for more cucumbers but did not ask for the appropriate amount of protein. It was an unpleasant experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipML9MksrNPrLy6RDU46ODBDjU6qGiCCV6PA9Ms6&fid=0x0:0xcc7439254cced8f8"],"When":"2024-4-3"},{"Name":"Y. Cherski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-7SLlKKRW0Rqcp9wRXFlvt6gbh0rtI7PMIroLgxETtGiPwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"In general, the whole chain of Steve's Poke Bars delivers constantly. But I like this location in particular as we would stop by after walking around SFU and Burnaby Mountain for a meal that completes a delightful experience.
The staff is very friendly, and the ingredients are fresh. I like spicy protein in my poke bowl, and they offer the best variety of spicy seafood. Plus, remember to collect points. The rewards are pretty decent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5ovTXnOc4bfI_wsFi0lA_PqwEv3PU_oayuTi2&fid=0x0:0xcc7439254cced8f8"],"When":"2022-8-24"},{"Name":"Carlton Miller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUz7rsq65UPaHLhau4wRQ7dSdupyDj3gHJpVhXKqr0lpKENVRn_pQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Your $11 Poke Bowl deal (with a drink) is fantastic! No need to go anywhere else now as I typically (I think like most people) visit the food joint with the best deal…telling everyone about this deal.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nhat Ha Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLPshDbdlSMtwA5gtbJwTnuzJ5UY9NjaUIpuk-hgZ0ykBxBWP8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best places to have Poke bowl in Burnaby!

This spot, despite being small, is very nice and clean. Decors are very modern and cute.

The service was amazing! The server happily greeted us when we entered the place. We had never had Poke bowls before, so the server let us try the different seasoned sashimi in various bowls. He also friendly advised us which one he personally liked. That was very considerate of him!

The poke bowls were insanely yummy! We didn’t know what to order so we asked the server to add in almost all no-extra-charge ingredients available. Amazingly, they all tasted good both as an individual and as a whole! I’d recommend adding their special sauce to make it even tastier!

Overal, 5 stars ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ and.... Will go back for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvJwEM8O7Nhf2O24buPUeCU0t8DkJsyxp8oNxr&fid=0x0:0xcc7439254cced8f8"],"When":"2018-6-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Harrison Ens","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXy6nnUCtAVE291ykxHAR5AkhEKCNqUnONOVioWeL9fWaUVxpaY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Incredibly tasty Poké with hard working staff. Steve's Traditional Mega Bowl with all vegetables & Meat choices was spicy with a wonderful fresh flavour. The employee making my lunch legitimately seemed to care about making a high quality meal & knowing how my day was unfolding. This is among my top 5 eating out experiences in my life. If you want to try Poké in Vancouver, this is the place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-CoM-v1RXlOs6AQHdRF2jk4u0_QKXobvR5QTP&fid=0x0:0x646abe3de26bc2e0"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"C L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFSCt_t74XiqlEdz6jDYOHmtwc4pgb3Fve6nsF3wEBwwz9hl0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I should have posted a review of Steve’s Poké Bar long ago because it IS my go-to for poké in the city.   When you go to a place often, you may take it for granted but good service and good value should be given its due recognition.  The bowls are always fresh, the portion sizes are good and the establishment is generous with their selection of toppings.  I recently tried their Hawaiian chili and fruit tea – both proved delicious! At the beginning of 2024, the franchise announced they were even lowering their prices, recognizing the hardships of 2023. No other chain has done that!  This makes Steve’s Poké one of the most customer-forward businesses around. They consistently deliver healthy, high quality food at a great value.  Why choose any other poke?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNerJors7lHcBb76mMk5UchC_iM2rgvfelAykiv&fid=0x0:0x646abe3de26bc2e0"],"When":"2024-4-29"},{"Name":"Elizah Lopez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrfvmgnv0Rp4iOOoX8nevI-BiWym4chql7RkHMipbx-LH5R0GC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Went today 9/15 @ 12:35, and was disappointed with the service. I’ve been going to the SFU location since 2016, first time at lougheed mall location. Brought my 64 year old dad to try for the first time and the workers were very impatient with him as he did not know what to get and he is hard of hearing. I tried helping him but he still needs some time to think as stated earlier he has never been here or any poke place before. I understand, you need a fast turnover from customer to customer in a place but the customer service was not up to par as i’m used to. Maybe cause he thought we were taking to long when he cashed us out he didn’t ask for my rewards and rolled his eyes when we asked for drinks. Food was delicious as always, and he does want to try again which was an upside!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2S4WPwdMHGyAPoGddU8NXVvhzGe8SL9Vy0mr-&fid=0x0:0x646abe3de26bc2e0"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Thomas Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL5a08XY-tls-gdkDTaISPskwnWr57PwTh5OqPw5wLttgZi2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service was amazing! Very attentive and helpful.

Food was great. Tasted fresh despite it being late in the day. When asked for water, they give big cups which is always appreciated 👏

For mall food, this is actually pretty solid.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gloria Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9bUyZ_X-iZqIai7FFl78hFe17cquJpbn6EURp7_hM8NLbOwTM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My fave place to fix a fish craving! The fish is always fresh and the staff are always lovely. Simon helped me out with my order and his recommendations were fantastic. The atmosphere at lougheed is always chill and clean. I can’t say enough good things about this location!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Queen's Academy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIItPFKEYi4mhAXrRAS6cnsvA9-qyIHcODrhh84gORhEMsLLg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super yummy tofu and avocado bowl! I didn’t know what toppings or sauces to get and the staff were really friendly and helpful making my bowl for me. Very satisfied.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"TOM CHEN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJeXf6bC83WhD1xgoO-wRE8hsdbI2ZUAy64Z2THqSrMve8l2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I hope the management gets to see this review

The service was awful as there was no order and yet after checking in my order , they needed 10 mins and then after coming back 10 mins later , the guy and girl on site only to start my order upon my return to wait with them

Good luck to the location as it was much better experience with Brentwood and metro location","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jessy J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLHNRFw0Z_JgaU0TxGr1Pv5X-w9V6JzR0bnCuTDlGr_7pfsbx_k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Quite a bit of choices of toppings and extras than your regular poke bowl. Instead of charging by weight they barge by scoops.

Fantastic friendly customer service and recommendations.

Sashimi is fresh and tastes is great! I recommend trying place out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmqvyxDWXG2cVAhpHhn28BUO___ltoIWrTGT2B&fid=0x0:0x646abe3de26bc2e0"],"When":"2019-7-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Cindy Lo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2x3WTsaq24Va-C0OXivTxrAK9IBM0CBE-EtTx2p0pPPdLzcxqkw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came for a company Christmas party so I'm not sure if my photos reflect the regular menu! The service was really friendly that day. The food was tasty, especially the pasta with meatballs. The portions were generous which seems hard to find nowadays in Vancouver.

The only critique, which I hope will be constructive to the restaurant was that we felt that the eggplant dish was really dry. The flavour wasn't really there and we wish it wasn't deep fried.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOx_LJpGQTNvQWaUmMAYqzFJ3VczOdvv4Ukzguf&fid=0x0:0x46c0becf5ac9de86"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Seung Yeon Su","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJzrASWUcuyFGZMiCdBin4VkOmqQu4XZARpZzxdSgeTI3RaxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had such a good experience dinning in at this restaurant tonight. Our couple and my sister sat in a patio (we requested), as it got chilly out they have checked on us and put heat outside which was very nice. Service was excellent and I loved their new vibes. I recently moved to the neighborhood and definitely will be going back. Pizza was delicious! They also had lunch specials (server let us know for our future visit) and happy hours! So happy to find good place to eat and drink. Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0wh3HHo4NjC_MnzbfM9H0HAdBaqIsbmZSxNbv&fid=0x0:0x46c0becf5ac9de86"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"AIZY A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW63HuUeCCv9sgK_rgm18cZfVwLP0r1WfmUCdIu1jqRWz_XpAFKzg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a wonderful dining experience. The manager and staff were very friendly and welcoming. The patio was beautifully decorated with lights.

We started with appetizers, followed by the main course. The thin crust pizza was delicious, with melted asiago cheese and they have a big serving of pasta. I was unable to finish my meal, so I took the leftovers home. Everything we ordered was delicious. Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNiDkcMzXczwXwSrgPIay6ZaYkSJ65huXhdfl8b&fid=0x0:0x46c0becf5ac9de86"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Munro Stuff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj0Wcuk6ox5dfAeJ4fAaMbhX_F-nzzt3p5oc_f0hBd0NpbGSM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great lunch service and decor. Tried out their Pizza Wednesdays (all pizzas $16). The Hawaiian had a nice touch of roasted pineapple and Prosciutto pizza had lots of meat and the cheese was interesting, but both were good not great overall. Odd that the prosciutto pizza arrived barely warm, but I think that's because one cheese and the meat are added post-oven (though I haven't run into the same issue elsewhere). Disappointed to find they serve beer only by the bottle - hope they'll consider adding some taps.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMO2J542B8aTzkSjZLt1mrl2otNQjIfiHSkReOt&fid=0x0:0x46c0becf5ac9de86"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Dr. Vaibhav Goswami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDCjYxWOWEBOVFBvh7bFf3bN2DhbTcDjUx4KxNhnVhANt8qIlYlQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The “Vatavaran” of the place is amazing. 😂

I recently had the Chicken Milanese here, and it was fantastic. The chicken was crispy on the outside and tender inside, with a perfect balance of seasoning. The arugula salad added a nice freshness, and the subtle lemon gave it a bright touch.

The portion was generous, and the service was friendly.

Highly recommend it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1zWB-r6fUlmQlpJ9SbaebvOFevvBfqmpI5jz9&fid=0x0:0x46c0becf5ac9de86"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Alym Amlani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGCS7cfdRd9yppSIvIAypDkWBSXz0qghmJF3r1Qs4AKnQ6BCK-zQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The ambiance and service was fantastic! The desserts were delicious too.. The calamari was somewhat greasy and I didn’t really like the mushroom bruschetta. Our pastas were all came out mostly cold, and the sauces felt too heavy. There was also too much truffle in the spaghetti so it was overpowering. They made every effort to make the meal right though - this may have just been an off night for the kitchen because we’ve previously had great food here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMD9J9MOmgov3BnVcyQgDEgX0-xy2uWl-ZxAiJP&fid=0x0:0x46c0becf5ac9de86"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Ron Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4C9fuu3Pgu102q3bAxHKivkiOQqwqKjJditkVdy4zIZ628gCE7g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had an amazing experience here yesterday, our server was excellent and everyone we interacted with was so friendly and helpful.

The portion size looks small but it was surprisingly filling, and everything tasted so fresh and flavorful.

They are also very accommodating to kids, my 5 year old had a cheese pizza and he loved it.

We will definitely be back to try the other pasta offerings.

Thanks","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9kaFd7uaFHAlFP9xHNM45S5kdfHc_JsqfMtkP&fid=0x0:0x46c0becf5ac9de86"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Lexie Han","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJDsrbuKoYunWV354DiFuTySiA7FreLEqghDu_B5Y3zTCoXZA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Look at this pizza. I had a very disappointing experience at this restaurant. The pizza I ordered was completely burnt on the back—how am I supposed to eat that? It ruined the entire meal. The quality and care put into making the pizza were clearly lacking. Do they even know how to make pizza properly? I won’t be coming back. What made me angry and prompted me to leave this review is that when my friends and I told the staff that the bottom of the pizza we ordered was completely burnt, they took the remaining slices and remade a new one for us. It was better than before, and we each ate one slice, leaving three slices to take away. However, when I got home and opened the box, I found that the three slices inside looked exactly like those in the picture. They were probably the ones we had asked to be replaced earlier, not freshly made. This is just beyond frustrating","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5y181Xrv2UaTGxONwOfbumhehSAGmwTz1JkSI&fid=0x0:0x46c0becf5ac9de86"],"When":"2024-12-4"}]

title: Tenen Restaurant
address: 7569 Royal Oak Ave c, Burnaby, BC V5J 4J8
descriptions: Eastern European specialties are presented in a cozy antiques-filled room with a back patio.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"CJK S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ-X5MWI6fVajRpWeDcvYRrOl37FpawXBm_Tl_Q2kW3dPbsXg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"There were able to accommodate for our large group. It is our first time that we tried Serbian food. We found this restaurant on google and wanted to give it a try because some of the reviewers posted that they have a buffet. But they didn't have a buffet and the server said "we never had a buffet" which seems strange because posts had pictures of the menu and the buffet prices as well.
Anyways, the food was delicious! The bread that comes in the appetizer is really good. Kind of expensive but we think it was worth it so ordered that bread again. It's similar to cheese bread in a Brazilian steakhouse.
Pros: It is Serbian food, try it if you haven't already. It is good food.
Cons: There were some people sitting by the entrance and SMOKING constantly! Not sure if they are the owners or the customers. Their cigarette smell mixed up with our food with the restaurant leaving its door open during operation hours.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2neW7uCWU42OYuKjqhj7mxW3L1-dlwgq2OuOc&fid=0x0:0xedcc70a03178194e"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"David Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVh_aejPYzpDBC7HZu1cSAlXkT4P09eZiSic9sGGKE-TxCckyM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pleasantly surprised on the quality of the food and the portions. Great value and delicious. The host/owner was very friendly and informative would definitely go back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXYS5SOqF7b-jaimPxLnQy7pjphdw1xSgZCU_Q&fid=0x0:0xedcc70a03178194e"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Callum Alexander","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHgbVIIxcaNrYbr8haDHppS8BicmyIh3BmreZaNc5Uw8poE1HBeA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this restaurant. I started going here not too long ago as my teacher had recommended it as one of his favorite spots for food from Serbia. I remember the first meal I had being the steak dish they serve and finishing the whole meal without stopping. I finished that dinner with a smile on my face and a sense of bliss knowing I couldn't think of a single thing to improve with the dinner.

Long answer short I recommend this restaurant wholeheartedly and I believe all should come and try their delicious dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsOpRrUDnjJMsgSF5TJVYI_Xw1aCJn-qZx4bQi&fid=0x0:0xedcc70a03178194e"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Ayush Arora","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVUYS4OhWeuWBOyzhyW3HXt1a0VW2VK9Tndr0s0IQ8Tkp3zlLEv=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently dined at a Tenen European restaurant for the first time, and it was a fantastic experience. I ordered the chicken shish kebab, which was delicious, and the mashed potatoes were amazing—creamy and flavorful. I especially enjoyed the dip. The service was exceptional; our server was very friendly and even gave me extra dip on the house when I was packing up my leftovers. I don’t usually write reviews, but this experience was too good not to share. I’ll definitely be coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHAFHlvmXFVx9s2bA6APZTKZ-3_wNyk_kKRdwU&fid=0x0:0xedcc70a03178194e"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Marcela Quijano","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMHLTrKU2tFnf6nMs6ili5K4-EVGvkRGCEogjRe09J7FYnEVk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s a little hole in the wall and a well kept secret in Burnaby! The resto is nestled in a little plaza but once you enter you feel very comfortable. Our server was so nice and welcoming and let us take our time browsing the menu. I went with two friends and we had quite the feast!!! We had the Ushtipci, which are buttermilk fritters, accompanied by salted butter and a red pepper spread. Delicious when butter and dip are mixed! We had the Njegushki steak(pork tenderloin wrapped in prosciutto and stuffed with smoked Gouda); the Karadordjeva Schnitzel (pork tenderloin with kaymak cheese),  and the meat platter for 1( which fed three ppl!). Everything tasted fresh and delicious. The portions were very generous, so we were able to take leftovers. Highly recommend not eating beforehand! You’ll be fed very well here! The Slavic beer tasted really good  too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKMwy-ycUvrYDbPC2H4hljbseqRt9M1JR1akEf&fid=0x0:0xedcc70a03178194e"],"When":"2024-6-13"},{"Name":"Rita Alvarez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ9wGl00ilyZpR0nCBSEFeM3ArscX-h9GhFzOCJrc53YiImLw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been here twice. The warm and friendly service and high quality food are consistently good. Ambience is cultural, lovely and cozy. Some of the ingredients on the menu are even house-made, e.g., one type of cheese in the schnitzel. We ordered a bacon wrapped pork 'steak' which came with potatoes and was rather filling so my mother and I shared it. We added a salad with feta on the side. It was yummy and fresh but a bit pricey considering the portion size. Krempita was a marvellous dessert.  I also recommend the schnitzel that I ordered last time which was also quite satiating and featured an oozing cheese filling. I'll definitely return to try their top selling sandwich.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMT3LN-AyBO1kA4u6tIwfKOjJbnXKEYpwTTqGwh&fid=0x0:0xedcc70a03178194e"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"Mark Bullock","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXurhNUyvU-UwJu3PIhpIoO401kmvr3NAof13pUMcZTWY-2ZCva=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What an introduction to Serbian cuisine. The veal soup to start was fresh and genuinely flavourful broth with bits of meat and veg. The Lamb cooked in cream sauce was an absolute hit. The creamy garlic sauce was only bettered by the fall apart large quantities of lamb. I usually don’t share food but the main was going to be a significant take home amount if my friend didn’t help. I am favouriting this place for another return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlXWf0kbishHv4_hU6WaB4okMen5o4DOX5bkQW&fid=0x0:0xedcc70a03178194e"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Joanne Shih","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXximxdR2J0MX38SMpQXvX83o69PGyHXNObNbbK0mDK-tz8T9Z6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is a unique Eastern European diner! The restaurant is decorated with a collection of European antiques which give it a unique yet cozy vibe. Food and service were superb👍🏻 definitely recommend and will sure revisit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOE6dkdO4rUADuLYWCfNAThe_Q24S5btef0uuad&fid=0x0:0xedcc70a03178194e"],"When":"2024-8-11"}]

title: OO LA LA

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Evan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocItqym_b8p4Y-FW9783yYhbbkXgbWq5yo1i3Fyi_bB9_Q1tlIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This place is pretty good , I'm giving it a 4.5 /5. It's much better than the BBQ chickens and nadri chicken nearby , so come here instead of going there.
-the secret sauce fries chciken was pretty good , insides were juicy and tender , there was enough sauce but the flavor was a little off for me
- the prinkle chicken was juicy, but it felt a bit dry and there was not enough powder on it , I legit was dipping it into the other sauces so it could have more flavor
-the soy charcoal bqq chciken was sooo tender and juicy, and it had enough flavoring and everything, it kinda was just teriyaki chciken
-the price is really good , for 15 dollars pp we could not finish all the food
-service was so amazing , staff came by so often to swap water and ask if everything was okay ,probably the best service you can get at Lougheed. Though music was a little loud you really gotta shout a bit to talk in there.
All in all, I would come again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMixCHQlhmA8U66FU28DmpKrHYCi3OuBYcOBrzX&fid=0x0:0xeba1123abbc3dafe"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Ar K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIxMWKnachhRRgkf3B7b5u7jHz-BoEI9ra0yDLCwE4tBo-mLef=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came here late night as we were visiting from out of town and we were craving some soul food. This place was open and had some good reviews so we thought we should try it out as it was a random find. We definitely were amazed at the quality of food and service we received here. It was super delicious and hands down some of the best charcoal bbq chicken. They had an option to add toppings as well to customize the charcoal bbq as well. Each table has an ipad where you order from and honestly I have no idea how they brought out our food so fresh and hot so quick. One of the fastest services I have received at an asian restaurant. The portions were pretty good sized. The servers were very friendly and extremely efficient at their job. They definitely know how to treat their customers 10/10 would highly recommend and would love to visit here again next time we come down to visit from Alberta.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqt6wGh9u-dkQdM9oYUBQ6Z-SJRObMFM-4Pm7a&fid=0x0:0xeba1123abbc3dafe"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"Sandy Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJWFvGDL4OpMJfsmo2W6SZGNnEyPVBpmLQRbR-gF4KEQU7Jcw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Second visit during my trip to Vancouver.  Came back one more time before going home.  Delicious chicken, love the rice ball - must try!  Friendly staffs and warm environment!  Will miss this place !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLRRM395HgRSeNomKopWcMui3up-D6OUSWi715&fid=0x0:0xeba1123abbc3dafe"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"Sky Jang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsnlFBmRy7tyi6QC1WQMYS-_XgUyK7bm7m7BJrwzV_4Y89SkWE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place has variety options for Korean style chicken; mainly grilled & sauteed. We had yangnyeom flavor and the spiciness was just right and the portion was very generous. Good vibe and friendly staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPq0-2FWYhStdJcwW_BBnAnhM8c-36H5_Kkqzw_&fid=0x0:0xeba1123abbc3dafe"],"When":"2024-6-28"},{"Name":"Hussieni Azad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzjgt1zaSQzmfvBGRZGGjGHndXiNru8R0g1Jv0Lw6z4r01-0_a=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You order on a tablet at the table. Smaller place 30 people.  Lighting could be warmer. This is for lovers of Chicken only! (KFC or BBQ chicken limited menu) But I really am enjoying it.  The menu on the tablet offer great descriptions and customization to suite your pallet. Quick service from order to delivery.  Well my highlight was the DIY rice balls.  What a fun interactive way of experiencing food (glove included)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxnTlBRvAjZkzZAOlNJUCpkRedkRFWa7wThzVs&fid=0x0:0xeba1123abbc3dafe"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"erin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4lLIb_OHkNkrFm85O8UMvOQGJLIKTV4UBEDWzY27w-ufF-u6r=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"my boyfriend and I just had best experience here, first time trying korean style grilled chicken  and it was insanely good! also the male server’s service was so amazing! he was so attentive and kind and so was the other girl who was working. would definitely reccomend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRNm2REnXu1HkDK9M4RML8EaW6vygTpIGdG3Zh&fid=0x0:0xeba1123abbc3dafe"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"Halyna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxYgqTnRryTH-dgMIEDnX4FbEdny3RSoIEXPiWO7eVX8gC5nQQrg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came there with my friend after work around 11:30pm. It was nice and quiet there. Great place for a late dinner!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTnCGvhcv2ccXFYZNDVM0hnOd1zFnNfVfRGLL8&fid=0x0:0xeba1123abbc3dafe"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Joy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWanwJPml7ZACgKagFibFRRatokEwVPGOp8YdVOEKGXuPN1wvI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friends and I visit this place at least once a month! The chicken is very tender, especially their signature charcoal chicken menus, which are excellent. Other items such as their ddeokbokki, fried chicken, and sides are also superb, so please come and enjoy yourselves! Additionally, all the staff are very friendly and kind, and the atmosphere is very welcoming!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBo7Np6UkU3hEhM6F8RUhSjgmxTNyH9dyjdRG5&fid=0x0:0xeba1123abbc3dafe"],"When":"2024-4-30"}]

title: Nadri - Korean Cuisine & Fried Chicken (나드리)
address: 4501 North Rd Unit 111F, Burnaby, BC V3N 4R7
descriptions: Unpretentious eatery doling out Korean fried chicken, noodles, handmade dumplings & hot pot.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Small plates","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true},{"name":"Catering","enabled":true},{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true},{"name":"Seating","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true},{"name":"Wi-Fi","enabled":true},{"name":"Wi-Fi","enabled":false}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"Family-friendly","enabled":true},{"name":"Groups","enabled":true}]},{"id":"planning","name":"Planning","options":[{"name":"Accepts reservations","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true}]},{"id":"children","name":"Children","options":[{"name":"Good for kids","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"DJ Shin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJyUNzsYbUZB5eSN8OpaRi2UHPt3aCgRPxWsIBv1mPF5uURUw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband really likes the original fried chicken at this restaurant. The texture is so crispy, like a snack, and the seasoning is perfectly balanced. Whenever we go to Coquitlam, we always stop by this restaurant to buy the original chicken! Luckily, today is Thursday so we got it a bit cheaper than the regular price. I wish they had a chain restaurant somewhere near my place."","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOONPWioBAZm1aeI6teaW6UCvH4LOSZBGPDxgmG&fid=0x0:0x375b8cfe368c5a3b"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Anthony Plaxen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0TosyGAQWTqM_XvTHaXfq2jDGHv6ifKWBgTGcJKYnap3ceipL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great spot to hit up for good Korean eats in the Coquitlam Burnaby area.

Came here for lunch and tried the Clam Kalguskoo and the Nadri Fried Chicken in Sweet and Spicy sauce. Plenty of clams in the Kalguskoo and delicious noodles. The broth was very mild and I liked it. The Korean fried chicken was great. Just enough spicyness and the regular order had a nice portion too. Very crunchy and tender in the middle which I liked and it wasn’t overly spicy at all.

Overall, love this place. Will come back for some delicious eats here. Great spot in Korea town for good noodle soups and Korean fried chicken.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJkk88bm7K1RQ_6emROZl4yyfY_l4Rbhzj4K8w&fid=0x0:0x375b8cfe368c5a3b"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Frank","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV32Dl3aDuecVTKkUVDILvrpBYb8ATjyfxIGWGxKJriKTeCzCiJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"APT APT APT…..sorry their music stuck in my mind.
Oh, this place is great! I love those “short” ribs in the bowl. Price is fair, and food is valuable. I ordered a medium sized original chicken, the portion is enough for 3 people and only cost 17. It even came with 3 cold dishes. Fantastic service, I don’t what else to say about it. It won’t disappoint you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhoQU79_i2g2k35yhmOY_FuP29tnhagTUxCzSH&fid=0x0:0x375b8cfe368c5a3b"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Ching-Kai Chiu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGbYbS0ggvEFgjque4QRFtJ9y5gnvhUtfu0dvMbXF9kgoqrbF1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I ordered a clam soup. It was good and the soup is very tasty with clams. One of the stores nearby is under renovation so  it was noisy when we had lunch there. I remember fried chicken is also good, too. The Korean restaurant usually provides free small dishes, such as kimchi, radishes, and bean sprouts. However, we only had kimchi here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3xgy8UxEbq3O9ulE87UQcOTCkz-Lw6Jxgu_l8&fid=0x0:0x375b8cfe368c5a3b"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Marilyn Mok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUikqrTCDS8NJxP3Hkk4jQDiHEi8RL4gQluQjwU1f2e462S8t3D=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Frankly, I wasn't expecting much when I saw the location. It's inside the little mall behind Hannam. You'll have to walk past Hannam and through the automatic sliding doors. They don't have an actual shop space, the tables are laid out in the open space of the mall and the kitchen is just behind a small counter. We were seated promptly by the only waitress. She was quick and efficient.

We ordered gam jal tang, ginseng chicken soup, tonkatsu pork cutlet and LA galbi ribs. We were all impressed with how the food turned out. Expecting it to be authentic Korean food is a given and it was all cooked to perfection. We had brought take out containers just in case we couldn't finish everything. The portions were a good size but we still finished everything as it was delicious.

This is now a definite to go spot if we're in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0ectrnPctydIdD41Gddl8J2EH4TxudODTtuVF&fid=0x0:0x375b8cfe368c5a3b"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Mandy Sam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfdcmtmnw1QBUKzc568p_XlShrjauBmzaYnb3AklL4JCX7IFSL3g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I arrived on a Saturday morning, roughly 10 to 15 minutes after the establishment opened. The restaurant was quite busy, but we were able to secure two tables that could accommodate eight people.

The portions of food were generous, the prices were reasonable, and the food was delicious. Our group of eight ordered two large katsu plates, cold noodles (both original and spicy), beef kal-guksu and clam kal-guksu, half and half dumplings, and bossam.

I highly recommend their cold noodles. They were incredibly light, refreshing, and flavorful. The broth for both kal-guksus was clean-tasting and sweet. Overall, it was a delightful dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlp9aoqHibVY0jC_UxPIp8EJ43zr-Fow4IoYch&fid=0x0:0x375b8cfe368c5a3b"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"Ada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_tT85lO7aZKFfq17wWpo8ldgI_n0GJFJfBhG1nWiEa2zXCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Wanted some takeout so I tried this place. It is the sole food stall in the mall plaza. 10 tables or so in front of it. Food court style. Ordered mild spicy rice cake and snow chicken. The snow chicken was freshly fried, thin breading so it was crispy even though I took it home 25 mins later to eat. The mild spicy rice cake was a bit on the spicier side for me, but was good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3AibWAzqwrk3cNGC_DkRCc1gDPsVdgI08nAIa&fid=0x0:0x375b8cfe368c5a3b"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"Andy Chiang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6Ytd6jvLjiUIKjc2DLdidLuwgHbgPUD4GPhFuPOLEoqlZ2vbh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This restaurant is inside a busy strip mall “food court” but don’t be fooled by its exterior or lack of a restaurant storefront because it’s a super busy spot. The seats get filled up quickly, they don’t take reservations, and it’s first come first serve.

Their stews are tasty, but not really my style. I know a lot of people enjoy them though. Their fried chicken is super good and well priced versus any other Korean fried chicken out there.

Definitely give this place a shot if you like Korean comfort food. This may become a go to fried chicken take out place for me in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjdujmlSYp0yo-HIzhgWCPG2lVWyiY0pNEUQVJ&fid=0x0:0x375b8cfe368c5a3b"],"When":"2024-2-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Keenan Jacklin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3bN8ugJtHfxZiELcjV4DscEXGjBZL6FHcsSvuaygBlf26CA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pelicana Chicken is hands down my go-to spot for incredible Korean chicken. Tucked away like a hidden gem, it’s one of those hole-in-the-wall places that delivers on every level. The food is consistently amazing, with perfectly crispy and flavorful chicken that keeps me coming back.

What makes Pelicana even better is the atmosphere—it’s the perfect spot for large groups, whether you’re with family or friends. The place has this authentic, homey vibe that makes you feel welcome. The owner was incredibly hospitable; when I went there for my birthday, they surprised us with an entire bottle of soju on the house, which was such a kind gesture. You can tell it’s a family-run business, and you feel that personal touch in every interaction.

Places like Pelicana deserve all the love and support. It’s not just about the food—though the food is outstanding—but also the warmth and genuine care they put into the experience. If you haven’t been, you’re missing out on one of the best Korean chicken spots around!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzvCusE_jWt3Lvyu4QOoX0E7sQplbvzVOBn7HN&fid=0x0:0xb7a5f0c6d4e54eca"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Gina Han","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjTyubIwxlSHH490Hj0RReYMsXuTWVnVvVIAbUOhc08410=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Perfect location for Korean chicken especially for Korean food lover 😆 I missed Korean 치킨 so I ended up vising here all the way from downtown. Exact taste  I looked for 😲 😳 surprised!!!
One of the must visit places in Burnaby, in the whole world","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmiixm42fqGlEJSr9nVuFshCCKE0ATrL0lmZk&fid=0x0:0xb7a5f0c6d4e54eca"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Lucy Lei","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWqMDQPy8Rdj2ck6AFqBEF6oKEHn-aaEjadtV4H6wI1nduavxw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious and crispy fried chicken with unique flavours. I love their sweet onion because they load it with onion and sauce! Plus, their combo prices are amazing!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsGsKkdcvU-Jb502Sd9IDPGJOyPMSPRz6BPw8F&fid=0x0:0xb7a5f0c6d4e54eca"],"When":"2024-11-21"},{"Name":"Abel Beraki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLbIV9xhsWGsFXM73eNPlULpHa-geLNsPVyU_LWSKIhQRDfDJc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A friend introduced me to this Korean restaurant on a Saturday night. The atmosphere was great and the service was 10/10.  I recommend the Soy and Snowing Cheese Chicken paired with a beer. Will definitely be back again soon! Thanks to Andrew for providing a great experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPagFOxXvUUFmgVanz4pkLM_bIuHWNRXa4R8p9b&fid=0x0:0xb7a5f0c6d4e54eca"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Diandra Durando","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVR2pZ5jp37DuAEoqz8JxIwXom5CD-bTIlBWZIS-jLWxdNeeXNy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the food, service and vibe here. The boneless fried chicken soy flavour is delicious! The calamari was so so because I think it doesn’t have much seasoning. But all and all this place is great. I will come back :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtdPQK4HpZYMKYvCjXZb1L_ppHWZqziN8uZeSo&fid=0x0:0xb7a5f0c6d4e54eca"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"TS OS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrxJ8Fjd3bGSI8mWbF186RbFWyg_DW73VTS3OIkFaxPfXFBEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Edit:  I’m upgrading my review to 4 stars as my recent 2 visits have been pretty good.  Portion size has grown bigger from our previous visits as well.  Lots of take out orders.

Epitome of Korean chicken place.  Good old school style Korean chicken, especially their original fried chicken.  Their spicy ones are really good too.  Beer price is decent too so don’t be shy to go to this place for Chi-Mek experience.  However the portion size seems to have become smaller.

Other dishes are also decent but not the largest portion sized.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8Nw8a5IU5WV-dYSVpTBppzaytj18hYERi4mPP&fid=0x0:0xb7a5f0c6d4e54eca"],"When":"2023-4-24"},{"Name":"Robbie Sebullen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcUM4O95WBmruJSzKrZg8KQpAeXedo_arP69mSAw0hJW30XzNG=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve visited this location a few times, and this time I celebrated my birthday with friends and had a wonderful time! The service was exceptional and they were very accommodating in hosting a large group. The food was delicious — the chicken were crispy and served in big portions! The drinks were good as well! Lots of soju options! The owner, Andrew, is so kind and offered our group a welcome drink which everyone enjoyed!

10/10 — highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Choi lox","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsnNMpPHphel8tVvTKVbf_ikck_i6bfW87ie4vwAPofyvxcQ_8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best and fun to go to place  specially with groups that are loud and love to share foods and drinks. Also, met with the owner Andrew, was so cool and very welcoming. Looking forward for more hang out nights in this place. ThE FOOD are amazing!! Atmosphere was fun and feels at home.","Images":null,"When":""}]
