user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Amy Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvtm7hBqZHDYxXgP_oxkelx2FGhwfW-EuwTv9rdyjxo-_-_8Nq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time here and will be coming back again. Great deal for homey Taiwanese food! I got the fried Sweet and Sour Fish and the batter was super light and the fish was tender and moist. The fried tofu side was light with a nice sauce. The Special combo for two is very worth it as it’s a larger portion of meat for just a few dollars more. Good portions. Service is friendly and very Taiwanese. Love it. I NEED to come back for the salt and pepper chicken.

My friend and I shared the Special combo and it came to $46 between us.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMR7VpPglq3ZyjTroxhKTMzbAwu9wPM42_TyQKD&fid=0x0:0x8455285560aa645f"],"When":"2024-6-2"},{"Name":"W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVijg2B2FKhHEO0daffmmkqtpWCzt3aDQdnZOIHflF7afjJd1G7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"9/10: fried cabbage (fresh, crunchy, well seasoned, not overdone, simple but yummy).

8/10: fried chicken (well executed, crispy not oily, tender inside, kept the skin on, dark meat - a bit sweet though, presumably from sweet potato flour dredge).

7/10: Beef satay noodles (not enough satay heat, veg a bit mundane like fast food style).

Service super nice. Restaurant small, feels a bit cramped.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHpu_z14Z-U56vu7cJpCz5b_f9wPxQufxowxVi&fid=0x0:0x8455285560aa645f"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"Jonny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJShSgCHbmme6GLETHZczdb6MWGsJKCwpKUqZlkj3SXYWukfA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Never been to Aroma Eatery before. Small Taiwanese spot outside of Crystal Mall.

- Special combo for two ($39.50) - Taiwanese sausage and sichuan boiled fish. Combo came with fried tofu, seasonal vegetable (garlic yu choy), two bowls of rice and two black teas. Sausage wasn't anything special but liked the sliced pickled garlic. The Sichuan fish was tender but very mild. Vegetables were excellent, tofu lightly deep fried.
- Wonton with spicy sauce ($9.00) - standard.
- Crispy pork noodle soup ($15.75) - pork came separately on the side. Decent.

Debit or cash only. 3.5 stars.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP25ZnByvJO2PiiZlBE_5cVZZx9keDn-DN4-U6f&fid=0x0:0x8455285560aa645f"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"D Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4D0pnJRuugp7xtOoI9Okhc1IdtNuzKocuzhsSBj3gUdos57g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very homey taiwanese food.  Beef noodle was great. We went on a day that wasn’t very warm so i don’t know if they have air conditioning on a hot day. Otherwise the food definitely met expectations.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOO7euZi1J7sizu1wP-QjPNnIkTbF-n7DOZLAqN&fid=0x0:0x8455285560aa645f"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Ellie K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI1Bvfhw59U6hW1Dmjhl5XuenKr5q-LKNQDB91SK_lnnqhqiA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time here! Really Taiwanese style! The price is reasonable and staff are really nice. Just a bit salty and deep fried technique can be better, other than that is good!! Will come back again and will recommend it to my friends!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPP4JBC9D7rjaSjPvflsE16ZUFwt3MyJzH0WuW3&fid=0x0:0x8455285560aa645f"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Vancouver Foodie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8w6jkWQhHhs1Z246avVvoKQqrR4N6KZDvvFaklq629YACSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very authentic Taiwanese food at the outskirt of Crystal Mall.
Roughly $17-19 per combo.
Combo includes a drink and two sides.
Big portion meal.
It's a small shop but people have a quick turnaround.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnnQclvY4jza-0v_7erB3CDSMoAz6q5Cy5-tjI&fid=0x0:0x8455285560aa645f"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"J. T.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_sa5RAC1-7vSaf7XilM5IG_MJjFsqYnws9ROJ1rmG68gmT1Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My co-worker took me here for lunch yesterday. The service was great. Food was fantastic. As for the value of the food, you are getting the most bang for your buck here during this financial tough time when everyone is struggling to put food on the table. Unbeatable price for their combo meal. Many thumbs up and I highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPpPiGe1weebNI81yRt14tnjx9V6ffYmrnjmFRg&fid=0x0:0x8455285560aa645f"],"When":"2024-4-26"},{"Name":"Eva Tong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbdn1JwTeGwTMz4zaH_aM0s2MjqUg4f-ith9g4COdwAGXFieA4Ow=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My hubby and I ordered lunch special for two people. The food was delicious and flavourful. Love the salt and pepper chicken, the Kung-Pao beef is spicy, my husband likes to eat. They also provide two additional side dishes, veggie and fried tofu (nicely done, crisp and crusty outside, soft inside). They have either tea or soup to choose for drinks. The overall is great, but the store is small with it takes long time to wait for seats. Recommend to go early for lunch instead of 1pm that needed to wait 3-5 parties ahead.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNh2BL2-INHXLBD7ilVSLe5DRndySwIsmPKXog6&fid=0x0:0x8455285560aa645f"],"When":"2024-2-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Linh Tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbP3plInkqXVOA2XJc8czoQ80aWBGnT8WS-yMiUPgvNShtt-y90A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It has a fun old vibe like dimsum restaurants in Chinatown in Asia back in 1990s, where staff push dim sum carts around and you can pick any plate you want. Their deep fried taro cakes were beautiful and yummy. We enjoyed the Chinese donut and Chinese donut rice rolls. Congee, tofu pudding, shrimp tempura are okayish, not too bad but not good either. While the BBQ pork rice roll was a bit disappointing compared to other rice rolls I've had in Richmond and East Vancouver. I like the staff. Will be back to try dinner, the menu looks attractive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_8QBkJhVKDM1z199f0pV4WGiM9rArEV-vQ4wh&fid=0x0:0xfd47f510a0877b4b"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"Joshua (ThickBurger_Bites)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbIhhMlbxk7OIMpcaP-aSx2m75kt8-mqmXoXAJQ5K99gnxiff1zg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We had lunch as a group of 12 and ordered the 6 dish special.

Dishes came out fast and the taste was good, not the greatest, but still delicious and filling.

Price was also reasonable at about CAD 20 per person.

The Peking Duck was delicious, but the wraps were slightly sticky and tended to tear when separated. The other dishes were pretty similar in taste despite having different ingredients.

I’d highly recommend the claypot tofu dishes as those had a lot of flavour.

Overall, I’d recommend this place as the flavour of the food has been consistent and the prices are still reasonable in 2024. It’s better to call in to make a reservation as the restaurant does get extremely busy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO38SVEGyM2P-ipx3qnGDsbzez81VnSiMIwozpu&fid=0x0:0xfd47f510a0877b4b"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"Gordon Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYpk0cIhtHUvM7XXheJSxz2s3kSGL8HqlDSxLxb-fzNnM7pgBx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food portion is standard and quality is not as good. Service is alright. They also have push carts for food. One thing I didn’t like was that they were trying to “bribe” us for 5 stars reviews with desserts. Understandable but it destroys the purpose of a review system.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmUB1TrQeR7Cof8TZOv-fxGL_69h3MXqKV8mw1&fid=0x0:0xfd47f510a0877b4b"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Y Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSr-20RIoMlwxA6rcIsK3I32iR8W04F2FutgbBfbgy3RRp2cZQ9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good selection of dimsum items. I came alone for a quick lunch in between meetings on a workday. No lines, plenty of parking spots in the plaza parking lot. Service was prompt and efficient.

I ordered the shrimp dumplings which were great. I also had the chasiu pastry. These were absolutely delicious.

However I made the mistake of ordering clay pot rice. It’s not so good. I couldn’t finish it. So be aware if you want to try this. The toppings aren’t tasty, the rice under cooked!

Oh, the Jasmin tea was good.

I’ll come back when I’m in the area still. But I’ll stick to dim sums. :D","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNM8A1wK8Iw28zvT2Pwp7zEtl_n_OqvoVEALFPM&fid=0x0:0xfd47f510a0877b4b"],"When":"2024-6-8"},{"Name":"Stephanie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBV5KRG75WlxmWo1wuDhWSQhlZCOao4V2_9kFkOn0OqRNe45TP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We came at 10am on a Saturday and the restaurant was empty when we got there. When we left at 11:30 the whole restaurant was basically full. They serve everything in the carts. There's some things that they won't have in the carts which then they will tell you to tick off on the paper to order it.

We ordered steamed beef trip in special sauce ($9.28), steamed rice flour roll with scallops and seaweed ($9.88), deep fried sesame balls ($8.58), deep fried milk custard ($8.58), pork and shrimp dumpling shao mai ($8.38), har gao ($8.38), deep fried taro ($8.38), steamed pork ribs ($7.88). Tea is $1.50 each person

The steamed beef tripe in special sauce had a strong tripe flavour in a good way. You could taste the innards flavour. Some restaurants bleach it and clean it really well so that you can taste it but this place has cleaned it just enough. Flavour was good and I would order this again

Rice roll with seaweed and scallops. There were slices of scallops throughout the rice roll. This rice roll is different from the rice rolls you usually have at dimsum. It's not chewy like the ones you find at other restaurants. Instead it's really smooth and has a slight rice flavour. According to my grandma, this is the way it's meant to be. The ones that are chewy and bouncy is the new way of doing it now. This one is based on personal preference. If you like traditional style, this is the way to go.

Deep fried sesame balls were not too sweet on the inside but the outside was too thick (also not chewy enough) and it wasn't crispy enough outside. We found out later that they have a different kind that's the thinner one. This one is pushed out on carts and not on the sheet so be warned if you are looking for the thin skin one.

The shrimp dumplings or har gao were okay. Lots of shrimp inside and very bouncy but the outside skin was a tad too thick

The taro fried dumpling was not crispy and flaky enough for me. The inside filling was pretty decent

The pork shrimp shao mai dumpling was pretty good. Lots of pork little shrimp which is how it should be. It had a good bite too it and was well flavored

The pork ribs were not bad. Meat was soft and portion was big.

The fried milk dessert was interesting and definitely not what we were expecting. You drink the milk custard that's inside. Outside is crispy but also not hot. Inside was cold as well. Interesting but would only order it once.

Overall dimsum was not bad. They have dishes here you might not find elsewhere. No major faults. Some of the servers pushing the carts can be a bit pushy. They try to sell you the dishes that have been sitting their the longest. Other than that the other servers are really nice and fast. They have servers specifically just to pour tea and get the bill. Would I recommend it? Probably not as none of the dishes stand out. But if you are looking for some solid run of the mill dimsum. Then this place is actually not bad","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1tvlOPgZI5PxQuBlntgi8oH6pyxBURp5_JQhA&fid=0x0:0xfd47f510a0877b4b"],"When":"2024-5-2"},{"Name":"Anjstacansi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxfxd7NedIKrSKbEThR9bCPUg8DXPAGue7SfEQVr5kqeRxyA8a=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Me and my family loved it. Just the downside is the shrimp, they dont remove the black thing inside","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZ6QoLLHN_k82h_1pHpcYdjY9Av62PKT0MlGxZ&fid=0x0:0xfd47f510a0877b4b"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"The JOKER","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQuiHl5446ZqSIBmhoQY8q4NuTHDo0F4Qr2KVa1APrDHGiVv22=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Meal was excellent.  Had one of the 6 food course meals between 5 people for about $180 tip included. Very flavourful dishes and service is very good.
Will return for more
Had combo dinner of 4.
Food came quickly and was very tasty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzY8qYDsm-fMDNyp5SGmG_2m2L2ad90EPMtjF4&fid=0x0:0xfd47f510a0877b4b"],"When":"2024-5-20"},{"Name":"Robin Leung (Eatwithrobin)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVCnn7xsj7nvsW8Nu6zZST8TAOWlBPr0xbPsRqg6sg5SSAyAHvzw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The only all day dim sum in the area! Decent portions.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkAW2sPpCMaYliMVhjjavft--DwMGzkc3AjhVc&fid=0x0:0xfd47f510a0877b4b"],"When":"2024-10-5"}]

title: (Burnaby) MYST Asian Fusion
descriptions: Spacious, contemporary venue offering a wide range of traditional Taiwanese dishes & bubble tea.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Thomas Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUITuDRjw9J9Us45xAUXKSfp8lG2sJ2s04TW_lNAi_G6a5d62ur=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came to MYST with the intent of comparing the food to another Taiwanese restaurant that serves similar dishes called “The One”. Talking about MYST specifically I really liked that they had large screens so that you can watch sports games. Service was quick and attentive, and the overall vibe of the restaurant was pretty good in terms of the food. I had the deep fried squid which was quite flavourful and the deep fried chicken nuggets, which was also coated in a similar seasoning. I was mostly interested in the beef noodle soup as that is what I was comparing to the one. To be completely honest, they’re both good in their own ways however the soup broth at MYST felt a little more bland. Still flavourful and tasty however, just not as much flavour as the broth from the one I was also not asked if I wanted my soup to be spicy or not. I’m not sure if this means that they don’t offer spicy broth or if you just have to ask for it. I also had a bubble tea, which was tasty although very sweet overall I enjoyed my visit at MYST.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPa-HrkvgrcekV6JRSnMjyDCZ72nerodqyOQ2wm&fid=0x0:0x7f74631ddc94861a"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Suina Tachibana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTPrVqFhXEOaoro_YekrFMLthhW9v59uu_aZukNc2gobun-w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It is our first time eating in Myst. But the food never disappointed us. The food was so delicious. I feel like I am in Taiwan. Highly recommend the stinky tofu. The mango shaved ice is so good. The beef noodle soup is delicious with the beef so tender.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOQ4SQZchlptF5kP0ARyGAv9D89V0t7Om17C0X&fid=0x0:0x7f74631ddc94861a"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"James Shu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ-X1zh_92u1cTBADC3dN2MfeBqYQzw8dQmS7J28C0kZ28jdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent food and service. The popcorn chicken was cooked almost perfectly, with the right amount of spice and taste. We also ordered the shredded chicken with rice and the laksa with egg noodle. Both were absolutely delicious and amazing.

The service was great, seated quickly and food came really quick. Waitress was also very nice to us.

Atmosphere was great. Although it can get a bit loud, it was nicely decorated.

Overall would definitely recommend and would come back again to try new dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4kj0_2RQWiM60jE-qTyM_jo4M0C-YY_V9guSj&fid=0x0:0x7f74631ddc94861a"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"Melinda W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqFa91nGQX9-WVxFZ-rAUul10GF70bhWZFQZe97ymoPVUZrvFxnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It's not my first visit to Myst. Unlike other times, I came with my husband for dinner this time.

We are well aware that their portion is quite big, so we agreed to order some food to share. Taiwanese style pork knuckle, fried rice noodles with veggie and shredded pork and a soup with meat balls.

The pork knuckle is so so. It's quite tender but the flavor is rather mild. Perhaps that's the whole point of having a sauce with it. The sauce did enhance the flavor and made the pork knuckles more enticing. Among the food we ordered, my favorite is the fried rice noodle. It might look very plain and not that appealing in photo, but its very aromatic and flavorful. The magic came from the dried shrimps. They totally took the dish to a different level. The soup tasted like what it supposed to be. No surprise, bad or good.

Myst is one of the restaurants that you can go for a late night meal coz it closes around midnight from Sunday to Thursday. On Friday and Saturday, it extends the hours to about 12:30am. Its menu offers you a great variety of food, bubble tea and desserts.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMEjffx0dlwxKroTIGzhqvMaXPQyqWa4yBOgYW6&fid=0x0:0x7f74631ddc94861a"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Daniel Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLZmzi6Y2HQRLE6lVrbGVTLpfTAci5UebN5CTmHwCUE9BhHeQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I tried Myst for the first time when we got catering for a sports event a couple months back and enjoyed it so much we decided to come and try the food at the restaurant. I am happy to say it was expectedly much better at the restaurant. I came with a group of friends and shared a couple dishes. The portion sizes of all the dishes were quite large and we had leftovers to take home. My favourite dish was the chicken red curry. With the fried chicken and creamy curry, I thought it would be too heavy, but i found that the red and green bell peppers added a hint of freshness that helped with the heaviness of the dish. Overall a fantastic experience and will be back for seconds!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOes3XBHRzuRjRo4KgrtM7GUr4o2xVzE8A83ych&fid=0x0:0x7f74631ddc94861a"],"When":"2024-6-21"},{"Name":"Edgar Ignacio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7oexz4qXoBKr6ujKuYxwMvlf16ckv-ovFMKFmC4nzUqeMSoelFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always have a good positive experience everytime I come visit this place to dine. From the moment I walked in, I was impressed by the cleanliness and inviting layout of the restaurant. The ambiance is modern and comfortable, making it a perfect spot for both casual dining and special occasions.

Myst Asian Fusion specializes in an exquisite blend of Asian cuisines, showcasing flavors from various regions, including Thai, Japanese, and Chinese. Their specialty dishes, such as the Mango Tango Sushi Roll and the Pad Thai with a twist, are not to be missed. The presentation of each dish is simply stunning; vibrant colors and artistic arrangements elevate the dining experience to a whole new level.

One of my favorites was the house special, the Szechuan Spicy Chicken, which was perfectly balanced with just the right amount of heat. Every bite was a burst of flavor, and you can really taste the quality of the ingredients used.

The history of Myst Asian Fusion adds to its charm. Founded by a passionate team of culinary experts with roots in various Asian cultures, they aim to share authentic flavors while also putting their own unique spin on traditional dishes.

The restaurant operates daily from 11 AM to 12 PM, making it convenient for both lunch, dinner and late time visits. While the prices are a bit on the higher side for some dishes, the quality of food and service truly justify the cost.

If you’re looking for a memorable dining experience with exceptional food and service, I highly recommend Myst Asian Fusion. You won’t be disappointed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOt1FHy0xF3himUoM5q3Zbn-nIjuJ93IN6bsxAq&fid=0x0:0x7f74631ddc94861a"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Cole Davis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAOU6XCX3s_R0vWndse-P-J59JZDVGZbi6kfyG2pJARhX4qsYzZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I believe MYST and No.1 beef noodle are owned by same person. However, overall the dishes and portion size- everything, really is just better at No.1 beef noodle.

Gotta love their kids menu.

Not to say MYST is bad, more rather it's a comfy spacious dining environment. Until you're packed in the back area due to low seating😂

Service can be slow during lunch/dinner rushes as expected. It's not as bad as some places though, which have you wanting to just leave.

Their drink is ginormous. Never was I expected one drink to be the size of two, for the price of one.

Their egg is suspicious. I don't know if it's really egg. At least No.1 has an actual egg omelette.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkoesBt4S8wkKp6iFmtBS9ImQP8ISl3siN7_is&fid=0x0:0x7f74631ddc94861a"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"Jimmy Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ1qntejyOUzrVHnGQvTPpkwUoFIru_CNwsC4mP4mBcL-YCEA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As a professional food critic, I strive to provide honest and unbiased reviews, and my recent visit to this establishment deserves recognition. Having dined here several times, I found yesterday's experience particularly noteworthy due to its near perfection.

To start, I indulged in the green onion pancake as an appetizer. Its texture was crisp and flavorful, setting a promising tone for the meal. Following this, I savored the salt and pepper chicken, which was seasoned impeccably, and the pork soup dumplings, which were a delight with their tender meat and rich broth. To accompany my meal, I selected the peach slush bubble tea, which was refreshingly sweet and complemented the savory dishes beautifully.

Overall, every item was executed to a high standard, impressing even my discerning palate. This visit reaffirmed the establishment's commitment to quality and taste, making it a standout choice in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4ZQyECmo90nLhxnV8VJnWCTAQPuxLl1jqbGyw&fid=0x0:0x7f74631ddc94861a"],"When":"2024-8-6"}]

[{"Name":"Amie Ch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVkc9cF3f9MR63XdYMF9WiYhZznfAtGLL13ZBs_wJMvVvWaonA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We love to come here to eat since they opened! The food quality has always been excellent! The steak and beef are always very tender. The lamb shank is so juicy and tender, just falls off from the bone. They also give big portions. My kid is very picky with her food but she loves their meat skewers! Highly recommended to everyone! Very friendly staff too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKkenC8Uj1vxShfOib1ePT8BEDhrNUhNB8t70P&fid=0x0:0xf372cf01be53f580"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"Jimjim ym","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1PiOSVCEn9bWgSGk-UbnwgQixs1lcWf48KuIObYXL-Zzxm8pF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's the only place where they treat you professionally and very well and respectfully and kindly in a way that you don't feel like you are there just for eating.the prices are always reasonable and clean service as usual. And it's very tasty and they treat everyone wonderful. I've been in different branches of Cazba , but  this Cazba Persian grill at Lougheed mall is amazing ,they are really the best and they look after customers very well because they are  professional and they know how to do their job   they welcome you with kindly and respectfully and treat you with the high quality food .
If you go there for eating then you will know how they are friendly to make you a wonderful time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMN3Wl8kTEf4Y5vNmLq1OhbY_sLcPapGQ2ZgkuH&fid=0x0:0xf372cf01be53f580"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Thedishdetective Lala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD_tj6k6xpF8R8uVmPtHQuGBgjvefVOKaKmqeE1mkWnmvdyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cazba Persian Grill express

Location: Lougheed Shopping Centre
9855 Austin Ave #106, Burnaby, BC V4J 1N4

During a recent visit to the Lougheed Shopping Centre, I decided to explore the offerings of the food court and opted to try this restaurant.

Food:
I ordered the Koobideh, a dish featuring two skewers of ground beef accompanied by rice and a grilled tomato. The beef skewers were impressively tender, well-seasoned, and served in a generous portion, striking a commendable balance between flavor and texture. The rice was abundant and flavorful, complementing the dish nicely. The grilled tomato added a welcome layer of acidity, enhancing the overall composition of the meal.

Rating: 9/10

Service:

The service was friendly and efficient. The staff member who assisted me was approachable and courteous, contributing to a positive dining experience.

Rating: 8/10

Ambiance:

Situated within the mall’s food court, the restaurant benefits from a clean and well-maintained environment. The space was inviting, with what appeared to be recent renovations lending a fresh and modern feel. There was an ample supply of seating, and the lighting was bright yet comfortable, making for a pleasant atmosphere amidst the bustle of the food court.

Price:

The pricing was highly competitive, offering excellent value for the portion sizes. It is rare to find such quality and quantity at this price point, particularly in a mall setting.

Verdict:

Overall, this establishment provides a solid dining experience. The combination of flavorful dishes, friendly service, and reasonable prices make it a compelling choice for anyone seeking a satisfying meal. I will certainly return to explore more of their menu offerings.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXGEAGEqW56OBTSFSLHS35xu5lbjh2-x6rwRCG&fid=0x0:0xf372cf01be53f580"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Sepidar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKgp7EAZNWkefDLRXhcRSD6g873CyI9knhg5DIvpr5zoieVwg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had lunch at CAZBA Logheed and I was thoroughly impressed.
The kebab and rice were excellent—perfectly seasoned, tender, and full of flavor. The quality of the food truly stood out.
The service was equally outstanding. The clerk was incredibly friendly and attentive, making the dining experience even more enjoyable. Overall, a fantastic place to eat, and I’ll definitely be coming back!"","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVQVsA3jTxXwKJTRK9rfy2JlwRIMI7hZpQpdOa&fid=0x0:0xf372cf01be53f580"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"mohsen amiri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpaVrmZPTsv-fkUAw60eboA5CAtqCWjiynEimM--LdSI_-HG-5=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My order was Kobideh kabab. The rice and meat were fresh and well done. The service was excellent, and the staff were respectful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMP_hD1mgI_JrdOmaOlu6OwhDnAWZEkbymzQLiU&fid=0x0:0xf372cf01be53f580"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Varun Sai Poluru","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbmlNCQ4MPfkwVzYaUYzSU6XH3zX5SNvOgUnhdMQp6Xt5tFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had an amazing meal at this Persian restaurant tucked away inside a mall in Vancouver. It had been ages since I last had Ghormeh Sabzi, and it did not disappoint – truly comforting with awesome taste that felt like a hug in a bowl. Being in a mall, the seating is shared, which is pretty standard, but don’t let that deter you. The vibe was still cozy and welcoming. Definitely a gem worth checking out for a taste of authentic Persian cuisine. Can’t wait to go back and try more dishes!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOA0qT7w6V5MJbq3NdpIahUzwRavvMI7YXrTVs&fid=0x0:0xf372cf01be53f580"],"When":"2024-2-10"},{"Name":"Reyna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdI_jxsR1wlSGd_ZeffKcuXobZ8qGpZBrX3WdwouV5oGX7X190=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I wanna know what they put in their rice but it's super tasty.My son loves it too. The meat is tender and delicious.
Their baklava is a hit but a bit pricey, should be bigger in serving.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgl_xTAYXT0fu0fUg-ExRX7DqIiB2ayVG-vmxI&fid=0x0:0xf372cf01be53f580"],"When":"2024-3-9"},{"Name":"Carmen Gutierrez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJIsJv7tmGTFJbAF6MdkiN6mMO5No36TwfWhSoJMu5LMD4B8g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Quality beef kabob. So juicy. Please try the ghormeh sabzi with rice. So much flavor. Very kind staff. Merci !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6EdZbH0M4mh-MA30sNfu6sC41ZgJ5PXihvsft&fid=0x0:0xf372cf01be53f580"],"When":"2024-10-17"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mohammed Yahya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLT1QQjsQL0cVBO4YH4tgQfBRBthb4gM79UjFdzAIKyKZVPkA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The restaurant was kinda quiet no customers. We saw the buffet at the beginning and it was almost empty kinda old food. We asked for the new food if there would be one. The waitress wasn’t happy with my question. Waited for a while then we got served. I am not sure if would recommend the place. They serve 3 kinda curry, chicken, lamb and veggies. Rice and nans and one kinda sweet. The food was ok but the service was very slow and unwelcoming.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNymL57aVEsoRFdk5NIdGXWzHAY3uqJNuN8wmh&fid=0x0:0xf966e414abe2b184"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Viviene Tiu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKNqk663Vr0DqIWT9OTeSE7G21st9EUYu0Kd-kHQYWotRWT_TCy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was an absolutely amazing restaurant! Loved the butter chicken! The sauce was superb and the chicken and fish were so tender. The naan bread was the group’s favourite as well! Wonderful ambience. Definitely a place worth checking out especially for celebrations or romantic dinners!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMf1J8CyQzHzT92CmvDgTtcEK-HMWb_t7fGZi7O&fid=0x0:0xf966e414abe2b184"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"PRANAV PAREKH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7Foto1gh0Wvtp7lxJT5vKzjhSYfJUe5QQpT0kqoZvsyuDvlTOPw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"“Had a fantastic experience. The staff was incredibly welcoming, attentive, and friendly, making us feel right at home. A special shoutout to Sunaina and Sanya who was exceptionally helpful and ensured we had everything we needed. The food was absolutely delicious, with authentic flavors and perfectly spiced dishes. Highly recommend this place for anyone craving great Indian cuisine and excellent service. Will definitely visit again!”","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMEuvQ0-NKW-5UzH3_w3a3NpaQPhLXTWRnrs1OS&fid=0x0:0xf966e414abe2b184"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Lisa Belle Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJCmMi7s1y7lWIWBCRTwYZLTtMonQCfJOsG74QMkp0RGBFdKg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was so good, it’s so fresh and yummy. I really liked the lassi drink, and the service was so good. Everyone was very kind and they paid attention to how fast we were eating appetizers before we got our entrees","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjFfCEcwAdzFITd5ayC_EXXYjfHbNjt0sG3sFu&fid=0x0:0xf966e414abe2b184"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"B W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJp85P5JohieEKJOfTMzyjH1aTNit_eIhBL3dFVyxf0xS2BxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Missus, I and the boys had a fabulous dinner at the Kurrywalla Indian Restaurant. Upon entering, the dining area was very clean and welcoming. The service was very good and hardly a wait for the food to arrive. The menu is very extensive and alcohol was available.

We really enjoyed our main dishes of Vegetable Pakora, Aloo Gobhi, Butter Chicken, Chicken Biryani and Chicken Tikka Masala. The food has a serious spicy level of hotness even though we ordered “medium”. Luckily, we like our spicy foods.

We will return to sample some of the other dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO83hW3lmr0G8bj8du-JaaWwDWExsj75Rq0piHN&fid=0x0:0xf966e414abe2b184"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Gaurav Chakraborty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxblSuK4N2K1mk98FuLlejXYyNkUgo1YP_JOGrQRJsq-naXtSb=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was really awesome. Best in the town. Calm environment with less people and nice ambience. Sunaina really helped us with the menu and quick service. Thanks a lot!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNh2ilvTbBmR1--_sj3oBZkpTo4hjawM6z85vvU&fid=0x0:0xf966e414abe2b184"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Gautam Modkar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKeIGbzU-dcGsE5lyb6YgdLE2aVJOmygWqzWVQhgYxlXfwPcQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A Must-Visit for Consistency and Flavor!

I believe in going back to places that inspire greatness, and this restaurant is one of them! Returning for their Chole Bhature was a decision I’m glad I made. Once again, the food was outstanding—packed with flavor and bursting with authenticity. The Bhature were light and fluffy, and the Chole, rich and satisfying, reminded me of the power of consistency.

What made the experience even better was the amazing ginger tea that followed. It was not just a drink, but a refreshing moment of calm, perfectly capping off the meal.

If you’re looking for more than just a meal but a place that delivers every time, this is it. Keep coming back to places that fuel your spirit and remind you of life’s little joys. You won’t be dissatisfied at all.

- Gautam (gmcreativestudiocanada)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8LbCj4YDMAXZhFw_qOgOXrnsTKhMZQmIwG91d&fid=0x0:0xf966e414abe2b184"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"S Salil","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHLEz5i6JHhYd1TSfmOhILHvAbA35-zO0yP4VKH163dIaYQCYW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Either their regular chef is no longer working there or the ratings are superficial.
They gave their 100% to service. seemed a bit inexperienced but I'll take it - 1 extra star just because of that. It's a new restaurant, the reviews seem hyped or buffed up for some reason.
Food was a total downer. We tried all recommended dishes - chat papri had taste of curd only. Lamb chops were totally bland and a waste of money. Noodles had taste of only ketchup, Butter chicken gravy was too tangy and no other taste. Garlic naan looked weird but was the only food item that didn't make us sad.

Please don't go by the ratings. Try if you want with opposite expectations to ratings.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoGo28cLs0mvkc7j3t0i97g7ZTeQOrBU5q2cBm&fid=0x0:0xf966e414abe2b184"],"When":"2024-7-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mia Duong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPAUy0Htbh5FTHA7CrcyalmfPE1fNra4l4o1y3j6EQjpz6Sdhn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I saw this place on YouTube and never knew it existed!!! It’s home cooking and note it is a hole in the wall but if you don’t mind that and are patient with the service as it’s just Yasser cooking and serving then you’ll love the soups and the sandwiches.  Be sure to ask about the special of the day as it’s not on the menu. It’s the only place where you are full and it cost less than $10! He often has 3-4 different types of soups and Tue & Fri the special is the Yasser burger. Monday’s special is the seafood on rice, Wednesday’s special is buttered chicken on rice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9keeXRUR7inMWvfAxGGlYiZjdVTOLGk4cGLJQ&fid=0x0:0x85ea87b0993e9161"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Phil L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLP8vblWOjxfvpOcXTu84a5zJqXMSlg1A4A-FK4spzf_Xtq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing corned beef sandwich! I had heard about the food here from people in the neighborhood, fantastic food and amazing prices!  They were right! The owner is busy, really really busy, place was full but it was also lunchtime, it's a very small place, but he was super friendly and I got my order quick!

Sandwich was hot, perfectly toasted, loaded with meat, delicious!  And 7 bucks! Crazy! Did I say delicious? I didn't have cash so I had to pay with credit. I wanted to leave him a tip but he didn't even put a tip option on his credit card machine!  Now I MUST go back to try the roast beef sandwich ...  and also make up for the tip I owe him :-).  You want ambiance? Go elsewhere.  You want great food, great value and a guy who's so friendly you got to love him? You come here!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nalinee Yeung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWo10huSX0dX6mUo_p-98vcDKFsNu-pbqmp1FOUHibmggCI0smK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very homy. Feel like having food at home.
Simple but tasty. The chef / owner s sense of humor and very kind.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtMC4sTd2ZBHFx99NM7MYn1Al7CvvsU_nu7hJu&fid=0x0:0x85ea87b0993e9161"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Zain Sattar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLWEo6_UefMH2p3Ku-wHAXW1J2rnlXth6ibHpgLSDsaqUEIsg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing place! Yaser is so kind and his restaurant really feels welcoming. The food is so well priced and absolutely delicious. Try roast beef and corn beef sandwich highly recommend!!
Love the aura will definitely come back
10/10","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMp9Q3kJE4_mTQhpQbKV5IgeBZjn_rL4prbxHq2&fid=0x0:0x85ea87b0993e9161"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"Kalvin Walker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWigZZon5lBY8bc9dUGdaabXIExS8McY2oiiSA9kIAGljo1SdJC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely warm your heart homestyle spot. This is not for someone looking for an upscale experience. This is home cooking. This is a stick to your bones hearty soup and sandwich Spot. It's like stopping by your favourite uncle's place for lunch and he wants you to grow big and strong. Always ask about the special. 10+visits and counting. There's a reason it's always packed for lunch and after work. The value is unmatched.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"To Ching Chan (Raymond)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_JNaVYtt5g0NGwmOn0CZ8D3OYXoGeQEAGHictSSpxFK2__U6u=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beef and beans soup with toast for only $3.5 with tax included! It’s tasty and you can’t find it anywhere nowadays. The owner is very friendly. :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhD8JPVlZ1bO9sq8mNY0aGKFjYuqKtu6LChhVH&fid=0x0:0x85ea87b0993e9161"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"S. Reid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocISNPb4BJnzu5cUcXQUpH68kYmzAE_Gfom8zWU0pQUNlbL1UQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a fun little cafe! It’s a place you hear about and just have to take the time to seek out. We were told about it from a dear friend in Rome!! It’s homey, the food is delicious and the prices are unbelievable!! Yaser is one of the nicest people you will ever meet! If you’re in the area of Burnaby General, check it out!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Frédéric Losson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2KnjnrbKb3XwyfTBDFXqRxfL_hY_P11HN7dsyuMPaChWyaMme=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I usually don't review, but this is just a really good place. All is fresh, homemade, and delicious, and very low price. The owner is very nice, smiling and welcoming.
It is not fancy, but you won't find such a level of quality for this price in 99.9% of Vancouver area's restaurants. Soups and dish of the day are a must.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nguyen Nhi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUIG6PRq7Q0pKPz8o87Vx3BwJECu4vxZh19_Us77Vairz_izGBa=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went here to celebrate our anniversary as we would like to try somewhere new and not too hyped. In overall, the decoration is just ok, nothing special about it, but the service is good and our server Linh Do is really attentive. We had happy hour pork bao which is so savory! Hanger steak is well-seasoning and tender, seafood pasta is good, the portion is bigger than I thought so at the end I had to take the rest to-go. Moreover, when the server was aware that it's our anniversary, she said the dessert will be on the house, which was a total surprise to us.
I think I will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNo3EdI9jLPVzWsaQ9RCOelnxod6gDBcOJBCLhp&fid=0x0:0x2e98a3929a97b700"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"MRH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJV98sRXubHy1KDN6gzNM0FB29r5gpSGEV3EAn_EvpwTB8kEDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"- Dry, sterile environment
- Unpleasant food
- Great Server Staff

I came here with a friend to try out some restaurants in Burnaby. And we were surprised to see one in the hotel on Kingsway. Excited we ordered the carpaccio and 2 Broken Ladder Ciders. Our server Leopold warned us that the carpaccio was vegetarian and we verbally acknowledged that we understood.

The ciders came out by the pint for $6 as a deal and we were delighted. The carbonation was mild but the service was quick. The carpaccio came out and it looked unappetizing but we proceeded, and to our displeasure we indulged. After one bit each we choked down the food and politely told the server that it wasn’t to our taste. We asked for the bill and finished our drinks.

Credit where it’s due, Leopold was a good server and he even cooped the food we didn’t eat. We appreciate the gesture and have nothing negative to say about the service. Perhaps it was that night or maybe that item is a flop on the menu. But it really wasn’t good. Clashing flavours, and bold statements. Just not ones that I enjoyed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCkArZA-WHiDK_-a7azCcq3CF2arI81OuToCoV&fid=0x0:0x2e98a3929a97b700"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Kimberly W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyEcFWm9KlF1A5qUr48_2k5NqNkBKB28_JBHp8Hk3SydvKzo4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Some friends and I came here for dineout. This is a review of their $49 dineout menu:
1) Lobster Bisque - good flavour, a tiny bit salty for my taste but I am also a bit sensitive to salty stuff.
2) Beef carpaccio - I was worried this would be too dressed up (I’ve had a similar type of beef carpaccio that didn’t sit well with me because there was too many toppings piled on it) but this one wasn’t bad, the toppings weren’t overkill which I liked. The meat could’ve been a bit more flavourful itself however but overall it was better than I was anticipating.
3) Braised short rib Paparadelle: the portion was huge which was great, I got to take some home for lunch the next day. I was sort of expecting the pasta to taste more homemade, but it definitely just tasted like dried packaged pasta. However, there was a ton of meat which in my opinion made it worth of value, and the dish was flavourful enough in my opinion. Weirdly though the food wasn’t really hot when it came, which didn’t fully bother me because I could eat it right away, but that might bother others. Overall I thought it was quite decent.
4) Scallop risotto: the rice tasted a tad bit undercooked and not as seasoned as I hoped? My friend had to add salt to it. I didn’t try any of the scallops so I can’t speak for those.
5) Cannoli Trio: out of everything the dessert was the winner. My friend ordered the cheesecake (although I didn’t try), but she really liked it. I also really liked the Cannolis, the cream inside was really tasty and didn’t taste fake at all.

Service was just ok. Had to ask to get my water filled and it took a while before they got to it/remembered. Servers weren’t overly friendly or anything but they weren’t rude either. My friend thought it took a lot of time for each course to come but it didn’t bother me too much as I was okay chatting and digesting a little.

Overall not the worst dineout I’ve had before, I’ve gone to some hotel restaurants for dineout Vancouver in the past that were very average. This was not bad for a $49 price point. I’d give a solid 4 stars.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPejmj_J4fInM1MK9nP6UO3Nikk91RbVIz6XEXi&fid=0x0:0x2e98a3929a97b700"],"When":"2024-1-30"},{"Name":"Helen Lu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvlD2THS7P8b_vT3p9ZoN6oXc4IbvekW-nLHk-BxCQibirlg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for the Bite of Burnaby three course meal for $42. The food was delicious, fresh, beautifully presented, and generous in portion. Our server was very courteous and helpful. We had a nice booth seat by the fireplace with the sunset glow coming through the windows. Relaxing, quiet ambience great for conversation.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPG_4lgBz2FYHqu5eLRvH0Hq1btHwPYbUuaBwct&fid=0x0:0x2e98a3929a97b700"],"When":"2024-3-30"},{"Name":"Erin Bell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLSyMp4YhOZ6eeNSs5k9_T07fllIXF9MntLPeUhXLW9DBbbCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Incredible dinner at Time and Place! The menu was full of so much variety, and every dish was incredible quality and so beautifully balanced. The dishes were thoughtful and portions were great. Loved it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOla26SUU9ZLj0vkpkgo2NsvQ_CvrJW1rlUynkp&fid=0x0:0x2e98a3929a97b700"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Hey Sam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIix0eUa7E3hqKWdA7Hi8scwWQy4U1OEN6SvlQMljBetj8ubA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went for dine out Vancouver. The lobster bisque was ok. The carpaccio was really good. We loved the cannoli dessert. Had a great time and would definitely go back. Our server took the time to explain the dishes to us which we appreciated. Located in the Hilton at Crystal mall. Parking is on level 3. If you park in the blue stalls you can give your license plate in the hotel lobby for free parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEXHXqoIZJaKhHukINUcAVPtJgYrGtGeDsszc5&fid=0x0:0x2e98a3929a97b700"],"When":"2024-2-1"},{"Name":"Ssarah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUj9Bq7d-0t_4j00LZ4xLcsidISpHWe5a1PZCzcURO3aVEVT6ql=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Surreal experience. My table tried to order for over 20 minutes. We left after sipping on water for 40 minutes.

It looked like there was 1 sever for the whole restaurant on a Saturday evening during the holiday season. None of the employees seemed particularly glad to be there. The hostess was rude to the final member of our party when she arrived, demanding that she have a reservation when she told her that her party was already seated. Even when she was able to clear things up with the hostess, the hostess gave her attitude that "Being already inside is not the same as having a reservation".

Surprisingly, the 1 server didn't look busy or hurried, but she also didn't look over at our table once even though she visited tables near us and we were seated in her eyeline when she was at the bar. In over 30 minutes that I sat at the table, the server didn't come over once to check if we wanted any drinks or to get anything started. We tried staring at her when she was at a table nearby, politely raising our hand and keeping it there, and then finally waving our hands in the air like survivors on an island. We caught the attention of many other diners there, but somehow missed the server. Finally, the busser noticed us and came over to our table. We said that we wanted to order, and he called, "Angeline, they want to order," and walked away.

We were relieved until we saw her go to the table of five seniors next to us instead, who didn't seem concerned with ordering. The seniors took a long time to ask questions about the menu, and my table kept watching the server and raising our hands to try to get her attention, so she'd know to visit us next. We were exasperated and starting to get worried about the rest of the dining experience: maybe the kitchen is shortstaffed and our orders would take forever if they are rung after a table of five. Maybe the server would take equally long just to fetch some condiments even if we did somehow manage to order and get our food. When she was done with the table of five, she went back over to the bar without as much as a glance at our table. That's when we realized that for whatever reason, we were not going to be served at this restaurant, and we had to leave.

We ended up at a restaurant in Station Square, where staff greeted us in a welcoming manner and served us promptly despite the restaurant being busy. It was like night and day.

We really liked the location, atmosphere, and menu options of this restaurant and were excited to try it. Unfortunately, we never got to try the food due to non-existent service. Sadly, we will not be coming back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"James Davis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ-SeiL7vkJUDvuYcIJusJGWbQx00m8FiAp2hIOwn5E8LKZfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We arrived around 4:15 on Friday afternoon.  The entire place was empty, not even one other person there.  The hostess brought us back to a table and then told us that they had a reservation for 6pm for that table and asked if we could ensure that we leave before then.  We agreed, but it wasn't very welcoming!  We decided to just order a snack off of the happy hour menu since they didn't want us to stay long.  We ordered 2 orders of truffle fries, an order of the beef sliders and an order of the wings for the 5 of us to split.  The truffle fries had no truffle flavour at all!  And the beef sliders were about 50% fat, 50% beef, the fat was so thick that it was gross! We are staying in the hotel for the next 3 days and we're planning on going back for the seafood platter and then maybe even going back to try the prime rib dinner Sunday evening but decided that we won't be returning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_I4sbUyWtSEXrwPgwQH8F3yVh9v-sQttm6TJ5&fid=0x0:0x2e98a3929a97b700"],"When":"2023-9-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Livia Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVie7wYIYnTNy_iOqvWMwiX-xgJH8Iz1_hWskpK-wZj63ZZMmbP6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favorite place for hot pot! I had been to other hot pot restaurants that were more expensive than Marble house but I still like this place the best. So much varieties and ordering is so much easier after they switched to tablet. Their servers are all pretty friendly I never had any issues with this place and love coming back. Recently we tried their lunch hour for dim sum and again it was a very good experience.  Lots of varieties yet so much better pricing than your typical dim sum restaurants. Nowadays people seem to have forgotten how dim sum started - it's supposed to be like a local restaurant nothing fancy, very casual, yet tasty. Most dim sum restaurants unfortunately are all going for fancy interiors and "creative" dim sums so that they can charge customers more. I was happy that Marble house dim sum reminded me of the good old experience not to mention their portion is good! Our family enjoyed the dim sum lunch very much and already looking forward to the next visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFXmMMNGsY2OqOpvfa35--0ECqe051QuTUwRUR&fid=0x0:0x84b374e374007398"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"carol liem","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUCuYohzwvL-I_7dNVbbjdcGA122HF_X2tQ1V3VyXmvEJB9WWU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We always come to Marble House for their roast duck! It’s tasty and crunchy upon a bite! We love the braised chicken feet, lots of collagen too! The peppery pork tripe broth tasted delicious and nutritious. We had a very satisfying lunch here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8gSqx6PIHuq834bK3yQZrimwZWRo7_CK19836&fid=0x0:0x84b374e374007398"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"Rico Ackerman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmlwcRVxbjsx2o3SE8jaE10nKyxmV8zDHixoBM8WcUrdoB0uyq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Mori here! I love trying out different Hotpot places and my experience here was alright. The first time I tried to come here they told me it was a 30 min wait so I came back the next day. When you first walk in they keep the environment nice and clean. I was given some water and noticed there was some grease (as a previous review had pointed out) in the water I poured. I made sure to address the issue to the waitress. They were very nice with service. The food was delivered right away and I was able to enjoy my food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDKk82gAjvFdWqN8aqB6JW4nkelVxPpqPazdm4&fid=0x0:0x84b374e374007398"],"When":"2024-11-14"},{"Name":"Raph","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLABWGR2YeC_aGxeQkyQ3vLWJh7V48hn_-y9moA-6wypFGJcg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of the best venues for genuine Chinese BBQ meats that is on par with what you can get in Hong Kong or in South East Asia.
I ordered a takeout (or take away) Roast Duck with rice. The service was quick with very pleasant and helpful waitresses!
The food was great and flavours on point. I enjoyed my meal immensely.
Look at the photos for the prices. Very, very reasonable!
This restaurant is tucked away on the second level of the Chrystal Mall in Burnaby and close to the SkyTrain station.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjq_LxHHo70JUdGp55ppytbY1C50mfvkjNnhB6&fid=0x0:0x84b374e374007398"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Anthony Plaxen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0TosyGAQWTqM_XvTHaXfq2jDGHv6ifKWBgTGcJKYnap3ceipL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"An excellent spot inside Crystal Mall for evening hotpot. The all you can eat hotpot is definitely worth your money here. We ordered a variety of dishes, meats, vegetables and sauces. Similar to what you get at ChoCho or Dolar Shop. Good soup bases here, would recommend the sukiyaki or pork broth.

Overall, the quality of the meats is good. We found the ribeye to be quite meaty and more filling so I would recommend getting the short rib or lamb. The fatty beef was a bit too much in my opinion. They forgot a few of our dishes but that’s okay, we had our fill and it was great!

The make your own sauce part of the menu was good, you have to order each individual item but we were actually good with that! Also the drinks are unlimited too which was nice! You get ice cream at the end and cotton candy which is different and the cotton candy machine was really neat.

The meats were of good quality, they have a fair selection of vegetables and non meat options and the seafood was good as well, but certainly could have a few more options. It worked out to about 60$ per person with drinks and tips so it was overall pretty good! Staff were very friendly and attentive. Will come back again, a nice spot to hit up and they got a good AYCE menu in Burnaby. Parking is also free at the mall for three hours.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_hWF6xGOl59WBJccp1uDIRQ2WQRKTJSs0Ye4t&fid=0x0:0x84b374e374007398"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"MrMarcus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyUdUumn6PmcHSgQ61JzOMt3g7g34TOKebZXdmQ_Ovq9MBLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ive never had bbq duck so depressing, feels like it's been there for a day. We asked for bbq pork that tastes like duck, so I hope it's not bbq pork. I do not know how this place has positive reviews","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWQv9WXdi7FpoXwLVjdgeZuQBa0rv4f5X7Jo94&fid=0x0:0x84b374e374007398"],"When":"2024-11-14"},{"Name":"DC G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKgEfP1mBKyycrif96oHS3qLSBdMNLaAdNHodByCKv_7ltcAG8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My go to Hotpot restaurant in Greater Van. With family and friends, again and again mostly each week. The service is warm like home! Shout out to the Mr.manager, he knows how to take care my family or even just myself alone for late diner, he would love to greet me and talk about families and all that, such a heartwarming moment! Late night dinner goers are also welcomed for their high quality Hotpot AYCE deal! It comes with all kinds of clay pot rice that you would want not to skip at all! Don’t forget to get the marshmallow!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfBsUcGjsC8IDYpXB3B8hOLAgNGoiiSUZHTZJX&fid=0x0:0x84b374e374007398"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"OTL","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIDaiwqYX8MNo2iwWjVkU6yJsdN1hsNiutjtTA1StziK05Irw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Decent place. They can survive in crystal mall for so many years, it means they gotta be good. Dim sum is decent price and service also decent. Can’t complain.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVAq7eP3a4L9p4l4fP6cA3fnAP5g1fJrIpjmtY&fid=0x0:0x84b374e374007398"],"When":"2024-11-17"}]

descriptions: Tudor-style mansion on the lake presenting Pacific NW plates with a cottage hosting special events.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Iris and Scott Wedding","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXjUefdZRNJMcCgmMMfLYQWeR_K3UNo-piHulpCkZYKBV6iOBA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sonja, Gen, and the rest of the Hart House team are absolutely amazing. I had my wedding here - specifically inside their event tent - and even with the rain, it was beyond magical. The bartenders were on point, the staff were super friendly and accommodating, everything was set up and in complete sync with my coordination vendors. The food itself was divine. Guests kept complimenting me on the food selections and dessert choices! Overall, Hart House is the perfect place for a lush green and quiet lunch and dinner, for exploring the grounds and Deer Lake, or for a major milestone event like your wedding day. We don’t live in Vancouver, but we can’t wait to keep coming back to Hart House over the years!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFP7vDzX8oIYxooeOgTFgxMEWq_fOdtNlvrGqW&fid=0x0:0x373c4eea0847305f"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Alessandro Salaris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrrAFhZ0DWxEznML-_6_HmJZtHRgzEa3bJxENt2tNnWIMlGRMK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great location, exceptional service. Dined outdoor, surrounded by plants and flowers everywhere. Our table was facing a giant green yard used by the owners for a wedding party happening at the same time. Lovely atmosphere. Food was great, and service was really top class. A bit too expensive but overall is worth the price. Thank you","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-vTj-bSHLiFzNYXKnItLYI6MFtistWxOECKWe&fid=0x0:0x373c4eea0847305f"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Norman Farrell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOKauCUm-k2P6JXZbVaCjI514xmAUd8cPqhMzakFQdELGnjKWj0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Busy afternoon with a large wedding party on the lawn overlooking the lake. We enjoyed the outdoor dining area. The “happy hour” menu was offered until 5 pm when the dinner menu was available. The happy hour menu was limited but adequate. We had mussels and clams, fish cakes and Caesar salad. All nicely presented and tasty. Desserts were crème brûlée and fruit Pavlova. Both very good. Service would be 5-star except that my wife’s plate arrived more than 5 minutes after my shellfish dish. A couple normally expects to have entrees served to them at the same time. Young woman serving us though was excellent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjJroRJs34SVkyC6BtXuJsBdF3DSweNAFvMRb8&fid=0x0:0x373c4eea0847305f"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Jennifer Bee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFO0fgPBTIA1yxL3IXSghRJ6EmshLC1YB1a72b-xeg3kpjHx0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Edit: we returned for our anniversary. Excellent food and service, and a wonderful night out!

We visited Hart House Restaurant for a work function. We were seated upstairs which offered a cozy meeting room with technology for the PowerPoint. My husband had a view of Deer Lake and commented several times about how pretty it was. Buffet dinner was tasty. I’d love to go back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlCoBnkkEq4aVMwgRO5YEx4yp0roA9_EC1rJLr&fid=0x0:0x373c4eea0847305f"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"Mrs. Leci","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFUu7tIDGHhiFP61EOIZLCOSzvwJkGN10CXxqa6MRhYpyxpm4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our dining experience in this restaurant was nothing short of exceptional. This feel-good-and-charming restaurant was a delight from start to finish. The dishes we ordered was really delicious, the plating is beautifully done. It's charming ambience is the cherry on top. You can walk outdoors and if your lucky, there might just be a wedding ceremony going on with all the flowers blooming. It's a great scenery while dining in.

Love, love, love this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfcOig6lBzZReEK-le2YMVUTawL8XutJcU9tHx&fid=0x0:0x373c4eea0847305f"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"G C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW20QuW__IfaK4FwuvG_N-_l9xiiBSDQFOta_GyQe9BNR4mDQU3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were greeted by a friendly gentleman as soon as we entered. The fireplace was on; warming guests as they entered. We tried the set menu with wine pairings with each course. We were given a pre appy snack which was a nice surprise. My favourite dish was the steelhead. The fish was perfectly cooked and the flavours worked well together. My husband enjoyed his roasted duck. The servers were attentive and sweet. We were happy and full when we left. We’d definitely come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNk1FDX496YJPPsMj-mpi7JFIVMOhXqimacP6AB&fid=0x0:0x373c4eea0847305f"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"Michelle Kienzle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKEPDzRZApZ0TVs_lWHFpNjZ0-OB0yjGNDbbsAlhpoWQYWs0A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a wonderful lunch. The food was delicious, excellent service and beautiful Christmas decorations. Our group was in a side room so it wasn’t too noisy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQqHqE-1c4hme9ck52j0Uoq-XtlKZUflqDGpPV&fid=0x0:0x373c4eea0847305f"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Pinky Kwan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQqfyxiiCFNtW-lUJJe8BSajvsKemaaGzIiSaV_3riQMLqiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful place ! Excellent service and food! We sat in the  patio area for lunch and had the view of the lake and the  open grass area where they would set up for weddings! Love coming here every year to celebrate birthdays with friends:) Erkin the manager is friendly and so welcoming! The servers are all excellent as well:)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCryFjPh2zRqoSbXx7mufXX6iUXo_k2E9TMuBR&fid=0x0:0x373c4eea0847305f"],"When":"2024-7-26"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Selina Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUl1Xdwkrhcn348KF_kAAKRb07OtRHuXqFNqAaHShsjdgXloDJaXw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We googled the restaurants around south Burnaby and found this treasury. The place is small. It was a raining and cold day. Only two people inside but we imagined that it’ll be busy during working hours or brunch hours.

We ordered chicken enchiladas and Burrito. The size is big, taste good. Definitely will come again to try their brunch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_BKG0xTw0QqMqFEEbJbVwULGWlP3EkP6Wx8cb&fid=0x0:0x3bfdaebc3898d562"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"Erik Leong (gd6noob)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFn08Dkw-Vc2VUS4RFPPEWldYIwPrAvH4xtkXnIoGrVB2Is6a4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cozy little cafe and the food tasted great. Definitely worth a visit if you have never been here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOY288kvmFFHIs25VtN_6BMJCT7reO11MImjzTg&fid=0x0:0x3bfdaebc3898d562"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Michelle M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWeetN-W20mnzvtvgZG8vAeDlWwG6zd354oPCvc1I4B_3Cjy_PI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"What a lovely joint tucked in a business complex. We came for brunch and it didn’t disappoint, we got there around 10 on a Sunday morning and no one was there. Then around 11 am it got really busy! The baha fish taco was perfectly crispy and flavourful but not greasy.

The big breakfast burrito was huge and the Benedict’s came with 3 poached eggs, tater tots and coleslaw. The kids didn’t like the coleslaw much since it was bitter. But everything was cooked and flavoured well.

We will need to visit again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDDM5eLhqxO80lgLZxF1fXfEMgMtKs6NW-ewy-&fid=0x0:0x3bfdaebc3898d562"],"When":"2024-4-7"},{"Name":"Emilia Muirragui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVbrBdWMJwAdDmTKF2rqn3OE2f7BKVf4ff7Eui90G41UPNKe7l=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is a little hidden gem and I love that about this place. I haven't tried any of the food just yet, but I've bought a couple of drinks and bakery items and they've all been pretty good. I personally recommend the Hibiscus Water (Agua de Jamaica) - it was SO refreshing and it's so rare to find that it was a lovely surprise!
The staff is very friendly, but are usually quite busy which can make interactions feel brief and sharp at peak hours. There is plenty of seating space and the music is great. Would highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJsSj-DZsV05SxRqB5Htj9yFMlSlNgqg20UNB9&fid=0x0:0x3bfdaebc3898d562"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"Jade S-T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUt8D3Wbam1mlvwn8z7VPlAaeVuiJetfJ4opr154dNUfSfiD-sJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super cute little cafe with super yummy food and unique drinks! I loved the smoked salmon eggs benny (3 eggs!!) and my sister enjoyed the chilaquiles. But be careful with the chilaquiles, they were a little spicy for us! But we’re not spice people. Bright and inviting space with friendly staff. Highly recommend, will be back for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFkXxCx4B4-e2_RNo_X-5u-Be7mJTbxWjoS4f-&fid=0x0:0x3bfdaebc3898d562"],"When":"2024-4-29"},{"Name":"Jenny Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUIbexbcl7ZaDC2gqV7dd0k7OIRychepS-CfMpDAcwrFZHbVG8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The birri ramen was bomb! Also enjoyed the Blue Lavender Latte too. I will be back to try all the other amazing things on their menu. A must try 👌","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNG-4nWxPktFuVAP6TOtntF646TD7v2TRLSn12a&fid=0x0:0x3bfdaebc3898d562"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Diandra Mark","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrV3qPJoVEtA9rkDz4RRCP6sOJp9qqBiWsoaOl1V_rtuqFD07TKw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am beating myself up for not trying this place sooner! This place is GREAT. After spending a fortune at Lucky Taco at River Distinct last weekend, I would rather go here ten times over. The portions are excellent for the pasta and very flavourful. We were here for when they had the Bites of Burnaby going on - three courses for $35. We got the tortilla soup, three tacos and a craffle. The soup was so good man. Super hearty. Tacos had double fajitas so you can make them into six tacos.

Atmosphere is so cute. Love all the custom painted murals and portraits of local scenic spots along the Fraser River.

Customer service is absolutely on point. The girl at the front has the best customer service I’ve seen in a while.

Will be back many many more times :) to try for brunch next.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuwYA7I7Z5fMZMgU-1N0OQebGFd6yxEsNc2_Cz&fid=0x0:0x3bfdaebc3898d562"],"When":"2024-3-29"},{"Name":"Vancouver Foodie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8w6jkWQhHhs1Z246avVvoKQqrR4N6KZDvvFaklq629YACSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Little hidden gem in the industrial area for a great brunch.

Ordered their eggs benedicts and it was great.  They also have a lot of taco selections if you love tacos.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7OzHDBrOupLvFCHGDWWxnCTQn6IMBD-L_eo2v&fid=0x0:0x3bfdaebc3898d562"],"When":"2024-8-10"}]
