user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kathy Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiyb_IZpx_WoUpDbNVrKDpyLmD7_rVs6LOSYuAzIVmUAcA7Ma7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I google map to come here and it is very hard to find it because the restaurant entrance is not facing Kingsway Burnaby.  This location was a coffee shop before.

I came at 9pm it's empty and I don't have to wait.
I was surprised that they didn't have Manu you need to scan it and for me it was hard to see it because I only have one eye.  However, the waiter was very nice to offer suggestions for how to order.

I ordered Mango Prawns and Spicy Beef Noodles.
It was not much of mango and the prawns deep fried very hard to eat but my husband like it.  The noodle was very good not instant noodle and the soup is perfect.

I will come back and I highly recommend to eat here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDU5YjAFb6C7YrzrzQAC10IsOPCrsRCpIGOivl&fid=0x0:0xae01f477f31e375b"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Kim Mui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZfR-XvItEDXzwxy6hQfqpmkL0fpDb6SiqsyKRtdfvfmFqylkw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We arrived right when a large dinner party was leaving, so we had to wait quite a while to get seated, for someone to take our order, and for water to arrive. Otherwise, the food was amazingly cheap for how much you received! We also received extra ice cream at the end for the trouble.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMu_hJkXKi_F9c5cNATVDHsmWcOTxLJDjLpbx37&fid=0x0:0xae01f477f31e375b"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"JAY J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKhcLM4oNSDiU4wVY4wBgguAR_TZvXIN_EUeLmraxGboL8wyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The service was excellent, they frequently checked on us despite being busy. It’s rare to see an owner and staff who care so much about their customers. They’re always there to assist you before you even ask for help. The food was just as good as we expected.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjOy4evSZ86iV4wfUnBQ418AO6IpDX5y51-ukN&fid=0x0:0xae01f477f31e375b"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"Akorede Bamidele","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVhanzrQv49IoSnirobSyDSFxMo6TQbm8Q_eWroejjBDYm-1PdO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was so good that I came back twice in one week and the portions are a good size also. The Stir fry beef was really good, the mango cream shrimp is literally one of the best things I’ve tasted, the sweet and sour wasn’t my favorite but I personally just don’t like sweet and sour things. The Jjampong was my personal favorite, I had it both times but my friend says that the Jajang was good too, and the ice cream at the end is the best part. The service was amazing, our server Tae was so helpful and attentive. The vibes and atmosphere were lovely with Kpop hits all round. No complaints whatsoever. Will definitely be back a third time soon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvtWC3k0t8IytjQ9XEDtMuYyUCGyCNE3MPMoRU&fid=0x0:0xae01f477f31e375b"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"Chloe Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqEESWTSxK9Pt0Q0vaxxoceKapTsEiREU6mVITX_6aKfms4ICHJg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food are not the best. But the price is reasonable. We had a combo with 2 noodles for like $50? It includes 2 ice creams in the end. taste is okay.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNYlR64vxFm6wbGB7E1ZS8DgNKogdgPzNPLrLj&fid=0x0:0xae01f477f31e375b"],"When":"2024-6-7"},{"Name":"Evan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocItqym_b8p4Y-FW9783yYhbbkXgbWq5yo1i3Fyi_bB9_Q1tlIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Solid place to get Korean food , me and my friends came here for dinner and had a pretty good time. There prices are really good for some of the items like the black bean noodle and bulgogi(which was really good) for only ten bucks. We also tried their fried chicken which was like okay , the cheesling flavor dosent have enough cheese but the honey garlic sauce was super bomb. The chicken batter was also a little too hard and instead of crispy it felt more like over fried. I also had there donkatsu meal a few times and I totally reccomend that meal set.

Service is good and the staff did their job.

Inside is nice , clean and looks good with the soju and teal color scheme.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6Lm9w93_yholu7IEzFg8sm8q9yoHgCRdIRxOm&fid=0x0:0xae01f477f31e375b"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Krystell Bello","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtQmtDqnzD-S9M_duXBtDEC2WTky_OokR1Ciwf2Bbnjl5IzmCtvg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The place was recommended by a good friend, the food is amazing 👏  I would highly recommend the Jajangmyeon and the mango prawn!  The staff that assists us throughout the whole time is  so accommodating and gives us some complementary drinks as well! Overall, the experience is superb! I would highly recommend this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdkzUrkbkKGWjTbcPEXUTgB_MM4ObJxX8KIs59&fid=0x0:0xae01f477f31e375b"],"When":"2024-5-15"},{"Name":"Kelvin Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYlOJ0ZWKycRqx5ZOzHhnjusnD1vSd-Gno_8IQ4mNi6hmtCYtiSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The combo for 2 food portions were perfect however the spring rolls included felt a bit out of place. The sweet and sour pork and jajangmyeon  was delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTkNo8DBvefU9Ije4FOr3kt2Z27s4mN9bpmnb1&fid=0x0:0xae01f477f31e375b"],"When":"2024-5-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Adam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6N4PuUho6CqZtyOpzb8lhtXmrL2q8sMmlmyAJgvEPqvC7TI0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This was my first time experiencing this style of hot pot, and it was quite unique. You start by selecting your ingredients from an extensive array of options, including sliced meats, processed meatballs, noodles, fresh vegetables, and more. Once you've chosen your items, you weigh them and pay. Next, you select a broth, and the restaurant cooks everything together before serving it to you.

While it takes away the interactive fun of cooking it yourself, the end result is undeniably delicious, even if it looks like a big bowl of slop. It's a different approach to hot pot, but one that’s worth trying for the flavour alone. Overall, it was a great experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMioSWntls2DR5_ue-5kHWvcIWW32XzIxeY83g7&fid=0x0:0x4e0c47d3429882cf"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"Nancy Breedveld","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6VXJqkVK2A-wHW5vZByENZj3Mq7eXARa1il2RmlFMEZqohzJ7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"As long as you are mindful of how much you add to your pot, you will be fine for pricing. There are many delicious items to choose from for your hotpot!

Sadly the ice cream machine was not working when we were there but they offered popsicles instead!

I also ordered bubbletea which was the perfect compliment to my hotpot. We went at 1145am on a Saturday and it was already quite full! Once lunch rush started at 12pm there was a constant line up grab food and a constant turnover of the tables and seat.

I will definitely be back, I love this concept and surprisingly did not miss cooking my own food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOg88QLjtJdiAL0Nof0d187CpIYet7xH0IXA4j5&fid=0x0:0x4e0c47d3429882cf"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Dahlia Thomas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJuQgMiJgQQUWXUpX_vLBTDbbMkB1XyhSnpGj8rW2JxPqajVg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I didn't know you have to reserve your spot in the line online on their website until the friend told me. So while I waited for her I booked but your spot will be canceled if you're next in line but everyone is not there.

It was kinda busy but I am wondering if it is always busy since they have another Big Way around the street. They have a huge selection of meats, seafood, veggies and other hotpot ingredients. It is pay by weight but since it was my first time I got carried away cause I wanted to try many things. I don't eat meat so I just got seafood and veggies. I think you get a complimentary drink I got wintermelon tea but there was also green tea. You tell them what broth you want, I got tom yum and then they will make it while you sit down and wait. They have a sauce station where they have a bunch of sauces.

I enjoyed the fish balls, they were really good. I also got noodles but I didn't finish them as I ate everything else. The broth was good but next time I want to try something else. After that you get free ice cream. This flavor was milk tea in a cone.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMz7y96g_acWKP7c-jfMNM9DCf9EMqfvjFPhVu&fid=0x0:0x4e0c47d3429882cf"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"shahvir patell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUj-gStr-SxUMNYhYIxCv_SNQfWIklkoz0CSXuMVa8Jl-81PGZz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I recently visited Big Way Hot Pot  in Burnaby for the first time, and I have to say, the experience was quite unique and enjoyable. The concept is pretty cool—you're given the freedom to pick your own items, and you're billed by the weight of what you choose. However, it’s easy to get carried away!

We ended up selecting a bit more than we anticipated, resulting in a bill of around $100 for two hotpots and a bubble tea. On the other hand, my friends, who were a bit more restrained, managed to keep their meals under $20, with some people even spending under $10. The broth base we chose was the Signature Ma La Tang, which added a nice kick to the hotpot.

One of the highlights was the complimentary black tea-flavored ice cream they served at the end of the meal—a pleasant and refreshing way to wrap things up. Overall, the experience was good, and the service was decent.

I’d definitely consider going back, but next time, I’ll be more mindful of my selections to keep the bill more reasonable. If you’re looking for a fun and interactive dining experience, Big Way Hot Pot is worth checking out, just be careful not to go overboard!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCbGXbFA34hk8aze08SIbnUUrCFA7H8IQtIocU&fid=0x0:0x4e0c47d3429882cf"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Carlye Shaw","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzovWIut-CQ8CWgAug0vLYRdlZtXVFsH_hbtKc_OUFBEDYbHMOWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I was coming from out of town and was very excited to try! When we arrived it was VERY busy and quite cramped! But the staff are doing well managing with such a small space. Tons of ingredients to choose from and the broth was delicious! Id definitely go again but maybe on a day that isn't as busy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_Shm1WKkG5tITN0GoC12znmHzwz0b5-vwFWcN&fid=0x0:0x4e0c47d3429882cf"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"C E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL9Sw12YtCq4W1VpSxyr7zX2I2LRxLhd47w143d-5D5HQq8yg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Big Way Restaurant, patience truly pays off. We put our name on the waitlist and, after about an hour, were finally seated—but every minute of the wait was worth it! The experience is unique and interactive: you get to select all the ingredients you want to include in your soup, which is then priced based on weight. You can choose from a variety of fresh, high-quality ingredients and pick a flavorful soup base. The best part? They cook it right there and serve it fresh, steaming hot.

The result was a bowl of soup that was not only delicious but personalized to perfection. The staff, Daniel Chu was friendly and attentive throughout the process, making the wait feel much shorter. If you're in the mood for a hearty, customizable soup and are willing to wait a bit, Big Way Restaurant delivers an outstanding dining experience that's more than worth it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpl5giFvVpI97MyhmYRYRTFk0AFnnZumc3QJv9&fid=0x0:0x4e0c47d3429882cf"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Taz C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ235c-1POJF85QGI4N_CFSzUmrADwRBXdKObCvBIDceTrCYTc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Bit chaotic, but one can get used to it if you are a regular.  Definitely woth going here regular if you are craving hot pot. Service has been great most of the time, but I found staff getting impatient at times.  Although they can make bigger groups of 8-10 work it can get messy. Best to go on smaller groups. Parking is tough during weekday lunch. Not bad on the weekends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4nqm3suMzK2p334Z_qcoiXnGnkhcEZ9Rt9wu-&fid=0x0:0x4e0c47d3429882cf"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Kabbit","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5g5_h9j00SGUnTwF_nUxWAl1UXFr993Oy7iPdJ1npPaBqIlYX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Christmas decorations were very cute! Both the environment and the workers really made the vibe a good time. I dropped a piece of meat on my shirt while eating, but the worker noticed fast and gave me a wet wipe without me having to ask! Thanks for the great service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNq7hkWairJu8wYxMLwbaAetxgwKpjpsTmGRbNk&fid=0x0:0x4e0c47d3429882cf"],"When":"2024-12-6"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Olha Diachek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKapYGpIaHHL_bYwAq1JBs_HDSsE2Hp1SZ1O_3KZuVv9Zypvs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was surprised by how spacious this place is. On a Saturday afternoon, it was quite busy and noisy, but that’s exactly what gives it its unique vibe. I was particularly impressed that your order is brought to you by waitstaff. The team is very friendly. There’s a huge selection of desserts, which seemed to sell out quickly. I ordered the waffles platter, but the portion was so generous that I couldn’t finish it all. I ended up taking two waffles home with me.

The interior deserves special mention. The abundance of fairy lights brightens up the mood, even on the gloomiest, rainiest day.

This place is definitely worth a visit. I’ll be coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5-SdGkXj3GbWivZzbkY_2IlQXOp-GBo11NQ83&fid=0x0:0xee497c0e629fc581"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Alysa Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJcgTm0ud5IEy5AFweNCtfAx_NW6IUKANq244urxoakJ5YPzw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This cake shop has a beautiful interior design that makes you feel comfortable as soon as you walk in. The atmosphere is cozy and welcoming, and the overall vibe of the shop is relaxing. The staff are incredibly friendly, always greeting customers with a smile and making you feel at home. Their warm and attentive service really adds to the experience, making it even more enjoyable. The cleanliness of the shop is also worth mentioning, as everything is spotless and well-maintained, which makes the place even more inviting.

Of course, the highlight is the food itself. The cakes and other treats are absolutely delicious, made with fresh ingredients and a lot of care. Whether you're there for a simple snack or a special occasion, everything on the menu is prepared to perfection. It's clear that a lot of attention goes into both the presentation and taste of their offerings. Overall, this cake shop is a fantastic place to relax, enjoy great food, and be treated with excellent service. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQlkV62UIFpdE8hs2hwu1ckZA2mGJag-ImqovN&fid=0x0:0xee497c0e629fc581"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Lucy Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuwCjTEBDQem6hcfmmxSA0I0nNlJPkS88N0KyjwlMUZAjI_Jdm8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finally tried this place out and it did not disappoint! We went on a Sunday around 2pm and it was packed, but there were a couple tables available so we didn’t have to wait. Recommend reserving to avoid the wait during peak hours. I got the bulgolgi sandwich with squid ink buns, and it was so yummy. The food also comes with salad as well. The interior of the place is also super aesthetic and there are a lot of seats, and it’s a great place to study! The pastries are also really delicious and we tried the red velvet Oreo cake :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNip0Qa07f4r-TlKrE6qKhz5mGJwAH1aOqBPNgV&fid=0x0:0xee497c0e629fc581"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Ruby Esmundo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWA9WnUbdR0sy9PRxptKaUyLmTPRH3OvB996GbWqawCIVyva1Vt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food is good. There’s quite a variety of pastries and cakes to choose from. They are $8.00 for croissants, $8.25 per slice of cake, $39.99 for a whole cake.

The customer service is not that great though. I was in line with friends, the lady at the till who took our orders looked unhappy with what she was doing. She was not very friendly, and kept a frown on her face. It was busy during that time, but a little bit of friendliness would create a different atmosphere.

The place is clean, bathrooms are clean, they even have diaper changing table. It is also spacious that could fit a stroller in the bathroom. There were lots of plants which is very beautiful. Lots of tables and chairs.

They have parking in front and the back. Otherwise you could park in the street. It is kind of difficult to find parking though.

The food is quite expensive, but if the staff were more friendly, I would highly recommend this place. Staff friendliness and accommodation to guest plays a very important role in hospitality, not just the quality of food. It doesn’t matter if your food is super good, but if the customer service is poor, guests would not go back. Good customer experience is very important.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkaaaVUmPirF_SImbgxJwO4ZN7irNRWjSe2Z03&fid=0x0:0xee497c0e629fc581"],"When":"2024-8-26"},{"Name":"Minsu Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVeQw_YhBoAI2Nw8r0LMwW0nIB7-k0xmL7wVLR2dXlH04ac3BEx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Coffee was great, they make it with lots of love.
I had a cookie which was very good, many people in seats around me were having heavier meals and they all looked good as well.
The tables are wide, good for studying or working, but after sunset it’s a bit too dark for reading.
Highly recommend a visit!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBXBYe_LYyLjs7bhCJqvipCXDux8aJl7sDFKZC&fid=0x0:0xee497c0e629fc581"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Angeline Rafael","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLNIjGFt3AwM_dbBlrzN87xEqd8MR6IorQ07Mu1L2X8Ih11nQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is always busy and packed but their service is fast. Once you placed your order, one of their staff will help you get a table. We got their chicken platter but not a fan of their soy&garlic chicken. But their desserts and drinks are really good. We liked the tiramisu roll and their matcha latte. 😍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtkwPk3bDK3tLOAy1n3F8pNttR_FbsDjRBJjoc&fid=0x0:0xee497c0e629fc581"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Elaheh Mahraban","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUM7Oi6ZA5Fr6MkruIzoopb-zB6aVtEKxKffUhhlHzjMxNIqDrL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a really nice and relaxing time at this bakery. The mango waffle was delicious, and the high ceilings along with the well-thought-out interior design created such a chill atmosphere. Perfect spot to unwind and enjoy a sweet treat!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmj1dEDAV0h4hXUMfuaOLxsuAcGqL2mpHbS5Nw&fid=0x0:0xee497c0e629fc581"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Cap Holz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPyOU4gu8e0VDkbUMnKwJdDhYwFFnSKwX2msPVNIE1ol0wz4i8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food is really great looking,  but when it comes to taste, it's just but there.  Waffle is very bland, only toppings are tasty.

Coffee is good! Drip coffee is really strong :)

Service is fast but theyre always very full.

Also, 90 dollars breakfast for 2","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO201plN8k843wl1PqhX3BWdkrO8cjU8MAEvZI&fid=0x0:0xee497c0e629fc581"],"When":"2024-10-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Quinn L.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6vx0ezJG0GDaJFb7qHXLdrAbL4LGTjhR-05HfHlbp5QPFSkU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My parents and I dined at Earls Station Square for my birthday. Laren was our sever for the evening and he was great until an order mix up which put a damper on the rest of our time at Earls.

I ordered the Cajun Blackened Chicken but instead was served a salmon dish. When I informed Laren about the wrong order, I was met with doubt and annoyance. Laren did not offer to correct the mistake right away and it seemed he wanted to persuade me to keep the salmon. At no point did Laren show accountability for his mistake nor did he apologize for it, it almost appeared that he casted blame my way like I misremembered what I ordered. I had deliberated between a burger and the Cajun Blackened Chicken when I reviewed the menu, not once did I even consider the salmon. I honestly felt gaslit by Laren during this whole interaction… I was certain I ordered the chicken…

Unfortunately I was not able to share a proper meal with my family on my birthday. By the time the correct dish was served, my parents were already finished with their food. What was supposed to be a joyous occasion was shadowed by Laren’s poor attitude and the awkward atmosphere that followed the conversation about the mix up. I felt it was obvious he avoided our table the rest of the evening while he was attentive to others around us. We also waited quite a while for our bill, which furthered the frustration.

The food somewhat compensated for the poor customer service. All of our dishes were delicious and well made. In addition, I was pleasantly surprised by the complimentary brownie at the end of our meal (not the birthday dessert special, which I felt too awkward to ask Laren about).

Although the food was very appetizing, it’s really a shame that Laren’s sour attitude and lack of professionalism made our dining experience uncomfortable and subpar.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPl0b02dlIbOIgXLcQPnM_0BPk9NI9LzdhBP2nz&fid=0x0:0x1e8568236be22147"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Thais Oliveira","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKXD1ghyGnpuIJs3_L2s_WmL-t8i8bpNdTnvYmAiDTd_aiIWg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was the best dining experience I’ve ever had. I chose Earls to celebrate my birthday with my friends (20 people in total), and the service was exceptional!
I got a hand-written birthday card from the hostess as soon as I arrived, the manager checked in with us multiple times, and the servers did an excellent job managing all of the orders!
I wasn’t expecting so much care and attention to detail, the customer service went above and beyond to provide such an amazing experience. Thank you so much for making my day so special!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOYcWsoJ4Sg-c5WIHTObN6rqg38usDOhOcKtVb&fid=0x0:0x1e8568236be22147"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Kristy Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEfZ2rjxNiODjhooQ3vu4wU52UFmMssx1nBEw-QrGtiP3D8nPb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Absolutely one of the worst steaks I’ve ever had, it was chewy, and dry even though I asked for medium rare. It felt like it was half frozen when it was cooked, but likely it’s because the quality of meat there is garbage and I had to send it back to the kitchen for a different dish. I am typically not the type of person to send food back, so the meat would’ve been unacceptable. Would not be going back. On another note, their pizza was not bad. The crust was very thing and cooked well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN19wS9BSgfoO40VY-Ws8wo0Fz0NqXKpgRtfJ1B&fid=0x0:0x1e8568236be22147"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Eva Zia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJp1CScTOq-jdIBVBA-K4f_r74TZU-kRd9MclConVIiSCPfy3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Here is our favorite bar for gathering together. We always go here for happy hour from 2 to 5 PM. One of the waiters here, named Miguel, is really friendly and patient. Try this place once, you won't regret it.

Don't miss the key lime pie dessert, and the guava strawberry drink is really delicious too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2ebYlyIx8eMGJekE8Rq9BW0TH9xCMdakeYVG3&fid=0x0:0x1e8568236be22147"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"YVR Duke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbrjJ5U6gKw7Gn1zE_GlxhUndims9WHlh7sVaHLXVrjOFlYd_B=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I always prefer Earl’s over other restaurant chains in Canada as it delivers consistent food quality.

The Poke bowl, pasta and Cobb salad we ordered today was good.

Staff were friendly and efficient even though i think they are a little bit understaffed, which is understandable in today’s poor economy.

The oyster was disappointing though.  It was
the thinnest, the most tasteless oyster i have ever ordered in my life time.  I don’t think it should be served if the kitchen care enough.

Not a bad meal

Card machine: preset 18%, 20%, 22% tips.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3aJIuyevPgeA_g4YhwHuCyuQICJVC8NpIxcVa&fid=0x0:0x1e8568236be22147"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Ivan Ruano","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJlD88eOgp4LoyjUgNEvZilCX7_nfJHbEXsoz58oEF29KOX8Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Celebratory dinner with my co-workers/friends.
- Elegant, modern décor, serene ambiance
- Staff & service was friendly, well-trained, & efficient
- Exquisite flavours, made from seasonal and high-quality ingredients
Our server was Cedric & Ayla. They were lovely, friendly and well trained.
Highly recommend for special occasions!
10/10","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCFzPBfJmggXxXwcI-OMuxvs0Za3hI0UY689Ng&fid=0x0:0x1e8568236be22147"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Leanna Wen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsfJTW-TsAXmUcndj_rCxFGk2NAIqCPLdhOtY5q_4RrmYAlg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a great time coming here with my friends for a celebratory dinner during happy hour! The staff, Cedric and Ayla, were super kind and friendly. The food was delicious and the service was quick! Would recommend coming here with your friends and family!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2qGIlUQvWzIaKr56NGZVESw2pAAMRsnMg6fw&fid=0x0:0x1e8568236be22147"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"Jason Tribbiani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXpvlAY0NULhaj1b4k1yZZtRXFlzsqxg5gIO8-kzQ1-Qy-iq7d=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"**Rating: 4.5/5**

We visited this Earls for a friends’ lunch gathering, and it didn’t disappoint. The atmosphere was excellent, and the food was top-notch. The staff were all very friendly, and the table service was quick and efficient. We thoroughly enjoyed our lunch and will definitely be back. Hopefully, in the near future, they’ll consider adding a kids' menu with options like mac & cheese or mini burgers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkEMQ0gFowYzqFs67zegyAiI_xkcDXq1E5n1cQ&fid=0x0:0x1e8568236be22147"],"When":"2023-12-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tammy Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWn0N2I5STxk6Dw-kQhoKTxOlHlPrvcouHiB9OgzjAG84pt3M0D_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"tldr: portions are tiny, yummy food and very kind and friendly staff

Food Quality: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️5/5
The food quality is amazing. Always fresh and tasty seafood as well as vegetables. Great variety and lots of options for different diets.

Food Quantity: ⭐️
This location always gives way too tiny portions. The staff although kind and very stingy. The owner of the store is more generous with his portions but the other employees give so little.

Customer Service: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
The staff is very kind and friendly. Im always welcomed with a kind smile and the owner is extremely kind and the service probably the only reason I keep coming back.

Other pokerrito locations are more generous with their portions. Take a look at a bowl from this location VS a bowl from another location. I am always left disappointed with the amount of food I get. I would recommend dining here but only if the owner is the one preparing your bowl for you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkJUi6hDdc3Wq4BnSSkI0_5M9NUiRRkSZMr2NR&fid=0x0:0x428ac64b2432bb89"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Yue","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXw2CzZ4ybY9X7CKP5IHpKnSQMkBHUBaUlQYAf_fIZN5iAVr40=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It is a fresh, tasty take on poke bowls! Great flavors, big portions, and friendly service. Perfect for a quick, satisfying meal. Love the build your own option.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMO9ljuc67n4rW1pOxWgVYZx0L4wkBOQ4u95Hnm&fid=0x0:0x428ac64b2432bb89"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Amnon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjcm2KnVvAXZsXO1Xw9a-BsRGj5-RmJ6nF12OqCF9XTomoPJ9CkA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered a few poke bowls, and they were great. Lots of flavourful meat, crispy jalapenos and veggies, and rice that doesn't feel too hard or soggy. Not cheap, but not expensive either.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTfCzDZtfFU9jT6pG03YY-peq-fXK8JGP12OPk&fid=0x0:0x428ac64b2432bb89"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Катя Rock","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvavlaq9dRL5RPryQrxNlkxGmb54RhUmBQZfBV762O6kaU7Hg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I stumbled upon this place in now it will be my favorite. everything here is clean, very tasty and responsive employees. I ordered poke and asked not to put tuna, instead they put me more other fish, even though I didn't ask for it. I was pleased with such attention. thank you ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyJd-s_klTxySq0N4Ix6f0Ukq3cXUOIt_X5A4&fid=0x0:0x428ac64b2432bb89"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Caique Santiago","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOox6PUq5eWC3lBaLydouQ7QUD4ciNU4rnLlNGRkAI_yOtiXUG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favorite of the bowl places. Always fresh ingredients, their wasabi basil sauce is delicious and this location got a very friendly service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5FwuIsT-B2jAqQOywZDqhxq97l2oyre3iXbsS&fid=0x0:0x428ac64b2432bb89"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Lina C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKbsQQl1N-BQDxBgK7N8-u_lcReIeD-M7vrDyswe_xAfT6bSg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We have always had great food and awesome service:)!!
We ordered Ahi tuna and it was super good.
Especially a guy who looks like the owner,
He is always so kind and nice","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlvMqyCyn5njGvT19c0EAO_3HgnQdZb1mC5TbZ&fid=0x0:0x428ac64b2432bb89"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"Charles","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW64Ss-ojDrxP41iMg-J0WxqtXB3TGqBajw2Nh0lV6aakNiaxrs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fresh ingredients and presented well, but pricy for the amount of poke protein you get","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNP0IAlAwDml1QlQfrbD4lQQ_Slkssx4GE2Bqe4&fid=0x0:0x428ac64b2432bb89"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Serena Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9dCXJiXkT2Yw03SJdaNBPt4M_g0YqE6WK4iltbPxjJjyx6Z3vBw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was my second visit, and once again, the staff were incredibly friendly, and the food they recommended was delicious and fresh! I highly recommend the Korean-style sashimi rice bowl! (If you can't handle spicy food, ask them not to add jalapeños!)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPVsKKerX9_bctC3NHGOhOzjhvK9OonhjrAnhj&fid=0x0:0x428ac64b2432bb89"],"When":"2024-6-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Isha Motani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIW4POr2CnFe8xGZwSQ3o1VsIIzKAt5a0D-U1KW9FjBnuY1fQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I am a vegetarian and always struggle to find good food in these type of restaurants. Why do you guys hate vegetarians!!
I had no option but to have Falafel bowl. Even the Thai curry had fish sauce! Please keep some vegetrarian options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlWrBma5YkeYCrpIwFPhjmYlYJHFWlXJEv0DqX&fid=0x0:0x41a3a1261e77e59d"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Chantel Lu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhUBNkL0dFJIMe46Hc5ZOh4M4Rb_kRrqjOnOpE53jr3rAZmMY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"we went there during the happy hour time.
The burger was great, but the steak was overcooked and hard to eat. We asked for medium but it might close to well done.
I think it might be close to the closing time (11:00), so the service was really slow. The service was nice, however, he never filled up our empty water glass.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnqkZV9PAajcT9m5OmbK3tD-CWAVToPUvotTs&fid=0x0:0x41a3a1261e77e59d"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"Melissa Meng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfi_MaQwJQjr5awFnfBadZv0UHcxu-wrWjT5PFn9oDD0gq0vU3JQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"New location in Burnaby, new environment inside and outside. Spacious inside. Food is still kept high end level. Fresh food material. Service is professional. Suitable for friends , family and company gathering here. Worthy to come . You can park your car at square station parking lot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfJUJGkGekeAnUysz0mCaySi_fYYPXG-tHxEg9&fid=0x0:0x41a3a1261e77e59d"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Yanniandi C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUSuq2O6lPgjTyeeK5I0-HvsIcyZNK163GH31jkT6zHPryGZbnbnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I've been there a few times for employee appreciation dinners and have had a wonderful experience each time, the meals are all delicious, and if the servers are able to be around they can speed up the serving of food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkX-koel7eyOWFF8CZUFsXxkpADHndKOV6Tnhd&fid=0x0:0x41a3a1261e77e59d"],"When":"2024-11-8"},{"Name":"Lost in Flax Blog","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnuEdz0exGAqoaKWuU3YZ60m50P5j2VjB_aqaZVW3VnTtNws28=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been fortunate enough to be a patron of Cactus Club Cafe for more than 20 years. I first started off being obsessed with their gardenburger and sweet potato fries back in my youth when I was courting vegetarian hood. Later, I would grow to love their calamari with tzatziki dip (since discontinued…) and various pasta dishes (many discontinued).

Despite their ever evolving menu, Cactus Club never disappoints and always satisfies my cravings. More recently, I tried their spaghetti portofino, Baja fish tacos with a side of truffle fries, chipotle chicken tacos, and New York cheesecake. All were sublime but my favorites were the spaghetti and fish tacos. Will be back to try their salmon aburi, chicken Parmesan with potato gnocchi, and hot chicken with pickles!

Keep on rocking and winning, Cactus. You are always a good idea 👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻

P.S. waterfront and station square branches are my fave so far.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjIkiPRMXcrDBgB0XGFgOID5mP4fqfRT89NyJB&fid=0x0:0x41a3a1261e77e59d"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Carol Wal.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmaEoaKXJ-LJbZu9x6VXOl8dM3-bKZExckrX8F7_7T88DDxKbn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our server, Christina (back to my memory…),was awesome! Very friendly and patient. A nice place for dine in with friends!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwgtgPoxZEDoFt00WDWIOU0ZvHke1gnq4Fa01m&fid=0x0:0x41a3a1261e77e59d"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"Berenice Baeza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9NjTRE1lVaLFkorLOHsrwcd4Ar03FlEkQdbO7B2xq0ZkfNKVyWg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great option for birthday celebrations, the personal is very friendly they made my celebration special. Also, they are very efficient we don’t have reservation and our party was a little bit big, however we didn’t have to wait too much for our table. 10/10 experience","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDPAcQLq26Z8LUner9IlEX4g0SxpgaUZBqAfKB&fid=0x0:0x41a3a1261e77e59d"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Mrs. Leci","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFUu7tIDGHhiFP61EOIZLCOSzvwJkGN10CXxqa6MRhYpyxpm4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have dined in this location a few times now and I wanted to make a review now just because my daughter cannot stop saying "mommy, this is sooo gooood!" for their spicy calamari. Yes, it's really good and will definely come back for my all time fave millionaire's cut, peppery salt wings, truffle fries and this new dish they got.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLeYPUQqYbn1IsmTTXhx1x0qI1_ZqpmfdJTWC_&fid=0x0:0x41a3a1261e77e59d"],"When":"2024-6-4"}]

The only down side was because it was in the food court and a stranger joined to our table without asking us... Pretty risky during COVID, isn't it?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOt13LsW_gFsuaZKMIG0HhmJ6ZXdi-17EJiTgtJ\u0026fid=0x0:0xe3bd965afeb65caf"],"When":"2022-11-14"},{"Name":"Jerry Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6OMg9SoN-VSjtB3-AtmhUrBhCZddv3XwoJHeD3sSb8mNzPWeK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"When you come to crystal mall, definitely don’t miss out on the small shops that’s been here for awhile, you know it’s good.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Paul Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVl2oVxJKLr_k_g4j5wg7lB9NsNfiBzRT5FNAPVPTrX-BeeOxpk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very classic Taiwanese style teppanyaki. Taste is good, and the price and portion are ok.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAjJTz7D1iHx-R_Y99PNJhitXzMBX35qThCom9\u0026fid=0x0:0xe3bd965afeb65caf"],"When":"2023-9-20"},{"Name":"Sergio Castillo Yrizales","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQlHUDJ-OTBNZsylpIVVwMPyYh9mYs7Db3rrT3JRNeiB_cLj0fqA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really tasty fried rice. Sadly they only accept cash. But the great taste is worthy 😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoncxi1pAzIa885tU8jQelGIPmTnxGQgh8bF4l\u0026fid=0x0:0xe3bd965afeb65caf"],"When":"2022-4-23"},{"Name":"Keep Breathing","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUC9see0g6ctnZ1neacK7EC_z289e1Wsri7b_LqU-hpW9QV4ww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Authentic local Taiwanese flavour, made by real Taiwanese chefs","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ryan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCDMUY42ah4aAgta84ssT2DYa3PFsR3r4fbxhBdcs3AXShIgTOYw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cozy little neighborhood restaurant serving up a variety of authentic Chinese dishes with great spice level. We ordered several dishes for lunch and enjoyed all of them. Staff are super friendly and speak both English and Chinese. Reasonable prices.

They have several parking spots behind the restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJN58ztKuhnGwBhEUhzb_D4id24SrgOlFN6zPo&fid=0x0:0x8a0a316a7b913677"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Panographix Image Services","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXs8ELIDCY4klFP3p13SV0-WiciXVsAEa0hXouSZH9NsC17yRqkiw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good quality. Some dishes look a little pricey, but the ingredients are all top notch. I tried the Uni and Shrimp Dumplings in soup and it was bang on. The Uni tasted fresh and the shrimp was fresh and bouncy, the broth was clean and made from scratch. You can tell by the shape of the dumplings that they are handmade and not previously frozen. All the dishes coming out looked amazing. The place was packed and the kitchen was spotless! The dumpling dishes are all reasonably priced.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObGb5Jn8LqJWOhKPaJOE7BA8UhUxi-b5OKQUA3&fid=0x0:0x8a0a316a7b913677"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Jamie Jin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKlepHCWdoqih1jl4dnAMo7ntd9I3m4VnkN__YLq5zodAqxuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very authentic Chinese home cooking food and the restaurant manager is a lovely lady. They have chefs from the North China (Xin Jiang 新疆，Si chuan四川，liao ning 辽宁)。

Recommended dishes and this is sufficient for two people:
Sweet and sour pork 锅包肉， this is the authentic and yummy Chinese style instead of the cheap western sweet and sour pork from Panda Express!

Stir fried pork with egg and black fungus 木须肉

House made pork with pickled Chinese cabbage dumplings 酸菜猪肉饺子, all the dumplings and buns are made in house with meat grounded in house too.

Restaurant is very clean and it’s a relatively small place and can hold about max 20 ppl. It gets busy during dinner time. It has street parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN44WsaKG4Mb1-BF3cICkCazuJjJscGd3YQEV7p&fid=0x0:0x8a0a316a7b913677"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"L C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0UvmmNv-LTP2kjLnvY4Tkp2-hsTp7MoElGKvEXR6urPb6QSXz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They deserve the high ratings. The shrimp wonton is awesome, as are the beef dumplings. The price is reasonable. Definitely recommend the Ma Hua, although it's quite big. Tried their signature pork dish in a delivery order and will try it again in-store. It’s a small cozy place, don’t suitable for large gatherings.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxcMU-8gqCbGDPKM3YyH9ZKayCUjonQP903Q4_&fid=0x0:0x8a0a316a7b913677"],"When":"2024-5-2"},{"Name":"C-live H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLf8Gw0zAUTAb4FMeWzfrzmYjSp8f2r3Lg9za-m1JISgeEP8A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been here many times. Exceptional chinese food, authentic with plenty of flavor in their dishes, rice and soups.
Have to say that while many of the pastries are delectable, a few of them (such as the dumplings) falls short with the low filling to wrap ratio.
The front of store lady is very nice and does her best to provide excellent service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Amnon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjcm2KnVvAXZsXO1Xw9a-BsRGj5-RmJ6nF12OqCF9XTomoPJ9CkA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cozy little restaurant with plenty of great food. Everything was served fresh and was absolutely delightful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOM16QXoKlDvwBSnDPmqvPn_Bwz3-62109YAFsY&fid=0x0:0x8a0a316a7b913677"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Ming","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGotxgv31aHvuF0A9tZbhCTgXDEmmc3pJGvvFFaP6upY8yxLZe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely love their dishes. We’ve been here twice. Love their beef fried rice, their shrimp dumplings and cold seasoned spicy chicken! Every bite feels homemade food. Fresh ingredients, nothing oily or heavy. They are all in large portion too.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Yan Jie Pan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWtJgsuhwRId0t1MOzd5ywiIXfrBfIFDTo7UODkLUu9At3EXtegw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered from the delivery app and I go pick up myself. The restaurant is not too big, however it’s very clean, which gives me a good first impression. The lady at the front desk is so kind, she keeps apologizing for letting me wait for a bit, even though I told her don’t worry it’s okay 👌🏻
Food is amazing!! Especially sweet and sour pork👍🏻The portion is so big that my boyfriend and I even save the rest for next day lunch🤣
We will definitely visit again, try some more dishes!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEeW6Jk0RFwVSbRBU979kM1SaI6xGZQwGqeKY0&fid=0x0:0x8a0a316a7b913677"],"When":"2023-2-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Melissa Albano","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJHEx4g1_Qmx297PBmzL-VHqJXywquOlItQDaqeAmjGdDu1eQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm absolutely loving Basha! The servers are incredibly kind, especially Aziz - he's exceptionally friendly, goes above and beyond, and truly provides top-notch service! Plus, the food is EXCELLENT and the portions are generously big! Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2VNXLmxFXz4iHd2imyL6kBmvleGJQiCl0eCl9&fid=0x0:0xb415152e4fdbcb53"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"Micahel Rupisan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJm8I4ki07gu4RRJY-_8s1XDFKf7mDmzv8CFmkU0_OIQr7POA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good and tasty food.  Good portions that could be shared if you are a moderate eater.  Very accommodating servers who gives you option if needed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDXxJOxbh4hVbuE_0dEkvkh6OWY_HUxFaN3nAs&fid=0x0:0xb415152e4fdbcb53"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Alexa Love","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIRyxk7sfm3OPU9JtxS536XsKHV42RFY-PqVVLiGC8U8BwuFw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been coming here for a couple of years and think it's the best shawama in the area. The food is healthy and made onsite (kudos to the woman in the back who's always preparing and bringing out more salads, etc.!). A nice change from typical mall food.
Favourite dish is the chicken shawarma salad plate. You get to choose four salads such as tabbouleh, fattoush, dolmades, and so on. I always add the pickled turnips yum :) Posted a photo but it's hard to see - the salads are underneath all the chicken.
The ladies who work there are kind and always smile and wave at my 1- year old daughter.
Hope they're there for a long time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVFR1dNFamAjytOhK-u9ig3cLg7EBOCvUQTzLc&fid=0x0:0xb415152e4fdbcb53"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"Monica Nguyen Ho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZBeMwSkt7l1K2HVfyeAFOoXFwnBn78IKEly42V3HGsujhC8gu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I love eating here whenever I have a work break or drag my bf here. Plates are very filling and I love their garlic potatoes. Just a small box filled with garlic potatoes is very filling. I will say thought the package they use for the wraps is disappointing. I held it in my hand for like 5min and when I was opening it the wrapping kept sticking to the burrito. Not worth getting a burrito but I hope they change the packaging then maybe I will try it again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_UAODAHOH5GMqD_Xs7c4hI6obu6lnu8vhBtGf&fid=0x0:0xb415152e4fdbcb53"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"Ehsan Ansari Dezfouli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBuctSfCC7I6o7Wmf5_NwMSKZW4VU-hHdVx9puXgtFqHggGVM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a great experience at this restaurant. The food was amazing, and the staff were incredibly kind and friendly. I asked for some extra sauce, and they brought it to me without charging anything, which was such a nice gesture. Overall, I was very satisfied and would highly recommend this place. Also, there was a staff member named Aziz who was super kind and helpful—his kindness made my visit even better!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"rebar shop","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLi-WnKVVM8zu7bgmQ74-UAVfXaM0869Jr2o5stbQxfSBLU_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was so delicious 😍it was my first time , and aziz who made my food  he was so friendly and professional definitely recommend👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0FDnP6qVJrvyZ0UHkiENrmZ9dd-lWXAv4E0iq&fid=0x0:0xb415152e4fdbcb53"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Rico Alviar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVGLImwjFF8kTaFeYox_LojakdBdiQSt1WToxt5OA4H-3Lg5gs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great service! I was served by Aziz who was very friendly and the service was prompt. Whenever I'm craving swarma I go to this place. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPz0omV_5ycr1QA4HHS3-hIyGTxXyWbWBZPZbwc&fid=0x0:0xb415152e4fdbcb53"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"syed jabir (jabi)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUP9nX8GVPPrANlU6g7-R_R2dmHT7JuRB3X3vHIrCFep-sUXsRU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"It was taste 4/10, but the chicken had alot of fats. Its doesn’t look quality chicken though","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwBLBgv6WSw6ioNJW0h6iGqyeJqeV3pQrYyTlV&fid=0x0:0xb415152e4fdbcb53"],"When":"2024-9-12"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Marley Mckenzie cook","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5n4XAwgV26WrtDQFOwKexjEHrP8ok0rq2RztGWysEOnM29r4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Avalon chocolate milk is one of my favourites even thought it’s expensive. First time checking out the Avalon retail store / restaurant, food isn’t bad but isn’t the best either, I was hoping it was going to be very good with all the hype but was disappointing. The cranberry sandwich was good but the soup was mediocre at best. I ordered the soup of the day and was told it was chowder but I don’t know what it was.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIeacDaRgm4fGxiMFBb1FjkVT0ehX9KtO3wWc&fid=0x0:0x9989efaf569f1934"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Jenn Barnett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzqUWXbP6zEojwPISobVMwfU_yJ6gYFAzXSwx30ZfFRB-hR2aprw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You can purchase milk, eggs, ice cream and all sorts of dairy products. Also bread, cold drinks and snacks. There are daily lunch specials. Plus coffee and muffins.
The staff are friendly.
Plus seating inside and outside.
A real gem in Burnaby","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOV-1oHvZzP1lvYa94mi_6fjn0HnZEGp-h89i_A&fid=0x0:0x9989efaf569f1934"],"When":"2023-7-2"},{"Name":"D M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIuH80L8_wM6G7Idu7S0eKOFlHvGcslndhZ413VSdhWvBY9nw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They should really consider, lowering their price a small sandwich with bare minimum ingredients and a side of small bag of chips with a drink should not be 17$ !  Very over priced ! And to think they ask for tip on top of that is insane.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0uB2KyLwozflrhdHHOE8KGcmXe8WsnkAalRbO&fid=0x0:0x9989efaf569f1934"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"J Chow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5nTjAm8gcoM8KEoMc5sPDIPLKdZEtk_2xDDFiiYwdxxyp1qQ7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Honest and affordable food served here! They're not winning awards for innovation or amazing luxury ingredients but the simplicity is part of the charm. You're just eating in a cozy store. Kitchen is open and people are friendly! My chicken pasta special was great on a rainy afternoon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMoY2ExAsBLCrBRpThTFPEIXp1Ndvd5gWDguPgn&fid=0x0:0x9989efaf569f1934"],"When":"2023-11-13"},{"Name":"Y. Cherski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-7SLlKKRW0Rqcp9wRXFlvt6gbh0rtI7PMIroLgxETtGiPwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After walking along the Fraser River in Burnaby Fraser Foreshore Park, we decided to have a quick bite but quickly realized that being in an office/industrial area, we don't have much choice. Luckily, Old Farmhouse Kitchen was still open and very close. Since we came forty minutes before closing, I didn't get to try food items I was interested in since they ran out of them. We still got a few things, including vanilla milkshake and latte, to highlight Avalon's main product, which is milk. I tried Avalon produce before, so I was delighted with both items. The milkshake was simply perfect and not too sweet. The interior is pretty cool and cozy with lots of great decorations. We ended up getting some milk produce to go. Overall it was a great experience, and I can see myself coming back. I only wish this joint was located somewhere more accessible.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0t5eUGwQjR3t3Mx5aFApNwoYDr2Of-iPuf2aW&fid=0x0:0x9989efaf569f1934"],"When":"2019-12-2"},{"Name":"Tami A.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlJNR4R1uitr082NvPNP_ir27Y4tUaJxwY3uezJWRMn0aqL2I-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice cozy little restaurant with fresh local food and Avalon Dairy products for sale on site. Good daily specials, and an outside patio area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMiQwe2BJaQv_-nPdoL5noBdjqUlxuRTz1leYyK&fid=0x0:0x9989efaf569f1934"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"Rae Nason","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLrCw7M-pseb2AZi8wT9Qnwdaq2jr_70LDDM9v2l_e5mRJVMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ok people coffee is good when it's hot lol but I've never had a chef salad with zero veggies 😅 come on guys","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMT4_mS_RBABUYp3TPxQPPNixli_IMB9rkvkSPC&fid=0x0:0x9989efaf569f1934"],"When":"2024-6-7"},{"Name":"Vee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLNqo7GsNEXpPBVCqGGWsNLS6BGEH4QfuZNVx2RABtSfESedQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The cafe is located near the industrial area and hence a little out of the way. It is near the Fraser river though, so a meal before or after a walk by the river is always fun!

The servers were friendly and food was served promptly. The food seemed fresh and I also bought a chocolate cookie. It was great! It wasn’t too sweet; just right for my taste buds!

I’m not sure if there are discounts for the diary products sold here, but they do have a variety: milk, yogurt, ice cream, and even homemade soup! I purchased one to try and it was savoury, but it is still best to have it in store.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdnNOk8kE6n_zCpEbhVLa8N8gKvnvIFUSL0Ox2&fid=0x0:0x9989efaf569f1934"],"When":"2019-8-25"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"erik Benson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ94N-QOr_BWgBD5Q6_UBMu06S3r9gH2fIa5R_R3LQsBuK4Og=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Come hungry. Quirky spot with a fantastic old school trucker diner feel. Gigantic portions and great tasting food. Prepare to take half home. Had the German Breakfast, which is huge, the deluxe comes with schnitzel as well. Order for three, feed eight kind of portions. Love this spot, come early. Jammed by 9am.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNR2tNGkpDepIZ1zBiNuqR97LjUzshQ0mzkPxs-&fid=0x0:0x39f3b68fe8fb837a"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Carmen Aboytes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCCLFKJlS62-34BUpujZzDsaZV9yysTxPBmk8fhCY7OoETeMyS6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You definitely get great value for your money here. The portions are generous, and the flavors are spot on. The eggs are especially fantastic—perfectly cooked every time. Overall, everything about this place hits the mark, making it a solid choice for a satisfying mea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN20XvTYn0qWSbHYbaJmwaZnFEYFc8L9t_cGOfL&fid=0x0:0x39f3b68fe8fb837a"],"When":"2024-8-26"},{"Name":"Celina Arenillo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLPvcNqjpmtihcb5J8miFlC4lw0H-EdaSQUtLM4u3kh0_GMHA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is the second time I had breakfast here and always a good experience. Located near the industrial zone of Burnaby. I love its retro vibe and generous breakfast portions. We ordered the breakfast poutine and Al’s breakfast plate. Always an excellent choice!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOMubpl-TfdGHXnE5IKJhgnl0Zd5o8f3ENNS-I&fid=0x0:0x39f3b68fe8fb837a"],"When":"2024-11-8"},{"Name":"Arjun Tyagi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWopm7CB27Brsn2nZf_ZcGMYA1rC2xZn0gFS2Ev_B4zUk8mX8MoIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely a home run! Awesome place in terms of food quality and bang for buck. We went around 11:45 AM as a group of 3 knowing it’s usually busy and the wait was about 35 mins for food but they were very clear upfront to warn us and time flew by as we had our coffee and chatted while they prepped. The wait was worth it.

Service was friendly and inviting, A+ to all the service staff. Atmosphere in my opinion was as expected, it’s an old school feel diner in an industrial park location. It was clean and comfortable but don’t expect 5 star hotel fancy ambiance it’s also not priced like that. Their food portion in a fancy location would easily be jacked up 50% or more. I ordered the Spanish omelette with a coffee and it was wonderful.

Parking is relatively easy to find if not right in front in the nearby side street 1-2 mins walk max away.

I would definitely come back here again and can understand why this place is so raved about.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPc8F-IflaH4h0uILXHq9iSzNpaC9w3r-73ShOG&fid=0x0:0x39f3b68fe8fb837a"],"When":"2024-6-8"},{"Name":"Tak Takeda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHDzw0zgUPlMuWFfM4Ed1egt9R6dPYNT_uSKXitKf_7aBGgDbLQg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This place is a no frills, large portions, good value, hole-in-the-wall type setting in the middle of an industrial area. We had the pork sandwich and mushroom omelette and both iron sizes were generous, including the complimentary side items. In particular, the fruit salad for the pork sandwich was a lot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyEdQYlKna_DuIPnlP92HirJQud3Vg9MOh8moa&fid=0x0:0x39f3b68fe8fb837a"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Chloe Rachel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgExGuK1W-XgQc1tPnrQlqQkWxCTaNhdz977uVTTY3zjpsAzs-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice family run diner tucked away in the industrial part of South Burnaby. Heard from a friend that it gets very busy around lunch! The portions are massive so the dishes are good for sharing (or for leftovers). Two of us split a German Breakfast. The plate came with eggs and cheese (their version of scrambled is more like a pan-fried omelette texture), ham, bacon, sausage, hash browns, toast, and a couple of small orange slices. The menu said it came with a potato pancake, but we unfortunately didn't see it on our plate.

The food was tasty and satisfying for brunch! The restaurant is very much self-serve as diners pay for drinks like coffee, but it's at the front counter for you to get yourself. Carafes of cold water are in a fridge for you to help yourself to as well. It was a neat experience, and definitely worth the price for food. Simple, casual and affordable!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAVR9pMb2i05BEmyInsSb5wgGFpXlOcRcAeZcT&fid=0x0:0x39f3b68fe8fb837a"],"When":"2024-4-6"},{"Name":"Grim Eater","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6PTwu2hn6AlzWUp8iqwg0vO72Zt0HGJTxU9PiA6j2bZPnT9A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Before getting down to the review by itself, just wow, what a fantastic place to eat breakfast/lunch! Fraser Park restaurant performed amazingly for the 3 factors I will be evaluating this establishment. For those that are reading this review, i base my factors on Food, Service, and Atmosphere (eating environment).

Firstly, the environment upon entering this establishment was interesting in my opinion. Parking was semi easy because the parking lot in front of the restaurant is PACKED with cars. Luckily there is a park nearby which allows parking. When entering the restaurant, we were greeted with a canteen like setting where you order up front, but they wilI bring food to your table. An interesting concept for sure.

When it came down to food, i ordered the deluxe german breakfast. The presentation was nice but as a warning, the sizes here are HUGE, so you certainly will get a bang for your buck here. The food was satisfying to eat, especially the schnitzel, omlette, the sausage, and potatoes. The schnitzel with gravy was savoury yet rich which activated all my tastebuds. The omlette tasted alright, but with the cheese, became a stable part of the dish. Sausage tasted great as it was nice and savoury, along with the properly fried potatoes. Overall was very satisfied with what I ate.

Simply amazing place to eat your breakfast or lunch. Great portion sizes and the taste for the food proved to amplify my dining experience. From the schnitzel to the omlette, it tasted amazing, which for generic breakfast food such as this, surprised me, as I thought the food would be subpar at best. I highly recommend this establishment to friends and family. Simply a must try and you will be hooked!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmpPpB35XlA-WXgLnQgI4ySavN1OZTKkxeL_5_&fid=0x0:0x39f3b68fe8fb837a"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Minji Co","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0cW7yUIGQwxewtq2t91XH-PweiJmGMnXmQUWs9lKXUa5ZbKC6vQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Set in an industrial area so it has a hole in the wall feel. Portions are huge so it’s absolutely a great value for your dollars but I find the food on the greasy side.

The park is nearby so it’s good to go for a walk after a big meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOG2FuurlbexLTAoE7z28fGQ9vodVFNofGWre7J&fid=0x0:0x39f3b68fe8fb837a"],"When":"2024-6-20"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Danny Yan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLRPWWKcVdRHeoB-9RWRILXmiR2bwZnV4LcEulNAzluWALah6_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finally had a chance to come and try these guys out.  Portion sizes were super big.  One bowl was enough for two people.  They definitely live up to their name.  Not only were the portions super, the flavours were super as well.  This place is on my top 10 list for sure when you’re looking for something quick and cheap to eat.  Service was super as well.  The ladies were are super nice.  Definitely coming back and would recommend them to everyone who enjoys pho and other Vietnamese dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOauvKQj45PIQEElK0pnoQHMxnxqR7z2ojvZRu7&fid=0x0:0x16c6e5a6e68786f4"],"When":"2024-11-6"},{"Name":"Andy Chiang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6Ytd6jvLjiUIKjc2DLdidLuwgHbgPUD4GPhFuPOLEoqlZ2vbh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Newer location on Kingsway that features the same pho as their original location. Good portion size, and clean interior. Has a bit of a plain and sterile feel to it, maybe it’s the newness or the lighting. Pricing is similar to other pho places, so it’s on the same level as most places.

Taste wise, it’s a solid bowl of pho, and one of the better ones in Burnaby. You can’t go wrong with pho, and they do make a tasty one. They also had a free spring roll promotion at the time, which was a nice bonus.

If you’re lucky, you can get a free parking spot right outside the establishment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNKsxJDIPrdzy1oOBnAFLlTwmI3y4haBOwiDAO&fid=0x0:0x16c6e5a6e68786f4"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Hillbillytc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV833YeKMKJfxtYeKhRHVRSrikZoFOcCapKBwyEFBOnxiCMeXAZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The atmosphere is very plain. The servers are alright.  The portions are big but the chicken a little bland, the beef Pho was good. A few GF options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7ZdIQda7S8quOSlUOrJNYVNjLjaHgVHMhLwdB&fid=0x0:0x16c6e5a6e68786f4"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"D D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVn-HmKGkiEXpPYEJdaFnX-Wk9npBuMky8Sv8ZSJcapzQOOPiN3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Probably the best bang for your buck pho in Burnaby.  Generous portion for the price and tasty pho broth as well as their spring rolls and calamari. Noodles are always perfect aldente to start.  Definitely will be our go to pho when we are in the hood.  Service is fast and friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFFp-7xFJrOF37pJLpL8uLk7NTCRqRehXe91yX&fid=0x0:0x16c6e5a6e68786f4"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Daehyun Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIHxxz0drxXNhxABHkARE53of9eUDqUYMpgMl7k7eCkK24jniG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered house special large. It was perfect.
I recommend to everyone to visit. My co-workers love this place, too.

Any time i am near edmonds, royal oak, metro town area, i visit this restaurant.

Thanks for the great food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjGykkj0q1r0lXEmFD9NRffzQndzYXjFZqa0Nj&fid=0x0:0x16c6e5a6e68786f4"],"When":"2024-11-21"},{"Name":"Nickesha Henry","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUuMDJXQowfORHvvuiotEanLM4k-viwoYMXhC3RIkm6GAXWcc7_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food is really good. Portions are large. Staff is helpful and kind. Had a good experience. There is nothing special about the ambiance but maybe that means they focus on the food. Overall good restaurant. Ordered the deep fried squid, beef stew with rice noodles and pork and prawn vermicelli Bowl. Everything was good, but the noodles of the vermicelli bowl was kind of dry.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJLjk9KQrzIftL8lYXGvZgL9isJK6g3Qln2d2e&fid=0x0:0x16c6e5a6e68786f4"],"When":"2024-6-1"},{"Name":"Elephant Bea","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmbTkWbvkzq9BEURa4cDUNDp_dqnBpyYXDtKQjP6X4hyrXm3Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great portions, fantastic broth and tender rare beef, the perfect combination for a good bowl of pho. We love their tea, which cuts the greasy from deep-fried food. We ordered two bowls of pho, one bham-mi, and five pieces of deep-fried wontons. We got one free dish: a deep-fried pork spring roll. We will mark this location as our must-go pho restaurant in Burnaby.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcBqBWAevoaIzJ-uW8xOpzeBf9okwNjmhP0pgU&fid=0x0:0x16c6e5a6e68786f4"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Richard W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ399ImpSbV08xvsGTm2EnPcmRBxLU-x5ZXIikuplhPN6243A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We ordered three items, Pho Noodles (I think it's house special since it got everything except beef balls), Bun Bo Hue and Grilled Chicken/Pork rice platter.  Their Pho Noodles are one of the best in my opinion but the rest are so so.  We got 3 pork spring rolls for free from a promo (free spring roll any order more than $20).  Spring rolls are ok as well.  If I do come back I'll definitely come back for their pho.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWlCwQ4r15yxU5vO4EhovU3MDRIUrT8Yp9tGZk&fid=0x0:0x16c6e5a6e68786f4"],"When":"2024-5-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Absolut YVR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAKKuJBhDjQ2yvrY0bCIOExStNeMzrxg1x0ksL6cHk4jqCNjYH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time to try this restaurant featuring fish hot pot.
The restaurant is bright and fresh, and looks very clean.  Comfortable seating.  Servers were welcoming and friendly.  Told the server this was our first time trying their restaurant.  She gave us a quick rundown. We decided on one of their recommended items. She confirmed with us the spiciness. Good came out very fast.  The presentation was nice. The temperature was hot,  and  came with free refillable rice.  Fish and sauerkraut and a couple side items.  It was very tasty.  Apparently they have lunch specials.  We will try that sometime later.  Overall, it was a very pleasant dinner experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNh2lRem-tIhaYtt0qN4kCy0E3B6KiiAM4wKHht&fid=0x0:0x6dbfa498a7f181cf"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Audrey T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVt7NSeCmrDxjN6eGFiHdOku-giePvd1JuUbLyAEp6odBtHY6vv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yum! Located on the side of crystal mall, this restaurant was nice and bright. Highly recommend the top 1 best seller, the large laotan snakehead fish ($37.95). The large can be shared between two people and you can pick 4 side dishes to be added. With dine in, you also get unlimited rice! The snakehead has a really good texture and better than basa. We also got the tomato sauce one too, and it’s quite nice but we enjoyed the classic spicy sauerkraut one more. Just a small note that the bowl looks bigger and a deeper than it is, but it’s still a good size. For dessert, the deep fried durian balls were really delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHuKYmmn40d_ZmTOBwG6CHYl9ChsX1k7VDTIl7&fid=0x0:0x6dbfa498a7f181cf"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"Shibe Life","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUC4Mb1DHizRVJ60Sg_sm7ibJx8EQiAVjPSsfgIJdoHWmHYbUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"PSA: they charge extra if you pay with a credit card (like most places in Chinese restaurants so they can avoid the fee). Bring cash or debit card if you want to avoid this

I  like the disposable chopsticks that they have is very nice and fancy. The fish soup was sour and spicy and super yummy. We got the value combo meal for two people which had two drinks, popcorn chicken four topping and a really big soup with two bowls of rice..

Super full. I like their rice prob their rice cooker is elite or smt. This is a popular chain in China for a reason. You also order online thru the QR code. Drinks were also good but wish I got to try the milk tea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2zpALM5ZdJNP0nBKEzZ8iGB4158SGyqzvB2sr&fid=0x0:0x6dbfa498a7f181cf"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"wayne chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUDu17QYm_OR8HwmuWE5xqw7xSOV1Q340EVgZ0ykLpPzhvGuce6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The Princess Tomato broth was very flavorful. Went well with the unlimited rice. Quick friendly service with comfortable seating. Felt could've given a little more of the toppings. The portion of fish was decent for the price.
Wouldn't mind going back to try the other flavors of broth.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJc000tUZ0oivzvfc-UdbRreqLd7vlSJ1BSSHp&fid=0x0:0x6dbfa498a7f181cf"],"When":"2024-6-2"},{"Name":"Jane","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIdHD0BpWR4l-A565iaZTCjMrYY13n_Owo3lZPpuoKw7A4MKOg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had laotan sauerkraut here and absolutely love it.! It taste really good, good price for the portion with unlimited rice as well. The place is so cozy, the service is fast and good. My first time visit this place and really love it. Definitely recommend..! 👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-B7FlcUtTya0pFtceRx2GF4d9zXF-6PY_Aqkw&fid=0x0:0x6dbfa498a7f181cf"],"When":"2024-7-3"},{"Name":"Howard Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNKqcq42PiBJN4bS67Y7TA8O0IBqU96MNwi0GdoKWfDTI8fEKh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Giving 4 stars for the food quality and staff.

The food tasted good but the portion was quite small. The bowl looks huge but it's actually shallow.

The unlimited rice catch is great for rice lover.

The credit card surcharge was a surprise, it should have been mentioned at the beginning.

Staff were informative and friendly with good attitudes.

Overall experience was ok, but feels like the restaurant was cheaping out in certain areas which does not bring a good impression for your brand.

And those friends and family 5 star reviews... 😅","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuNR0Z4duZCSO6IzQGMOfcxIsRMJoRivndC6j2&fid=0x0:0x6dbfa498a7f181cf"],"When":"2023-5-10"},{"Name":"Brenda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwbIVWnhkgkW1vVSPc7Hi7rNeih1-rfkmik-FZ0TEby-aDTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I went here for a lunch few weeks ago. I've never tried hot and sour fish so I was excited to try this place.

We ordered large size of Hot Onion Boiled Fish with Veggies ($37.95) with 4 toppings. I only saw 2 toppings for large sized pot which were broccoli and sweet potato vermicelli. It was strange as the menu clearly said 4 toppings can be added for large and 2 toppings for small. Soup was nicely seasoned, but it was too greasy.

Food was good. Portion was big enough for us as well. I had to give 2 stars because staff only added 2 toppings for our food. Price was overly priced as well. I can easily buy a frozen kit from T&T or Price Smart to make one for myself instead of paying $40 for this.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Logan Makohoniuk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKK6x5aqZXjLf4qgJxzu30IJ1A-hmFl_9tJPndFpOneixcZlUu=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the most delicious soup ever. I have been coming here for over a year now and can't get enough of the Fruity Lemon Fish Soup and their outstanding unlimited rice.

The store is bright and clean and vibrant. The staff are friendly, fast, and helpful. The food portions are generous! They are the whole package.

I would give them 10 stars if I could.","Images":null,"When":""}]
