user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sayani Chowdhury","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjD34o3DB1ZpRQF82FIyI7sLdx6aLu5umEaHn-Fepbek1_K2P0gQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time getting their poke bowl and it was absolutely delicious. I got the Build Your Own Bowl with one scoop of the spicy tuna and one scoop of the spicy salmon with rice and their iced green tea. They are generous with their toppings and it’s truly worth the price. Great quality on the fish and the edamame. Will definitely be back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIIbyGAn4dOgi9vhONdwM52PFL69uX2zm3zhzJ&fid=0x0:0xd578361c2fe014e2"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Mariella Flores","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUNXS9vGNw9Sms90jDZgQcd4V6NCX7-24dd3rDi-ELIfzFMYb_i=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I wish I had discovered this place sooner! One of the best pokes I’ve had that is very generous with their portions. The staff specifically in Metrotown location are very friendly and make sure the food is to your liking! I highly recommend for the amount of food you get, the price is so worth it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsKKK36nHbCqBp67O9z5c990cerLw9sDzJ_qtM&fid=0x0:0xd578361c2fe014e2"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"eileen chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJfy8j6h40wTj9SdCZNLYGr3JieOiTRhn1j3JC3UlURe1pDfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely takeaway joint inside Metrotown. Read quite a few positive reviews, so I decided to give the BYOB option a try. The staff is very friendly and patient, specially Mimi. She’s built me a wonderfully balanced bowl of 3-scoops deliciousness that surpassed my expectations. Love it. 😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4H5ZCQZfxLD4WOsebHXlb6eiO36LQRlMa8IbO&fid=0x0:0xd578361c2fe014e2"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Olivia Chu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdHN_Ck4nOCGCfBsKegZLicBhnSLZPhBEfvKsIpVIp_-VGj75h=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Me and my boyfriend came here on Sunday to enjoy because you guys have incredible reviews. We ordered 1 mega box and ordered extra stuffs, and our bill was 34$. Honestly, it was our first time enjoying poke in Vancouver so we were very excited. But right after eating, we both had severe stomach pains, followed by diarrhea and finally vomiting. I intended not to write this review, because I once had food poisoning and it went away after 1 night. But now it's Monday night, and our symptoms are getting worse and worse. We can’t sleep and super tired. Please check the quality of the food before you serve it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6cU9KKVR-i_-v1mU1S963j9qWHd_GdJ6J2dAn&fid=0x0:0xd578361c2fe014e2"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"flora michaels","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVojFCE6b92CJF1RU9ui1CNJDiq8EnokOR8w8LvgBk-ch0F1p1J=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"i love to build my own bowl!! its nice to have poke after a long day of shopping! the ingredients are always really tasty and fresh and i like the variety they have of sauces and marinades compared to other poke places. staff are always really friendly too! and the rewards program is nice!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPK1f1xbuyZkLbFxzqFnL0l1_sVb9yTdA8uG5YG&fid=0x0:0xd578361c2fe014e2"],"When":"2024-4-30"},{"Name":"cecilia Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVT-FsOI_0s0bhkXZ2cvPF-a6Skxd884qLzJuwdNCIvOs2hCtE1=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was very impressed with the server, Ella. She was very helpful and courteous. Definitely worth coming over for my lunch today. Will continue to come over for my lunch. Ella is an employee that will be an asset to keep. Enjoy her good service at Metrotown, Steve Poke👍❤️","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chloe Rachel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgExGuK1W-XgQc1tPnrQlqQkWxCTaNhdz977uVTTY3zjpsAzs-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Purchased their spring special to go, which included 2 build-your-own bowls (1-scoop) and 2 drinks for $29. The poke itself was good, as diners have the ability to choose from a variety of toppings (no limit for the "regular" toppings). The amount of vegetables included is fair, and the bowls overall were solid. Standard toppings like imitation crab, wakame, pineapple, edamame, and a variety of onions. The most unique complimentary topping was pickled radish. I did appreciate that you could get plain fish if you didn't want a pre-marinated option.

We had a service issue which caused us to be at the store for much longer than expected. It became clear early on we were being helped by a new staff member. They had to re-do my bowl after I asked for their gluten-friendly Ponzu sauce option, and they initially used the regular sauce on the side. They were unsure if it was gluten-friendly or not, but used it anyways until it came to light later when they consulted with another employee. We also had to repeat multiple times that we wanted all the complimentary toppings aside from the ginger. In the bowl re-do, I watched the staffer almost include ginger so had to step in vocally as a reminder.

For one of our bowls, we asked if they could include a bit more fish, as it didn't look like a full scoop. Earlier, a more experienced female staffer told us that the fish they use is fresh and they don't always leave them out in the open. They indicated that if we ordered the non-spicy fish, they would get it fresh for our bowls (likely from the back). Yet, the staffer helping us was essentially scraping the nearly empty bins for fish and therefore, their one scoop wasn't really a "full" scoop. When watching the other employees prepare bowls for others, we noticed they were more generous with their protein scoops. While the employee did apologize a couple of times for the bowl re-do, it was awkward for us as we didn't want to feel like we had to watch them prepare it, but it ended up being kind of necessary. There was also a lack of urgency because at that point, two other employees were building bowls for new customers. Someone, perhaps the store manager, did step in at one point to inform us of the toppings which were gluten-friendly (or not).

Our first Steve's Poke Bar experience was an alright one! The fruit tea was delicious, and the poke itself was good. The service was not as positive due to the mishaps, but we'll probably be back as the regular prices are affordable. We also signed up for their rewards program using our phone number, although we weren't quite sure what it entails when we provided our number.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdZR7GIBP6txxQK4KAObuh22ntSLRMKcGBqJIE&fid=0x0:0xd578361c2fe014e2"],"When":"2024-4-1"},{"Name":"Dina H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIfsq97R4sgDIOe7gesF05bhBwqVTm4mfLDvrvgUPwpnj6y7A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good portions. Tasty sauce but the Ahi tuna had a little too much rendering it too salty.  Not the nicest location ( in a noisy mall) and the tables needed cleaning.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Uncle Willy's Buffet
descriptions: All-you-can-eat spot offering self-service Asian & Western favorites for lunch, dinner & brunch.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sinyo ganteng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVK6DhObLW3StVcJ_e9Ph42mdmAq5cSoW-d536hao-jSu7WAn8I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Before food, let's review the atmosphere,  it's classic 90's restaurant. I am glad I was able to come again after years, since my college times. the music, food, and restaurant layouts were real in the 90s. service is okay, you grab your own clean plate and get the food. Food is okay, their rotisserie chicken very juicy and tender. their famous fried chicken still taste the same way before, not great but undeniably very addictive. Their rice mix with lentil souce is on my 2nd plate. Tomatoes soup is ok, not the chicken soup. rest was less appetizing.  Love their jello mix with apple souce and ice cream, got 2 bowl of them. Hope the restaurant keeps going strong as it is a good cheap buffet and good momorable place  to go. Free refill drink.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNH1X1fc5DJEEQSvcp2gKIaKF5U_0qxdsOHerUx&fid=0x0:0xd09308e657f4f441"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"Heather Chatterton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL7IfedKSn_eOIC8drcusP2ZP2fmQV5HK2K0Y50okRIFlF0Xg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant is just Great😃😋✅️✅️✅️ We REdiscovered this buffet recently, and were VERY pleased with the experience✅️✅️ They have a great atmosphere and have undergone really nice bright renovations. It is CLEAN, large, and, with PLENTY of tables- GREAT for a party or celebration- as well as a place to just plain enjoy your meal!!  You can see a takeout menu on the wall also- here in my 3rd photo along-with VERY fair prices! They have Christmas, Thanksgiving, etc, celebration meals and the MENUS CHANGE DAILY! The food is always hot and tastey! Price is depending on what day- around 24.99 for adults, less for seniors and children WEEKDAYS,  and 25.99 on the WEEKEND-for ALL YOU CAN EAT buffet! We had  this time, really tasty choices- sliced pork, curry chicken, ROAST beef, chowmein, Spring rolls, perogies, excellent gravy, salads, condiments, frenchfries, corn, lasagna, different kinds of  juicy tasty chicken-fried, baked, roasted,  macaroni, mashed potatoes, deserts, ice cream, and SO MUCH MORE!✅️. You can always get take out buffet items home-menu in pictures!  Take a look at the value, choices, and amount you have for the prices- AND the food quality and taste is there❤️! Friday nights, for instance, they have a Sushi chef come and make a few varieties- alongside the other choices of buffet items there! GREAT home tasting foods😁. We ARE going back- SO much to offer! Nice, friendly, attentive staff✅️✅️. They were out tidying, and refilling as soon as an item needed replenishing. I cannot say enough - GREAT experience😋! You aren't hurried even! Please try for YOURself!!😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLUHpe8eZ6NTsnNCxwFVssT-7HwMzQjezUiihG&fid=0x0:0xd09308e657f4f441"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"TS OS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrxJ8Fjd3bGSI8mWbF186RbFWyg_DW73VTS3OIkFaxPfXFBEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Back in my younger days, there were more locations and these uncle Willy’s were popular choice for family night out. The place still offers good value especially at lunch price and if you are a big eater. Food aren’t going to wow you but average or slightly above average dishes will welcome you. Give this old school place a try if you are nostalgic like I was.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_VG-XzeDnIeCNCB96eSoZr44Jrs2TH5M9QjbA&fid=0x0:0xd09308e657f4f441"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Frognotfound","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJH1zUHhKWpUzz2ASW5ouJa7eGiDAIHLxz6tMm2GUCaC2kP3Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came here for a late dinner. Everything was fresh and deliciously made. The food prepared was absolutely perfect,from the quality to the texture to the taste. Definitely would recommend this place to eat at.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPN-3ISQewdluvFJ_mvfoxiFE63MTzCdJ14Grn8&fid=0x0:0xd09308e657f4f441"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Louise Boilevin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrbB57nz9izpshPwn7yH-SAdWr6iO_LJBZM25eopW2F0ZElrXPDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ive been enjoying coming here since late   90s  , its like one of only uncle willys buffets in the country remaining  ,  lots of seating areas and comfy booths ,  decent verity  its nothing super fancy like the casino buffets  ,  the verity is bit more better at dinner times here and this place is ideal for large families  aswell, my personal favorite is the fish tacos , chowmain ,ice cream   . Location is on metrotown mall  property  on the north east corner   .....I wished we still had the buffets we had in metro Vancouver like in the 80s 90s early 2000s  those were awesome buffet days in city and very good  for families and people's budgets too .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlFuwGTuA1a1BqBczVHnB3XhmSU2dEiP5qbScq&fid=0x0:0xd09308e657f4f441"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"Riddhi Loladia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocImighxSgff1MIlyfN936r-Mh_X7KdPqBsiGSGe2mNqIfWWBYg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved the FOOD ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️
The food had a lot of options to try if it's your first time. However, I would skip a few items next time. It was so much worth at 18.99 per person.
I tried some dishes and especially loved their desserts, coffee and soft serve. Add some soft serve to your coffee, it tastes good.
And surprisingly, they added Indian mixed veg curry which is next to the dessert plate in the photo, being an Indian, I can say it was super delicious and authentic. Also it had unlimited pop with so many options.

Give this restaurant a try if you have a big appetite.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_RxX7C44KyRPesZqtoSgA8lY3GvgZBAD6zlPC&fid=0x0:0xd09308e657f4f441"],"When":"2024-2-14"},{"Name":"Dennis Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1ydxNyydUVOcNs3SPifSL_abf6Hx3br_8HARHfEFgTdExwywX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Came here to feel nostalgic. What I got in the end was horrible stomach pains that ruined my night.

The bad: food quality, variety, cleanliness, value
The good: none","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9a2loVKkFX_LGPydTDPTqoVTUQtJMd2ncOYwd&fid=0x0:0xd09308e657f4f441"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"Peter Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjFHpMfr2lFzpF8LvaoCh0yxlwbevy7_F6KFcqn7xzMqEEB9ZK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place. The food is very good for the price. Obviously not baccanal buffet , but its hot, fresh, the chicken is very tender, and the noodles flavorful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTSdLo7vHyBhfbAl2Tb3owYetsh8b0gUMTXjM-&fid=0x0:0xd09308e657f4f441"],"When":"2024-10-23"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Gaurang Dave","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxuezn2NW81-B_EXY_rhkxprXWU2Nxco_hq87UaeexCvTuNUBXzw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best, authentic maharashtrian restaurants in the Vancouver area.  The food quality, presentation, and spice level will take you back to the streets of Mumbai! We tried many things but Madala Vada Pav and Misal Pav were our favourites. If I could give more than 5 stars I would. Must Try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPO7NIBz7eTxiWAJITqyu-O7TNPmZkdO9XDZmof&fid=0x0:0x295fda2614b6a618"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Bess Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQN6tp3tLascCxZJkkG0pSJjCN0aRvgU_pVPUc_1fd0lx0f548eg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been wanting to try this place for a while. So happy we did. Everything is freshly made as ordered. Really delicious, great spice. The samosa is served with sauce but it’s still perfectly crispy on the outside. My first time trying pani puri and it definitely will not be the last. Looking forward to coming back to try more items.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5GmyyeT_RLn4GgDx14jl_QW5McyvLKvSgz--8&fid=0x0:0x295fda2614b6a618"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Yeshvi Mehta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVHHFZUwt0pnim38TVGVDQUhu3Obi33NtK1Ek9rBbru761t74M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The interiors are vibrantly designed, I love the Mumbai influence. The service is fast and quick, and super polite. I had the privilege of meeting the owners and hearing about their inspiring story!
Growing up in Burnaby I didn’t see too many Indian spots, but this Indian street food restaurant is literally from my dreams!

I strongly recommendthe Vadapav, if you’re feeling like having something different try their ulta cheesy Vadapav.

For drinks, I recommend the strawberry Oreo milkshake. Their chai thaali is also great. They also have an interesting chocolate falooda, worth a try!

They have many options for all dietary needs, and the restaurant is fully vegetarian.

@TheLoquaciousGrinch
Follow me on instagram for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyBMVyOrzecXxmvjg1a55mOsuVktjXYUpdolHg&fid=0x0:0x295fda2614b6a618"],"When":"2024-11-15"},{"Name":"Jainesh J Hira","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2pWZNpMUUryKBwI8TinHi9zTNSpyB1NpHQ0ZHe0i5Q_YAwRfeFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Craving for some street food, we stumbled upon this place.

It is a quiet and small area , which can seat around I would say max 25 people. So don't be fooled expecting a larger place.

The food is made fresh, and this is something which I appreciated the most. It was definitely made to order. We ordered the ragada patties, sev Puri, vada pav and dahi puri. Each one was better than the next.

The highlight was definitely the vada pav and the sev Puri. It had a great level of heat to it, not too overbearing but just enough to taste. They were brought fresh and piping hot to the table. A big shoutout to Sanaya for making the food. It was delicious!

Since the place is small, there are areas which are seated close to the bathroom, so beware of the seat you would choose.

I would definitely go back to try some other items! Keep up the good work!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3LSBgjI4cNdE3g74ah-W0OoT9Px8ZJeDlbs2p&fid=0x0:0x295fda2614b6a618"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Skin Collector","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdxuEFvnwk0GfbcLYmVX6syKNGrbv_iCfAOJiiMLY2ESpPGzM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We ordered the Cheese burst Vada Paav, Ulta Vada Paav and the Butter Daabeli.

I’ll start with, the Daabeli being the simplest and most boring choice, which does by no means mean that it’s bad ! I simply prefer the other two.

But it’s incomparable to the Ulta Paav, which was Fantastic ! You start feeling the spice the longer you eat it and all the components add in multiple different textures. (Crunchy fried outside , fluffy buns, soft, spiced mashed potatoe Vada).
With that said, it can get heavy after a while. Personally I had to get a to go box and (gladly) finish it later at home.

I’d definitely take that one again and again.

The Cheese burst was an interesting twist I haven’t seen in a Vada Paav before.
Assuming it’ll be heavy from all that „cheese burst” the rest of the filling was very refreshing packed with onions, and it balanced it out very well.
Taking a bite of that one after eating half of the Ulta Paav,  felt very light and refreshing.

The owners are incredibly nice!!!! And can help you out with your choices as well as adjust the spice levels for you :)

Last thing I’d recommend which came so unexpectedly…. their strawberry shake.
Omg after some spicy dinning, this shake hits the spot, in every spot ;)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnP4byhqj7fcYR0p_5605omQ94c8qw12lH5KOV&fid=0x0:0x295fda2614b6a618"],"When":"2024-6-27"},{"Name":"T S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLEgk65WhzXLsBEpZzGkxO3a3bOSNFYIk_UXtSQRwN7HForreM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Don’t trust this fraud cheating restaurant !! See my review and decide.

Firstly they don’t greet you or show you where to sit, it’s you decide and they don’t serve water. There’s a water dispenser and you go and do self service for water.

They don’t serve you cutlery and napkins are poor quality (washroom tissues are way better)
Very untidy washrooms ! Poor hygiene

Management doesn’t have responsibility to check for feedback, when we say anything they just argue and their staff are illiterate girls with zero training.

Our family tried 4 dishes and we are from India and we know how these dishes are made.

1) chole kulcha : it’s not Indian kulcha, they just give you burger buns, these people are cowards and covering saying it’s kulcha. Very extreme price

2) Frankie : the Base roti is too hard and it doesn’t taste like Frankie

3) Misal Pav : Mixture has a bad smell, oily smell and poor quality ingredients used in it.

4) Samosa Ragada : normally ragada is very hot and here these fraudsters serve with frozen samosa and poor channa ! Taste is too worst

If you don’t trust my review see picture, if you still decide to waste $$ pls go ahead, they will loot you enough.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwsg8HFEu4yFLElCszVwo1skIgXFyxLIscd2r4&fid=0x0:0x295fda2614b6a618"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Feve Omipon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_0GEhwUjCKnwOJDNPpXV2CZS1bbyas601WD4tWnrTWQ_VGRs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my first time coming to this place since it opened in my neighbourhood. I thought the food, service and environment were excellent. I’m unfamiliar with this cuisine, but luckily the employee was helpful and showed us the menu with descriptions and photos of the items.

The place is clean and well lit. I got the butter vada pav pretty quickly under 5 minutes. The dish was hot and fresh, I loved the garlic butter on the outside and how soft the bread was. The filling was tasty and not too spicy. A great appetizer, I will comeback here to try other dishes! I highly recommend and I shared the other bun with my boyfriend:)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOp_Q7fd2K-fZr9MkD3fbCaCtT0IpIgLYVT_PI&fid=0x0:0x295fda2614b6a618"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Joan Coleman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKWEJ5GBiPvj1P5mpZYNdQfNFejChoxxedvE1RfWMo7LpFdQw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious and fresh.  Service with a smile - they seemed very proud of their product, and they should be! We had the Cheese Chilli Grill (my kid is a fiend for grilled cheese) and it was a flavour bomb, so so good.  I opted for the Black Chana Chaat and was very pleased with the layers of flavour and the zingy heat. Would come regularly if we lived here. Recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPx5sRcxXqheMF4nQWB3i2YEABy8F9LFqBpk_Rm&fid=0x0:0x295fda2614b6a618"],"When":"2024-9-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Arun & Jayati Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1nRUaNnMhfrJXEHRAsLmucE76xhX7zjbHxTwvQuVl2h1215pD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I was looking forward to eating here. The location is lovely, the staff really friendly and the interior is well laid out and very comfortable. There is a an opportunity to sit outside as well. I found the lunch menu a bit disappointing. I ate the vegan bowl and found that the menu did not really cater for diabetics, vegetarians and those who may have dietary restrictions. I do hope the management will make the menu more inclusive and have a greater variety.  My husband chose to eat the lobster flat bread. It was ok however, the amount of lobster was really miniscule. This place has great potential and I hope the management does exploit this opportunity to really shine","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYO72Yt_aMjWhIMK8p83VLCBRVvV9HLY8Gn-5F&fid=0x0:0x5432c86c7e292aac"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"Jess V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBvDVB0mpKVygf4Rio0jst6fk1o97QfYEhbY5crU2JPbRIuw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had an awesome experience with Mintara for our July wedding this year. Carissa was always quick to respond to any questions we had as we planned, was very flexible, and available without being pushy. Actually it was our first interaction with her as well as the beauty of the venue that made this venue our first choice and we were very happy to be able get a Friday date with them! We had a couple of last minute meal changes/seating changes and Carissa was very flexible to adapt this for us.
On the day, everything was set up for us so beautifully, the garden was full of roses and spectacularly beautiful and it felt like the staff were there without noticing they were there. During the reception, again, they were available, but in the background, kind and friendly. Our guests kept telling us how delicious the food was and how amazing the views and venue were - we had the most beautiful sunset! We would HIGHLY recommend Mintara for hosting your wedding. With the rose garden and the restaurant, we had so little to do to set it up and Carissa was fabulous to work with! Thank you Mintara!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1vMykcYm3-F0RmUfDmZHn1ruVFlOj__dgnhT4&fid=0x0:0x5432c86c7e292aac"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"V L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIn2d4l9QAm_yvLsqlGxWT1rou6qq9FWkLhXrKhu2e2Qw7XEA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I had a holiday season date night here. It delivered everything I could have hoped for. Beautiful landscaping decorated with lights that we spent time wandering around after a giant portioned dinner; I was so full I had to take my dessert to go! They had a special 3 course holiday themed menu and it was delicious. The inside was dimly lit and a nice ambiance with classic tasteful Christmas music and great service. We had a great night","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mat Vanstone","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUeaNvOoTu_rCbF6Zd7n6abE64V3APCLFUhlYoP721tmyYQQOzB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the pleasure to DJ a few weddings at this wonderfully renovated venue. The ceremony space in the back garden is amazing. The staff/servers were all super friendly and helpful. Food was great as well. I would definitely recommend getting married here. You can’t beat this view and the dance floor is nice and close to the bar!
DJ Vanstone Owner of ‘Zapped Productions DJs For Hire’","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPclxePp2hd7WBVuPOtQjr2IUXoBFwInEN8tvvi&fid=0x0:0x5432c86c7e292aac"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Catherine Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUTkz5822W-4tHOlQW0f2BS3SRckLjhOraB3PjIPXcn_UMUsmbO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I  was thoroughly impressed with this restaurant. The interior is well laid out and elevates your entire experience. I was even more surprised by the food! I tried the dine-out menu, and not only was it such a good deal for 5 courses - no dish failed to impress me. The portions were generous, and every dish was very balanced with unique and high-end garnishing. Every dish appeared intricately prepared. There was also a good selection of mocktails and cocktails. The service was also great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZcF7tyYk61zrYXNIMVpE4NqqReTIOu5_ohknM&fid=0x0:0x5432c86c7e292aac"],"When":"2024-1-28"},{"Name":"Jodi Reimer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKAw5Q9y0WYvmOkKqCvJy6o6ROmTMLcvlidEUWPvVVGamvagWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What an amazing experience we had with our family celebrating our 25th anniversary. Everything from the attentive service, quality and beautifully presented dishes to the reasonably priced menu, and let’s not forget the million dollar sunset view of the city…it was all perfection! The sushi was second to none, some of the best we’ve had from all over the world. Definitely will be back soon and will be our new favorite go to from burgers to amazing 4-course dinners. Thank you Mintara. 10🌟","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNV7kL_Dkh2OQjUAY7_bdZb8-t3OLG4rz2heqKv&fid=0x0:0x5432c86c7e292aac"],"When":"2024-5-3"},{"Name":"Henry Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhmFNsaF86cbZCyen0CMkPieS_tHSm55NOkNNeTeKiqvoVPSqI9w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I took my parents and my uncle and aunt to come here for dinner weekday. The food was good service ok. They tried their best because there is only four staff working here on weekday. Reservation is a must because they can only deal w 48 set dinners per evening. The food was better than I had expected. Usually when you have a nice view, you don’t get quality food. This place is located in a nice setting and they have set dinner and view( I think they got the best of both worlds). First time I came, there was wedding private even and restaurant was not available to public. See the picture of food & the facilities and you can decide it yourself. I will not recommend coming on weekend as it gets too crowded and parking can be a challenge on weekend. I can imagine this is a popular place in hot summer.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyLuL0S4PQjsyPyr1sbKpKk1f_S7uJZ0kZrn6k&fid=0x0:0x5432c86c7e292aac"],"When":"2023-9-26"},{"Name":"Stephanie Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIfAPsDTRgZ0X4LUN9xMgeNNOdsmkairokm_V1ITzvg2ctG7A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We hosted our wedding at Mintara on Burnaby mountain in September and have nothing but rave reviews! If you are thinking of hosting your wedding here - do it!

Carissa and the rest of the Mintara team were so helpful, caring and truly went out of their way to make sure us and our guests had the best day. Throughout the planning process, Carissa was so responsive in answering any questions we had, but also making recommendations to ensure our day was smooth. Also the food was delicious - and we received so many compliments from our guests! 10/10 wedding venue :)","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ayon Rayhan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUk1t0mMEnXcBwA4oO2vbDly8NCDTs72Gk7ZzS-nvuFcnUdEkL8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The place is nice little cafe where the owner Mr. Yasser welcomes you with a warm smile. He solely does everything and from scratch. The menu is limited consisting of sandwich salads soup and drink. The service is homely so is the food. The best thing is it's very cheap and the quality is top notch. I tried the roast beef sandwich and the turkey sandwich and added soup in the side. The quantity along with the quality was really good. I really enjoyed it and would totally recommend it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMI4TEvgtDwZkGIH8x2Vh2AyOlviZxJ1cI_JBo&fid=0x0:0x4f540f85a76e3a80"],"When":"2023-9-26"},{"Name":"starfinder1234","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKuJA6PrxL3Yh7DTk7a8nlD0e2diwxYtLvXKrhUJ5UoxzS4Iw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time visit today. Hard working owner and so down to earth. Food is great and unbelievably cheap considering the high quality. I wish this type of business all the success in the world","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Samra Shah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIswPeFCVvLsO9ejGTyiRV0cerwlzJ6_2Wy1oMFekFq3_UE00M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hidden gem. Love uncle yaser and his smiling face and personality. His lentil and chicken noodle soups are the best. Tried His rice with salmon and that was top notch. Don't forget to try their corn beef and chicken sandwiches. Everything was just amazing. Did I mention it was reasonable too!! Highly recommended halal spot in town.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elan Hollander","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnIlVLclphuHwqKMxUF9McwyEgadvGeftskP8rgiFSS8Jcxeaj_g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My gf and I were looking for a soup and sandwich and chose Yassers Cafe because we saw the great google reviews and we were not disappointed! A cozy, cheap eats diner, Yasser was welcoming and friendly from the moment we walked in. The sandwiches were $6 and they were just what we were looking for. Yasser is a gracious and wonderful owner who gave us free chocolates and made us feel like a part of his community. Definitely recommend if you’re in the Burnaby area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNifgAZba-fZta0cfCreZ_VHtSdQXG4NuHR2ceJ&fid=0x0:0x4f540f85a76e3a80"],"When":"2022-12-6"},{"Name":"Avril Metcalfe-Roach","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYGU1Ys5Qyc5eCX8FcN5yk2cuQlc_xMGZCyUKu8z6nL3BA4-Lo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow, what an amazing gem! Very affordable, excellent atmosphere, and delicious food. I got a soup, sandwich, and latte for $9, and it's all homemade in the best way. I plan on coming here a lot.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tristan Dellazizzo Toth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKVZJymYfvZrIq0AjRoxrr2A4It6JQn8Vs4-DrN8tPvYDYOKg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got a coffee and some lunch there.  Tasty home-cooked food and an excellent coffee.  Very friendly owner who takes pride in charging very affordable prices.  Tax included in all the postings too.  Definitely would recommend to anyone in the area.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Noorain Fareed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ4rcqgzd6GmpbSObgU-qk1NtARKFswmS5LUkqIRn2ehzmFgA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yasser’s Café is more than just a place to grab a bite—it's an experience crafted with heart and soul. This cozy little spot offers a level of warmth and personal attention that’s hard to find anywhere else.
Each dish is prepared fresh and with care, reflecting Yasser’s passion for good food.

With no other staff, Yasser handles everything himself, and yet, he never makes you feel like he’s too busy. He welcomes you as if you’re an old friend, taking time to chat, share a laugh, and make sure you’re enjoying your meal. It’s this personal touch that turns a simple visit into a memorable experience. You feel less like a customer and more like a guest in Yasser’s home.

If you’re in the area and looking for a spot that offers great taste with even better hospitality, Yasser’s Café is the place to go. It may be small and simple, but the warmth and care you’ll receive here are truly unmatched.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rebecca L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhGjy80CTfRvhVu68W48jKztX73xZkk29Zgnse6nPEawcoaawB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing dining experience and vibes. Service was excellent and the food was such good value. Make sure you get the soup + sandwich combo

Will be sure to come back again! Great neighborhood gem and so charming","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipME8Vfr03eW4kjyoH7iFkfKSsfvVreHrrTFCiI&fid=0x0:0x4f540f85a76e3a80"],"When":"2022-2-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Aneesh Vaghadia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLWrL7cKUXjPtxgV-J_aqDc0U8QhiCuyIUBtGHmUeqQs8V-GQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great family style restaurant focused on quality meat. The prime rib is always a win, with a great texture and taste to the meat. Not pictured here, the sticky toffee cake was also delicious.

The location is next to the Costco and so the parking can get a bit busy if you eat too early despite their own dedicated parking lot. The atmosphere is elegant and warm with soft lighting and high walled booths that give you privacy from other groups. You can easily have a private date night or a larger family meal and both be comfortable. The staff is attentive and kind, quick to add humour to brighten the evening.

Due to their popularity, would recommend making a reservation around peak times to avoid a long wait. That says a lot about how great the experience is than anything else!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_9CSK-PTFujLr4AZt505njG9vrry61WpDtI4&fid=0x0:0xccc9cb2cd170dbcd"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"Jason Tribbiani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXpvlAY0NULhaj1b4k1yZZtRXFlzsqxg5gIO8-kzQ1-Qy-iq7d=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As a longtime customer, this is my first time leaving a review. The Keg has always been our go-to restaurant for family and friends' birthday gatherings and anniversaries, and it has never disappointed. The service is consistently top-notch, and the food is always excellent. While the prices are a bit higher, we keep coming back for the quality of both the food and service. Special shoutout to 'Lisa'—we were thoroughly impressed by the outstanding service she provided. We'll definitely be back for our next birthday celebration soon!"","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmyi6aXO8OjYl0hx26Nx08ip9JDNzn-eZ3liyx&fid=0x0:0xccc9cb2cd170dbcd"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"S Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKwMFij14f9bwI2ZtevY6-GPOvGVt7I9oWmNuiWLd0FOZqYKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is a particular praise for Carey - she’s not only friendly but with enthusiasm and politeness to introduce us about menu in a precise manner with warming voice. And very detail-oriented without too much disturbance during dining. Just make you feel at home and easy. Extremely different experience than any waiter we’ve experienced at KEG in downtown Vancouver since 2000s (we are loyal members since 1980s).
BTW, she gave us a bottle of hot water with napkin to avoid hot bottle heat. Very considerate.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqovMX1GDE01EMLZTBYK44m7pXJLQ1D34xKzEJ&fid=0x0:0xccc9cb2cd170dbcd"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"S J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFJgtQsTx2GqIorZzdULLXPFX8yaR7DrYrRftNOfTGqwP15U2i=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was my first time at The Keg, and I’m so grateful to Brad for his detailed explanations and friendly service. He timed everything perfectly, serving our dishes in sync with our meal, which made the experience so relaxing. We ordered the filet mignon, prime rib, and the classic wedge salad with blue cheese dressing— the dressing was especially delicious. The mocha ice cream cake we had at the end was also a great finish. The portions were generous, and we left feeling completely stuffed! It was the perfect way to celebrate my b-day, and the food was absolutely amazing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPaboLz1WNVMHebtHB6qkkczPWP5HM972mwFz0P&fid=0x0:0xccc9cb2cd170dbcd"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"An enjoyable experience. The Keg has such consistency in great quality delicious food and cozy ambiance and value. Even the washrooms are super nice and clean. Loved the complimentary warm table bread. We went with a group for happy hour and the food was great. Tried the prime rib slider for $7.00 which was delicious. The prime rib sandwich is also scrumptious. All the appetizers such as the bacon wrapped scallops, Caesar Brussel Sprouts, tuna tartare, and wings were all delicious. The Billy Miner pie is a must and since it’s huge, you can just share one making it the perfect portion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOW4neibVyB1vrbYu_3ehAiwlHt0H4tyb_wLksK&fid=0x0:0xccc9cb2cd170dbcd"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"YVR Duke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbrjJ5U6gKw7Gn1zE_GlxhUndims9WHlh7sVaHLXVrjOFlYd_B=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Filet Mignon is great. The bread and my lobster bisque were great.  The oyster is ordered was fresh.

The prime rib however is disappointed.  Tasteless.  I prefer the Prime Rib at the Chop.

Service wise, overall friendly but they did forget something i ordered for my dad.  Server was busy, i don’t want to blame anyone.  But that was the experience i had.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNb6UrbC_V7nHga-XMuUVuBCc_AZd4Y3D65gzYT&fid=0x0:0xccc9cb2cd170dbcd"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"M Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIsGv955Ri875E7vGmsYaHqa37baEVpl4eh0b_zeRaT_a88ew=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This Keg doesn’t need more positive reviews because everyone already knows this place is amazing, but it is my practice to leave reviews when an experience blows me away. We went tonight (Oct. 9, 5:45pm),  to celebrate my dad’s birthday, and I made reservations online requesting a quiet table (I didn’t say it, but my mom is a cancer patient so we need to be careful). Of course they made sure to give us a nice table as we requested. The service and food was outstanding, and my parents were so happy. Thank you for making our night. 💗","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPE9ARdOHrAJ5iELMGJUElHtJNJLIyKpXxj9IAs&fid=0x0:0xccc9cb2cd170dbcd"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Luan Reisdoerfer Cardoso","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJy4d20z2cS8v7rChMGw3z6muiCCzuI588LnB8lkU6JnQBfH_g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had such a fantastic experience at the restaurant! It was our first visit, and we were there to celebrate a special birthday. The server was amiable, walked us through the menu and all the available options, and even offered us wine samples to help us choose the perfect one. We absolutely loved every moment of our time there. We can't wait to go back again in the future!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPyN_DBX-CGhPhiNVwyXo1jTWs8jeYGiTTwjT7r&fid=0x0:0xccc9cb2cd170dbcd"],"When":"2024-10-9"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Cannie Liew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVeFXS4FtnsrTT3RNfuZxPNTYwmVEVsK03Zd7Crcu8OIr5Z8dDM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is delicious. Ordered the house special fish noodle soup. Really enjoyed the noodle and the ingredients(veggies,tofu,fish). It’s a very hearty \u0026 healthy meal, one I would appreciate eating daily.\n\nDined in and ordered a take out after as it’s delicious. Will revisit again soon :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQcwgVfBvnLF38w1xNxBWzCtTZ2NyP19UL6_HI\u0026fid=0x0:0x1977382ac01da5a2"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Amy Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvtm7hBqZHDYxXgP_oxkelx2FGhwfW-EuwTv9rdyjxo-_-_8Nq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Large portions, great flavour. Exactly what I expected and it really hit the spot. A little oily though. Going to see if they have chewier noodles next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1djXJWkvzF3UjIAfzX3ssw-yNj7w3gwYkjbuK\u0026fid=0x0:0x1977382ac01da5a2"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"C L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFSCt_t74XiqlEdz6jDYOHmtwc4pgb3Fve6nsF3wEBwwz9hl0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Read the reviews and my friends raved about this place.  I went there twice and tried different items because I wanted to like it but both times left disappointed.  Although the broth was flavourful and rich; although there were lots of toppings options and; although the food was served very fast - none of us felt satiated!    Depending on your choice, some of the soups tasted very salty. Even though we drank most of the broth - we felt bloated rather than satisfied and were hungry soon afterwards. This would be a good place for a quick, lighter meal, especially on a blustery day","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqPgFyUiEM7cGKMoNV-R1nTvBpsANZFCYMiTQO\u0026fid=0x0:0x1977382ac01da5a2"],"When":"2024-3-31"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Like the majority of other 5 star reviews, I completely agree. Grains Fish Noodle serves a perfect bowl of delicious fish noodle soup that’s not too salty, healthy, delicious, hearty, and with such creaminess and depth of flavour. No complaints! Tried the original fish jaw soup and it was very tasty. All the flavours of their multigrain noodle soups I have tried are excellent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOagMqb1ZjEx0lMnL5AphQFh1PSxjDo5eFtf6zj\u0026fid=0x0:0x1977382ac01da5a2"],"When":"2024-2-2"},{"Name":"Daisy Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVu1nxOTin_LouqpMg8SuZhcgesKimL_02BtAAmRSIlR4zjoDPR2g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"There are two other locations in Richmond that I haven't tried. This one has a very rich and a tad too salty fish broth base for #1 spicy pumpkin fish noodle. The bowl was packed and very filling. Fish was not fishy at all. Very tasty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDAoCPSv3K7TYHCn_YxfK7l4EooW3AC0hB3YW_\u0026fid=0x0:0x1977382ac01da5a2"],"When":"2023-8-29"},{"Name":"W L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK3lEbwV8e2v5in0IhnFqBGUt83IWuJaaihBPoKpdmjx1Wi-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered 2 bowls of noodles (Seafood noodle, and Hose Special) , rice bowl with 2 items,  beef stripes side dish and beef rice rolls.  All the food was delicious and good service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFryR4ERJXMqSBtTiEzFTJM7jDKbQXgPpCMyD0\u0026fid=0x0:0x1977382ac01da5a2"],"When":"2024-4-15"},{"Name":"Kelly I","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXquEahqi64vPbCeET717zYpgegwA8i3NW9-l7MkI7Qwpb7QLT5Sw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I was impressed with the freshness of the fish, soup base, and noodle texture. Their signature dish. The order came out in 5 minutes. I'll be back. Good healthier alternative.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPu2w0Md5L5Wg0qHwUUsmOAGtuymjL50twpZEUw\u0026fid=0x0:0x1977382ac01da5a2"],"When":"2023-7-30"},{"Name":"alice w","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKfBFd5-MCz0iWhHQjADA6mFZoHPhSAyoSlVDQe971OUgYbxw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent Bun have very tasty bun, veggies,pork,beef and so on👍👍👌😀🤗","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO46peJSJQ_RoNGbhFdv9Yz7irXYXUI3Rpdr3w8\u0026fid=0x0:0x1977382ac01da5a2"],"When":"2024-8-21"}]

title: Kamamarui Ramen & Don
address: 6514 Royal Oak Ave, Burnaby, BC V5H 2E9
descriptions: Small, wood-&-concrete clad eatery specializing in Japanese ramen noodles with varied toppings.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kathy Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiyb_IZpx_WoUpDbNVrKDpyLmD7_rVs6LOSYuAzIVmUAcA7Ma7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I always walk by neighborhood but I never go try it until I saw a lot of good reviews so I got to try it.
I came for dinner I ordered plain noodles with chicken soup with chicken karage and my husband had pork noodle soup.
I like my chicken soup very delicious but I don’t like the noodles and my husband noodle soup was so oily but I still give 4 stars for the food.
If you like noodles soup I do recommend to eat here.
The restaurant is very small only has about six tables so don’t come rush hour and also very hard to find parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUPng-ik8u5G0z5ZbKNyxNDluUxGxZ9EJcutRq&fid=0x0:0x7831cc9e92c971c"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"Luke Weng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXn1tdfwXfRnZVszKV8bZBNwooyRqfHv0VT8T0EAQWyUrqTrrO6aQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've visited kamamarui ramen a couple of times before the pandemic. It hasn't changed 😁 Unlike most ramen joints, the ramen here is actually not too heavy!

The restaurant is quite small, but the servers were extremely fast in getting us a table. Once we were seated they were very polite and made sure we were comfortable.

The ramen only took 5 minutes to arrive! Scary! I ordered the black garlic ramen. The noodles were very thin, reminding me of wonton noodles. But ended up making the dish actually quite light.

You get a choice of rich broth or regular broth. I chose the latter. There are also combos you can order on top of the ramen, like with onigiris (bomb), karaage, etc.

The only thing I wish they would change is the price, because it's actually quite expensive for a small portion of ramen. This is nearly the price of ramen shops in DT Vancouver.

But asides from this, I would highly recommend Kamamarui 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwl1jJl6XVUHmiXrh0i_UkE4K_BcnJGlktyq98&fid=0x0:0x7831cc9e92c971c"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Lucia Martin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWD62NnYZ8sbYz8NfhbmZrZlqgjMSTvCKN3sYnMBikbgZA4DmtI8Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hadn't come here in a while but am so happy I did! I tried the limited time Gojira ramen and it was sooo fulfilling and delish! I tried both miso and pork based broth and found the pork one to be my fav of the two ✨✨ def come with an empty stomach because it is a lotttt of pork but super worth it. The servers are also super sweet and very very attentive and will refill ur water/tea every chance they get haha

(Also the bombs really are delish! We always get the combo with them)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKOClO_4S5YB86ii3B0Y7pdGvxIZfDW2x8yP3k&fid=0x0:0x7831cc9e92c971c"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Candice L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKgJpKypQ7qV4a_1lJEnQPNJCyJn-RHieXCifCqqwnvY-_9XrUx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were a group of six and all enjoyed our ramen dishes so much. Lots of flavour, great value, and hot. Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOi8rvL0bTAVhdtPmOXnGaKggFzuFnnKgFNkUmb&fid=0x0:0x7831cc9e92c971c"],"When":"2024-11-13"},{"Name":"Mrs. Leci","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFUu7tIDGHhiFP61EOIZLCOSzvwJkGN10CXxqa6MRhYpyxpm4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been coming back to this restaurant since my husband and I saw it around mterotown area many years ago. We have tried out all their ramens and I must say that our favorite is the chasu ramen with rich broth. You can add sides to add in your soup as well and for me, it's the bean sprouts. Add a little chili oil and you're ready to dig in. Yum! Another favorite is the spicy agedashi tofu. I normally request that the sauce on the side if my kids are with me. And ofcourse, the chicken karaage. Very tasty!

Very nice and attentive staff as well. I'm a regular, and will keep coming here and eat ramen even if it's warm weather. My daughter is very picky, but she loves it here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNziHMVXKY8AWmG4ujIBm5EuiFHCsOw6_aZI2nx&fid=0x0:0x7831cc9e92c971c"],"When":"2024-7-3"},{"Name":"Kate Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjE4MSAa0c4Uqc8iOt1LfqIkJDL1ULa2Z17gRh4YDWMExQ1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ramen base was mediocre but they make up for it with other stuff. The tonkotsu base was lacking depth and creaminess. But for my black garlic one, they do put a hefty amount of it so you get the black garlicky goodness all the way until the end. The cha siu was super soft. One of the better ramen cha sius of vancouver. You can choose the broth richness but I wish you can choose the noodle doneness. The noodles were al dente in the beginning but quickly got soggy. Usually I got for a harder noodle doneness so its perfect midway through.

There are things you can add to the ramen yourself. There's ramen sauce - not sure what it is but it was flavorful. There's also fried garlic. Adds a nice touch and other restaurants don't have this.

The chicken karaage was lacking. Small pieces. Not fried well. The takoyaki was good due to the sauces but obviously frozen takoyaki, which makes it quite expensive.

$16.95 for black garlic tonkotsu ramen is expensive for the quality they give. Same price as santouka and more expensive than danbo.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtOSnvEEnR8dPsaG8I38G-gmf168RohoeaEpX5&fid=0x0:0x7831cc9e92c971c"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"Lisa T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwStHWH7kO88Zst0q2uRgjrtCwrFaBSFTtBLPK2iypQv9DepSZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I tried chicken karage and some ramen here. The broth was flavorful, the noodles were cooked just right with fresh toppings.

Cozy atmosphere and friendly staff, though service was a little slow during peak hours.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3f5Xf-HGHd7nuewhRQfqj4rrxau_10vrTZO8x&fid=0x0:0x7831cc9e92c971c"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"y sa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFngQqa2F90OIpbxkUL3vQVcASx5xoE2gyFjE4kMR1ydjk_2M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I've been there many times. Depending on the time, there may be a bit of a wait. The soup's richness can be customized to your preference. I've tried various flavors here, but I often order Tonkotsu ramen.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHHlE9Wn-D021KZ0vbjp8pZvtsm7cpRJZHHfMq&fid=0x0:0x7831cc9e92c971c"],"When":"2024-10-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"JJ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWv0snBpgvBPf2qz4qfFT4OylgeUYJtPPar7PLTM4oqEyOHGx25-A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I recently decided to visit this place after driving by and feeling intrigued enough to give it a try. However, my experience turned out to be quite disappointing. Upon arrival, I noticed that the lineup system was poorly managed. There was no one taking names, so everyone was left standing and waiting at the door, unsure of when they would be seated. This lack of organization was frustrating and set a negative tone for the rest of our visit.

When we finally got seated and ordered our food, the disappointment continued. The dishes we ordered were very bland and lacked any distinctive flavors. They did not live up to the standard of authentic Taiwanese cuisine, which was a significant letdown. For the quality of food served, the prices were unreasonably high, making the experience feel like poor value for money.

On a positive note, the service was good. The staff were friendly and attentive, which is the only reason I decided to give this place three stars. Despite the decent service, the overall experience was not enough to warrant a return visit. Unfortunately, I won't be coming back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcPF6LjOPu7iSC5rlpv3k6dquM9ApnKMSSvtCB&fid=0x0:0xe73ad3a9bf211467"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Bessie Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvjAQzsb6-fQG2o46FKS5b_snwMkLpbS97qdnqAoeVAYjx4E7yqw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went to this restaurant at night for dessert. The atmosphere was quite festive. Bright red everywhere along with Christmas music. We ordered the vanilla ice cream and it exceeded our expectations. It was so cute decorated with waffle sticks, chocolate and strawberry syrup, Oreo etc. I recommend the vanilla ice cream!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuCR7IYINjkqzbksnfCMyZoittvK0BYpxMfcTj&fid=0x0:0xe73ad3a9bf211467"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"MG_FXV","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiigFyUNoiwP5bHSXlNRrOpnatj6VSziAvS6zd1X48n-qBzP4n=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We decided to eat here after some recommendations on FB. The place looks ok, the food was ok wife said probably will be our first and last time to eat. She said food are salty and lack crunchy from the fried tofu and chicken nuggets. The only good part about this place is we ordered the fried rice and it's plenty. Even for the appetizers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipML9CrPmXjeWMKolYUVXgc22-WnaFyZTW7bmXRa&fid=0x0:0xe73ad3a9bf211467"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"Lost in Flax Blog","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnuEdz0exGAqoaKWuU3YZ60m50P5j2VjB_aqaZVW3VnTtNws28=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Tasty fried squid nuggets, delicious chicken nuggets fried rice as well — but the food is quite oily and heavy with salt. Taiwanese beef wraps are 7/10, decent but not the best I’ve tried. Did not partake in the beef noodle soup, but I like their boba milk teas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXjQ-2efQ5GVactPqV9cQeDKBW7X4kb2Rb0G7e&fid=0x0:0xe73ad3a9bf211467"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"E.J. G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQUvaFK78eVaepRJdGpJeW7DuI5cf4jmFP1v7Dj09PdLAdXKb1=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good restaurant overall - but comparing other reviews, seems like some are right about some stuff like charges on sauce and to-go containers but if you had the good food they serve in the end, it would be well worth your time and experience.  The quality of food is pretty unforgettable and upon returning, I always usually order the Shrimp fried rice and the Deep-fried chicken nuggets.  Pretty much a staple you can’t go wrong with.  I may have gotten deep-fried squid as well once before .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAqcCqrvdTNMj00nzokBcR8Nhyma5Fqg-MjiOP&fid=0x0:0xe73ad3a9bf211467"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Anjstacansi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxfxd7NedIKrSKbEThR9bCPUg8DXPAGue7SfEQVr5kqeRxyA8a=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I enjoyed the meals i ordered in the photos :) the dumplings are quite hard maybe better if its thin and soft to be more palatable. Thank you","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtJkuA3BTG3bC6hIqzGPpoLWMDebhVmWHfG2FO&fid=0x0:0xe73ad3a9bf211467"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"Kayla Camile Dula (카일라)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVOIRwXco15Y4sCvQ59rO-2bSxeiR6byfOZfOo1uHDIiOmY3UIDJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was a great experience! I’ll definitely keep coming back. My favorite dish was the Hawaiian fried rice! Sorry, guys! I didn’t get the chance to take a picture—I was too distracted by the food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOY90WQI5heVNLMk1gmO8yJUrg3L5HTghionOBF&fid=0x0:0xe73ad3a9bf211467"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Kin Leong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYCM_PRNvUtGHhoFDzu77IUY-7LDnMGgj8AkDfN2G_Cw1G7-lqiw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good selection of Taiwanese style dishes with generous portions. Flavours are good, especially their deep fried chicken (aka Taiwanese Popcorn Chicken). The outside is crispy and crunchy while the chicken remains soft and juicy. Their famous Taiwanese Beef Noodle Soup has a broth that is full of flavour and depth.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJiBWfhJows44_9FiNt_8ReWdYNqCklex_C9ky&fid=0x0:0xe73ad3a9bf211467"],"When":"2024-5-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Vem Fell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwkPSV3Go5MeUNG2num_FvOxxkl2soaYDTRAJLJyvuZfHkM2xy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Special shout out to our server extraordinaire, Sharin! She was continually checking in on us, making food recommendations and subs---attentive and positive demeanor throughout our dining time. Best of all, she surprised me with a birthday choco-banana waffle on the house! It's our first time here, visiting from Seattle, with no reservation on a Saturday morning. Will def come back the next time we're in town!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8VhF0xv2lUsVs73IwX5csx-SrHdgeMKMGhs0D&fid=0x0:0x46ad4bf21998be2f"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Daria Liukin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkJyqUukJ1Tp32CT1Y60hgwO8TEu98t8UrHjC4vSHU3XhtZR-hfA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been there twice and can't get enough!
My husband and I absolutely love this place! First off, their coffee is amazing especially for a coffee lover like me. They serve it in a bowl size, which is a perfect 10/10 in my opinion!

The food is always presented in an eye-pleasing manner and is very filling. Their potatoes are the best I’ve ever had!

As for the service, the staff always greet you with a smile and a welcoming attitude. It can get busy on the weekends, so sometimes there’s a bit of a wait to get in, but it's definitely worth it!
This place is definitely going to be our new favorite!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODfNaLPefrkQlD0BcSGceOTls-F1V9JSOjlYrV&fid=0x0:0x46ad4bf21998be2f"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Swimming Lion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoNuKoBPU8hDsJrOBlEDRPQawlWHi3C9rUvrLYtz7paaZM0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Very disappointed
Quality of food really below average
Burger patty very dry
I have potato allergy and they substitute at $1.5 for salad but the salad not fresh and only some chopped veggie with onion ( I could have paid $4 to upgrade to fruit salad)
I requested sour dough in place of bun my wish was granted
Presentation of food is nice
Next table gifted us the fruit on toast as they didn’t want the sauce very generous of them
Free 3 hours underground  parking at Station Sqaure but they do ticket fast if park over 3 hours","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuoefrV8Tz8jnZbBNyjPQLSQnyubv-3BvNqpC3&fid=0x0:0x46ad4bf21998be2f"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Cat King","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVs0w4Gi6wbbwHozHIMXCxGOYXWgHMRV7NGZtPTmRmCUIubsOlj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Just dropped by here with my little toddler and my girlfriend for brunch. The prices were pretty decent, and the quality of food was pretty good too. I ordered the crêpes and fruit, an island spritz and junior kids meal for my toddler. My girlfriend ordered a skillet. Overall, it was solid  Breakfast. Nothing was Nasty. The drink wasn't that great. Think I could've skipped that. Didn't finish it. I think I should try their different menu items to really see if this place stands out more than other regular brunch spots. The junior for my toddler seemed to be a meal of good value so I liked that. It came with milk. For now, I thought it was clean and pretty straight forward. Service was alright though. Nothing to write home about. When they got busy, they kind of forgot you but when they came around, they were very nice. If I'm around, I wouldn't mind visiting again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlNrJs_9hO0skFpAqAyZPp9FrXCgjhe4xEXBsa&fid=0x0:0x46ad4bf21998be2f"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Anne Reimchen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1BebgngGXnOdE_L-yoUylD52GWAlXy8f3wfJI7Evtsu_zBUPrSg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The service was exceptional. Hameek did his best to let my friend have an amazing birthday brunch. Even tho whole team came to sing with a little dessert and candles. My vegan toast was amazing and huge and also my friend loved the vegetarian skillet. We def come back!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM04Goy2vBSj3bUm2P_8hDABAFHLKC4N_F79PUf&fid=0x0:0x46ad4bf21998be2f"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Harmony Hodge","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjEcB71glc9XoGzAlvpfEkLF80DU1ajN-Vzz27Hv5DYyKOznI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I loved the atmosphere and the service! The food presentation and taste was superb. Great menu selection and yummy smoothies. Our server Om provided exceptional service. I will definitely be coming back again soon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuVZZXvRJdrdDHZlTdNWqy6EgIbdiSGpO9SRd_&fid=0x0:0x46ad4bf21998be2f"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"samira","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwkQGMre8jgbaip4E0o2r4QwZ6hsRUFGFhUhbAr4O--khz6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food here is great! Menu got a good variety of brunch options to choose from. Location is very convenient next to the mall and the interior design is quite nice. The only major problem with this place is that they are way too short staffed. We were on a waitlist that took an hour and even when we got seated at our table it took them a long time to get our food. They had like a few empty tables while ppl were waiting but actually no free staff to take care of them.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsZ8eOkZnakn1vTmD9f-JdMD1pLGwAaDHgX4ic&fid=0x0:0x46ad4bf21998be2f"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"camillia Verbena","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7XSwryagnko87z4Nq17RiWXSBJKLG9tumm0l46SSWFLtMDn8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Came here the other day for brunch and it was such a disappointment.  With the wait time and good ratings,  I expected it to be decent.

The food and service was mediocre.  I was shocked by the lack of effort put in for the dishes. I got the avocado lox and the avocado wasn't even cut and spread out onto the toast properly.  I just found half an avocado placed on the toast,  and the layers of smoked salmon all clumped together on top.  You can be busy but this was plain laziness and i expect more from a restaurant this popular.  On top of that,  the pricing was pretty standard.  I can forgive this lack of attention if they actually had cheap prices.

Would not go back and don't  recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_ef55XpN3ud7EIrHKyFkptqsVqInc3NKahoDy&fid=0x0:0x46ad4bf21998be2f"],"When":"2024-9-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"D Phounpadith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3MKAh-lqo6p3ykSqbDhLfXiv2abS_ONpkOJXKbDMpO8NiIPksBA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time here and it was nice to see a variety of things here at the restaurant between Pizzas, Pastas & Others. Its not a big space but a lot of groups larger than 4 come here so its pretty nice and very accommodating space wise. The food was a 8/10 or maybe Italian food may not be for me but this is one of the better Italian  restaurants I’ve been to. The service (or rather just our server) was hard to ignore as either her negative aura or just her disdain to be serving our rather large group (PTY of 11) was showing. Our server was polite but her attitude made more than just 1 member of our party uncomfortable and unfortunately that attitude would be memorable . Again the service was not terrible but it goes to show how serving is a hard job. I also thank her for dealing with us. We weren’t terrible but most likely slow. Anyways most likely to come again and hopefully if i get the server again she’ll be in a better mood. I would come back for the food and atmosphere:)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWgv_J8CosTkDbJlqg_Cimei1CbS_ywxBJhJuH&fid=0x0:0x7344f5d8fd9866f0"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"Claire P L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJGM2D4TICm4bsRYfNUkKyVabhXL5nYa_FiMr3mZxJdxDKqf4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The rigatoni is so flavourful and a little spicy, i really loved it. recommend to share the mains family style since the portion is decent. The tiramisu is what i came for after seeing photos… and it did not disappoint! I was back a week later to eat it again. Perfect place for date or girls night.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJyc5a6NcxldKF2vLqhos_VUbIaIGycjKzce53&fid=0x0:0x7344f5d8fd9866f0"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Felicia Steinfeld","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJj0Zau45FH1ZEi76Ga0sKp8UxseYPsXP9uTK7YSm-9-e6iOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Foods incredible! Gnocchi melted in your mouth, the rigatoni was a lot spicer than expected but still delicious. Same for the mushroom and cream pasta. Also ordered a Margherita pizza and it was great. Tasted pretty authentic. Had the Caesar salad and so original! It’s two massive pieces and they grill it on the bbq, so it’s very Smokey tasting. Loved it! Lastly, I’m not a big tiramisu fan was but this was definitely worth the calories.  This spot will def be our new local fave. Would highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuXhV3L_bDbibWpU4DLpDxFjPZe_D3Yb3j9i_T&fid=0x0:0x7344f5d8fd9866f0"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"D D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVn-HmKGkiEXpPYEJdaFnX-Wk9npBuMky8Sv8ZSJcapzQOOPiN3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visited on a weekday happy hour.  Weird how we were seated right next to other parties while the restaurant was only 25% occupied.  Carbonara pasta was excellent. The ragu pasta was bland.  Carpaccio was ok.  Overall service was meh.  Only paid parking via app is available on-site.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-O1q4-scwtnL8NGEcv48vl9VnWY6Hi5xKNX2Z&fid=0x0:0x7344f5d8fd9866f0"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"Ivy Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1c2zLFM8IbxzNhVBCkqc1bFr_w3nONWAkfmBx8VcW6AqqdUPD3g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"My partner and I love coming to this restaurant because it is close by to where we live and come multiple times on occasion so I thought to do a group reservation for my birthday recently (June 28). I was left disappointed.

Pros:
- the restaurant was able to accommodate for 14 when I first requested for 12. Ended up with 12 guests and a table was removed which worked out for the dinner.
- Cocktails and food were the highlights and the overall ambiance was good.
- tiramisu was delicious

Cons:
-  had completed the initial form for a group reservation on their website and after 1 email asking me what time was best and I had replied, there was no answer for 3 days. Had to send a follow up email which then the reservation was made.

- When I had arrived with my group, the server was not aware of the occasion (birthday) and took a long time to take drink orders, meal orders, etc. As the host, my guests had noticed the server had given snarky looks (passive aggressiveness) to them as they were asking for simple items such as chili flakes. Though not mandatory, the dessert for my birthday was not complimentary.

Overall, I would go back but not as frequent as I would before and would avoid doing a group booking due to response rate and how my group was treated.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBNSFRAdN-_aWlGVbuzz-P_oj3yltq_nBgVdM-&fid=0x0:0x7344f5d8fd9866f0"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"Hyebin Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjDtbZAwmClVNZWe8in7iKPeuWFpJk3xV63n3oUYqAkU_8FufJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered gnocchi and prosciutto pizza.
The portion was good for Italian and food was great to enjoy the natural tastes of the ingredients. I prefer fried gnocchi but I still enjoyed this style.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSgU_aVxrhelurPmqZgOZ_0IgSJ8AQ_rvqZ2QW&fid=0x0:0x7344f5d8fd9866f0"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Goan Za","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVu6U_Ehpte442lCrj2u5C99cvlA1BRDDJ_8FDo3UaZjyHwj5RKiw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place truly delivered! The Carpaccio was the star of the meal—hands down the best I’ve had. The flavors were delicate, and pairing it with their bread took it to the next level.
The Pizza Diavola was fresh, with just the right amount of spice.
The Boscaiola Campanelle was a highlight: rich, flavorful, and absolutely loaded with truffle. It’s a must-try for anyone who loves mushrooms.
The Lingcod was cooked to perfection—tender and flaky. The corn garnish added a sweet and refreshing touch that balanced the dish beautifully.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOS1gnjmIq8SU1P7OhJ2MGWSN-YssK5V9UaBoXf&fid=0x0:0x7344f5d8fd9866f0"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Sammy Williams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIMvPSp33XAkWzDwVSWgVrEek7oW5vF6CExdpQQY-on8Vw3qQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here with some girlfriends for a surprise birthday and the night couldn’t have been better. The food was fantastic and the service matched. We definitely recommend the pesto gnocchi!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbgdWChrdSebpYpJ6a2ITOrRTxuQKugXDwNDXq&fid=0x0:0x7344f5d8fd9866f0"],"When":"2024-10-12"}]
