user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Evan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocItqym_b8p4Y-FW9783yYhbbkXgbWq5yo1i3Fyi_bB9_Q1tlIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This place is pretty good ,

I really like the curry here , it's kinda coconut-y and there is a good amount of meat and fillings in it.

In terms of the Hainan chciken it's alright , I  have had it twice , one time it was flavorless and the other it was over cooked. But you do get a good amount for the price you pay , like 17 is enough for two.

In terms of the Malaysian roti , it's alright , it comes with some of the curry so it tastes good but it's quite expensive compared to other options at Crystal mall.

In terms of the lemon tea , the lemon tea is good , it satisfied all my conditions for a good lemon tea.

Oh and the you fan is fine , I have gotten it twice and one time it was too watery.

I would rate this place a bit higher but everytime I eat here I get a stomach ache, including all of my friends . But just like how lactose interlorant people still enjoy dairy products , I will still continue to enjoy the food here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSe3GZA0DPKfFLLpeECvB5Vd7bRHAk1S061Sni&fid=0x0:0xba4167c19cb25e1b"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"eddy wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8Fjpj3y8teHQ4LqbC4PHR8whbU4-XOrTXEwklI9bGRqZLRD20=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is a new location. I’ve been ordering many years from the Victoria drive location. The curry beef brisket is a must. It’s the classic Cantonese style dish perfect for lunch or dinner. The sauce is killer with rice.

Fish and tofu with bbq pork. Savoury gravy. Delicious. Perfect with rice as well.

Would I order again? Not regularly.
Prices inflated and the take out sizes are not generous. There’s better competition elsewhere. Mind you I was a regular at least minimum 2 to 3 times a week in the past for this brand. However, if you’re tight on time and want to satisfy your craving, this place won’t disappoint on flavours. If your looking for a large meal, this isn’t the place for value.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2uNQkrTgUnKBfBhPbAfKwrtRJkDH_32AvfIqB&fid=0x0:0xba4167c19cb25e1b"],"When":"2024-5-8"},{"Name":"Vee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIWDDwhOzxU8pS1LaBUBhe_G4GOZXQQRUMFHUzZCybUZw1-9ELI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So. Yummy. Curry beef brisket with rice totally hit the spot for me. Had 2 big pieces of potato (kentang), my fav part of Chinese curry. Ate alone as usual, portion is enough for 2 meals for me, will pack for lunch tomorrow. Only thing is - there's no veg in the curry. Otherwise, it's pretty solid. And no, not spicy. Just yummy. Beef is so tender and tear away good. Has good amount of fatty bits which I like.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAG3YIkGqdJQhFbLsUWyDuUBCiSbmatEXI2jj9&fid=0x0:0xba4167c19cb25e1b"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Joey Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIncJBLfbVzRO24PRdfxE4-hovZn6C_s4RV_vqsGslULP8YEA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We normally go to their location on Victoria Drive. This is our favorite Hong Kong-style cafe. The staff always chat with us and check how we are doing.

Today we were in this area and just needed a small snack before heading home to make dinner.

We had French toast and Peanut Butter toast with condensed milk. You can see French toast was crispy but not oily. They put the right amount of peanut butter and condensed milk.

Their hot drink was great as always. Same for daily soup!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlk8WKhF01uWHI9DxFeKt6YhNSntGVEvlBJ5M2&fid=0x0:0xba4167c19cb25e1b"],"When":"2024-5-23"},{"Name":"VSBC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAjo55PePJf4zgVv5Al_yx2ilxM9R-ZY5XFJE6VqKHhkzSF7WAQA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I have been tracking the gross weight of their take-out curry beef brisket for 10 orders in the past two years.  They range in weight from 618g to 730g (variation: 112g / 18.1%).  Last week I bought one at 650g. Not being able to know what weighs the most, I’m unable to tell the value:cost ratio but the range of 112g is really quite unreasonable.  They should improve the consistency of the product with a more uniform ratio of beef brisket : potatoes : curry sauce.

Update:
While your reply is very much appreciated, you missed my point","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"WINTON WONG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9TPDk6-2cSBFxeb5haNrpOhLpQDLDmFQw_I66fPuB-57LYZy0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was great! I liked the beef with curry and rice. I found garbage in my fried rice, but they made another one! The restaurant is kind of small, but the food is still pretty delicious.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Carol Song","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKIbZbb90dtvQf2UmrPvpF3lw3Fj9Whx35iyZPMjJ0cJM-RSw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The restaurant is bright and clean. Children's tableware and chairs are provided for kids. The service is good and timely. The meals are delicious and large portions. My favorite is the milk tea, which is comparable to the taste in HK. Personally, I suggest that the more peanut butter in the French toast will taste better, and that the potatoes in the curry brisket will be simmered longer to become softer, waxier and more delicious. Everything else was perfect and we will dine again. Glad Burnaby also has delicious tea restaurants. Best of all they are kid friendly and we enjoyed our meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDtzbvd-7A55dgbylyixq01p8w34TNRojd84eZ&fid=0x0:0xba4167c19cb25e1b"],"When":"2024-3-3"},{"Name":"Kelly Man","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0WoeYd3GkcYb0grGDYAdIacEB1l7cpYjSE_3xFpg7GpUZaMte=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The hainanese chicken had no taste and was just oily. The chicken oil rice had no chicken oil taste. The fried rice was pretty mid.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOIKCJ_yssKecGYH2G5QnRp02UbDPNFFabC6kR4&fid=0x0:0xba4167c19cb25e1b"],"When":"2024-10-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"WanderingNomadJunky","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLV5nGXazxvMsF1gu1JToxDjQdzN7lbcZ-wJLf6VmKi487Kmt5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very very busy for a Sunday of course. Just a note. Reservation only means you get priority but not an exact guarantee for a table. The food is tasty. For dim sum you have good portions. Service is fast. Very loud and lively like a typical Chinese restaurant. Lots of parking too","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKnbiCklnba5KsX-qbJd9arsThZpkAzBGxsfVy&fid=0x0:0x6c43ef1bf6d6e7bb"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Ying Ng (Nalylstyle)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXG5NfQHtnrYR1cCcHw2vrrGTZgugO-IaiPyWd-H1JDTJJGHik=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This was my first time at this place, but my family has been here before. They wanted to try it again because the last experience was just okay.

I called to make a reservation for 10:00 am, but when we arrived, the host told us we needed to leave the table by 11:00 am, which was not mentioned when I made the reservation. I explained that it would depend on how quickly the food was served. She replied, "Just try your best to finish before 11:00 am."
I thought, "she replied me, and it's not my problem if it takes them longer to bring the food."

After we ordered, our food arrived quickly, but it was only room temperature, with no steam. Honestly, I didn’t enjoy it and wondered why my family liked this place. They told me it didn’t taste like this last time.

The service was okay. They refilled water and tea, brought what we asked for, and paid attention. However, the place was busy and needs more cleaning. We found table cloths and chopsticks under the table, especially near the chairs, which we noticed when something touched our feet.

When it was time to pay, I noticed that food was “cancelled “ was still charged on the bill. We asked to cancel it after paying and nearly leaving, another employee brought the bill and asked us to pay again, even though we had paid just a few minutes earlier. There was no apology for the inconvenience.

We definitely won’t be coming back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8Tqibx0mzPUSrARDHEo2eQwtxlw2clTlpY7TW&fid=0x0:0x6c43ef1bf6d6e7bb"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Hiep Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMRHHZ7t798igHqhwEObqqiXXBYRe7_vTRRS3-gXG7fOgZlXSH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came here for dim sum with wife and kids and in laws.  Food came out within 10min after we ordered. Place was 90% full on a Tuesday.  We enjoyed the food, was pretty good. Price came to $107 + tip for 11 items. I remember the good old days when it was $2 per dish! Theres free parking in the Plaza.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQr-6XlOSdqdHEw-E9YugHkalaMG6DP7fZlY18&fid=0x0:0x6c43ef1bf6d6e7bb"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"eddy wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8Fjpj3y8teHQ4LqbC4PHR8whbU4-XOrTXEwklI9bGRqZLRD20=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This was my first time here. I loved the free parking lot in the back, there’s tons of room. Across the street there’s a Korean market as well.

Upon entering the host didn’t acknowledge me and was doodling with a pencil. Finally she asked if I had reservations and I said yes. Then she told me to wait cause the grand master chef was eating breakfast 😆

Ok so … she guides me to the table and instead of a 6 seater she gave us a 12 seater and said there’s a 1hr 30 min limit. I felt like everyone was staring at our table. It was literally 4 adults, 1 child, and 1 infant 😆.

Anyhow. The food comes. The sui mai, sticky rice, and ground pork dumplings were small. But they redeemed themselves with the big platter of crispy noodle chow mein 😬🔥.

As for the service staff, almost a near hit with the infant. Sister in law was carrying the baby and a server with blue hair came to our table and turned the lazy Susan without checking and one of the plates was too long and tipped over a hot cup of tea almost splashing the baby.

Overall, yeah it’s good. But it could be better.
The service was a turn off mostly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMiFDtHkA5QE6tFWJV0hTGjKZj4SoETFJhhszeF&fid=0x0:0x6c43ef1bf6d6e7bb"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Angie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyUjdZQkz0bhaDppuQsySaOzrLROWSfhKe7zzOgxtMex30Fg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came here for their 4 people course set dinner. Soup was not thick and flavourful. The pigeons were crispy on the outside, juicy on the inside. Lobster was fresh. Fish was a bit oily and the pork was too soggy. Overall I’d recommend this set dinner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMik4-lbvvtmBUb-B-GycZXYEmwrjPtPRVJ26wQ&fid=0x0:0x6c43ef1bf6d6e7bb"],"When":"2024-5-31"},{"Name":"Sandy Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJWFvGDL4OpMJfsmo2W6SZGNnEyPVBpmLQRbR-gF4KEQU7Jcw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I only wanted to say - very good food.  Best 酒樓food I hv ever had in Vancouver during my stay.  Love the lobster with rice at bottom.  Service is good too. The manager is very friendly.  Lots of space for parking!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRVLGGS78SWWoHh12hrWGRBb3VL9rLN00hdwHG&fid=0x0:0x6c43ef1bf6d6e7bb"],"When":"2024-7-11"},{"Name":"Joey Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIncJBLfbVzRO24PRdfxE4-hovZn6C_s4RV_vqsGslULP8YEA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Dim sums were not bad, fairly standard.

Service was quite good. It was not like they did a lot, but about things that they did not do. We spent more time on talking than eating, but no servers tried to rush us to leave. We had a great time catching up.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-fyA09XlCiOPDE0UlcrgOF1QvvM9eC99_CTxU&fid=0x0:0x6c43ef1bf6d6e7bb"],"When":"2024-6-21"},{"Name":"Amy Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvtm7hBqZHDYxXgP_oxkelx2FGhwfW-EuwTv9rdyjxo-_-_8Nq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The dimsum was pretty good. Reservations don’t do much we still waited 20mins to get seated. Egg tarts are super flaky and salted egg yolk bun was very runny 👌🏼 Siu mai was pretty standard. Pan fried bun could have been more crispy but it was really soft and pillowy, lacked filling and juice.

Service is typical Chinese service - they’re very busy so you will get what you want but attitude is not the best. Food came quite fast once we sat down it was great. They kept rushing us to leave toward the end. Seating is super tight but expected.

5 of us dined for $158 after tip; we definitely ordered too much food and were stuffed. Wouldn’t mind coming again if we are in the area but not dying to.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYglmPl8lnV0OVrZXN3SG1BU1ThJCpN_DD6hrB&fid=0x0:0x6c43ef1bf6d6e7bb"],"When":"2024-6-2"}]

title: Riverway Clubhouse
address: 9001 Bill Fox Way, Burnaby, BC V5J 3H6
descriptions: New Canadian fare in a lofty space with floor-to-ceiling windows & a patio with golf course views.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Beverly Ilaine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJOfKPZbMvb42_xrZF5ClhSC5jdqhApu7E9LUpCeuCFmvWbiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am so happy we chose Riverway as our wedding venue. Everything went perfectly. The whole process was very organized and the staff were all awesome to deal with. Bradley was our contact through the whole process and he was very kind, professional and patient with my million and 7 questions! All my quests were very impressed by the food and many said it was best wedding food they have ever had. The desserts were also delicious.  I also received a lot of compliments on how beautiful the venue is. The staff were very on top of the buffet and making sure food was replaced as soon as getting low and the chef was able to accommodate the few guests I had who had special dietary needs. One of the reasons I chose Riverway was the very transparent pricing as well. I compared several venues before choosing and I especially liked how straightforward the pricing structure is at Riverway and it made it easy to plan my budget. I have zero regrets or complaints and could not have chosen a better place to share my special day.

Update:  Two weeks after wedding I am still getting calls and texts about how good the good the food was. Many friends shocked two vegetarians had such good meat dishes and said the prime rib was perfection.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNijlofkhNX_GDeBA9kazvfftJynyKSbVD_ZLsD&fid=0x0:0x6b1815483dcb77f4"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Gloria Kwok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDAFqPWRWeT53N4LeEy3NovGglbPNXMDbhXHfakPDm-pA7Xgc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There is no doubt we picked the perfect location for our big day. Riverway Clubhouse offers a modern venue with a touch of rustic charm. I love how the reception area is connected to an outdoor patio and leads seamlessly to the ceremony area, right beside a small lake with a fountain and overlooking the lush greenery of the golf course. The facilities and landscaping are impeccably maintained. I must also mention how stunning the sunset was, casting its glow right above the fountain in August and creating a magical scene for our sunset photos. This is something we will never forget!
We are so happy we chose the plated dinner option, which was a crucial requirement for us. The food was amazing, and many of our guests complimented it, especially the dessert buffet. The serving staff and bartenders were professional and fun to talk to. Supervisors Bradley, Laura, and Tegan were friendly and accommodating with all our requests, making the wedding planning process smooth and worry-free.
Thank you for making us feel special. Your professionalism and effort are truly appreciated. We highly recommend couples to check out Riverway and consider holding their big day at this amazing venue!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnsMqKS38ge5dj7bNn8fazBvtKtAAnW5-cFxiJ&fid=0x0:0x6b1815483dcb77f4"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Ivy C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJI-0DKHrbq9cwyZtdxoyTslChz-bW4i6IP-K3UiX51ZmB2O262=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can not imagine myself having my wedding anywhere else but here.

We hosted our wedding here in September and couldn’t have chosen a better venue with such an incredible team. Bradley Binkley guided us through the entire booking process and handled all the details for setting up the venue, showing great attention to detail and quick responses to our inquiries. We needed a customized menu to meet Buddhist vegetarian and allium-free requirements (no onion, garlic, chives, leeks, or shallots), and both Bradley and Chef Mok made sure everything was perfectly tailored to our needs. Our guests raved about the menu Chef Mok created, and many said they would return just for the food alone. Laura, who supported us during the tasting and on our wedding night, along with the entire Riverway staff, was friendly, welcoming, and accommodating. If you’re considering Riverway Clubhouse for your special event, you can be confident that it’s a fantastic choice, backed by a team committed to making your experience truly exceptional.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHEHXfY_B0gq6V3tIlVbQ_QZfUBtNq2yT_-Pma&fid=0x0:0x6b1815483dcb77f4"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Swimming Lion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoNuKoBPU8hDsJrOBlEDRPQawlWHi3C9rUvrLYtz7paaZM0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Very disappointed
Quality of food is horrible
The AAA New York steak ( Steak  and Fritz)  was super chewy its as chewy as puppy’s toy for almost $50/pax meal I was hoping for something much better
Poke bowl is another nightmare , rice is hard and cold , salad was dry and tasteless
Atmosphere was good and relaxing but server not friendly make the whole stay rather awkward

Free parking though

most golf course restaurant that we visited mostly have  nice environment and great food today really caught me by surprise","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcyuKI3ORTMtOry20T_EAR3gtlo5gjTWzUIhKg&fid=0x0:0x6b1815483dcb77f4"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"JR Wedding","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLft8D7bIDwDyi3Q6WmFcD4HucbpHTggcTCsUbJdmUGFT9NHdM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First and foremost, thank you for providing such an amazing venue and making our day so special! Our family and friends couldn’t stop raving about the delicious food, and the staff at Riverway went above and beyond with their professionalism and care. The Riverway Club made our wedding a day we’ll cherish forever. Wishing you all the best, and thank you again for everything","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvZEwEVTqJkuXh4UsCGV-8sFaBtW_ywAWKlln1&fid=0x0:0x6b1815483dcb77f4"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Kathy Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiyb_IZpx_WoUpDbNVrKDpyLmD7_rVs6LOSYuAzIVmUAcA7Ma7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We have reservations for 4 people at Thursday 5:30 PM,  I was thinking I am early but it was no parking at all and I have to park out the road.

I saw the manu it was different at Web site and I am kind of disappointed because not much to choose from the manu.
(Please see attached photo)

Therefore,  three of us were chosen for Roast Beef set dinner with lobster. ($39+15)

The set includes soup or salad, roast beef and dessert.  The whole set was very delicious especially the beef very soft and coffee cake 🍰 too.

The service I only give 3 star because the waitress didn't come check on us at all after she delivered the main dish and even we don't have water any more.
The food I only give 4 star because I didn't try other dishes yet.

I highly recommended to try to eat here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5F1sjg11lQjtg4gdBzQwjDaxI5z8Riq_FpipE&fid=0x0:0x6b1815483dcb77f4"],"When":"2024-6-15"},{"Name":"ruth navarro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkRURw3ECASwnLbqNJwjvkMfMteELmGMRTGpYujyJA4HxtVhyw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Attended a wedding reception. There was quite a spread: salmon, chicken breast with mushrooms, roast beef, lots of veggies, salads, etc... everything was scrumptious!
Even the dessert and coffee was really good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvaXxhT1F9QSmNDyHUrXVlBrN015kh4RYEzEb9&fid=0x0:0x6b1815483dcb77f4"],"When":"2024-6-29"},{"Name":"Jason S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJkCj-jc2YXNtXhtWIHMiswaQLIS5bwxc3U-1qEa51OCIRs3w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bradley and the Riverway team did a fantastic job hosting our wedding and reception. The venue is absolutely perfect and the food was excellent. Our guests were raving about how much fun they had! We looked at many venues before deciding on Riverway, and we definitely made the right choice in being patient. If we had an opportunity to do it all over again, we would definitely go with Bradley and the team. Thank you for making our wedding day memorable!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMu693kmMFcHWCNmj6psGQUrwPFOrZPrlABHzfZ&fid=0x0:0x6b1815483dcb77f4"],"When":"2023-9-1"}]

title: Happy Valley Food City
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Alcohol","enabled":true},{"name":"Beer","enabled":true},{"name":"Cocktails","enabled":true},{"name":"Coffee","enabled":true},{"name":"Hard liquor","enabled":true},{"name":"Late-night food","enabled":true},{"name":"Small plates","enabled":true},{"name":"Wine","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Breakfast","enabled":true},{"name":"Brunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true},{"name":"Catering","enabled":true},{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true},{"name":"Seating","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"Groups","enabled":true}]},{"id":"planning","name":"Planning","options":[{"name":"Accepts reservations","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"children","name":"Children","options":[{"name":"Good for kids","enabled":true},{"name":"High chairs","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kit Yee Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUy4hyLjXryzPjKJf4N3DUJBAsHtZSSuk76pvxFtVmwfHSV1Gtd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I bought take out and tried two dishes of their dim sum (steam rice rolls and beef tendons and stripes) as well as a couple of fried rice and fried rice noodles with beef for lunch. All of them were pretty good. The restaurant offered 10%off for take out if paying by cash or debit card.

I also came here for dinner with family. Please see attached photos. All of them were pretty good. It let the Chinese requirements - enough “wok hey”. It was between $50-$199 so we got a free dim sum for next time.

We thought we finished dinner. We paid and almost wanted to leave. As soon as we left, a server brought us purple rice dessert. It was really good filled with beans, purple rices and others. It was very delicious and filling. It was much better than the red bean soup!

The service was great. Servers were polite and friendly and they smiled with us. They got a parking lot right outside the restaurant. It was full of cars but we could still find parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5QeyLzhudrpitZnO9BjTsqb-Jk0XrfogPNFEE&fid=0x0:0x97f14aa9f8867590"],"When":"2024-11-21"},{"Name":"Vancouver Foodie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8w6jkWQhHhs1Z246avVvoKQqrR4N6KZDvvFaklq629YACSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We went to the HK cafe section of the restaurant to try out a few dishes.

Price is at around $18 per dish and it comes with a drink.

We ordered seafood fried rice, stir fried beef noodles and baked chicken and pork chop mixed spaghetti.

Taste is alright but the restaurant got quite busy and even with a big parking lot, it became full easily.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOM9_bwSzky2yshiZmSlwgAP3duywt8IDeutMP4&fid=0x0:0x97f14aa9f8867590"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Hiep Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMRHHZ7t798igHqhwEObqqiXXBYRe7_vTRRS3-gXG7fOgZlXSH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We used to go to the old location many years ago for dimsum and dinner, and the service was great. Too bad this location the servers don't smile, if they did then the atmosphere would be so much better. Their shrimp paste with eggplant was the best I've tasted. And their deep fried pork dumpling (sweet fried skin on outside) was also extra good. They have a big parking lot here but it's always full so try to have lunch after 1pm. I would recommend trying out this place if you don't mind neutral service (they aren't rude, they just don't smile).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMA_KN6zGdWc1EYN2oHV-xoC0MDxakfOGnDHI1M&fid=0x0:0x97f14aa9f8867590"],"When":"2024-5-10"},{"Name":"Vern","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoBEa2DpCVgJo-G-26vwXXigumr7-aNIbPobMzYUx6xUys_Niz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a fantastic experience at Happy Valley Food City for dim sum! The staff were incredibly friendly and attentive, making our meal even more enjoyable. My girlfriend, family, and I had a wonderful lunch/dinner, with a wide variety of delicious dim sum options. Every dish was fresh, flavorful, and perfectly cooked.

Highly recommend this spot for anyone craving authentic dim sum and great service. We’ll definitely be back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michelle M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWeetN-W20mnzvtvgZG8vAeDlWwG6zd354oPCvc1I4B_3Cjy_PI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We tried the cafe side and ordered the Pineapple bun which was massive but bit dry. The bbq pork noodle soup was flavourful and the Yang Chou fried rice was huge portion but at a $25 price point.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMChimsH38Fr5puNVb1xQ-PF0OgvWLi7tnbEELs&fid=0x0:0x97f14aa9f8867590"],"When":"2024-5-10"},{"Name":"Fuzzy Nemo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMhjGNDhI-RZYgIiVRXnRDEQCiyyP-dsVjb7EhBkcymNr9MvYi0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was really good here.   We had 2 lunch specials for 2 people and it was plenty of food.  We packed it up for dinner.   Like most Chinese places,  they charge 0.50 for take out container, so be smart and bring your own.   Bill came out to about $43, tax and to included with a cold drink charge of $1 as well.  Parking was very easy.

Although I'm confused as to why they have 2 sections.   One for the cafe style and one for dim sum style.  What happens if I want cafe style, but wasn't a side order of dim sum?  Where should I sit?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfvliuaClzx6BUfYYlmybtN8ILMtCEu8TyA8Qj&fid=0x0:0x97f14aa9f8867590"],"When":"2024-4-8"},{"Name":"Lynn777","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBZnBEVlENBE7LHdJ-lxKJp37l4154WisVr2IXBKEEyCY9Xoau9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very busy Sunday! But it was definitely worth the wait!
We were told the wait was between 5 and 10 minutes but waited half an hour!
Once we were seated, though, service was absolutely great. Water, tea, and table settings happened within minutes, and our order came out fairly quickly, considering how packed it was.
I haven't had dim sum in quite a few years, and frankly, I didn't know what I was missing out on. We ordered 5 dishes and can say all were simply delicious, except the spareribs in bean sauce. It was chewy and had too much fat on it. 🥴
I would definitely recommend this place, but make reservations to avoid the wait. Especially if you are super hungry! I would have given 5 stars - the misleading wait time was a huge factor in giving 4 stars.
I definitely will go back, but I will be sure to make reservations during their peak hours.
We went there at 12 pm on a Sunday.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGz-P5KZnkBz1AF8ssI1vtB53sMnxcCQhyezqb&fid=0x0:0x97f14aa9f8867590"],"When":"2023-8-29"},{"Name":"Marc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgOwNQ-ZaAI-t1EaZ7yeBM2yptaOrq4hNsy085EyFMJEZaSS1rxA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Stopped here today for the first time after having received a recommendation from a friend.

In short: we ordered dimsum and enjoyed the food. Very tasty and freshly all freshly prepared.

We decided to return here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXQb-XkqSDfNA9quesprI8VnLz6kD7DSclFthW&fid=0x0:0x97f14aa9f8867590"],"When":"2024-4-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mike Carter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIz_gZ5gBnGugtZQRGmvbISHXsQ3hs3KL8nQDLUF1_KS_1CCw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"4 Stars, keep in mind that I rarely if ever give perfect scores so a 4 is very good.

This was my first time coming to this location which has a nice atmosphere and would come back.

My wife had the Creole Chicken which was very good and I had the Creole Sirloin Steak with Prawns.

I should have upgraded to the NY Strip in hindsight.

My rating would be 4 stars but when I ordered my steak I specified Rare but it came quite overdone, it was not pink inside.

I don't like to complain or send food back but I nicely mentioned it to our waitress and though it took some time they brought out a whole new plate which you can see in the pics is so much better.

So I commend the staff for rectifying this for me.

The one with a lot of char is the overdone one.

It was a good night and experience so my wife and I will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXUiN4-FRNXPE1NOZMcTOMjsfjlO_Xb-7vXkBL&fid=0x0:0xd2c166dcbeb6adee"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Stanley Lowe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLMA0j5YPV0e_ki7txxd7xeDBLDLGeQTP8WAcMSalz9cV9eFw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Went for late night. Happy Hour.

This location is always nice.  They mixed up our cheddar burger and brought us cheddar garden burgers instead, but they were super nice and comped our burgers.

We were super pleased with how they handled it and because they did it so well, we would totally go back.  They were also the few places that are open that late on a Sunday night.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHQ0AkHJjuMd2l8vwBbfelzzsPdF0YpY1mYWrp&fid=0x0:0xd2c166dcbeb6adee"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Hillbillytc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV833YeKMKJfxtYeKhRHVRSrikZoFOcCapKBwyEFBOnxiCMeXAZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The atmosphere was nice but a little cold in the part we were sitting in. Our server was very friendly and knew about allergies. Our meal was hot and very tasty. Lots of GF options. Would be a 5 star if they had some GF dessert options and some nice coffees or teas to go with dessert.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOQe6RhwF4BkPSdDigHcRUDTCkbg15Iq5lQjE4&fid=0x0:0xd2c166dcbeb6adee"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"Shabbir Hasim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUH8xK9SlJsdoc5DfEoB5FlFoU9-aoRbJheLKUaqIAfjk4NlYPF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first experience using Cactus Club as a venue for a party, and I must say the service was exceptional. The ambiance was top-notch. The management who coordinated all the services for my wife's 50th birthday celebration did an outstanding job. It was truly one of the best services I have ever received at any Cactus Club location. The staff, management, and all the service personnel who assisted in making my wife's day memorable were exceptional. The level of generosity displayed by this service was truly remarkable, and I would highly recommend it to all my friends and family for their event planning needs. Not a single one of my family members or friends left disappointed with the service, and the food and drinks served were of excellent quality. Thank you, Cactus Club, for being a part of my wife's 50th birthday celebration and making it truly special for me. Thank you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgfe31fwT91JCoVfI7910px1SG9PBDcQn7SQPy&fid=0x0:0xd2c166dcbeb6adee"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Mrs. Leci","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFUu7tIDGHhiFP61EOIZLCOSzvwJkGN10CXxqa6MRhYpyxpm4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Can't count the times I have dined in this location. It's very spacious, lots of options where to be seated (depending on your mood). Music/ambiance is great. The staffs are amazing (special mention, Georgia, just, the best!!!). Last but definitely not the least, the food! They cook the best steak! I always..and when I say always..it's really like everytime I dine there, it would be the Millionaire's Cut, fillet! The best! They know their craft...just..amazing overall. My favorite location to dine!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsfqBlY0TxFbVe1YMEbMRy7UbqEEltmX-RNAGl&fid=0x0:0xd2c166dcbeb6adee"],"When":"2024-3-21"},{"Name":"Sash","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsEN8LESXHdVUHALQ4S3DxVR2gfd5knlpOhRGZTjLzMJeMHtuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my fav location. The staff is super professional and nice. They have gluten free burger buns and other appetizers. So def have lots of options for celiacs. Plus the staff always takes extra care with food allergies.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKFucNBE0WzUX23mUoDg3eGC7DqGAidQtO9eUv&fid=0x0:0xd2c166dcbeb6adee"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Denis Santos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXF32K7mKkPkKCpGUSEjmRXhqYloH84bwlSW6sQJ_X-vjOnAtXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've visited this Cactus location multiple times and have tried almost every item on their menu. While Cactus may not be exceptionally extraordinary restaurant, it earns a solid 5-star rating from me due to its remarkable consistency. The food and drinks always meet a reliably high standard, and the service is consistently pleasant. If more restaurants maintained this level of quality, dining out would always be a great experience. The atmosphere is inviting, and the food quality is consistently good. The staff, including waitresses and hostesses, are always kind and patient. Moreover, the ambiance is good for various occasions—whether you're inviting someone on a date, enjoying a dinner with family, or just watching sports and having a few drinks and appetizers with friends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO37A6Izkeu1c1netw8d1OIduwoFSobNyTKbhoC&fid=0x0:0xd2c166dcbeb6adee"],"When":"2024-4-29"},{"Name":"Allezander Narciso","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKE2W15YLe8IrA1EfZqL4CN77l7oCDLc5904GDWfWYLu5x0ffRr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time to have dinner with family on Mother's Day. Server Zoe and the front hostess did an excellent job to make a memorable dinner worth spending. Food ordered from Appetizer to Main course and Dessert are served on time. The steak frites I ordered was a perfect medium rare. I highly recommend these restaurants to try. Kudos to the Chef and all staff members to maintain the standard.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4qYUSigMpqGT0F6ZNIXeOsrbxeT4weLtE_0bT&fid=0x0:0xd2c166dcbeb6adee"],"When":"2024-5-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJcSTrvAkETp5GS3z8RhAHVaYouKSaPeknm0ZxbLuelbq-2-0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The restaurant has a great ambiance, and the food is quite good. The steak was cooked well, though unfortunately, I got an edge piece that was overly salty. Since I was a guest, it didn’t feel appropriate to make a fuss or mention it to the server. Speaking of the service, it wasn’t the most professional. The server’s attitude felt indifferent. While my friend and I were in the middle of a conversation, she could have chosen to serve from the other side but instead served between us, completely interrupting our discussion. I think I saw her photo mentioned in Google reviews with comments about her service quality.

In the dim lighting, be sure to check the bill carefully, especially for groups of six or more, as they add an 18% gratuity automatically. My friend didn’t notice this and ended up tipping an additional 18% on top, and the server didn’t mention it.

This restaurant is located within a casino hotel, so while it’s convenient for guests and casino visitors, it might not be the top choice if you’re specifically after an outstanding steak.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7sZhAeYXuXIHQtmQvGT2CSTSox3q5-btfaLhL&fid=0x0:0xd45e50d67854772c"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Chris Yeung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcT6Z40EZW4C3yt0N7VoX3tM1V1mzzAe7xxRrgBiMmtInx7b7I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Located next to the Grand Villa Casino, there is a giant screen that welcomes you to the restaurant. There is a bar seating area with TV, the main dining room, an open kitchen where you can see the chefs in action, and if booked a portion of the restaurant can be used for private dining parties. There are different table side food items that they will finish/prepare in front of you if ordered. I would say it's a nice place for a special dinner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxHGHNVQSR4wsS1GjxKfqKduQfBTaWctOgLcFc&fid=0x0:0xd45e50d67854772c"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"Mir Ahmad Akbari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoqAwl2wcq3GFC6LxcKUr7DXqlhIRMpCsSeFBgLwXQJL2_LW0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Atlas Steak & Fish is a true treat for steak lovers! I tried the New York Striploin Steak, and it was absolutely perfect – juicy, tender, and grilled to perfection with a rich, smoky flavor that really brings out the quality of the meat. Every bite was packed with flavor, and it had that beautiful, slightly charred crust on the outside.

The Lamb Chops Steak was equally impressive. They were cooked just right, tender and full of that classic, savory lamb taste with a touch of seasoning that elevated the natural flavors without overpowering them. It’s clear the chefs know how to handle high-quality cuts of meat. If you’re craving an outstanding steak experience, Atlas Steak & Fish House won’t disappoint!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOweRLbsqZivqw2xCKDYrnkhcPMQ8OSo6d_buP6&fid=0x0:0xd45e50d67854772c"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Mr.TravelElite","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ6UqEna4S9A_-E0cxxYbWPUI4PZWbbnv7Ma-MBL_maF93P-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I look forward to celebrating my birthday at Atlas yearly because the service and food have always been exceptional. Unfortunately, this year was disappointing. From the start, our waitress seemed uninterested—there was no friendly introduction or small talk, which made us feel neither welcome nor acknowledged. She took our orders with minimal engagement and later returned, forgetting which side dish I had chosen. Her demeanour lacked warmth and genuine care; she only checked in with two brief, impersonal questions, "Is everything good?" before quickly walking away.

To add to the experience, I ordered a medium-rare tomahawk steak but received it rare. While the food had potential, the inattentive service from our waitress overshadowed what could have been a memorable meal.

This year’s birthday experience was particularly disappointing compared to previous ones. For the last three birthdays, whether I celebrated with a group or just my wife, the servers would always surprise me with a complimentary dessert. They either knew about it through the reservation or took the time to inquire. I had no expectations this time, as it was clear from the beginning that the waitress didn’t care. It’s disheartening to see such a difference in service on what should have been a memorable night.

After our disappointing meal, we only wanted the bill and a takeout box since we had a lot of food left. However, the waitress only brought one box, which was another oversight. By that point, we were eager to go. We ended up stuffing it all in one box, and we were done in an hour from
getting there and leaving because the lacklustre service made the experience far from enjoyable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdD-pzJyGpmepZVI5iYJQKVvD6yw_UAoTREfGU&fid=0x0:0xd45e50d67854772c"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Jonathan Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9QzZE25WJY2Aa0NjLRlLU5VaKnW39cVAjboDLckOZD4XxInumSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We had previously visited the Langley Atlas Steak + Fish and had a fantastic experience, so we were excited to try the Burnaby location while in the area. Unfortunately, our visit on November 30th for my wife's birthday fell short of expectations.

We had a reservation for an early dinner at 4:00 PM and arrived slightly early at 3:30 PM, hoping to be seated. The hostess, however, was engrossed in her iPad and did not acknowledge us for several minutes. When she finally did, she avoided eye contact and told us we could wait in the bar or until 4:00 PM to be seated in the dining area. We mentioned that we were there to celebrate my wife's birthday and opted to wait for our reservation time.

At 4:00 PM, we returned to check in and were once again ignored as the hostess continued tapping on her iPad. Eventually, she grabbed some menus and informed us that only the Happy Hour menu was available until 5:00 PM—a detail not mentioned anywhere on the website. In most restaurants, Happy Hour offers additional, cheaper options alongside the main menu, so we were surprised and disappointed to learn that we couldn't order from the full dinner menu until 5:00 PM. I shared our concerns, explaining that this wasn’t what we expected for a birthday dinner, but the hostess reiterated that our only option was to wait.

Once seated, our server greeted us, and we expressed our frustration. He agreed that the website wasn't clear and implied it wasn't the first time he'd received similar feedback. To his credit, he allowed us to order appetizers from the main menu but confirmed we'd still have to wait until 5:00 PM for entrees. This inconsistency—exceptions for appetizers but not main dishes—further dampened the evening. At this point, we considered leaving but decided to stay, knowing our dinner would take longer than expected.

After finishing our appetizers, the server returned to let us place our entree orders so they could arrive shortly after 5:00 PM. We ordered the lobster risotto, truffle tenderloin, and a side of brussel sprouts. While the food was delicious and well-prepared, the overall service left much to be desired. It was acceptable but lacked warmth, and despite multiple mentions that we were celebrating a birthday, there was no effort to make the occasion feel special.

We did receive a complimentary dessert, which was a nice gesture, but it came with "Happy Anniversary" written on it instead of "Happy Birthday." Given that our reservation noted the birthday celebration, and both the hostess and server were aware, this oversight felt careless. We didn't have the heart to correct it, so we simply ended our evening.

While the food lived up to Atlas's standards, the lack of clarity, underwhelming service, and missed opportunities to make the occasion feel special ultimately overshadowed our experience. We had high hopes for the Burnaby location, but unfortunately, it did not meet the expectations set by the Langley restaurant.

I don't expect we will visit this location again and would recommend the Langley location of Atlas Steak + Fish.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOV2Py0_vDTcgaljmnKfsV8P7i8EGb5NiWHc040&fid=0x0:0xd45e50d67854772c"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Nancy Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0OLHpxrUE61BZqWGZfm_HMiegDgnBQAyUAh3yxMEuIa2bR7Sy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a wonderful place to have
Christmas Dinner! Everything was
perfect, from the outstanding service
Richard gave us to the tasty drinks
and food. The only issue was that
our section experienced inconsistent
temperatures.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVZIfbEAzml5ytth53cHW3hh8R3VIhEvuAd5Pv&fid=0x0:0xd45e50d67854772c"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"Alan Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-QmMYfw75kgf5vonVt_7RAAdUJRl5hAF6Ijht6iC6ZE8aPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Haven’t been here since before the pandemic. Food is still as good as I remember it. The piano player playing this night was solid. September 1st

The server that served us though didn’t seem like she wanted to be there. Very emotionless throughout the night. I get more engagement at a quick service restaurant than I did from her….

Otherwise the night would have been amazing. It seemed like it was just her too cause other servers serving other tables seemed better","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPc5LkYwy9DpEKRoKmFn6uFdtc8iHI3pbdQ3r9l&fid=0x0:0xd45e50d67854772c"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Serendipity","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUk1F1vCkTVDoGHZtDDasanpZBAaBNg5gUIAu-btE3KAHbArMruDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"No joke, the best calamari I’ve had. All the meals were well seasoned and had good portions.

I liked the dim light concept too. Very cozy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQjv0sSZIEgCkOU3uSMdELm2BAhitcWsfV-I1Q&fid=0x0:0xd45e50d67854772c"],"When":"2024-11-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ryan Roulette","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUM8NIHV2-Utm1tuBMKuLVooVHig-eNGnSJqjxadsWoECegXpU9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely loved this Pho! I had the Pho Sate and Shrimp Salad Rolls. The sate was probably the best broth I have ever had! Creamy, spicy, and very flavourful. Highly recommend! The serving size was large and very filling. The sald rolls were also a good size and satisfying. Overall great experience and friendly staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNiD0X1-1UvbntfnE8CKJTWzfxWPW3xkDShxUJz&fid=0x0:0xad11212ac70d4b00"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Evon Tsang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJvHujww9uFxgsiZ71CuzdL-Kn-UTJtwb3Erm1KkKgV_QrVSA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for dinner on a rainy night. Ordered a hot bowl of pho and spring rolls. Great taste and huge portion. Service was also good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwEnKHX18Mb9Q7gOxZgpbQFp25dPUORKiNzag-&fid=0x0:0xad11212ac70d4b00"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Ghazal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUxPjakfUDfUlOphLX0NHrhY3j03bOfl1WB2qtK88VIEBoxSUc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place has a nice atmosphere and they serve good food with big portions.
Worth stopping by when in the neighborhood.
There’s plenty of parking in front of the restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORW0qj8ALHpPEHZR_ev4S6FCprSnftfQmXrLg1&fid=0x0:0xad11212ac70d4b00"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Harp Gold Heart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJPSNwfZh6dYGQo7WflUqyhGAhE0fp6fOYRvAUlrROss8jMIg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Great location and set up.  Lots of parking in the front and back. Hit and miss with the food and service.  Temperature is not always hot. Salad rolls with shrimp don't taste fresh.  The pho broth lacks flavor some days and some times it's great. The chicken wings were good but tasted reheated and old a couple of times. Do not get the chicken tenders.  They looked and tasted like they had freezer burn and the chicken was so chewy.  It used to be better. It's a nice place that is close to us so I hope it improves.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Peter Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKG1y3Jb9qfjl7qyLpjsCxZRT9vZsOl5_OH18cdd4vc3TWD_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been here many times. Relaxing atmosphere to eat in. Friendly service everytime. Foods taste great! Love the charcoal infused taste of the grill lemon grass chicken and pork.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOV8gyHdJgRcKEKQMlwGzg8eXziW_oOuQPbh-87&fid=0x0:0xad11212ac70d4b00"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Jack Yuen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJhRPpXHdrFGpSfFPj2Llvg9rACCkMWbpnKawexr7OBRxKhKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Restaurant looks nice in first look but lots of table still with dirty plate and even soup on the floor. I can understand with merely 2 servers they need to take care everything including preparing drink and cashier duty. Food is so-so and it is more on the light taste end. Portion also smaller compare to other Pho restaurant. We came in right after snow day. They have no HEAT and my noodle soup cool off very qucik. Nearly all the guests need to put on their thick jacket when eating. We also have dishes with grilled chicken and grilled pork and it is definitely over-grilled. My spring roll also have no sour dipping source plus my son raw beef noodles are supposed to be raw beef but come in nearly completely well done.... The ONLY BEST thing about this restaurant is plenty of parking in the rear","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2eyQT9YK3cJjw5tHNlslvZwJu3JnZOokbTIoO&fid=0x0:0xad11212ac70d4b00"],"When":"2024-1-21"},{"Name":"R Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocId81LTxnZGHjWTe-8F9MiSVXwn-xaqQiwF56roHs3sATTcIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Edited Aug 24: this place has gone downhill quick. I don't normally give bad ratings but I paid $19 for a takeout vermicelli combo with pork and chicken. It only had burnt dry pork chop, and 1 piece of chicken that looks like it had been chewed off by somebody (see pic). Gross! The portion is small, I am still hungry after eating (look at how the container is full of bean sprouts and salad). Never again even though I rooted for you guys, so disappointed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmjaq1YY1_F7MLGvrSAxTHpoT0O8hObnIwvSgp&fid=0x0:0xad11212ac70d4b00"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Tim Wei","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrOSXifH3JuzXzWUvKWYGGZgLgTLTiaN0cqL0pCJJ0cU6-Gl3q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Pho Den and ordered the rice with pork chop and grilled chicken. I must say that I was thoroughly impressed with the food. The pork chop was juicy and tender, and the grilled chicken had a great smoky flavor to it. The dish had a slight spiciness to it, which added to the overall taste.

Apart from the food, the ambiance of the restaurant was also great. The place was clean and well-maintained. The decor was simple yet elegant, which made for a comfortable dining experience.

Last but not least, I was really impressed with the service provided by the staff. They were friendly and attentive to our needs, which made us feel welcome and appreciated.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOr31B0WGoI88V1jau0XexMCgLJqImPFVpmMgW1&fid=0x0:0xad11212ac70d4b00"],"When":"2023-3-29"}]

descriptions: Bright, classy space for traditional Chinese fare & dishes with a twist, plus online ordering.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mrs. Leci","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFUu7tIDGHhiFP61EOIZLCOSzvwJkGN10CXxqa6MRhYpyxpm4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Enjoyed dining in here. We ordered a few dishes and it tasted really good. The wonton soup has a light taste and is not overwhelming which I love. It's a must have! I am bringing my family here soon so they could try as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0bSLqkjj0to-ac1CC5tVUfkN0ZyyxGr1abELX&fid=0x0:0xfa1efc383cd1040c"],"When":"2024-11-15"},{"Name":"Rebecca Peters","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0gHF18J3Ime6kTPm2yKeqHbZrYoz0bcO0n_npz5sOUy3HQe7Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The place had decent food… The fried rice had loads of shrimp in it (which I think is good but it was one shrimp in every bite?) I would also suggest them to add other meat in the same amount or balance it out? And the Hakka Noodles definetely need more salt..Either way, the shrimp spring rolls had my heart! There was some language barrier in the service but I suppose that could be improved on. If you’re looking for authentic Chinese food, then this is definetely a go-to-spot!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKYKRDRxF4u-75IOmoRp2F7oRycgMSHrfWA1ZT&fid=0x0:0xfa1efc383cd1040c"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"Maria Kwak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5R9KMKwNrVegfPRKZescuKSvbDd1qV2Wt9msWLwoDac6ZbF9E6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The servers were nice and atmosphere ok but the food was mediocre - some average and some less than average. We ordered:

Lemon chicken - breading was crispy, flavor was pretty good and white meat (5/10)

Chicken fried rice - just average, not great but not bad. Overall a little bland; some garlic would have made a big difference and better cooked rice instead of lumps of it not actually fried (4/10)

Mapo Tofu - not enough seasoning and flavor if seasoning itself pretty bland; could hardly taste the seasoning and almost felt like eating plain tofu (2/10)

Spicy green beans with pork - the most flavorful out of all the other dishes and pretty good but definitely have had a lot of better green beans elsewhere (6/10)

Prawns with cashew- pretty bland (4/10)

The service was fine, if anything the food came out super quick - seriously within about 5 minutes of ordering - but the food wasn’t anything to recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfKB5Wbiy3OvIrarWL90IQojK7QY3EHqZOgaJQ&fid=0x0:0xfa1efc383cd1040c"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"B W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJp85P5JohieEKJOfTMzyjH1aTNit_eIhBL3dFVyxf0xS2BxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The Missus and I along with the boys plus GF had dinner at the Burnaby Palace Restaurant.  We ordered a chicken chow mein, sweet & sour pork, beef gai lan, spicy squid, mapo tofu, lemon chicken and spicy pork chop. We found a few of the dishes were on the salty side, lacking “wok hey” or flavours of a seasoned wok and some pieces of the S & S rather on the tough or chewy side due to being refried or over fried. The spicy dishes were on the mild side of the hotness scale.

Service was fine except for one dish arriving very late. We noted the dining area was not at 100% capacity but there were numerous takeaway orders. We also overheard a disagreement by the cooking staff on an order mix-up. The busyness of the preparation of the takeaway orders may have contributed to our very average tasting dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOx8ogeIjLxHK9b8cs7NFCuP57A8f9gZJIBJhUw&fid=0x0:0xfa1efc383cd1040c"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Charles Vasquez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW13oqEbCKLva3GDyy3PbMbrqmhLidIYj4aQPMa6WW3vAAof4g9dA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food is good. Their ginger beef is one of the best in town. Curry dishes are not great here. Service is very good and fast. A little tight space in seating. Plenty of parking around. Overall, it's a good Chinese restaurant to dine in with family and friends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0w4_sIjdlFbUuKspGWfKKEH_wokLJFJ9faPyR&fid=0x0:0xfa1efc383cd1040c"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Lord Stanley (Lifepilot)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzQPaJP0C4QgYze9YWfcg4vOQGSlA7Fi1WI2IqpyzPqwuzcItLsg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My family and I recently celebrated my birthday at Burnaby Palace restaurant, and it was an unforgettable experience. The moment we walked in, we were greeted with warm smiles and excellent service. The staff went above and beyond to make our celebration special.

The food at Burnaby Palace was absolutely incredible. We have tried many Chinese restaurants in Vancouver, but this one stands out as the best we've ever had. Every dish was bursting with msg, and the ingredients were incredibly fresh. The chicken corn soup was a standout - it was rich, flavorful, and easily the best I've ever tasted.

Not only was the food outstanding, but the service was also top-notch. The waitstaff was attentive, knowledgeable, and made sure we had everything we needed throughout the evening. They even surprised me with a birthday dessert, which was a lovely touch.

Overall, our experience at Burnaby Palace was exceptional. If you're looking for the best Chinese food in Vancouver and a memorable dining experience, I highly recommend visiting this restaurant. You won't be disappointed.

I hope this helps you write your review!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPABXSeUMwDI4TBn_BOeAUkjT7kjvdVF8s4ybIJ&fid=0x0:0xfa1efc383cd1040c"],"When":"2024-5-18"},{"Name":"Robert Miller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlAkMc5h58DpsuTOrDV5dMZ_QamLBJDA5p60lG4V6c6STBi6Hg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here with some family for lunch. Every dish was great: green beans with black bean sauce, crispy skin chicken, fried fish with spicy salt, ginger beef, crispy noodles with chicken and vegetables, plain rice. Everything was tasty and would recommend everything we had. Hard to stop eating. The service was prompt, attentive, and professional. Some may think the decor is dated however we thought it looked nice and fit the place. Do you like Chinese food?  Come and try the food here if you haven’t already.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMePndO6X25289FJpIExpBjHr7vRIZnlvAVbn2w&fid=0x0:0xfa1efc383cd1040c"],"When":"2024-5-27"},{"Name":"Daniela Macharé","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXpBqjkFB_VrmsEDpKTl5wT7d1XmyHzdPWSDG5av3Z4wA9DFRPsig=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We arrived and were given a table quickly. They didn't take long to take our order and bring it to us. The service was very good. And the food was delicious. I will definitely be back! I recommend it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNC0XYoSTFBL4Rlv0P92xvcycB81NE7AMCpCZRU&fid=0x0:0xfa1efc383cd1040c"],"When":"2024-9-24"}]

title: Simba's Grill
descriptions: Small & large plates of East African eats plus curries & sides in simple digs with beer & wine.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dayane L.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-aVnBCjKWasiLYcwLUWwkm8MSQ2AzxjHXz_ufjrsjEZAUStCq4g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had an amazing dining experience at this place tonight!! Authentic African restaurant that truly exceeded my expectations. We tried the Kuku Choma, Lamb Biriane, and Muhogo, and each dish was bursting with rich, flavorful spices that showcased the vibrant cuisine. The Kuku Choma was perfectly grilled and tender, while the Lamb Biriane was fragrant and savory, with each grain of rice infused with delicious spices. The Muhogo was a delightful surprise, crispy and well-seasoned.

One of the highlights of our visit was the friendly and attentive service from the owner himself. His warm hospitality and evident passion for sharing his culture through food made our meal even more special. The ambiance was warm and inviting, making us feel right at home. If you're looking for an authentic taste of African cuisine, Simba Grill is a must-visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9RB4q8LyelKZ6ao33ZCpYtTw_AUXaV85dRVIn&fid=0x0:0xe480278a01e923eb"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"Asad Raquib","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7rtU11CxT0fodBl73a9UEIvQjIX5NMHx0OoO5M21-KUs2CVye=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's one of my recommended restaurants. Their food looks kinda Persian food, but it's not. It was totally different taste. Kebab was great, and Fish was top notch. I got a platter for 3 and it was enough food. We ordered goat biriyani, which was a surprise because I never tasted anything like that. It was kind of new to us. However, it was a great biriyani.
Overall, food and service were amazing","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOI-E25XEzOB5eazlQZmn89QVhEZKRnVXW4Kq5&fid=0x0:0xe480278a01e923eb"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Al So","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLumQHIv-5W9wXPr4ZbA1zWCVnPk2w1Kc3bjsO93-VMG-v7JQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We decided to brave the wilds of Burnaby and ventured into Simba's Grill, where meat is abundant, and spice levels are not for the faint-hearted. The Chef's Dinner for Two caught our eye — $90 for what turned out to be a full feast that easily fed our family of four! It came with a wild mix of BBQ steak 🥩 bites called mishkaki, lamb 🐑 kababs, fried fish 🐟, BBQ spicy chicken 🐔 tenders and spinach 🍛 with rice 🍚. Honestly, we felt like royalty dining on all this, and there were so many flavors. It was nice how the African flavors mixed with Indian.

We also ordered the Jungle Ribs because, well, who can resist ribs with a name like that? These ribs didn't just fall off the bone — they practically leaped off! I’m not sure if they marinate them in magic or what, but the ribs were juicy, spicy, and had us licking our fingers like cavemen (sorry, fancy napkins).

If you're into bold flavors and hearty portions, Simba’s Grill is a must-visit. Just be prepared to break a sweat from the spice...and from fighting over the last rib."","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPptWTutaBlndRDzFO4K1LYtEUnj76a3wpUHMG_&fid=0x0:0xe480278a01e923eb"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"Bwalya Kasanda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUSp7YawyPLujwBkxu-xPwqxNItwsziahRHHOOg3AjDq6LbG-EC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really good authentic Kenyan food. Loved the briyani and mango latte the most. The atmosphere is excellent, such a nostalgic African taste vibe. Simba I has genuine care for his customers. Definitely going back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFnNSaqapyZOiUm0WDj7kvMnB7AYXKXzn6Qn3G&fid=0x0:0xe480278a01e923eb"],"When":"2024-6-6"},{"Name":"Crumpet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqUrYEIjICTR659z-lo5J8BffAowjL0Sdr-55fKbEyQMifgHAd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came here by myself as I’ve walked by here many times before but never tried it out, I’ve also never really tried Kenyan food.

I have to say I was so pleasantly surprised, it was amazing. I got the mushroom curry with the fried dough (I forget the name for them) but it was so damn good.

They also gave me little sides to go with my curry to make it creamier or spicier but I wish they had explained it to me because I had to kind of figure it out on my own, I’m glad I did though because it made the experience even better.

Service was good! Nothing really to comment on there. Atmosphere was fine, there’s lots of nice art around but there wasn’t any music playing which made the restaurant feel kind of empty.

But the food alone makes this place worth going to, I’ll definitely be coming back. Definitely worth checking out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_0ZXVAhEIqmiQMKQ5UuXi2srj1x1Jkn6S7xEn&fid=0x0:0xe480278a01e923eb"],"When":"2024-4-17"},{"Name":"rocky constant","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWszrstfNu5K6Xj-WLZqVyyZPrK-Lb_17AjfYlder_AeIBKxyoLZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Mmmmh, the price was a little expensive, comparatively. The portion was a lot for rice though. Taste was aokay.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTMegTxPXspz1xGQEwiQBwK20Dfk6Tua58pUGR&fid=0x0:0xe480278a01e923eb"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Rozmin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlHgq5dFC4msgLTk2rCaaFQuUCiFzXX2Xk3zNnCe7rKAwcWE4ajQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is really good,  really solid.  Ordered a bunch of different dishes and they were all good.   Beef kebabs were excellent as was the mandazi.  Chai also good,  along with the samosas.   Pricey, but a nice treat.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chelsea Vancouver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHVWaXfVBGL-NRGFFbHN7eiAD3hCGrOaEohFBcpGwJyjbv0CUl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was great! Does have some vegetarian options, but not sure about vegan options. Bathrooms are individual rooms. Highly recommend the cheesecake and icecream.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuExtKtQsNt0fEzkgR8Hjhl8g-s8gBhnboh6U&fid=0x0:0xe480278a01e923eb"],"When":"2024-4-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nathan McCain","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMaTd10qU1yoxV34Ts6SnYTvzeaAiPCQDHNmqrHxF1m_kacFSH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very good soup dishes here - the dill and crab soups were both tasty and generously topped, meaning that value is decent even at a higher price point. I wasn’t too blown away by anything but also can’t really find anything to complain about… and this wasn’t quite as good as some of the other SEA food we tried in Vancouver proper, but it’s a solid spot nonetheless.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMB0EsYkNjLUHUXp32MCexVcCKy4Y5K2BJ-JB4d&fid=0x0:0x125122499b868919"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Steven Zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVF96PpJEq5cgttM3qKi9p--UNClQrOB08SgCnvRXnlmFg-MGh2dQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food here is great and the portions are large. I ordered the grilled lemongrass pork chop and chicken with steamed rice. The pork and chicken were very flavorful. It also came with a salad and a bowl of broth. Although the rest of the dish was good, the broth was incredible. I also ordered the spring rolls. They were crispy, but a bit lacking in flavor. Overall, there was enough for 1-2 meals depending on the person.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONNC9F3UIfLxlgUqYlQoBPQvIH5NDrDunJfMgW&fid=0x0:0x125122499b868919"],"When":"2024-10-30"},{"Name":"Scott Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHpW7vGME__Zs4wKjXR04Upnw88bkVVyz-H2288JsHocq9vI3r=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's one of the few Vietnamese restaurants that I had to wait for but I can why it's so popular. Everything was so fresh and tasty and the portions were huge. One thing to note is that they only accept cash or debit cards so keep that in mind when you go!

The restaurant wasn't too big, but it was very clean and the servers were very friendly and accommodating.

I got the fish cake & vermicelli in soup with some spring wraps and it was phenomenal. I also highly recommend the crab soup as well! A surprise hit for us was the fried squid which was hot out of the pan and was a good appetizer for the noodle soups.

Overall, I am eager to go back and try other menu options and I highly recommend this place for anyone who likes or would like to try Vietnamese food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdlqaOdxb0v7eiTIWvZwnt4iGepqFLuNGtJcXe&fid=0x0:0x125122499b868919"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"Eric Jia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVayPVyMs8cXoTnLF-1wINmBGj4ROvmD5YPh1QKFm4CL7A4yV6mg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super good food. The beef pho was phenomenal, along with the crab pho that the waiter recommended.

The other appetizers and dishes were also very delicious. Definitely go for the fried chicken wings and the fried squid! After eating a bowl of beef pho along with a few sides I was full. Prices were quite reasonable.

Servers were very friendly and even took their time and gave us great recommendations.

Would definitely come back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVgZlmBkY6omxStELuvWRiX1TgL88VbTsCWPIY&fid=0x0:0x125122499b868919"],"When":"2024-5-21"},{"Name":"Joshua (ThickBurger_Bites)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbIhhMlbxk7OIMpcaP-aSx2m75kt8-mqmXoXAJQ5K99gnxiff1zg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went for the opening. 15% off for 2 weeks starting 28 March 2024.

Food: Ordered the House Special, number 7, and Special Crab Soup, number 23. Flavour was alright. Broth for the house special was light, herbal and relatively flavourful. As you can see in the photos and video, the broth is clear and relatively not greasy. However I felt it was slightly salty and it left an odd aftertaste after the meal.
The special crab soup was good, just bursting with flavour, egg and crab mix were just right, but the ingredient portion seems to have been reduced slightly as compared to their original location, and their expanded location along Victoria Drive.

Service: Good. Jessica, the owner’s daughter was going to each table to apologies for the delay on bringing out the food but we felt it wasn’t that bad, given it’s a new location and their first opening day.

Price: Approximately 17 to 18 per person before tips and with the promotion.

Would I recommend: Yes. Pho is always recommended. Especially since they’ve got a specialty that can’t really be found in other Vietnamese restaurants.

Parking can be a bit of a pain though as there’s only street parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM129wUH0eJ0SNl6At13b7P7XoedUhYdeXY4KGz&fid=0x0:0x125122499b868919"],"When":"2024-3-29"},{"Name":"Quan Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-pZoPYeXOZPMkFMWnt3iHTw-bLVVD4nPlpNeu5CixkZ08tZvrEw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I will come back. That is a wrap up overall for this restaurant. Going into more detail: the quality and quantity of foods are awesome. The service is on point. However, I did not like the fact that I have to squeeze myself and share my table with other customer because the restaurant front space is narrow. You try to put more table on the floor and indirectly you squeeze us in the room. Line up is about max 20 mins.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDQnVmbcIXhX6r2A1Jo5wFeY-Q7eJE62R4C93H&fid=0x0:0x125122499b868919"],"When":"2024-5-5"},{"Name":"Naythan Rasquinha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvE2B428G9mm4S7ORqKOWfPtfOeyYdrOMRGE8Ng1kJvBb6v8g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tried the bun rieu at Bun Cha Ca Hoang Yen in Burnaby, and it was amazing! The broth was packed with flavor and perfectly balanced — ideal comfort food on a rainy Vancouver fall day. The combination of crab meat, pork roll, and shrimp was delicious, adding so much depth to every bite. I’ll definitely be back to have it again. Highly recommend for anyone craving rich, authentic Vietnamese flavors!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0Bt6Azr6DJazBAAdb1KsazgLZv5AQWbERnmwT&fid=0x0:0x125122499b868919"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"M. A.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLB10KqeIl0fqiL0pGNdfKbos8ZnoBDkwk_kgO3yJezaC8LhTs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was good, and they also have a big portion of servings. However, the service cart just beside my table caught my attention while eating. It was dirty. They should maintain cleanliness in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMli2A8XPaeHMz59SrcnbvENflf1-Sza9IxZ-p3&fid=0x0:0x125122499b868919"],"When":"2024-9-3"}]
