user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Hillbillytc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV833YeKMKJfxtYeKhRHVRSrikZoFOcCapKBwyEFBOnxiCMeXAZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The atmosphere is a little loud during rush hr. The   food was okay a little salty. Lots of GF options. Charlotte was amazing. She really knew about food allergies.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjgDRMHYhBVv-aah-OeLTGeqPMr1GwRvKTHi7N&fid=0x0:0xb774fd12cddbe3f5"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"The Wandering Pianist (Lee)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVUBZsAZ9EIBNq_deJHz3XkOMnrx0qKLTX4AxUFQWwPgJ7rvtDl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was great, the service was fast, and the ambiance was A-okay. Special shout-out  to Ayushi for looking after us. She explained the menu very well, patiently answered our questions, and  checked on us. A great asset to the food industry!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcXjF-xt8y-1PPkpnECYUzjEmeaZ8lAAKvnQFo&fid=0x0:0xb774fd12cddbe3f5"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Enrico Buenaventura","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXC-_JhiSZzA_lg6KL0xNy2Misew0rTke-JdRRIj1tbTzVbK8tN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A must visit whenever I am in the greater Vancouver area. First time in this location. A compromise but perfect location between downtown Vancouver and Langley for a small gathering for a lunch chat.
Had craving for the clam chowder and a bacon mushroom burger with fries. But a colleague ordered a strawberry milkshake and on a hot day, that seemed like a really good idea. Unashamedly ordered same.
The place was not crowded and the service was relaxed but staff were very friendly and responsive. Food was what I expected and remembered.
Facility was accessible and washrooms looked well maintained and clean albeit felt a bit dark. Though it seems to fit with the overall design of the restaurant.
The booth was reasonably comfortable but recall them to be a tad more roomy. This maybe more related to my increasing girth over the years than the furnitures themselves. Appreciated the thoughtful details with the hooks to hang a jacket or walking canes for example.
The staff let us linger awhile and just chat and reconnect. This was very much appreciated.

Cravings met. Expectations met. Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPl2DHDSKR1uuJkmxvKLaG8ZXqou_IbbCBHhV_F&fid=0x0:0xb774fd12cddbe3f5"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"Amit Patel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQ4BWWOt-MFNnYLuIrS2NwWeJ6KyjNkjkl1nXIyIhTmr_T7w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent all around service.  If your looking for beverage suggestions or something to snack on, my server Charlotte was very helpful in my past few visits. Manager Michelle is always greeting customers with a warm smile 😊  If you need a sporting events up on tube, don't be shy, ask Michelle!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbQ9h_xFkDKV5MugBtHSZVcfdrFsOlw5vrdYFY&fid=0x0:0xb774fd12cddbe3f5"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"jason wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLAr7OPM3u3i7bBkh0r7Q9kS7_8Gu_88Crv223BgydShD66TQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Big portions, they make exception if you need to change the food items on your plate.. staff is very easy to talk to.. great Service.. very good breakfast..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhyCwxH8amz9xateEyXqeIuTwLDEQFTKydWAVD&fid=0x0:0xb774fd12cddbe3f5"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"Pam Delfino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVou97WNj_X-lZ_I6WAUZr7ELzzqVVEd-LYy7ydp9dEDslErRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Enjoyed a lovely family dinner here - delicious food, friendly service, and overall great experience! Fish and chips were fantastic!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMd8D5XBePmq2NsnfIOal_jAQa8tZyGLDybvf8L&fid=0x0:0xb774fd12cddbe3f5"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Adrian Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJRz_uEV8AM70-EugybmCMjVZLIi0OfMP3My2LKS1PidWwGuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best White Spots in the Lower Mainland. The outside is unassuming, but there is plenty of parking. Inside is nice and bright and well kept. Service was very friendly and polite. Food was excellent and very nicely presented. Happy and enjoyable experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7zK7idX3fOnsW6-8O3d4uXxB3oYGUQ9kkQ1nI&fid=0x0:0xb774fd12cddbe3f5"],"When":"2024-5-21"},{"Name":"Reza Tayebli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcT2fOJoRAr7FvIHh1G5PVgmbDiwwKBvZ1eyTjxq0G-ExmlAk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing experience in a cozy environment, kind staff, and a great taste and texture of food and drinks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPpmlgjioIKBqcSlvFqtxHC2fUGYR-X-lDXE_zP&fid=0x0:0xb774fd12cddbe3f5"],"When":"2024-7-21"}]

title: Pot Empire
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Curbside pickup","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Alcohol","enabled":true},{"name":"Beer","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true},{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true},{"name":"Seating","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"Groups","enabled":true}]},{"id":"planning","name":"Planning","options":[{"name":"Accepts reservations","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"children","name":"Children","options":[{"name":"High chairs","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Paid parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Paid street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lydia X.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViT0kOTUfe-14sI-XZzuSAMJ11zLMz2yRFRP-Y15rc4maS4qQo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very vibrantly lit with cool neon signs inside that gave it a funky, fun vibe. The sauce bar isn't extensive (but it's clean) and the bottom part of the menu was super faded.

The food selection is good, but not very dietary restriction friendly. No substitutes for anything in the pots, although they are willing to remove things you don't want. Come after 8 pm to add an extra portion of meat for a low price. The upgraded rice with braised pork was delicious. Portion sizes are generous and it's a decent spot for an interesting twist on hot pot.

Service was quick and efficient.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMEIhmEyfId32l4-bCJlOmUbI3VLGTnFZvxbV3z&fid=0x0:0xaf6058d9910d3d33"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Theresa Ting","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3lYm9Q6eJ90P0HKqu2eawp2aRRW-o3ccB0AkqiwwJmmZFSQM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went in today shortly after they opened. Only one set of customers inside on Saturday morning. The server explained to us thoroughly how their individual hotpot sets work - select your soup base, type meat, rice/noodle and drink. At the end of your meal, you’ll be served an ice cream.

All in all a good experience - staff were all super friendly and attentive (even when it got to be quite busy).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMh3JrovX5uciI0sZqRjl-e_auaTWDWGIs_QdWm&fid=0x0:0xaf6058d9910d3d33"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Justin Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdx52Kikwc0qLXVIQ56I9QgSYzQs4FktHZQJNeWk16LhVxDTSZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Saw this place on the gram, and we love hot pot so decided to come try it out. My advice is: RUN!!!

Go to Boiling Point, Big way, or Cho Cho if you don’t want to get disappointed.

Yes, the decoration is nice, looks good on the gram, but the soup base is tasteless, only saving grace is the dipping sauce.

It’s on the pricey side for what you’re getting. The ingredients are not that fresh, and no extra utensils for the raw meat.

If you can see pass all those things, the service is extremely bad, I understand we came within an hour of closing, but they were sweeping the floor while we just started eating, and mopping around us. Someone slipped and fell on to me, hit me in the back, and no sign out to warn people that it is slippery. No one apologizes or even check in the person who fell.

We got so upset that we left after we finished, and didn’t ask for the ice cream.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNd4JrNGqAB0O8Mfn_AM9VR-R1_z7LQda4ALvGu&fid=0x0:0xaf6058d9910d3d33"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"mickey grace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2koY7ZFfBdWpziRjPP5TFVjsrz4r1zt6MPtsM4mBH9nhU6uE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As a Taiwanese, I find most hot pot places quite similar, but this one stands out. The broth is rich and flavorful！ The highlight is the ingredient platter—it's super generous and includes rare items like lotus root! The prices are very affordable, and I've already come back several times!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJtJCWXIPJERKmJAJ1waP43DgKllC0pQAJ_vJL&fid=0x0:0xaf6058d9910d3d33"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Jay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXpO4Bh8DZWAUVAzJ_hJYjoLutXZbl0vSp4y69d3OqZWEClfNlh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My new absolute favorite hot pot spot in town! 🍲🔥 The variety of combination options is seriously impressive, and you can customize everything to your taste. The tomato soup base? Next level—rich, tangy, and packed with flavor.

I also loved the self-serve sauce bar where you can get creative with different sauces, herbs, and condiments. Plus, free refills on drinks and your choice of rice or noodles? That’s a win in my book!

The vibe here is super welcoming, and the staff are always around to help if you need anything.

We’ll definitely be back soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJc0yXAEyA-A26T1in3oKqUT5QNC2HXkpBFyVa&fid=0x0:0xaf6058d9910d3d33"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Lucy Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuwCjTEBDQem6hcfmmxSA0I0nNlJPkS88N0KyjwlMUZAjI_Jdm8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I tried this place last weekend and it was alright, I ordered their classic bone broth (my go to for hotpot) and it was flavourless, I definitely recommend trying out the other broths and don’t recommend the bone broth I got. The other broths however are around $8 which is kinda pricy imo compared to other hotpot places. The portions however are so big and super worth it. I got the beef & shrimp combo and for $30 the portion is so worth. Their beef and shrimp were also pretty fresh. You also get free milk tea / yakult green tea and icecream with your meal, and the milk tea and icecream are good! The decor and interior of the restaurant is super cute and the service was good as well! Overall the food is okay and experience would of been better if I chose a different broth base!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOV8FdBPRtiFd0RtpH2pIuo08Tm_TzBl8ZnFSWE&fid=0x0:0xaf6058d9910d3d33"],"When":"2024-11-13"},{"Name":"Jessica Andrews","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjWj4xlnnk9ThCvCUccUtIh9m58xuPlJNWSfuXRF8Y-qOhGeyPTw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The service was so kind and attentive. The food was definitely very good value. A very good variety of foods for a very good price. It's an individual hot pot for each person!! You get to make your own sauce, and get free edamame for an appetizer, and free ice cream cone (different flavour regularly) at the end! This is the perfect place if you are new to hotpot! Plus the neon signs are awesome.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhbHIfTc55__K-k9SwCOs9qfZpLAHmAoSCs6-8&fid=0x0:0xaf6058d9910d3d33"],"When":"2024-5-19"},{"Name":"h chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJCSvXAQfL37vg-iumuxJNyd2PtybYrL0eAMA7-ABMCKkgU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Right across Metrotown, this location is quite busy. Ordered the blade meat set 5oz, slices are very fresh as well as a variety of vegetables  in the soup pot. Paid parking available at indigo lot behind the store. Drinks were ok, a bit watery for my taste. But ice cream dessert is an added plus!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNk0nfa87pN8nUa1XU8JSDOgIy3A_BfwTRJmyw&fid=0x0:0xaf6058d9910d3d33"],"When":"2024-10-25"}]

title: Ha Cafe
descriptions: Unassuming eatery serving pho, banh mi & other traditional Vietnamese specialties.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Derek Shek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP9Pjija1abf8rOsOgAPBkesWOZ8sALAjyQJKt0I-DTaykDkHV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ended up at Ha Cafe on a whim when our original lunch plan fell through, and what a delightful surprise it turned out to be!

Nestled right next to the closed Mui Garden Restaurant, Ha Cafe offers a genuine taste of Vietnamese cuisine. I savored their BBQ chicken and pork rice, which was exceptionally juicy and flavorful, truly capturing the essence of authentic Vietnamese dishes. My friend enjoyed their beef noodle soup, which was equally satisfying.

We tried both hot and cold Vietnamese coffee, which were average, but the overall meal experience was wonderful. The staff were welcoming and friendly, enhancing our visit.

Definitely planning a return visit to explore more of their menu!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_uBFdZIpPoSWJt6oDj6po-4RLGU-ZxHfmD0Zd&fid=0x0:0xe0d2ff6b5cbae9b4"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"NC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUi7i4NwNpNEzIszjhbxKRN43HbVvZt8x4BOGr2pmqSj3ZKyWTz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ha Cafe never disappoints. We often dine in but do take out more since we live close by and like eating at home. The portions are great, and the food is delicious. Not salty or under-seasoned! Take out never takes more than 10 mins to prepare and dining in means we get to see the lovely staff. I wish they would turn on the TV or play some music for ambiance but not a big deal :) my favourite item is the short ribs on vermicelli!! I could eat it every day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpMIbdzszxmabJ6n12OfSCx5VmbcUXU0ggo5jb&fid=0x0:0xe0d2ff6b5cbae9b4"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Maxim Borzenkov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5du_PkAVH4Z1D5yn5ceof8nx4Vb5Gh-oa_Y_0G13tOUKmBqAiog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lemongrass chicken on rice impressed me. A bit sweet, full of flavour and grilled to perfection. Noodle soup was also very nice, recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVOJfZ0iUV4sbpnMsvNo8Zn9jOKC2RBn86IyT7&fid=0x0:0xe0d2ff6b5cbae9b4"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Andy Chiang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6Ytd6jvLjiUIKjc2DLdidLuwgHbgPUD4GPhFuPOLEoqlZ2vbh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a staple for pho near Metrotown mall. It does get very busy and there isn’t a lot of seating available so you may need to wait during busy periods

Parking is a bit tough as it’s street parking only.

For pho, they make a tasty broth and it’s very flavorful. Definitely the highlight of the meal. Not all pho is made the same and they definitely have the right mix.

This review is mainly based on the food as its interior is similar to most pho places. Definitely worth stopping by for a quick bite before a movie.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMliWr_Vy4B9Ui1-PNqS2pFJa4jRvq-emhszqTx&fid=0x0:0xe0d2ff6b5cbae9b4"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Thompson Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvT3wthkscBk1HzmAVpiCVTNOTk83aoXGxP-0_pyQ35kgZaBXq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Impressive dishes! Definitely coming back for more! Great price for all dishes!

Well used of sound absorbing material, so it is quite quiet even there are many people. Very kind staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSasWgZ1_lbgH_az9GklLv-Wi1IvmVRVvgL-6i&fid=0x0:0xe0d2ff6b5cbae9b4"],"When":"2024-6-28"},{"Name":"Elton Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_SVkVqkNe3SvSFwaZ1xrBYHObNVkTiTTXXYykf58guqGIk3qy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I don’t usually go to Kingsway nearby Metrotown for foods but this time I felt like having lunch outside rather than eating in food court. I searched for Vietnamese cafe and I found this place. They have pretty good reviews.

I went there with my wife and we ordered grilled half pork and half chicken on rice and pho.

This foods didn’t disappointed us. I was surprised the broth of the pho was gracefully rich and tasty. The beef balls had natural beef taste. The grilled pork and chicken were having a nice smoked flavour but not burnt. Well done!

The owner was there serving the customers and he is friendly and welcoming. At one moment the sunlight came in from the window he immediately went to pull down the bind so the customers won’t get the sunlight directly into their eyes. He kept serving tea and refilled frequently. I’m happy with their service.

In terms of foods and service quality, this is a place I will definitely return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLqlCIgO5YHf_JEwpY5LJKStuN00vrZZJrXyk&fid=0x0:0xe0d2ff6b5cbae9b4"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"allan duong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLGxUcchxgL7ckWobz0D4SkQX2X_-MUEClzpOhSJ32Qd5j6TA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything is great here. Big fan of the bbq pork Banh Mi. Neal, the owner is such a nice guy and knows how to run a restaurant. Affordable and delicious food consistently. Hes also a great tennis player!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7LBEi0UhrngaOXC2ApOj8jWeEDNDrrhKIpxEB&fid=0x0:0xe0d2ff6b5cbae9b4"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"MD Ziauddin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXodMgQTYeurui5Akz5ecfFeI0koeX15uE51SyfwtR2iW6qd7bI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Special beef broth pho was excellent 👌  with price under control will go back
3 star for atmosphere cause it was painfully silent inside , maybe soft ambience would have been better.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMU6S3yiQ1KsdN0NLB8Z1u7NLVoWF9lCvjgkjHY&fid=0x0:0xe0d2ff6b5cbae9b4"],"When":"2024-11-6"}]

title: Tendon Kohaku - Metrotown
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Alcohol","enabled":true},{"name":"Beer","enabled":true},{"name":"Wine","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true},{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true},{"name":"Seating","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true},{"name":"Cozy","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"Groups","enabled":true}]},{"id":"planning","name":"Planning","options":[{"name":"Accepts reservations","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"children","name":"Children","options":[{"name":"High chairs","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"San Wayne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjFb2dB41O9n_VFwgfqlyajgDnGhNggu7YKnObZ04VikDc3OZS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This is my 3rd time to have meal on this restaurant. Waiter is good and environment is silent and clean. But the food quality is worst. The green bean is hard to chew with the root. It seems not Japanese made food quality. And the rice is coming very soft and not taste as before good. The food inside steamed egg is very few. It is only fish cake, spinach on top of the steamed egg which is not as Japanese style. Hope to be improved in the future","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXlV8AHHPc7K_NaO3S05LvcSz_aC2ncCUR4v2z&fid=0x0:0x42b9fc24a08d3e4e"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Kepler F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcYUwrLRUf_A4xgkkfabw9Aa43ECXLeHl3hlCTWCXfL2zpbI0l=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"🌟 A Tempura Paradise at Tendon Kohaku! 🍤

If you're a fan of crispy, golden tempura with flavors that transport you straight to Japan, Tendon Kohaku in Metrotown is a must-visit. The moment I stepped in, the warm aroma of freshly fried tempura set the stage for an unforgettable meal.

Their signature bowls are a masterpiece of texture and flavor. The perfectly crispy tempura paired with their unique sauces strikes a balance that’s both comforting and exciting. I particularly loved the prawn and vegetable mix—each bite felt like a celebration of fresh ingredients and expert craftsmanship.

The ambiance is cozy yet modern, and the staff are incredibly friendly and attentive, making the dining experience even better. Despite the lunch rush, my food arrived quickly and piping hot—a testament to their efficiency and care.

Pro tip: Go hungry! The portions are generous, and you’ll want to savor every bite. Don’t forget to pair your meal with their refreshing side options for the complete experience.

Tendon Kohaku is easily one of Metrotown’s culinary gems. Whether you're a tempura enthusiast or new to this Japanese delight, this spot is bound to impress. I’ll definitely be back! 🍚✨","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMORejluv2j8f4kmRNF3iFOrteuDvoCB3ROxuHw&fid=0x0:0x42b9fc24a08d3e4e"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"cotton candy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKMmoOGXJIlT8jx0uCPFlNxGb2g2JZ9w1U-ngpkfzafqh4mlg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It gave me a menu, but it was really convenient to order food quickly on the monitor. There was no time to wait for the server, so it was convenient. The food tasted good, but Tendon was especially delicious. It's a restaurant I visit more than once a year.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1qwMoqAAY6f001UQf6yNpX97J_ryNm7QoUXUL&fid=0x0:0x42b9fc24a08d3e4e"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Mrs. Leci","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFUu7tIDGHhiFP61EOIZLCOSzvwJkGN10CXxqa6MRhYpyxpm4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I've tried their food a few times already and I was hoping the food and service would step up. I must say that if not because of the sauce, it won't be as tasty. Their price is on average and also, there's not so many dish options to choose from, which is fine because they focus on their signature dishes.

Hope that our next visit will be better.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrA-f95TMAg4kbL2U1JlRB04AlaSNbnuHLtqWr&fid=0x0:0x42b9fc24a08d3e4e"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"Jennifer Chiu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpoEXdttHjVVsSTvCa_zr74WgEbDQeCwR_j4Iibc7tqIGRebJq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A specialty restaurant serving Japanese tempura rice bowls, and it was an outstanding experience! We ordered the Ebi Tendon, Kohaku Tendon, and SA Aimori Tendon, and each dish was incredibly delicious.

The tempura was perfectly fried with a light and crispy batter, and the sauces complemented the dishes wonderfully. The quality was on par with the best tempura I've had in Asia. We thoroughly enjoyed our meal and will definitely be coming back. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3v_wQ3cWPQJN_0lGa1CGliddBDrNGC0fH6E6K&fid=0x0:0x42b9fc24a08d3e4e"],"When":"2024-6-4"},{"Name":"Celina Arenillo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLPvcNqjpmtihcb5J8miFlC4lw0H-EdaSQUtLM4u3kh0_GMHA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I love this place. The ambiance reminds me of Japan. Food was good too. The server was a Japanese lady. Her service was pleasant, typical of a Japanese restaurant.

Had the rice bowls, chicken, and chawan mushi. Will definitely go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTUnBh7Wmpn3XdSSK4QFwhiEWRnfbpoI6bLB4b&fid=0x0:0x42b9fc24a08d3e4e"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"gold stream","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIMLKdGRVpixSTb9Y3fj1pK-hK-7pRtDNbg9D1Y6Usg47nrsw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This Tendon Kotaku is located between Metrotown mall and Crystal mall in Burnaby. Opens at 11:30am serving Japanese tempura  style seafood and pork cutlet on rice or udon noodles. Their curry dishes are aromatic and not too spicy. Most items are under twenty dollars, the place is clean and tidy. Service is reasonable with only two servers and one robot. You can order through the touchscreen display on the table which is very easy for the small menu. Food quality and quantity is good and consistent. Don't forget to add the savory egg custard on your order. Washrooms are clean. One of the better restaurants in the area. Recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQ_XzOrf8_13TPlpFQELSOob000KYvigYI1VSz&fid=0x0:0x42b9fc24a08d3e4e"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"Amnon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjcm2KnVvAXZsXO1Xw9a-BsRGj5-RmJ6nF12OqCF9XTomoPJ9CkA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This restaurant is located conveniently and has a beautiful interior. Lots of seating is available.

The service is pretty decent, and you've got a little tablet to make your orders, with everything divided into different categories. Some of the pictures are very misleading though, like the fact that tendons don't come with the side dishes.

Regardless, the food itself was great, and so was the tea. The portions were good, so you get good value.

Overall, just be mindful of what you're actually getting when you order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNby3wY2pC3FwMEjugvK9y_hDzJ3m0Xdnugzo03&fid=0x0:0x42b9fc24a08d3e4e"],"When":"2024-7-31"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Mahshad Refahatnia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0MWQXxK5H2ziADPybrpxrMcK2Wslz2Div7r7YjJ_M8wxhH16N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This restaurant had a nice atmosphere and good customer service. However, the quality of the food was quite average considering the amount we paid. The presentation of the food was nice, but the taste was very ordinary; it didn’t have any special or delicious flavor at all. Steak was not cooked professionally. I wouldn’t go there again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMhaz6YjIzlE5U7J-Ly3IwRnM-k9bVo0hG1nHK\u0026fid=0x0:0x8506999abb5c4096"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Charlane Binga-An","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLBC9x-_wILXUDdwq01M8C9qxZsjtqoem4o9PPBCIkxE_LlhA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best Earl's I've been to. The location and atmosphere were great and our server Ben made everything 100% better. He was so friendly and very attentive! We were out celebrating a friend's graduation and he even came out with dessert on the house! It was so sweet of him.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlgTYjVnS6k44h-O8zZUMKHVCtDPwgfUDN7UlM\u0026fid=0x0:0x8506999abb5c4096"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Tony Hoang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6S-doEAxjVwXEsWxNgTYzGuqUx22Qq5Y_HPrsxGPh1v6wA7RA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had a night out with friends and family the other night. Food was great and steak came medium rare, just how I asked. Plating could have been better but the food tasted great. Nice location and good dining atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNV7PrpJh77mVjy1ZVO1gLNO6g_m9N7c0wK14MK\u0026fid=0x0:0x8506999abb5c4096"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvU4HdlESptkRf0TqiLSNamp-b3hLIhsTk4jU9jft7nopM4PaG=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I don’t normally go out to eat, much less at places like Earl’s, so this was a lovely experience! Me and my friends came in to eat a little while ago and had the best server ever. He helped us choose what we wanted to eat as we are a bit indecisive haha and he was super nice about it. He was so attentive without being invasive and we all enjoyed our meals greatly (food was amazing as well). I would totally recommend this place to any Earl’s fans and if you’re looking for someone who knows their way around the menu to ask for Chase!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9BuNkzvi-cgL94JLpF5YXfKMFqL6ADoK8bpVF\u0026fid=0x0:0x8506999abb5c4096"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"L.A. ZONIN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3viQRMbbn0pWxqvjD85DAiZP3lZeqbB825G4RkR5Wep1D96Fc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s always such a pleasure being here at Earls. They never disappoint with their food, drinks, and staff. I’ve been coming to Earls since they first opened last year in early spring, and I must say I’m always leaving the place fully satisfied! Tonight I got to meet a new bartender, Brandon. His bartending skills speaks for itself as I ordered a White Peach Whiskey Sour. Presentation was beautiful and the flavour was fireworks in my mouth. Definitely my go-to drink! And Brandon was delightful! Super kind, talented behind the bar, and insightful at best! If you’re looking for a night out at Brentwood, Earls is the perfect place!\n\nP.S the sushi prawn tacos were SOOO GOOD!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnGRfmUZ7dPVgy52Ex0S_AAIa82Vo46QQWMfdU\u0026fid=0x0:0x8506999abb5c4096"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Hiep Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMRHHZ7t798igHqhwEObqqiXXBYRe7_vTRRS3-gXG7fOgZlXSH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything was good except for the beef sliders. The slider buns had very little meat in it that all I tasted was bread. And they put horse radish or Wasabi inside which turned me off. The sushi taco was the best, then the crab cake. My wife wants to come back for mainly the sushi tacos! We came here for happy hour and the bill came to $72 not including tip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoBJmJzW0TudtazRZIGCo5xNlsL8wbZ6OgNXLC\u0026fid=0x0:0x8506999abb5c4096"],"When":"2024-6-15"},{"Name":"abby y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUP7hgK8G2WOeres9hsGERbOPIrqtMm6w0MVk2J8sSRUhC7fQCB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Benjamin was an amazing server very cutesy, he had a very cute hair charm on and the gold chain was an amazing touch to his outfit. Not only his style was amazing but he was an awesome server for myself and my friends. We were a large group and he met every need during our dining experience!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1XcidQ1rjViEIkdubu_cRTwgv5R5TBnm8gMMI\u0026fid=0x0:0x8506999abb5c4096"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"richard chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIf1neCZqBnJLrk0cTe43Vpuwux4gjmUzrrV78_wxQmqDskDw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife had a friend come into town, so we decided to take her out for lunch. Earl's Brentwood is a 10  min walk from our condo tower. It sits right in the heart of Brentwood Plaza, which is a busy hot spot for hanging out, shopping, or eating. It's suggested you make reservations because this Earl's gets very busy. It has a dining area inside and a lounge area plus an outside patio. Inside is nicely decorated with a lot of hanging plants and retro lighting and seating. Its very clean inside.  We were sat down quickly, and our waitress greeted us right away. Lucky for us, Earl's serves a brunch menu till 2 pm, so that's what we ordered. My wife had the egg breakfast while my wife's friend and I had the crab cake benny. All of our food tasted great. The crab cakes melted in our mouth. I really like how they made the sliced baked potato squares. Overall the atmosphere, food and service is tops here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLnAupzLWqyurq21Lm65_HkjSbLS2YkIa06MhF\u0026fid=0x0:0x8506999abb5c4096"],"When":"2024-7-24"}]

[{"Name":"VICKI HUI","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYgAOh8HUHBsWfgmODT_Ify2usoVu2lPXY5vhfB_tIA1xJ1Xev=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had the 3-course roast beef set which was very delicious! The food was fresh and very cozy; i don’t like cheesecake much but the earl grey cheesecake was quite nice and worth a try ☺️ Servers were also lovely and the whole atmosphere was stunning, could see the sunset nice and clear 🌅","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmhz1EQYWvp7oC_PWCgpjGQMrObGSBypb9kyhA&fid=0x0:0xbde5969106292e16"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Johnny C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMH8aFZIGB5a7CFStbNQ6JGT0sYgxOttD7xMtIebcz8N9tnSzq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food quality was good.  Service was good.  Plenty of parking but maybe difficult to find a parking spot during golf peak times.  Overall I would have given them 5 stars.  A star was deducted because the seat was dirty with food crumbs and the burger bun was too charred.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRIIr6YONpsjnFCThRI2VFJx5FMqmqWcxGNVmU&fid=0x0:0xbde5969106292e16"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"Tiffany M.H Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVEEILPLKkaPpClYcrh-pqQr9Qp-ChcXOXh_6gWcHTjnAC6d-A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was here with family on August 17th 2024 for dinner. We ordered the 3 course meal and the food was amazing! I really love the steak, salad and creme brulee! Our server provided wonderful service and was kind to adjust the curtains so that the sun wasn't shining at us. She was also very attentive! :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPz1NiBHaLnWU0J1sZO7hpmUWM06krwZ9evZ-HG&fid=0x0:0xbde5969106292e16"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"sterling lans","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUIvenuetfEWn36IEiriFUPO5kWX_zzj7sHU6kuq1Gz6fGRZZ4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was absolutely spectacular!!! I ordered the Steak and it was cooked beautifully! I have never had a better steak experience in my life! I highly recommend eating in this fine dining establishment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTcWm2g2g6DCyqAk9k6FFBLxV0JqAZR4RQbDzW&fid=0x0:0xbde5969106292e16"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Nastassja Dorotich","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXn3xVQllagWYXZP_5pYQUbA_9S8FifHN2FImREt6v5HUwEzIUh5w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our wedding was a dream, the absolute perfect day! Ella was such a kind and helpful coordinator. She answered all my questions promptly and made the planning process so easy. The chef was able to accommodate our request of a fully vegetarian wedding with vegan options, which was delicious! The team were all so kind and seemed to be having fun during the event, as well. The indoor and outdoor space offered the perfect flow. Gorgeous ceremony area, beautiful dinner area, fun bar area, and lots of outdoor hangout and conversation spaces with the front, back and side patios. Highly recommend Burnaby Mountain Clubhouse for your event! Thank you ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNaIZbIfOza8oifP4B3yTat8R4OAdfZwcTxgaHy&fid=0x0:0xbde5969106292e16"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Betsy CT","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQGGIyc_AHsnDVRkUQkbSnV2yECP14J_GFVoTan8z9D8GO3iLAQA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time visit. 5 of us celebrating a family birthday. All the food was tasty and service was friendly despite a bit of learning curve from new staff. Mistake orders were taken off the bill so it's all good. Such a a nice quiet pleasant location. Definitely will tell and bring others.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTffXP-mlv7qT6_2dqT86LGeNx5SNYsGr5K4kC&fid=0x0:0xbde5969106292e16"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"Katrina Stavenkos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVu8k31K8bLBb3gU-CZZko7AdWW-2Kcangps-MS6U0qeb28LGs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"People are posting reviews and pics of wrong restaurant lol this one is beside a golf course not ontop of Burnaby mountain …

The restaurant smelled funny lol not sure what it was but yuck . Food was ok , the big full potatoes were not smashed as advertised , I smashed them up , no flavour , eggs Benny was ok . Daughter enjoyed her lobster grilled cheese . We shared a dessert hole in one something , was so small , should have two little cakes on the plate .
Service was good but never asked if we wanted another drink once we finished first one . Such a lovely area , and could be such a good restaurant , more appetizers offered , more sandwiches etc , if you ever need a over haul hire me lol","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORAAjuqpR3I4qgUkea_s7Bhhj9uQp5HSn9cUUR&fid=0x0:0xbde5969106292e16"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Lola Bradfield","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWurG33EZqdt6uDU7HAJsd_fp6jKSUDSbuLYzXg6oaLHuo7XC0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time here, the server was amazing . The food was good, but not excellent or something to come back for. However, the atmosphere was not what we were looking for in a nice, expensive dinner restaurant.  The lights were way waaaay too bright and more appropriate to a cafeteria type of setting, which was too bad because the fixtures themselves were beautiful... the bright lights  gave the location a cheaper ambiance and very cold instead of a warm and welcoming feeling....","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Terry He","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzTQqhsguVDTEd9e8q47nd5OwFsf83UNMCdALeW_bEgqcGaqe4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Review for Bliss Cafe

Bliss Cafe in Burnaby has quickly become my go-to spot for a satisfying meal. On my first visit, I tried the marinated preserved vegetable boiled fish cutlets, and on my second visit, I had the fried chicken nuggets with rice. Both dishes came with a portion of rice and were reasonably priced as of 2024.

The flavors of the marinated preserved vegetable boiled fish cutlets were delightful, with a perfect balance of spices and freshness. The fried chicken nuggets were crispy and well-seasoned, making for a satisfying meal. While the portion sizes might be enough for those with a smaller appetite, they might not be sufficient for those who are particularly hungry.

One of the unique aspects of Bliss Cafe is their subscription-based menu, which encourages customers to return and try new dishes regularly. It would be great to see them rotate other menu items on sale, as I am eager to try more of their offerings.

Overall, I had no unpleasant experiences at Bliss Cafe. The food was tasty, the prices were reasonable, and the atmosphere was welcoming. I look forward to my next visit and exploring more of their menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1dgrxPxM3wNzn1DXVDfe0QZ7_I-ktnq11n9N4&fid=0x0:0x7b3491e7bd53ffd"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Hiep Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMRHHZ7t798igHqhwEObqqiXXBYRe7_vTRRS3-gXG7fOgZlXSH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Met a friend here for lunch today because the new Ramen place up the street that just opened had a line up out the door. It way 1pm and Bliss was half full so we got a seat right away. Food was great and tasty. Adding their chicken nuggets for $4 is a deal. It's kind of like popcorn chicken sprinkled with their unique ground pepper with a nice aroma. Almost like msg 😆.  Bill came to $39 plus tip for the 2 of us is worth it for lunch nowadays.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSwBypdXOX22xF_LPqtTSxbTUiIm6oZte76bgG&fid=0x0:0x7b3491e7bd53ffd"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Kalvin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYzAZd-0_JeniSNljNxgImCwzlXWbe6PzaDeAXT6_nhg5vP5E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The creamy soup hotpot tasted delicious with good flavors of meat in it. Good portion and good price. The noodle soup lacked flavor and the fried chicken not as crispy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6Ma2-TfZ4bEiQ3OBZk8f9wsm3unl8yfUM9_Si&fid=0x0:0x7b3491e7bd53ffd"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Vancouver Foodie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8w6jkWQhHhs1Z246avVvoKQqrR4N6KZDvvFaklq629YACSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Small hidden restaurant at the Save-On-Food Mall on Kingsway across from Crystal Mall.

Really great value Taiwanese beef noodles combo (a bowl of beef noodles + marinated egg + drink) for only $14.99 and you can add $4 for a small crispy popcorn chicken. Lots of noodles and you'll feel very full.  Also ordered spicy beef briskets combo and three cups chicken combo.

Overall, good quality is good
Service is just ok.
Tons of 1.5hr parking at the mall.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDRcQi9at-Qhx5t40kG21bonNR0VMgPy582-Ad&fid=0x0:0x7b3491e7bd53ffd"],"When":"2024-5-19"},{"Name":"Sympascho Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2_xkaSp5M0XHEygf8K3dopRp_CxdW8Wg4vrkHc90rdlhFo-hl=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I came here with a group of friends on a Sunday lunch. It was an awful experience. The food is okay, but there are plenty of good Taiwanese restaurants around here, such as The One and Aroma Eatery. However, hygiene was very questionable. For example, they gave us the wrong dish, and after it was sitting on our table for 5 minutes, they realized their mistake and took it to another table without even recooking their food! In addition, their service was poor. They brought food out for the majority of our group but it took an addition 35 minutes to bring out the food for other 3 people in our group!!!! During this time, we reminded their waitress several times that our friends’ food wasn’t here yet, and they did nothing. In the end, this meant that some people in the group finished their food before the others’ had even arrived (and it was cold for the people who waited). We did not receive any apology for this…
Also, they gave us the wrong dish as their “knife cut” noodle (see below) but gaslit us and told us this was “knife cut” when it clearly was not. I have been to many Taiwanese and Xian restaurants with knife cut noodles, and this is not it….
The only reason they got a 2 star for atmosphere is because the interior is reasonably new and well lit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkx8Mi9DSd-ezJOr11PQ5gOpkLdTjK43m4q1lF&fid=0x0:0x7b3491e7bd53ffd"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"Carolyn Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocID-ne5zGEq4LZpDeyBnWOjv7ymh8I7w7axyhOpoZGb3Woga6o=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Extremely poor service. We came with a group of 9 people for lunch, they were so slow and inconsistent with their food service that it took 1.5 hours to serve the last dish to the last person and they got that order wrong. Instead of writing off the dish like a typical restaurant would given the order was so slow and wrong, they compensated us with a tiny side dish which was insufficient in our mind, and we told them this and they refused to do anything more. They also got another person’s dish wrong and took it back after it’s been sitting on our table for 15 min and served it elsewhere. Also the stir-fried beef noodle was way too salty, and the knife cut noodle was not knife cut, rather we thought it was rice noodle and they refuted this.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObc4sA6IoJpubn8S86ojFKI5iOZn88EbaevaUx&fid=0x0:0x7b3491e7bd53ffd"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"Lister Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWbNvO55wOzkDRxCcJ-fMoCcdWyut5hlx-H_zUreRnwso9_V0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wasn’t sure how good but food excellent. Ordered seafood udon and lots of seafood and veggies. Spiced right flavourful and not too spicy or too salty. Big mussel size of oyster, squid, meatballs, prawn, fish balls. Wife ordered coconut seafood pork hotpot. Only complaint about fatty bacon. Came again today and ordered beef noodle combo with marinated egg and jasmine tea for $14.99. Also had chicken nuggets for $4. Wife had chicken hotpot that could have had little more flavour. Just came today after escape room experience next door and had lychee frappe , Korean chicken, fish sticks with 13 friends. All very delicious","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnOeZZuiI8O7wW3EgY7DXuY1FNRP18HzBWnEaH&fid=0x0:0x7b3491e7bd53ffd"],"When":"2023-12-18"},{"Name":"sophieeeali","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLFRgCbth_Z0kexP8ajaQJK2wf8rnr_7rdngqmcMKUS5Hvz9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hidden gem!! Big portion and reasonable priced. And the food if actually good! Had the half tendon half beef noodles, love the soup base and how tender the beef is. The fried chicken nuggets is a 4-dollar add-on, and super fresh and delicious","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbded4JWOEVUeqzsCwryGxd3VGiymj7RYhz7s6&fid=0x0:0x7b3491e7bd53ffd"],"When":"2024-4-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nelson Mah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMvSq7-l8Kje4bUGcJFo_gjx31JEZujbDf7RAmASmnqxtIa8Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Restaurant is pretty good. I appreciate a sushi place in the neighborhood. Only tricky part is finding parking

Fruit dip was enjoyable. The full size calamari was a better deal than the half size

Smoked salmon rolls were average tasting. Would recommend a different roll

The restaurant offers promotions and discounts often, best to keep up to date with that. Was very surprised in a 20% off anniversary promotion.

The platters are very cost effective deal.

I recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4PhG94RBRIz2m18NMWUd3102puh8U_TFotWHg&fid=0x0:0xb6b0945a653c212a"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"C L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFSCt_t74XiqlEdz6jDYOHmtwc4pgb3Fve6nsF3wEBwwz9hl0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice little restaurant on Imperial Drive, close to Metrotown. I must have driven by this place hundreds of times but never noticed it. Friends introduced me to this place when they held a party there. They carry the traditional Japanese fare but with some imaginative twists.  You won't find prawn tempura here, but try their Mango Ebi Mayo instead. The Vegetable Tempura and Spicy Agedashi were delicious and fresh out of the fryer. The Dragon Roll and Salmon Shioyaki have also become favourites. My friends ordered a variety of items, including a dinner box. Everyone was pleased with their dishes. The servers were courteous and attentive. The restaurant is easy to get to and there is plenty of street parking.  Prices were reasonable so will definitely be visiting again soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPY_A-gF9wvjzoUETi3tIJH_I-McqUM1YZCKTlU&fid=0x0:0xb6b0945a653c212a"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Feyona McKenna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZDDipdNdQOlJp1dg4n7g1mc0Smm73l7RifmYSNiXg-VGEyg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice, cosy place for salmon lovers. They have a varied menu - in fact, it’s a bit overwhelming with all there is to choose from. The food was fresh and tasty, but we found the prices a bit on the expensive side. Everything was presented beautifully and the service was great, so we might come back another time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2F4WMiyVp78krJ2y-efCfICC1MrOtJ-qvnGjj&fid=0x0:0xb6b0945a653c212a"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"다연 Dayeon Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLZi2CxroQpGXGtijgsL5adMb1NxGhka4j65TmTyfx2ibldJg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We visited to this hidden gem.
We had an amazing time. The food was amazing! We especially loved Salmon steak spaghetti and assorted Sashimi.
And we came back to here right next day to try some rolls, it didn’t disappointed us 😋
Wish we had found it sooner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhi4OAz62qlx0Y9qhunIzMTw_-2dfO2soXWzC_&fid=0x0:0xb6b0945a653c212a"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Malcolm Gray","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXh4yzyylSClLeWhPoF4GqgdScsO4v9CLr2CKeg4lUP5KuS32x_Fg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Found this little gem based on a friend’s recommendation but didn’t know where it was. You can easily pass it by an not notice it.

The inside looks like something out of early 70s decor but don’t let that fool you, the service and food were as modern and excellent as any place. Very delicious meal and definitely will return","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMztgqFkX5MOpbQyM5L_m2JD_ee-R0PqGUao8UL&fid=0x0:0xb6b0945a653c212a"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Nalinee Yeung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWo10huSX0dX6mUo_p-98vcDKFsNu-pbqmp1FOUHibmggCI0smK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been there with family every generations.
We were happy with the dishes, fresh sashimi, and tasty. Many choices of menu to choose from.

The service is good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPs-4MgHI_sFG25q5DXgS5Izg0cSexjeYAmeIoR&fid=0x0:0xb6b0945a653c212a"],"When":"2024-10-31"},{"Name":"Ohsopeachykeen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVg_UbAdIPwSnKRLj2ATOtjLZNYTpqRCsPrMcKFi_9HIiF9u8g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Club Salmon bistro is a must-visit for Japanese fusion lovers. Specializing in salmon, the salmon steak is a standout! The Mother’s Day special menu has came back! It was a highlight, blending creamy avocado and citrus for a delightful taste.

The atmosphere is serene and stylish, and the staff is attentive. Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPyfAHwHGwf87WWeFFI4ytnD2XMMTBtp3slh8jb&fid=0x0:0xb6b0945a653c212a"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"Jeremy Clegg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjC4puI3y5OMfwy8NF4jUvgaBHp1PLK7PdoD6AHHAJW7JIAw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the food here! They only serve Salmon but it’s done really well, they serve it in a lot of different ways. Staff is really friendly and attentive and the decor is nice as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPG9C5zH_X3ASxJLJtpDtMrbPtiFo69XXoSfVbN&fid=0x0:0xb6b0945a653c212a"],"When":"2024-8-31"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Island Bwoy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ8HOxwMOkQ2N-9KvUsdJvNP39TlyKb7bS9M5EHzYJOvvKxzg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went here for my family member’s birthday celebration. The food, service, atmosphere and ambience were 10/10. Everyone was so helpful, friendly and genuine and we really enjoyed our meals. It made the occasion so much better. We are so grateful we chose this location. We look forward to returning soon. Great vegan options also. High recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPATYlDUT33YaT-jyUWUihUJSVj0xkuYRs8eAT3&fid=0x0:0x47d677bf5b06211e"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"skr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIcuhU2CLfpC2Z6zhqf2JvPfEX3PFzkuNqk6OK8TD1kgxyFdg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m kinda disappointed that I didn’t come here to celebrate my birthday earlier. The services and the vibes are amazing!!! The servers are welcoming and friendly. I was given free cakes for my birthday as well. However, I still paid them based on the price of the cakes. There is a happy hour after 9pm. The price is reasonable considering the enchanting romantic atmosphere. The light of the candles provided a beauty effect on my face when taking photos. You definitely wouldn’t mind tipping a little bit more. I will come back here very soon!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsrMrn3QKFi_i-0pivElQLLscc640Zz8pxkIcy&fid=0x0:0x47d677bf5b06211e"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Hassan Makhlouf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYREoqUkazVJoJhrGCrjS5g1lIMahzFkhsZA1Ir7O3A-YofJyb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We went celebrating family member birthday. Food was great with excellent taste. We ordered a desert and a candle with it to celebrate the birthday and at the plate , it was written happy birthday. That’s it. But in other restaurants, they show more involvement in birthday celebration in different way but not here even that it wasn’t crowded at all. I like their food a lot but these small things makes a difference.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOef9pM2BQzUyFk2_F-L-NPBAaBZkn-Smu8Ma_0&fid=0x0:0x47d677bf5b06211e"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Ashkan N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKGC9QpVpAYzkuU2nETbRxXDGZW6ZxU4DFK0Bytd5fdamCstw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Visited this location for the first time a couple of weeks ago for drinks and some appetizers. Our server, Rosie (if I recall her name correctly), was incredible, extremely friendly and attentive. The service was outstanding, and the food and drinks were very good as well!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMP9jLajzseG9B19QrJJ28u5gwYNKJtyMdSnZlo&fid=0x0:0x47d677bf5b06211e"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Shirley Xing","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIg6I1EBoL4HNjYlXY_lD74zcOwCV5qOXflIbqVETog656Hig=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is what you get for $50 worth of takeouts. Been always eating at the restaurant and the size is doubled. Cactus has ruined its reputation. Well, don’t ever order their food if you can’t dine in, they treat you like dumb trash. If a restaurant only earns money from tips, why don’t just shut down the takeout service?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMD8jkA6r1Y0e7CnucdwCw608P487717s_XxZki&fid=0x0:0x47d677bf5b06211e"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Sara Rostami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-0F0X5uejpgUPksS3dNe8lvbqXi3gXIV5sSqvv6JCvVyYEIfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my favorite Cactus Club Cafe location of all. I managed to book a nice table on the patio for my friend’s birthday. Despite the restaurant being nearly full, the service was excellent, and the food was delicious. We spent a wonderful three hours there and will definitely be back again, as always.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObjOW_YZD9aV_zLjIUsOibPIc0NnCIuqWU7H7n&fid=0x0:0x47d677bf5b06211e"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"Stanley Lowe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLMA0j5YPV0e_ki7txxd7xeDBLDLGeQTP8WAcMSalz9cV9eFw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Sunday night Happy Hour.

Got the steak and frites.  It came with a kale salad, too.  It was $26.50.

The avocado 🥑  and chips was shared among the table.  It was quite good.

Service was consistent.

It was quite busy for a Sunday night.

Good music and lots of parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPup812y4Z5GBQ-agBQ_b_P59lzdx6HDFr7SHRO&fid=0x0:0x47d677bf5b06211e"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Joshua Lamb","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpxxroB9wWkDP81-bzqi9m3qKH73kXPdF1qlay8Miqx3mQiFLjRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A friend brought me here and the moment I walked in I felt like it was a high end restaurant. Though it has that vibe, the prices are fair and absolutely perfect for the great quality of food they create.

The sirloin steak, with mash and salad, was next to perfect. We got the steak and it was slighlytly over cooked and asked of it could be rare, which they quite nicely remade it and took care of us. The service was absolutely brilliant and rarely see such amazing waiters as this.

The atmosphere is great and the happy hour was fun to get drinks like margaritas and spritz. Highly recommended!

Overall, I enjoyed the experience even though I was worried about food, service and atmosphere. They went above and beyond and for that, I give this place 5 stars all around. Way to go Cactus Club Cafe!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMoULAVkEGVY3jTkCN_SiUcS2TxS_8V2n4b6Bbs&fid=0x0:0x47d677bf5b06211e"],"When":"2024-6-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Fionn Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ6QM4xX4rnjDy7uQ9_UX1ud-FeXhAIPbUGuv1ks1vTREnqqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was great. My favourite is the Shanghai dumpling, they use a thin wrapper which isn’t doughy. The fish in batter with seaweed was also one of my favourite! The duck on the other hand was very dry. You can never go wrong with the Shanghai fried noodle as well! Definitely would come again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpQhQcUHJUOGOU9risb8yHCZ5eBfYrYzAgMzc5&fid=0x0:0x73a8dcb1eaf5a89f"],"When":"2024-10-31"},{"Name":"wah chi yip","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKBykHMUbkrtJ4cwRRXsjOnAzAcOzwrpq-XVjovUt6A3trFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I think this restaurant may be the only one still has traditional Shanghai's dishes in Vancouver.  We are happy that we still can enjoy the food in a well kept and clean big restaurant.
The food and the prices are good.
We come on a weekday for early dinner.  The services are good too.
If you go there for lunch, don't forget try their Chinese doughnut.  It's the best in Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVISfYSxQi5DFLkvuCSxY4x4p6j-NB3hg3724T&fid=0x0:0x73a8dcb1eaf5a89f"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Penny Rusty Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkGfXMIDqwS_yD1axTk6tkHoLsnybE2ErvKrHMoMIElMJWekI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The first time I visited Jin Jiang was back in 2014. It's somewhat hidden in the Best Western location on Kingsway and has a strange interior layout.

Back then, their xiao long baos were under $5. Now, their steamed Shanghai dumplings are almost double the price ($9.68). But I do admit that they are better than I remember them to be. Filling is fairly juicy. Note that I've had them a couple of times over the last few weeks and found the filling to be different on different occasions. Sometimes being more meaty than other times.

As a Shanghai restaurant, their dim sum offering is a bit limited compared to a Cantonese restaurant.

We ordered their turnip cakes ($9.68) which were round cakes filled with shredded radish (we kind of ordered this thinking it was like the Cantonese lo bak go but this is much drier in consistency like a pastry).

The fried shredded buns ($5.98) is a classic served with condensed milk for dipping. I know this more as silver thread buns (which can be either steamed or fried) due to the fluffy interior of the bun.

The pan fried pork buns are basically the like the steamed pork buns but wrapped up like a soft bao and then pan fried for a crispy bottom.  The bottoms were super crispy and the filling was still soupy.

We also ordered the deep fried thick noodles with shredded pork ($18.98). Contrary to the English menu name, the noodles really aren't thick. I wish their menu names were more descriptive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQusXVfEFP-rHnxkCBfTvTG3dSoHYDcB3FrTdU&fid=0x0:0x73a8dcb1eaf5a89f"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Zacery Wood","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdPmKc7b7qQr6cN9eNebNcie4ffrySE-Dvtj5AwsHYOkDNKfc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The photo on the order platform is totally different than what we received.  The 27 dollar braised pork only contains a few pieces of pork and it is not tender at all.

The deep fried pork chop is not the same as the picture shown on the menu.

Disappointed as a long-time customer","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODA30e_ZqpxZNYXSpA8f5l1SOUtLULSUbnDK0W&fid=0x0:0x73a8dcb1eaf5a89f"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Steven H.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXK62iJj1ZUFGa-U3A8AjtI1ckQk60_9MMp9OhTpvv0nDBllSzC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food taste is mediocre, price is reasonable.

Quality and freshness is good.

There are better shanghai restaurants in vancouver but this place is good enough and centrally located if one wants something quick.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMneZDPbtshfAWRmKYDr1UKuy3IPb69PgesQNhU&fid=0x0:0x73a8dcb1eaf5a89f"],"When":"2024-5-12"},{"Name":"Kate Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjE4MSAa0c4Uqc8iOt1LfqIkJDL1ULa2Z17gRh4YDWMExQ1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Tantanmian is the soupy kind. Doesnt really have much meat in it. Wasn't too tasty.

The xiaolongbaos were good. Thin skin and lots of soup.

The preserved veggies and edamame fen pi was terrible. So little veggies and just a sprinkle of edamame. The noodle texture was good but it was so oily. Many shanghai places do this dish much better.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNadw18uEPoLKzdgt0Hos7dNqPLqg0JZzzGc36W&fid=0x0:0x73a8dcb1eaf5a89f"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"Hejin Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKn1tewBq8uJRFgkCJ9srsIHk7b8CeJxN--3zoUgic3xSz4fpA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"My friend and I standed in front of the restaurant door and waited for about 10min before we got served. There was nobody before us and the waitors passed by us at least 3 times and intentionally ignored us. After we sit down, I tried to be polite first when we were ready to order, but the waitors never looked at us. I have to yell to get their attention.

If their food is good, everything I just mentioned above is okay. However their food is very over-priced. Their pan fried pork bun is okay, but the fried sliced eels, which is supposed to be a signature Shanghai cuisine dish, does not worth the price at all. The eel is hard and I doubt they cooked it before it got fully defrost. Also how come I paid CAD26.98 before tax and they only serve such a small dish?? Check the pic below. Will never come again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_Ahv0qXYWHyfPhkgNvDW5CPWZpQaDTB03xyGh&fid=0x0:0x73a8dcb1eaf5a89f"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"Lister Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWbNvO55wOzkDRxCcJ-fMoCcdWyut5hlx-H_zUreRnwso9_V0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had smoky tea duck but salty. Spicy noodle soup good.peanuts on Peanut ball could have chopped smaller. Came again and enjoyed smoky tea duck, peanut noodles, dessert buns with red bean","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_ni4G5-mcPBkwIiooU04W3OKUo0YoskFNYL0X&fid=0x0:0x73a8dcb1eaf5a89f"],"When":"2023-12-22"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Emilia Muirragui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVbrBdWMJwAdDmTKF2rqn3OE2f7BKVf4ff7Eui90G41UPNKe7l=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first time at Pokerrito. I saw an ad on Instagram and quickly Googled a nearby location. The service was good, and the staff were friendly. They fulfilled my order in a timely manner, the ingredients looked fresh, and the meal was delicious! There's plenty of parking and enough seating if you'd like to dine in. Price-wise, it’s comparable to other poke spots, but the portions are quite generous in my opinion. Overall, I’d definitely recommend it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLrbQsAAlONnQnnM9Lfi5H2dVBn_wPGd6Hl7g2\u0026fid=0x0:0xbb7f10f66b3df986"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Esther W.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZ44_CjQ6-wehLPc33Ng17kPOWOSFrXqo3jg5WgP7CtwNUYUeR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Food is pricey, for the quantity you get most of the bowl is rice anyways and it’s very little protein. The server only filled my bowl three-quarter full while the other bowl was filled to the top. I’m very disappointed that the bowl was not filled all the way to the top and when I mentioned this, they said it was because it was a different type of bowl. I don’t agree with what she said and I feel like if one bowl is full. The other one should be full, not 3/4 full. It was also significantly lighter than the other bowl Inside there was not much protein as I said before very disappointed and I feel like they could do better for the amount that I have to pay for this. I also believe many of these reviews could be fake as they offer rewards for making a review.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN94X9knkN17sNrWfIeAfedJVE34Lf0BNO1M0ra\u0026fid=0x0:0xbb7f10f66b3df986"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Andrew L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWljdCrGfi3-1z_8yksCxH-gZqLowDHAtOE1eGGl2LhWEgN5Uv9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent . Fresh. Good portions. Reasonably priced. The employees were very helpful. I come here specifically because it’s the best anywhere within a 20 min radius.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2tAGJIHVdpLecWnheoBNk42tPcInmOlL1MiAH\u0026fid=0x0:0xbb7f10f66b3df986"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Samantha Ricks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIKpvT6FLfNxK1zy0UwUMlUfw8EH8l0qSP-wQ9nQ4Lwn6wNaw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I come to pokkerito all the time during my lunch breaks. The portions are great and food is always fresh. The staff does an amazing job of keeping the restaurant clean. Very welcoming staff, I highly recommend everyone to try it out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAML3vVeD0xkAhXDtLkOV7aR2DTUKjqKttPWzu\u0026fid=0x0:0xbb7f10f66b3df986"],"When":"2024-4-9"},{"Name":"Chris J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVCS_l2tEBg0UwqR18Bwu1Bs9SuGuJkZ8vAy0IMHtf5Cf48p-ETQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very yummy, fresh, and filling! Friendly service too. My first and second experiences were two thumbs up 👍👍 will return! Their main bowl (the first one on the list, tuna) is great. Rice is fresh, so are all the veggies etc. House umami sauce is tasty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7aOXu2t4wQG7JTAgLsFARBhOQAjNk9gVzyba7\u0026fid=0x0:0xbb7f10f66b3df986"],"When":"2023-5-2"},{"Name":"andrew comeau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKui6BULC3x3SSC2S-MhXNv3AAYNizOhy0JXcpX3EtxhmbZ8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The food was a little pricey but good.  I was, however, stoked that it said there was crab on my Diamond head bowl.  There was no crab, but there was imitation crab.  I guess there is no penalty for them lying, but imagine getting some kind of other meat with chicken favoring and having them claim it was chicken.  Shame on them, they could do better.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipON_QSpTmP12HctPqscR9Q1Q66ajFYUvtvCEj0T\u0026fid=0x0:0xbb7f10f66b3df986"],"When":"2024-3-28"},{"Name":"Czarina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIEsMcynZ1Cis9IWYqsqk1EtshOzUGnwmf3mDrKzyRTueWeGyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My go to Poke spot! Not once have I been disappointed when grabbing this delicious Poke Bowl. Staff is really nice and the atmosphere is excellent. 10/10 would recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPD_aASDCYv8jDcZXWT6KD_Ip5MG0Imo8pmw92q\u0026fid=0x0:0xbb7f10f66b3df986"],"When":"2024-4-10"},{"Name":"Stephanie Vu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFFlg8ZCVJN5df9Ep-W5UtMD81ecLr09njsUdrmB7cjmu3VDsO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first time trying, and it was definitely worth it! The concept of eating poké in a seaweed wrap was interesting, and it didn’t disappoint. Albeit a little messy, it was filling and delicious.\n\nI ordered a regular sized seaweed wrap which was $16.75. There are six sauces available, seven different types of proteins, and an abundance of toppings - lots of variety! The location is clean and tidy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXkEhpCRqMOcHa64iI0lAkyy4ekxIIDYOzWwod\u0026fid=0x0:0xbb7f10f66b3df986"],"When":"2023-4-28"}]
