user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Terry He","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzTQqhsguVDTEd9e8q47nd5OwFsf83UNMCdALeW_bEgqcGaqe4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I recently visited Suren Persian Cuisine on Hastings Street in Burnaby for the first time and had a mixed experience. The restaurant has a decent and friendly atmosphere, and I was able to find a table reasonably quickly, which was a plus.

I ordered the Lentil Rice and Lamb, a dish recommended by the server. The portion size was generous, which initially seemed promising. However, the taste of the food did not live up to my expectations. The rice and gravy tasted dull and stale, lacking the vibrant flavors I was hoping for. The lamb, unfortunately, seemed to have been pressure-cooked to the point where it had little to no texture left. The consistency of the sauce was quite runny, almost like water, and it didn’t have a memorable taste profile.

Additionally, the wait time for the food after placing the order was quite lengthy. This might not be suitable for workers who need to get their food quickly during a lunch break.

While the service was friendly and the environment pleasant, the quality of the food was disappointing. I had high hopes for a flavorful and rich Persian meal, but the experience fell short. I hope the restaurant can improve the taste and texture of their dishes in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOV5ncgI0UerLObjeIqVUftYM1z3Lqcd3pkWk9Y&fid=0x0:0x6d5c4923e8c333bc"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Tareq Soufi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJFZqlpVBGqEDJMPzqm7XeWclRMd74ChXcqbjw9qulwOXy9dw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I won’t be exaggerating if I say that this is by FAR, the best Persian food/ restaurant I’ve been to not only in B.C, but Canada!!

Service; Excellent!
Atmosphere; Excellent!
Food quality, taste & portion: Excellent Excellent Excellent!!

Keep up the amazing work guys,
Thanks to our servers ATA & Maryam!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwEOItOzPawXYLcw1Gzl0UmWxBzBbuPoED7Kqs&fid=0x0:0x6d5c4923e8c333bc"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Robert Arbor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCQGcQxjL0YQQBQdJ531QwsU3eO8jWw8yRkMmtgTNQ-bybYFg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Went for dinner on a Monday night at about 7 o clock. We were the only table there the entire time and didn't see any delivery drivers come and go. Food wasn't any better than a cazba in a mall food court would have been. Space was kind of awkward with 2 levels and 2 bars and an odd stage area. Only bright spot of the trip was that the service was good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMx-UL0AEnYHESRERoXElwcDqnklnn5_KjiA69K&fid=0x0:0x6d5c4923e8c333bc"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Rucha Karande","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVU8iaQdFn99Vuq-kbFJ5gyMUTrS3R8DSLnnpqBZWMrJZYi8vf5=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I dined here last Sunday (August 25th, 2024) with my sister and her boyfriend. They suggested this restaurant for Persian cuisine as this is one of their favourite restaurants.

We started off by ordering some appetisers; eggplant dip, deep fried dumplings and grilled chicken wings.

I’m usually not a fan of eggplant but this dip definitely changed my perspective. It was very smooth, with mild flavours. The bread provided with dip was slightly on the dry side but it was overall delicious. The deep fried dumplings were sort of like an empanada and I could taste more vegetables than beef in them and was served with fries and ketchup. The grilled chicken wings were also mild flavoured but the chicken was ver juicy and had nice char to it.

For the main, we ordered the koobideh kebab and chicken kebab. They were cooked to perfection with lots of flavour and served with Persian rice which was slightly dry but the juices from the kebabs mixed with the rice add to the flavour. The dish was also served with pickled beet root and grilled tomato, which really adds to the bulk of the meal and was an absolute delight.

We were attended to and served by their employee Ata, who was very hospitable and delightful. I would definitely return for dinner here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEDvI3Sc2riLRWDwmdK1Cw_5D8KMxxHVNjbjkI&fid=0x0:0x6d5c4923e8c333bc"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Bradley Harris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-VgYFhNHqRq6Nb2BeOYF8bo0ZLF16Z7dnH4n3fP9mlh_PBM7erw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best. That's it. This is the best Persian.

My server Ata was fantastic as usual, the vibe is always super chill with good music. The kebabs are juicy and flavorful, the salads are bursting with flavor, the roasted pepper precisely hot enough, and my god the rice...amazing.

It's also super affordable which is a bonus. 10/10.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkx5-B5qkOXy8Ub6ktm2Ib_v0wFPvnImKvQ-Ju&fid=0x0:0x6d5c4923e8c333bc"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"Layla","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKNxBIwuy3UcNAL541dkqKLTjoS5h4R2FgeAHK6whgI48v9U_hM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had our 25th wedding anniversary .it was a really good experience at this restaurant, the staff were really amazing and friendly and caring, food was great. Even they didn’t have live music at first but when I told them it is our anniversary they  brought a really great DJ  that made the celebration so amazing.
I would give more than 5 stars if it was possible.
Thanks you made our night really special and memorable","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mehrnoosh Zamani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFg0QwsMKGTsQgy8RpYdhdkSP9ZR99TzHP0hJIjvT7YmAzSx0x=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Unlike other Persian restaurants, they had good music playing.
Service was good too.
I liked the environment and decoration, but the washrooms needed more attention.
Food: we had koobideh and Torsh kebab, with half rice and half Shirazi salad/shallot yogurt.
The portion was big enough, but didn't like the rice.
The kebabs were a bit dry, and delicious though.
They also brought us complimentary Tahdig🥹","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuHrjBjVEpsZyECVnlnIIKHFAUqQg7ia76fhUE&fid=0x0:0x6d5c4923e8c333bc"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Scott Donnelly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL5EAF9DtH4ijmCd0whZuXPrGMsOI2VrSXFoYfn26161GWcAA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Delicious food, clean and spacious interior, great portions and friendly staff. I’ve eating at so many Chinese places I was surprised to see my lamb had no bones, it was literally all meat. Portion sizes and presentation were beautiful.

We had roasted eggplant dip, koobideh platter, and rice and lamb platter. It was so much food we had to take it home, the cost per value here is outstanding. Really impressed with quality of food and cleanliness of the space.

My only wish was that the servers were more attentive, however they were both so friendly and when they did notice me I got good service. I highly recommend Suren and will return","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Karen W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZZPfpr3QNA42Rvf5GRma8e9wVZe75RxS8Wiz-RehL8Z3PSw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Expected ayce but that is only at lunch.  Dinner is regular menu service.  Ordered a bunch of skewers. Favorite was the chicken gizzards and the beef.  Chicken and the frog tasted the same.  Dumplings were very filling.  Noodle was good.  Service was alright.  It can be pricey.  Each skewer is over $2. And there are set minimum numbers of each variety.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwfMAAdIec3CSbytJz49pZeEVwzBB66pXho2Hm&fid=0x0:0xa1b02baaa2055943"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"Kate Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjE4MSAa0c4Uqc8iOt1LfqIkJDL1ULa2Z17gRh4YDWMExQ1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"--edit aug 2024---

Went for their lunch ayce buffet. It used to be 16.88 but now they upped it to 18.88

The first time I went there was crab and braised pork belly. The second time there were clams and lamb neck? The things that were the same: tomato egg, dumplings, steamed baos, chineze fried donut, and cold dishes like bean sprouts, smashed cucumbers, tea egg, tofu dessert.

They also have hot soy milk for drinks.

Their deep fried chinese donut has got to be the best I've ever had in my life. With the price of a pair of fried donut being over $6 these days, I get my fix here. Other things are standard, good but not outstanding. I really like having soy milk to drink instead of water.

$18.88 is getting a little steep for a limited choice buffet with not too many meat choices. The crab/clam are a nice addition but if there are days without it, it wouldn't be worth.

I would rate the food from this place higher than the similar chinese lunch box style place in richmond, K squared mansion.

--may 2024--
Tried their too good to go. The portion for 6.99 is great! You just never know what leftovers they have so it's a gamble if youre picky.
I got 2 boxes, both had egg/tomato, mapo tofu, and chicken and bell pepper. One box had eggplant and fried dough. The other box had a fried fish head.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7UqmGaL_suVyBxIJ5FcYnD97hyPQe9PeCcMup&fid=0x0:0xa1b02baaa2055943"],"When":"2024-5-23"},{"Name":"Stephanie Maccc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJR-g3p3OTzLou4IruzlffOzNBecuPDu6q1y5X6pI9hEoG2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My first time experiencing this type of BBQ!

Really good, lots of dishes to experience, I was satisfied with my meal even with my current diet.

We had a reservation, party of 3; very casual atmosphere, comfortable, with a good blend of customers. I have seen a family of 3 with a toddler, a group of 6 who were having a round of drinks and food, and plenty of friends sharing a meal.

Only one star lost for a fruit fly found twice in the large rocket of beer(had to exchange the rocket of beer twice). Each time though, it was exchanged promptly and with no fuss.

I managed to taste: beef, chicken, chicken wings, squid, shrimp, scallops, eggplant, and a chive pastry.

All were great- reasonable prices(although my brother said typically this type of BBQ is not cheap), but the flavour is just so good! I usually ask for a dip, but with each meat marinated and seasoned specifically for each dish, I was never bored and in need of dipping sauces.

Now it's not my typical restaurant choice- so I had help with the ordering from my brother and his roommate. There is no rush to finish all the food, there is a mini BBQ at your table to keep food warm.

The bathrooms were fine(functioning toilet and sink), the service was decently fast- about 15 mins for Skewers to arrive, and that was on a busy (tables were full) Saturday night. And with the service, they are good- very straight-forward.

Highlights:
Exciting eating concept
New flavours I hadn't tried
Seafood was delicious
Plates were promptly removed when empty

To note:
Decent parking (in a strip mall)
Wheelchair accessible
Kids allowed
Reservations are allowed
Plenty of menu items to try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLXRI_7OrAG0hrFRlETp7QxAw4JvcBg3Npirw&fid=0x0:0xa1b02baaa2055943"],"When":"2023-9-18"},{"Name":"S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJFi8NUjGIjAKGAmU4BvQNO7lvH7EJ0udfkQsxzZ-7f2FSyPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"There’s no service at all, we spent almost an hour there but they didnt refill my water and napkin until I requested. I can’t even self serve cause they didn’t leave the water jar or tea bottle on my table. Food WAS good when they first opened years ago, but NOT ANYMORE. There’s only one table when we got there at late night, but it still took them such a long time to prepare the food. Plus the other table was mostly drinking, didn’t order much food. It wasn’t even that hot when the food came. The servers just chilling and chatting most of the time instead of look around to see what customers need.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"James Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVk_NV3WJDOK4Ptj4gfFxDZYJY8vECONnQTgFPKW5_fvE36idE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice atmosphere and a very good variety of food where all of them tastes great! A great spot for people to dine or snack while grabbing a few drinks.

Would highly recommend the skewers as they were all seasoned very well and cooked perfectly. Even the beef and pork are super tender!

The only thing I wouldn’t recommend as the Angus Black Truffle rice as it is a bit blend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNt9pbDSFBCQpCTh2ptRXDajX-8ZomDR7Qa5lmQ&fid=0x0:0xa1b02baaa2055943"],"When":"2023-5-17"},{"Name":"Terri Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdHMQamP6ntk6cmD8m9VHj4cLgJWNXVSwfy5Jk1_ks8LpnASP1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This review is on their buffet lunch only! Adult $16.88, seniors 65+ additional 20% off. Lots of meat, veggies and Chinese breakfast selections. Instead of scrambled egg they got tea leaf egg. Chinese donuts, millet porridge,  black fungus etc. the bang for your buck would be the manila clams. Some Tiktok videos showed fried shrimp (which I didn't see) so I think the menu does change up a bit. There are complimentary hot tea and hot soy milk (some said the soy milk was watered down but I find it quite nice!) And you are supposed to wait for the staff to serve you aka scoop the foods onto your tray but as you can see from my photo, some impatient customers would reach over and scoop food themselves which is a bit annoying. Once you get in, tell them dine in or takeout and line up. They will provide a metal tray with rice and you basically point to what you want. Later one of the servers would come over to you with card machine. They also have sliced apples and oranges!! Tell them ahead of time if you have seniors or not! It's a good economic alternative in this economy!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDXFjbdlG-sNllm1wSW92rsrX0QGgceMkglhBe&fid=0x0:0xa1b02baaa2055943"],"When":"2024-1-15"},{"Name":"Kay _sril","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWf6o0e2_vXdRZ-GA9GhniPOW4YWy5Gw7HdSMUg31YdCKtroP7L=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I like this restaurant, it has a very northern flavor, very delicious skewers, and I highly recommend the fresh grilled lamb skewers, which tasted no different from what I tasted locally. The service was also great, and the waiter with glasses was very considerate in pouring water for us. Considering that we had children with us, he also took the trouble to tell us which ones were not spicy.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Penny Rusty Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkGfXMIDqwS_yD1axTk6tkHoLsnybE2ErvKrHMoMIElMJWekI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We originally planned to come here to try out their bbq (I mean, their name has "bbq" in it) ... Unfortunately, we came during the day when they have a smaller "breakfast" menu and no bbq items.

Inside, the interior is filled with neon lights. Quite different than the last restaurant that used to occupy this location.

Food was actually pretty good but also slow to come out. The beef rolls were good and the sauce wasn't too sweet. I liked the steamed dumplings - they were quite large and plump.

Overall, would have liked to try their bbq.

Update: Came back for a revisit during dinner and the skewers turned out great. Especially liked the appy platter where you can choose up to 4 different appys and their dumplings.

Update: Feb 2024 - We revisited in mid Feb and had some skewers but we noticed that they are now offering ayce options where they have a buffet area with different offerings. The ayce options differ between lunch and dinner (think it is only available on certain days so check beforehand). I think they have someone that dishes out the items from the buffet that you pick. Will have to try it sometime.

Update April 2024: We finally tried their AYCE offering. It was $18.88 for lunch on a Sunday. They man the buffet station and you just tell them what you want to eat. While they had crab, it was quite dry and I honestly wouldn't come here for this kind of crab. I thought the clams were pretty good and we definitely ate a lot. The big issue is most of the food isn't really hot as it's sitting in those trays and they wind up being luke warm at best. The flavors also aren't as good as the things we've had made fresh. Honestly, I'd probably skip the buffet and stick with the bbq skewer items.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKTH1LsnzI6j4SiMh_hvloQa-UeeIbengmyDf0&fid=0x0:0xa1b02baaa2055943"],"When":"2022-11-5"}]

title: Meetrice Noodles 蒙自源过桥米线

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Notesa Pooh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLrjOWIJY4AVspUp0spzz7a7iVD4XW0AuZy93pCons02uHEEhjh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently tried the fish maw and chicken soup rice noodles from Mengziyuan, and I was really surprised! The soup base is super rich, without the thirsty feeling of MSG, and I still feel very comfortable after drinking it~ The fish maw and chicken portions are super generous, not at all like the general stores, and it tastes particularly satisfying! I drank all the soup directly, and it was not wasted at all!

The tomato beef rice noodles are also good. Although I think the flavor of the soup base is not as good as the fish maw and chicken soup, it is still a very delicious one! The beef is equally generous, the meat is tender, and it is paired with the sweet and sour tomato soup base, which is especially suitable for friends who like refreshing tastes.

Overall, Meetrice efforts in the ingredients and soup base are definitely worth the price, and I recommend it to every friend who loves rice noodles! Next time I go there, I must order the fish maw and chicken soup rice noodles!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFPX-sfaQc-MtFfnDrbv4y-1fWsyZLHRlEweM_&fid=0x0:0x85f65f5d45e3cf67"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"PumpkinSultan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYOjYMl1zhNPMoh5lAcXuMy3-aBs640z_Ayp3RdHDpxeQfxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered Szechuan noodle soup, it's so spicy and delicious. The food came out super quickly after ordering. This place is authentic and delicious!!! The large fried chicken nugget is a generous portion and so crispy and fresh.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYFSuFzlH-S4x98wOOWFnoDWD_TfAPowV6n-aB&fid=0x0:0x85f65f5d45e3cf67"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"Lynn Su","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWw9q9weQ28aM_NG0d6iQUmLWJC6d2L4nLR1YgE_5bMqE0qBaA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly recommended their Beef and chopped chili on rice!! We come here often, all our family members love this place.
Cold dish Sampler is the best side dish choice if you come here with over 4 ppl.
The top 2 choices of hot appetizers are deep fried chicken nuggets and fried dough sticks!!
If you don‘t prefer spicy taste, tomato flavor rice noodle is the best choice, and rice noodles are refillable for free.
Never disappointed!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNovBc_MESXG8yV12IaDiRa5qNGVaRt55_U1Vj2&fid=0x0:0x85f65f5d45e3cf67"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"eddy wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8Fjpj3y8teHQ4LqbC4PHR8whbU4-XOrTXEwklI9bGRqZLRD20=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first time trying meet rice noodle. I was told this iconic noodle dish is China’s most famous Yunnan “Crossing The Bridge” rice noodle soup restaurant chains with over 600 locations around the world.

There is free parking in the back and it’s limited to a few stalls. But there’s cheap street parking out front if you can’t find a spot, as well as it’s free after a certain time.

Upon entering this location it’s very clean with the air conditioning on during the hot day. The decor is very nice and the staff is very friendly.

Our family ordered some great recommendations. The top #1 selling beef and tomato, the white pepper, and definitely the fish maw and chicken broths. We struggled ordering because the menu is difficult to navigate. We also wanted to try a few appetizers so we got the chicken nuggets and chicken gizzards.

The stone bowls arrive piping hot so be careful. That white pepper soup broth has a nice kick. The fish maw and chicken was soooo comforting. These 2 have become my favourite so far. If you still have a lot of broth left over you can ask for another serving of noodles for free. It’s unlimited but I find after asking once, I’m at the limit.

They have a self serve sauce and garnish bar that a lot of people don’t know about. Take as much as you want but please don’t waste.

Overall it was a great first experience for me. My brother and his wife has been at this location many times and it has now become one of their favourite spots to eat. I’ll definitely be back soon. The quality is excellent. So much flavour in their broths. Come to think of it I prefer this over deer garden signature. MeetRice noodles is affordable, generous, and delicious!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPpAcyFzb2qoxXgBtsCCKjDPHmNgCPgWi5WgP0V&fid=0x0:0x85f65f5d45e3cf67"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Cole Davis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAOU6XCX3s_R0vWndse-P-J59JZDVGZbi6kfyG2pJARhX4qsYzZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"TL:DR the food is already prepared, they bring it out to you in less than 5 minutes, noodles did not have a soulful taste, overall mediocre.

The noodles were scary. As the waiters were approaching me, they tripped a little and gave me a mini heart attack. That's because the hot rock soup was literally smoking hot. They even warned you before eating it.

It was not off to a good start. Dining environment is okay, better if you can see the street.

The noodles looked fantastic, however the flavor was on the surface and not inside the soup. It's like they just added flavor on top of mildly salty water.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnhNVQ5_HYdhLlU1LzH8XaOkUXUqN9Hrxy714P&fid=0x0:0x85f65f5d45e3cf67"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"Chloe Rachel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgExGuK1W-XgQc1tPnrQlqQkWxCTaNhdz977uVTTY3zjpsAzs-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time dining at MeetRice! Had their Special Combo for One (original chicken soup with pork). It came piping hot and took a while to cool down enough to consume. The soup itself came with vegetables and a quail egg, which made for a hearty meal. The meat was tender and not overcooked or dry despite its length of time sitting in the broth! It also came with Chinese donuts (fried donuts) and a bottled ice tea. Others in our group had the Mixed Rice Noodle with smoked duck breast, which tasted more like smoked ham.

We also shared the Cold Dish Sampler (vinegar marinated okra, vinegar marinated fungus, and marinated chicken gizzard). Good starter and palate refresher. Diners at their table can order using a QR code on a cell phone, or on a physical menu where you check off what items you want. Food came out promptly! Good first experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGufLmdoIf60xO7kptye_WtZSTcVI9E0x-jkMn&fid=0x0:0x85f65f5d45e3cf67"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"Earl Flormata","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHEYR5crfzT5mFZF5yY6PmVwTawXCmDPm3U8WVZUqH5mb8rOP9MA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good sized portions. They ran out of many of the things I was hoping for but I did get to try their #4 special with duck meat which was pretty tasty.

Not sure if I’ll repeat but it was a satisfactory experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcGnbCZzkSEmfIMNeWdSgh6C1YEZQ847Glh0Wu&fid=0x0:0x85f65f5d45e3cf67"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Chris Yeung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcT6Z40EZW4C3yt0N7VoX3tM1V1mzzAe7xxRrgBiMmtInx7b7I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This restaurant specializes in noodles in soup, but they also have a variety of appetizers and rice dishes. They have a paper menu that you can mark with a pen, or by scanning the QR code on the table. I would say the portions are pretty decent for the price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOS8RsRXhbtHpGdrxF33EZWHE1rIAQ2_PBYufNR&fid=0x0:0x85f65f5d45e3cf67"],"When":"2024-9-28"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Alexandra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWod6EbW5D4lQiIr-KZpM7_XafS1GjbPyWk8hXBh63OaLnzfHCWEg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food itself was just okay, kind of bland. The best part was the pumpkin broth I chose, but at the start, as it got watered down later. The milk tea was very good as well. Aside from that the cabbage was probably the best part of the hotpot combo (vegetarian option) and everything else was bland, compared to items I could buy myself at T\u0026T. The udon were also tasteless and not good texture - too doughy. The hotpot combo is a good choice and id recommend that option as you get your main pick, a carb side, drink and dessert. Personally wouldn't go again, not for the wait time or price. Our plan was to meet at like 7:15-730, and join the wait-list since they don't take reservations, but we didn't get seated until like 830.\n\nThe service however was great, the staff were friendly and attentive. I think the rest of my group probably enjoyed their time, I just personally thought it was overall too bland and would rather go elsewhere like big way hotpot or boiling point to get my money's worth. Or even go to T\u0026T and pick up hotpot items and make our own.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtrskr2dldhPehl0gpurNsVzaLi3qNZQFtalCo\u0026fid=0x0:0x68e358067d4ef96e"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Adam Gauthier","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxRc7XInTHhMkSXbLH4BabJg43_crL9J2O0ePhYQT9gQqJOcau=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We got the hot pot combos, one with the default house special chicken broth and one with sukiyaki broth. Honestly, the broths and veggies were pretty bland. Udon quality was low as well. This was my second time trying hot pot and I didn’t really like it both times, so take my opinion with a grain of salt. I’d be curious to try different broth flavors, because I definitely don’t recommend these ones. Service was very good however!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKnylcZuuj0PmAVTUa5wrXEMVodKDaB0iYBQbM\u0026fid=0x0:0x68e358067d4ef96e"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"Caroline Hurley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0W2lT28U6f8mba8Q7Bj488o5986FI0XHFKCzC8A-eCI59Jwv-9w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had great service here! Prices seemed reasonable; $100 for drinks and food and dessert for 4 people. The food was all great! I liked how much came with the hot pot combo, the variety is nice. I upgraded to the duck egg and cilantro soup base which had a nice taste but was a little bit bland. Everything else was great! We got a table for 4 people on a Saturday night around 9pm with no wait. Also the happy hour after 9pm is a great deal!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPH8Vt3dtiQ_c3fshGMby6eUwzUANJvYlnpBHJH\u0026fid=0x0:0x68e358067d4ef96e"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Nat A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnjKr4KNFAObzj2bIvH9BRInxwKsSvEg1PM25bKfvhxtWZTWHoog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fresh sides, fresh meat, and tasty broth. The first time I came here I ordered the meat and balls combo. I had the lamb, udon noodles and the chicken broth. The bottomless milk tea was so good and the orange sorbet. They were part of the late night deals. The second time I came here I had the combo with the 7 ounce AAA short rib and laksa soup base. The broth was not as creamy as laksa broth usually is and it was a bit spicy! It had more flavor then the chicken soup base.  I am new to hotpot and really enjoyed this place. There was no wait to get in the first time we came just after 9pm for the late night deal. The second time I came was at 5:50pm on a Sunday night. The wait was around 25 min. We didn't know we could have put our names on the waitlist online before. Definitely worth coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODPRgjw4UFVp0iZTfiHwy6y9tBHWyx0Cnx2Ue-\u0026fid=0x0:0x68e358067d4ef96e"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Ling To","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIlFxJCKp6bjqARUOXgwrUpHcbKAm9tBpTn_ze63uacIdbffw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Place filled up quickly after we arrived around 6pm for a Thursday! Food and service was top notch!  Ice cream at the end was almost too decadent after that filling meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAb9YypXebVeBcM4pfv1sx9OPkjByhUZ-UBNnb\u0026fid=0x0:0x68e358067d4ef96e"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Fionn Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ6QM4xX4rnjDy7uQ9_UX1ud-FeXhAIPbUGuv1ks1vTREnqqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Can never go wrong with hotpot. They also do a combo where you can have a hotpot and a drink! Also when I went it was a buy 1 hotpot the second one is 50%! I definitely recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDJJrA6fULm2aRzLFVsxxSaG6AwI2jMxdG1OEX\u0026fid=0x0:0x68e358067d4ef96e"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Boris Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUk9r_jDbEOYLZE002_C-mDR1iy13BvAeTSP90zAqlrpzBKP98b=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I believe that when it comes to the restaurant, customer service is a key to run business. Jenny was the person helped us and the customer service was fantastic. I live in Richmond but I love to eat in this location because the service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEE-RonxNN7NYYMiov5Rfj3f9K3WsLyv2tSKSS\u0026fid=0x0:0x68e358067d4ef96e"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"vanto vanto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJIccafqWgpXVJNz7rQf3Mi2pFoGK7saOUJlIspaNi9wlwuOA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice Taiwanese shabu shabu! The service is friendly, introducing menu in English nicely. The meal was great, very nice combo, fresh vegetables. shrimps and beef, the soup tastes good. Upgrading to marinated ground pork rice only needs 0.95 cent (tastes really good) every nice experience!! Love it","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFZz30sGBQBCXbCkMh3gznCgpa1Zx3hPXCjjEs\u0026fid=0x0:0x68e358067d4ef96e"],"When":"2024-5-21"}]

[{"Name":"Brent Haverty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0dN217TDEvH_8HM2XLCnsKGyb_jaQlPzsT6Ao6EYHtDk4fFU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great service last night. I placed an order close to when they were closing. Skip mixed up my order, but I called the restaurant and they made sure my order went through, and got it out to me. It arrived quick, and was tasty. Much appreciated. We'll be back. 🙂","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9KTlC8I0fmO6hQdT3XLPepG4FHLTGhA6A7TE&fid=0x0:0xdf526837a71890d0"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"TALHA CHOWDHURY","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbm34OqSKdQ1mLYcx8cLhDaGZp2W1hUDNqgyJGT_URSqqBBTU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We ate Lamb plate today, and the food was really good 👍. It was tasty and delicious not dry.  I hope they will keep the quality of food the way it is now.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBRpMXr_yZ6kMitWM4NIj-j4-d3vDYy3bSjHQ&fid=0x0:0xdf526837a71890d0"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"William Ting","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVROj5tKGe8MbrrNOhk8-59eVUA_x7_lmH6eRP-mRZLTzD9H6iPlA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hole in the wall basement donair spot. Really good. The chicken is well seasoned and portions are generous. Price for a meat platter is fair.

Give this place a try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQiWanmM77IGRExjN_pDrAv8XR2OKCNv-nM1ZG&fid=0x0:0xdf526837a71890d0"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Sheena Van buskirk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ9N1oHt6k3cJJ7F85Ov9drdDPaokeNsFwNEI8YvESXTlC_Ew=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Walked past and it smelled so good we had to eat there. The food lived up to the smell. Service was fast, food AMAZING, service good. Portions huge! Will go back for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLasb-a7aykyW-l9tVw1rge_TAz5bTpbkCod52&fid=0x0:0xdf526837a71890d0"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Петър Петров","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIXufN67cd4okbOdx-km5KOvc5OtZvp2WoMOJyIvzcaT3V5cQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great Donairs , always happy to visit and enjoy the food.
Highly recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmF8mV7Bh2YZb7UYF2nqc-hXsOU0YCeT3EPJJK&fid=0x0:0xdf526837a71890d0"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Camille MacDonald","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwP1KYc9OGQB0maB0_Vg3ViD_DKCJIRKm1QBEAOjwvWny8zZHT=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've eaten here twice and it's been great both times. Really fresh and delicious, plus they're open til midnight. Love it! 👏","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNU-r7KQCX4WC2APg8coPGyunxAcx3mE_tBWsEr&fid=0x0:0xdf526837a71890d0"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Kim Van","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLSmYr_9FzPN6iDImg2B_agskwEHvPhgAvib8jSpCvgJVDwYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great first time experience. Walk by a lot and the smell makes my mouth water! So I decided to try it out. The person who made my donair was so kind and made the food extra tasty!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO66GmeNih0XdEJesZZW9fSUGMpa5HYNw85VWA6&fid=0x0:0xdf526837a71890d0"],"When":"2024-6-27"},{"Name":"Alan Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKcyIvxib_OqKagUIDGf4GkKiLeSnWcS28OLwMPA1Ei6K9nXA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Feel bad for the staff here for working in that heat with no A/C….. had to note this as I don’t know if there is anything that can be done for them

But on the note of food, it’s the best place in town for donair. I have been to many in the GVA and I’d say this is one of the better places :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6UIcyBIS9r97kE0KVlC7yjWHj5wiPinJuDURn&fid=0x0:0xdf526837a71890d0"],"When":"2024-7-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lạc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpO8370_7RDhjsqnPt6c35t5mMarMGN54u0eeSrhk9ZwWK5CU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered beef noodle soup and chicken fried rice. The price was reasonable and the portion was huge so you’ll really get more bang for your buck. Their tea was so nice and the service was awesome. I love my beef noodle soup. The both is tasty and the beef is very tender. I will definitely come here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7TyYWWnhS7BN6yu-SAUyqN071ALD1y9dPYMY4&fid=0x0:0x97c2eb290f6e2ff"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"Bonnie Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrN8l--jS8SSlWf4ITIBjcqcfOfGT89uq3eYLZ3VBX6hfTmvyt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This local gem is worth it for the unique lychee-like tea, delicious lamb skewers, and incredible mapo tofu—we even went twice in a week! While the food is fantastic, the small space can feel chaotic with impatient delivery drivers crowding the area. The friendly owner makes up for it, but it’s better suited for takeout than dining in.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhXVUXaNwTQ5P1uR76DUBtTCyBCaykF7V0QN7g&fid=0x0:0x97c2eb290f6e2ff"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Bob Garlick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfLmjiVv01ZU-jB3YNluSYF2ooJYC36mV7qQZNJk426nlnkW-fTw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place lived up to its reputation for fine food. This is the second time that I've been to the restaurant and I find that they are always helpful and welcoming. Even though the atmosphere has a low budget feel, I still think that their food is 5 star.

Burnaby has some amazing restaurants and it seems quite a few of them are within this area so if you live nearby definitely check it out.

And if you don't mind a bit of a drive, come on down to the Heights area and check out some of the restaurants here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrMMIf06drAm8FADgWk4xpkp5dcs1LaNBcdbJ7&fid=0x0:0x97c2eb290f6e2ff"],"When":"2024-11-14"},{"Name":"Mitsuba","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPTokkJ7B-7PXzC1asSVZYKNDX01MAmrvmPdKoBlxIra8E3U0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We ordered the meal for three, priced at 62 dollars. The food was decent, however the sweet and sour pork was refried and hard to chew on the inside.

The noodles were great and had sufficient oil.

For the price it was a tasty meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNg5XiIzbhFWrghrC6ZuqNbbFfeI_9CyCb2-B6g&fid=0x0:0x97c2eb290f6e2ff"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Kevin L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJFN49rWecZZfUCTK3rbvFOFo0pjI20zCoRw5bMGABHEWzSww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Have the beef roll, you know you want it!

North King Noodle House is a perfect addition to the Hasting strip in Burnaby.   There is authentic Chinese food and new age Western food for our friends who might not be as adventurous.

The owners is adept in various styles of Chinese cooking . So if you be Taiwanese, Hong Konger, mainland or a Canadian this food is TASTY! And a great deal!!!

I will be coming back for more.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNy3_bEHQVvWbXSASnsGvxBL-x0YDBY9yr6EYJg&fid=0x0:0x97c2eb290f6e2ff"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"Anna Tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWa43AnPnraNMwSMXJiQfK4j7w9ooXWLyuZVMbEIDdJ2wovIyWR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food at a great price point. Glad to have more authentic Chinese cuisine in North Burnaby.

We ordered the water boil fish, hot and sour soup and the green onion lamb. All very good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJGMct9rtXpO94AvqZz_B7FAt3NLb3RQMGM3OC&fid=0x0:0x97c2eb290f6e2ff"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Ramtin Jamshidi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJlslwRn0d1yFXo1OTekV1XDnYBhElsnDSwkEoT-DdoA3cCUA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've had their Dan Dan noodle before, and it was one the best I have had in the gvrd.  This time I came back for the beef noodle soup, and it was delicious.   The broth was mildly flavoured and enjoyable, but you can amp that up quickly with a couple spoon fulls of their delicious in-house made chili oil.

The star of this meal was the chili cold chicken side that I got with it.   Wow.  Thin slices of skin on chicken, smothered in chili oil and covered with cilantro...wow.  Just wow.

I'll definately be back to explore more of this menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO16p_CRG_mxZ6_f7nFZHxEZyRkk_kVENjtHcHZ&fid=0x0:0x97c2eb290f6e2ff"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"Jordana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJvxqFr8nGL8vok-SCRwxhp2_EJmOiFDFc3qAUH70xw1rrHg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for lunch on a Sunday. Food was great, family friendly atmosphere. We especially liked the beef roll, came in a large serving size and the sauce was the perfect balance of sweet and savory. We ate all of it before I had a chance to take a photo. The steamed dumplings and tofu noodles were also great. Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1Q9-dlG0OZx1uF3_-jjIcNn6JiBQwix5kgUm7&fid=0x0:0x97c2eb290f6e2ff"],"When":"2024-6-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kasumi A. Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7_0dE4TBrW-eazsY9gh6IEHsIYux8SX4ecNQs4YyVQn_4oH7I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Extremely slow services, took them 45 minutes to serve us dried ribs, full rack of ribs and zoo sticks. Even they gave us wrong orders after 45 minutes.

Bit of a wait for seating. But got a party of 8 seated at same table","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0HGT1uJkDZT_d45Qrdw03WzpIcFClSVQgxNBL&fid=0x0:0x1bd86e1b9a1a73e1"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Peter Au","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwBxrbZVtlTM1OV2SDGm3NwMn7yUHEw1MaS3fh_B2utP_W4kON=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was good. Usual quality as most other whitespots. The milkshakes were great and can be shared among 2 people if you asked. They gave you two glasses.

Like this location with lots of parking and less crowds, even on weekends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtOKaxw25tMDHF53aWCdZ3GJDYtHJ_al5OmqYj&fid=0x0:0x1bd86e1b9a1a73e1"],"When":"2024-5-1"},{"Name":"laurie cook","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIYUH9BMoPdLrCuEneTgOuoGHk41JornT-Ies67VkAfXp_xLw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was covered tasty!!! I highly recommend the Humboldt squid appetizer 😋🤤😊....burgers were great hot n tasty... our server was Josh5937 he was very attentive to our needs...only 1 fault ( he forgot to bring me little bit of gingerale for my sangria..) all in all great place ...clean great atmosphere fabulous food!!! Will definitely 3at here again!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOIH4BQZtC9Pggf3Y13Q8F9Y6eaIz2dh_Ov23el&fid=0x0:0x1bd86e1b9a1a73e1"],"When":"2023-6-1"},{"Name":"Taylor Sutton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZ94dC4ovvA8vMx6Ru5C1hGmwWA-otbXj48vbRx2g9ryt7m9Tq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our server Julia was amazing! Best service we have had at a White Spot in quite some time. Very attentive and down to earth. Great addition to the team!! Food was delicious and was prepared fast.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Donna Mah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU12wasVRo6FDSPuB3LLLr5cSTMUZp-bihxRad5C6MQcLk9t6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I got say I was shocked by the lack of service at this particular white spot.  I usually find the restaurant chain’s service great but not this one.  Let me be clear,  it was the service staff I had issue with. It was the front of house.  Let me explain. The restaurant was not busy and there were lots of table open and clean that they could have sat people at but did not. Three parties including myself wait was the host wandered around the restaurant chatting with other staff rather than seating the customer.  It’s first of all not great optics and secondly this does not help the restaurant have repeat customer. I will not return to this White Spot sadly","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sathiyaseelan Suhashini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGCDhZwAvUF3Q8iMEpEx8TQCvKbwiXzYFJN0uOrenEt7v0wxGX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had an awesome experience with excellent customer service.

For the appetiser, we tried Chicken with honey mustard.

We tried the Fish and Chips and BC Chicken burger. Both came with coleslaw salad, fries and dipping.
We also tried Zoo Stick - Zuchchini sticks. It was filling that made our tummy to fill so quick.

Food was hot, fresh and great in portion. Loved our visit !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1WcnFf-sYMrsqJsZS9ktZHTP8JAMZF6BzvZ5U&fid=0x0:0x1bd86e1b9a1a73e1"],"When":"2023-12-4"},{"Name":"Aikaterini Paraskevopoulou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWz3ZxtJ1yGZCtR75W-LnZSOUs_niDfPdjJoxT_2MZ0KgUgxXA8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"These guys care about their customers! They always have cute and funny messages on the bag and some times delicious treats!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDmvSGUG8GU3cJTJ9jZjnXznwo7euztO3au9c3&fid=0x0:0x1bd86e1b9a1a73e1"],"When":"2024-12-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Innsbruck A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJfBHpT0Z4m7H2I3G0xUSha_BPZ0NBXCI6vqj7nINfjcFSQPg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Exceptional dining experience! The customer service is outstanding—warm, friendly, and highly attentive without delay. The food is absolutely delicious, bursting with authentic flavors, and served in generous portions. It’s a fantastic value for the quality provided. A must-visit restaurant—highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXgpY1hm4aE9Vo8o-YqUUEw4hkLaFo2qUIHGOD&fid=0x0:0x6a548458c192f1e6"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"David 04 Make the World a Better Place","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXmkrAyRsAwad4uDl0EKEwpsCVMLq51IOxmbley55h_iwJzGo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"● Taste ★★★★★
● Price ★★★★☆
● Kindness ★★★★☆
● Comfort ★★★☆☆
● Cleanliness ★★★★★

On Sunday, the restaurant seemed very busy, and there was a wait to be seated.
Once we sat down and ordered, our food arrived in about 10 minutes.

The taste was excellent, and the food was truly delicious.

As for service, there wasn’t anything particularly notable beyond the essentials. The server brought us hot tea and cups when we sat down, took our order, and delivered our food—there wasn’t much else needed.

However, the manager stood out. He asked if we were enjoying our meal and greeted customers warmly, managing the busy crowd with care.

The prices seemed a bit high, even considering the quality of the beef. Almost all ingredients were pre-prepared; after ordering, the noodles were boiled, and the ready-made ingredients and broth were added.

Parking is very limited.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsCttMiYuDwwVHq0Dbj7qfvQWNkp_xxKVzsPU&fid=0x0:0x6a548458c192f1e6"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Derek Shek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP9Pjija1abf8rOsOgAPBkesWOZ8sALAjyQJKt0I-DTaykDkHV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We've dined at No. 1 Beef Noodle for dinner several times, but this was our first time trying their breakfast, and it was quite a pleasant surprise! Normally, the dinner crowd and long queues deter us, especially with kids who aren’t keen on waiting. Opting for breakfast turned out to be a delightful decision.

The breakfast menu is impressive, offering a wide variety of choices and different combinations that cater to diverse tastes. We tried the pork chop with black pepper sauce, and it was excellent—perfectly cooked with a flavorful sauce that really hit the spot. The highlight of our visit was the special 11% discount offered in celebration of November 11, which was an unexpected bonus that made our meal even more enjoyable.

If you're a fan of their dinner menu, I highly recommend giving No. 1 Beef Noodle’s breakfast a try for a tasty and more relaxed experience. The ample choices and great food are sure to start your day off right!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZ3pPIwcLh8sCdawZeJ2ZMwZLwfhF74WXbed7r&fid=0x0:0x6a548458c192f1e6"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Sip Somp","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwgL5vmiYKzVQ7BKwYO70yLRJwmbgUmpttU-CcoTZiuB_KS0AS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a good place to eat reminds me of when I was in Taiwan I ordered z2 and made it a combo I shared everything with my wife . They give you so much food the portion is huge and it’s so yummy it was worth the drive from Surrey. Everyone here made you feel like at home always asking if you need anything the price is reasonable. And the stinky tofu is so good if they had a place like this is Surrey I will be there often this place did not disappoint us at all. And the bubble tea is so good","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNORcZuwyDcgPPbCX6AUD3kBfn5u-N4U_s11cbC&fid=0x0:0x6a548458c192f1e6"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"Kevin (KC)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrZpzDcm4xbgvb_oOynyP_bQvwIe7l-wMoPIs8L4UeVZ-waBkO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Delicious Taiwanese Beef Noodles! 😋

Had dinner here for a friend's birthday and the food came fast and hot! So fast in fact, that another friend and myself started sipping on our broth before we could even pray over it! (oops, sorry Jesus) 🙏

Anyways, the beef noodle soup I ordered was excellent! I went with their house special with wontons and hand sliced noodles. The broth was hot and didn’t taste too artificial. Portions were good as well.

We also ordered several fried baskets like chicken baskets and squid baskets to share amongst ourselves. The portions were so large that we couldn’t finish it even though there were quite a bit of us there. They were hot and crispy and really complemented the soup. 🦑

Service was also great, they allowed us to combine the tables together so everyone can eat and enjoy staring at each other while we celebrated our friend’s special day. They even played the 'happy birthday' song which was great!

The interior and lighting was also nice. It was modern and brightly lit and seating was comfy.

The only con I would say is the parking. I would advise to park at the BCIT parking lot nearby and just walk here during busy hours because it's a nightmare finding parking here when every Asian person is parked on a lane with their hazard lights on.

Overall, this was a great establishment to have a birthday dinner with lots of people. Food and service was good! 👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwD8ndTdSs4UEKHhQCj-K-mi0jEg69yZR7BZXm&fid=0x0:0x6a548458c192f1e6"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Alan Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-QmMYfw75kgf5vonVt_7RAAdUJRl5hAF6Ijht6iC6ZE8aPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food and service is very good for an Asian style restaurant. I would even say it competes with some of the fine dining restaurants.

The price point of their main menu is a little on the higher end though and they don’t accept credit card

They have happy hour bbt after 9pm","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkftMPbskufEMx_rC9S-zHhLECH2ohGqjm_CSF&fid=0x0:0x6a548458c192f1e6"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"Nita Hsu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUhGTdmBM9jecfEcbpSqwrLDk0DxAV7yZiQfjEnrY15rN22_Ml3w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It was a friend's gathering, so we ordered a lot. I came here for Taiwanese-style deep-fried stinky tofu, which tasted very similar to what I had in Taiwan!
Other than that, other foods are nothing special. Some are too salty, and some are too dry to eat.

There was an event that followed their Instagram account to get honey green tea. It’s way too much sweet to drink😵‍💫","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCprK8cuhHCk6AhEk9QLydiPc0GcjN7GudJ_5M&fid=0x0:0x6a548458c192f1e6"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Wilson Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSm0OL35hzVJK_abduYEdwM7LUqJ7brLJ81t5M62AnbZsxwMgg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Extreme pressure environment, staffs continuously check our table to take away not even finished dishes at least 10 times.

Putting pressure on us to finish asap so they could get the table back for the next clients.

My friend called ahead for reservations at 6 pm, they called at 5:56pm and asked would we be on time. Totally wtf

Not a place for friends meeting and chatting, even worst that food court.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMABc4FutLeaC-WUTvdeYfeUS5DAiqiGGzaUhFC&fid=0x0:0x6a548458c192f1e6"],"When":"2024-12-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mike","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJzmIMdClD_EKzaLe1KeBgD1C80_nJRRFvPT1-KW88LywkF0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Carbs (rice, potatoes, pita) were flavorful as they were really good but we prefer the meats and salad more seasoned but probably better for our health with it being less salty. Our favourite was the shrimp, meats is always hard to make sure it’s cooked without it being too dry. Overall good meal and pizza was good also-large portions so we were satisfied!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaR5VMFRp8qmXfflbjDnhLVz_upnF2i3Js4tCP&fid=0x0:0x4a0430008cdc0f94"],"When":"2024-6-12"},{"Name":"T Turner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIPMGGqAq7klP2u1e3RkGw4eNKl43C-wW-lqME0DBOq09WNPw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just ordered here for the millionth time.
Again..beyond amazing!
Beef Souvlaki Dinner was perfect! The steak skewer was as long as my forearm! HUGE portion.
My wife's Tortellini also was perfectly cooked. Delicious! The front staff also was very prompt and friendly. Thanks again Argo!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHnRF16KX78-saYETwtYUEdeJbvJSFXKz-HbEb&fid=0x0:0x4a0430008cdc0f94"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"Susan Gnanaprakasam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbt4PnxzdvnOl1oM6NX45JLD9E-ClELd0DKvCFPzsUkuuIsBYT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was delightful 😍 large portion and the food was of great quality. The service was amazing. Very polite and courteous staff. I tried the platter, roast lamb, calamari and Ekmet was the name of the dessert, all of them were fresh and tasty! 🤩","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQMZcOu8X3ZMnuZj4mEIpu9kNcXNf7Mj1yTJWW&fid=0x0:0x4a0430008cdc0f94"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Anthony Plaxen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0TosyGAQWTqM_XvTHaXfq2jDGHv6ifKWBgTGcJKYnap3ceipL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good Greek style pizza! Tried this place for takeout and was pleasantly happy with the pizza! Has a good crust, nice tasty and zesty sauce and good toppings. The pricing is pretty good and the quality is good too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSsH92eDxg9EF_xILVMXF9BegyNq44Napr4YAD&fid=0x0:0x4a0430008cdc0f94"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"Hollyburn Eye Clinic Marketing","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJdVWFOFMzLDhGWUT2qYwQwsuxyifJjC7fYimvNOLTzJuPKsA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Catering service was outstanding! The food was authentic, flavourful, and beautifully presented. Everyone really loved the fresh tzatziki and warm pita bread, and all the ingredients were fresh and high-quality! The staff was professional, courteous, and quick to accommodate special requests, helping us host our event with one less thing to worry about. Perfect for any event, their catering brings the vibrant flavours of Greece to your table. Highly recommended!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jason Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3LIYcsoJa62sMCKkYZEq5KqZmDy8sYq1goonxztvnXTGB2t1xKg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I needed to plan for a lunch for around 50 people and decided to give Argo a try and I'm glad I did!

The food was incredible and everyone was amazed by the food.  We ordered chicken and beef souvlaki and the proteins were both juicy, delicious, and generous.  The pita was fluffy and yummy.  The rice was flavourful and had great texture.  The potatoes were a surprise as well, as many places, usually provide bland soft potatoes, but these were filled with flavour!

I also managed to get an order of the lamb for myself and it was also incredible!

We will definitely be ordering more from Argo!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Homayoun E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLExIMU_sMsOdOIL75LRlSj26wJuIEYT-v8sO_NWa6NjCjgRw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"FIVE stars all the way!
We have been going to Argo since they opened a while ago and the service and the quality of food have never changed and always been great.
In my opinion, they serve the best Greek dishes in Burnaby and Vancouver area. The lamb souvlaki is my personal favorite. The owner and the staff are friendly and nice. I cannot wait to eat there again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tyler Schofield","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWuoaZZ3MNDehF361JNjPMrf5HGihgX4wTbUaFJ0po5QOO5nWpcGw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"During our stay in the area we had been craving Greek for some time now and we haven't found a good Greek place in our home town yet. The good ones closed years ago. We were extremely satisfied with our meal from here and couldn't be any more happy to have fulfilled our craving. It was a small little place with two tables but we waited close to half hour to dine in there and the cashier brought our food out to us and we ate there. The pita bread was super fresh and soft, the food was full of flavour and good portion and overall was amazing Greek. We will definitely make this a place to stop at when we are visiting in the area for a choice of Greek options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2NJvHJqQy8wdb3RMjrDjqDYJ5d0R5lIp3oqZj&fid=0x0:0x4a0430008cdc0f94"],"When":"2024-1-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Utsav Kapoor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJL8x4VY5WagjCcrYphJooLF_4R0tb1XG9loJaDDcZ2HnJQSw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This hookah lounge is the perfect spot to relax and unwind. The ambiance is cozy and inviting, with great lighting and comfortable seating. They have a wide variety of high-quality shisha flavors to choose from, and the staff is always happy to recommend new blends to try. The hookahs are well-prepared, smooth, and last a long time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNknJSpvtZISo14XB_ttohtfL496vWjBuCbgdV1&fid=0x0:0xe30e5fcd54f6f02e"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Kamal Dallh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnVenP0mB44f6hrNiBrZFKgyyfO-KZa1aGNyUHEtBkfmS4ux02=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mike, the owner of Living Room Hookah Lounge, is truly the heart and soul of the establishment. His passion for hookah culture shines through in every detail of the lounge. With years of experience, Mike has built a reputation for excellence, ensuring that every guest receives top-notch service and an exceptional experience.
His approachable nature and genuine love for connecting with customers create a welcoming atmosphere that makes everyone feel at home. Mike often engages with patrons, sharing his expertise and making personalized recommendations. His dedication to the community is evident through regular events that feature local artists and themed nights.
In summary, Living Room Hookah Lounge is a must-visit for anyone seeking a delightful hookah experience. With Mike at the helm, you can expect not only great hookah but also a warm, inviting environment that fosters connection and enjoyment. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYXP__kxOoECW2qlalADWuJZvKgSAhQaFTLg-P&fid=0x0:0xe30e5fcd54f6f02e"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Bree","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJeKvaYfiXnh_E1SPdxRS6e6fxGRyOy5PZowuDtIBFwTQFYRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best Hookah Lounge in Canada. I've been to many in Toronto, Montreal, and Calgary. This has to be the best experience.

The ambiance is unmatched,  very classy, demure, and cozy. You are truly exported to a new world within Vancouver. The music is very tasteful, ranging from classic Arabic music, Farsi, Afro Beats, and Modern Mood Music.

The food is very flavourful. If you don't smoke Shisha, come here for the food. Must try the Lamb Shank and the Living room hummus.

I saved the best for last.

The service is 5 stars. When I came here for the first time, my server took her time to explain their menu here. The ladies here are graceful, kind, fast, and polite. Always with a smile, you'll feel like royalty. You can tell they enjoy working here, which makes the service deserving of 5 stars alone.

They have many special entertainment events ranging from professional violinist to belly dancers. Never a dull moment.

Note: For special events, book your table in advance as it's very popular and draws a crowd. You don't want to miss out","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIb_z7iKYZaNUZndbNvPqMlrW0eqyDGw2pOYpj&fid=0x0:0xe30e5fcd54f6f02e"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Garvit Gandhi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_I1I4Rn0X6g1t5fLmZof6603i8tDuO_9TovXm_s75XZeizWuf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Living Room Hookah Lounge is a great spot for hookah enthusiasts and newcomers alike. The inviting atmosphere, excellent hookah, and friendly service make it a standout choice for a relaxing evening out. Highly recommended!

Special mention goes to Mike, who is an exceptional person and owner. His warm demeanor and willingness to go the extra mile for customers truly enhance the overall experience at the lounge.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONq0jqRR1QrJXA4wMYIG6hAKjJrJPoH2SKT1LT&fid=0x0:0xe30e5fcd54f6f02e"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"Vivek Madaan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXY13yRvBJRswBOfxPmJIboKsY45aWhiW_wzUGATCPDQaG2WoWB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The customer service here is exceptional—friendly and attentive without being intrusive. Ask for the owner Mike.
The music adds to the vibe, setting a chill atmosphere without being too loud. Bonus points for their drinks and snacks, which pair perfectly with the hookah experience.
If you’re looking for a fun night out or a place to hang with friends, this spot is definitely worth a visit. I’ll be coming back again soon!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jarmaine Ragutero","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUI9rcSVE7Kzu_Yjd3TXX_fYr-SDqIrhn8ILOAGjuleFJn6u7KU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The service at living room lounge is excellent! The staff especially the hostess Jovanne is polite and attentive, going above and beyond to provide a wonderful eating+hookah experience. I was really impressed by the service and how beautiful the lounge was! They had a great playlist going throughout the night which did not disappoint!! Definitely worth it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGPYX7iteUVMZ2VI3ACnIc1ymHlApq3QUlpBPX&fid=0x0:0xe30e5fcd54f6f02e"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"Svitlana Hrybanova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJXwUrn7E2n5ouSUhAxxb36jFB80WfLcKt5nib74guCXZW--g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Outstanding Hookah Lounge Experience in Burnaby

If you’re looking for a cozy and upscale hookah lounge in Burnaby, this place is a hidden gem! From the moment you walk in, you’re welcomed by a warm and inviting ambiance, soft lighting, and comfortable seating that instantly sets the mood for relaxation.

The variety of shisha flavors is truly impressive, catering to both classic and adventurous tastes. The staff is friendly and knowledgeable, always happy to recommend flavor combinations or assist with setting up your hookah. It’s clear they take pride in providing top-notch service.

What really stands out is the attention to detail. The hookahs are clean and well-maintained, ensuring a smooth smoking experience. Pair that with their selection of drinks and small bites, and you have the perfect spot to unwind with friends or enjoy a solo session.

Whether you’re a seasoned hookah enthusiast or just trying it for the first time, this lounge guarantees a memorable experience. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rima Daniel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXa-KY-e-3VtdRPI_ru7qw9KzWGWroyfunqGgPFkbAoCN6mxRdG=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is absolutely amazing. We come here often.. Mike has absolutely amazing customer service. The best hookah I’ve ever had. We drive two hours just to come to this place. Definitely deserve more than five stars.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMDIdH29DKpgi26CMto7T1vdhZDO8c_HPYmBv-&fid=0x0:0xe30e5fcd54f6f02e"],"When":"2024-10-10"}]

I ordered the birthday meal, and both the receptionist and the server were very kind and attentive. The coffee was refillable, the table was clean, and all the necessary condiments were provided. Considering the value for money, I was very satisfied overall!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNc26COQwB-NOZvBZ5VIr8XoeGIk8saD7AeHPAJ&fid=0x0:0xbbb2b5c47fd9282f"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"C E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL9Sw12YtCq4W1VpSxyr7zX2I2LRxLhd47w143d-5D5HQq8yg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a fantastic experience at Denny’s thanks to Aileen R for being warm and attentive. From the moment we walked in, I was greeted with a friendly smile and promptly seated. Aileen is incredibly kind, checked in regularly to make sure everything was perfect, and handled our requests with genuine care.Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNaDzB81Xu2cmkaOQn7RYV1fbZwy6H1D8Mlbfyw&fid=0x0:0xbbb2b5c47fd9282f"],"When":"2024-11-8"},{"Name":"Lui Wing","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIkLKwyrVXVeKp5xlkVZazzpkLWpBVKKUr4fDN-F-oZjkv0VQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have my birthday meal here and it's such a heartwarming dining experience. I want to give a big hug to my server Eva, who greets me like an old friend and deliver exceptional service the whole time. She really makes my day! I have been to different Denny and the Denny on Kingsway is definitely the best, in term of the food, environment and service. The French Toast Slam is amazing too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZpNxeU1Km-PZBuqKwFPMTeg4YqOUxO0Us4orB&fid=0x0:0xbbb2b5c47fd9282f"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"CHRISZEL IGTANLOC - FAJARDO","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUa1oFm2yvPlKLBPYcqpE2ugZIOCc8gVAfkeHAel5Hzvov5NFPE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Daisy is our server today, she is great, accomodating and friendly.

It’s our first time here at Denny’s. We love the area, FOOD, and the staff as well.

I got the berry toast! I love it! 😂 my husband got the American breakfast is was good, esp the roasted hushbrown!😀 plus  Unlimited coffee😁

Thank you Denny’s!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMN1xcTstiJyRfi21UJcieccKtU7QgDpkEPysjd&fid=0x0:0xbbb2b5c47fd9282f"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Steve Kwok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKwkgRrbi5M9Ki8qJpMrO9D1tvlC8mU1uuhk5zLapBrH6_gog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favorite location! Thank you Karen and the team!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqqkklYmfDs1tXLvh8O6paDAmys4ofPofF2pY5&fid=0x0:0xbbb2b5c47fd9282f"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"alice w","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKfBFd5-MCz0iWhHQjADA6mFZoHPhSAyoSlVDQe971OUgYbxw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The steak is cooking just right very tender and outside not so black so delicious to eat I just forgot to take the pictures the manager and service girls so nice there are perfect even have so many people we just feel so welcome and treat we will coming back soon Thanks for everything this is best one and favorite one we enjoyed so much 👍🤗🤗👏🥳🥳","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxNrD-sjZ1ZW-D4xfIZ3tr6qkfKFw78xmqG4BX&fid=0x0:0xbbb2b5c47fd9282f"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Lina Huine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXTc90UClGdW5-vlLdRudv0nYQ1eUmIsZfcJ8sj-8pxZav3xZGO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This DENNY’S has been around forever and the service is still great as it was years ago.
