user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good Chinese food that is suitable for family gatherings as they have huge round tables and the restaurant is huge. Everything tasted good. The fish maw soup was great, speciality chicken was standard good, classic beef ho fan fried noodles and sweet and sour fish were solid, and the assorted seafood fried rice with pineapple was unique and refreshing. The longevity buns shaped liked peaches were freshly steamed and tasty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3hNOv67pFsQHEsobUCmZ-qKAx5TLamooermFX&fid=0x0:0x313d915b0b468f26"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"minnie li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKRoQOlIxvrw__7xun_s22_XplGfNg8u2NALefXOOF5MWkjHg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food at this restaurant was average, and the prices were fair. However, the service left much to be desired. When we tried to order individual dishes, the server persistently pushed us to opt for their more expensive set dinner. Despite repeatedly telling him that we wanted to stick with single dish items, he continued to upsell.

We ended up ordering a few dishes, and the portion sizes were good, but after dinner, we felt unusually thirsty and had to drink a lot of water.

When it came time to pay, the service experience became more frustrating. Like some other Chinese restaurants, they asked if we could pay in cash and offered a 10% discount. However, the discount didn’t apply to the entire bill. They told us that only regular items were eligible for the discount, and the duck we ordered, which cost $100, was excluded. It felt like a bit of a trick, as the cash discount ended up saving us only a few bucks.

I’d recommend avoiding paying in cash here. It doesn’t really benefit you as a customer and can make it feel like they're just avoiding taxes while offering minimal savings.

Overall, while the food was ok, the upselling, confusing payment terms, and feeling thirsty after the meal made the experience less enjoyable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfGWXXNUu28tQeReZLZghZAf4w9guhR4OSSZqS&fid=0x0:0x313d915b0b468f26"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"Stanley Lowe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLMA0j5YPV0e_ki7txxd7xeDBLDLGeQTP8WAcMSalz9cV9eFw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came with dad on a Sunday Funday morning at 10 am.  No wait and no reso made.

Service is consistent.  Always someone clearing the empty dishes and looking to add hot water to our teapot 🫖.

Always nice to get a bunch of sauces.

We did not order much, but did order a huge congee to take home for a few meals after.

It was not that crazy loud, none of the TVs were all ... but it was chill 😎.

We were quick and it was easy for us.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZPbqNmQ8HFJCuh89_EZEf8J4DJ2hGN9RXuU00&fid=0x0:0x313d915b0b468f26"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"eddy wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8Fjpj3y8teHQ4LqbC4PHR8whbU4-XOrTXEwklI9bGRqZLRD20=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There's 2 locations. There’s one in Coquitlam and one in Burnaby. I came to this location in Burnaby on Kingsway. Also, if it’s your first time here, the entrance is behind the building where their back parking lot is. There’s plenty of parking all around the neighborhood.

It was a hot day and the air conditioning was on. The restaurant is very spacious. This type of restaurant is a banquet style setting with Cantonese style cuisine. You come here for the seafood to maximize your experience, but there are many other items that are non seafood.

Our family came here to celebrate Father’s Day early. We decided to get the lobster set dinner. Btw this kitchen was on fire that day. We had all our main items come out to us in less than 18 mins. That’s incredible. At one point we were wondering if another table had cancelled their order LOL.

First came the fish maw crab soup. Done wonderfully and with real crab. Great start to the dinner. Very silky and savoury. Great preparation with the fish maw. Sponge soft with a feather crunch.

The crab claws are very classic Cantonese style. Be careful they are piping hot in the center. Done properly and very delicious. They come with a sauce to dip if it fancies you but I like it au natural 😬

The lobster with noodle was very classic. Great flavours but I thought the noodle was a touch skimpy. No complaints on how it tasted. Very comforting.

Scallop and beef tenderloin with broccoli. The scallops weren’t over cooked. The beef was soft. The broccoli cooked perfectly.

Our vegetable dish we chose the snow pea tip leafs modified in vegetable stock. Normally it’s eaten with garlic stir fried. But for 5 bucks more you can modify this dish. Either way it’s delicious and considered among very nutritious with a good source of vitamin C, folate, fiber, and beta carotene.

The chicken dish we had it upgraded ($5 bucks more) to the salt roasted chicken with crispy rice chips. All the kids love eating the rice chips haha. The chicken wasn’t dry. It was moist and light on the saltiness.

The seafood fried rice done to standards
You can taste the element of the wok hei, the breath of the wok fire 🔥

Dessert that night was the classic red bean soup. It was delicious. We were also surprised that the kitchen gave us almond cookies. They were made in house and was so delicious and fresh.

It was a great Father’s Day dinner. So pretty much a 9 course with desserts included. It can definitely feed 4-5 adults. The service is amazing. There’s very few Chinese places that have such attention to their customers. They are kind and always social.
Great first experience. I’ll definitely be coming back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEDRW3O9w8qblsplz4y6anGqy61L1xtwu2NzmQ&fid=0x0:0x313d915b0b468f26"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"Hillbillytc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV833YeKMKJfxtYeKhRHVRSrikZoFOcCapKBwyEFBOnxiCMeXAZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was hot and tasty. The server was average. The atmosphere was comfortable.Not a lot of GF options","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbpZqX84Yhlu8-pCU_bF_OFdiF0rj2YjJQmniz&fid=0x0:0x313d915b0b468f26"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Yang Ricky (superrricky)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX37uzotH3Yrpy1ASc1F_0rjO3lc5vZ_QV_a4rABpBKuBwQoOUd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"From the moment we stepped into this seafood haven, we were greeted with the most delightful and welcoming atmosphere. Hosting a party of 15 can be quite a challenge, but the staff here handled it with such efficiency and grace, accommodating us quickly and without any hassle.

The food was nothing short of spectacular. Every dish we ordered was a delightful surprise, bursting with fresh, flavorful seafood that truly showcased the chef’s skill and creativity. The ‘wow’ factor was undeniable - each plate was a work of art, both in presentation and taste.

What really set this experience apart was the attentive and friendly service. The staff went above and beyond to ensure our comfort, consistently checking in on us and making sure all our needs were met. Their recommendations were spot-on, adding to the overall enjoyment of our meal.

In a world where dining experiences can often be hit or miss, this restaurant truly stands out as a gem. It’s not just a meal, it’s an experience that amazes and delights. I can’t recommend this place enough for anyone looking for exceptional seafood and outstanding service. A must-visit for seafood lovers!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWlCDo_M-27ahd2TQiLRNjmn6z8qEB7XuBbv2u&fid=0x0:0x313d915b0b468f26"],"When":"2024-2-24"},{"Name":"Joey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJl9szXFCvkqiDIj8ffgxhpU02VBcZUaH8smB2SMyI4TIXdsaA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Without a doubt, the food. The menu offered a wide variety of dishes, The flavors were authentic and rich, with just the right balance of spices. it's worth mentioning that the prices were a bit on the higher side. While the quality of the food and service justified the cost to some extent, it's something to keep in mind if you're dining on a budget.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1i9b_jyproW1CIGnoBbS3cGq4lRWnAZVpTv14&fid=0x0:0x313d915b0b468f26"],"When":"2024-2-14"},{"Name":"Sandra Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUS3d7aZA4lMhkB4lrjOTrDjB_p6PvngmeWQeM0VFHPfzqli2Uc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This was my first time here. I liked how the large tables were spaced well apart. Also, sound didn’t echo everywhere and we could hear each other. The food was fair to good (mostly good) as was the service. Except for the few dishes at the end, the food was served in a timely way. The 7 courses we had for 14 people came to around $750 which is a bit pricey for the quality.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODo9hhfLXYphDaS8kMs7H_wdZcqqLTixPT4eqL&fid=0x0:0x313d915b0b468f26"],"When":"2021-12-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Louis Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_X5ezyg5lrfk6kqIPMk3yOgilfu9R29Ew0ahAf4UedF5APCzgEg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I’m Korean and this food is mediocre at best. Ordered the black bean noodles which had zero wok flavour, and noodles were too soft and mushy. Felt like the food came straight out of the microwave. Price is alright but would not return nor would I ever bring any of my Korean friends to this place. There are much better places out there. The TV was blasting Kpop music at deafening volume levels. Parking also sucks big time as it’s mainly paid street parking. The other reviewers here have no idea what good Korean food is supposed to taste like.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIR6xc7Q3YCF0QFvmzionMM79xRdnirn5kuI_U&fid=0x0:0x3319d3faef58b0ec"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"TS OS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrxJ8Fjd3bGSI8mWbF186RbFWyg_DW73VTS3OIkFaxPfXFBEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pretty good food here. Our dishes came out in reasonable time and they were well prepared. Portion size was respectable and service was stellar. Parking nearby is really tricky but overall we would like to comeback here. Their jjambong and jajjangmyun were quite nice with good ingredients. Give this place a try if you are in mood for Korean style Chinese food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIPTHcliMFAIDNi5Q0pWPrCFH8mDTRIgzj8yoi&fid=0x0:0x3319d3faef58b0ec"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"ZHILI YAO","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvibygBT2hkBal5DmLAuQ7jdOQrBdWEQuK8FBm6E6ay7DMoA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The black bean noodles are really good. The sweet and sour pork is crispy and tasty as well. But you should know that the pork can be shared with at least four people! But it worth a try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCIQ_ofEp3b-LQBzHERHHS5andQdtj4CermXSd&fid=0x0:0x3319d3faef58b0ec"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Kingramen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU35K9K-3WDR1LhMOarmobzfUiY3qJQT45Dn4vfHiWAkp32qFPGKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Been here a couple of times. Noodles are tasty and loaded with ingredients. Sweet and sour chicken not bad, just batter a bit thick. Portions are large and reasonable priced.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPoZRV0z4DK-IX_hFvn78ABUtugS4TuF3ONFIJ6&fid=0x0:0x3319d3faef58b0ec"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"J B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAwkGdHptp4NSG8jB1yPnzY78ZK3uNzq5DBh4dOU1f3ajFAto=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered the 88 noodle soup, a generous portion packed with beef, prawns, squid, and fresh veggies. The broth was rich and simply delicious, making the whole meal a satisfying experience. The noodles were soft and complemented the flavorful broth perfectly. The price point was fair for the quality and quantity. Service was friendly and attentive. The constant K-pop playing on the TV created an authentic Korean atmosphere, making you feel like you've been transported straight to Korea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYB987QUwIk0dpyXPM80JGako9zIW6Q14AiWBg&fid=0x0:0x3319d3faef58b0ec"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Janice","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZXVMFXg99DddIAvq90LvFnx8S8T4fPIqVltf27bqW9si-mrdP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"When my friend and I first time came here, the service was good. We order black bean noodles and chili seafood noodles. It's pretty delicious, the   Chili seafood noodles like Chinese 大滷麵. We were full and also liked Earl Grey tea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMa-W7JEEwzYTNx926vFBZ4cCgXnoCEhS_dXsn1&fid=0x0:0x3319d3faef58b0ec"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Amir Alimohammadifar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrMzehyYKL2N5MygYIJn0Qq0Mw_ICezrph5kn4Lgaj3XeaBUPp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food and the service are really good. The price is very reasonable.
Th fried chicken is so yummy and I loved the spicy seafood soup. The portion wa so big that two of us couldn't finish the whole thing.
The atmosphere could be better, sme renovations might help a bit but it's not something that will stop me of going there again.
I would definitely go there again to have that yummy fried chicken and the spicy noodle soup 😋
The black beans noodles dish was also delicious. The noodles in both dishes were very good felt like a homemade noodles.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyizSVPmkQdOMwcsqIyrM0k6_G7TFTQ54Hy9wa&fid=0x0:0x3319d3faef58b0ec"],"When":"2024-3-30"},{"Name":"Hiep Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMRHHZ7t798igHqhwEObqqiXXBYRe7_vTRRS3-gXG7fOgZlXSH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My wife and daughters have been here few times and finally decided to bring me along for lunch.  Chinese style Korean food was good! Do the combo A or B, you are getting the best value.

It is spacious inside and seats are comfortable.  Not too noisy so we liked it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMSO8CoI0nXvcf9dtkLWx9D5FHSoSBwW6aCNgc&fid=0x0:0x3319d3faef58b0ec"],"When":"2023-7-25"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sandy Y. (CameraGourmet)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQ9J8ig1HwUQBJbXRdKDIwR0OrTw3YtQtyHDEaRuCN8XnUDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We recently visited ZUBU at their Metrotown location to satisfy our ramen cravings while shopping at the mall.  This spot is conveniently located outside the mall, right across from Walmart and next to the parking area, making it super accessible.

We are regular members of ZUBU and are familiar with their Happy Hour menu, which usually offers excellent variety and value.  The food and service at this location were consistent with the standards we've experienced at other ZUBU spots.  However, we were slightly disappointed with the ramen noodles — they were soft and overcooked. This was unexpected since ZUBU typically delivers on quality.  We also noticed a steady stream of takeout orders, which may have impacted the kitchen's focus.

On a brighter note, we redeemed our ZUBU rewards points for their 5-piece Crispy Chicken and Pan-Fried Pork Gyoza, both of which were delicious!  If you're a fan of ZUBU, downloading their app is a must — it’s an easy way to earn rewards and enjoy perks during every visit.

Overall, ZUBU Metrotown is a decent option for a casual bite during a shopping trip, but we hope they can improve consistency, especially with their ramen.

📝📝

Food: 🍜🍜🍜 Can Try!
Service: 👩‍🍳👩‍🍳👩‍🍳👩‍🍳
Kids: 👶👶👶👶 Yay!  The kid’s menu has various kinds of food.
Price: 💲 $20-$30 spend each person (Happy Hour)
Presentation: 📷📷
Parking:  🚗🚗🚗🚗 Free parking available in the mall parking lot, but it is not easy during busy time or shopping season.
Tips:
📝 can get a free hand roll when signing up for their ZUBU app.
📝 serve Happy Hour Sunday-Thursday from 2-5 PM and 9 PM-close.
📝 can join the ZUBU app to rack up points and make your visits even more rewarding.
📝 have an outdoor patio in warmer weather.
Would I Return: Yes 👱‍♀️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJMzWgerMFMhfJSINDtkCitgohgEn_lV5uWMgm&fid=0x0:0xd3b9dc93123922f"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Scott Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHpW7vGME__Zs4wKjXR04Upnw88bkVVyz-H2288JsHocq9vI3r=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is a chain restaurant which has another location in downtown. The food was about what I expected compared to what we had in downtown. The ramens were still very good. But brussel sprout tempura was a bit disappointing because it wasn’t seasoned enough for me, and there wasn’t any sauce. But the truffle fries were quite tasty and would love to have it again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMu59sIZKAiGrVUZje7A6y8qa3JOMM5aWSdQMyX&fid=0x0:0xd3b9dc93123922f"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"Oceanid S.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocILFoBYTPTB6JAB2W82GMAbE1dVJUby3rG9nTZ9Q57ut0Ti-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Service is on the slower side even though the restaurant is half empty. Some of the servers were just on their phones. But when they do attend, they are friendly and courteous.

Food portions: Husband had the ramen set which came with a mini size ramen (set type), an Appy and desert (ice cream) good value if you are a small eater.

I had the ramen flight as I was interested to try the different ramen types. Individual portions are even smaller than a mini and the cumulative size of all three is probably similar to that of a mini ( by weight/volume) which doesn't seem to be worth the price as I could get a regular sized ramen for cheaper. See picture of empty bowls for size comparison between mini and those in the flight ( keep in mind that the it's typically filled to slightly below the zubu word on the bowl and that is the narrowest parts of the bowl which creates an optical illusion that it's alot larger than it actually is). Most But good option for those that just can't choose.

Taste wise:
Tonkotsu soup was a let down. Not much bone broth flavour. Noodles were good. Not much toppings. Mainly soup and noodles so we were both hungry not long after.

Overall: Being located in Metrotown.. I'd rather go elsewhere for good ramen. Cute atmosphere for those that like to combine alcohol/ modern bar vibes and ramen.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZzKw-JdSi2n8BpmuzjymdJqA9rayZp0wVCNr7&fid=0x0:0xd3b9dc93123922f"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Jayson J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWh5xePACHGFMrujGyu-HBmelU_P6fuccz4VSAVxS0935C9YQ3k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"2024 update: ⭐️⭐️
Was close to walking out after being seated for 15 mins and no one came to take our orders.

Portion sizes have become smaller despite the increased price.

There are much better options around the area for this price.

2021 review: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNj1SHR27Z0VLZD_kxxx60c-bKCwg3zTPqLahIE&fid=0x0:0xd3b9dc93123922f"],"When":"2024-11-8"},{"Name":"Alice Zhou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYVr5lNGa3-Y8JLpOz1WaR4g8Yuaf6R94oy88F85SRq_gBkxTFaw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Incredibly friendly staff ( a handsome young black server named Alex), nice decor, my pork chashu noodles came almost instantly! By joining their membership,  I got a free blue crab sushi, which was also very yummy. 😋 free parking at the mall next door, close to sky train so very convinent. Price is very reasonable. I went on Tuesday , and the noodle is on special for $15.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOiomBcyxV8yZ9XrmtFC_mrWXsDb-GIQprA7tev&fid=0x0:0xd3b9dc93123922f"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"Sala Yeppie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoRAbDPtL7ba_h8FHdfbHtb4J1exJ2tD7CImskvkzY3pXgi5_a=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was very impressed by the promotion, quality of food and the service!
Especially the lady named  Vi, she is amazing!!

Well, honestly The previous receptionist at the front was not very friendly, so I didn't visit for a while.
Unexpectedly, I found all the servers were very friendly and professional here now!
The food quality is actually good, and now the service quality has improved exponentially.

I really feel that it is worth to come more often, I can't wait to introduce it to everyone around me.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlgIWUspHx_y8UWxCSLLMkEnnhk9TKZ9xaCxwb&fid=0x0:0xd3b9dc93123922f"],"When":"2024-5-2"},{"Name":"Kenny He","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxW2mQOjSNcD852563CmCawkHwAgSju9TEpDpqJdkP9-243bFHuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food, reasonable price,

I strongly recommend the Brussel Sprouts Tempura , it has a very nice touch of Truffle oil, very interesting combination.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgUtg_sOSZETbR_kcHhaAStqW5dg2QpTt5UPB9&fid=0x0:0xd3b9dc93123922f"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Ken Klatt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWB-1oiqzMhWKjUmFzUOOtexvucd3Jb1cxEjKIq4ksYwtPJuDs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"good vegan options - we tried the spicy vegan Ramen

busy vibe
trendy decore
good service
quantities were reasonable
tasty food

nice to see a selection of mocktails
I was happy with the  Haiyu Mojito","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzVGAlrpX_sWWM-kodqRZwhLeBW1keGwUzLLc&fid=0x0:0xd3b9dc93123922f"],"When":"2024-7-20"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Monica T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIfTcr7UpZvrmvtqWfFjBeZIhFRwKW8QZ4OivzWAS6rOFQreQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This place used to be good, but I had a different experience today. I ordered seafood and vegetable chow mein, specifying crispy noodles, but the dish arrived with a lot of sauce and soggy noodles. The sauce had soaked into the noodles, and I couldn’t finish them. I’ve had this same dish here a few times before, and it didn’t look like this. It seems like they may have changed management or the chef. The portion was also much smaller than what I had last time. I understand that food costs are rising and don’t mind a smaller portion, but at least maintain the quality and taste.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_z4cBSY9YT1ABDkdunH1Xa3VpzmouU6Qo45qX&fid=0x0:0xcfda3bd0a6e99e70"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"PicTsao2","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKgSrP8Bsph_CXWaSZ44qGamDFBzT8JaOtpAu46eC9jo2Kzkg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I don't know why there are people giving them bad reviews, seems to me they are just expecting Michelin level service and flavour. This is a family own small restaurant not a fancy restaurant. I love the food here. Always great portion and taste fantastic. I'll come back every week!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Acacia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfZtRyvS02Y-nirNA8KmFkYuuXc-nQka6l-WTTFRPvtHXJYHMv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"it was our first time ordering from this restaurant, so we were hoping it'd be a nice experience and we could make it part of our rotation of favourite restaurants! we ordered take out sunday morning (about 9), scheduled for the same day at 12:05, since we were having people over for lunch, we wanted the food to be ready on time. however, we had to wait a whole 30 minutes after arriving there at 12:05 despite having asked them to prepare the food in advance. as a result, we were late to our own lunch - isn't that ridiculous? when we expressed our disappointment, they didn't even respond with an apology.
we ordered 6 dishes, and the 2 most expensive dishes we ordered they swapped out for random cheap dishes without letting us know - we only found out after we got home. still, the receipt says they made us pay for the dishes we ordered but didn't get! they scammed us.
the food was slightly below average. no one touched the two dishes that they subbed in randomly because it was not what any of us liked or wanted. the 4 dishes we ordered and got, when compared to other chinese restaurants, is mediocre at best.
extremely disappointed in their poor service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"jason wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLAr7OPM3u3i7bBkh0r7Q9kS7_8Gu_88Crv223BgydShD66TQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We got the dinner for 2 and couple of other dishes.. the waiter let its swap one  of the dishes out of the dinner for 2. Which made my wife and o happy they did that.. all in all the meal was very tasty.. the workers are friendly.. can’t say anything bad about the place..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmjzLXNefPSofBkjf-FPr_YohOItvVyB4x_1cG&fid=0x0:0xcfda3bd0a6e99e70"],"When":"2024-2-10"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tried their honey garlic spareribs and their sautéed greens with garlic and both were pretty solid, fresh, and tasty. The honey garlic spareribs could have been a bit crisper but it still tasted good. The price for the greens wasn’t cheap and a bit high in my opinion but the portions for both dishes were good. Tasted much better than food court Chinese food and up to restaurant type Chinese food standards.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyg8t2rbAMAHjKVX_288aDk6wYA1amQN-TAwYG&fid=0x0:0xcfda3bd0a6e99e70"],"When":"2023-10-20"},{"Name":"Jon Noj","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ6QnxMhGdN39gi_BJd3q4T2iEf3nn8TbjBOu-4vbFHvGKuQA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"New management again and they raised all the prices by 2 dollars and got rid of all the lunch specials/dinners for 1 and the specials with rice which were a good cheaper option for one person. They also got rid of a couple of dishes I liked like the Mapo Tofu (although they had changed the recipe to that one and I didn't like so I guess it's for the best)
Probably still good for large group orders of multiple items and for parties but no longer a good option for a quick lunch for one person sadly.  If the recipes didn't change I recommend the Beef Brisket Noodle Soup and their sweet and sour pork.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Terri Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdHMQamP6ntk6cmD8m9VHj4cLgJWNXVSwfy5Jk1_ks8LpnASP1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is legit your go to authentic Chinese restaurant! If you know what wok hei is, then you will get it at this restaurant! (If you don't know check out uncle roger haiya 😂) I think it's under new management. The owner works both front and back of the house. I noticed lots of takeouts (10% off pickup) I ordered several classic dishes a d they did not disappoint. I got the scrambled egg and shrimp on ho fun (flat noodles), honeymoon fried rice and deep fried tofu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJE78eZDG-VNOiLsA4u8TugMEW_6R3SRtMr6xB&fid=0x0:0xcfda3bd0a6e99e70"],"When":"2023-9-19"},{"Name":"Cadz0027","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIIFUNNJs7scwbkY4PZ16V1bA3H0RJA79HbuipNxcT7YzukKw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If I could give six stars for the service That we received today I would. Lady was working alone, but she kept a smile on her face and gave us an amazing service. Amazing food as well.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Philip Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLUNH-tTQKDIOcuvg0a1kDctdahTmpU89Sbok8FZoHMHtXQsg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Somehow this is a usual place for me and my wife to go to when we want a nice family style dinner when we don’t want to cook. The family style restaurant in South Burnaby is like part of our family where the owner and her people make us good healthy Taiwanese food. You won’t be disappointed as they have a menu with many items to choose and most are comfort food for all people.  If you are a vegetarian this is a very nice place since that’s what they are good at, too. Guarantee the their veggie items bring you will be as great as that from the meat.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jae Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwgEbyT1k_Erly1qbmK38A7SM_aO2zQ1PHwZgWKwrn5lgNvu0a=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Authentic Taiwanese food! It checked many boxes typical of a home-style restaurant in Taiwan:
✓ Decoration and atmosphere
✓ Good food quality and  prices
✓ Service","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYT5xTx_BTjZWUTFY9rVHCf5twE8sFpFY3HtX5&fid=0x0:0x5b17bde85db3c565"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Richie C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIU59S55OOW6Qyv36MS_uAYTsYIoWjVQQS7RYqsARBrWs16WNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We've drove by this place many times and decided to try it after work.  For a Friday, it was quite slow. However we were pleasantly surprised the food was not too bad.  It definitely met our expectation.  If you can, support these neighborhood restaurants. You'll enjoy it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXPRbkakCjMLTv8GXzm4gy3xvoSb32oV4VvMId&fid=0x0:0x5b17bde85db3c565"],"When":"2024-4-7"},{"Name":"Shirley S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK5yucpeer4mBapAXpBQBWsFKtwtFQJnZWpESHO5fB1YnBq_g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our local place for homestyle Taiwanese cooking. Love their stir fried sauced chicken on rice. Their hotpot and vegetarian noodle dishes are great too. We also like the different bubble teas. They cook from scratch so takes a little wait.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Emerald City Treatment Clinic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUb-ExLz3HJeLn8r5UJc_4vn9Ar9I_-S-EAAhIdOIxUcH0chBLK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Simple Taiwanese comfort food! Our food (crispy chicken nuggets and fried fish filet) was made to order and was piping hot and fresh. Very reasonable price, $13-15 per meal. Hard to find these days.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kate Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjE4MSAa0c4Uqc8iOt1LfqIkJDL1ULa2Z17gRh4YDWMExQ1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"They serve very no frills chinese/taiwanese versions of korean food.
However, even with no frills, their prices aren't that low and almost comparable to korean restaurants.

We ordered the kimchi hot pot and the budae hot pot. Both didnt have much to offer. It was not korean flavor at all but tasty in its own way. However, there werent much toppings for something around $15-17. To compare, the price of boiling point is $17.

The taiwanese chicken nugget was fried well and I like the light crispiness. However, there was really no flavor at all.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPa61FywOrZbAR13gs4zdLg_rBDsZFfyG4UhYaw&fid=0x0:0x5b17bde85db3c565"],"When":"2023-8-21"},{"Name":"Herman K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFxZg1i8kmZZmjRPD7Dawy7dScHEufsFpJaghfzr36uZwkvVtd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Taiwanese comfort food. Great portion for the price. The salt and pepper popcorn chicken was very good. Seafood hotpot had lots of vermicelli and tofu. Large seating area with many books free to enjoy while dining. Food took a bit long to get to table, otherwise service was fine. Usually no waiting for table which is great for a quick bite!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnd5JNYdJLX2xW_8W5RlR7iPVfJaX-E5VyAEsI&fid=0x0:0x5b17bde85db3c565"],"When":"2019-3-11"},{"Name":"Angela Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8L6rr7ByTucpImQKyHaTPVbWsiJ8Hg1-5qRHzX6LEe9TzHehZ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food came really fast, it super delicious and affordable for students.
I love their student specials with lots of vegetarian options too🫶
Also eco-friendly♻️, they let me used my own cup for the drink!

Would definitely recommend friends to come.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMh-3KqOQhA6n6GkvV9Nml7QFvgvWkBJ0ouokm9&fid=0x0:0x5b17bde85db3c565"],"When":"2024-2-26"}]

title: The Dolar Shop Hot Pot
descriptions: Sleek, upmarket Chinese hot pot specialist with premium ingredients like wagyu cubes & geoduck.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Luke L'sk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWiiH908v1rCDXF-44sIh8_2REsgK4BqjhayxbtuQZBsgU3tmKG9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"One of the many hotpot places in the area, newly opened after Station Square was revamped and rebuilt. We made a reservation for 7:15pm, we arrived on time and we were seated by 7:45pm. I wonder if they understand how reservation works or how bad their time management is. The reserved space shouldn't be occupied at the time of reservation.

We were given a $20 item offer for the delay as an apology, but surely our time is worth more. The greeter desk is often emptied, i kept seeing other guests getting confused as they come in, and no one was around. (See pic)

The place uses a tablet ordering system.
There are choices on soup base and ingredients you wish to order for the meal. The soup base comes with an additional charge for the sauce and dessert regardless of whether you want them or not. They provided a cover for the pot so you don't end up burning yourself. In general, the food tastes okay.

However, it is relatively overrated for the price and experience. You can surely get better for more economical options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPg0qXqPzUqS0jRD5YRPn54DWv8GbOTdYfkjCvy&fid=0x0:0xeef46ded33085721"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Agnes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyqJcbJDbElC-RwU1sBP46by6tVeVGdJmv6s9B0kjpjwDghjdVVw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hot pot is a big thing. There are so many options for this, and so I really value the quality and the overall dining experience.

There were 4 of us and we had reserved a table at 630 through Yelp. It was a Saturday night but we were seated promptly at our table.

I like the individual hotpot style where everyone manages their own pot. The communal one gets crazy sometimes and usually one person manages the cooking for the whole table.

We each got the hotpot set and the value was good. I felt like I ate enough meat plus I ate all the included veggies and I was stuffed.

The servers were attentive and prompt. I would recommend this place for hot pot. We spent $62 pp with tax and 15% tip.

Also ice cream at the end hit the spot!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7EExESZm9ktymQ-558aiVNMgxvJ9qleEgS1qW&fid=0x0:0xeef46ded33085721"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Rianne Cavage","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLaX6K-ln8RzU1URGVKIfw29Y8wwmQBbmibI8uQOciA4VTmog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went for a dinner with coworkers while visiting the area from the US and had the best time! Everything was beyond my expectations and so impressive for a place that was as busy as they are. The service was exceptional and so attentive and kind. The food provided for the hotpot broth was fresh and delicious. The sauce and dessert bar were amazing as well and ending the night with unlimited ice cream was the best! Will happily return if I’m back in the area next year.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIE_xuK6kbbxjdtltvxEUqEMg1YhCok_zBhoEh&fid=0x0:0xeef46ded33085721"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Manizha A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUC2amaTPsYhEEr9awVR6ZxKWDqTPxYLLvu7b9SO5vvAOcniJoJSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for the first time and we were very happy with the service and the atmosphere of this restaurant. We were greeted by a very friendly gentleman named Steve, who seated us very quickly and explained the entire ordering process to us in step by step instructions. He also gave us recommendations and pairings of meats for different broths.
We ended up ordering the Veggie Broth and the Mushroom Broth, as well as 1 serving of beef, noodles and rice to go along with the hot pot. We also ordered Spring rolls, and 2 mocktails that were both very sweet.
The servers are very quick, efficient and friendly. Grace was very sweet and gave us timings and recommendations for the broths. As well as answer any questions or concerns we had.
The restaurant also offers a dessert bar, sauce bar and side appetizer bar in one corner. These items are self serve and unlimited during the meal.
The restaurant also offers free vanilla ice cream at the end of the meal, this ice cream is very light and tastes delicious.
Overall the restaurant is definitely a must try, and we would come here again for hotpot, although the food is pricey, the quality and service makes up for the experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHFZJro9jd3gj9Kf3wPXjrPz1g-bNk1hOzhSkG&fid=0x0:0xeef46ded33085721"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"Parker Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4w7QUGTOh6g8NBFrM-MpLnDCQZE7QC-ytsIBruKVR6b7cGsT0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Straight up one of the most memorable hotpot places I've ever been to. The staff were super friendly and made sure we felt comfortable in every aspect of our meal. The hotpot set is pretty expensive but the quality of the meat is pretty justified. Not to mention the unlimited noodles, dessert bar and of course the soft serve ice cream. I never thought I would praise a hotpot place for its dessert but the ice cream was genuinely amazing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPo_tJK6nvHjl_jqTeLAR2Vev5YZHS5WnMcn23K&fid=0x0:0xeef46ded33085721"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Mia Duong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPAUy0Htbh5FTHA7CrcyalmfPE1fNra4l4o1y3j6EQjpz6Sdhn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is awesome for you get your own hotpot so it’s more hygienic then dipping in a common hotpot! They give everyone their own portion of veggies and meat. Plus there is an unlimited albeit smaller selection of dessert bar but I may add they have soft serve ice cream on a waffle cone you must ask for a waiter to get for you. Yes it’s a bit on the pricier side of $30+ but it’s a great treat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeK58Jeiuf8VpMkDU3KKxhxBSEKTsAqmVdgCL8&fid=0x0:0xeef46ded33085721"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Alina D.W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6aT-AekindTc6G7xIT3kVbg0SZLVnlRjB6JrP3HHm0Wrf8bbzUA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"My friend and I wanted to try this place out together, it looked super popular so we wanted to give it a try. For only 2 people it's not worth it, but it is worth it if you're sharing with a large group. We found that the amount of food given is not worth the prices. Felt like we were paying for the technology forward atmosphere rather than the food. Don't get me wrong, the soup was really good, just wish we got more bang for our buck! The servers were so nice and informative with any questions we had, especially with my friends food allergies!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrhW66dFeST3YIMxkTtxo9SirUbP5CbesTCO0w&fid=0x0:0xeef46ded33085721"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"rinatchalove","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuO1rntC2oQZoKUtOqm6IaTQ4wBM26jAlbbqW4w8YxelmhLiM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Another great hotpot place with sauce bar and sides! Also dessert like jelly and free ice cream.

Love coming here, it is on the $$$$ side but well worth it. Meat is tender and the snacks are really yummy too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOb_lcK_4BGJay_6KPf9qUaZ1HEZQSbyMMEOtHS&fid=0x0:0xeef46ded33085721"],"When":"2024-10-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Thomas Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUITuDRjw9J9Us45xAUXKSfp8lG2sJ2s04TW_lNAi_G6a5d62ur=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I thought the food was very tasty and had good value. The wait took a while. We waited about 45 mins for a table for four. The only dish I didn’t enjoy was the fried rice. It was very average that’s all. The chow mein noodles were excellent and so was were the chow fun noodles. They had a delicious smoky flavour. Service was fine. I would go back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-oJnSAc9ML1779Ft_0B4RRAE5QJioTXfTQh4i&fid=0x0:0xc1f6ac8a64b53386"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Ray Jang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3wj8Ne3ngI4eg9ouEU6zPmvERlQuudbckz4ma4Vg6pfYrsWM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Solid HK Style cafe with your usual Cantonese “fast food” menu. Breakfast set combos are an excellent choice here. Can be pretty popular on weekend mornings.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOG_y0SjmZQRmyV2F1q94KSBhAyQ_b6YAsfdkMY&fid=0x0:0xc1f6ac8a64b53386"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Thedishdetective Lala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD_tj6k6xpF8R8uVmPtHQuGBgjvefVOKaKmqeE1mkWnmvdyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The Boss Restaurant
Located in : Metropolis at Metrotown
Address : 4700 Kingsway, Burnaby, BC V5H4M5

**Satay Beef Soup**
The satay beef soup is good, with a rich and flavorful broth that pairs well with the tender beef slices. Definitely a comforting dish.
8/10

**Oyster Congee**
The oyster congee is thick and creamy, making it a hearty option. The oysters are fresh and plentiful, adding a pleasant brininess to the dish. 8/10

**Omelet**
The omelet is decent, featuring a generous amount of mushrooms. However, it could benefit from a bit more seasoning to enhance the overall flavor. 7/10

**Satay Skewer**
I was very disappointed with the satay skewer. The lamb pieces were too large and tough, and the lack of seasoning made the dish quite bland. 2/10

**Lamb**
The lamb is juicy and flavorful, though the portion size is somewhat thin. It’s well-seasoned, which makes it enjoyable, but the accompanying vegetables were bland and lacked seasoning. 7/10

**Service**
The service is poor and inattentive staff, which detracts from the dining experience.

**Ambience**
The restaurant is located inside a mall, which gives it a casual vibe. The place is okay, but nothing special.

The pricing is affordable, making it a reasonable choice for a quick meal. 2/5

**Verdict**
Despite some disappointments, I would consider coming back due to the extensive menu. There are many other dishes I’m curious to try, and hopefully, the overall experience will be better next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1uWFVQ8Lva418-2QHdbHfgLTovwv0gVQbdkAf&fid=0x0:0xc1f6ac8a64b53386"],"When":"2024-6-12"},{"Name":"mlvn cgndhn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyQ_4N38tzwgbvk9ME_YzYZifN3k2gci6ujiPZVaKX59iCiCObxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A friend brought me here for he first time and I like it! Service was fast, food was good and staff are friendly. It can be very busy during lunch hours but I’d say it’s worth it. You should try this place","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTvT7CGYZ21YC0r6CVAFvcwVMCyCY4RdCRsujj&fid=0x0:0xc1f6ac8a64b53386"],"When":"2024-6-28"},{"Name":"Karen Lo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVy7IKDgoBu5-GpgCOSD4cGeZrgQ2WNTZ5s54ZY-vysf5NoRKzIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Solid Hong Kong restaurant, they have system for a getting where you get a number ticket from the machine and look on the screen for it to announce your number to get seated.

It’s nice they close at 8pm on Sundays even though the mall closes at 7pm. Eat dinner here after going shopping.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoxDD5gWqSz7vJYwVKctZgNn80yGxnukWzEMvE&fid=0x0:0xc1f6ac8a64b53386"],"When":"2023-8-13"},{"Name":"chan Cindy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaeOXV6kT2G98yuvkhh00Ns9a0SyZ7N-CPIvk93SlbI2dHg53blA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I was very disappointed. I know me and my friend may have chat late till 21:50, while i only left half cup of my ice lemon tea. The staff spray detergent the table next to me madly and spread all over my left arm, while my lemon tea is near my left hand, means that detergent is all into my cup.

Staff was keep asking like third time whether we make our decision on our order in 5 mins. What a bad dinning experience.👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhm9qmm5j1L1aS0IPnVJIYKTl2OR6aXEo--Tok&fid=0x0:0xc1f6ac8a64b53386"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Stephen Chiu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUyvDfgr2u_SVXCbenwncr5m_lbx3hXSedpR8trbIomLSD6ruw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The Boss offers a clean, modern updated setting. The food is decent and is always served quickly. And the portions have gotten better again over the past year. The breakfast combos and set menu specials remain a good value even with the price increases.

This is a popular restaurant, so wait times can be long when the mall is busy. And they still only take cash payment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHtxyuNpxW-VKvReIrSX9rnrIszGOg8Yj-LLs6&fid=0x0:0xc1f6ac8a64b53386"],"When":"2022-9-24"},{"Name":"Gina Quinton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJq6uKuQsbshnOEVlh-dC_O3MizvtB4chDBDbFcE3ubI9518w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Decent Cantonese food and service is depending on the day just like a woman's mood. This visit our tea cups were constantly being filled. Thank you. Price is worthy because the portion is huge. I'm especially impressed by the clam with black bean sauce. I enjoyed our visit with my friends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1iC-2tLeVi-srhJIiJ2Dh39jbMA5UiLzOlchh&fid=0x0:0xc1f6ac8a64b53386"],"When":"2022-6-4"}]

Not only this, but I'm gonna give 5 out of 5 for a picnic .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPyJnfPSGXBNbQ4ycA-8yPsGQF1MeMKVwbS5vi4\u0026fid=0x0:0xd07159cd01934219"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Patrick Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLF-zGQ83z5pjjXkV0kf822DW9RQtMHgVs8ODXBiG0gHzpnaw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Without a doubt a gem right in the heart of Burnaby. A great place for a leisure walk, kayaking, running, picnicking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_g_AA67PFK99F5-0qzK6JTJtPDPIly7Q9j-yd\u0026fid=0x0:0xd07159cd01934219"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"John Pozer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXe0BvqmYZVSdl8vMzkjfI5nnnXlGPCIuhLYzs9LnFZvwXYyqQh7A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great destination for an easy afternoon walk/hike. The loop trail around the lake is 2.7 kilometres (according to signage). Mostly level trails, boardwalks, and paths with a mix of cycling-shared walkways. As usual, the City of Burnaby does a good job of maintaining the park. Enjoy all year round!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrk2a2QH8N62Mgo7Loq7vWIBpvJPey4pnlVnWZ\u0026fid=0x0:0xd07159cd01934219"],"When":"2023-11-19"},{"Name":"Lisa T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwStHWH7kO88Zst0q2uRgjrtCwrFaBSFTtBLPK2iypQv9DepSZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's a lovely park that holds great memories for me. I first visited with my former coworkers and later came back several times with friends. We had a great time kayaking and using the pedal boat. I’d be excited to return if I’m in Canada again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKG2V5nIQDi2-jVJIfRp3nFpMrcFg1MHRny8KK\u0026fid=0x0:0xd07159cd01934219"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"King Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrz7eSAP4u2IzFwF7xvxADBskZM8H-HIOkAt3qck1OlZh_Y1aZ_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a large beautiful lake in Burnaby. Also, it's a good place to have fun or relax with kid, family, or having a picnic, cycling, water activities and seeing the sunset here. There's couple of path to walk along the lake with beautiful city view. Highly recommended to visit this place. Parking available on site.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvKblxaSLcEZLRjbp-TsbaANFkoEo5_EuqC6VO\u0026fid=0x0:0xd07159cd01934219"],"When":"2023-4-4"},{"Name":"Manizha A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUC2amaTPsYhEEr9awVR6ZxKWDqTPxYLLvu7b9SO5vvAOcniJoJSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful lake to boat on! We went on one the peak days of the summer, and booked a two person pedal boat for 1.5 hours. Pedaling out from the shore was easy, but pedaling back was  quote a workout. Lots of geese swimming about, Lilly pads, and other boaters. Definitely coming back here again to rent out another pedal boat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2-Ib-a2yOB9wRbq4KDtq1RTZ3uM-AYMeR18bV\u0026fid=0x0:0xd07159cd01934219"],"When":"2022-7-31"},{"Name":"Raymond Zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV553RsLiHZ376r_cg1t6f6czurhVEFNpCdaEiEdye1imXZUUY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Intricate system of nature Tralee that don’t leave you bored nor overwhelmed. Lots of connects to the urban and suburban areas around the park. Wear shoes though, there is a lot of Goose Poop!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrumqfAzVZjb0FI_smHrcXQF8IyETcYtVA3cmw\u0026fid=0x0:0xd07159cd01934219"],"When":"2023-9-5"},{"Name":"luke willingdon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIhy2vUlE1fLK50Sge_Qb2nCpNlkeJ4VcOtvA5iBdD-sSZgKg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favorite nature spots in the city. It feels like being farther out of town. I like to walk the lake loop, paddle my kayak and go fishing from shore here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzhGG85S_Bu66iGFDKHH7AFzhhZtHThbe-Dhsd\u0026fid=0x0:0xd07159cd01934219"],"When":"2024-4-16"}]

[{"Name":"City and Memory","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLaThK7YVCMndgcfJhO2Y52pwwJjzy22GR94OGBl3Qdju1-iA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is amazing! The sushi is super fresh, and the fried chicken rice is crispy, juicy, and so tasty. The portions are great, and the service is fast and friendly. Perfect spot for a quick, delicious meal—I’ll definitely be back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"刘皎","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZA4xorvTb1ywlu-2kt6rJ8I4vzqznwtmk5x6-vTJG0pld6w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Every visit to this coffee shop leaves me in awe of their exceptional pour-over coffee. The selection of coffee beans is outstanding, and each cup reveals the unique flavors of the beans. The baristas are highly skilled, paying meticulous attention to every detail—from water temperature to extraction time—ensuring every cup is brewed to perfection.

If you’re a coffee enthusiast, this is a must-visit spot. And if you’re new to coffee, it’s the perfect place to start your journey. Highly recommended!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jesse Romeo Junsay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-RRUdFBV34hy1dAOHJeY-VUchZp89s-Mud8KvOqgdzc8bQdk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Soft Opening. Good food. Great atmosphere. More updates to come, looking forward to it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhHv2lCd_LUXU5-gmCTXXd7xYXdR4Jdc7B6ohD&fid=0x0:0x5d52ffb9fb4fd98b"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"Leticia Sturlini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWuNfFnCH0x1ILuywkUW0m7vo_HCTF0GpVNfkODCdeUY3qSMK5g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place not only for coffee but lunch as well. Lots of vegetarian options. Light environment with with nice soothing music and views to the garden outside. Very kind snd thoughtful staff, all neat and tidy. Delicious veggie panini.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Love Alina Samson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbTHrXXKN1GkmBQY1slpH81TfiUpkfkfeZP-QeHndeD_whH2Bf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"In its previous life, this place used to be Scallions Bistro that I happen to have fond memories of.  While Scallions used to have more western style deli fare, Hooray offers its own unique spin with freshly made sushi rolls and Asian appetizers which one can feel is truly made from the heart.  I would recommend their vegetarian bento (Bento B) combined with their delicately crispy chicken kaarage.  The bento is well presented, simply delicious and the chicken kaarage is like taking a bite out of clouds.  Love the prices and the owners Bello and West are very friendly and accommodating with their customers.

I wish them all the best in their newly opened cafe and I can’t wait to try more of their coffees and food.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Joel Adimathra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUU-GI6mpr6xG9dwqsNu_gX6OTWh-qfSwtdeT_CEmMj8mboLR0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We found this place by accident. My wife and I were really hungry after visiting the Burnbay village museum for the Christmas Tree Lighting special. We were so pleasantly surprised at how authentic and amazing the food was. It felt similar to what we were having in the middle east. It made us feel nostalgic for a restaurant we loved to eat at in Bahrain. We will definitely visit more often! It's our new spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_PdjFpt6NbfT0le8PiS0dVeThxGKvDnTwBGg&fid=0x0:0xf59903adc47f1060"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Shabnam B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINmhU8uS2Zsvl6JqLYduWdVvBF_JzgRelqj_9FWdHGPySXHjI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I got take out on October 13th. They gave me this half of the lamb vindaloo dosa even though they charge full price for it. It has very less filling as well. Very disappointing and tastes terribly dry and bitter. I called the store and they don’t take accountability of their quality of their food and aren’t honest at all. Definitely never going back or recommending this awful restaurant to anyone.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPteTxw9I1lCsCWfNBw15l_UCXsdAeYwO9FdJxk&fid=0x0:0xf59903adc47f1060"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Jayanand KV","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ300Yeb4iZG-kKuVhK9gX6deBVBJYl5e792S9p7AKCEsTgpA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We stopped by for dinner on a Saturday evening. Got seated immediately. Medhu vada and cauliflower 65 were good starters. Onion tomato chilli uthapam was tasty. So were gun powder dosas. It comes with masala, we requested the dosas without it; price was same though.  Veg kothu paratta was not tasty. Mango lassi , falooda drinks and coffee were good.  They seem under staffed. The lady serving us seemed overwhelmed and tired. We had a rather long wait for our food. There is not much of an ambience; very basic and old fashioned interiors.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtUunKmWiGAlCYKIedsvofV79GL-XibzvkTBBq&fid=0x0:0xf59903adc47f1060"],"When":"2024-5-15"},{"Name":"Nick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGjptqH3FdoeLfdSjPWQygL5KEsM_ui4pClg77BekGUD0E-Q_8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I'm being kind while giving away 4 stars to this restaurant, and that's only and only due to the fact that the food was extra spicy, the way we like it. We asked for the food to be made extra spicy and they delivered. Otherwise everything else was going against this restaurant. We were the only ones in the whole restaurant during their lunch service and the food still took over 40 mins to reach our table. Imagine the wait time of it gets busy. The atmosphere is very basic with ventilation being an issue. Go for the food, not for the atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpxSY6GRJyC5V4mZfFB0Ii3gTJWww0hCZoe20N&fid=0x0:0xf59903adc47f1060"],"When":"2023-7-4"},{"Name":"Sathiyaseelan Suhashini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGCDhZwAvUF3Q8iMEpEx8TQCvKbwiXzYFJN0uOrenEt7v0wxGX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had Chicken Kotthu and asked them to make it spicy.
It was super spicy and fresh. A little bit of coriander leaves were added on top. It came with a tasty gravy.

Great portion that I shared with another person.

The other day, I tried their Rasam, awesome in flavours and heaven on a rainy day.
Poori and Parata are a bit oily, but tasty.

I was eager to try their idli, but they said that it's not available.

Update : On my second visit, tried Chicken pepper fry with extra spicy. They delivered it as expected high level of spice and tasted great with rice.

But be prepared for many No No.  Rasam wasn’t available. Rasamalai and Faluda drink were also not available. So left the place without any desserts.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6wBeBuD-GsvZgRyhS5dosNDVXnSdc-6h-g14v&fid=0x0:0xf59903adc47f1060"],"When":"2024-2-19"},{"Name":"S Ramesh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWq93P1v7Q5LEZs1NfgPNPQHNhO82zc2MQImRPuuKzwZ46QhAaZzg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place to explore South Indian cuisine.  The food was excellent quality with fine spice level and authentic flavors.  Variety of food selection with reasonable priced.  The tipping option are enormous.  The customer service met beyond the expectations and pleasing with accommodating nature.  Washrooms are clean.  Amble parking at a great location.  Definitely will come back with my family and friends.  No hesitation of recommendation to the food lovers.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Radhika Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqhivsBGfuy4Hh4Ikya7TYc3M3f3ax5pRlJEKTGryuw2nE44wF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food experience, please try there chicken pepper soup reminded me of home, Rava onion dosa don’t forget to tell them to make it with ghee.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPDK-CIlePG_zXf95WGKtnRGsErDCPmb4IGavV&fid=0x0:0xf59903adc47f1060"],"When":"2024-11-6"},{"Name":"Darlene B.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJEzkJ_Cm9j6nle9JrD7D2YVUuFX857_POLo7FiF7FYoLYxKrd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was delicious! And the server Sahil was so sweet and fast with service. We got our utensils and waters immediately after being seated, and were even expedited an appetizer earlier than expected. Cute little spot, I really appreciate the art they have up on the walls. It’s a little run down, but for the food, service, and maybe a little bit of privacy and intimacy w your introverted mate, this spot is perfect. Oh and they checked if the food was dairy free for me beforehand which I really appreciated. (Worth the price it don’t break the bank btw! A dosa is like $10)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNx5VNt2Y2GeO8XNw5N3up6GV0nYQuMniQhXghL&fid=0x0:0xf59903adc47f1060"],"When":"2023-8-26"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Izmet Barranco","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXiQo1jy483UmDOGk0DLpOPmwFqDxOxzKBlrj-9MTXzn_Zhoww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We organized a get together here on Karaoke night. They separated an area just for our group. Our waitress was really good. Super attentive and efficient with the amount of people we were.
Food was ok. I ordered a pull pork sandwich that didn’t taste at all like pull pork but the fries were really good. Karaoke was a little far but that didn’t stop us from singing along from our table. We had a good time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfVjINZyFSKIPir1pPpHZZkOFLT-KS1pvWmV0K&fid=0x0:0x188603c7b6417a54"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"Sally Rodriguez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYImJyCsPZ1U003tXN4fpaHQosVQMfmFbKD19gt9ySf-YRWw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is a hidden gem. We went on Saturday for karaoke night, and was great, we had so much fun.

The house beer during Happy Hour is excellent, and the chicken tenders with fries are a pretty large portion.

The servers are nice and friendly. We'll be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyNDjy7rLBbQcYr5MO1urr2jqKIyX3jSkK7avO&fid=0x0:0x188603c7b6417a54"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"Betty Jean Kruger-Cardenas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJR1X27lFCCVdB3q1V6BIdsqyed_fwKmoZ2kaT-7ckE4uAQAQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Waiters were slow. Would not suggest to come here and watch fight night seating and tvs were hard to view definitely would recommend spending your money and time else where","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFia7ftgVMwuwyWZDlBmsLHPSURpRZFVQtQ92C&fid=0x0:0x188603c7b6417a54"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"S S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI6bTwJxVAmflKaVCNl_tUpON2xrcLbttdYt-2i7f4LtWL10g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Okay, I am a regular customer for years which is why I have 5 stars. And I love the Great Bear, it’s my favourite spot (kind of like the show Cheers) but I must let the owner know that the change in food has been terrible. I went the other day and was so disappointed that they changed the fries and crispy chicken burger. I brought a friend who had never been there before and I was raving about the food, and to my disappointment they changed the fries to the same you get at Costco. I understand maybe you’re trying to cut costs or make things easier for the kitchen staff but please please bring the old fries back!!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kyle Giroux","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWHOLsWEpFCtHEVOX_wy6D8L0NN6uiLxWungvDHrEWqWsEryWed=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The bear statue is pretty cool out front of the main doors.  The location is great.

Food is mediocre at best. Service is  slow and not consistent. Bar staff.. well the cocktails aren't worth it.  The regulars are standoffish.  Not the best place.  Not the worst place.  But be aware of what you're walking into.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Robert Arbor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCQGcQxjL0YQQBQdJ531QwsU3eO8jWw8yRkMmtgTNQ-bybYFg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place to grab some breakfast and nurse your hangover from the night before. Servers were fantastic.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBREBlY18r1ThgzVG6FdM2nY0kBXWoftwHrTiw&fid=0x0:0x188603c7b6417a54"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Valerie McCart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI3DJi8eiLefDEmuZQ-tkxijYjXwiQgedLddFR5rFhfvnOxWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just finished Chiro/Acupuncture at Royal Treatment on Kingsway in Burnaby stopped in for a glass of wine and Ruben sliders, which were only $13 fr 3 during happy hour.  Shout out to Maria who served me on the patio.  Local Pub
The siders were on a soft brioche buns very fresh. Dijon, mustard, sauerkraut, Swiss cheese, meat ratio with Dillpickle on top was perfect. Delicious!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMynuG80dKx32ztcpoA7npAd4gf4qG8X2j_ShtP&fid=0x0:0x188603c7b6417a54"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"Danielle Campbell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ0gfeCaEzQuRVaysPjOTlmHETPZRigRPE_AXDzzGD1UI-eRg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Service and atmosphere were incredible. The chips for the spin dip were stale and  old, but the flavour of the spin dip was awesome!  Not impressed that the kitchen was unable to rectify the situation or offer fresher chips. The kitchen told me that the tortilla chips are made fresh each day! They are not, I’ve been in the industry for 20 years and I know fresh chips. But our server Suzanne was incredible.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Chelsea Vancouver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHVWaXfVBGL-NRGFFbHN7eiAD3hCGrOaEohFBcpGwJyjbv0CUl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious pasta! But not sure if it’s worth the price as a vegetarian. Love to see the vegetarian option tho! I went for lunch and I think it’s better suited as a nice dinner spot. Nice service and overall good food. Free parking around back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUTRJwiOIGFK0S-egWnpinpx5DVo8Ane7vu_8&fid=0x0:0x8ab025f5a5359877"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"Michelle Havvagoodey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLOzetGkb5sfvQ2QqVQLz6HIVsUL94CClajRGhGVUfARW0O_A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Parking lot at the back! Great space for large groups and 100% I’ll be back. Great service, great food! They have a patio but not currently open yet!

Deal for AAA ribeye until July 30,2024 $38!! For 14 oz.

The texture of the pasta is just magnificent. It was our first time and Eva was our server- she was amazing in making our experience comfortable and suggested great dishes and always ready to refill our glasses right on time!

HIGHLY recommend the Maltagliati La Forchetta (I know it says pistachio and many people may not be used to that) but it is so good. Pappardelle is good too, wish just bit more sausage that’s just personal preference.

The ribeye was dripping with its juices, each piece was even cut for us already in good bite sized pieces. Nice sear on the outside. Great deal!

Wish we had more room for dessert! Will have to try another time.

A gem to find in Burnaby!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYz_20SCBTtyu61AuwteeuB1II9ZkSo8MQjsmF&fid=0x0:0x8ab025f5a5359877"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"Melody Fu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUnKNbwOnEnsNVY1KRqwCc9H8FvnaQy0Zz4TB737JBU7i9IKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this restaurant. It is on my to go list whenever I'm in Vancouver. Everything is good, you can really taste the fresh pasta. The pasta combinations are divine. Nothing beats the dessert tiramisu. The service is also top notch, we were each given a shot of lemoncello after we told the waitress we're celebrating for our friend's upcoming wedding ❤️one of the few restaurants that I am happily paying a 18% tip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDZHa4Mlpt4mPwt33zI3IB9Q5bJDTC9VDIDPc&fid=0x0:0x8ab025f5a5359877"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"Al So","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLumQHIv-5W9wXPr4ZbA1zWCVnPk2w1Kc3bjsO93-VMG-v7JQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"La Forchetta is the real deal, and it’s nestled in an area with a rich Italian heritage history of North Burnaby.

I went for the Spaghetti Vongole with fresh Manila clams, white wine, and olive oil that’s, apparently, as extra virgin as it gets. And then came the Scaloppina Chicken—sautéed in lemon or Marsala sauce with Brussels sprouts, which I happily subbed out for extra veggies. Delicious? Absolutely. La Forchetta’s got a good thing going here, with each bite somehow feeling like a shout-out to Nonna’s kitchen. If you’re in North Burnaby and craving a taste of Italy, this place might just become your new ‘old faithful.'","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObDdkFoa457YoGQgevTUCsjItxRliTxkMveoqD&fid=0x0:0x8ab025f5a5359877"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"M L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL2wTL9G8MjEKoECJNl0YFVXOZdqpreACf-Kw1GF6trivGEjA-Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a great, unassuming restaurant in North Burnaby! I'm so glad this place exists.

Everything was seasoned beautifully and the ingredients tasted really fresh. To start, we had a caprese salad. Fresh juicy tomatoes and nice tender mozzarella. We had the crab linguine and the pizza with arugula and prosciutto. Both entrees were seasoned super well. Generous amounts of crab in the pasta and the sauce was so so yummy. Pizza was good, the crust was a touch dry for my liking but the toppings were delicious. The pizza was heavily topped, we had to mop up the leftover arugula. It was so good.

Not pictured is the tiramisu, which was super light yet strongly coffee flavored. Very well balanced.

The restaurant has great ambiance, lots of natural lighting, and comfortable seating. We had a server who was prompt and to the point which we appreciated.

I can't wait to be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOalCRxQaSo1c1g0OtOtTKCAs8t8mehryhqEb7i&fid=0x0:0x8ab025f5a5359877"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Shelley Anne Shorter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVo42l5sIRiNx3QxgOLKDM_-bPv1rxvGRkox0mBfbGM4a57adyk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I brought my friend here for a birthday lunch quite early on a weekday (12:30) so we practically had the place to ourselves!  We all decided to have to crab linguine and WOW! That flavourful sauce loaded with crab on the beautiful fresh pasta was delizioso!! In fact, it was so good I almost forgot to take my photo so please excuse the few bites that are missing! 😋😁. Will definitely be dining here on the regular.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGrvI1O0QSGi8jUw0Yo1CmQ47mJNBxDQp_jP7V&fid=0x0:0x8ab025f5a5359877"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Amelia S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbsodJVB_29--r7ZLKYCYzFI8th8JKc3Hnyx6uxqJZBJEtY_Gj2A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful evening, delicious food, can't ask for more.

Two of us shared
Meatballs appetizer and
Pappardelle in spicy Sausage, mushrooms and Rose sauce.

Then we had as Secondi:
Salsiccia Alla Griglia
(Grilled Italian sausages)
Scallopin
(Chicken sautéed in lemon)

We liked that there was a good portion of vegetables served.

For dessert, we had to try Tiramisu.
We really enjoyed it.
The truth, would have loved a tiny more liquor in it.

Happy to say we both enjoyed every dish.  And will return for sure.

Great service.
Plates and utensils were changed for the next dish we shared.

The monitor at the back showed a video, some pretty scenes of Venice, which is lovely to catch if you haven't been there, or great to remind you of good times if you have visited before.

Thank you La Forchetta!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZUzxWcJwAsAsqJ4JrYl1t_rASk5yaEXKtsMDY&fid=0x0:0x8ab025f5a5359877"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"Lee Reach","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVyvDETKsPyPVmqOsT9YOXMIvO5mmUwNeccQLIEZbx1_LNjnD4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came across this lovely Italian restaurant after trekking at Burnaby Mountain.
The staff were all very friendly and welcoming, providing us a relax atmosphere to chat and rest. Love the Peach Sangria recommended by the server, the taste was mild and refreshing but not sour.
I like my Spaghetti Vongole, the clams were fresh and the spaghetti was tender and chewy, which is the texture I like.
Andy friends all love their food, just want to thanks the chef and staffs over there, good job guys.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuzI4oJmf0BQ-BjLLWAv4jlW3oLjdSES3ijwQA&fid=0x0:0x8ab025f5a5359877"],"When":"2023-9-21"}]
