user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Majid Taherinejad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViDPiXU0JKzH_zVow85jmOX5CVYRWsJheQX5s1ReerMFEgHGH43w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Viva Sue Pizza is a true hidden gem! It’s incredible that this place has been around for over 30 years with the original owners, and you can taste the tradition in every bite.
The thick crust is topped with tons of toppings and flavorful cheese.

For Iranians: Chef's Best is just like makhsoos pizza ✅
Super Sue feels like makhloot ✅

Sue, the owner, is so kind and generous. She has such a warm attitude and is happy to share stories. The place isn’t fancy, but the food is all about exceptional quality and that nostalgic taste. So glad we found this spot! Highly recommend it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFCX_XS9iHJf-bosxWAm9bMc_ajZanR4XXXaXe&fid=0x0:0x4ff907ccb4f9a3ef"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"TIMOTHY NG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJN2gSiOaEpoGCNqpejeNlvBx1ORB59GTGiaGiQ4L8w_ZeW5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a great experience here. The pizza was excellent and crunchy. The lady was so nice and smiled all the time ! I will definitely come back again ! :) However, one small pizza for 1 person was a little bit too much so I will probably bring more friends to share a larger pizza next time !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONKtFKa7N4x-hHKuz6dcTHbiUUPkaXzimcQdxs&fid=0x0:0x4ff907ccb4f9a3ef"],"When":"2024-6-25"},{"Name":"Zuhal Akay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXg1GgpOURu6iroxmZvkn1xIHAzW9h3eAvSkLgL5SlOyjxqMwldWg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loaded with ingredients, topped with a delicious homemade marinara sauce, and simply excellent pizzas. The best pizza we've had in Vancouver so far.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7enJ4DawB-GH_M1Y0pp79bHP-Lay_6MAOqT1A&fid=0x0:0x4ff907ccb4f9a3ef"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"Eric Sahrmann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKDVPpEOav4bcliJ1B-9dSabhVsGjEASsG_60KBpYSm99uWBGv=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic pizza.  Friendly family run business.  Comfortable small dining area.  Wish we had tried them sooner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMHak32dOMwJF2QiDSEU3rSfC7hXhC2HCuBs98&fid=0x0:0x4ff907ccb4f9a3ef"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Joshua Yoo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocILIEOAH325QGUH7UI3lh6F68Dw9rUGD3QwlV4s2L3I2fKwgw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Truthfully one of if not the best pizza I had. Ate with my mom, the topping are amazing, they made it instantly after order so it was hot. The crust was crunchy and it was so nice. The workers seemed genuine and the pizza tasted as good as the atmosphere. Hidden gem 👍","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ethan M (Eman)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-3DmXsORWGZfMdxe8zPGO9xlyzThe8u4M2DfZAKd7Zo779Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I saw the reviews and needed to try it. I heard they had deep dish pizza and that’s what I came for, and they did not disappoint. There was 3 of us and we ordered the Deep dish meat pizza. It’s very filling and tasty, perfect for meat lovers. The interior was very old school and relaxed. I would totally recommend, and I will be coming back.10/10😋","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"C. G.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLdX5pRLXY9e18pKURD_9CEbSpkPLUmMYS2UYnb4TVOI9Xs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"beware of metal wire in pizza (see photos)

i reported to Sue multiple times by phone & email, but problems persisted. my family loves Sue's pizzas & ordered weekly. deciding to write this review was difficult being a regular customer supporting local businesses, but i really don't want anyone being hospitalized after eating.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWGMD0TqbRIDQMUyZphxy2e5mMSc5RHfGE7kg&fid=0x0:0x4ff907ccb4f9a3ef"],"When":"2024-6-12"},{"Name":"최경인","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIxwmIsPQbdgOhziUQsp3bptSLqnurKZcQywuYxz9neL-0bMw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the best pizza ever! I appreciate the owner's kindness. The pizza was wonderful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhqkQZBWez0Hb3qbE0GW2AHoPnXdyVGiIX2cTT&fid=0x0:0x4ff907ccb4f9a3ef"],"When":"2024-8-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Hello Hello","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtzOt6oKFmZzK-dAla5ANIGbqvtokt2WSx2yOtUbb-HOP8eKgV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food and service was good. Ahmed was attentive and they clean the tables right before you sit down so you know it’s clean. The large bread in the photo is known as lavash bread.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMe-wGqzZ5F7idFOSImPZelywcxKJFfP7eySPts&fid=0x0:0x7967b40a6c1e08f8"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"ahmed Salem","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKxl8EpM5PpxnInVEAcO2YWNWUQHKIWVLZJ32u8fde02oXCbJgQA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I had an extremely disappointing experience at this restaurant. The service was very poor, and the customer service was incredibly rude. I deeply regret coming here.

One of my friends visiting from Alberta had a problem with his dish – it wasn't as described, and the soup was watery and tasteless. When he complained, the waiter reacted aggressively and stared him down, almost ready to start a fight. We were charged $150 for this terrible food.

As a neighbor of this restaurant, I strongly advise against going there. The staff is unprofessional, and the overall experience was disgusting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmEp64UcvEmUdm9KOfNzrOBR6p4Tz0J1CTfs3w&fid=0x0:0x7967b40a6c1e08f8"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"Celina Arenillo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLPvcNqjpmtihcb5J8miFlC4lw0H-EdaSQUtLM4u3kh0_GMHA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was good, chicken and beef was very tender and hummus was flavorful. The meat dishes were served with rice and some greens.

It was served fast. Service was just okay, there was only one server during dinner service.

Overall, had a good experience but could have been better. Perhaps could have added one more waitstaff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNi0VPMuUmz2ymc5vQBdF2n9AP5RF8DGGYBVmU&fid=0x0:0x7967b40a6c1e08f8"],"When":"2024-1-28"},{"Name":"Saskia Asyari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOw-vGRppaZWH-87l0DTjRp6cH2-cGmCr2why8D5leomPAj1GywA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Halal turkish foods. 15mins walk from Edmonds station. I ordered their Beyti Sarma and Stuffed Grape Leaves (Dolma). It’s very hearty and filling. Their lavash bread is baked fresh, the dip makes it even yummmm. Everything tastes very healthy. They gave us dates for iftaar free of charge. They have a small prayer room too next to the washroom.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEuGvtn3IuPUodbAfyDB4TzO8M0mYQfMZMNucy&fid=0x0:0x7967b40a6c1e08f8"],"When":"2024-4-16"},{"Name":"AN Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKytqEjsXsEbEaEDUTYY8Bcf9-PiW8asJvtxFyKgOV2S2xUnhg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered a meat lover Pide, it was not a meat lover but onion and egg Pide. It was not the food that bothered me as much as it was the handling. They don’t wear gloves when preparing food, they touch everything and than prepare the food. The place is filled with spider webs and covered in dust, and the floor is has been long overdue for cleaning.The washroom was filled with used papers. I don’t know how it got such a high rating.

I think FHA needs to inspect this place and make sure they follow food handling guidelines. I will make sure to get their attention.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Amy Guo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjvRRK_YlsmDn-NmKvJTOsZ-KzzLkGdsFts7t-MjP23-gLvQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing lavash and cold salad combo. We enjoyed the fresh and tasty flavours of turkey so much! The portions and gigantic and ingredients feel very fresh and high quality. Will definitely come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzwTNd6JFHg38a4C7kyv11KbKk7FGOQZCQL2dK&fid=0x0:0x7967b40a6c1e08f8"],"When":"2024-5-21"},{"Name":"Rodrigo Amaya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7EjU9cUQJow2SlAxccaUEH3zNhsjX5UadVMXFWXqx6N5s9Np1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent meat pies. I would like some fresh toppings and some lemon to add above it. Other than that excellent quality and size.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsxVFw3BB5TiezCftI4hgWZsjWZK8STZd8pisV&fid=0x0:0x7967b40a6c1e08f8"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Ibraheem Aziz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXUCRwlr78GZ1GRHrfTkGx2BBnyawBYeFefuJjXBEr7AqN1NLIpSg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Visited this Turkish restaurant for dinner in Burnaby and was impressed! Their service is very attentive and there is a decent amount of seating inside the restaurant for dining in, as well as street parking available nearby. The complimentary bread was delicious, along with the iskender kebap which was very richly flavoured and seasoned, accompanied with rice and salad freshly prepared. Dessert was tasty as well - the baklava and Turkish coffee was a refreshing end to the meal. Highly recommend visiting for dinner in the near future!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtd9aUktxgvhxQY9-5T7UyEKqT1GqAvZQdO0ZW&fid=0x0:0x7967b40a6c1e08f8"],"When":"2024-1-12"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It’s like food court quality Chinese food. We ordered takeout and the taste of everything was mediocre but still palatable. The deep fried silverfish was average, the tofu and vegetables were okay, and the honey garlic spareribs tasted kinda odd with poor meat quality and the sauce was different from the standard honey garlic flavour you get at other restaurants.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWKBAfB0PMRgwUIQEIcgbseX2vybpz5CEGu4kw&fid=0x0:0xddc405aa820319fc"],"When":"2024-4-28"},{"Name":"Jasmine Davis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjl1vG8AfP1KQsme5lqEpYpQJBF68_I3YKilvkqGxYcn9Se447fg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Huge portions of food.
Great prices.
Everything was delicious!!! There were three of us in our party and we ordered one combo and two sides to share. We had so much leftovers for lunch the next day.
The staff and service was very quick and efficient.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTenvXlzBQTMQNJEucVjqQ8dqmjr4FopFnqx22&fid=0x0:0xddc405aa820319fc"],"When":"2024-5-13"},{"Name":"kawaii hatchiko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLtom4JJghW2UnkOsI7GKr-J96yxZfSX4SBdkTaAQaNBfKVBVT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This place has been around for years and finally I was able to give it a try.

The lunch specials are reasonably priced and the portions were just right. The service is pretty standard for a non fancy Chinese restaurant.

The wonton soup was tasty and hot. The sweet and sour pork was crispy and juicy.  Definitely a place to try if you’re in the neighborhood.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_ipW1vLFNmG0XCMlKlLQbXyNOwPJmF190EuJy&fid=0x0:0xddc405aa820319fc"],"When":"2023-12-12"},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Mr. Ho Wonton House has been in Burnaby for about 30 years. They are a good place to go to for casual and convenient everyday Chinese eats.

Featured here:
Vegetables & Bean Curd with Chinese Mushroom
Deep Fried Squids with Salt & Hot Pepper
Prawns With Swirled Eggs on Fried Rice Noodle
Sichuan Style Long Green Beans
Salty Fish & Diced Chicken Fried Rice
Assorted Meat & Bean Curd Hot Pot
Deep Fried Crispy Skin Chicken

I only tried the first four dishes as I don't eat meat but everything I ate was tasty. My husband tried everything and was very impressed. We'd eaten food from this restaurant many times in the past but for some reason everything tasted better this time. Possibly related to the fact that we dined in this time instead of getting takeout. (We ordered takeout from this place many times during the pandemic!)

Service: Good
Parking: Free parking at the restaurant or on the street
Location: 6731 Kingsway, Burnaby, BC","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOwc-VMXNlg9ck8rqfzZIhthPDEj8uQdGDi5vV&fid=0x0:0xddc405aa820319fc"],"When":"2023-11-29"},{"Name":"Ilex Evergreen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLB_pYSlxr9_al1HrHd2ZHhlLtyEen8bUjnVbrJ3e-AhtFqpg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I'm a regular customer.
My order yesterday contained some meat & this was an *unpleasant* surprise:
- there was a piece of beef in the vegetable chow mein + a mushroom (less bothered by the mushroom).
- the vegetable spring roll contained chicken ( or pork) so I couldn't eat it.

I would appreciate a refund or credit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRYmt6be6ihoGOQGVn6qQM-OYI7F4bShniQ6v3&fid=0x0:0xddc405aa820319fc"],"When":"2024-5-5"},{"Name":"Penny Rusty Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkGfXMIDqwS_yD1axTk6tkHoLsnybE2ErvKrHMoMIElMJWekI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Mr. Ho has been around for years and it used to be our go-to for take-out. Generally speaking, the food comes out fast and fresh. Nothing that would scream fine dining... mainly geared for meeting westernized taste buds. But tasty nonetheless.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKjc5SmArv4rIGV8lt04OxKpdAOrEVXGm8Y7qh&fid=0x0:0xddc405aa820319fc"],"When":"2024-1-14"},{"Name":"Janis Stephanie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVimr_SvQHh_3jMyZzm5d6s5g4eHMT9fWLUrRqN09vp80jHFbyf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Amazing, delightful, classy restaurant off Kingsway. I came with my son and he thought the rice was greasy they were quick to resolve and replace the item. We got a combo D for two.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1iRSeoOVl0Ir2IILi0etrPYef6sHGlHdNX6G0&fid=0x0:0xddc405aa820319fc"],"When":"2023-11-9"},{"Name":"Len B.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4pVIb0MMvFKVSKYWDl5qcnfYcK_FvAtA1Ke2XFVIE6YHndn8ISA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hot and sour soup is fire along with everything else. Huge portions and great pricing = Get some.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSK9apA1wjcx3ohfA-kMppq1cSCe-dYesEhzoD&fid=0x0:0xddc405aa820319fc"],"When":"2024-6-23"}]

title: Sushi Garden Metro
descriptions: Modest but contemporary outpost with a classic Japanese menu of sushi, tempura, udon & rice bowls.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Evan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocItqym_b8p4Y-FW9783yYhbbkXgbWq5yo1i3Fyi_bB9_Q1tlIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It's fine , it's just Japanese food , nothing exceptional nothing bad . Like if you're craving sushi then this place is very serviceable and will get the job done. Pretty good prices too for sushi nowadays
Only thing that stood out was the takoyaki , the crispy ness on the outside was  simply delightfully . I will come back if  I'm craving Japanese food.

Service is fine no complaints.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNk2TIO0iFhMNbGC2sskq9r5RbufOmF1Mymzz0y&fid=0x0:0x86d2f8ae051d4b44"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Lost in Flax Blog","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnuEdz0exGAqoaKWuU3YZ60m50P5j2VjB_aqaZVW3VnTtNws28=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Have been a patron of Sushi Garden since their opening, more than a decade ago. My entire family love dining here. Salmon sashimi is always super fresh and good quality for the price you pay, superb quantity as well. Love their sushi rice, firm yet fluffy, and properly packed. My favourites will forever be: California roll, beef teriyaki roll, dynamite roll, salmon sashimi and nigiri, takoyaki, prawn & sweet potato tempura, agedashi tofu.

Went with my daughter for the first time and she hoovered everything! So sushi garden is definitely kid approved.

I don’t know about other people’s experiences but my latest dine-in with them was wonderful — the servers were friendly, accommodating and always easy to hail down. Food came out fast, too. Check them out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMko_T6MpJFAHLBXO7Wy2eWX_yKt7-oD_I5wVDl&fid=0x0:0x86d2f8ae051d4b44"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"Muh Ruri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkStAcVhSLoWZluIOVQ74c2fLDnRh9SyZ_LHSDWUY1b4U3yJnx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Garden Sushi, conveniently located near Metrotown, is a fantastic spot for sashimi enthusiasts. The sashimi here is incredibly delicious, with each piece tasting fresh and full of flavor. Despite the high quality, the prices are very reasonable, making it a great value for what you get.

One standout feature at Garden Sushi is their sushi rice. Unlike some places where the rice is packed too tightly, resulting in dense bricks, Garden Sushi gets it just right. The rice is perfectly fluffy, enhancing the overall texture and experience of both their nigiri and donburi dishes.

The restaurant offers a cozy and welcoming atmosphere, perfect for a casual meal or a quick bite after shopping. The staff is friendly and attentive, ensuring a pleasant dining experience.

If you're in the Metrotown area and craving top-notch sashimi and sushi with expertly prepared rice, Garden Sushi is definitely the place to go. Highly recommended for both the quality of the food and the great prices.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtIcoevCGtV4ZxJpaBtW1KSgckHBLehycpQiCz&fid=0x0:0x86d2f8ae051d4b44"],"When":"2024-5-28"},{"Name":"Thomas Wilczynski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJD24Or0RUBGSuMLrdcePCdBXv8sl7ZLUknVBIS-JYZ_nACiVt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious and great value! $15 really filled me up. The deep fried California roll was really enjoyable. The BC roll got a bit messy. I'd like to visit again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkAHmu031ZW2RsGljWJnSK9gIVrBpJA_pHxBCM&fid=0x0:0x86d2f8ae051d4b44"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Annabelle H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLSJcer9XDzZjjJbS5bzbGbwxDnn83xBqXcJfhtJXmzK15orb8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is worst location and their in house policy says it has to be three or more here to be seated or else you cannot set down first and wait for your friends. They have more than enough for table of four. It is my first time ever hearing this rule. I’ve been to many places that are way busier than them, and they will help you find a table and let you set down and wait for your friends. Their excuse was “ they are very busy restaurant” . This is ridiculous!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxfSDLoh1Q_4tcdTAYbWrswJWV9fMlYDNJKxqG&fid=0x0:0x86d2f8ae051d4b44"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Akshita Goel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXL3ERp_727H-iN3iXdxEAizP8D_dLFrt4PN5Y_l1PGbYQ4uJN8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I visited this place for the first time. The food and service was great, no doubt in that; however, at the time of making the payment, the server named Jiyun (the name written on my receipt), asked me why I didn’t pay the tip and if I didn’t like the service or food. I replied with a polite smile and tone that I definitely liked the food and the service; however, I will tip next time. The server didn’t respond to what I answered and had that weird expression on her face as if she is mad at me for not paying the tip. I understand tipping to a service is a kind and expected gesture but it’s customary and not mandatory. I might would not visit this place again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"joan WONG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI6T-B9nK04ecGKRRC7r3FGvlkvfslOjEIBuZatey7Mhh0JkA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good food with affordable prices. We ordered sushi combo, kids menu, and pork katsu. I do love the fresh sashim!

We paid the bill by cash. However, we had a bad experience from the cashier about the tipping issues.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQ0LTHORnZbcYvbeLZXuWYMp2vPJTy2vVJzXuG&fid=0x0:0x86d2f8ae051d4b44"],"When":"2024-1-17"},{"Name":"Nalinee Yeung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWo10huSX0dX6mUo_p-98vcDKFsNu-pbqmp1FOUHibmggCI0smK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the huge chunk of sashimi here. Very fresh with reasonable price!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPyVDvnaa1OBY1xFFnL0cPvVqtoIY--Gcg9igVG&fid=0x0:0x86d2f8ae051d4b44"],"When":"2024-11-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Genova “Gen” Pangan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXEIdEux0Y6t5oht2jr_SIjM3bcTupGJn9fR2Ts_u19pLcx_Y6eIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had our Christmas party get together here at Acqua Restaurant. The service was satisfying as their staff was very nice and accomodating. For their foods, we all enjoyed it and mutually agreed that it was delicious and satisfying. It was our first time to come here and our experience was very pleasant and we are planning to come back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkTZGQpoAydv6cyRJdULxQXP0WtQFi95CjDgDB&fid=0x0:0x9db4bfc13f087b7d"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Penny Rusty Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkGfXMIDqwS_yD1axTk6tkHoLsnybE2ErvKrHMoMIElMJWekI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The thing that drew us to this restaurant was the prime rib special they have on Wednesdays.  Most places only have prime rib available on Sundays so it's nice to enjoy this mid-week.

Located inside the hotel, there us free parking for restaurant guests (put your license plate down on the sheet located at the hotel lobby desk).

It wasn't too busy on our visit. We had a view of the small hotel pool from our table. Got the acqua sipper (cranberry, pineapple, mango) and Pacific breeze (coconut water, ice tea, muddled mint and lime) to drink.

Thr prime rib special is 10oz ($32) with yorkshire pudding. A good price point with all the fixings. The yorkie had a crisp exterior but fluffy inside. You can get the gravy on the side (it's a thickish gravy). I would definitely come back for this again.

Also ordered the Thai mussels ($24) with lemongrass, galangal and garlic toast. Plenty of mussels but this wasn't my fav and I found it a bit too salty and the mussels weren't very tender.

The Brussels sprouts ($11) with capers, balsamic, and parmesan also leaned into the salty side of things.

Overall, worth a visit for the prime rib at this price point and they also have some happy hour items that looked interesting.

UPDATE July 2024: It's been about 2 months since our last visit here and we decided to come back for their Wednesday prime rib special. We started out with their happy hour calamari ($14) which was better than expected but somewhat salty. The batter was a bit thickish but crunchy and it came with scallions and jalapeños slices.

The 10oz prime rib is the real reason to visit. We asked for medium rare (I would say it was probably a bit more cooked than that but it's difficult when it comes off a roast). Still, the prime rib was tender to the bite. The yorkies seemed to be more cakey/eggy inside this time around with the inside lacking a light hollow interior (assuming it didn't rise as much as it should have). That being said, it was soft and we enjoyed it. Still good value.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4RIbfEgZiWLtn1LqfQAL5BcgMy-jbVBWw1FyI&fid=0x0:0x9db4bfc13f087b7d"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Alex Kopylov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXEZ8X4JTTtCM1b8X3zPmW5j15msvWvCXtM7Xsw5rKCihVs4Ji3=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here with my girlfriend for her birthday.
Everything was excellent, our waitress recommended us a west coast salmon and a beef sirloin steak. We got it so fast and honestly salmon was something fantastic. At the end of a dinner we got cake, what was very surprising.
So in total the server was very professional and friendly, restaurant has huge patio, what is perfect for a summer. Going to come back here for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUt0iKvjFAdLQq3NzqF8XnVmRNUodyYYwdEG6f&fid=0x0:0x9db4bfc13f087b7d"],"When":"2024-4-18"},{"Name":"Victor Law","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIpnZPh7heLHnvp3JcjErTq9VzUaFB6LA67FBNyLyGHNyq0kA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As part of our stay here, we had a spending amount for the restaurant. We chose the Acqua Express Breakfast, the Any Style Fried Eggs, and the Belgian Waffles.

The waiter was super friendly and accommodating. He gave us some great advice when ordering.

Our meals were very nice. The eggs were cooked appropriately, and the waffles were nicely made. The hashbrowns were essentially tater tots - no complaints here!

The bacon was on the fatty side, but that's pretty normal.

Overall, we had a nice dining experience here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiJjJj5HLkffSrGoIest3Ax1kqOqkdL6obg2-z&fid=0x0:0x9db4bfc13f087b7d"],"When":"2023-11-5"},{"Name":"Gian Carla Aquino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEjGODszLDP0PBfi5bC1jh8ooARGb0NlOHSd5ua__dUMKtkczJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely amazing dinner experience! 💕

Food was fantastic! From drinks to soup to mains, all hit the spot and cravings!

Service is excellent! Really felt we were taken care of from the start to finish!

I will recommend this restaurant everyday!

Thank you for having us! 💕","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWus1PIXCAFemVVGnsLYWsZzIiSE9mUc-P8ukH&fid=0x0:0x9db4bfc13f087b7d"],"When":"2022-9-19"},{"Name":"Hassan Makhlouf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYREoqUkazVJoJhrGCrjS5g1lIMahzFkhsZA1Ir7O3A-YofJyb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food and service are great but food options wasn’t that much. Place is nice with easy parking by using hotel parking. Service was nice and we used the 3 course offer of dinvancouver which was nice. It’s not a busy place which gives good atmosphere to enjoy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOiPborV7PKTqOdOx5rWVDZCrPPWlYCAt3z8LmR&fid=0x0:0x9db4bfc13f087b7d"],"When":"2024-1-24"},{"Name":"Tessa Krueger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQY00lFPNAuOjrkNqvUsGc4OC0kjC6vPeOBYlzX1Ur7ggU2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My experience at the Acqua Restaurant (Executive Suites in Burnaby) on May 12, 2024, during my Mother's Day celebration, was unfortunately overshadowed by several disappointing incidents, primarily centered around an issue with the seating arrangements. Upon our arrival, it became evident that the staff's approach to hospitality involved seating guests in secluded and unappealing areas of the buffet venue. Specifically, an attempt was made to seat my two children and I in an isolated corner outside the buffet hall, adjacent to the gazebo. Despite finding our name listed on the table, it was surprising to discover the absence of chairs, especially given the numerous vacant tables within the buffet hall.

The highlighted section in the attached image depicts the area where the restaurant manager, Dennis, attempted to seat us.

After expressing my concerns to a waiter, we were briefly left unattended as he sought assistance from the restaurant manager. Unfortunately, our situation remained unaddressed as we stood near the gazebo. It was only thanks to the intervention of a kind young lady, whose name I regrettably neglected to note, that we were eventually seated within the restaurant premises.

During our interaction with Tatiana at the restaurant, whom I had previously communicated with regarding my reservation, our concerns were adequately addressed, resulting in our relocation to a more suitable seating arrangement within the buffet hall.

Furthermore, our initial encounter with the restaurant manager Dennis, was marred by a lapse in attention, as we were temporarily set aside to accommodate another group of dissatisfied patrons. While I recognize the importance of addressing customer grievances, the manner in which our needs were overlooked appeared disorganized and lacked professionalism.

Despite the exceptional service provided by our waiter, Rishi, throughout our brunch, it was unfortunately insufficient to salvage the overall experience.

In conclusion, my Mother's Day buffet experience at Acqua Restaurant serves as a poignant reminder of the potential repercussions when customer comfort and satisfaction are disregarded in favor of expediency and indifference.

I encourage prospective patrons to explore alternative dining establishments where all guests are treated with the respect and consideration they rightfully deserve, regardless of party size.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOc0soHiQdoiWE5ZYauQRATx-fNan4YktbQYJEk&fid=0x0:0x9db4bfc13f087b7d"],"When":"2024-5-13"},{"Name":"Preethi Nair","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUz8cCAzlnay_PFhvv7Ji00tvlRLoqJA-MhaglfwwGMG6P16JkGug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice restaurant inside Executive suite hotel. Service is quick and food is tasty too. Our server Victoria was very helpful. Ambience is good, very quiet and very spacious. I would highly recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJQZnW3P7TNbn9igCgY--wj3J0F2Hp5Q6cxeZJ&fid=0x0:0x9db4bfc13f087b7d"],"When":"2024-3-12"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Bob Man","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7gEa-pMXe2SmF7txaDJhxQkROWXYK6GHi_X2z7fLvS6NhAw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Uber experience at Bubble World Burnaby:

The sole purpose of this review is to assist and friendly remind the restaurant of their inconsistency with this highly rated dish and their response in handling the situation.

PINEAPPLE SHRIMP BALLS - received has NO SAUCE. Called back the restaurant and inquired if they revised the recipe and/or just missing the sauce (comparing to picture shown)?? The staff responded they are certain there is sauce but if still unsatisfied we can pick-up a "free sauce for our next visit" as a solution for missing in this order. Phone was placed on table while inquiring with packaging/kitchen staff that handled the order. Loud strong vocals in Mandarin argumentatively of certainty in preparation and in no way for error..fighting back with FOH staff via convo on phone. Few months earlier, this same situation occured WITHOUT sauce - and when contacted via app, uber just thanks you for your feedback regarding missing sauce (no refund), and left unable to enjoy the dish properly. This is the second time. This is the 2/2 orders we made for this dish and we find this troublesome, time consuming and distressing over a simple dish.

At the end, drove all the way back to Bubble World Burnaby and they gave a replacement, while showing them the order made incorrectly.

They suggested for next time to ask uber for full refund on entire uber based on this one dish error. That would completely unfair for the business and I don't recommend doing that in response.

Don't recommend ordering this dish/ Recommend ordering Chicken Nuggets & Taro Milk Slush instead.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMThQtfoNX2hDtxUoCJa23FdHDbQ16cOcpCc_Vr&fid=0x0:0x554265aac79f232c"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Miss Lynne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwRhjfH5-OHpuQthobphDEGqrTSpZc4Skj0JUJTU7B1tP8bS8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My friend & I was waiting 15mins for seating and I noticed 3 tables available but the girl did not seat anyone. There were other ppl waiting too. Talked to another waitress and she said we have wait to be called. Another 20 mins passed and the 3 tables still had no one seated there. My friend and I got seated finally after another 10mins and we ordered. My hot bbtea came, and I had to ask for a spoon to eat my pearls while my friend had to request utensils for her noodles. Then the girl delivered salt & pepper chicken nuggets & walked away. We had to wave a waitress to get utensils. All of us at the table felt the services were bad. I don't believe in giving tips for bad services.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPaeA8EA9aBDx3Dqi-uMDVS7M9wXQboO9xm4ah2&fid=0x0:0x554265aac79f232c"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"C T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgS9_N3RvGRzjGP4q0CjRyk4CzxkTzB4cNEPmyEXeU-p7IBoH2mQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Had a disappointing experience. The service was incredibly slow, and the staff only seemed to attend to certain customers. Even with few people dining, our food took forever to arrive. When it did, the dishes were either too salty or too sweet and overall below average. I wouldn't recommend this place unless you're just desperate to fill your stomach.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSqrzeMIABCAmgZ0CnJxH75uVQkQ9Gqtj-CbHD&fid=0x0:0x554265aac79f232c"],"When":"2024-6-26"},{"Name":"Martino k","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjUwm9_tiJtBn8aHq_pf9WAX2R9oGx8j05UKYRPt9Ihw2wfA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Horrible, I ordered take out two teriyaki chicken rice bowls. Once I received them it was half the portion it is when dining in. But we payed the same  amount .. $30 something for two bowls just for us to receive a smallll portion in both bowls. As if they took one dish and divided it . At this point places like Big way hot pot are better at least for the price. It’s unfortunate because the bowls are tasty but how can you be this stingy.??.. If I could rate them no stars I would.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9ZJBKGrisKJtikVD1fZ9uddlnberJ_zuCnJ8G&fid=0x0:0x554265aac79f232c"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Mimi Arogie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHl22MZ572JfQST8HkjErDxof6OVP4o5MQGs4gcmTzdlm5ddkrDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I’ve ordered from this location and other locations since I was in high school and this has never happened. A simple taro slush with ice cream and these were put in it. I started throwing them out but decided to show them after I kept finding more. This is how much liquid was left in it after taking these things out. Maybe we got the wrong order but it literally had our name and what we ordered on the receipt. Even the condensed milk toast was bad this time. These are my go to desserts and it was not satisfying at all.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9WxAh3XJIUWPDtMVu5GRxht1TWf3pxgihzmv6&fid=0x0:0x554265aac79f232c"],"When":"2024-10-31"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tasty and affordable personal hotpot’s here that come in a large portion. The hot pots come with lots of fish balls, tofu, and assorted vegetables as well as dipping sauces and rice. Tried the vegetable and tofu hot pot with sliced lamb and it was light and delicious and not too salty. The portion was large enough that I could pack some home for another meal and it was under 20 dollars.

My friend had the kimchi pot which was equally large and she said it was quite tasty. Solid place for personal hotpot’s and Taiwanese foods at an affordable price. The restaurant is cute with a colorful bubble wall.

Service was humble and nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9RTR-vEKJ-4KxVdw8Iow3HS71nLXF53n93tLR&fid=0x0:0x554265aac79f232c"],"When":"2024-2-23"},{"Name":"Yuting Tang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnmXIBtCm63FJEjDfp1HYZuLQgkYSDxM_EAY9WHR4fDPSyrzf_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"portion shribked dramatically, and very unbalanced between different meals.

i ordered a beef stew,and this is the only amount of beef that i received out of the whole bowl. and compare to my friend's fried chicken lunch box, we paying pretty much the same but he's meat portion is like triple compare to mine.

havent had them for a while and the shrink in portion really shocked me.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOIrHtE-qCHkBRta2_pM0vGgsYzXqlhKKron-xl&fid=0x0:0x554265aac79f232c"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"sally baux","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJJPyBCWPmca8C7WPWuGnQRRBsNLbLVAzX5a0NDafbTe3baww=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Had the worst meal at this restaurant. Their customer service is bad and the food is below average. Overly seasoning and over cooked. I had to wait for 30 mins for my appetizer to come. You can get much better food from T&T instead with almost the same price and without having to pay for tips.
Also their tofu dessert or tofu pudding is gross. Is overly sweetened and not authentic.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYZ-3SRY212fu9Cu6PF2SMvTbFPyPJNZpv7F3i&fid=0x0:0x554265aac79f232c"],"When":"2024-6-26"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Melinda W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqFa91nGQX9-WVxFZ-rAUul10GF70bhWZFQZe97ymoPVUZrvFxnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I re-visited ChongQing after more than 20 years. It seems to me that it is now serving a greater variety of food.

Peking duck was the highlight of the evening. It was on promotion and only cost around $55 for a Peking duck in 2 ways. I would say it was very good for this price. The skin was crispy and not too greasy, and the stir fried duck meat with lettuce wrap was delicious. My second favorite was the spicy and sour soup. Though I was a little shocked when I saw button mushrooms in it (the authentic one didn't have), it tasted just like the one I used to have.

Perhaps the chef is not particularly skillful in making Xiaolungbao. The wrapping was easy too thick. Other than that, I'm happy with the rest of the dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPK6rWDbiYnrvOTxS-oxJBUC9AHM_ODI54JUo4g&fid=0x0:0x7039730ecef39a86"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"Faith Oh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIRU1l7lR0St2FKA3sFQRqByUMO0kTpIy7V5hHpzuF2subJjzXD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious Chinese restaurant near Metrotown mall! Such friendly and polite servers with the best dish recommendations. Our favourite dish was the beef and vegetable rice noodle in black bean sauce, so flavourful not too salty or oily. Lemon glaze sauce chicken was very good, meat was thin and tender. Honey garlic sliced pork was also a hit with their fried donut buns! We will be back!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYMaGObGkc533muGr-7yyjBYfqR5TNUlhgOBSA&fid=0x0:0x7039730ecef39a86"],"When":"2024-1-28"},{"Name":"Gordon Kwong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKjDehFqHA5ZT74ZkeWTLjTUZu8GTq7uesQO3c1SQIt6zn0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Peking duck tasted and looked like it was reheated, dried out meat not juicy at all. Steamed juicy bun were not juicy and had very thick skin and not very tasty. Skin so thick they did not have proper pleats. Service was excellent however. Restaurant was very cold and some employees were wearing heavy jackets so food got cold fast. They are relying on good reputation of commercial restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORzRn5noio29aU04Zk91x8MCfW-fWC2Q0eT9ig&fid=0x0:0x7039730ecef39a86"],"When":"2024-1-15"},{"Name":"Vero Vero","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJqM6z3NvGgp8fOHPNYXy_sxK1l4a3Acl0A1wGDJ4i1AfuQXig=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Perfect dine in restaurant during this time. Very well spaced, and menu can be viewed online or paper. Foods were served so quickly and fresh. It took about 10 minutes. The lemon chicken is so unique. It looks like chicken cutlet with sauce on the top. It was delicious and crispy. Egg fuyong was mildly flavored and soft. I expected it to be little crispy on the surface and gravy. But there was no option for sauce . I loved the portion of shrimp in the egg fuyong. Beef with black bean sauce was mediocre. The pieces of vegetable were too big. And flavor was not intense enough compare to the color of sauce. Overall, it was good dining experience. We will visit again for other cuisines as well :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9ZzkZlOfbWag7B5YZGq-9BdVKCtTCFHvn37L6&fid=0x0:0x7039730ecef39a86"],"When":"2021-3-12"},{"Name":"Dominique Matys","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWZMJLtMFh5MvM_rWh3rQEmnAYMi8RxhTj-ZjrwYtjHQN60POY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service was quick and friendly. Food came in a timely manner with big portions on each menu item, plus was very delicious!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2IXthUB1uXoRRSt1IzwJPpEFTB7a-fUKWnQ_D&fid=0x0:0x7039730ecef39a86"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Maj Mi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJEkFFuhxILyz-Dju9hXRhPtSWy469kUxTGBigJDNHAH-xIiA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went for a nice family dinner and the food was fantastic! The whole family loved it. Our server recommended we go with the two course Peking duck, and it was absolutely worth it! The stir fry filling in lettuce wraps was to die for. Peking duck skin was crispy and overall delicious. Chowmein was also amazing. Family also liked the General Taos chicken which was more western...but very tasty. Will come back again and again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfUwylfV9IY3GI5luP1AIBdr1apkCJBJiUYSnB&fid=0x0:0x7039730ecef39a86"],"When":"2022-3-23"},{"Name":"Sarah W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXT0nZvuCCWtxE7tCmKwkdtK9DgTxxgPN_H5tcLUmMEgLxeACiU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This restaurant has been around for years..

It is not a big restaurant with 5 booths, 1 large table and a banquet against the window with various 2 tops and 4 tops. Parking in front.

They have an extensive lunch menu.

The staff is efficient and friendly, for a Wednesday afternoon, the restaurant is 90% full with mix of clientele. Not all asians as I assumed.

I ordered the Seafood Crispy Noodles including the Hot and Sour Soup.

The food comes out fast, the soup is flavourful with the numbing spicy effect but the consistency is more like gravy, which is too thick to my liking.

The Seafood Crunchy noodles indeed was very crunchy with 2 prawns, 2 pieces of small fried fish, 2 super chewy squid and a handful of eraser sized scallops and Bok Choy. The sauce over the noodles has the flavour but the seafood is bland, however again, the sauce, I suspect is made with an abundance of corn starch, so it’s super thick. At the end of the meal, you can literally see the sauce congealing into solid jelly.

I do like the attentiveness of the staff, there were 3 servers always walking around, clearing and cleaning tables.

They have their own napkins printed, and at the end of the meal, you get a fortune cookie, which reminds me of the old visit to their Broadway location when we used to eat there in the 80s. Most Chinese restaurants don’t offer fortune cookies anymore.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgiD4SlfdkZuvlLMy630CgU4cROC_2KkLXqKKM&fid=0x0:0x7039730ecef39a86"],"When":"2023-1-25"},{"Name":"Veronica Rogers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMVH7w7uO6nRrZlbVL1dJkBkSEFkH2r5iDgbJK_qMW8mzkE_O4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Big portions for a fair price. Quiet and cozy. Servers were very kind and well mannered.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlZk_5VLrK8BsHUagOFrYXqT5G7iU5eey2hDHx&fid=0x0:0x7039730ecef39a86"],"When":"2024-6-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Peeratuch Lewnanonchai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxW_sy0eajhrHokVv09605E9rTsfelzVOZFvkVhc91N5zqwmV-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I can confidently say that this hotpot buffet is the best I’ve had in Vancouver. The food is fresh and high-quality. The meats are thinly sliced and taste amazing, while the vegetables are fresh and come in a wide variety. The restaurant is spacious and can accommodate a large number of customers. The atmosphere is bright, clean, and well-organized.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbSYZc4ivXD-Vw7Zp53CbHUcDuAX28XOmZ8Xpb&fid=0x0:0x83ce0c8f32692002"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Deb PS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2JrjvxBJWPrjHCwBxV9NiRybb9V5GJpynDBuSW5sd6snYZiMa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time going to hot pot, but all my Asian friends said that this was the best Hotpot ever. I could see why. Everything was very fresh and I had read the reviews prior to going and the other Google reviews are dead on. After reading those reviews, I was so excited to go. Everything like I said was fresh and high-quality. It is a bit pricey, but worth it, especially in these times.  The service was amazing. I can’t remember the last time I had service like this. Since I’m not Asian, the server came and gave me so much personal attention. She taught me how to use the hot pot,  gave me a bib, even took out my food from the hot pot onto the plate for me. You have to really keep to the two hour time limit though because close to two hours they’re coming and giving you the bill and shooing you out but as long as you know that you need to keep that two hour time limit then it’s fine. The restaurant was very clean and organized. Everyone was very friendly and helpful with smiles on their faces. I highly recommend but it’s hard to get in so you need to make a reservation several days before.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMggyiDt6NNHAXJc-vUUPXcTu4C7s0A-5rqRFrQ&fid=0x0:0x83ce0c8f32692002"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Keisha Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWSBkJW7RrFGbKL6C60hxkSANvnbpvY9YnumLH9HrdDpLQ8AE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Where do I start? Lots of choices, and they keep refilling the food! The food are fresh, plenty, colorful, flavourful, and delicious! It is a bonus that you can choose 2 broth. We were in on our their semi private room and our server was attentive. We told them that it was my friend's birthday and they gave us birthday ice cream. Superb customer service! Highly recommended and will come back. We are very happy that we chose this restaurant to celebrate my friend's birthday.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNL8U4S3z6VmvyOdBTl0WU5BKyY9FoCQ2pIxaY&fid=0x0:0x83ce0c8f32692002"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Andy Chiang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6Ytd6jvLjiUIKjc2DLdidLuwgHbgPUD4GPhFuPOLEoqlZ2vbh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can see why this place is always busy. Reservations are highly recommended and booked well in advance.

For the price point, you get a lot. Will you actually eat the amount you pay? Probably not.

There’s a lot of drinks to have and different foods to try including a small dim sum section. They have a dessert bar with a panda marshmallow, tip, it’s not that good (the marshmallow).

$3 for all you can drink is absolutely worth it. Get the drink package!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN6MJELsgEQOGSEb0kSitOs7Sey8NLIrB3zqBFg&fid=0x0:0x83ce0c8f32692002"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Nate D. Suppanade","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWT5GIFT3fWisDu-ffUjuVaDyKrj5NqWSJjl9Ok7m5pMmYxWgpmJg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This place gets PACKED pretty much every single day, so be prepared to wait! Even on a weeknight we didn't get a table until 9pm, but this place is so good, its worth the wait! You order a la carte from the tablet at your table. The self serve bar has so many options, and the sauce bar also has a huge selection. Definitely one of my top hot pot spots in Vancouver. Don't forget to save a little room for the ice cream at the end!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMPk_KTcSAY388_xfIq7ZoDm6OewUPpGejBzUa&fid=0x0:0x83ce0c8f32692002"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Jane Son","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWja80BS91BFDBjRMWTbbPLFrCV33vuvgI4rfMbObIOgluYb9mtSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is definitely one of the top Chinese hot pot place in Vancouver. It was very hard to make a reservation for the table.
All you can it but the quality is so much better than anywhere in Vancouver.
I will definitely go there again!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkyWjexyIWtza2TL8-OVgXYk9RODBepMjo2bWy&fid=0x0:0x83ce0c8f32692002"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"Jason D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV14HLbc6Ze7JZiJufUEhwiQ1I37e9rPxJ7pjEPsypNxuqatRs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"10/10 ayce hot pot. They have great quality meat, tons of veggies and other toppings to choose from (self-serve). They also serve dim sum, fried buns, and have a dessert bar in the back!

You can stay for 2 hours and they also provide 2 hours free indigo parking for the lot  behind.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKQYmvRSl7UmYZ17JHxfPjpJyjulnXMYLKQ9Y&fid=0x0:0x83ce0c8f32692002"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Mr Brandon Ho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzyNF73ewaY1aF0baxYxE4YtPYi-TsNFUWI6Aoy7uM0JgSfKHY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing AYCE hotpot! Was pleasantly surprised by the choices of food and the fast service. Everything was fresh and tasty. Definitely a good place to get your hotpot meat craving fix. The quality of hotpot meat is also superb.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNH9R3U80D0fN50FJPLiL96GxZJgSfgWjk-C_7W&fid=0x0:0x83ce0c8f32692002"],"When":"2024-11-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ray Jang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3wj8Ne3ngI4eg9ouEU6zPmvERlQuudbckz4ma4Vg6pfYrsWM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tasty Korean fried chicken using boneless thigh meat that was tender and juicy inside while remaining crunchy and flavourful outside. We also enjoyed the tteokbokki as well but I would go for a different flavour next time. Nice to have the ability to choose split flavours for the fried chicken. The meal came with a side serving of pickled daikon which complemented the chicken well. Chicken-Mu is yummy!  Portions were generous considering the price so we left happy and will be planning multiple repeat visits. There are only 4 tables in the restaurant so it seemed just as busy for their takeout orders as their dine in business.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9sF6eCfM9JThWbd1kncPqdryVC3Az3cBb2Of3&fid=0x0:0x11293b86046b521"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Charlene Alimot","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJK49oevTBzIqwreFOt7DPeIa3qXCXxyJ2zOmFgYQExA20Kp8Nm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The service and the food is amazing here! We got the Rose pasta and Tteokbokki, Sweet onion chicken, Cheeseling fries and 2 rice bowls. The rice bowl portion here is also bigger than most restaurants.

Everything tasted so good and when we ate our leftovers the next day, it still tasted amazing.

The restaurant itself is quite small but during our visit it wasn’t busy. Our wait time for food was about 10 mins and they served us our whole order. The staff was attentive and they also have a button on the table to ring them in case they are busy with other task.

BTW, the parking lot is small! That would be my only con but the foods so good, I don’t care.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIIkf-67dSmdlagwdDNEtRGL930ERSdgHr27Xi&fid=0x0:0x11293b86046b521"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"Derek Hansen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXaBRm-VY_m99UwZ6UwdvGjzB7nw1EejvhcMIUbGB5N2HHxrZpHjw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"After passing by several times we decided to stop in. We were not disappointed chicken and one of the passes with the rice cakes. Everything was very good are only complaint is the restaurants itself is very small and has limited seating. Other than that everything was great and we will be returning to try the rose pasta in the future","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOVLRHAxTmNufdzWxl1adp6XycjMRi6G33wa5qy&fid=0x0:0x11293b86046b521"],"When":"2024-4-7"},{"Name":"Loretta So","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUElNmAh8_rcGsVOIIS9zyMqfqrTNBaN3FQmSepG2S-x1n93g71=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It is an excellent place for Korean fry chicken. It is so good that I am willing to drive 45min - 1 hour to come to eat. The only reason I am giving 4 stars to the atmosphere is because the shop is small. Only 4 tables but I like sitting here to eat. You need to come try it out yourself.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"venus cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVV4I_86gAp2DTVQh_V0qc4wcYm8b-iL7eJoGN7tab9oSoHYPA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"ive been to the restaurant before and this is my first time order from them through uber eats and they are VERY generous with their portions. their fried chicken are HUMONGOUS last time i went! bit on the pricey side but for the price and then quantity you get i think its worth!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Katrina S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJd6-wGFmTzITMKEeSjGQGp3DfqBGRibCcIciVZQHeWV-bk_A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"4 of us ate in and it was delicious, quick service, tteokbokki was a great surprise, all the flavours were really good. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPffuVk8JGQbd9sxJD1k_maRpaVI_lmhgE2iSnN&fid=0x0:0x11293b86046b521"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Kevin Le","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUCCAO44045pHQzYeC_i0FVblP2dxKh4FdXEw7zyt63Fkmu2I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It's okay and interesting. The sauce is creamy and rich, but the tappoki in carbonara is quite bland. The chicken is really good! It's juicy, well-battered, and tender. However, I found it unpleasant that the server asked for payment TOO EARLY because I was trying to enjoy my meal and chatting with a friend. The meal was just served about 8 minutes and we haven't finished it yet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPD6kDrsWnGByuYDoeMcTOGPwjeo124MMHSYXl7&fid=0x0:0x11293b86046b521"],"When":"2024-4-9"},{"Name":"Sheryl Zulueta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXm8ZpPG0fhrDifuXYNAgUyQU36ee1c0FHBQ2redFh16L0S64SmfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow! The fusion the world was missing. I'm talking about the carbonara tteobbokki of course. I've been hearing sbout this place from friends and more recently social media. Finally got to give it a try and came in on a weekday evening. There were two tables occupied with only another 2 tables free. The place is small! Though glad we were seated right away.
We ordered the set combo with fried chicken, carbonara and rice balls. The food came out quick. We weren't sure how to eat the rice. We asked and the staff happily showed us and recommended how we eat it. We were given gloves for the rice balls. They were delicious! And we had plenty of left overs between 3 of us. I will definitely come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNalnXIpFndZoahhUtg_ifp2CpQdGRNgZXR2Gh&fid=0x0:0x11293b86046b521"],"When":"2023-11-21"}]

title: Chad Thai Restaurant
descriptions: Snug storefront turning out traditional curries, noodles & other Thai dishes for lunch & dinner.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Emilie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINBA2dcaLJpvKBu6WUpF-u40Klx2AHogwLxG_SrDai5QuKr-hO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Guys I love this place ok it’s so authentic you don’t need to go all the way to Thailand to taste such good food. I also enjoyed the sound of birds in the restaurant","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzmxTcFb8_S1AZ7iv3T0LY-u1my_WNdjmBPQnE&fid=0x0:0xef54a45c6f71290d"],"When":"2024-11-14"},{"Name":"Kimberly W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyEcFWm9KlF1A5qUr48_2k5NqNkBKB28_JBHp8Hk3SydvKzo4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came here as I was told this place was a highly reviewed Thai place. We ordered a pad Thai (no pictures because I was too hungry!!), a khao gra pao with pork, and mango sticky rice for dessert. The pad Thai was pretty good but I wish it came with peanuts for that nice added crunch. The khao gra pao is just okay, I haven’t found anywhere in Vancouver that can make it as good as Pai in Toronto. The mango sticky rice was decent but a touch pricy at $13. However, they give you 2 half mangos vs one and the mango was very fresh so it is decent quality for the price. Overall enjoyed it here but I’m still looking for my go-to Thai food place!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWEdFZ7Ur8iJbKmJ7AmGGKiJIjIvEsZ6kWe3yi&fid=0x0:0xef54a45c6f71290d"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Hoang Do","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOxPs2h8JRBGcTsbMMdPkmFwFVArYTNT_xvGdjLufLs5STQMeUQA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I used to live in Thai for 4 years (and can cook Thai food), and this is the best Thai restaurant I've ever had in Canada. The owner is also very sweet and thoughtful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBY5CnUpYBEVPnY4HveNzdT9IsRc2TRvSVAVZL&fid=0x0:0xef54a45c6f71290d"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"NaNa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-X7HBZOKDIxOzySOMvt3ICpfue2A9nK2S8EJeozX4GbFgU6w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A relatively small and hidden spot with unbelievable delicious food! Love their Thai iced tea, mango sticky rice and pad ga prow!!! However, we weren’t that satisfied with the Tom yum Kong regarding to its portion and price. The taste of their pad thai can be a little bit plain (had better ones else where). Overall, I would say that we will definitely come back sometime!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN64SjzCyHLMmVnYveJfWIYNrfjpr7aFkTg_iPN&fid=0x0:0xef54a45c6f71290d"],"When":"2024-4-3"},{"Name":"Pomo Foods","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKtB6LNlHbrXFav1QsAqWj8IVwhzeHm7gij5nLHRFzUdx3gJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Chad Thai offers a culinary journey with its flavorful dishes that tantalize the taste buds. The menu boasts a variety of authentic Thai flavors that are sure to please any enthusiast of Southeast Asian cuisine. The red curry is a standout, striking the perfect balance between sweet and savory, while the green curry has a delightful aromatic depth that is both comforting and exotic.

However, the dining experience is somewhat marred by the ambiance and service. The establishment has a certain charm but feels a bit outdated and could benefit from a refresh. Service can be hit-or-miss, with some days feeling welcoming and efficient, while others leave you checking your watch and wondering if you've been forgotten.

In summary, if you're seeking delicious Thai food and can overlook the less-than-stellar service and setting, Chad Thai is worth a visit. Just set your expectations accordingly and come for the food, which is undoubtedly the star of the show.

---","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrAbjDmG3M3ZElbGXQ6SoS4z5H1RCgIP5z_Bmg&fid=0x0:0xef54a45c6f71290d"],"When":"2024-3-26"},{"Name":"D. King Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVB1pTIZKXMEaom2kveXGwQIOnn9G4OdGsfjUgp4EjbBifUBYM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My spouse and I are regular customers of Chad Thai. Every time we go, it feels like coming home to a tasty meal.

**Food**:
The food here is always amazing. Throughout the years, we've figured out our top picks, and the quality is top-notch every single time.

**Service**:
The staff knows us so well as regulars. They always greet me by name and are super friendly and attentive. I never have to wait long for my food, which is awesome.

**Value**:
Amazing value for the quality. The servings are huge, and the prices at this place haven't gone up much in the past few years, unlike other restaurants.

We are going to continue coming back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"HC Siu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPhVDSg6OyzySdaQ4nqSCN8GZZSgaDw3nCjnZoCc5WWQ14R3bo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lunch special is good deal.
Food are yummy.
If you are looking for sticky rice mango, must go in summer time.  I was told it is a seasonal dish.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONhM96w5JjLFxraUN4pU2q-CfzVGBsn9EZ7RxJ&fid=0x0:0xef54a45c6f71290d"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"D Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4D0pnJRuugp7xtOoI9Okhc1IdtNuzKocuzhsSBj3gUdos57g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Food: 4/5
Atmosphere: 3/5
Service: 1/5 not present, difficult to get
Wait time: 1/5.

Maybe the Restaurant needs to decline or turn off delivery orders if the restaurant is busy.

Arrived 6pm.
Ordered at 6:10.
Got our starters at 6:30pm.
Finally got our entrees one by one from 7:15pm to 7:40pm.

There is no way it takes 1 hr+ to serve us some fried rice or curry. We ordered at 6:10pm and the final dish (fried rice) showed up 90 minutes later. By the time the last entree showed up, the first entree-person was already finished eating.

The waiter/waitress did not come by to apologize or anything while we were waiting.

This was on a Saturday night.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPydJoTsRgvuRQ8OW-wdTEdRHPPX6WuRdTQgdxV&fid=0x0:0xef54a45c6f71290d"],"When":"2023-10-22"}]
