user_reviews: [{"Name":"Ryan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCDMUY42ah4aAgta84ssT2DYa3PFsR3r4fbxhBdcs3AXShIgTOYw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Small casual spot for Vietnamese sandwiches and coffee. Friendly staff and affordable prices. Banh Mi’s are not bad and lots of options available to choose from.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGm_53BUJ-BeX7bFox1axkMOtSGoQyrj0I9DCP\u0026fid=0x0:0x10ec83ae507993a4"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Alan Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-QmMYfw75kgf5vonVt_7RAAdUJRl5hAF6Ijht6iC6ZE8aPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This fairly newly opened Banh Mi spot is a nice place to visit for dine in and takeout. The staff working are friendly (owner seems to work often) which adds to the genuine experience.\n\nI’ve had most of the Banh Mi \u0026 Coffees and most are all quite yummy 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOu2e8z0q63crdGQQkb0oER0YY4Xisju7M8vM4O\u0026fid=0x0:0x10ec83ae507993a4"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Lister Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWbNvO55wOzkDRxCcJ-fMoCcdWyut5hlx-H_zUreRnwso9_V0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very friendly service. Enjoyed my bubble waffle and mango fruit tea which was very refreshing. Bubble waffle was excellent crispy on outside and chewy on inside like delicious baguette as very hard to do. Must come again and try rest of menu like banh mi sandwich and spring rolls. Came again and tried ube latte and bubble waffle again. Sweet drink and brought waffle home to try. Not as crispy as freshly made so must eat at cafe. Came again today and had chicken banh mi and viet coffee. Bun was crunchy and chewy like good baguette. Viet coffee had nice flavour. Came should and had spring rolls. Nice and crispy with sauce not too heavy. Came again and had beef banh mi even better than chicken. Nice crispy roll with tender meat and crunchy veggies. Came again and enjoyed beef banh mi and mango drink. Nice talking with Jesse and krisy","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWQo_uTBq9qCJRxUJuUqes7JqWqidsWzklgu_4\u0026fid=0x0:0x10ec83ae507993a4"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Snoopy Kitchen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3h-I-trbYva-Tzrs-UNhkQe4Nn1jgsblAcoQ0hPrnUWvugM3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A warm special Vietnamese coffee shop.  They recommend pandan latte and coconut coffee.  Both are very nice and special.  Be careful for those who don’t like sweet.  Next time will try sandwiches.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1tgfM1w_e4vwNdAuhZkXPwRHAjM5MRo6vgk4Q\u0026fid=0x0:0x10ec83ae507993a4"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Arielle Cohen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVyTw6qa0mqOVBu26gbcAk4L-_gY8IZTHgX8aARBQWeDh7xk6sjw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place clearly bakes their own buns and they’re incredible. I got the beef bahn mi and it was absolutely delicious. Super flavourful, tender meat, soft fresh baked bun with crispy edges. I’m drooling just thinking about it! The service was super friendly and fast, I would definitely recommend eating here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFhs0wiqtTP_KliUzX9v1jsCk63aHwcHrKsEVI\u0026fid=0x0:0x10ec83ae507993a4"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"Nhi Pham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3mJcYmcoxsPTHbt_qi19dx9edC5Nrq7YxOuPWYZv-dDjrqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good food, good drink. The bread texture is more crunchy than when I tried couple months ago. Ube fresh milk is one of the best drink for ppl who cannot consume caffeine like me. Overall, decent delivery breakfast order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOLFtHfyZG3ZCSIaMlyATdCoJNkYs8IT3Yb5JZ\u0026fid=0x0:0x10ec83ae507993a4"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"VancouverNina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5VLfmQRJ0DfLj1_hVZGHUnw1VL1WAkqvYpw5-sBEXcl3hHX21=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Saigon Bites on Kingsway in Burnaby, and it was an outstanding experience. This quaint little banh mi shop exudes charm, but what truly sets it apart is its exceptional customer service. The lady who greeted me was incredibly warm and helpful, guiding me through the menu and suggesting the best options for value. I ordered a banh mi and an iced Vietnamese coffee, and both exceeded my expectations. The banh mi was fresh, crispy, and packed with flavor, clearly made with care and attention. The coffee was perfectly refreshing, complementing the meal beautifully. Overall, Saigon Bites offers a delightful dining experience with a genuine touch of hospitality. If you're a fan of banh mi or simply looking to try something new, I highly recommend this gem of a place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3zO2vHV3u3D1ZQ0pvsVWwQxJ5idDU0JkZvXvp\u0026fid=0x0:0x10ec83ae507993a4"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Stephanie Wiriahardja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVGl7u-BPwU-STTGes1q4LjUn1pkii-pr-DOpEzhEi8FNX7NlZsfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious fresh banh mi and extra friendly service! I might come back again soon and do a bit of laptop work there as they also have speedy WiFi and nice big windows!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVWKftuuwb3H-i50IcWVefm4juMi84Yfoiw3Qf\u0026fid=0x0:0x10ec83ae507993a4"],"When":"2024-12-12"}]

title: Chicko Chicken Burnaby (Edmonds)
descriptions: Unassuming counter-serve serving Korean-style fried chicken in a choice of flavors.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Alcohol","enabled":true},{"name":"Beer","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":false}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true}]},{"id":"planning","name":"Planning","options":[{"name":"Accepts reservations","enabled":false}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Paid parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Anthony Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjLBVGvYMuQ_7irAafqyFenF84IHbDebi7uNt8G5dE291E5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Parking lot is pay parking.  Pay for parking or risk getting a ticket while waiting for your chicken.

Half half chicken soy and cheese snow had really good flavour.

Soy chicken and cheese may be on the sweeter side for some but I like it like this.

Pickled radish is a side dish and isn't included.  There are two sizes.

Way back in the day radish was always free with fried chicken.  But I guess not everyone eats this and to prevent the cost of the chicken to increase as much.

Overall must eat KFC (Korean fried chicken) better than churches location close by which has their chicken sitting for long time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGBLAPQmUIXvmNDGpo-7-qBPBGxKTObOGfgCmQ&fid=0x0:0x4c6eed8474d450ee"],"When":"2023-12-31"},{"Name":"Al Kix","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXEnY4bX8UHRuEfONzPk551D2mnW0WEmjlDK-KhaTmdIN43Y7v-4A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Found them totally by accident, after Google Maps sent me to a back alley. Since I love fried chicken, made a sample order to try them out.  Definitely one of the best I have had in the Lower Mainland. Very nice servers & great service , too","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMEjPr0mrojBOp4mKzjFGYAv98zBB_SONU1pLiy&fid=0x0:0x4c6eed8474d450ee"],"When":"2023-12-10"},{"Name":"Lister Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWbNvO55wOzkDRxCcJ-fMoCcdWyut5hlx-H_zUreRnwso9_V0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered Yang Yum chicken and shake fries. Some found chicken too spicy but ok for me. Fast for pickup. -5-20 minutes for pickup.  Next time will order regular flavour","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPymtwblDKKyyl6co2r7mEWKz3FpN4ErjwWDKXO&fid=0x0:0x4c6eed8474d450ee"],"When":"2023-9-11"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice takeout Korean fried chicken. I prefer the bone in option. My favorite is the yangyeom one because it is sweet and spicy. The Padak Padak one is good too as it has a generous portion of green onion on top and comes with a sauce that tastes like sweet soy mustard. The original tastes like a good chicken finger. The chicken quality is good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4-vet0KX2uKxFuSb_lPjmQIEhf_Lie8BpzWvG&fid=0x0:0x4c6eed8474d450ee"],"When":"2023-3-4"},{"Name":"Evelyn W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKN7puiWTfhN7citaJYEm02_jDInbGSRCV0vjW-pu2Y5eOb6CgTw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Korean-style fried chicken in town!!🍗

I ordered a entire boneless chicken with Half/half. There is about ~30 pieces.

🌟Snow show: LOVE IT😍The cheese powder is a bomb💥 PLEASE try it if you haven’t. It’s cheesy but you won’t get bored cuz it gives you a hint of ‘milky cream’ after taste. I couldn’t stop and had almost 10 pieces of them🤣

🌟Buldak: This is considered the classic Korean flavour. It goes the best with a can of iced beer 🍻 It’s slightly more spicy 🌶 than the typical Korean sauce chicken. For whom can’t endure spicy, I suggest to go with yangyeom flavour.

10/10💯i will definitely order again!!!
📍Chicko Chicken","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPu9i5RqgyHGdkab1pegIhR6p3b95MdqABHOYwz&fid=0x0:0x4c6eed8474d450ee"],"When":"2021-7-29"},{"Name":"Da Wanderer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6gUX2zsQKdIE8uVzYWBnKKtvYQAJfEKJppzMJqd4hE4TuUun8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my favorite go to for Korean chicken. My personal favorite is their original boneless and shake shake fries. It's located at the back of the building beside the parking lot. Their service for pick up is efficient. You can either order over the phone or through their app 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsPM1KZchmdAEM0bodMrwqOgot3UIxV8vHBSoW&fid=0x0:0x4c6eed8474d450ee"],"When":"2022-4-8"},{"Name":"Penny Rusty Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkGfXMIDqwS_yD1axTk6tkHoLsnybE2ErvKrHMoMIElMJWekI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Chicko Chicken is a franchise that specializes in Korean fried chicken. Recently, I noticed a small sliver of a storefront open up on Edmonds Street in Burnaby. The thing that caught my eye was that there wasn’t a door to get into the place! As it turns out, the shop’s entrance is actually located in the back parking lot… talk about a hole-in-the-wall!

Your best bet is to put your order in via their app as it takes a while for your chicken to be prepped. I opted for their Half and Half ($24) with a mix of their original and soy garlic chicken (my order also came with pickled radish and a can of pop). In all honesty, both versions were similar in flavour. The good thing is that they know how to make chicken. The outside had a nice crisp to it while the meat on the inside was tender and juicy.

The following week, I decided to try their Padak Padak ($14 for half order) which is their sweet soy-mustard sauce chicken topped off with green onions curls and added a side of their Shake Shake Fries ($3) with cheese seasoning. I’m sure some people like the cheese seasoning on their fries but it didn’t do too much for me.

On the good side, the chicken is just as tender and juicy on the inside as on my last visit. However, there’s not much variety here in terms of flavour. Overall, if you like crispy Korean fried chicken that’s tender on the inside, you’ll probably like this place. But you might get bored with the limited variety.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPw7wsxb25Y0d9S6RctmMWyExehq2yBVszoMPAy&fid=0x0:0x4c6eed8474d450ee"],"When":"2020-10-7"},{"Name":"Adam Dileva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVOYiwibK2x6Nw_n7kkQJySxe33AT_eRmRIK-mYuCNUbgx6Iqww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow.  What can you say about perfection? Skin is incredibly crunchy, chicken is moist and it's not greasy at all. The yangyeom flavor is on a whole other level. The only negative is the pay parking in the back, but you could easily order ahead and grab it. If I could add another star I would.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM65Xn69E8TaYmuJYFvCz_zaszISd1DBO_zt-CD&fid=0x0:0x4c6eed8474d450ee"],"When":"2021-5-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ethan S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXiEvWL_EmGbw7lQnpt_RQwPNPKLiSE6o_ykgcB7esIpvLOzZ00=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food! We ordered the lamb shank and Greek ribs tonight for the first time. Everything was really fresh and wasn't overly spiced, so we can actually taste the meat. The lamb shank was so tender that the bones fell off as I picked the meat and the ribs weren't dry at all. The food is well packaged, really just tells me they care about what they serve to people. Price is way better than all the Greek restaurants I frequent in Burnaby. Will be back for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNZEzx5gEPl2m6gK6OZfozNfGbWKYwfASTifOb&fid=0x0:0x3e486417684d197c"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Esther","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWm4MrcOMcE-MmdjBoKAjDTfZHS26hzehvqwvBxROz7rHTb9kPKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"AMAZING. First time trying Greek food and this BLEW my mind. The salad, the chicken soulvaki, the pita, the POTATOES!!! Amazing amazing. Totally recommend this place. Good price, good portion. I called them to order for pick up and it was ready in 30 mins!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOk69pVrscE-wnkWqsDEWN4FVWyrfRYGBgLsM4E&fid=0x0:0x3e486417684d197c"],"When":"2024-11-21"},{"Name":"Kate Book","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-uTbhpsuLWyCTW0ZjFXFa3uoRFmk5dZYR-a_6LGn6PRojXvIIaA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fresh and flavourful Greek food!

I really enjoyed the shrimp souvlaki, hummus, and Greek yogurt cheesecake, and my partner said great things about the beef wrap, Greek fries, and tiropita. Everything was just freshly made and the staff were very friendly!

As the reviews suggest, it’s mainly a takeout spot—we sat at the one table inside to eat, which can sit a group of up to six people and they also have a little table for two outside.

I’ll definitely be back to try the veggie wrap to go!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0lKgUvW21JU-i-XPUqVDRU0frV2Ntyf79Mjxg&fid=0x0:0x3e486417684d197c"],"When":"2024-6-25"},{"Name":"Kelvin Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYlOJ0ZWKycRqx5ZOzHhnjusnD1vSd-Gno_8IQ4mNi6hmtCYtiSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Solid takeout spot! The 2 lasagnas for $25 and 2 small pizzas for $25 are still a good deal, though they used to be $20, so thanks for that, Trudy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqrLi_8Og4EZhO-X-E3xtqTmrKOByx6QW0ICZX&fid=0x0:0x3e486417684d197c"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Viona Halim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5PMLEtvgkAwv2IjmL8XXm0-Ly_XpBo5Kd0Hv2pxoQ26_Hfy4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came across this unassuming Greek food place from the front at first, but they serve some of the tastiest Greek meals in the city.

The place overall consists mostly of a very large kitchen in the back. They have some dine-in seatings but very limited, which makes me think maybe they serve more take-outs and catering. We showed up at around 8PM on a Saturday evening. There's some people coming by to pick up their orders but overall the place was very quiet. They have some small tables and chairs outside, only to sit 2 people each. But since there's no one there, we opted to enjoy our meals outside to soak up some rare Vancouver evening sun.

Price is fair, portion is good, every single component of our souvlaki meals is seasoned to perfection and the soft pita bread came warm, toasted with slight crispiness outside but fluffy inside and oh, so garlicky! It's heaven.

If you're confused as to why there's no menu inside, there's a large QR code you can scan on the window as you walk through the door to see their digital menu. We'll definitely come back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNV7URwcK6HSwfMRIqv_uEA8nXGI5GrVPH7B_yP&fid=0x0:0x3e486417684d197c"],"When":"2023-5-14"},{"Name":"Jeferson dos Santos Braunn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWycIVD1mLjNX7TSFMAVCAfWYw0rYmXwD2QwIBpVbghucakHEUiwg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing experience at my first time trying Greek cuisine. I arrived there almost at the end of the shift but the team didn’t esitated to take my order and make it as fast as possible. The food was delicious, spectacular and it’s a huge amount of food. I ordered a lamb shoulder roasted which was unbelievable tender and juicy and it came with 2 slices of a delicious fluffy bread. The ambient is cozy, with inside and outside tables and some quotes of Socrates on the wall. Worth the experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMun0AGECcDIxylkEVrqij57-QE6Lr2J7ybbg8m&fid=0x0:0x3e486417684d197c"],"When":"2023-9-16"},{"Name":"Gisele","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhJq-FAsHHvYUFdZ7wbgH09PRy9Q5P5uoKF9sxySHAG7nyOW6V=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Easy 10/10 experience. I had the roast lamb and my boyfriend had the half chicken. Firstly the service was so sweet and pleasant. I thought the prices were on the higher end but the portions were HUGE and made it actually a great value. For us it is easily 2 meals in one each. Food quality was amazing, everything cooked correctly, flavor was perfect. Would recommend this to everyone","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNW_0dumzuDhpN5xrPLIDKvk0BeCe54vqEvseBx&fid=0x0:0x3e486417684d197c"],"When":"2023-8-2"},{"Name":"Anthony Plaxen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0TosyGAQWTqM_XvTHaXfq2jDGHv6ifKWBgTGcJKYnap3ceipL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been wanting to try this place out for along time and had a Greek craving for my lunch today so I decided to try for take out. The food was great, I had a 1/2 roasted chicken meal with the rice, potatoes and Greek salad and it was very delicious and filling.

The portions are very fair for the price and I was quite happy to see everything was organised and in separate containers for my take away order which really made me happy. I have to say any place with an open kitchen where you can see inside the kitchen and how they operate is a good telling sign that the place has good food and a great atmosphere.

Will try different dishes for next time, was pleasantly happy with my order!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJOLVjAFuP-O8ExcBpSjOlIg8vi4pGsp2Es_Fj&fid=0x0:0x3e486417684d197c"],"When":"2023-7-25"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Cyrhinne Manuel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvcQ1wL6mZWoLv55Bs5jrfaSbIKLYaiiC95pQTr1icWAk1RaOufw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The place is wonderful. It was clean and it have a calm vibe to it. Perfect for a get together with friends and family. Food is awesome. The soup was delicious, and the salad it top notch. Very flavourful. We ordered the pasta, I personally recommend the chicken as your add-on. It was so good. Our waiter was awesome too. He’s so friendly and makes sure that our time at the restaurant and food are good. Overall, I would come here much more often☺️ If you’re looking for a good restaurant around Burnaby, you must try this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObI8DWNbQ0LINeD4AC8O7-v41pVzxB77QIijuB&fid=0x0:0x456f82b52454fba1"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Mary Clarin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSfMqtWsBYeEJ97Bbs8hWYgsw744NDknE3gBloJzKg8d6UgfkI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Impromptu date night Tuesday at 8:30pm and the restaurant was fairly spacious! Atmosphere with the decorations, spacing, and music was lovely. We tried the 4 course menu and it was fantastic for the price point. Personal favorite was the spanakopita. We had the chicken souvlaki which was perfectly moist and tasted very comforting. I ordered a rose flavoured gin cocktail which tasted like a floral candy. As someone with a sweet this was delicious! We would definitely come again to try other dishes. Glad to have another good restaurant on our radar!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMaZY3X3xEkIlazn8Va-MfXIHdHYRa4pcLLMl0t&fid=0x0:0x456f82b52454fba1"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"James Kwok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3dZyNZwwn2bgVt-Xa9iDAC2YxhzhlYZ37ZgUsshLxACOu5uFSYg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We had our family dinner of 26 people at the back of this restaurant in the enclosed porch area with a couple of heaters in a rainy, windy evening of June 14, 2024. It turned out the origin of this restaurant was my neighbour back 50 years ago in 1972 on East 2nd Ave, Vancouver with my first house then. The food, service and drinks are tops , some dishes tend to be on the salty side with fatty cheese. Steaks and lobster tails were perfectly done. The prices are not high end prices because it is a neighbourhood steak house. I had the pleasure to meet the original owner who also dined at the restaurant. It was quite a meeting after 50 years.👏👏👍👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVaHHG9tL0dmkzuWPHC-t_Rk2C_3Kshwk2H9A4&fid=0x0:0x456f82b52454fba1"],"When":"2024-6-19"},{"Name":"Livia Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVie7wYIYnTNy_iOqvWMwiX-xgJH8Iz1_hWskpK-wZj63ZZMmbP6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The 6 of us came for dinner at Little Billy's. We ordered the platter so that we could sample different items. The food was delicious, good portions, reasonable prices, and good service. We don't live in the area but we're really glad we tried this restaurant out. I would like to go back to try other items on the menu 😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcQylyvmwJutrmTKh_wQz_vUR3xTihlMuqAmxH&fid=0x0:0x456f82b52454fba1"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Kenny Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPZZirBvo0A4h9mBsQTblhWpjRI5s3b9jzZsDmMvuAnSg24xg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered the Greek platter for 4 people. Lots of food we couldn't finish it so had lots to take home. The vegetables were boiled which we're not used to so they were overcooked for us. Leo the owner came by to check if we liked the food and chat. Friendly and fast service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhCV0GZiOq0qyD96BmOz_xyTv6uxIjr1OucwjP&fid=0x0:0x456f82b52454fba1"],"When":"2024-5-30"},{"Name":"Rizwan Kheraj","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIPHKcCo8uU5LP5qZlFAIePscvt-QD0lpwzMtX5DseHyD4k5xdu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time visit for us - had the chicken livers appetizer, a green salad, the roast lamb main dish, and the seasonal desert plus an ice cream sundae. The livers were a little undone, the salad was amazing, the roast lamb with rice, roast potatoes, fresh vegetables, and pita bread was delicious, and the deserts were good. The service was reasonable. The place was quite empty but it was a Tuesday evening so to be expected. The prices were quite high but overall the dining experience was good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-eSNDzxIZfLLBl3_u4D48y-fRLnY6H9Jj27_x&fid=0x0:0x456f82b52454fba1"],"When":"2024-5-22"},{"Name":"Melinda W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqFa91nGQX9-WVxFZ-rAUul10GF70bhWZFQZe97ymoPVUZrvFxnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We were here to celebrate a friend's birthday. The dinner menu running from Mon to Thur caught our eyes as it seemed to be a good deal for a 4-courses dinner for $35. It incluedes a soup, a salad, a main (choose from 4 cloices) and an ice cream sundae. Most of us ended up with this menu.

The soup was lemon chicken rice soup which I found quite refreshing. The salad was a standard mixed greens. For the steak and prawns, I was quite disappointed to find my steak well done despite the fact that  I ordered a medium rare. The server was very kind upon noticing and replaced my steak with another one which had the correct doneness. However, the steak was a bit too salty. The ice cream was nothing worth to mention.

We ordered a few bottles of wine plus a few starters for sharing. There were 15 of us, and the bill was almost $1100 excluding tips. Not too bad with the amount of food and drinks we had.

I don't find the food impressive. Everything is just mediocre. Service is good though. Our server is very attentive and friendly. But I doubt that it is enough to make me revisit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEWhJDUQjW3pylaju0T1hmAq97sdvv0LYbnc1M&fid=0x0:0x456f82b52454fba1"],"When":"2024-4-19"},{"Name":"Yoshiko C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKtcsZOlyd8taDwX9F7EkmkehI4-UW_WG9O9oyFRNdwVNmFnuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A surprise after entering the restaurant. Interior is way better than the outside. Service was great. Food was great as well, esp the souvlaki.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzmm2MH4NFlxsaAt8tXGD7RxJr7HtGn8Mhc9DM&fid=0x0:0x456f82b52454fba1"],"When":"2024-7-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Gabriel Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVoIrBEf8Dgrvi0kyQ9NebghbD-2VthONhYdJPxnnS9NpvE2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Gluten free Chinese food! Yes, you read that correctly! Actually gluten free Chinese food. Including the battered meats! This is the first time I’ve ever encountered a gluten free Chinese food restaurant!

I got their most popular dish: the sesame chicken. It’s the first fried Chinese food I’ve had since getting celiac disease. The crispy fried chicken was delightful! It was served very hot and they prepared it so quickly too. It had great cuts of chicken too.

The associate who I talked with on the phone was very kind and courteous and worked hard with her staff to get my food ready quickly as I was in a rush.

This restaurant only adds 3 minutes to your route when you go from Vancouver back to the US!

5 stars!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOa18Wu7AJ9y4h-sxeP5G3SOdct0JtQQEnJD_Y&fid=0x0:0x4b00bf75e7768527"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Elise Weatherby","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXi-zWo5LAojkvd1S-ezncllOB0dbnpqeMHRld4Z0EwpSgkAD8y2A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"For a take out only place I was pleasantly surprised. We ordered their dinner for 4 combo and it fed our family of 5 plus leftovers. Everything was hot and fresh absolutely nothing spicy which was great for my kids. The Ginger beef was crispy with a sweet sticky sauce, sometimes this dish can be a bit spicy but this one was very sweet same with the sweet and sour pork. I like that the chow main was sent in 2 separate containers one had the stir fried noodles, the other veggies and sauce so we could mix this at home it was not soggy. The fried rice was nice nothing fancy simple fried rice but did not taste old or like it had been sitting around. The spring rolls not pictured were classic deep fried rolls we got them fresh out of the fryer too hot to eat actually. Over all everything we had tasted freshly prepared to order. The only thing I will note is the food was very saucy and ran on the sweet side again this was perfect for my kids. If I was ordering here again I would go with some steamed rice because the dishes were so saucy and perhaps had a spicy dish to the order for myself.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNh1BYHN5HxUt7qVL-y4loQTkpt20g8-bFAdrWS&fid=0x0:0x4b00bf75e7768527"],"When":"2023-6-27"},{"Name":"Madeline Minten","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXssDXZIrKkLWybs6P38RylRYuccT1mHgLxm_9CqoU4yg9qTz7o=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I wish I could rate this place below 1 star. My entire family has celiac disease and we all got severely glutened here. When I called the place to tell them what happened they claimed that I was lying and that it is not true. We are throwing up, feverish, have rashes and severe stomach pain. It is not ok to gaslight your customers and pretend that their issues are not valid. When I asked for a refund since that’s the least they can do for causing our entire family to be sick, they said that they wouldn’t. Do not go here if you have celiac disease!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael Persaud","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIUh9MayxMzneX1EAAx4JO--HsFzyaoxoSbvnENXuUrC2KCaNR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finding Chinese food is fairly easy in the LMD but finding good GF (gluten free) Chinese is hard. This is probably the only place that does it and it is really good. Would highly recommend for gf and non-gf eaters. 2 of us got 4 dishes and rice and had enough for 4 or more so definitely worth it price wise. Wish they had a Surrey location!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCpjy9m8jqrAH-mdmUhUhGfWpMyqqChPHWJoaG&fid=0x0:0x4b00bf75e7768527"],"When":"2023-1-16"},{"Name":"Sean Corrigan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ0iqZpyN13Zl92ROGqzEUJbv63KkRBTwJIIXnyCmgKXRyPGg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is excellent Canadian style Chinese takeaway, that gets bonus points for being gluten free.  This made our family dinner much easier, as my niece is celiac, and they take real care about ensuring that they are truly gluten-free.  The service was good, and the food was ready when they said it would be.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stephen Long","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVhpRns8VZT1aEWXyNZxQYIc1Qgzslo_WEtpzbdWhm9PHCVRnGLVw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I tried the almond chicken, satay chicken, and pork wontons. The satay chicken was cooked perfectly, lean, and the peanut sauce was good. The almond chicken was good. If the batter were a little less/thinner it would have allowed the chicken to come though a bit better. The gravy was thinner than what I'm used to with almond chicken, but it was ok. I liked the pork wontons although the meat was packed tight which gave a firm texture.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCBfCvFWI5NI1iVicnyI8pqCX8q9RLWJaVdq7e&fid=0x0:0x4b00bf75e7768527"],"When":"2023-4-13"},{"Name":"Jay Dubya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfMlUVFBOTYnkMhZMzBI9QuByFvWzHVqFvyDc6x7TrOUiB7t5s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst take out of the year award goes too:
Chili Dragon. We were really busy on Friday and thought we would give this place a chance. I am not one to post a really negative review, I try to be objective and fair in all my reviews... but this was truly bad. What you see in the pic is the remainder of what no one would eat after the first few bites. The honey garlic chicken was very bad...and I am not sure what it was because the texture was very weird and the pieces were shaped like a pork chop that was cubed.   The chicken with vegetables was more like 3 day old soup of some kind and the sweet and sour pork tasted like it had been quickly defrosted and dunked in the current sauce then thrown in the container. Both pork's had strangely soft texture and no crispness to be found anywhere. The rice was ok, but it's hard to mess up rice. Truly a waste of $60+ as what you see went in the bin this morning. No second chances with this place...hard no put next to their phone number in my phone in case I get confused in a year and can't remember which place it was.
Epically bad.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_Xkb19eLvkoJnJbwKYWCWFMswTkK54leaxVan&fid=0x0:0x4b00bf75e7768527"],"When":"2022-11-26"},{"Name":"NDS Investments","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVikPs6WOuTzc-E92-sZ1BLaCA6XPNBLrLbmLXnMK-Mmkbrg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always reluctant to try a new Chinese restaurant based on previous experiences with bland soggy food....

Being new to the area, we decided to give Chili Dragon Chinese Restaurant a try.  Four dishes for takeout; portions a tad bit smaller...but WOW.  Amazing!  Food tasted delicious and was steaming hot....even the kids had seconds!

Recommended to several others already, will be ordering again in the near future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMs7CK8ZCyoPzYvsPpP1FXnMaU3eXwm98LisJ8l&fid=0x0:0x4b00bf75e7768527"],"When":"2021-9-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"LCarter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrOiIliZfXxF2Dv3YqBC31I2tCTpoYMMTwJNQiB9J70GYGP-Wk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"OMGOSH!!!! 🤩 If you're looking for an unforgettable dining experience in Burnaby, Cayenne Bistro and Grill is an absolute must-visit‼️From the moment you step inside, you're welcomed with warmth and hospitality that makes you feel like part of the family. The service here is hands down the BEST I've encountered in the area – attentive, knowledgeable, and genuinely caring.

The food is nothing short of exceptional. Each dish is a masterpiece, with spices blended by hand to create the perfect balance of flavors. Whether you're enjoying a traditional recipe or a unique fusion creation, you can taste the passion and expertise in every bite. The portions are generous, leaving you fully satisfied but also wanting to try more from their diverse menu.

What really stands out is the care the owner takes in explaining each dish. It's clear he’s dedicated to sharing his love for food and ensuring every guest has an outstanding experience. If you haven’t been to Cayenne Bistro and Grill yet, I highly recommend it!!! You won’t find a better combination of exceptional food, fantastic service, and a welcoming atmosphere anywhere else in Burnaby!!

PS Sorry there aren’t more pictures.. we were too busy being blown away by the food and eating 🤤","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMkIGDa-FXuk4N1dGHBbAd4CQtugm60SEzApE-&fid=0x0:0xe0b90bac87ba83e7"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Viviene Tiu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKNqk663Vr0DqIWT9OTeSE7G21st9EUYu0Kd-kHQYWotRWT_TCy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The moment you walk in, you can feel a sense of warmth as well as a very ambient atmosphere that keeps you feeling refreshed.  We were greeted by the staff and owner with such a warm and friendly welcome and the service was amazing! I highly recommend this place. The family that runs this place are so down to earth and friendly and they truly gave us an experience! The food itself is cooked by the family and it was amazing. Every dish was so authentic and flavourful! Such a burst of flavour and culture in every bite! Very rich in flavour! Definitely an experience! Loved it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNa2lHMq8c7MHamdDAl065IxdqMZigPTfQD3Ltj&fid=0x0:0xe0b90bac87ba83e7"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Nadia Walji","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXjJORZKfa7jR66NmxZy6R_7vnNl2M1FPci6UOol5l4INi4WAzJjA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As someone with family roots in East Africa and Northern India, I can confidently say this restaurant offers a phenomenal dining experience. The food was exceptionally tasty, capturing the authentic flavors of our heritage without being greasy. Every dish we tried was perfectly seasoned and well-prepared. The blend of East African and East Indian influences was evident in the delightful, rich flavors. My family and I thoroughly enjoyed our meal, and we can't wait to return. Highly recommended for anyone seeking delicious, authentic cuisine in a warm and welcoming atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPd-mDV0RBGlYoUmzoerAYPrfpMiD5dxBs06nps&fid=0x0:0xe0b90bac87ba83e7"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Israt Jahan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUGLh9yB2qVdZGIbYpQJ5Mon3-2NjEqAny7q46XimuvNTnMNA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m upgrading my rating to 5 stars as I am so satisfied after my recent visit for the weekend dinner buffet.
We visited this restaurant every weekend in August after trying their food through online delivery. This clearly shows how much we enjoyed Cayenne Bistro's food, and their hospitality. I appreciated how they took our feedback seriously and made adjustments to the buffet menu. I highly recommend their Beef kabab, Chicken Rafiki, well-balanced sweet Gulab Jamun, and house-made soft naan. It’s a great spot for hanging out with friends and family. The owners are fantastic—they treat you like family and ensure you're comfortable with both the food and service. I also value a clean restroom, and Cayenne meets that standard. I definitely plan to return for their beef kabab.

4 star review from August 18:
We enjoyed the Sunday Brunch buffet on 08/18. Food was fresh, coming hot from the kitchen to our plates. I loved the spring rolls, puri with bateta, kashmiri chicken and sev. Aloo paratha and raita, pickles were ok. I wish they added tea to the buffet. But I must admit the buffet was neat, fresh, non greasy, made my tongue and tummy feel good. This was the third time I had their food. First time we ordered online the Zanjibar Kuku paka platter, a chicken curry with coconut milk comes  with boiled egg and naan. It was tasty,but a bit pricier compared to the qty. Next we visited on a weekend to try the Choma platter. Taste was good, but the amount of rice was very little for this platter. They could have added few slices of naan/roti to complete the platter if not increasing the rice portion.
Overall good experience. The ambience was nice, saw many people picking up big orders for family gatherings. I must appreciate the hosts -the lady and gentleman, both the owners. They made us felt welcomed, a good host indeed. Hope to visit again to try the appy platter soon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxbFuxU9ZmKIIyHPvomBj_DNe1yooJTjR6B2kJ&fid=0x0:0xe0b90bac87ba83e7"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"elisabeth kaunang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLHXh9nk8bssGh4AgVeZdtpa9EEcQ5OOp-FFyTm761U4MP7jA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had lunch today, because My friend's birthday.
We ordered pakora chart,  chicken briyani and beef combo I forgot the name, the foods were delicious combination between Indian and South Africa.
The owner was very nice, I will recommend my friend to come there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXWGs9DakzJ3ceC7EIwOGQChEFgH6xeuMQ-YLH&fid=0x0:0xe0b90bac87ba83e7"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"Colleen Holub","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKO1WzHcSqrCCWQx7vic0N30o2vhvXQFKloHf9C4kWeBcgXu4U=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our 4 top enjoyed mango lagers, an appy platter and veg pakoras to start. Then we shared a Choma platter with yummy nylon bhajia, Cayenne garlic prawns, Kashmiri chicken. Everything was delicious and flavoured to perfection. Highly recommend!

There was a singer performing with an amazing voice range and was just right for a small dining atmosphere; enjoyable and fun but never intrusive as we could still carry on conversations.

I regret not taking photos before digging in but honestly the aromas were just too enticing to wait!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYisDgFCOFM2PoykRMkZRlIUI2YDQamNgCRtJj&fid=0x0:0xe0b90bac87ba83e7"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Sun Sweet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLN5z4nSI612GymIVSJn93C1itBrfQFV01dREzLb3PUHvl92w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a great restaurant. We double-dated with our friends here. The food is terrific. There were some spicy choices but I'm sure you can ask for more milder versions. This restaurant has a warm atmosphere and a family as your hosts. The owner explained that his wife is the cook behind the scenes. For the most part, we asked the host/server to recommend the food. I find that this is a good way to experience authentic ethnic cuisine. And there are also alcoholic drinks which you might enjoy that you will never find at your mainstream liquor store. We will definitely come back to this restaurant to try the dishes that we didnt order the first time there.
By way of reference, we eat out frequently and I rarely ever leave a review despite having eaten at many wonderful establishments. I'm writing this review because we were very impressed by the tasty food and friendly atmosphere.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sweet Home Mama","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVm4XPshkHIQoehsd5AjzaEeVaUQZEGWKTr6x0hM7K7qb-W_Pxb=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Hair found in curry (looks like someone’s mustache)

Chicken way too tough

So many little pieces of chicken bones

This is not the right quality customers should be getting for this price

Moreover, there was a big event going on when I came in to pick up my food and I couldn’t walk to the front to get my food because of the crowd who was all standing and blocking the hallway, and the waiters weren’t doing anything about it. Seeing a change in the waiter’s attitude after seeing a receipt showing no tips (since it was a takeout) was very disappointing. I didn’t appreciate some food pieces sitting on top of my to go container as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQiUswuv9DgT_s2m_ngRjKw_B-HXkGrcb31-m9&fid=0x0:0xe0b90bac87ba83e7"],"When":"2024-11-3"}]

title: Gaya Sushi
descriptions: Sushi & Japanese kitchen fare, including noodles & tempura, are served in a casual, dark-wood space.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"J Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI3XzCXx8zebpE2gW1eZ--Jd2S9EKszgFUc_2IPPK9INTTc-A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We've come to Gaya for many years but less frequently in last 2 years.  This may be our final time.  My daughter likes chicken katsu and this time there was barely any chicken.  In her words, "It seems to be all crisp, no chicken".  Chicken was really flat and half the cutlet area had no chicken, just deep fried batter that you are getting.  Disappointed and they need to do better.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNp5pH6tW03oYSP8-UDxpQvuaM1G6KOgUreoVF6&fid=0x0:0xc086a3deb81a63d7"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"TJ Harmony","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpo3SDHChk5juhkHGFNwkt6PotJMtbI0WdBI4KSOGhEA0NJrJb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Gaya Sushi seems to be a popular pick-up service spot. While I was there, the door was revolving, with takeout orders being picked up

The restaurant is clean and had ample seating. Free parking out front with easy access to Lougheed Hwy.

Prices are on par with the current economy. Everything is getting so expensive, but that's across the board in Vancouver.

Service is friendly, and what I noticed was that EVERY time that front door opened,  the staff greeted the person walking in. That made it feel inviting

Food tasty. I took a few pics. Tea nice and warm. Yam roll good. Avocado salad nice. Chopped scallop was ok

I'll be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOu8j7sZ2EuNrDhy7OI66sb6xa5kdfxHeIKHH4g&fid=0x0:0xc086a3deb81a63d7"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Sang Byun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL---GiNZPsVun9YOiTzJF8vrqUgbdLGwunK0hL_IjsHXdNGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Last call take out we had, and it was the worst sushi we ever had in Canada.  Rolls were all broke down, and the rice tasted very old. Noodle was disgusting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN48Wtsl84Pf4tX0u6_LfGbWn2pxK6zRw_1JukY&fid=0x0:0xc086a3deb81a63d7"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Martin Robson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWehMUrDWFUDZTrvsuW46-2NojidJg74A3-LRRLCnrTdxLQ4p3xZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Food wasnt good. The teriyaki sauce was cold and had lumps. The rice bowl didn't have much rice either. There's better in a 5km radius.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMc0oigeBzTFd3QItC2Pnqg9KuE0Z1MBFwz5Uss&fid=0x0:0xc086a3deb81a63d7"],"When":"2024-6-7"},{"Name":"KF","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU42dxqIM8kc-ZSoF46gLvjVhJGwjnkOLO92L8Fb9ilOYPLqXun=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been going for over 5 years but never left a review. I would say it’s the best sushi in Vancouver. Try the crazy girl roll.
Great service great food. Very chill","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiZRJ23UAJFnCzoN5RlcW6rVkpkxStZU_1RH-X&fid=0x0:0xc086a3deb81a63d7"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"Ernestyna Pietruć","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBka56BKWMwIpCnLyUWXfY5YVk9N5__pq5fHRn_wrAeaHTgIJTWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This sushi restaurant is a very good sushi spot. The prices are very reasonable, and the quality of the ingredients is top-notch. Everything is incredibly fresh. The service is also commendable—efficient and friendly. It's the perfect place for a delicious and affordable sushi experience. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOe2-MORFWj7McxwWRw_vQOyJLZ-FckK8h7CfFz&fid=0x0:0xc086a3deb81a63d7"],"When":"2024-6-27"},{"Name":"Dave Martinez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJOK-O8UJrPfgzdIwaky3UcP2E0-gMEfpC0wJ03F35oXZ5Hww=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The 2 for 1 California rolls are pretty small in diameter. Also, for $10.95 on Uber eats ($9.75) in restaurant, the Fire Cracked roll is very small. I was expecting a specialty roll size for that price. The roll was super tasty though!

Please make your portions a bit bigger.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqNMqZIJgB5lUp-s-2KdVU7vz_WvtW7h5q25rW&fid=0x0:0xc086a3deb81a63d7"],"When":"2024-4-22"},{"Name":"Chris Van Luven","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2h20svqHRt1zmTV8Q_6syn8tS3URWzdAtBXtqTx6mx0KnZFDu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I like Gaya, been a patron for years. It is the only decent sushi restaurant in the area, and it’s always fresh and tasty. Parking sucks, it can be quite loud inside, but if you’re looking for decent quality and a clean environment, definitely hit it up.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObmK5nOcN2VTtAljTp1TRiqUmdcVJpbDUeUXLn&fid=0x0:0xc086a3deb81a63d7"],"When":"2024-6-16"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Justine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiTXgXAKna0kx8mDrqZ41WtbWHEvpzA1eUM-KHY57t8aciXZ4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our server Jasleen, was very helpful and knowledgeable. She gave is great recommendations and explained the dishes well! Because of this, we were able to order beautiful and delicious food! The food itself is amazing! My favorite are the lamb chops and the coconut curry! So yummy!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMoHYCyqOcg1cxNLqOH1M1aONGgwqeMHJv9ndXD\u0026fid=0x0:0xf3c1b75745dcbca2"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Maria K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUh4lKKr9VI0HgSJGAG3ecDz6inptcxXELj94c06rab8vHKpOcPtQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Edit: In response to the comment - I've ordered a side order of coconut rice (not the one that already comes with the curry), and it was no coconut flavour at all (spicy yellow rice in the photo). But thanks for responding.\n///\nGot a take out tonight for the first time. Lamb curry was great, but instead of a side order of coconut rice they gave me yellow very spicy rice. I just can't understand how it's possible to mix up such a simple order. I'd try other dishes next time, but I'll be checking my bag before leaving the restaurant:)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCuz-3pUy1wDFCdOdrnTkzSjY4sGqtFwmzZ4P5\u0026fid=0x0:0xf3c1b75745dcbca2"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Anoop Arunan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_K_sQAM-iiTr5XdEr-OslQ-F5KXFamFwV0fmV5pgrcMvXsbkTxA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved the cozy atmosphere, super friendly service and nice food. The quantity of the food is impressive and there was not much waiting time. I became a fan of the special masala chai too here. Overall a great experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYzOaFpLi_SOcDBaqFnbGJ7Q_c80bE4l4UoW3e\u0026fid=0x0:0xf3c1b75745dcbca2"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Nick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGjptqH3FdoeLfdSjPWQygL5KEsM_ui4pClg77BekGUD0E-Q_8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is just a take out review. Ordered from Doordash, asked for the food to be made extra spicy, it still came bland, and maybe they put an extra effort to make it extra bland and unsalted. I'm not sure why would you do the exact opposite of what's been asked of you in special requests. Food is pretty flavourless, bunch of colors added to make it visually look appealing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7UgylP8eGbDHqpr3y8-m85dQIQrxDx_UyiTOA\u0026fid=0x0:0xf3c1b75745dcbca2"],"When":"2024-6-11"},{"Name":"Davincia Givenchi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI3KxxpeUDYoBSkZ23cB2qu64tE6gg4gMydP7jmlg-rMantWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best best best butter chicken.We’ve tried so many Indian cuisine places and nothing compares.They’re butter chicken is never watery like others.Butter chicken is always nice and thick with a rich brown colour.The price is very reasonable and affordable.My boyfriend and I come here every month and they never disappoint.Very kind customer service also.Love love love THANK YOU","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKanqRzo6hcz-NpR02gUQQKqqVON-oQDCXd8BX\u0026fid=0x0:0xf3c1b75745dcbca2"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"abrar faiyaz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLxtFF7uQPXf2jCAqVO4haxlByo_4_XTZTpp8G0yLFM4_CL7II=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent food. We tried pulao rice, butter chicken, lamb vindaloo and butter naan. Lamb vindaloo stole the show. Our server Jasleen was the best. Huge shout out to her for her friendly service. Definitely recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBA4SQ3Y8uzz1XCXpxnTNglp2cAgONCFmDXfIJ\u0026fid=0x0:0xf3c1b75745dcbca2"],"When":"2024-6-21"},{"Name":"Ben Cynthia Langstaff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJLRdWtHGFn_AIcXGmKfDk_2Osei38I0sKfrkHwLA_qe1XLcg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very flavourful, hot and fresh food. We ordered two samosas and they were huge and fresh. So yummy and good portion sizes. My belly was happy. Great service from Jasmine or Jasmeen. Highly recommend this restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjZ5E_2w0eMvNNH_CarI3guNC3SdbCp8xU0SvW\u0026fid=0x0:0xf3c1b75745dcbca2"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Aboozar Ketabi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1iGEheyGTiJs-t5gIuMvrxeLE5iB8ue-Vm5SyYj_sOfA835hy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Paneer Lababdaar and Desi Mix Grill were both delicious and highly recommended. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Chuyi Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_Q_BJ3SXHv4HWXrYhO71njhol5VPNjhZtYX7rj0qlh9TEH8s=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Honestly one of the best sushi takeout I’ve been to🥰taste is SOOOOOO phenomenal! I mean initially I find the price a bit pricy(not expensive but definitely not cheap), but with the taste and ingredients(plus the amount they give) it’s worth the cost. It’s already on my list of “visit again” whenever I crave for sushi hahahah and I’ve been here a few times. Atmosphere is just pretty nice as a takeout only place, I’m not expecting a seat when I wait for my food and the storefront seems quite clean to me.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcJmQLAcpeJ9C0KgzXie-kuZJ9PNzFXntkIdyG&fid=0x0:0xca745a666fdfe3ef"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Maria M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmuhUB-INQ3XCbE2M9HT-MdzILSuqxW6ls6tLvy0JgUoxl1f3wCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"High quality take out sushi spot. Yes the wait is long, be prepared. But once you eat here, you’ll forget about whichever sushi spot you used to eat from. It’s fantastic! I absolutely loved that it comes with a layer of sesame seeds, most places are incredibly cheap about it and I have to beg them to add more. Take it to the park and make it a date ;)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYvNEacfphvzitR95gEYTsMOccezK7oEa5Pmvq&fid=0x0:0xca745a666fdfe3ef"],"When":"2023-7-13"},{"Name":"Chris Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVh0jzGmL0AT4SDv2HIKUxBlQ5BwdXAf3IgzgyScxD1WduHm6U=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Ordered through Ubereats last night and bit into a fish scale EACH in TWO different Tuna rolls; the negi tori maki roll and the spicy tuna roll.

Packaging was inadequate. Takeout bag was dripping soy sauce because of the way the soysauce containers were all stacked in a single vertical column on top of the boxes and improperly secured.

Dragon roll was pretty good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEoQr6NJzW8nxaazCfk6YGR-e-XsIJ0QL28aRu&fid=0x0:0xca745a666fdfe3ef"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Justine Yiu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8H-B1DNcZxcUZKDHNDSXoUVkKJCpyVVXJKhAY4JEGWFkxFKd5Gw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of our go-to sushi takeout spots. Quality and packaging has been consistent. Rolls are fresh and the crunchy ones stay crunchy

Good rolls:
Mango yam
Mushroom
Spicy Salmon
Aburi tuna
Lavender","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOoMg6fftq4VP79EniLzIj0-Zh8WH7pr6JEMDT7&fid=0x0:0xca745a666fdfe3ef"],"When":"2022-12-20"},{"Name":"Michelle Hillock","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJrzRoOQIhVr_Azv33mg4FgqnXjS5clP8SiddvR3MVEWC9e9w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A unique take out only neighborhood Japanese and sushi food service. They do not have dine in -- ever. Their business model is strictly delivery and take out.

The best on their menu are the rolls. They taste well balanced, well seasoned, and fresh.

I was disappointed by the Aburi, in my opinion, the toppings were too thin and it was too saucy and oily, which completely masked  sushi taste. Unbalanced with too much rice.

Open relatively late. Service was fine.

They are realllllly busy during peak periods. And the ordering apps might not be able to account for that ... So you might get a 20 minutes wait time from the website/app but it may not be correct.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5LphpXaCRCGPoOnLINqAmR7eCSdHNyplgMK-N&fid=0x0:0xca745a666fdfe3ef"],"When":"2022-2-1"},{"Name":"Penny Rusty Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkGfXMIDqwS_yD1axTk6tkHoLsnybE2ErvKrHMoMIElMJWekI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Recently, I noticed a Japanese place show up on my radar that’s located in a mini mall along the busy Burnaby/New Westminster border. From past experience, most of these places are just your run-of-the-mill quick sushi places that are nothing to write home about. So I was actually pleasantly surprised by the variety of Japanese fare that FusionCore serves up.

First off, this place is quite small and strictly take-out. But that doesn’t mean that they don’t have quality ingredients. I ordered their Aburi Oshi Salmon ($10.50) with torched salmon with jalapeno and special house sauce as well as a piece of Fatty Tuna Belly Nigiri and Fatty Salmon Belly Nigiri ($2.50 each).

Just look at that fatty salmon belly… mmmm! On this visit, I didn’t think the nigiri was as tender as I expected but it was still pretty good.

Aburi oshi sushi is a pretty trendy item in Vancouver right now and this was pretty spot on. Definitely going to try some of their other versions in the future.

I came back a few days later to try their Assorted Nigiri ($14.95) which included octopus, fatty salmon belly, salmon, tuna, wild salmon, scallop, surf clam, and fatty tuna nigiri. I think their menu actually said that it should have included tai instead of hokkigai but the surf clam actually was pretty good. This time, the fatty salmon belly and fatty tuna belly were more melt-in-your-mouth. But my favourite of the bunch has to be the hotate… the scallop was so tender and buttery.

On my next visit, I tried their Aburi Oshi Scallop ($10.50) with capelin roe and avocado… a nice and creamy version.

I liked their Chicken Karaage ($6.95) which had a perfectly crispy exterior with juicy boneless chicken meat on the inside.

I finally tried one of their sushi rolls with a classic BC Roll ($5). A relatively cheap price for a filling roll. If I were to nitpick, I’d say that there was a bit too much rice in the roll for my liking but it wasn’t too bad. I also added a couple of pieces of Salmon Belly Nigiri and Hamachi Nigiri ($2.50 per piece) and I’ve got to say that their nigiri is pretty spot on.

The one item that I found a bit lacking was the Pork Cutlet Curry ($12.50) that I tried in November. Now, part of this is probably because curry doesn’t travel well in take-out containers. Since they didn’t keep the curry sauce separate, it was soaked up in the rice by the time I ate it. Also, the pork cutlet wasn’t as crisp on the outside as I’d like it to be (again, probably due to the nature of having this as take-out). Also, I felt the pork itself was a bit on the chewy side.

Overall, I’ve pretty impressed with the sushi and sashimi quality here and it’s a great take-out option in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOC2CT7OCXnWBOJC8pUdaz5ETWG-65muY4-FRYg&fid=0x0:0xca745a666fdfe3ef"],"When":"2020-11-8"},{"Name":"Joyeeats. ca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5pPfXPjXCAKyqZiXyJpDO5kz6nxwzwNADzRj09FgbrU8maWy_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"📍Fusion Core, Burnaby
💵 Price: $12 per platter
🤤Taste: 4.6 / 5
🕯Atmosphere: NA
🪑Seating: NA
📈 Price Performance ratio:  4.9 / 5
Retention Rate: 100%

ℙ𝕣𝕠𝕤:
🍣 great pricing
🍣 excellent sashimi to rice to sauce ratio
🍣 has relatively thick sashimi topping
🍣 has quite a bit of oshi selections
🍣 delicious - nothing was disappointing
🍣 across of Hiel cafe with my favourite soufflé pancakes !!

ℂ𝕠𝕟𝕤:
🍣 take out only

𝐅𝐢𝐧𝐚𝐥 𝐓𝐡𝐨𝐮𝐠𝐡𝐭𝐬:
🍣 hidden gem! It’s better than Miku or minami or green leaf
🍣 Located at the border of burnaby and new west
🍣made it to one of my favourite restaurant for aburi oshi sushi
🍣 wouldn’t suggest the tuna or salmon belly. It’s yummy but the normal salmon aburi had a better price performance ratio","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxyfBhWahkgN8tWG57SEAajDFgZTKFxH5kn9S4&fid=0x0:0xca745a666fdfe3ef"],"When":"2021-9-1"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Quality, tasty, take-out sushi. The BC roll was good. The deluxe sashimi was thick cut and fresh. The aburioshi salmon sushi was creamy and had nice spice from the Jalapeño on it. The aburioshi scallop was sweet and creamy. Great place to pick up good takeout sushi. Not gourmet, but pretty good quality.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNULdcVimj6xY_C0JaTzxh-EGghAZnZIxgMQK7k&fid=0x0:0xca745a666fdfe3ef"],"When":"2022-5-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jennifer Chien","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-uYhM0OXW4Bap9syuvpsHqoSYb15hZFK9fcmHJjm-ueRjbQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been coming here since I was a kid. Always good value and food tastes great. Braised beef brisket hot pot is very tender. If you don't get the black bean sauce for the chow mein, the flavor will be milder. The chow mein noodles are nice and crispy and absorbs the sauce well. I'll continue to come here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMM195ZruFC1S-vjBj42FL9B-Z2pypUTwj8HNw&fid=0x0:0x907293439a71f2fd"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"liberty facundo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNBp5rH1To4BVHWq1Mfj3iKJNDPtZ8CbWa3yq0RypDCjJicJtkRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"New favorite!! Tiny place along 6th street in Burnaby but the service and the food were totally worth coming back to. This is going to be one of go-tos now when we’re craving Chinese food :). Their portions are massive and not bad on the wallet. If you’re in the area, stop by and check this place out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNytnOba8LnEVsUB44yTwjro0-9WCYV01iEXUHd&fid=0x0:0x907293439a71f2fd"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"TS OS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrxJ8Fjd3bGSI8mWbF186RbFWyg_DW73VTS3OIkFaxPfXFBEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Alright good and pricing is fair considering portion size and tastiness. We enjoyed their food and they always have been solid. For that I am giving this place a five even though they come short in other categories. They got rid of lunch special deals though, so be aware.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYmZh8m2DRP5VacCMWiEaiICHWWCgniG0j3r_m&fid=0x0:0x907293439a71f2fd"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Esther W.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZ44_CjQ6-wehLPc33Ng17kPOWOSFrXqo3jg5WgP7CtwNUYUeR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Favourite place to go for family friendly classic Chinese food. Sam the owner is very nice and has been there for 30 years.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIE-9IN7LEdrm5XUVTnH9IiBTB1uBnH1fO_ARE&fid=0x0:0x907293439a71f2fd"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"The JOKER","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQuiHl5446ZqSIBmhoQY8q4NuTHDo0F4Qr2KVa1APrDHGiVv22=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Excellent food and reasonably priced. We ordered 7 plates of food.
Crab, calamari, 2 rice dishes, Crispy chicken, chow mein, and pan fried rice noodles.  Every dish was excellent and flavourful.
Sorry I didn't take any pictures as we devoured the food when it arrived.
Family run business. Staff were very attentive to our needs and cleared full plates of bones and shell off our table and replaced with clean ones.
I will definitely come back here for dinner.
Came back 2day.  Ordered a bunch of plates. I was disappointed with the chicken 🐔 dish as the chicken was not fresh. Their was a tint of yellow on the meat which means that the chicken is old. The female waitress was very nice n helpful. The male waiter didn't smile at all...maybe needs a vaca.....eventhough I left them a large 18% tip for 2days mediocre food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzWIhUXcC-Ia0Nky8gwx92Kb0rv9dF0BrdtOwQ&fid=0x0:0x907293439a71f2fd"],"When":"2024-5-12"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had the party tray size of the fried beef with rice noodle, shrimp fried rice, and the fried green bean Szechuan style and all of it was solid tasting for what it was and standard as expected. The shrimp fried rice had lots of juicy shrimp pieces, the fried beef with flat rice noodle was typical, and the fried green bean Szechuan style was the highlight dish bursting with sweet chili, savoury soy, and mild spiciness. Highly recommend their green beans.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOX0ylRqKQb_eB47vKfP91tLphJefcFaIe18q8v&fid=0x0:0x907293439a71f2fd"],"When":"2024-4-12"},{"Name":"Dennis Jaciw","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnDGSg439f5DO9TZEL8Y8lCObZ5C9BX4P1hwz-Gj-POVbqhI7K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Good people, but they are very slow. If you call in 30 minutes early for takeout, be prepared to receive it in an hour. Food is very good, but priced high. I've given this place more than 5 chances, so I only go here I have extra time, knowing they will fail at on time food from the kitchen.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rnie Javier","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWHBJV1K3x0Py3tvNiDVtisKTRGCoVAv4fDYdGg2N10daP8wS2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Service was very slow for Chinese restaurant. We waited almost an hour for our first dishes to come out and ended up waiting 2 hours for our chow mein. On top of that, the waitress seemed confused and wasn’t aware of the total dishes we ordered. The food was overall alright, it reminded me of Chinese food you get at a Chinese buffet which is decent . I’d recommend others to try out Hon’s in new west which is down the street instead. Probably won’t be coming back here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-P88bfNKSJyA4qOq71ZWoi-B2M3h7KZsOMccx&fid=0x0:0x907293439a71f2fd"],"When":"2021-6-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Fiona Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyJ_SsBYfwi3sJ5fw1M-E7oP3p7XAG394glM0xYys0uaK1rSd8aQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hands down the best curry beef brisket. Brisket is tender and melt in your mouth. The sauce is paste like which is super flavorful.
The line up can be long but totally worth it. Service is good too. Consider you pay for your meal in front, waitress don’t work hard for “tips” (they already know how much you tipped).
We miss the curry beef brisket if we don’t have it for a few weeks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkU3XC55WK93ySRW1QtYyxytzcEx-LYogRy_Wt&fid=0x0:0x6b9e67f20592f179"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Huang Recca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIDF647f8wTC9xYKRRSNQV8CPkQJrc1Y81nFNPZerRiknh_jw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came over during dinner rush. Not a long wait, but you have to write down name on the wait list to grab a spot. There were a few diners who were not aware. Luckily the wait wasnt too long. Food was decent. Abit on the sweet side. Food came out hot, and we enjoyed it. We also received on the house desert.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9T8GycAq9VvuWPPYAa72bk2kYNMQjTv7f4tZI&fid=0x0:0x6b9e67f20592f179"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"AdrianLee263","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXAhMYzY2_PZAqB1pKWjI7kxSq9mPV0Ra40Vu_zkWmXxnpaX4kiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went there for lunch, this place is so damn busy! we were lucky we got out table before waiting list started. parking little bit challenging though but we were lucky we got a spot close by.

Service was fast and friendly, and the food all are yummy !! we went there 2 days in a row!! yeah, that good 😂

Ordered Kari Lembu on rice (tasty and brisket soft melt in your mouth), Beef Rendang with Ginger Rice (tasty), Singapore Laksa, Roti Canai, Gado Gado, Nyonya Yellow Curry with mixed Vegetables (tasty-vegan menu).

Highly recommended: Kari Lembu on rice, Nyonya Yellow Curry w/ Mixed Vegetables, Beef Rendang w/ Ginger Rice.

Definitely gonna be one of my favourite place to eat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrom8kyswD45LCob0e-prk0upJxA3U3gB-mhMo&fid=0x0:0x6b9e67f20592f179"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Daphne A. Yang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXUnEHYmQhfRzj8iSQsOTQaeknYUOpwIB-F_WPsz_wD2iXLxH8oFg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I'm not sure if they changed the chef, but the food are different from the last time we're here. A lot of items are not available on the menu, though they added a few new items on a separate menu.

I ordered the Hainanese chicken rice, the chicken itself looks unnaturally yellow/orange, and also taste ovely sweet.

The Curry Beef Brisket taste good but comes with very little sauce and not enough meat.

Overall, our experience is quite underwhelming, not sure if we're coming back anytime soon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-Ht2PfcTRwpnla3FuRHkFRnrU6ZlUP16inz_c&fid=0x0:0x6b9e67f20592f179"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Ray Jang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3wj8Ne3ngI4eg9ouEU6zPmvERlQuudbckz4ma4Vg6pfYrsWM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tasty, tasty, tasty! Just as good as their Coquitlam location. Counter style ordering. Prices are fair and portions are reasonable but above all, so so tasty!  One of my favourite places for curry beef.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM68b0zEhQbXXuId1LOg2HTzE5JMXLQfhB_jWcb&fid=0x0:0x6b9e67f20592f179"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"Rachel L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlj9bY8s4rXW4Y5gcqs3Lra4l64mX2jZe26IvgEYc_7L9ZFEmtng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Favourite place for Singaporean food (and some Malaysian specialties) in the lower mainland, along with the Coquitlam Centre location.

No frills but tasty and reasonably priced food - we always get the hainanese chicken rice (their sauces are great) and then rotate between laksa, satay beef noodle and Kari lembu. There were new dishes on the menu which we will need to try sometime.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5pCA3ItekAYfvP6sDZc_W7ropEHDloO81CXDO&fid=0x0:0x6b9e67f20592f179"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"R Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocId81LTxnZGHjWTe-8F9MiSVXwn-xaqQiwF56roHs3sATTcIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Found a sharp piece of hard bamboo skewer in my fried noodles. Almost bit into it and cut my tongue. Also lots of noodles are severely burnt and charred. Requested medium spicy but not spicy at all. This place used to be good and a neighbourhood gem but no longer.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwv_jIk8vW_-uSWXEIcW8onKQqf8MHKOIr2YE8&fid=0x0:0x6b9e67f20592f179"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"Lister Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWbNvO55wOzkDRxCcJ-fMoCcdWyut5hlx-H_zUreRnwso9_V0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Enjyed skewers, curry chicken, roti canai, veggie laksa. Went again today and packed but got table in few minutes. Had roti canai, curry chicken wings, fried noodles. Good but little greasy. Went again with friends and enjoyed char bee hon and yellow curry prawn and ginger rice. Came again and had skewers and rice noodles","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhItDLwiAhsNuwgnCrsBt3nad_zMB1rw4bsyLf&fid=0x0:0x6b9e67f20592f179"],"When":"2023-12-15"}]
