user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jessica Han","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI--Jv94Tg0FPNMmnzQ9uMdjx5jjoL9Y0_yiKbFFs1-NT3vrg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I liked the location, parking, overall service, and food. (It has its own parking spot within the building, and you can find the entrance on the Wilson Ave side.) The only thing I didn’t like was that the server, although nice, kept checking our table more than necessary, which became a bit disruptive. Even though the restaurant wasn’t very busy, I didn’t understand why the server kept coming to our table to ask if we were done or seemed surprised that we were still eating, especially when there were plenty of empty tables. other than that, everything was good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgcKsFZMZrtxtUAOKfP7Er5jE6CJ6Uz__veRxX&fid=0x0:0xd426c329a9fec480"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Kkkim B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKLOfRrWEMi_vvY3iDdyONtrSsnnVdNP1hCnl_hUc3gu4dvsw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love it. Went there for the 1st time on a friend's recommendation. I think their price, food and quality are better than the one I usually go in New Westminster. A chicken skewer was marinated well and not dry at all. Moussaka was really good as well. I even ordered another dish for take out for my family.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjWu8rOgOD-69E8Ar73t7A7hOYB9hfgr4RPsxn&fid=0x0:0xd426c329a9fec480"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"AIZY A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW63HuUeCCv9sgK_rgm18cZfVwLP0r1WfmUCdIu1jqRWz_XpAFKzg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was okay, very friendly server. We didn't wait that long for the food its just that its not that hot when we got our plate.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLgjx0ZxzSj_lI6gFRt4pA-qExMDeABCiiuARx&fid=0x0:0xd426c329a9fec480"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"jason wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLAr7OPM3u3i7bBkh0r7Q9kS7_8Gu_88Crv223BgydShD66TQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is good, great service and quick. lots of deliveries going out while I was there.. people coming and enjoying themselves.. portions at good size.. price is on point.. can’t complain much about the place..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMU0QVH6_oSGWbHrymxi0vhH3csIDcXna_5SG2r&fid=0x0:0xd426c329a9fec480"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"Mohit Owan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLdXlXw47UFGmP-UZGr5PN2Ez8idbUYa3WUwQErzVQ8T7Jkxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food and great atmosphere! Some of the best Greek food you can have in town. Can’t go wrong with the chicken and prawn souvlaki","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3kxMsUV9Nxq4Zxl1G_GAHwhuWRqIDSofL-lvc&fid=0x0:0xd426c329a9fec480"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Sylvia Wunder","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLWnKi7DdZM7EeOp25GCd1l8J1-L_rYXXZI7qi-_AM1rn-2I7t=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is great … always. I love the saganaki and chicken souvlaki dinner. Without fail, consistent. They will even make the saganaki gluten free on request.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSihVa2v13sin85wxiYHxUZPgyJYsLAHX3PoFW&fid=0x0:0xd426c329a9fec480"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Edward Desaulniers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoP1wTU2-qZu4-kyQmMbasgYbLJv8tKfq6HxU12Zm-ypnqVMIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"What a bloody name. It sounds like a cross between a fabric store and a place where they serve you a plate of disappointment. But hey, we gave it a shot.

Picture this – you walk in, and it’s like stepping into your grandma’s living room. The walls are semi plastered with photos of ancient island setting, and the lighting is dimmer than their chances of winning a Michelin star.

The service is friendly, but it’s as if they’ve hired Hermes, the messenger god, to take your order. I asked for a menu, and before I could say “feta cheese,” they slapped it down like a Greek tragedy unfolding before my eyes. Blink, and your wine arrives.

As for the food, they’ve thrown every Greek dish in the world on this menu. They got your moussaka, your stuffed grape leaves, your ribs, your pastas – it’s a bloody Greek potluck. But the pièce de résistance? The slow-roasted lamb. Apparently, it’s been “the toast of Metrotown” for years. Well, I’ll be the judge of that, the next time I go,  I had the moussaka and I ordered it with the same trepidation as Odysseus entering the cave of the Cyclops.

Here I am, questioning poor Ramie’s and yet secretly harboring a forbidden love for their moussaka. It’s like a tragic romance – doomed from the start, yet irresistible.

Let’s rewind the tape, shall we? Imagine me fork in hand, staring down at that layered masterpiece. The eggplant, the meat, the bechamel – they all whispered sweet nothings to my taste buds. And that sauce! Oh, that heavenly bechamel sauce. It clung to my fork like a desperate lover, promising ecstasy with every bite.

So yes, my friend, I confess: I loved the moussaka. It was as if Aphrodite herself had sprinkled it with forbidden passion I felt when I visited Naxos with my lover.  Alas, the rest of the dish – the eggplant, the meat, and the bechamel sauce may it forever dance on our tongues, defying the gods themselves.

In conclusion, the wine list could use some work but hey we will definitely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnhQQnXMCTcwCgbtJao3refaDSn7qo10F9chvI&fid=0x0:0xd426c329a9fec480"],"When":"2024-5-20"},{"Name":"The Koki Channel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLYCAfLKhUq--7x95Yhvc2vGemFeI_RXxT_ZXun36dUV2kGKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Lamb dishes are very tasty. Authentic Greek food available. Chef was very helpful to make aware of allergy ingredients. Pleasant service staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0yIwS_uvz-Aua0-V1w3nHjx0CE55_uc69gC-l&fid=0x0:0xd426c329a9fec480"],"When":"2024-8-26"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sarah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJZuen6azAZaeBPQC6XtvXbgUcHlZFPy1xD9wav_8Z186L2bg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best new brunch place! Choice of Italian or brunch menu. The food was good and the service was great. Free 2 hour parking across the street and free no limit weekend parking on Albert. Games section if that's your thing. Great patio with treed tables and under a canopy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpPP7IzTza4Ip-JE51GJhuNyO2I34koQyh1zsr&fid=0x0:0xd5fbbe326624ce2d"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Derek Shek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP9Pjija1abf8rOsOgAPBkesWOZ8sALAjyQJKt0I-DTaykDkHV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great spot for breakfast with plenty of options to choose from! The hash browns were especially good—crispy and flavorful. There’s lots of space here, making it perfect for a relaxed meal without feeling crowded. Whether you’re in for a quick bite or a leisurely breakfast, this place has something for everyone. Definitely recommend giving it a try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2JVQgCl9OsottKSRyre_Bvdj3SzyQcLZmiJhu&fid=0x0:0xd5fbbe326624ce2d"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Farzam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIooZPCPPfH5D4G1f5pX_06Fqf4UZb5reyqU1DQAFjZqgdcZ04=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I would rate Reverie Kitchen 3 stars. The cafe is simple, not fancy. The food was tasty and made with good ingredients, but it wasn't exceptional. The service was just alright; they served our foods (also coffees) separately, which is against basic serving rules. The cutlery wasn't clean, as shown in my pictures. It's worth noting that they have a few tables outside. Overall, the food didn't look amazing, but it was alright. I'm thinking about giving them another chance for a lunch or dinner and will update my review if I have a better experience. I'm very fair when it comes to rating places, and I'm very surprised by their google overal 4.7 review!!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpVTirLImVaeFWeZSPzCfl5HHmg837TI4A80Sk&fid=0x0:0xd5fbbe326624ce2d"],"When":"2024-4-27"},{"Name":"Renee Sun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjpu7xvxzQuz7mPhbIfCUN7BEUO3RMAXobynBrvl_suLC61AA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Had high expectations after seeing the review but sadly I can only rate this place 2/5. This restaurant is more towards a casual cafe, nothing fancy. Menu has wayyy too many items although some are fair priced.

Food: ⭐️⭐️

🍝Shrimp Carbonara with Homemade Fettuccine ⭐️⭐️

Tastes like something I can cook at home. They kinda overheated the Carbonara sauce, making it clumpy and scrambled, which made the pasta very dry. For it to be $22 (shrimp+fettuccine was additional 💰) was disappointing.

🍝Chicken Alfredo with Homemade Fettuccine ⭐️⭐️⭐️

Definitely tasted better than the carbonara, everything was good. Although I can certainly make the same taste at home.

🍕Margherita Pizza ⭐️⭐️

It was a bit different from we imagined, the crust tastes like those frozen ones, but the topping was good. The tomatoes were fresh and delicious, there was decent amount of cheese. $11 was fair, you get what you pay

🌯Tuscan Chicken Panini ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Honestly the best looking dish out of everything we ordered. It had lots of cheese and meat, $16 was fair

☕️Drinks ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Drinks were surprisingly good! We have ice-frapp and italian soda, both tasted really good, although a small frapp is $6 lol

🍽️Service ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
The service was amazing, staff were very kind and attentive. Willing to make fresh fettuccine when they ran out 🙏🏻 I appreciate that!

Overall:  2/5

A bit pricey for what they served, maybe order their drinks and breakfast. Pasta was disappointing for the price we paid, we might stick to paninis only.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpdJcwuLITEB0xEq51prxonrPo3YFDa-VJVefX&fid=0x0:0xd5fbbe326624ce2d"],"When":"2024-5-5"},{"Name":"Val Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXkNc5CFidDvCL6ggfjfAKrG0er-5TyNmVe1yZFGc2n0YAtMVp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Seriously best breakfast around. The bread is baked in house and has the nicest crumb. Crispest hash browns. Was blown away by the French toast. Not normally a french toast sweet breakfast kinda person but I crave this now. The savory French toast was topped with dried apple slices and “not too sweet” oatmeal crumble. Best value breakfast especially since there is so much care taken in making the food. The owner always comes out to say hi and the staff is so friendly and work quickly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMs-S-NsLPnkdIVbkNkCIj7vRIe1zm2Yn6tCpFw&fid=0x0:0xd5fbbe326624ce2d"],"When":"2023-9-28"},{"Name":"Jackie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvUQ9aJ1wSufelDKgqON2H6lO7iMGLWM2g-QyJYoOznHaBLkrZTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You order off a menu taped on the wall counter-service style and then pay and find a table (inside or on their humongous and comfy patio.)

The furniture is dated but the vibe and staff are all awesome. Very laid back and kind.

Prices can't be beat and honestly the food knocked our socks off. All 3 of us loved every part of our dishes, the bread was so high quality and the shredded hashbrowns are *chefs kiss*. The Italian espresso they use was also bold and delicious.

This place is so unassuming but what a gem for the community. I can't wait to come back and try the homemade pastas and other breakfast/lunch options!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5hLWvEss7xua6fjsAugCVuDxJu294LBLId-ey&fid=0x0:0xd5fbbe326624ce2d"],"When":"2022-9-25"},{"Name":"Justin Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIphX3IVdB6bYFyvRnGuBCpwkqSRxWlxdh1LxRlF-KLcXAbeHmLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Easygoing spot in a nice location… used to be La Fontana. Food at this new Reverie Kitchen is solid, tasty, a little pricier than usual, but not excellent: it’s missing a little bit of “soul”, if that makes sense. Service is a little lacking - long wait times for both drinks and food make it hard to give full marks for this area. The space, though is comfortable, easy to find seating in, and feels homey.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAogmnSTCxPJP-DAzCGzbJWHfo62RwHc7dM7hQ&fid=0x0:0xd5fbbe326624ce2d"],"When":"2024-5-12"},{"Name":"John Pavich","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHek5v_fSX8duNwx8Lk4q5we1_sn_ea56cGbxqkYRBa9BZuAW0LQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant was sold maybe middle of 2023 and the name has changed will have to check it out.

We had a group of about 30 people my wife's Zumba friends. They prepared a smorgasbord of good for us or you can order ala cart . We finished off with 2 bday cakes for 3 bday's that night . The owner and staff are very friendly food was pasta with a large assortment of sauces. I picked the chicken alfredo which was very tasty 😁👌
They also have a karaoke machine but I'am not sure what nights it's available.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjuEJWmPqpXj3Ep7NIaA5UJgpO2wb244x4NMgB&fid=0x0:0xd5fbbe326624ce2d"],"When":"2023-5-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"B W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJp85P5JohieEKJOfTMzyjH1aTNit_eIhBL3dFVyxf0xS2BxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Missus and I have been patrons of Bella Pizza for many years when “Ed Sag” was the owner/operator. When Ed left, we found the pizza was not up to the usual standards as it appeared there were different owners. It seemed the recipe for the crust had changed.

We were pleasantly surprised recently as we decided to give Bella Pizza another try. The service was very friendly and timely for a pickup order. The pizzas were hot and delicious. They were not greasy on the bottom like many other pizza joints. The only change to the pizzas was a nice heart shaped dough versus Ed’s round ball of dough. We had a ham, back bacon & pineapple; pepperoni, green pepper & mushroom; pepperoni, capicola & onion.

Looks like we might have reconnected with our favorite pizza maker.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSp2IN9SDAYMFi4Wy2SR6IdDHa_krm9wGxIB1n&fid=0x0:0xa1dd1dc538453eb3"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Dhwani Patel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ7cP0HNmYZ4h0lSc2LyjGc7rcF4xUrqK6PjG-yp-QbYP1dpw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Garlic Fingers and Garlic Bread

I recently tried Bella Pizza’s garlic fingers and garlic bread, and both were exceptional. The aroma of fresh spices was instantly mouthwatering. The garlic fingers had a perfect blend of cheese and herbs on a crispy crust, while the garlic bread was soft, buttery, and rich with garlic. Bella Pizza has truly perfected these classics, making them a must-try for garlic lovers. A perfect snack! 🤩","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuAtjdhGbwQ740mqq45jQiC-jHrypgyjr35vnJ&fid=0x0:0xa1dd1dc538453eb3"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Elephant Bea","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmbTkWbvkzq9BEURa4cDUNDp_dqnBpyYXDtKQjP6X4hyrXm3Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered one Mediterranean pizza. The owner was heart warm to put one heart shape of dough in the middle of it and told us no oil goes to the pizza.

Pizza has rich toppings and tastes very healthy. 😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNm5yirgANQTTchW1ZfegxKiB6SlezwZirk-uHh&fid=0x0:0xa1dd1dc538453eb3"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Franco G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-AGQcVJJmM5G-koGXukKAdkHJ9yhLtPNd51O959gDQO_vqpA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The All Dressed pizza is soooo good. Been having it for years and it never disappoints. The heart shaped dough in the center represents the love the owner puts into each pizza. I always recommend Bella Pizza to friends and family when the topic of pizza comes up. My favourite in town.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvXOSu99klXRFU2BW7VTNNKPzjSsmXJd-X4lTn&fid=0x0:0xa1dd1dc538453eb3"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Patricia Yogi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjlKd9mThgf7cTYIXLMXbilhcd8ljSFZMn37lWe0i8h43OGeOavQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Gourmet Vegetarian pizza from Bella Pizza is one of my favorites! The toppings are always fresh, and the flavor is amazing. The crust is perfectly crispy yet soft inside. If you’re looking for a delicious pizza, I highly recommend Bella Pizza!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOzKnfHf_oA31d1iucw6PnAx215_6gR3EKCqSz&fid=0x0:0xa1dd1dc538453eb3"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Talei","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiaAp19I3AzGAN9f0qA2Fw_FGzJL6hXMpzNE0EwkF0E6TBgo09=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were visiting the Vancouver area and my daughter and I were looking for some pizza. We ordered from Bella Pizza online and one of the things I thought was so great was that they called us to confirm alterations I made to my daughters pizza. He just wanted to make sure it wasn't done by mistake. We walked to the location to pick up our pizza and they were so nice and welcoming. The pizza was delicious!! I loved how it wasn't bogged down by grease and was really tasty with a heavy hand on ingredients. The little dough heart just made our night! Thank you, and we will be back when we visit the area again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocITMSk5bXEWAQO_KcSuJNYDYMO9AfywF8CE-ZyP_xLdv_8y_w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I decided to eat there inside the small area at front windows.
There's enough room for 2 to 4 people.

I tried a medium "VEGETARIAN" pizza.
They gave a generous layer of cheese on top,
so it's a thick pizza.

I was offered some type of mayonnaise topping sauce,
but passed as I wanted to taste the pizza by itself.

In my opinion,the taste is not overpowered
by any one ingredient.

I left Bella Pizza comfortably full and satisfied.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chrys n","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKFW7CWqtNaDmzww_RMAeJ_Pq0SeDKyJc_BAv1ZFI5W37kYYA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tried their pizza for the first time and I really enjoyed it. I ordered it for pick up and it was ready on time, nice and hot. The crust is tasty and the topping generous. Will definitely order again.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alan Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-QmMYfw75kgf5vonVt_7RAAdUJRl5hAF6Ijht6iC6ZE8aPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time trying out this brunch place in our neighborhood. The ambiance is nice and restaurant decor very warm and comforting. The staff was super friendly, especially the younger girl that served us throughout our dining experience (didn’t catch her name)

All the food options were yummy. The espresso martinis is a tad stronger on alcohol than I’ve had in a few other places. Some may love this though so totally your individual preference. The mixed fruit waffle is quite sweet and the fruits are definitely needed to help cut the sweetness. If I were to order this again, I’d ask for extra fruits.

The Benedict and pasta we ordered were both yummy. Worth a try in if you are in the area","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCDXR74cJvkaxlcW38jlSeaHSLHxk9yDecQcXx&fid=0x0:0xaabc56b7c30c946"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Peter Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMSeHRAtGk2XdalqRXihpRRMhie3ny5793uAdd9iw_CYpSb6O7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I didn’t expect such a special brunch, but wow, the place is definitely a hidden gem. Great atmosphere and service with amazing food. We had burnt brie cheese with figs, California Benedict omelette, buttermilk crispy calamari, coffees and a mimosa flight. Every dish was delicious and I would definitely go there again soon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOh09mlBVvZP8p6KjDLVB7Cni3cF5KdY_XZF_t8&fid=0x0:0xaabc56b7c30c946"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Reza Alaghmandfard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmMkMx99Qu99Z6EErgZuCHvUU2hEB5SXpcaLhvC4R0a2HkgjROTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Brunch was so delicious and employees were all respectful. The only complain I have is the level of the noise. I had hard time hearing my friend’s voice from the other side of a small table. If that is fine with you, this place can offer you lots of fantastic options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5RBPblQRO6wbBil06FlxGGeMRsM6EwB94AIAc&fid=0x0:0xaabc56b7c30c946"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"samira","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwkQGMre8jgbaip4E0o2r4QwZ6hsRUFGFhUhbAr4O--khz6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We got smoke salmon and pulled pork Benedict which were 10/10, very tasty. Staff were pretty nice and fast. We waited for about an hour to get in though. Place is well decorated but too many tables which feels a bit crowded and noisy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9t6HB25_6ZDZny3axeRSnQM6ELQ6bm7aiBE7A&fid=0x0:0xaabc56b7c30c946"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Sharon Biscoff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0-x1SooYgKJay2fzwX2BNXcCc3n8J_jzAtgfKGfItx1uYGGwGFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We got the rigatoni bolognese and crispy calamari. The bolognese was so flavourful and filling and it was just the right portion! Calamari had a strong flavour and kick to it, and crispy.
Staff are extremely nice and polite. The restaurant itself has a very nice look to it, and is clean. Loved the little pumpkins they decorated around the place, so cute! Definitely recommend this new brunch restaurant and will come again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-Y6QblEEvCMiRhm-vN53FRYLXO_taapj6mlWy&fid=0x0:0xaabc56b7c30c946"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Ryan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCDMUY42ah4aAgta84ssT2DYa3PFsR3r4fbxhBdcs3AXShIgTOYw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for brunch and had a pleasant experience. The staff are super friendly and a great selection of menu items to pick from. Definitely try the minestrone soup - super hearty!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPl7RaZwHiSYdczv_ZlqkSJ-nXRHzO8HC3CSWA2&fid=0x0:0xaabc56b7c30c946"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"John Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnQcmQk5zXvH68j5FJSO-DZt_bNb-sv4XDWST0oWFFOK2Ke2-Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went to check out a cute cafe that just opened up in the neighbourhood. Was surprised at the cozy interior and how good the food was! Service was quick, food was presented well and tasted great, and the price was pretty average for eating out. Lots of interesting drinks on the menu, including the Bumble Bee drink which I’ll have to try next time. Will definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipON2vi_RyNfnJXV4XWvSDzlCvVWfNgbazWn-Kxt&fid=0x0:0xaabc56b7c30c946"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Jennifer Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLnElfGUrwJdErhJahkLSaanNvX4G1k3-WZt2a4a57CwIQsqw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow I’m so excited about this new brunch place. The best chicken and waffles I’ve ever had, especially the waffle. The pancakes were also delicious. This place is definitely a step above your average brunch quality and the ambience is lovely. There’s also a whole menu of brunch cocktails I want to try next time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4hcuWJSPiJ-mCj0udw_Ye_GRltL_e4uvkdF6Z&fid=0x0:0xaabc56b7c30c946"],"When":"2024-8-26"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dylan Hendricks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQA2q_i_cbvFJmt5oGxZ7BA4GKrRPCLdlqYIQQi_N7sjF5Ew=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent Korean spot with a wide variety of menu items!

Friend chicken, wild ramen combos and your standard korean bulgoggi fare to boot.

Side dishes could use a little more oomph but that's a minor caveat and more preference then anything. The entrees are superb and its reasonably priced overall.

Would recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmivdjLsb4dzDURCilQZ85KYoGyY-9-cMZguoK&fid=0x0:0xc3f606175c02c8ee"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Penny Rusty Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkGfXMIDqwS_yD1axTk6tkHoLsnybE2ErvKrHMoMIElMJWekI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We've had takeout before from Gaya but haven't had a chance to visit in person until mid-September (mainly because it's located near a high school and the area gets really busy during lunch time).

We ordered a bunch of food here... the beef bulgogi, a mildly spicy chicken bulgogi, dolsot bibimbap and some chicken.

The bibimbap was served in a hot stone pot but it wasn't hot enough to really good the rice a crispy texture.

The half and half chicken had a big serving of boneless chicken. We got the original and the sweet and spicy (not super spicy) and the chicken was quite crispy but still moist inside.

I really liked the potato croquette with the lightly crispy exterior and creamy centre. Blue lemonade was just meh.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSad9yg-yFgha0NWstz2J_PBdD5zld0CD_IXEN&fid=0x0:0xc3f606175c02c8ee"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"eva lo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLG6_-zQP_odjQCD6-QyiUAohJJqHIlSZOxxzIrErs4yEpQng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Honestly the food was a bit disappointing and didn’t taste authentic at all.
The ox bone soup was so blend, the staff gave us salt and pepper to season it… imagine putting salt and pepper into water, that was how it tasted like LOL
The rainbow chicken was good value, but the pieces were in big chunks it was clumsy to eat. Taste-wise it was average.
Service was not the greatest as the restaurant was really understaffed. There was only one staff running around the entire restaurant.
Sad to say this, but I probably wouldn’t go back or recommend anyone to visit unless they make some improvements…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFOVlhqKn9rYwY9Q05RdGpXb8hzSvvVy7mojcd&fid=0x0:0xc3f606175c02c8ee"],"When":"2024-6-28"},{"Name":"Ashley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocItl4Nrnx-qvH8DpYTbdQQ4b9fX3lXFSp54MJ4ldlRjh_YoAmM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I like tteokbokki and pork cutlet so much I had the hotpot bibimbap and Yangyeom wing Few months ago
But not that good
Have to eat tteokbokki and pork cutlet !!
So good","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPccOyQfnt9_W6tIzE8xKb2juNP3RUIJMIuJQ6a&fid=0x0:0xc3f606175c02c8ee"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Eva Tong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbdn1JwTeGwTMz4zaH_aM0s2MjqUg4f-ith9g4COdwAGXFieA4Ow=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hubby, his friends and I, the 5 of us went to this Korean restaurant that is close by a friend’s house. We have parked 5 minutes walking distance away from the restaurant. If it is not raining, it is still good to take a small walk. The street parking is free but it seems to be full most of the time, there is a small parking plaza, not sure if that is for the restaurant as well. The restaurant is clean and well maintained, however the seats are quite limited of about 10-12 tables. We have ordered 3 dishes to share among each other. The Gamjatang is in good portion and comes with 2 rice, even though there is no spicy icon, but  it was spicy to me. Probably because I have a low spice tolerance, but the soup is flavourful and the pork back is soft and tender. The rainbow wings and squid rings are both crispy and well fried. The rainbow wings favour included original, honey garlic and sweet & spicy sauce. The portion is enough for 5 of us, and we did have to pack a few leftover chicken wings and squid rings.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpG1aefVheMNoSI9uMgvkj9goIbi4rQeGBGshS&fid=0x0:0xc3f606175c02c8ee"],"When":"2024-6-5"},{"Name":"Lissey F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_0h2gfDoKvqHrlczcNzuVcw6R82p4tFoqi1v6X-IZDmM6MIVL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Pretty good food.

Highly recommend beef tartare bibimbap and ox tail bone soup. LA Galbi is pretty tasty too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMr2odG0DwLZsHmpHz9BtZsLYCA8Qu6yQ_jGDVN&fid=0x0:0xc3f606175c02c8ee"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Jo Grace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLF6YZu5QiCrqmHDiTgEUA3-AgS0qwCF57Yg4UdpSVCixGG1A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the best experience at Gaya! The ambiance was cozy, the service was really friendly, and the food was incredible. Their pork cutlet was phenomenal and their cold noodles are perfect for the summer heat. Cannot recommend this place enough!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6975KaUWKq4JDc08AW0q4wv5prcqtqQ7dkwi6&fid=0x0:0xc3f606175c02c8ee"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Anne Jo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXevHayY3JMbkHBbOniNXKIPNvpnZfUFl8ywUeJ2D_A3yDRIb53OA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friends and I decided to try a different Korean restaurant in Burnaby and we all decided to try Gaya. The price was very reasonable and the food was really good. We shared the Ttekboki which was really good, the seafood tofu soup that we all loved, bibimbup and cold noodles.

We would definitely go back to try different things.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgapKO6yDCXsJkIIUx3w_sH048sYSfjdOSZuUn&fid=0x0:0xc3f606175c02c8ee"],"When":"2023-5-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"MJ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlm_XRYtoUIMsDe0r0YhYfxDQnj37a3FGprKGl2_zxeQCNP_XX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The atmosphere here is just so lively and amazing, full of botanical plants and just great vibes!

However, as much as the atmosphere was amazing, I wasn’t too happy with the quality of their food. I ordered a margarita pizza, as our server recommended. The pizza was lacking some flavour and was weirdly very chewy by texture.

Perhaps, next time I can try a different dish and give birdies another chance. Would definitely return for the environment and atmosphere✨.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvTUbQT3MVU2zFnYTr-Daj8eIa2M9eJyDa_7eA&fid=0x0:0x2b0126a7cf1b7ba3"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Fuzzy Nemo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMhjGNDhI-RZYgIiVRXnRDEQCiyyP-dsVjb7EhBkcymNr9MvYi0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I have seen a few posts about this place when it first opened and seems to be quite positive,  so just wanted to give it a try.  This was the old location of Earls Lougheed and they have changed up the decor and have a little section for takeout.

We were here for happy hour.  We ordered:
- Fish Tacos $6.75 each, which were one of the better ones that we have had.
- The Forager Pizza $15.75, highly recommend.   This pizza surprised us, it was so good and it was a lot of pizza for they price
- Birdies Wings $15.75, was meh and in comparison, this was a very small dish for the price.  Not worth ordering again.
- Guava Berry Fizz $7.50, came in a very tall glass, tasted great and presentation was cute
- Culture Blueberry Ginger Kombucha $9.75, it was served in the can, which we didn't know and felt that it was extremely overpriced.

Service was great.  Sam was very attentive and extremely friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuoKeLdzvaRYISOKbL97krNqQWsgJ3zJRhPh4p&fid=0x0:0x2b0126a7cf1b7ba3"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Daniel Vasquez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfH4IGtDH-RZPfkWL0P5tVuSs9PJ8oLSHVNJs_o3NyG6_oaSvUng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The restaurant and the atmosphere are great, fantastic setup and patio with fun music; a good spot for a dinner party, drinks, etc. I would rate this a 4.

The service was fine, not poor, not great; a 3 for sure. As for the food I would have to give it a 2.5; the presentation was awesome however the flavour lacked and it was consistent for every meal with the exception of their pizza. I would rate the pizza a 4.

I would go back for drinks and pizza only.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNT119sK6afvpHr7WEueY1XPVMvOs9mXk8qwiGa&fid=0x0:0x2b0126a7cf1b7ba3"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Munro Stuff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj0Wcuk6ox5dfAeJ4fAaMbhX_F-nzzt3p5oc_f0hBd0NpbGSM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had a satisfying early dinner here. This is Earls' 'California' concept, and it definitely had a different, more funky vibe than your typical Earls. Solid Happy Hour menu. The margarita (on the rocks, freshly-squeezed lime) was excellent. Fish taco was great, with a sizeable piece of fish, not greasy at all. Forager pizza was excellent, with really nice flavours of mushrooms & kale. Will be back to try more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOX_u_01h0NQmSLdPsryJ2x-y0IPrJnOp3FD9ix&fid=0x0:0x2b0126a7cf1b7ba3"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Marley Mckenzie cook","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5n4XAwgV26WrtDQFOwKexjEHrP8ok0rq2RztGWysEOnM29r4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been meaning to try birdies for quite sometime but always forget about it when the time comes. Last night coming back from pumpkins after dark we stopped and had dinner and it was very good! The unholy guacamole was so good, lots of good flavours! Service was good and the atmosphere was good but the music was a little bit loud but understanding it was later on at night. 100% recommend this place for lunch, brunch or dinner!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqsk5CbWE9UmadjuFqP68lur9paynVs3VwgJk&fid=0x0:0x2b0126a7cf1b7ba3"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"G P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIRBH3kmEC7zS9DCguHUR7BLkUesLTmOGdsJIgTl4hlmh9fnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I recently went to Birdie's for a lunch date with friends. The food was enjoyable, my friends tried the fried chicken sandwich, while I opted for the prawn and scallop paella. We also shared the Birdie's wings and the crème brûlée cheesecake. The wings were decent in flavor but lacked meatiness. However, the crème brûlée cheesecake was the standout, it was absolutely delicious and worth a return trip just for that!

While the food was satisfying overall, the service left much to be desired. Our server was notably slow, taking a long time to take our order and bring the bill. We ended up spending almost two and a half hours there, mostly waiting for our server to check on us. I had to wave them down repeatedly, and it was only when a different staff member noticed that I got any attention. The restaurant wasn’t particularly busy, so I’m not sure why the service was so delayed.

I wanted to actually tip less because of the service, but I just that the lower option of the tips which was 18% and regret because it wasn’t even worth that.  Overall, I’d come back for the food, especially that cheesecake, but don’t go in expecting stellar service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJMFfD6seNxI7cNcUKss2odI7uYWCGpzSif9ed&fid=0x0:0x2b0126a7cf1b7ba3"],"When":"2024-11-6"},{"Name":"John Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnQcmQk5zXvH68j5FJSO-DZt_bNb-sv4XDWST0oWFFOK2Ke2-Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This meal for 2 cost us $70, would you pay that? We were expecting a bit more quality for the price. The $23 “tacos” had no filling except meat, and the plate of spaghetti and shrimp cost $26 alone. Not worth it.

The service was ok and the restaurant was nice but a bit loud. We eat out quite a bit but will not be coming back here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxV7Z83KhVegFWR-RMJA8YOq6OsaEZCBFPFSO3&fid=0x0:0x2b0126a7cf1b7ba3"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"samira","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwkQGMre8jgbaip4E0o2r4QwZ6hsRUFGFhUhbAr4O--khz6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Drinks here are the best! I love most of their cocktails. Super nice and friendly staff. Tried their steaks for the first time and found it okay, maybe just a bit overcooked. Will visit again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOBzaC1ji63iEd733ZsZbofvGNtem1O9I2DTPd&fid=0x0:0x2b0126a7cf1b7ba3"],"When":"2024-10-17"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Wong Irene","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ7sp41wGQuueC1lDn3CqM9IATBJFCPj_h7E-EhyDPVkJBCmw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An exceptional dining experience! Rita provided service that was nothing short of perfection—attentive, professional, and genuinely warm. She ensured every detail of our visit was taken care of with precision, making us feel truly valued. The food was another highlight: each dish was expertly prepared with fresh ingredients and full of flavor. Whether you’re looking for great service or memorable cuisine, this restaurant delivers on all fronts. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKhxEiYRaNvgCE2sZTdbIorfj2gKpcLESbXR4O\u0026fid=0x0:0x28438971892ecfbf"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Ann Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIvn-xEzewwzi5MnaSg9fqfqC8GocNLnb-uO3tOtU-odVbwqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Loved the atmosphere and the dish presentation was great!  One of the coolest attractions was definitely the coffee robot, which manually pours your coffee, adding to the experience. We ordered the coconut chicken soup, pad Thai and beef green coconut curry. Loved their coconut based dishes, especially the soup. Very clear winner for us! For drinks we got their pour over coffee and Thai green tea. Ruby was our server and she was very kind! Overall, it was fun and tasted good. We will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZQq6fHRD1tAg75Za1jSxA3pD3d6IE6UpaK77z\u0026fid=0x0:0x28438971892ecfbf"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"马尔柯","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4syA-Xl9wGd2fBI-MP9Hvp_Amxw0QMFGRxMFKAtkG4OfWZE1JQg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Friendly staff, food quality was great. Tom yum soup was delicious, not that 🌶️, suitable for most of guests who would like to try out. Seafood was fresh. Seafood pineapple fried rice was okay, fried rice was not too surprising me, however the quality was matched with the price. Mango sticky rice was the taste that I have in Thailand which was a great after meal dessert. Recommend whoever is interested in Thai food.\nParking was easy, back of the restaurant or side street parking is available.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyw-XO-FZnfBT7th4oCsBzhi_yyftgEiRKV9nQ\u0026fid=0x0:0x28438971892ecfbf"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Ana Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUB7MTy6hJzRER5Lw64do3j-FVTSb3sI3u-0kGStMwjecZMBBKwWg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a great meal here! Lovely service from Rita and the food was amazing. We got the Tom yum fish hot pot, pad Thai, and an appetizer platter with a couple of Thai milk teas. Everything was so good! Would definitely come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3TatcypZevqgetWe3bso1LZkajBt8Y11Ohi6H\u0026fid=0x0:0x28438971892ecfbf"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Tpain23","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKPRnDbxGucmltpHTxfl4LuSbDv10RnR_WeKCXsm3vthM9LYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Great menu variety, the food tasted alright. The service is slow and the server wasn’t attentive with filling our water. The robot coffee machine was cool but the coffee didn’t taste good. We got to try it by leaving a review and we also got this free glass noodle dish.  The green curry was good but it should come with rice.  The pad Thai was good but the chicken had a weird taste. I’m not sure what the point of the serving robot when the servers still had to come and put the dishes on the table. We only ordered two dishes and I’m sure it’s nothing a server couldn’t handle to carry","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9j8npUulrOLHndvRJCFKfUH0Qr68bfKibWgYW\u0026fid=0x0:0x28438971892ecfbf"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Yanyan Zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMWy-rFnAasq_qrwNZ-pNjiWV8wDldQUwXmZ4yE5m4w5lXsrg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good food decent dine in environment and good service too! I would come back again to try their brunch! Ruby did a good job serving us and gave good recommendations when we don’t have the clues what to order!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqxaFPEkn1Py4nMsPg3xSqEV_Ev7ajYsE_lQo\u0026fid=0x0:0x28438971892ecfbf"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Paola","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK4XrimCFm4PtK_mrrS16PbwFF6YoSh4YLs5FG7yP-UkHhGyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"MJ was our waitress. She was very fast and efficient. Our food came so fast and everything was absolutely delicious! Absolute perfection! We ordered: pad Thai with chicken, a platter that had chicken satay skewers, tofu skewers, papaya salad, pork spring roll, taro chips with a side of different dipping sauces; green curry chicken, and vermicelli soup. Everything was fresh and savoury. Will definitely go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPt7sMClTRPsRudqgBbS-1wFXRXRHKmLXQfgIgG\u0026fid=0x0:0x28438971892ecfbf"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Michelle Zhou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVIvGyONprhS-fV2IjnaoygalX1P8-qAn8vawz8ML1gD0fJBE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this Thai restaurant, appetizers are a good portion and not oily, Tom yum fish hotpot is fresh, soft shell crabs are well marinated with lots of flavours. Additionally,  I was also super amazed by the coffee making robot. 10/10 experience. Huge thanks to our server Ruby and Simon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfl0vWP_7dSysX9l5IlFUJ6P-bzI9KMG8L0hIY\u0026fid=0x0:0x28438971892ecfbf"],"When":"2024-11-17"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"TS OS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrxJ8Fjd3bGSI8mWbF186RbFWyg_DW73VTS3OIkFaxPfXFBEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I think the place offers excellent choices for entry level Korean food seekers. They have all the nice mixture of menu that you can find from K dramas. The server was extremely pleasant as well. However as a seasoned Korean food lover, I expected little more kick in the taste as well as the choices offered in the menu. Parking also wasn’t easy for us to find as we had to park on a paid busy street. For that I had to take a star off however a decent Korean restaurant with fun vibe.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM49OS8UPGy2NbLibNCtwai9WJRub56lE_34RKX&fid=0x0:0x659aaaf3354843f5"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Martin Matahari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUAn1gLSlBMeGXZBHUnKkSJRx9LUQmHP9VKEpiPVA6PU8EOwPbl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We enjoyed our lunch here. Tasty food and ok portions. Service was a bit slow and took a while to get our food prepared. But overall it was worth it. We hardly find these kind of set meals in Korean restaurants. The food tasted freshly prepared and could have had a bit more protein, but overall a nice weekday lunch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3JmUaq4EqhVrI1_kV_mTtLvaaBl79rsROMDHT&fid=0x0:0x659aaaf3354843f5"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Crystal Tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVg-rriWrOXMJ2kt1gNglGMfFX_PyjV130ctGFUscilsgdilECbwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is a hidden gem! Food is super fresh, delicious, and reasonably priced. Their staff are really friendly and attentive (especially for a sat night)!! We got the C-Kim-Tteok combo and were pleasantly surprised at all the items. Will dine here again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEq6RWmBXc8qYUg4L-JdT4ZmR05MKfztP-h6Qa&fid=0x0:0x659aaaf3354843f5"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Kenneth Lagerstrom","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLOw1AIcCX3EC4zs2_Zhz6EH-UOFzEKD0Pg71LZ10Yr3bMlew=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Holy freakin c.r.a.p!!!!!!
This equals my best restaurant experience ever! Matches the $250/plate Japanese that set the bar.
Almost didn’t finish my beer, the food was so good.
Waitress came by and mixed up my food for me because I was eating it wrong.
Waitress tried to refuse the tip. I had to insist.
An absolute MUST TRY!!!
Wish I could give higher than 5 star.
I know where I’m taking my business clients now.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMp-YQtABFEW2JNKogrB3vncRJo532L7LNZIrrD&fid=0x0:0x659aaaf3354843f5"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"B Miller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_L5wS7UfqAb_Rm3a-LRbr6Cp6DmPinQckDFW5XwfoIRC_WSUXrg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a fantastic experience. Victoria bc doesn't have anything like this and this is exactly what it needs. I'm delighted by the colours. The flavors. The personable staff. Quick. Efficient. Kind. What a great little place to eat. If this place gets more popular there will be a line as the dining area is small. Can't wait to come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPnG30vFwZV2Mdjp0cLa01ub_svzbSPTyWdsPf&fid=0x0:0x659aaaf3354843f5"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"yewon yun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLI-0rm5PI2dypU5OzT9qihE7w0ZwN8YEZD_6Xx-9ET0X1zcw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Perfect Korean food,
I’ve missed Korean food a lot, and now I find my must-go Korean restaurant.
And on top of that, owners are really kind and nice. Highly recommend here! JUST come visit 👍👍

한국음식 먹고 싶다면 여기로… 강추","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTuxLLRq89lJsw-FortBFmAV9xBrWnDmMZ-uC9&fid=0x0:0x659aaaf3354843f5"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Edmond Kwan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvrq8yONOnchFnxwA24dBRIsdMvJaO3lwv04sWrLZMbM1rLS1Jyw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for lunch. Got gimari, pork belly bibimbap, and kim chi stew. Absolutely delicious. Stone bowl kept it hot till the end. Only issue was loud music, felt a bit like an early 2000s nightclub. Nevertheless, would definitely come again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMr0JgrNMUe1KFm7-K_0_tUxkEvR8irSQF-cCW4&fid=0x0:0x659aaaf3354843f5"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Anito Pookino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLqEDkp5ONz5PA7ODrupm52ENAJzIJ740hTdqZPeHgzTmxC7w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My bf found this gem of a place. The food was delicious and I can’t wait to come back to try again. Everything was perfect and had that warm cozy feel.
My only complaint was when we got our appetizers, the server with glasses didn’t bring us any plates to put them in so it was awkward to eat. We had to flag her down to get some plates and extra napkins. The second server toward the end of the dining experience was very pleasant and friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrNkMoJo3q2JwckzKbgFSj2nXqlBZRORtGCcP1&fid=0x0:0x659aaaf3354843f5"],"When":"2024-2-25"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mahi Mohammadi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqC-rZuQ76AwKkD3oY9lIbbPffPrvfajyPTndb0NlfbHCj4Y4W=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Anton’s Pasta is hands down one of the best in Vancouver! The quality of the food is outstanding, and it’s absolutely worth the wait in line. The portions are massive—you pay for one meal and end up with leftovers for two more days! This place has been my favorite forever, and I can’t recommend it enough for pasta lovers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMeZHJ8BhKfl8Vep6Ruagh8ng7CXJC46k5gGNVG&fid=0x0:0x55280a1fcea014fb"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Jason C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLT3cdnwMmVAUTm30C1o0hK2x82X9RSn1K7Px21H_Y5CcVung=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had a family dinner here  which offered large portions, providing great value for the price. The food was extremely good, making the overall experience enjoyable. I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for delicious food at a reasonable cost","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlPw8RCahS25bGYcSQPhOjZHeyVUi5WtURKiYh&fid=0x0:0x55280a1fcea014fb"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Amber Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUE3_LIkc7Cpzx-MDVN-THAzZDRP24bcGvXr6uyqlwc9r8ltGE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Be prepared for a bit of a wait in line, though. If you're craving the house bread, just be sure to request it from the server! Big portions of pasta! Personally loved the meat lasagna. The white sauce was a bit greasy for me, but overall, it's a lovely place with nice servers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNa0rCG048GnY14Bisd8XDDpw2dp251knUrwzxP&fid=0x0:0x55280a1fcea014fb"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Bim S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLZCEq-tjjAo_wFnCNX4kq5apTkVAiAoWVMqTwK5JG2VPcaBQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Got take out today. The lady who took my order over the phone was nice. My dad drove nearly 1 hour there and 1 hour back. We ordered 4 dishes and the garlic bread.

We thought the portion of bread was small for $7. Their menu suggested we add balsamic and olive oil for an additional $3. It sounded good, so we added that. They did not pack it in our take out order. It was pretty disappointing that we got charged for it, they did not include it,  and on top of that, my dad tipped. Why are we tipping if you aren't going to carefully check our order?

Anyway, people make mistakes, but this is why i don't like tipping for takeout. How can i tip when i haven't tasted the food yet? The responsibility always seems to be on the customer to check the accuracy of their order.

The chicken alfredo has the tiniest little scraps of chicken, which was so beyond overcooked. It literally looks like someone chewed up the chicken. My sausage and peppers dish had almost no sauce. The chicken and peas in a cream sauce smells like moldy cheese and tastes horrible.

The food was just okay. Over $125 for an average dinner, missing an item, 2 hour trip .... not worth the money and definitely not worth the time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMww3e2X_QqNYXo_m5GUGvHKf8MI91Tf3veieak&fid=0x0:0x55280a1fcea014fb"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"Eddie Amaitum","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWHdzeCwolrcB2d8eo7QBHZt9ijZZGGtu58cqll24HZJkWqql_Ksw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best Italian restaurants in town. Their food tastes great and they have super large portions, make sure to come hungry and I promise it's likely you'll still have food left to take home. The staff are also great and the prices are very reasonable. Will definitely be visiting again 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMr2Tg313uf7g_ppRRe8x4x90fPen62_QoNdYOl&fid=0x0:0x55280a1fcea014fb"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Nicole P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_hMBqVmPn-ivShuVmEj9Fd6wPI7TJMIizPn7HJ9DiKb9e4ew8dg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Antons, since 1983, has been providing great food for decades. The portion sizes are huge, and we always have extras to take home. They use quality ingredients and are quick to serve. There's usually a line out the door, but it's worth the wait. They staff are very friendly and appreciative for the business. If you're in the area, I highly recommend you stop by for some delicious pasta.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSJnf4NHmMEe0uwkpLlypZP-DGfXpygc-2P1C9&fid=0x0:0x55280a1fcea014fb"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Annie Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMh7GPmb-fwTeblPqWA2SYP6eaRbXDOeK0rRGXojq0IfUHF2Je=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved the food and experience. Got free bread and penne with sausage, feta and olives. All the dishes look so good though.

When people say large portions, it’s not a lie! One dish can feed 2-3 adults which is an amazing deal.

Service was efficient and friendly. Bathroom was clean. Only things would be that it is pretty packed and can be loud, with long wait times.

So worth it though. Would happily come again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsJOK0CqFEUPsx95vG4pWDPWz3opOk_3yTBw2_&fid=0x0:0x55280a1fcea014fb"],"When":"2024-5-24"},{"Name":"Lina Huine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXTc90UClGdW5-vlLdRudv0nYQ1eUmIsZfcJ8sj-8pxZav3xZGO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I’ve always visited this restaurant while in Vancouver. It has changed quite a bit flavour wise , although sometimes I find that the plates either have too much sauce or not enough sauce and also the flavours aren’t really what they used to be. The risotto is good if you’re willing to wait for it. If you’re looking for a large portion of food, you can’t go wrong here, their service was quick because there’s usually a lineup outside of people waiting to get in.

Update went back again October 2024 and it wasn’t great. I’m not sure what’s going on with the taste of the pasta sauces. But they were just bland. Portions are still quite large but the the flavour just isn’t there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjv4WZzl1d_CBDQNN9AHwW_z8FruJksg54E9OE&fid=0x0:0x55280a1fcea014fb"],"When":"2024-4-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Betty Lin-Trieu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUXqgoJQgJf18sGc55jYmX9V080TdwRUyiXkHtrRengNYg2A-j9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I’ve been here several times and always thought it was good here until this past weekend. The roasted pork is cut so thin that even my little daughter was wondering where the crunchy skin is. It was always cut thick but I’m not sure why the quality went down. Rice was also very dry. Very disappointed and won’t be back anymore unfortunately.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqAE0F9G4VCGGfwrYJPnoiqYmLcoujW6nM-K1u&fid=0x0:0xedc38f16bd273895"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Tim Fanny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLYrWBLURfr1tirNYy52Tk5AOqe9VEbid15IgxMqbMmNMDxyw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"1st time trying this place as friend said their bbq is good.  Just had lunch so order side of chow mein noodle to try.    $8.99 small and $16.99 large.

Taste: We lucked out as they just filled up with a fresh pan.  It's just typical of shopping mall style and quality.   So it's acceptable.

Price:  $16.99 for an order of just soy sauce chow mein, no meat at all, you would think they'd fill up the container.  Nope! It's just loosely pack with 60% full.  The lady wanted to take some back with her tong but we're looking at her so she stopped.  :-(

Service:  not expect to have much service as it's a food court.  However, lady was busy talking to another couple when we're waiting.  We had to ask a couple of times before we can order.  So my friend just went over to O'kitchen to order their food.  -_-","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuYJxggkz1w9UQqTHfiwX3EoWS5JV3d_DvX0Vy&fid=0x0:0xedc38f16bd273895"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Tommy Truong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXL1jzG6HtC7pBISAy3evcsVleJq6jZEVhLVU59Wa-0LPCanxop=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Low quality,  and very low quantity. Ordered two item combo and got two pieces of beef and stale BBQ pork.  This place is a one and done.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPoBPrs4gOYZlza50HYfnYrh4C-1L_HnEc5Ncue&fid=0x0:0xedc38f16bd273895"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"Ting-Yu Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlodVKIQ8_dmfGPXSY9bPBrYe1KhcRgWKeM1WOBzrhDpGlDdnb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The food overall is too salty, higher prices than Richmond. Honey BBQ pork was too dry. Not recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHdzvIdxiy7Ns82A3_NlK5UklTLqLlQCqu-QS-&fid=0x0:0xedc38f16bd273895"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Cole Davis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAOU6XCX3s_R0vWndse-P-J59JZDVGZbi6kfyG2pJARhX4qsYzZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Their food, like item combos and the bbq pork is okay. Not crazy good, definitely not bad either.

What's ridiculous is their portions. $15.99 for a two item combo, small enough to feed a toddler. That's insane! For $16 you should be getting a lot more than that.

Their service is good of course, how could they not smile at taking your money while giving you the least amount of food?

And as for their bbq, the "master" will smuggle behind your back. Be careful when buying from here.

Any other 2 item combo place will give you more, and yet this place treats their food like you didn't pay for it. Giving you tiny portions.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpLrp8-9yZiSGX45_3tU6nhl3rfGFuIqiT43xg&fid=0x0:0xedc38f16bd273895"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"Nikki Sy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBjATsJMmB41G9yqWFoEPo05_lPP8oOi4rOJgcyxBVDlQkbFzp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I always ordered the combo roasted pork belly and the bbq pork with rice.
It was good and fulfilling. I just noticed that for roasted pork belly, they chopped it thinly. The sauce in the rice is very few so sometimes its dry. They also give you 2pcs of broccoli.  Roasted pork at Hopwell in Renfrew is still better!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlM40_ymWIbXWPPWQYRyDAhiAUMmbhFN04I57X&fid=0x0:0xedc38f16bd273895"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Fanny Yuen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXm8EoBzG77BIIjdpRb_CFwMHE1opsPQ_grOt4OaM_e6SqT8dAD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Heard a lot of mixed reviews about Bona Fide BBQ in Brentwood Mall so decided to give it a try to see for ourselves. Got the 2 items combo, one with BBQ pork & soy chicken and the other with BBQ pork & free range chicken. I thought the food was pretty decent and actually a lot better than some other Chinese BBQ places. Close to $16 each, definitely not cheap but reasonable considering everything is so expensive nowadays. Service was friendly and efficient.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8f-fI5xyHChEEDLALWULcNfguHCeFybWs0m5x&fid=0x0:0xedc38f16bd273895"],"When":"2022-10-30"},{"Name":"Anthony Plaxen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0TosyGAQWTqM_XvTHaXfq2jDGHv6ifKWBgTGcJKYnap3ceipL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"An honest review: First time trying this place and I have to say that I am impressed with the food. I ordered the roasted duck and roasted pork on rice for take out. The service was speedy and good. The taste of the duck is by far really delicious and I appreciated the nice crunch on the skin of the roasted pork. The taste deserves a 5/5 rating.

I think that the portion size of the take out could use a bit of improvement, very little vegetable and more sauce seasoning is needed. I think that the price of around 15$ is fair but is somewhat on the pricey side but then again prices are increasing everywhere and inflation. I am overall impressed with the food as it is much closer to drive here than to Chinatown for Chinese BBQ.

4.5/5 Stars","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8gtsLKBTPjpHOL7GQT460OosZ0T0hspmjyI3l&fid=0x0:0xedc38f16bd273895"],"When":"2022-11-14"}]

descriptions: Hainanese chicken with rice & other Malaysian classics are the specialty at this minimalist eatery.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Momo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKi1z9F1Eh5YZ3oECG0VPKmx4vE2Q76-gpHn2Or7W9PmKHHRw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time came here with parents, the atmosphere feels so relaxing like home. The Hainanese chicken rice is so tasty as well as the chicken is tender. The beef curry is tender and not salty. Oh, the chicken wings were so good, not oily but tasty and crispy. We enjoyed so much.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0pCXg-rUKU2vEfJ0WVrx07E8TTmZXPFKdlKw5&fid=0x0:0xaa0822245dee57e4"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"An Le","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXF01TBYc3PKsxbdTmX6Nyb3k8CUa16dz0pehTu-KrjeP5-RXU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We tried the Hainanese chicken, beef curry, roti, and skewers, and everything was delicious. The skewers, in particular, stood out—they were tender, well-cooked, and full of flavor. The service was attentive, and the menu was simple but included some nice specials. Overall, it's a great spot for authentic Malaysian food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPpKg0S9dQ6bUqh1ufQLtiR4ZpF6Q_Wr3G_TII&fid=0x0:0xaa0822245dee57e4"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Bryan R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIvR6l1F1RZK4uaQvkjnPRVUbnOLmtRZTOSQTnujzP8mnr8O3k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been going to Green & Oak since they initially opened and still visit this place pretty often. I’m so glad they were one of the businesses to survive the pandemic. They are definitely one of if not the best Malaysian restaurants in the city. My go-to dish has always been the mee goreng as pictured. Also roti chanai and hainanese chicken is also a for sure recommendation.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNdQ-6ESfO36QukMRSrgm6bX1HJ0cPtNJuquqcZ&fid=0x0:0xaa0822245dee57e4"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Cherrie Tsoi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQ4VO4p1dZB0s08YxnuZkBrxxccHjXqaGLg1W-afrS6OgrlA0i=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the homey vibe and atmosphere of the restaurant. Great food and great service. We had the Hainanese chicken set, roti and Belachan fried rice. Will come again :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhUlCatnnDveIfHePNQydvJPqlT5RLedZjxBm9&fid=0x0:0xaa0822245dee57e4"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Ron Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4C9fuu3Pgu102q3bAxHKivkiOQqwqKjJditkVdy4zIZ628gCE7g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place to eat, parking on the street is free.  More parking in the back.

They had a skewer lunch special so I tried that, chicken was tender and flavorful.

Tried their hainanese chicken rice combo.  It is small but tasty.  Chicken was juicy and the flavoured rice was hot and tasty.

Service was excellent and presentation was wonderful.  Decor was nice too.

Cash and debit only.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTXgRsRDnE0lff5aab5rMuSg883By5iUFOhG3I&fid=0x0:0xaa0822245dee57e4"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"Lynne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZCsf97y3t-Ppi4xqcVMVpZ9qy3abZg0k-7Vz9rSFc5K4h7Apj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered the Hainanese chicken rice and curry beef. The flavors were amazing. Definitely worth coming back again! My photos didn’t turn out great because the food was so delicious that I forgot to take pictures at first! The chicken was super tender and absolutely amazing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJVTXj_I9YyaXAFSLtg3_8xhlVlE6sj2g7ToMS&fid=0x0:0xaa0822245dee57e4"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Huang Recca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIDF647f8wTC9xYKRRSNQV8CPkQJrc1Y81nFNPZerRiknh_jw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Place is cozy and owners are friendly. Delicious food and the kids loves the tender boneless chicken rice. Top up extra to swap out to dark meat. They have spicy and non spicy options for the fried noodles.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOx81Lja6u4WKQwlAb5v_e2bSs64OaQvWHuMfIj&fid=0x0:0xaa0822245dee57e4"],"When":"2024-6-1"},{"Name":"bostondave2011","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQ29WGaoD_9B2iWKTU_0MybzF34sQLBfRb670IKxURo-btEg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great Seafood Laksa! I'm totally excited about not having splashed any onto my golf shirt but for once, it would have been worth it.
Food served within 5 mins of ordering and refilled my tea everytime I took a sip.
Only reason for lack of line up is limited parking and quick turns.
Will be here again soon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcLaeNvX4yDRVYuX_2-8XXSW8rmQmicvWpo7Gj&fid=0x0:0xaa0822245dee57e4"],"When":"2024-9-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Bahar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUU5aKs1eICwt862xHyk6eML8Nhxgoc_vXAN8CVDAAXDoHVGQ78=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had a pleasant experience with Salmon Wave. The staff were helpful over the phone, answering my questions and suggesting famous items from the menu. The food was fresh and tasted great, though I feel it could be a bit more flavorful to truly stand out.

The service was quick, which I really appreciated, and the store itself was simple yet clean, giving off a no-fuss vibe that’s perfect for a quick sushi fix. Overall, a good spot for fresh sushi with room for slight improvement in taste. I would definitely consider going back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgF6MtCzq_Qaj2YEwnhyZhQENkBIN7S-amyaVT&fid=0x0:0x9064c08dca8758d4"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"Jenny Lu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIkf-UalKtj0lwknImwqEm4VFnh1y40nkM-uzMX36PJED6PmQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an absolutely fantastic dining experience at Salmon Wave! The staff is friendly and attentive.

As for the food, everything was simply outstanding. The Paradise roll was a perfect start—light, fresh, and full of vibrant flavors. The sweet mango complemented the creamy avocado and delicate crab in the roll beautifully.

But the real star of the show was the Toro Aburi Oshi. This dish was out of this world—literally melted in my mouth the moment I took a bite! The richness of the toro combined with the perfect level of char was divine.

Highly recommend Salmon Wave to anyone craving authentic Japanese food. I can't wait to return and try more of their dishes!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP44KxLChiBLIr8FuPXJ7zwsRJUMMP_EjNChuZJ&fid=0x0:0x9064c08dca8758d4"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Jeffrey Murphy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUTehYI_uwVXDynGVDx6lqHPyDkrKFQYJGmh6WxIe0Z9obBGfT-Wg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tried the Alaska Roll, Red Dragon Roll (spicy), plus the California Roll and Dynamite Roll. All were delicious. Staff were helpful and food was ready in short order. Not a lot of seats here, but it was quiet after 8pm and they do take-out. Definitely recommend it to others.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNi4qJthFYPuyr1LnPDwglil6jywu3symWQo1ev&fid=0x0:0x9064c08dca8758d4"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"miguel garay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVod2CALwnA4ucNtwsKbauqtv_jwEn_UpdEKmwxGrEfHSz-62s1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"West coast roll is out of this world!! One of the recommendations from the chef, I guarantee you will have a good time. Good sizes and portions, definitely a new favourite for me. You have to check it out","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMakHcwbsaCAsb6gU2rRQu5EN5qnwm3NgN-edHL&fid=0x0:0x9064c08dca8758d4"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Mehmud Iqbal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzdKzd7CEtSWik7PUDkAL2bm7hm1Q3Nn4JMf0vY7aaPod9GjZfWg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A very good place for satisfying your craving for sushi and other Japanese food. The atmosphere is amazing and so does the quality of service. The sushi tastes great and ample parking spot available.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfCtdD4sHuSdDQPqzCYrYMih684qCt44paW7jg&fid=0x0:0x9064c08dca8758d4"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Soraya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJFA9MjLZ9gpzo6zD8lmhkGStBPT_9CHbHT_MkBsPR8CzzmYYs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This hidden gem is a must try, perfect for picking up on on the way home from work or on the way to the park! The prices are reasonable and flavours hit it out of the field. I recommend the salmon poke & spicy tuna roll (it’s got a real punch of heat to it) 🔥","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7dLQP_4X8EG5hy8dsmtqQxjGWvz6lO3pEA8Xm&fid=0x0:0x9064c08dca8758d4"],"When":"2024-7-5"},{"Name":"Mehr Poulad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnMmsASCmXLOvaFhR1RoQ03vxNx7oVUBdwy_npEYvb7k7uZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"An impromptu stop here. Looked good from the outside and we were hungry. After ordering a few rolls, I was told that it would be 30min. For a grab and go sushi place that seems like a long time. The cashier explained that there was a big order ahead of mine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtu1j9fqjBPWjWr9eLd_5CuVPa_pqwOsiIBGAF&fid=0x0:0x9064c08dca8758d4"],"When":"2024-7-31"},{"Name":"Olivia K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKzNIyUHL0LsGtWNxjNYlTFWBVJWI-R7ZAWfaYswj6sOZj8Rw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s the best sushi place around Brentwood mall. Very fresh sashimi and a variety of rolls. The service was great as well. I was so surprised how nice the food here, I ordered Mango special roll, Alaska roll, Dynamite and Chopped scallop roll. Everything was so incredible! For this amount of food you get so many varieties for a very reasonable price for sure. Will come back again and this time with more friends👌 Highly recommended ☺️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJ3ORyF5dCZiZDbNidNq980OdEwoRH5eK7cSZE&fid=0x0:0x9064c08dca8758d4"],"When":"2024-7-21"}]
