user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Anthony Plaxen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0TosyGAQWTqM_XvTHaXfq2jDGHv6ifKWBgTGcJKYnap3ceipL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I love poke and Steve’s is one of my go-to spots for tasty poke bowls. Located inside Brentwood burnaby, the poke bar is inside the food court area and not hard to miss.

I thought at this location the poke was just okay. I did find that compared to other locations like Richmond, the burnaby one was lacking a bit with the freshness of the salmon, otherwise beyond that it would have been quite perfect.

Excellent and friendly staff here, they were very helpful and the portions were good. Again, my only downside is that I found the salmon to be a bit lacking in both texture and found it to be luke like warm.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPUP_pyRk8kFpGpcEaTBocSdQI9m5wmiUI_XOo&fid=0x0:0x94a407278851b694"],"When":"2024-9-25"},{"Name":"Jason D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV14HLbc6Ze7JZiJufUEhwiQ1I37e9rPxJ7pjEPsypNxuqatRs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Love this poke bowl location! The staff is extremely friendly and the portions for the salmon is decent. Their jasmine green tea is refreshing as well, so highly recommend trying","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEcik6LCN0TthuZXHpklTfm3wzYvEnZqTl96U&fid=0x0:0x94a407278851b694"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Juju D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXjdd-23iL698yDpFS2UF1tdz75HwENBiqv47o_WeNigFfyoeD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Top notch service here! Every single staff member working this morning was so attentive and helpful. From the moment I got helped, going down the line and to the till, the 3 people helping me out were efficient, nice and helpful as it was my first time here. The food tasted so good, I will be coming back here next time I visit this mall! Thank you so much for the awesome customer service and teamwork! It’s clear everyone here knows what they’re doing and is on the same page! ( I took a couple bites before snapping the picture )","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO69Df7z6SwWcZzl3yEl7QN5CXcUheaoyIET-bu&fid=0x0:0x94a407278851b694"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"Elena Kashyrina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU46JYNtdiO5Q_k-bwYPqYLUhseOlePNEAQvjsmRYy4NjKw2Cc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I tried it with a friend and came back again.  Nikita is a professional, he told, showed, and advised everything.  All products are fresh and prepared with high quality.  Large varied selection.  I recommend!   I'll be back more than once.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNahr_YHadRv-ANR57Cz5tzq0mih5bCR78vpuS_&fid=0x0:0x94a407278851b694"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Marcus Parmar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDyrgJFWSPPvK7-Hc1nKCswy2j-UuRSPB54Pdo8M-aIpPAeA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Don’t understand the 1 star reviews. I probably received the best service from Eddie today. Not once in my life I felt so attended by a worker especially the gong show what is happening with a certain group of people and how they treat customers. Eddie was just an awesome guy who helped me pick out my order and was just a beauty. Great food too, and I drove 35 minutes to this place and will definetly drive 35 minutes back to this location.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"John","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLeo1WGIMhQdfREl4vBppLy7zlmCcJ6KQQm6B9JXvshENLhiw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited Steve’s Poke Bar at the Brentwood mall this afternoon after hearing rave reviews on social media. The young man, Giuliano, who served me was not only polite and friendly but also provided exceptional service with a bright smile. His attention to detail and positive attitude made the experience truly delightful. I opted for white rice, ponzu sauce, 2 scoops of Salmon, Edamame beans, cucumbers, mango, green onions, topped with sesame seeds and green seaweed seasoning. Giuliano's outstanding service and the delicious meal made me feel truly welcomed and appreciated. His dedication to providing a great experience is commendable, and we need more individuals like him in the service industry. I happily tipped him 15% for going above and beyond in his role.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMskeBRs6ZGfsj6RwfeGO6nfQNGEdPbKG2cyj2h&fid=0x0:0x94a407278851b694"],"When":"2024-3-3"},{"Name":"Ben Moreno","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbXIQA5QNY2om_rvFeJhZDcAcErydWjpf8dpxFoZ8JJurbSZgE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Definitely a high level food, service, atmosphere,  great customer service,  I love the big size portions when they prepare the bowl, very friendly and simpatic servers, well recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWCr0BVKbktIIkDGpP-_DjuwF4TTvaFvP-tBf9&fid=0x0:0x94a407278851b694"],"When":"2024-6-15"},{"Name":"Could Be Anyone","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDAY50cq8NO-5jug61JWxmHG47SdtUaIM2tQjh7NIRoIRAN-Gn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Unfortunately, the rice is not a sushi one (no vinegar) and they don’t add mayo to “crab”. No meat options available either.

They forgot to add edamame and pineapple.

I tried so many poke places to find an alternative to Pokerrito and so far couldn’t.

The Hawaiian tea was good on the other side.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM52Gpb6vwnvl-B7OeZ-ad7iTu1Ab_-TiqSFpXP&fid=0x0:0x94a407278851b694"],"When":"2024-6-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Morgan Neil","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmy2ZgjTTjAnaiVVbg5YEkLkyT1oOt3n1MpdL3uQejIwErSKM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"You can easily find other Taiwanese meals that are much better than this one! In my meal, everything is a disaster except for the black tea.

Waffle, the picture showed two pieces, but what I received was one piece along with a bunch of crispy bits.

As for the side dish, they used a small steamed bun, which I've never seen any restaurants do so before.

The noodles were cut into very small pieces, most of them shorter than a finger joint. The noodle for sure was from the left over pack.
They only gave these tiny noodle pieces.
The noodles were super soft and really not tasty at all; they were just greasy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3w-zhEBm1_XoAvUXNDDJ8toXe5GfxRQAs9KPI&fid=0x0:0x81f752f45fc355c7"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"RX W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8zgGdsYIdhbvg9zRlw7CI2m5V3AAwf_TAyy07ZbykNIxt1g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly recommend! Ordered #16 Mince Pork Belly & Popcorn chicken on rice! Tastes authentic taiwanese. The pork was well marinated and chopped small enough. There is no weird 'pork' taste at all! Food quality is good and freshly made!  Unlike most food court food with no effort! Portion is good with no waste of rice left at the end. Will try there Bao next time:)

The Staff is very friendly and knowing what the customer is concerned about.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3RIwDCDxGnrG4GML7E-FUWdW7t6WxY8K8fSrA&fid=0x0:0x81f752f45fc355c7"],"When":"2024-5-24"},{"Name":"San Wayne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjFb2dB41O9n_VFwgfqlyajgDnGhNggu7YKnObZ04VikDc3OZS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food is reasonable price. The Taiwan Salted fried chicken is good but the dry chow Mein is not so good. Hope to choose another option if noodles can be chooses in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNt468A2MGna-jhTBEuhzEMwnZmvl-UXodIHLyd&fid=0x0:0x81f752f45fc355c7"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"Paul Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVl2oVxJKLr_k_g4j5wg7lB9NsNfiBzRT5FNAPVPTrX-BeeOxpk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I would say this place offers authentic Taiwanese street food. The taste of the popcorn chicken and pork belly Gua Bao was good. The only downside was that the ingredient inside my Gua Bao was not reheated or thawed properly, so it was somewhat cold inside, which it shouldn't be. All in all, this is a restaurant that I would visit again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOaMLBc2VsU5UvNuLlcp1Z-WNQCt2olJXKvNWk&fid=0x0:0x81f752f45fc355c7"],"When":"2024-7-5"},{"Name":"Lisa Stewart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWo79veLnsCvDCjha0TJoTathwJUFPajJepLVXdR9rXYCLOAi7D6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fun to try a new place, especially in a food court!  The bao was super tasty!  My soup dumplings needed a bit more zing, they lacked flavour.  My girls enjoyed their crispy chicken and lemonade.  I will try some other items off the menu next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8dbZ-ybSd66rr4fzeV_zT8nz7hkR5VZWMUirh&fid=0x0:0x81f752f45fc355c7"],"When":"2023-9-12"},{"Name":"M T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDZHf9z7wV-qOBXt1v_-FHUuWNSLz4Eicetc2o0TaHtyObxw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've ordered 2 combo (included drinks) with one free popcorn chicken, great price! We liked the teriyaki chicken and beef but the chow mein noodles had too sauce and greasy. The shrimp fried rice and popcorn chicken were perfect and delicious. Great service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOd8MLaYGp-c6FdmhkjCnErrKLGgUkbE-4qkzU&fid=0x0:0x81f752f45fc355c7"],"When":"2022-12-4"},{"Name":"Karen Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIeLv5KmxScMMva-gjTL_3-TCzbKWztlgA9q30uhiYoFshgDw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved the stinky tofu, so stinky.
Loved the popcorn chicken as well. Tasted just like home","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqaNUoL3g3ORZJgzqOFYWYwX-_1c9IsihZ8lko&fid=0x0:0x81f752f45fc355c7"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"B K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsV-6Jfj9gCzSYBGxW-AuerQcPwxemx3Fz0L0abS57iBAjqB56xA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I've been coming here for a year now and have always had the same menu item, shrimp fried rice, and I feel like the quality is getting lower and lower despite the rising prices.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwqUrlNshSqhkMfVo8ciZu0v1jEjvvgGVCI7GK&fid=0x0:0x81f752f45fc355c7"],"When":"2024-7-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Daria Liukin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkJyqUukJ1Tp32CT1Y60hgwO8TEu98t8UrHjC4vSHU3XhtZR-hfA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We visited Tap & Barrel right after it opened for brunch, and the place is amazing! It has three floors—the first and second are indoor and open year-round, while the third is a patio open during the summer. We sat on the second floor, right by the windows overlooking the Brentwood fountain, and the view was beautiful!

The service was excellent, with super friendly staff who welcomed us warmly, shared details about the restaurant, and answered all our questions with big smiles and great energy. The waiters helped us choose our dishes, explaining everything in detail.

The food was delicious, and we were completely full afterward. Overall, we loved everything and highly recommend this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPqCHdmfT_Zut7ya0BhtYUwwB2igZ_ntEpRaoV&fid=0x0:0x26d644e7075a79b3"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Elise Coulombe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViK4jjoo4e0IQVt9oYUgRxEQZAEfBII2krEdtoehaUBKGdHAcJQw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Robyn was amazing! Such a sweet server and made our time there fantastic!

We ordered the Valentina honey lettuce wraps not knowing what to expect and they were absolutely delicious. I want them catered to my wedding. Also ordered the prosciutto and arugula pizza which was delicious as well. Great experience here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWE5aWqSYChj83-B81rpc9eGbA33zQFnrtdvbM&fid=0x0:0x26d644e7075a79b3"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Jemma Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXCHgsvEOda8Euj2F1UAraubpKMT6WV7yVIZRrlelmuyGL9zw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"James & Syd at the bar - fantastic service. Will recommend and customize a drink for you to the best of their ability. Actually surprised at how incredible the food is. Was not expecting the pizza to be a 10/10 woodfire oven deliciousness stacked with pepperoni. GREAT happy hour! They actually have a great selection of drinks (cocktails) and extensive wine list. Our favourites are the calamari (possibly best we’ve ever had) salt & pepper wings, and Ranchero bowl. The upstairs patio is 10/10 view and dining experience. This is the best Tap & Barrel location and we are now regulars! We love it here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXL3_SDpoLFzfPfPtVI0rsZf_ecm2l8O1gSzIR&fid=0x0:0x26d644e7075a79b3"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"toffy concepcion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYhf6f6Tr-b7ekbkXxFz9ueDreb1BCkopv3RQXbcpm54DeMfYl5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is an excellent Tap and Barrel with really friendly and helpful staff from the start to finish. While trying to avail of the free parking from the app. Aaron the bar tender saw me struggling and helped me get it done. Yes the bar tenders are always experts. Our server Kelly was really helpful and attentive to our needs. The onion ring burger with truffle fries is excellent. Chicken strips, Salmon, Mac and cheese, loaded nachos were all wonderful and the desserts were great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqq_MDf-GmThYSDGdm4uXn82Aql5JXAHLWyeoV&fid=0x0:0x26d644e7075a79b3"],"When":"2024-7-8"},{"Name":"J. Adano","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXS6fYBp1czglx2bGTTrcfG3fTSHEuBmlqY6u1JHeL0TPZEijc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had reservations on a Saturday at 6PM. Although it was pretty busy we were seated within 10min of our arrival which was by the window on the second floor. The Canucks game was playing and there were ample TVs around  to watch the game in the background while socializing . Our waitress was very nice and attentive to our needs however, you can tell that she was running around most of the night due to her having multiple tables with large groups. A couple of missed drink orders but totally understandable. We ordered the following appetizers to start: truffle fries, hot wings, lettuce wraps, fresh guacamole and chips. All were good and as expected. For the mains, we all order the 10oz ribeye steak. Everyone agreed that it was tasty and a good sized portion however I found mine a bit salty and garlicky. I would definitely order it again but would request the creole butter on the side. Hence only the 4 stars. We had lots of drinks that were top notch. Started with a few Russel Honey Lager beers to kick things off. Tried a Backcountry Widowmaker IPA which was pretty good as well. Then tried a couple of different cocktails. The ones I’d recommend are the margarita slush, and purple reign. Finally capped it off with desert which I’d highly recommend not skipping because the cheesecake and Affogato ( a scoop of vanilla ice cream and a shot off espresso) were pretty darn good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhf-ST2zJNpIcKBGo9JI_nXupYyAZQ31laQM6X&fid=0x0:0x26d644e7075a79b3"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Nathan Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULis9x-C7u8jouJ6bmV-m7Mb2r-esn5uJaOqGwjwAA9z2MADUV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food took awhile to come and in the end it was alright. The pizza was decent along with fries however the burgers weren’t anything too special unfortunately. Happy hour prices are good which I cant complain. I’ll do my best to come by again as I believe it could’ve just been a bad day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2V7eWzqTRaNFW1w0rwzGnnKvcI6bJpHWetuCO&fid=0x0:0x26d644e7075a79b3"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"D D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVn-HmKGkiEXpPYEJdaFnX-Wk9npBuMky8Sv8ZSJcapzQOOPiN3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Impressive 3 floors with totally different vibes.  Happy hour food was great other than the pizza which was on the bland side.  Service was attentive and friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZOh15bkHbCx7BHK2b7QnwpQvA8LVOVUc-YlW4&fid=0x0:0x26d644e7075a79b3"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"oksana lytvynenko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCje5lIUYZuNH8dpnlmprn3ASLPMDIAcyvdUW5mWyFWaEkzjPTXg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great service. The girl-hostes smiled very well at the entrance, I guess I saw wisdom teeth. Guacamole was fresh, and rose wine complemented perfectly. Everything is fine. I'll definitely be back for lunch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN48FQ3nau06T9VYr_JTEzpQi7s3J8ScrzQV5zu&fid=0x0:0x26d644e7075a79b3"],"When":"2024-8-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tony Ly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjxNLcYJypr5nhUX8arZp4XW9suDjuCDvie4EDIAqM9Y257BA8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nov 7, 2024: I had the Mentaiko Cream Mazesoba and my partner had the Tokyo Mazesoba. While my food was ok, I enjoyed the Tokyo Mazesoba much more. I think the portions are very generous, especially since it has free up sizing. Also get a small portion of rice after to mix with your leftover sauce. Overall just really great and enjoyable experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4DZjaVSC04nL6duEOumhtMOqrQSkU-5wQxuwI&fid=0x0:0x97553fbf5420c0af"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"Catalina Guaiquil","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVOe8kJL7MTggWcKMcV2lAYOLtW0kE1otXxdA-x6ravZ8yYWi9Xyg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favorite ramen restaurant! I love the atmosphere, the prices are reasonable, dining in is super convenient, and the decoration is amazing! Most importantly, the food is absolutely delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8sVhBpsaeiBMBwWHrDajH7f5n7qqLY36NNCJx&fid=0x0:0x97553fbf5420c0af"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Lucia Martin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWD62NnYZ8sbYz8NfhbmZrZlqgjMSTvCKN3sYnMBikbgZA4DmtI8Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always come here with friends or family as it's easy to share plates for the whole table to try different dishes ! The price is super reasonable for the amount of food u get (especially if u upsize) and they have recently put new menu items too! V delicious and easy to drop by (⁠✯⁠ᴗ⁠✯⁠)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOUR7bzJQyT4BDoeJQUJl4h2buhouQNu2tjgf4&fid=0x0:0x97553fbf5420c0af"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Alan Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-QmMYfw75kgf5vonVt_7RAAdUJRl5hAF6Ijht6iC6ZE8aPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been coming here for awhile and enjoyed every time I have visited. The staff were friendly and attentive and the washrooms were clean :)

Ninja gyoza was tasty and the ramen and Mazesoba were both good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_hUD_2lQIrDiRavCtj_3Z80W0r8ct1mi9mz5v&fid=0x0:0x97553fbf5420c0af"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Nalinee Yeung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWo10huSX0dX6mUo_p-98vcDKFsNu-pbqmp1FOUHibmggCI0smK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"went there for dinner the place s nice decorated. Many choices of dishes and it came out very tasty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDH2sIr9wrUzw39q5v37KByg1BIVGpYtXSBkfj&fid=0x0:0x97553fbf5420c0af"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"8T8","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLaHAe29LTwj-kDB4Rxp2LPyCtNn-xUw5U4xwT2905ny-JNkA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went to Kokoro Tokyo Mazesoba twice in two consecutive days.  Once in Metrotown and the other at Brentwood.  Both locations phenomenal.  Excellent service and the taste is identical.  Highly recommended.  Make sure to read the "How to Eat Mazesoba" instructions.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQnvpqTcXcw36aELP-9YuvehcxLJRzoF175mLU&fid=0x0:0x97553fbf5420c0af"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"John Doe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUep7otFEM8_mjRAdIw7SDKo9mqFpMeilbXqvzM7Bem_9cOvvTs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The restaurant is hotter than Mall it’s self ; the mall has full comfort AC breeze. Restaurant just cheap out turning AC for hot summer day. Order takes over 25 min, slow like hell. Kitchen staff was goofing around, if they not plan do afternoon service then just shut down. After paid and leave zero greeting, very disappointing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOV0gCsHcPgfon-MOqngkj9Sqhe6fJ0lVmGjdVC&fid=0x0:0x97553fbf5420c0af"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"Melinda W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqFa91nGQX9-WVxFZ-rAUul10GF70bhWZFQZe97ymoPVUZrvFxnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I always love noodles, both Japanese and Chinese ones. We passed by this soba restaurant some time ago and decided to pay it a visit.

It offered broadly two types of soba, dry or in soup. My husband and I ordered one from each type out of curiosity. The dry one is very tasty in my view. I followed the instructions on the blue card with asking vinegar first then followed by some chilli flakes. The pork belly might seem quite greasy but it didn't feel greasy at all when it melted in your mouth. The overall flavors of this noodles are so enticing that I finished the whole thing without sharing with my husband 😂. One interesting thing about this noodles is that you can have a free bowl of rice to enjoy the remaining sauce if you want to. Good for customers with a larger appetite. To me, the noodles themselves are very filling already.

The soba in soup, according to my husband, has a very rich soup base. It came in nice and hot so he sipped a few spoonfuls before eating the noodles. He found the flavors and the texture of the noodles to his liking. He just wished that the sliced pork are thicker cut. 😂😂😂","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcyU8BgXIh03x5uB4w-r_iiGAnwbe2DND_htnq&fid=0x0:0x97553fbf5420c0af"],"When":"2024-5-11"}]

[{"Name":"Inna Solomeina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXc-i8SoM1Szp68YmTCiU7HGoDDLSX8gkAS54PFY00X8Lf2huH_hg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you want to taste real Mexican cuisine, look no further. This is the right place! I loved everything we ordered there. The soup was delicious, creamy and hearty. We will come back for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0I2I66qZCEzYQhXfZOlwXypKgAqm9FACOK9jX&fid=0x0:0xe681e89ff7ff2318"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"Matthaeus Alfaro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKDAO6qcfaxg7guGrvHl6KmEN1lf02rFnOQFYQ9auE6B6VVB6GEw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were a group of three and had the best time! Their food, cocktails and service was top notch. What stood out the most is their service - Diego was exceptional. He checked in, recommended some amazing cocktails and also had a personalized approach to the people at our table. He did make our experience from great to amazing! Highly recommend La Taqueria Brentwood for anyone looking to have great food, cocktails and service. 10/10 from me","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-B6FN3MCaeHrnnsYy5GhyW0G1mi8lxpJ_hz50&fid=0x0:0xe681e89ff7ff2318"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"Reza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKC_kPBW1Si1P3X218EM5NJd1BMGKvdmKZizc2NChnDJc6nPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly recommended! Awesome Diego was our waiter he was so welcoming and helped us to order the right meal for us. All his recommendation were tasty and so fresh. The staff are all friendly and the atmosphere of the restaurant is great. We had so much fun and we enjoyed the food. Definitely will go back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzaQyxOvUagi10SHF2DKnGXcwdiZY1GADmL-S4&fid=0x0:0xe681e89ff7ff2318"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"Zylgwyn Lucas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUs1dCDWPX3AUz9pAH4dlfYs6w3TiWPMQ2DA2Gei_OawhK71U=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our first Mexican restaurant visit in many years. Definitely beyond our expectations.

The vibe, music, food & the service is perfect. Keep up the good job guys.

Highly recommend those who is looking for authentic Mexican dish.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNT9L2VIT131lNI9YLUJFFaDxgWK-WWe_xXXjk3&fid=0x0:0xe681e89ff7ff2318"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Wing Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3CwQO9cN_VmYBk6QsIpDB_ChUQLMcdHTqcHBMFHLumtEVmGxm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food tasted great but was bit heavier than other Mexican restaurants I’ve tried before. Our food took around an hour to come. The staff explained it’s because one of the dishes takes a long time to prepare. The restaurant was also very cold until they turned on the heaters.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmBw42Ay6BRu4MPWkD4sdDrGeW3rW-ygyz7c0-&fid=0x0:0xe681e89ff7ff2318"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Jordana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJvxqFr8nGL8vok-SCRwxhp2_EJmOiFDFc3qAUH70xw1rrHg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went here on a Friday afternoon for happy hour. The location was accessible, the ambiance was great, not too loud but still lively, as a mexican restaurant should be. The servers were very attentive and made sure we were comfortable. We had the nachos, trio tacos, key lime pie and some drinks. The nachos came in a good size and had a lot of toppings bit the chips were ovrr salted, we couldnt eat it. We could actually see the specks of seasoned salt on the chips. The trip tacos tasted good however, its literally a tortilla, one thin slice of meat, and salsa verde. Great taste but not worth the price. The Carlota (Key lime pie) was great. It was frozen like ice cream pie, and the lime and sugar were perfectly balanced.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgV7Mq6I6bM-4d3jXIT_tR9LTpPXacQUdd5jRf&fid=0x0:0xe681e89ff7ff2318"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Nadima","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKJEeimLWW13EymUh976iEpx9lUa20btVuJ-MmCkFDCZK3Fgw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It was my first time at this location - have been to the others before and loved them. My friend and I did not appreciate the hostess trying to turn us away because they close at 9:00 pm. We arrived at 8:15 pm and the hostess was adamant that we could not dine in. If you're closed at 8:15 pm, please change your Google hours to reflect that instead of 9:00 pm.

After 5 minutes she finally decided to let us in. We had happy hour food and it was great. We had the Guacamole and Chips, trio of tacos (you choose 3), and the Chicken Bowl.

The server and rest of the staff were great and made us feel welcome.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSgLwYxmG1RieDe_iwe3kgKjGiSc9p_0on7xMj&fid=0x0:0xe681e89ff7ff2318"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Shaun Abila","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJZMQn9xR38QI9tbe9L9mr39paM0WGY5_TEGdjdyuyvfbxJ7w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came with my brother for a late lunch and we enjoyed our experience. We had the ribs for starters, they tasted amazing. We both loved the birria tacos, our first time having them, really good. Had churros to top it off. All the while, our server Victoria made sure our table was attended to at all times. Loved her energy and she explained the menu very well. Will definitely visit again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjjqlJVhmq2_vUeT_b00zblVFnXVS6k7EaWyFp&fid=0x0:0xe681e89ff7ff2318"],"When":"2024-12-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Joanne T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKWUm5wApXaGLdrhdyLnYu0BbbvdpiPo1GB0zmazZcIdHhRZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely for a date or hangout with friends. It's a nice difference from the overly dark restaurants that serve similar fare. Staff are friendly and helpful. I appreciated that they were very careful in checking and noting allergies.

Ordered the mussels and clams in white wine cream sauce on two occasions—great flavour and it goes well with the focaccia bread option, but both times there's been sand and some have been super tiny.

Overall nothing particularly standout, but the food is solid!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORU_G8E9nrKWc9Vppz7XeGMjL67RUXWUepXV0T&fid=0x0:0x8937a4abaea624bb"],"When":"2024-10-31"},{"Name":"Audrey T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVt7NSeCmrDxjN6eGFiHdOku-giePvd1JuUbLyAEp6odBtHY6vv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Stopped by for late night happy hour with some friends. The restaurant is very nice and spacious and service was quick and attentive. I got the sangria and it was tasty. My friends got the house lager and we liked the design on the glasses. Oysters were solid at $2 each. Our first round had a lot of shells, but the second round was perfect. Fish and chips were tasty, and so were the sliders. We preferred the clams over the mussels. We would also skip on the dynamite roll next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNljNi8cXG_PuMKAq_7u9vpwKt0oO3EBbGts70o&fid=0x0:0x8937a4abaea624bb"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Jessy J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLHNRFw0Z_JgaU0TxGr1Pv5X-w9V6JzR0bnCuTDlGr_7pfsbx_k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We dined at Bow & Stern over the weekend as a large party of over 20 people, and the service was definitely the highlight. With four servers attending to us, they were attentive to both the adults and children, providing napkins and handling our requests with care. Although some of the servers seemed new, they delivered the service smoothly, including bringing ice buckets for our wine.

However, the timing of the food was an issue. Despite starting dinner at 6 p.m., we didn’t receive our desserts until around 8:45 p.m. Since it was a school night, we had to pack up and leave without fully enjoying the final course.

As for the food, it was a mixed experience. The mussels should be a must order. I hit one with white wine cream sauce it was superb! The Brussel sprouts were overly sweet. The steak was tough, and the Arctic char was dry with underwhelming crispy skin, and I found a chipped shell in one of my oysters. On the bright side, the risotto and king crab were quite enjoyable, though cracking the King crab leg was a challenge, and the lobster initially lacked butter, which the server kindly provided upon request.

Overall, service was the standout of the night, while the food left room for improvement.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbyfOwno-7dGbncbtO9TSOrmb9DQ54aKS69iWH&fid=0x0:0x8937a4abaea624bb"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Johnson Hsin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJod1Ky8nWyo6bJwD11XbmtXok3a518fIFRBw8HjqKKYlhXqg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"First time going to Bow & Stern since they've opened a few months ago. We went to happy hour at 2 pm for oyster, and the server told us they ran out before happy hour started. This was unfortunate, but we ended up getting two clam and mussels, honey chicken sliders, and the lobster grilled cheese sandwich. The sliders are decent, and the chicken was hot and breaded nicely. The mussels and the sauce were good. The clam came to us with lots of sand inside, and the cream sauce was over seasoned (very salty). We had to get this sent back, but the server was nice enough to get the kitchen to remake it. The second time we tried it, it would be a lot better and would recommend it. Lastly, the lobster grilled cheese.. decent amount of lobster inside, but the mozzarella was overpowering. Dont get me wrong, I love cheese, but it was like I was eating only cheese. The bread was toasted well, and the fries were good.

Overall experience was okay. I feel like the food really needs some work. The servers and ambiance of the place were great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOm2nF1NI4sZyVrpP0ha1vUjG95RutHtk1KdqZg&fid=0x0:0x8937a4abaea624bb"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Ling To","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIlFxJCKp6bjqARUOXgwrUpHcbKAm9tBpTn_ze63uacIdbffw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We came for happy hour. A tad underwhelming since we were one of a handful of tables. Since the restaurant opened a little over two months, decor remains crisp and welcoming.

Food took longer to arrive than I had expected considering the place was mostly dead. Instead of tasting fresh and hot. It was lukewarm. The bread that came with the chowder had hard crust. The fries that accompanied our cod tasted like it sat out for awhile.

Our server was nice enough but wasn't pro-active to get us refills. When we wrapped up our meal - he was busy tending to other tables so we had to flag another server for the $110 bill.

Lots of areas to improve on to compete with Earls and Tap and Barrel where we typically go!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjivyJtoNdh6bW-PYiszugweEmPCz6x0aeBu_3&fid=0x0:0x8937a4abaea624bb"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Thomas Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUITuDRjw9J9Us45xAUXKSfp8lG2sJ2s04TW_lNAi_G6a5d62ur=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I enjoyed my visit to bow and stern very much. I had the chicken burger and was able to also taste the lobster poutine, and the calamari. Overall the food was tasty however I would not recommend the hot honey chicken burger as it was a bit dry. Other than that good experience. The staff were attentive and friendly and the restaurant looks very nice in terms of decorations and furniture. The value was okay but this is a nicer restaurant so higher prices are to be expected.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_Lygl4BJgK34ge0T4zXrVA_e1INrUM3oJxo0P&fid=0x0:0x8937a4abaea624bb"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Jay Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJgJ3GqWqzz5gKwDw9Rk0BtDOxoj9fHklquopBItC7yPtZgIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Happy that they opened one in Brentwood! I really love the clam chowder here, has quite a bit of clams, right amount of kick and consistently good. Seafood tower was fresh and tasty. Lobster dip was also amazing. The service was quick, friendly and attentive. We'll definitely be back again! Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhyoTs60c-I1gtz31xzxCe8eiywpfq-xTL9WCF&fid=0x0:0x8937a4abaea624bb"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"Y. Cherski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-7SLlKKRW0Rqcp9wRXFlvt6gbh0rtI7PMIroLgxETtGiPwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This kind of establishment has been long overdue in Burnaby, especially on the northern side. The location is spot-on, and we discovered it the old-fashioned way—not through an ad or review, but simply because it stood out from the street, towering above the neighboring structures. Inside, it’s spacious yet inviting, with an interior design that feels both grand and comfortable. The menu is extensive and diverse. Service was spot-on too. Wade took care of us and did a fantastic job, striking just the right balance between attentive and relaxed. The food itself? No complaints, as everything was beautifully balanced, leaving us fully satisfied. However, the experience wasn’t without its hiccups. Perhaps due to the sheer size of the place, the food arrived painfully slow, even the oysters. And they weren’t even at half capacity, from what I could tell. There seemed to be a bit of a bottleneck between the kitchen and the table, and I could actually watch my coffee sit at the bar long enough to go cold, which is a bit disappointing, especially given the impressive coffee setup they have. I’m hoping these are just teething issues as they figure things out because this place has serious potential. Despite the delays, we thoroughly enjoyed our lunch and are hopeful that they will iron out the kinks soon. Burnaby needs more spots like this.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP03Uds5HCB7UR2cKiqKzstc_7kyrlRpZ0PA6He&fid=0x0:0x8937a4abaea624bb"],"When":"2024-10-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Al So","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLumQHIv-5W9wXPr4ZbA1zWCVnPk2w1Kc3bjsO93-VMG-v7JQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sooda recently opened in Brentwood Mall after relocating from a nearby spot that operated since 2017. We ordered the Sooda Box, a delicious beef-topped rice cake with various cool toppings; the honey garlic option looked particularly tempting. The seafood pancake, featuring squid and shrimp, was crispy and flavorful, albeit a bit greasy. The Bibimbap was also enjoyable, accompanied by tasty sides. The food court itself is an international gem, spacious and well-organized, making it a great dining destination. The restaurant was bustling, and the staff were friendly. I highly recommend Sooda for a delightful meal!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDCRo3sceD4dc-iYu2SWEu3ENMrsnuiz6uu9p2&fid=0x0:0xd99a16e3fe000c03"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Alan Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-QmMYfw75kgf5vonVt_7RAAdUJRl5hAF6Ijht6iC6ZE8aPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been to their old and now their new location at Brentwood. The space here much larger than their old place which is nice consider how often you’d have to wait at the older location they had.

The service was friendly all around and the food was just as good as their old spot. Where you are coming here with a couple of friends or for a larger group meet up, they can accommodate you here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWsIp8RFbg2feGp9_FZO3ZnNqyUFdofOy7gSG4&fid=0x0:0xd99a16e3fe000c03"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Serena C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVLyBLBOvmhw80t-2zZP0jyDPEx3fYNAiv0iLkHeiLA6wofE5AbQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great decorations with the neon signs, clean esthetic.

Friendly courteous service!

Food was delicious!
The ribs melted off the bones!
And the tartare sushi (sooda box) was so flavourful! You just keep wanting another piece!

Would come back for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7iiWEoYPiGS146U8Lndev4hXTQy2XkqdAp7Uw&fid=0x0:0xd99a16e3fe000c03"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Jordana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJvxqFr8nGL8vok-SCRwxhp2_EJmOiFDFc3qAUH70xw1rrHg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went here for sunday lunch and it didnt disappoint. No wait, we were seated right away. Took long to take our order but once she took it, everything came quick. Ordered the Hapnam set and deep fried mandus and these were more than enough for 3 people. We even had some leftovers. The food was very tasty, and unlike in other korean BBQ places, they cook the meat for you at Sooda. It was great but also awkward to have someone standing beside you cooking. We wouldnt have minded cooking the meat ourselves. The marinade of the meat was tasty but not overwhelming, just right. The kimchi was not as expected but still good .it wasnt spicy, barely had spice, and it wasnt fermented either. When we asked for more, we had to wait because they were still making it. Its ok if you dont mind it un- fermented. Different but good experience overall.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMff8Fk4XAGuz6bjctIG9X2Y7sC8N_nGtxPuFI8&fid=0x0:0xd99a16e3fe000c03"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Joanna Fahmy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJTznlA_q5Xa6Whv5wHF-yEDXEyOSOXOXBiPU7xtZRDBuF4Yw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was a cool experience and food was very tasty. My favourite was the sooda box!! Definitely come here with friends as portions are big for one or two people. The only downside is wait time as they are always busy but definitely worth the wait.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOsgiZqCSkkNrX5wtxTVFq2PQoKxoNl2s5OjKD&fid=0x0:0xd99a16e3fe000c03"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Heyam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQm9BhjOHMjC7GcWrHn68t1cIzjRHFnDfgXZNgHLdz2uOG85st=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very delicious Korean food.
We ordered Sooda beef and cheese, and it was very tasty. It is enough for 3-4 people. The spwcial cocktails are tasty, but the alcohol is not very strong.
There is some lineup, but it takes shorter than what you think","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXkT2f6N7oKBAzj6NYMJQdlxv-G_TEqRA_zj1S&fid=0x0:0xd99a16e3fe000c03"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Kingramen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU35K9K-3WDR1LhMOarmobzfUiY3qJQT45Dn4vfHiWAkp32qFPGKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Been a few times, always a line here but was lucky I was able to walk straight in for a party of 2. The Sooda Special which is grilled meat served on a hot plate is the signature dish and was good portion and tasty for both of us. The surprise was their cocktails, refreshing to pair with the bbq.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlTIr62J5piyMSAOAZPLIFgFrCp7hxoDfQ0tqf&fid=0x0:0xd99a16e3fe000c03"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Remi R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJpvPFRphd2VpkxXVMIzOICSXl9la0Wn9DQoVWjZSK_rb7z9ak=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Prepare to wait because this place is very small and popular.
We ended up waiting an hour and a half, but we weren’t in a hurry so spent some time at Brentwood mall.
We were told we had one hour to finish our food, so if you are looking for a leisurely dinner spot this is not the place for you.

The food was amazing!
Their homemade ice tea is very yummy as well.
Definitely a fun place to eat and I would definitely come more prepared on my timing when eating here again because it’s worth it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSbZn0mYTCPQ2S8iQb4hNXcRn2DdRfbVFwdbyl&fid=0x0:0xd99a16e3fe000c03"],"When":"2024-8-31"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tricia C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIS8jxdORXKJaAWhct8yqQ3gE8qhWdlJFJL5jsz8u98jLVDfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fresh seafood serve on fresh crispy seaweed. The warm rice, fresh quality seafood and the extra crunch from the seaweed is what makes this restaurant unique. There are few Japanese restaurants in town that serve this level of crisp seaweed on the spot. Most rolls with seaweed are soft or soggy by the time it is consumed. Staff is welcoming and attentive to customers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaMJ1Xy146NJjpnA6GfblA4K1e-deyRsBxxynH&fid=0x0:0x8e28ab0cee57b8c0"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Vida Nayeri Laurent","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWaZYxHvWD_g4TBrKcc_gTKoe0970q0swxO0SodwKDhNIILjAMoRw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Michelin star alert ! This place really deserves a star. Everything was beyond our expectations. Fernanda was superb. She was an amazing hostess. We’ve been to couple of Japanese restaurants with Michelin star but this was much better experience at Hello Nori. I really wanted to congratulate you guys for running such a memorable restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORcDdGcw5XvrrzKRfSEXY_qoVAnb98OI5IeFNS&fid=0x0:0x8e28ab0cee57b8c0"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Sky Jang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsnlFBmRy7tyi6QC1WQMYS-_XgUyK7bm7m7BJrwzV_4Y89SkWE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Last night, I had a very pleasant experience with great people and delicious food. I could tell they use fresh, high-quality ingredients. I really enjoyed the sashimi platter and the decent selection of sake.

Our server, Shin, was very attentive and passionate, which made our night even more delightful. We stayed until closing time, but the supervisor made us feel very comfortable until we left the restaurant.

I wish I had this place near me!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMklrQKDAuisjxAzciByZQmPezMkPARgledNENo&fid=0x0:0x8e28ab0cee57b8c0"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"eilian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRs3q9A91UKpxgK5zcvbayckaCDV2p4ClNKRnRX52C5mv0G9p0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great hand rolls, highly recommend the scallop. Unbelievably soft and melted like butter. We got a tuna and salmon sashimi set and it was amazing as well. Feature cocktail was great too. Service was top notch. Got a few things on the house. 10/10 worth the trip","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODFtrVxex_EC-oTn3d9A8bFCXN82TAU6iNaynD&fid=0x0:0x8e28ab0cee57b8c0"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Michelle Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL4pcPjl4t4uNODsq0hbbsjMmM281GvrEzF7xn8jCwVVL-Z2P8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time here at Hello Nori and I can say that the food and experience were top notch. I got the 5-hand roll, Nakano (Saika), happy hour zen combo and mochi ice cream. You can taste the freshness/quality in all the hand rolls and sashimi. Of the hand rolls, my favourite were the Hokkaido scallop and snow crab. For the sashimi, sockeye salmon was the one.

All the staff were welcoming and warm, making the experience and transitions in shift-change very smooth.

Special shout out to Maheen & Sam for going above and beyond in giving recommendations and attentiveness in service. This place is definitely worth the price in food, quality, and service.

I’ll definitely have to try out the new location back home (Toronto)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCBFw-KQ3QaQrxozT6jVYNzhQFKiYDEp6NSM0V&fid=0x0:0x8e28ab0cee57b8c0"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Mark Yun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL_DhXmHOWNG6_6L5CabHJeltZVNikmSNa3Wn9EfJqhJfe7Kw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great atmosphere and amazing hospitality from the staff. Hana and Zuzana were both fantastic and really made us feel at home. This was my second visit, and the food was perfect. All the explanations about the dishes made them taste even better. Highly recommend—definitely worth trying if you're into Omakase-style Japanese cuisine!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPq9cYSKJpkL1snq9jmXphGu916vT1nwc53GBZ&fid=0x0:0x8e28ab0cee57b8c0"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Ty Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ1elPmigAV5ywdGkLRG-WSJOeq8tpQPGVw0fLYtZMUnFLH6H4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My very first experience with Hello Nori Brentwood was fantastic! The team here was professional, friendly and walked me through the menu with great details. Blake made the whole experience that much better with his professionalism, knowledge and friendly interactions since I was dining in alone. And also thanks to my server—Sam for his spectacular service & attention for all my needs during the experience. I felt welcome and really enjoy my time eating here because of them.

🍣The hand rolls were tasty! I got the top-5 combo which included all of their best-seller hand rolls. Also tried an extra order of Unagi hand-roll as well. Very good!

🍣Sashimi platter was 100% SO GOOD-SO FRESH. Very fresh with premium ingredients. I love that they served fresh wasabi because it really enhanced the freshness taste of the sashimi and doesn’t make your nose feel like it just came out of a boxing match! Presentation was on point. Highly recommend getting this platter to pair with the hand rolls if you can eat more or bring +1.

🍣Salmon Oishi — Smoky, tasty & rich flavours. Definitely recommend!

🍶Cocktail was refreshing. I got lychee berries which was a best-seller. They also have nitrous matcha which I’m excited to try on the next visit! (wanted to order it but was really full at this point.)

🍡Dessert was mochi ice cream. 4 flavours — matcha, vanilla, peach, strawberry. It completed the meal and left me satisfied.

Interior design is modern, unique and definitely a meaning behind the design I’d love to know about it (FYI: each Hello Nori location has a different unique design with the same materials). Overall, was spacious, very clean, good amount of natural light. Loved the music & vibes here.

Price point is very reasonable with the quality of ingredients & services you’re getting from here. Portion will fill you up even though it doesn’t look like it. This visit was my first meal and also my only meal of the day so I was able to eat more than usual😉

10/10 — Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkS39yH9d18k5RrT3YMe7c9i2DwViPTn7Fk5vQ&fid=0x0:0x8e28ab0cee57b8c0"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Amanda Calvo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPT3u9F4tno_QsaZnTJpTTUYEZMap2izOcH46FvI0ZiRtiHulf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I honestly don’t know what is better in this place: the fish that is extra fresh and tasty, the rice that is cooked to the perfect point and is still warm when is served, the perfect tasty and crunchy nori (seaweed), the amazing and sophisticated drinks (the Christmas one is 💯), the beautiful and cozy environment, the fast and excellent service, the best ice cream mochi I’ve ever had in my life… honestly, that’s my favourite place in metro Vancouver. I would recommend a thousand times.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_x2lJgNEdnK0RtcXvcdfui9bauKiGaYQfZ3-v&fid=0x0:0x8e28ab0cee57b8c0"],"When":"2024-12-8"}]

title: Neptune Palace Seafood Restaurant (Brentwood Mall)

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Solid, albeit slightly salty food, but not the friendliest of service. We went for the happy hour dim sum over the weekend. We made a reservation for 2:15 but since the dim sum happy hour doesn’t begin until 2:30, we were only seated around that time. Whether it was because we came for the happy hour, it was not very clear. Just as we were seating, they asked us whether we wanted tea and walked away without hearing our response which was really rude.

Also when they gave us the menu, it wasn’t clear which ones were included in the promotion on the menu provided and the server left so quickly we didn’t get a chance to ask. It was 2:40 pm at this point and we were hungry so we just ordered as is from the non-crossed off items.

The dessert was the first to arrive at the table, before any of the other food, which was unacceptable. Then we got most of the dishes within a five minute span except for one. They didn’t even realize until we asked for it and there was no apologies or anything when we received the dish and that was while we were having dessert.

They charge for tea and for any take out boxes. I didn’t check our bill well enough to see whether there was a 15% discount accounted for the happy hour.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSDABhR6r9GCyJAJjq7rnOgGofYR-cP3oZaRdP&fid=0x0:0x7e39e6bd3fc99232"],"When":"2024-11-13"},{"Name":"Victor Law","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIpnZPh7heLHnvp3JcjErTq9VzUaFB6LA67FBNyLyGHNyq0kA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a higher priced Chinese restaurant, but the quality and proportions make them worthy.

Every meal that we have had here has been fantastic. The flavors are always on point, and there is plenty to go around.

Our favorite dishes are the Peking Duck 2-way with Lettuce Wrap, the Salted Fish & Chicken Fried Rice, the Roasted Chicken half, and my little ones love the Crab Claws with Shrimp Paste.

Since we do not live here, the price is worth it for the few opportunities we get to enjoy the amazing Chinese food in Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjnKBho6YRS6ZWocZBbqrkpYeF6QqChT1wodfa&fid=0x0:0x7e39e6bd3fc99232"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"HX Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlYYhpD9JHfzL6pBbvHaEDo2KwU_rwj_gqucPvsBKa_qy6gJr5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dined in this restaurant several times.  No disappointment any time.  Restaurant is nicely renovated and seating is comfortable.  Waiters/waitress greeted customers warmly.  Food  tastes good.  Special discounted dishes for weekdays.  I especially like their Peking duck 2 courses, ling cod 2 courses, and the oyster hot pot.  Highly recommend it to friends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-sKBhFTxdzSU1ZLwPpvvjs9yylGvY2wjnD-XX&fid=0x0:0x7e39e6bd3fc99232"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Mori","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzjNclSLYHoLurDMy1z6lBJJfgC1i3gQXUk28JpQQw8EIfuYkF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time coming to this specific location and luckily we didn't have to wait to be seated, on a Saturday early afternoon!
We had a craving for dim sum and happened to be in the area so we figured we would try this spot and I'm glad we did. The dim sum were a good size and the bean curd rolls and sticky rice had some nice flavors it.
It's on the pricier side of the dim sum spectrum, so expect to see prices in the $12 range for each dish under the dim sum menu.
The service was good, never had to ask for more hot water for the tea and the food came out quickly.
Will definitely come back again if we find ourselves in the area and are craving dim sum.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1KYZ0UKYCHV_Zp2htfc4DCeQxSfVwxaL9gROs&fid=0x0:0x7e39e6bd3fc99232"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Clara Chau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoMWRC0cDGP4nCpQ1_Zdm86daXS0A0KJbVAa9QczqqbfD7fWIZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came here for the Tuesday Peking duck two course special and it was delicious! We were a table of 4 with reservations (seated very quickly too) and the reason for the docked star was mainly because service just wasn't there. We weren't asked what tea we wanted and menus were also not given either. It took approximately 10 minutes to get the attention of the servers to place our tea order and ask for menus. The restaurant wasn't empty but it was not at half capacity either so we found it strange it took so long (getting the bill and payment took forever as well). Between 4 of us, we shared the Peking duck course, the egg white fried rice and the sauteed green beans. Food came super quick and everything was tasty! Peking duck was crispy, the lettuce wrap was super fresh and the fried rice was amazing. Definitely recommend coming here on Tuesdays as it's about half price for the Peking duck course.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNt6APVQ_474JH0ljL18O2h3fpgR0JQRabT-saG&fid=0x0:0x7e39e6bd3fc99232"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Bella Mills","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9Ii_MUe1yBHkf4i7hAtgKoYsTZWvSgOMwOkR9qA3QXh9dyYpPrg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Braised Goose Feet with Fish Maw & Mushroom.
Goose feet is not soft enough and fish maw is truly fishy. Chicken and Pekin duck are super crispy and juice. The rest of dishes are delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMITXn9wsIsSWD24Buc01M3ja3XhCvSzLgAW2Fd&fid=0x0:0x7e39e6bd3fc99232"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Kelvin L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIKP-AEz_-4OsWq_LkU6jY6VsViU-g2T1snkyr7uxb8Q5hpgcQGg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My usual go to spot for dim sum is Sun Sui Wah but I think I found myself a new go to place for dim sim. The prices are on the higher side but the quality and proportions make it worth it. Everything we order was very good and on point with taste.
They have daily specials as well as Happy Hour from 230 - 430 Monday to Friday. The service was good too.
I'll certainly be back again and maybe even for happy hour 😉","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdrwnAOb7YqjAkTv0E31SzBD3X5X8cjj6vz4WQ&fid=0x0:0x7e39e6bd3fc99232"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Aneesh Vaghadia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLWrL7cKUXjPtxgV-J_aqDc0U8QhiCuyIUBtGHmUeqQs8V-GQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Neptune is a great Chinese restaurant located in Brentwood Mall. It is a traditional family style restaurant with round table seating, aquariums for fresh seafood and one wall serving as a TV screen for live sports.

Service at the restaurant is quick and snappy. The servers are professional and polite, efficiently providing great table service and serving dishes amidst the din of the busy restaurant floor.

The food is absolutely delicious. The prices are a bit higher but the quality is top and the portions are large, great for sharing amongst family. The two dishes of Peking duck are a classic! (The dim sum breakfast is also unreal, but we most recently came for dinner.) When purchasing seafood, the server will bring it alive to the table to inspect before preparation.

The restaurant is located on an upper level of Brentwood Mall and is accessible from the main concourse. There is ample parking located on the lower levels. The decor is classic modern and very clean. The bathrooms are located outside the main doors and down the hall, very clean.

Overall, great quality food and service make this one of the best dim sum restaurants in the city. Excellent to take tourists to have a culinary experience to remember!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0XNjdF1yEOXj9awed-r3_8dUwRUMi4JOjas8&fid=0x0:0x7e39e6bd3fc99232"],"When":"2024-9-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Hashan Peiris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQS5tXYmTSP8F6gc8CzViRW9uUkD3rHwc2GCIQJ7tX0r6Ne1oo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The food is delicious and well presented. The atmosphere is nice and clean, but their table setting welcomes only 4 or fewer groups. We went there for dinner as a group of 7 and had to wait by standing by the front door for around 80 minutes. Though there were  tables that could accommodate 4 and 2 people from time to time, they prioritized small groups for those tables. We had to wait until they took us to the only table that could accommodate 7. The place is pretty busy, may be because of delicious food. But we will not consider this place as an option if we have a group of 5 or more.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONFEg3mrhvnIt2GQIOvnGNiKbyti5HOFOY2koN&fid=0x0:0x85ad4c9034e2a156"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Coline","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLbX_QKuaEf6ecbnocWzjer3WudYneLMe_JJVgbs8i0ijFAVg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Completely disappointed. I have tried the other branches and they were okay but this branch in particular was not good. We waited an hour for our food, and even then we had to ask why was it taking so long (it’s not that busy either) and they completely forgot our order!! Thankfully the food came within 6minutes which made me skeptical of its quality… the food as you might have expected was not good either. I couldn’t finish my portion. The portion size was big but the taste was not good, very bland and cold. The takoyaki was mushy and mostly just flour with one piece of octopus. The staff was also not attentive, we tried several times to get the bill but was ignored multiple times.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzfsMmwDyuarZTF8-jGIGUUQpy22M1OOyBiauL&fid=0x0:0x85ad4c9034e2a156"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Nick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGjptqH3FdoeLfdSjPWQygL5KEsM_ui4pClg77BekGUD0E-Q_8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the place to go if you want to eat good ramen. I've tried multiple ramen places on multiple locations in and around Vancouver but this is the best place I have ever been to for Spicy Ramen. Drinks were on point and food was really good. Prices are not too crazy. The only downside is you have to wait a while before you can get a table. They have additional sauces on the table which is a nice addition if anyone wants to customize the flavor. I would recommend this place for spice lovers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM02bb1LOuOMA4eTY-sSY0d0mS52tvbBAX2cPS-&fid=0x0:0x85ad4c9034e2a156"],"When":"2024-9-25"},{"Name":"abeth mendoza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBoYK5OSywpF_1QMFL-3DgcIXMsWAGw5i-JXsDNKZF53X54YRH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We dine at lunch time, The service is good we are waiting for 20mins for the seat in a small place we ordered ramen I love the soup and takoyaki is good but the chicken wings and fried chicken taste like ordinary. Good for kids meals absolutely getting full for the combo. And they automatically charge an 18% service fee for two or more people","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM36tx9Soc354xvYJWyfyUXZuvULPM78ndplbnz&fid=0x0:0x85ad4c9034e2a156"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Alicia C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5FZx59zq_1boLwx6VJi3MNlKYZ3f_bpTKTI_oZju90xHEIRQAGg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's not a big place and we were seated pretty close to the next table.

We had the premium red ramen and the Jinya tonkatsu black ramen. Additionally, we had some sides - the Jinya bao, gyoza and a salmon sushi roll. The bao comes in singles so we ordered two (one each). It was a little filling and we could certainly reduce the sides.

Lots of toppings available for the ramen and of course, corn is a must-have for any ramen! I like that the ramen egg came whole instead of it being halved which is usually the case for most places.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP68A3G6OIiU6kO_H4a87_BWwL9jGYOm4YkWnrE&fid=0x0:0x85ad4c9034e2a156"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"Amrita Nayak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJgJ3b8LMBlPc7G1Rv8sy6cyH33IeJwYGYkw6c-i8ocBKF5odAKg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our visit to Jinya Ramen Bar was a wonderful experience! Not only was the ramen satisfying, but the service was truly exceptional.

We were celebrating a friend’s birthday, and our server went above and beyond to make it special. Without us asking, they surprised us with a beautifully presented dessert plate for the occasion. That extra touch made the evening feel so thoughtful and memorable.

As for the ramen, it hit all the right notes. The noodles were perfectly chewy, the broth was steaming hot, and the flavors were rich and comforting. I was recovering from nasal congestion at the time, and this bowl of ramen was exactly what I needed—warm, soothing, and absolutely delicious.

Jinya Ramen Bar combines great food with top-notch service, making it an excellent choice whether you're celebrating or just craving a hearty bowl of ramen. Highly recommend it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYcTHcMpMPhNpDCyOidA1QAdqxBoPE-2ZOgShM&fid=0x0:0x85ad4c9034e2a156"],"When":"2024-11-21"},{"Name":"Stella Oh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvqyQ2KS_YIN6XYOMkDtQZO2ezjEJLWRODsOzNFIWuIhCYtAL-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the spicy maze-men (a chef's special). I wasn't using any fancy camera to take a photo of it, but yet my photo ended up looking better than their menu photo. I loved the combination of the pork belly chashu, soft boiled eggs, kimchi, and raw onions. Every bite was so delicious! The portion size was just perfect!

I had no complaints about anything. The service was good. The atmosphere was decent. Even better, the washroom was stylish and clean. It may as well have been one of the cleanest public washrooms I've been in this year.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1j5uYuTerZnPytp59SQ5P6qGLfGfA9UKvQBjq&fid=0x0:0x85ad4c9034e2a156"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Alejandra Sánchez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXt051hy6gEMXkR86-3Xw80cqEx_9MawHfw61-PI0olAIeczxE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was really good! The ramen is traditional and carefully well done and the prices are reasonables. The service was good but could be better (the waitress took our order around 25 minutes after we arrived).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOz0XLGbkuSf649zNbYyRhSG6yMf3Xf7YMrQDkR&fid=0x0:0x85ad4c9034e2a156"],"When":"2024-8-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Gabriel Souza (Blart)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXSnVx7ZTOwrxOmzkyk8g-x4LBtDbZDjqUNRBwPSfW5OfbG78V-Vw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the pleasure of dining at Brown Social House and left thoroughly impressed by both the cuisine and the service. I ordered the Butcher’s Block Burger, which featured a perfectly cooked, flavorful beef patty topped with crispy, smoky bacon and crisp, fresh lettuce. The attention to detail in the preparation was evident, as each component complemented the others beautifully, making for an incredibly satisfying and well-balanced burger.

What truly set the experience apart, however, was the outstanding service. Erin, our waitress, was attentive and genuinely friendly, making sure our needs were met with efficiency and a warm demeanor. Her professionalism and positive attitude contributed to an inviting and enjoyable atmosphere. It’s clear that Brown Social House prioritizes both the quality of their food and the experience of their guests.

For anyone seeking a combination of excellent service and a delicious, thoughtfully crafted meal, I highly recommend Brown Social House. It’s a standout choice for anyone looking to enjoy a top-notch dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-GTQolz2yVh8m8-O0cuxlHiL_XEtitwMVy7jl&fid=0x0:0x1f96fae1d97e6d13"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Chris Yeung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcT6Z40EZW4C3yt0N7VoX3tM1V1mzzAe7xxRrgBiMmtInx7b7I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went to Brown's Socialhouse Brentwood to celebrate a friend's birthday. We ordered drinks and had dinner. There are multiple TVs to watch sports. There is also outdoor seating available.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1r7v6eFGHx_TnjDH5PaLYUNDgz2ep4pV7bVSN&fid=0x0:0x1f96fae1d97e6d13"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"Chloe Rachel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgExGuK1W-XgQc1tPnrQlqQkWxCTaNhdz977uVTTY3zjpsAzs-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Update: Thanks to Sarah and the team for their response to our first review. We returned for brunch and had a wonderful experience. Special mention to our server, Ella, who was very attentive with our food, dietary intolerances, and hot water refills. We had the Angus Beef Hash and Blackened Chicken Wonton Soup. The wonton soup was great, but a tad spicy for my taste buds (in the future, I'd ask for the chili oil on the side). They have large TV screens as well, so it was nice to catch some morning hockey while dining! Looking forward to returning to this location in the future, given the exceptional service.

Came here with a group of 8 for an early dinner. We were sat at a higher table with barstool seats, which were hard to move (as they don't glide on the flooring). Being middle-aged, some in the group needed help from others to be "pushed" closer to the table. The food was good. I had the Crispy Cauliflower and Crispy Yam & Avocado Roll (which was average for the $11 price). The cauliflower had a nice breading and was flavourful, and felt like a slightly smaller portion ("social hour" portion).

We had some concerns with the lack of service. We constantly had to flag down our waitress as we wanted to place part of our order before 6 pm to take advantage of the social hour pricing. My glass of water never was refilled during the meal. For a large group, it would have been nice to get checked in on from time-to-time, as a courtesy. Because of our group size, we still had to pay the automatic 18% gratuity, but we didn't think the service warranted that amount. The food itself did come out in a timely manner and was done correctly with some diners' special requests. When asked, our server was able to take a group photo of our table.

Ample parking in the parkade below with a 3-hour limit, which I was told was a non-factor after 6 pm when I called the restaurant ahead of time. Overall, we had an average experience! While the food was decent, the service for our larger group left a bit to be desired (3 stars).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRMdbceD5gvubL_XIV_xZyV73uBO4uvNPN8nFX&fid=0x0:0x1f96fae1d97e6d13"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"chaitanya gupta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP-Cx-tNwiu90cNABgEGrEB8sTBdVTRvK_y-kZN0OvutQ-s073wg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently dined at Brentwood - Browns Socialhouse, and it was an incredible experience from start to finish. The food was nothing short of amazing. Each dish was prepared with great care and bursting with flavor. The menu offered a fantastic variety of options, ensuring there's something for everyone.

The ambience was equally impressive. The atmosphere is chic and inviting, with a perfect blend of modern design and cozy touches. It’s an ideal spot for a casual lunch, a lively dinner with friends, or a relaxed date night. The staff were friendly and attentive, adding to the overall excellent dining experience.

If you're looking for a place with delicious food and a great vibe, Brentwood - Browns Socialhouse is a must-visit. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO08_3FEcFA7aLMz3TTzE-yN9qQ1G4lgr-Xgjkf&fid=0x0:0x1f96fae1d97e6d13"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"virlla devi soothar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQ87VSdNOiBHZdFVAOCWbky5_aTwGfKrpQhbWlqGppEwSWfH8BSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We recently celebrated my husband's birthday at Brown's Social House in Brentwood. The ambiance was pleasant, with just the right level of noise and activity. We thoroughly enjoyed our meal. For starters, we had crispy chicken and pickles, which were incredibly flavorful. Our main dishes included blackened chicken with Alfredo pasta and a crispy chicken sandwich. The Alfredo pasta was my personal favorite. Our server was friendly and even surprised us with a complimentary dessert for the occasion, which was a lovely touch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIllIy92gvjbjUVuQKImk_VX6LjKRVNilTMJGN&fid=0x0:0x1f96fae1d97e6d13"],"When":"2024-2-20"},{"Name":"Hembie Ashwe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKO9rJcuK7rmPLT51WDXVZEmLuIpTCZNMBqR345jXFZISUciQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Brown’s  is always a hit and today was super awesome because we had a waiter named Jessie who took care of our huge group really well. Food came on time, she was very welcoming and cordial to us. Great Blackened Chicken Alfredo too! I wish they bring back the Butter Chicken though!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Maggie M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJdc14i8-MYTGVgNkeFp_8cUvOSr08TU9llw-YCHcXvGaMtrw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place to dine! So peaceful to go sit there and enjoy lunch alone when I have writing or editing that needs to be done. Food is great! The music is on and there are people there but my mission is always accomplished.zero interruption (except to check that *I don’t need anything!) and I can accomplish more in a lunch hour here than in my office with a bowl of cereal. I come back feeling refreshed and accomplished! 😊","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kai Vancouver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5heIFDkKoC83IFbA65C6TMLRjWTHbqDpbnlW25A9H1S6DBNo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"You can enjoy a reasonably priced happy hour from 3 p.m. to 6 p.m. There are many big tables and large space, so it's good to go with many friends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWhfOrI1XqkBgw-_Pgximn5U6pHeiALjX-MWc&fid=0x0:0x1f96fae1d97e6d13"],"When":"2024-3-16"}]
