user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Eagleridge He","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyk6k_xeBUj_1KDLC2dilz6BOL-9JcNSoxnyXWuMM0QdJPvjOF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Thanks for bringing your top notch service to Canada. The restaurant is modern and bright. Once you order up to $50 and post your photos and comments on social media, they would give you 2 plates of complimentary beef. The plum drink is really a good pairing for the spicy food.
Dipping bar has over a dozen of choices for you. The washroom is very high end like and makes you feel like in a five star hotel 😀 The noodle guy and face change show are their specialties, you wouldn’t want to miss them.
Our server Christine was sweet, lovely, friendly and very attentive. A special thanks to her 💐","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJCtHRBIq_-ttJ166wy41FMESpe-im1BTs18yA&fid=0x0:0xf81f40f69a2052e4"],"When":"2024-11-15"},{"Name":"Ling To","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIlFxJCKp6bjqARUOXgwrUpHcbKAm9tBpTn_ze63uacIdbffw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The hype is real! Food was amazing, BUT the service was impeccable! It started at the entrance with treats - the plum juice did it for me! The interior is modern and clean. The washroom is like a high-end hotel feel.  Hot pot apron made eating mess free. Boy, do they know how to ring in your birthday in style!

Another gem to the Amazing Brentwood lineup!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUPQH1Z68UsxImroZHZcXzTpDEqdQSagwvAzUw&fid=0x0:0xf81f40f69a2052e4"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"M Siu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUeV_SXiAfmnubcz7tUJEexjK2eB55Yr_AtAEW9aZCByYTq62E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great fresh ingredients and plenty of choices. Recommend choosing the quartered soup pot and having 5-7 ingredients for 2 persons. Plenty to eat, if choosing 2 veg, 4 proteins (incl tofu), 1 noodle -- portions are good size. Recommend adding on the sauce and snack bar option to get the fullest experience.

Fast and very thorough customer service. Was duly impressed by the thoughtful touches (hair tie and glasses wipe provided, nicely designed waiting area with snacks). While the dining area is loud and raucous I think it adds to the vibe and experience.

Definitely want to go back for a special celebration: the bill adds up quickly but I think it's worth paying for.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPG8nIQ2fqOYM6s_b_rifLUTwe6uE8BHK0TWtvi&fid=0x0:0xf81f40f69a2052e4"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Stephanie Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQ3Mv6I10RUKYHG0tpD5Btypc8eRNzmAVg1j0sYSA8n7NVo2E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome place to dine at! My friends and I decided to check out the new HaiDiLao location during Halloween and our experience was amazing!
The servers are amazing, as always, and they were dressed up for the occasion. The food is fresh and amazing quality and they even had a performance playing!
Would definitely come back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcnxoPpqxzXbfwipNtYUMDzVezvQg4t0axMTo&fid=0x0:0xf81f40f69a2052e4"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Judy New","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIz6OxgihkeT4SOVktdVbdRJE2owHQlUyz89czejWszCTiqJA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Most delightful experience esp for my first time on board! Most  heart warming welcome & greeting! The mouthwatering sauces & appetizers bar is thrilling & perky! Most fresh & delicious beef, fish, octopus etc. I’m most impressed with the fun & most friendly customer services! Nora, Michael & Bill are well deserving & commendable for their caring & patience & happy smiles! Keep shining HaiDiLao! We’ll be back!!! Thank you all for a wonderful experience!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNTgVSxEx_6ilfMojPZIHIYYK8W6_HeZ1SAnXF&fid=0x0:0xf81f40f69a2052e4"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Sky Jang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsnlFBmRy7tyi6QC1WQMYS-_XgUyK7bm7m7BJrwzV_4Y89SkWE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a place I've wanted to visit for a long time, and it didn’t disappoint me at all. The ingredients were very fresh and the servers were extremely kind and attentive. Quite surprising they can keep up the vibe until very late hours. Considering the food and service, the price doesn’t feel too expensive. I would love to come here often if it were closer.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPFxKSI469u6ElmMUEtkCqVmH_i5zVzFmOcHF-&fid=0x0:0xf81f40f69a2052e4"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Nick (Neek)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1vFxY7J8TeGvCzfbDb-8G1ZKZ5NRu0re3I-xGPfKYIH_u9Mgytw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly recommend to reserve if you have a fairly large group of 6 or more. This place gets very busy, and for good reason. From the time we arrived and left, the staff of this restaurant were polite, gracious, and happy to help us - so kudos on the excellent staff at our location, including our awesome server Andy. When waiting for your table, you are given access to a small snack/drink bar. When at the table, all the food was ordered off of a tablet, which was convenient, and arrived quickly for us. It was nice of the staff to also give us some fruit for free while waiting. The food itself was a bit pricey, especially some of the meats, but to me, I enjoyed the experience of dining here. Again, excellent service. The noodle dance was a highlight of the dinner. It was nice to see the staff be professional while also having fun with their job. For 6 middle-heavy eaters, we paid around $450 with tips, so expect to pay anywhere between $60 to $100 here per person - excluding if you buy the meats like A5. All in all, HaiDiLao is a five-star, service oriented restaurant that can't receive enough praise for how they operate. You have to try it at least one time, especially if you like hotpot.

Also, don't forget to use certain codes and phrases when at the restaurant to receive gifts or trinkets. Some codes are seasonal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPck0T3Dhl4Kg2GVyOlybeAjIFb2elziu9MYaQY&fid=0x0:0xf81f40f69a2052e4"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"da0 0","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU81_vTpDwmk2_8rfEJqeTivLZUU9OHEPZKu5LNiHerxQFhW6I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited the restaurant the week before my friend’s birthday. As expected, the atmosphere was hectic and noisy. While the various events were fun, they were a bit overwhelming even before we started ordering.

However, Arewn, our server, remained calm and composed amidst the chaos, never losing her smile💖 Every time we made a mistake with our order or had to wait a long time for something, her attentive service melted away my frustration. She even thoughtfully replaced the hair tie she provided with a pink one to match the color of my outfit💕

I didn’t want a loud and flashy birthday celebration, but Arewn’s small and thoughtful birthday gesture was absolutely perfect for all of us🎂 To make the day even more memorable, we took a photo with her.

I would love to visit again and hope to sit in the section where she is serving.

+Special shoutout to the performers of the noodle and 👺mask-changing shows—they were amazing! Hoo! Hoo!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPS3JH5salUnHNoi0YZ1m3rk-y_Os6Kdq31hn4N&fid=0x0:0xf81f40f69a2052e4"],"When":"2024-12-19"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"iriseeks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUN60_e6Ur-2aRAWVagksXHkVjjXJQEtpBqJoH5yb2-dy-4FWWLpg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I highly recommend this restaurant to those who want non fast food options after 8pm. Food is fresh with good quality. The variety of food is amazing. Staffs are very helpful and friendly. Love the atmosphere as well. I know I’m gonna come back!❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNgUkCikURFcEJBFzEAlG4sSTTX0esaLJpTUT-&fid=0x0:0x8f1828f7e5f0e899"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Jimmy Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmaQe2WLp7herqsSS6Qbb3TdkPTjO2rKeO4tgMEL6Gag0kIT7k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Oyako don: I like how the sauce on the rice is sweet and everything feels so smooth that it melts in your mouth.

Chawan-Mushi: caution - it is quite hot when served. Would recommend if you like steamed eggs, and it also includes vegetables, (spinach, mushroom, edamame) shrimp, and ramen flakes. Rich flavours. Well done.

Crème Brûlée Cheese Cake (matcha): I like how it’s not over sweet. It has that cheese cake taste, smooth, soft and yet it is also quite balanced in sweetness. Very nicely done!

Service: my server was very kind to me. Even though the wait was within acceptable range, she felt inclined to apologize for the wait.

Good atmosphere with music playing in the background and people seem to be in groups having an occasional good time.

Thank you Ajishou!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOeNjkyngDRLLk4D6fima--pE25nZeSAUMaEaaE&fid=0x0:0x8f1828f7e5f0e899"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"PrincessRiccia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIC76C01xrAZ9e-O4ecd02gxPgoXtaGHfTj4U5QIo0wEIwAOA0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Really great happy hour menu with a huge variety of items and great prices. Was well worth the value, fish tasted fresh. Service was also good, we will definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOliqegrLBm6_zseEDLqu-MR1rbuWdeu3HqMWJ&fid=0x0:0x8f1828f7e5f0e899"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Eva Zia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJp1CScTOq-jdIBVBA-K4f_r74TZU-kRd9MclConVIiSCPfy3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this place; I've had the most delicious oyster dishes here. Not to mention the sushi—everything is great, and the prices are reasonable. I highly recommend you try it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuF_RpYOikd_eEPYwG-qdF110rroFddz5vpyaa&fid=0x0:0x8f1828f7e5f0e899"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"alice w","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKfBFd5-MCz0iWhHQjADA6mFZoHPhSAyoSlVDQe971OUgYbxw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice place the food is delicious special after 2:00pm have some appetizers 50%off I have taken some pictures too
The girl have very good service she is patient and polite I have very good services 👍👍🤗The Shrimp and Fried chicken is awesome
Also have many testy rolls etc…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuCpRLE_5tBxqG46s0OGTP_LOmJjalKLyzGAgG&fid=0x0:0x8f1828f7e5f0e899"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Emily Lu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKEvwebxzOOvHfn2UnHwr4i_lsQ_4WBBcdmwEUmGOtZoyfwO9Mg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Nice to have a different choice for Happy Hour deals in that area. The sashimi and the prawn tempura are decent. Service is good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoVf6pF4aO7Pf4mOv_PxTCKyTlKWatASCJeE2M&fid=0x0:0x8f1828f7e5f0e899"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Kayla Ok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2ZPW-HOTvhKWxZVs_tiGZng-PPQOf1u70Mg0ytQnqF8DWQ4ac=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Not a Japanese run restaurant. Oshi uses siracha mayo typically not used in pressed sushi. Cuts are small and food seems to be dressed up to be fancier and pricier for what it is but many other sushi places are better. Would not eat here again as food is only okay.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZCgGyiWdMvAaLBj6Pcuof_pnhOOjdaAmASxVP&fid=0x0:0x8f1828f7e5f0e899"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Jessy J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLHNRFw0Z_JgaU0TxGr1Pv5X-w9V6JzR0bnCuTDlGr_7pfsbx_k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came here for a company lunch. Service was fast and food came real fast too! Chu Toro was good but was a bit frozen still when we had it. Chef’s Special Sashimi boat was very presentable and they even deep fried the prawn heads afterwards. Geoduck nigiri was the bomb! So delish! Sakamushi was ok. And beef capriccio was ok too. Shimaaji sashimi was very crisp and tasty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXan6glQ-Zymj2HLRhEl3KP4fLQc3w2KA50K66&fid=0x0:0x8f1828f7e5f0e899"],"When":"2024-5-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rea Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBLG3PzTO2NCW67IKxC0iS6gst1jYd_GJQUIrA1cqAKOX8KCxZYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an amazing experience at this restaurant. The service and food were outstanding, and I left completely satisfied. The staff were incredibly helpful, even assisting us with cooking directly at the table. The food was unlimited, and they generously served as much as I wanted.
A special thank you to Raina & Hana for providing such great service. To top it off, the restaurant hosted a fun event where guests could spin a roulette to win gifts, which made the experience even more enjoyable.
Overall, I was very impressed with the exceptional service and attention to detail. Highly recommended for anyone looking for a fantastic dining experience. I'll definitely be back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpM2gw8OvnnBivf6zUaFELmjBJ5ETgEid1TZom&fid=0x0:0xf7a3b910a3ee468b"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Kalvin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYzAZd-0_JeniSNljNxgImCwzlXWbe6PzaDeAXT6_nhg5vP5E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great price for all you can eat pork belly. No choices to pick, 1 set menu for all you can eat. Great service but need a bit more variety of alcohol. Overall great place to have pork belly 🤤","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIkS8ihRVJ_kmX9TCjei90z9_-Zpr7vXcNN4K1&fid=0x0:0xf7a3b910a3ee468b"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Kate Yun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXllAMs9Lcb5YCEnNvv2v33fZfnWvWZO79ivqquLfmINpnFQY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food here was absolutely delicious, and Ben provided such friendly and attentive service. It made the experience even better! I’d definitely love to come back again ;)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKam4A2y3uO_7KEMsJ8a-zlkEE8C_whHmkf6p1&fid=0x0:0xf7a3b910a3ee468b"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Clara Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmLcLdgOmhzDNzUCJuvprD5MqWV_QSCSOfOuNDo0VQeMFAPbcw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went there during their soft opening. The staff were really friendly and made the atmosphere comfortable and fun. There’s a lot of food that comes with the set. They meat they serve is all you can eat pork belly, so if you’re a fan of it, this is the place to go! The service was wonderful! The staff barbecued the pork belly for you which is an experience I only had when I was in Korea! And now they’re bringing that amazing service here! I would definitely go back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKCxCGKKCFZ3er0G-xlEximYLouM3_UTuO838y&fid=0x0:0xf7a3b910a3ee468b"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Luna Han","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0uycRPWSsDiqxft1kc5lHRz7J_Gnl_XtbNU-hSSylFUZ4N-pn=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was so goood! The restaurant just opened recently, but I think I'll be coming here often :) The staff are very friendly, and it was so convenient that they grilled the meat for us.Thank you, I'll be back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7Qmdgf42NmIiLGQCVz15_oVFgT93F0Ny-veze&fid=0x0:0xf7a3b910a3ee468b"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Joy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSfMK4Mj59LyWCdxj9jubUTP6EGqzqImi4jJwpO8lta7TlaFsWEg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is amazing!! delicious food, super clean, and everyone is so kind. I highly recommend it! Especially Ben he’s the best!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXTt41eqRM7SGY6EiFLeAwHNfvnu2dLhZcw56b&fid=0x0:0xf7a3b910a3ee468b"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"D Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4D0pnJRuugp7xtOoI9Okhc1IdtNuzKocuzhsSBj3gUdos57g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is pretty much Sooda rebranded. Service is really friendly .

They cooked the meat for me so major bonus points","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwOWbgQ81e8u97P4T4ecXCzkY-SBaVTuAkHyHd&fid=0x0:0xf7a3b910a3ee468b"],"When":"2024-12-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Gloria Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXraEdtzs8pFLfqa5aLhzDZSAL1BhMjv_yg1eMqCSd7Gu8eIyoL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came at 5 pm on a Friday night and was seated promptly. Loved the ability to order on the screen.

We had the wings, some tendon, and an udon. Food came promptly and was tasty, but just a bit more greasy than we normally like. We prefer the mazesoba next door. Nothing wrong or bad but just not something we enjoy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTHer1V1RYhrKH8cA-KospteypLo2EJZgjRdgS&fid=0x0:0xee3e26a6ee0d36cd"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Nikki Sy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBjATsJMmB41G9yqWFoEPo05_lPP8oOi4rOJgcyxBVDlQkbFzp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"My husband and i ordered deluxe omelette curry and beef curry. We both liked our food. However, my only disappointment is that it took us a long time to be seated, even if there were just 3 people eating inside and us waiting to be seated.

It is because there is no person manning the counter where you have to wait to be seated. So imagine, if they are not seeing us, how would they know if there are people waiting.

We also ordered their ice cream  for desert and while having desert, there are flies flying.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFXrppwo59OlMtlVSXJhzQeCdNlTrbh3r5qGNb&fid=0x0:0xee3e26a6ee0d36cd"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Andy Chiang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6Ytd6jvLjiUIKjc2DLdidLuwgHbgPUD4GPhFuPOLEoqlZ2vbh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This really is the place to get massive bowls of udon. Any size you want and it’s a free upgrade, so for that, I can say there is value. I do think that the bowls get bigger than the portion, but it’s fun to see.

The udon is pretty good, it’s a solid udon joint. They have some interesting flavors to choose from, and their spicy does have a decent kick to it, so be prepared.

It’s one of the better udon places in Vancouver, has a very clean washroom, and nice interior. Good for a quick lunch or bite with the family.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4OfiBf9VdabT10Ct3X5NZynA2yMctnOX6PKgo&fid=0x0:0xee3e26a6ee0d36cd"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Vy Anh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGsNhnbufiQDne1lvQ3McghkbcFI54FxmqaYUzJIihCbDkv9D2gQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The dishes at this restaurant are absolutely delicious! The tempura on top of the rice was crunchy and flavorful, and the aroma of the flour mixed with egg was simply delightful. A truly enjoyable dining experience with every bite bursting with flavor and freshness. Highly recommend trying out their dishes!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNGF-Wkb2bXZJM4RKI5N719AxhX3LdUIXfXgMu&fid=0x0:0xee3e26a6ee0d36cd"],"When":"2024-5-8"},{"Name":"char br","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIAnL_8sV_ABc-sKziKe87xo6wE8QlOpKZixFo9Vdc23ouoQw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Order:
- mentaiko cream udon
- spicy rose cream udon
- tempura sashimi bowl

first time i’ve been here was 2022 and we loved it. came here again in 2023 and the food quality wasn’t as good. gave it a last try today and we will never be back again. the mentaiko doesn’t taste like regular
ones and it was really salty. the spicy rose udon had 3 pieces of garlic bread that was really stale. it was spicy which i can usually handle but as i continued eating, i realised it was exactly like the samyang buldak flavour… for this price and such restaurant, it was not worth it, especially considering that there aren’t any protein in the 2
udons we ordered. size of tempura bowl had obviously decreased since the last time we’ve been here and it looked as if it’s been fried for a while. atmosphere was pretty good as it’s in a quiet and clean neighbourhood. we got seated at 1pm on a saturday and the restaurant was completely empty.
overall, we will never visit this location again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMod4K7QxZcct1f9E0gUtIX92x556NzM7b5b9h5&fid=0x0:0xee3e26a6ee0d36cd"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Salicious Kim (Sally)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocInfzvmZm95_WrqVSbcEKA0Tgk4zl4fxg9m-xCs8Eo9eA95Zg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The portions were small, and the food quality was a bit disappointing. It was not well fried and felt a bit dry. Service was excellent but I wouldn't go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGdS14bCRRagzDHx46tUsNCFqYVpff27ybdEgn&fid=0x0:0xee3e26a6ee0d36cd"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Thomas Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUITuDRjw9J9Us45xAUXKSfp8lG2sJ2s04TW_lNAi_G6a5d62ur=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The udon noodles were very tasty. Value was solid and the service was interesting. Everything is done via a tablet on your table. I like how the pricing was the same for any size.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlDbZoRVbRv6X3RU7WNROW67uQhNRFzsJS0WeK&fid=0x0:0xee3e26a6ee0d36cd"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Angel Pop (Angel)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7LXvJTCePfgnAERL3EWfXii0ejddNUJAmBxkhPVsd1fn-QXa-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was good! However, the free size up is a little underwhelming. The carbonara udon was creamy and tasty! I think this place is beautiful for a little photo op

Valentines Day seemed busy, I've seen two groups leave because they waited about 15-30 minutes for their order. We decided to wait it out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWQqnM0KiJ_5Qo03rfdpWr2x2TFcQzugCl-_90&fid=0x0:0xee3e26a6ee0d36cd"],"When":"2024-2-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Chien Kathy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYAnTtYh2uR1uD-IYYCcoFezEBxw1he7W38OplSPAECu0LLvM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered Rosu Katsu for lunch, the portion is enough for a girl, can refill salad and soup! The deep fried pork is so crispy, but a little bit fatty. The service is good, except asking you to pay without any request, because feeling so rushed when I just finished my meal…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkwrcm8ZKUX5v_HmLPDutzr3tprWv-LkIdLsVC&fid=0x0:0x7790d1668cc4b062"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"kawaii hatchiko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLtom4JJghW2UnkOsI7GKr-J96yxZfSX4SBdkTaAQaNBfKVBVT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice new restaurant close to home.

The food was delicious. It’s all deep fried. Fried fish, fried pork chop, fried cheese, and fried pumpkin croquette.

You get unlimited cabbage refill for salad, rice, as well as miso soup.

The salad dressing was very good. My favourite dish was the fried fish.

The servers were attentive and quick to refill drinks and side dishes. I will definitely come back with friends in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXyy8gujfFWpV7jnBQTjNZPTWdqAd4vI6-rxPm&fid=0x0:0x7790d1668cc4b062"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Jacinda K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0xoGeCDSw5DVJ3YNgzQb_o4aJOLzQdAQ3syqD9WiYy7lJqCATJA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ambience, amazing service and delicious food: the trifecta of a dine out experience!

This location is stunning. The decor is modern and beautiful, with shades of muted pinks and neutrals.

I ordered the signature dish Tokujyo Rosu Katsu, and my friend ordered the Cheese Katsu.  The crunch of the katsu and presentation of all of the extras was perfect.
The sesame dressing (on the table) for the cabbage is so good.  Unlimited miso soup, steamed rice and shredded cabbage too.

Appreciated the level of service and attention, without it being overbearing.  It was a great experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPu7avx79Z3TQZEPrrwQkJXjkegQT2alXZeN5w9&fid=0x0:0x7790d1668cc4b062"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Jimmy Hu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK4KKSFXLv_ztDYf7sGCzApvgQHxj9J0lhi-ziH7XcY7sBpbw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We loved Saku for years, but the Cambie locating has gotten harder and harder to access.

We were thrilled a location close to home quietly opened their doors.

The tonkatsu is always top notch, and we do live their veggie curry katsu and seafood curry katsu options.

From big Japan nerds, we love the unlimited cabbage salad, tonjiru, and rice, which is reminiscent of Japanese Tonkatsu restaurants.

The servers were also all very polite with excellent service, and completely unrelated but it seems most of them were Japanese the day we went, which lended to the authenticity of the experience.

We will definitely come again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKlDfeRoO47HcfIDx1z2RJeXWf003h2JKATeVk&fid=0x0:0x7790d1668cc4b062"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Colin H.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKLAlde_mgxriv87MRbZf0l0wgEhQKsH0Yy1C5YUoxWRW_Tig=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have now eaten at every Saku location in Metro Vancouver and this is my favorite. Food quality is consistent across the branches, but I loved the service attentiveness at this location. I was there on Saturday. Our server, Nene was attending to our table and we were very well looked after. She did everything fast, and with a warm smile. Can’t beat that.
Parking is easy. I think there is free street parking a few steps away, but if you park at the building across the restaurant (where Whole Foods is), it’s $1 an hour.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhno32xBoJt2PWYZRRkMlhePVfJ4rDwj7bybuV&fid=0x0:0x7790d1668cc4b062"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"W L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK3lEbwV8e2v5in0IhnFqBGUt83IWuJaaihBPoKpdmjx1Wi-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great food and great service. We had their signature Rosa Katsu, the cheese katsu and the ebi  katsu with Unlimited miso soup, rice and salad.  The miso soup was really delicious.  The salad dressing for the shredded cabbage was also very delicious.  Thank you for a great experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSBo9XEpRlCEL4IU2-QZctoFP44XeI7DdaYxhH&fid=0x0:0x7790d1668cc4b062"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"You Cakes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW18sBMm2NvwATk7bxLgi_cf3iGPsWSCgjTEBKcMHVUdOOmMplJ5w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Delicious food but on the pricey end. I'd come back if it wad a bit cheaper. This was a one and done kinda spot for me. I recommend Mr Tonkatsu in surrey for slightly cheaper deal. Enjoyed the unlimited cabbage salad with the salad dressing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLaT6s1J01jcn6P7w4wtBjFl8yHKCz35Sk3Gmn&fid=0x0:0x7790d1668cc4b062"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Siri S.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX504EBWhYQQdsymEpDXnQupxyavz0jsgWZWdjyUsQIjyL_yLWn=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"the katsu n udon were so bomb! the service was excellent! servers were really friendly n helpful. the katsu was so crispy n not greasy. i really recommend this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9tShUTNFq7b4dOhoOnA-XaxBz0uEC4p_ykNAu&fid=0x0:0x7790d1668cc4b062"],"When":"2024-11-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Victor Law","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIpnZPh7heLHnvp3JcjErTq9VzUaFB6LA67FBNyLyGHNyq0kA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My aunt told me that she liked getting pizza here, so when I was visiting her, I knew I gotta pick up some here.

We got a large Pepperoni Pizza along with a slice of Hawaiian Pizza and a slice of Pollo Eccellente. The Pepperoni Pizza was amazing. It was light and airy with big flavors from the ingredients. My whole family loved it. The other slices were delicious as well per my aunt.

I am very impressed with the pizzas here. I can't wait to eat here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMP_PkS-khHIiRR1icLXHhGlcTL73_blF3Cl3N&fid=0x0:0xa78fb0d83860a551"],"When":"2023-11-15"},{"Name":"Emil Silver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgIVGfPNPAU9zACyZzBW3GsfWoZkW1pLBEGh-rot49b9qqUT4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great pizza and excellent service at the counter. All staff very friendly. I Highly recommend .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcR58R1sjhS3JmnLBZDIl0SwxRQWmxMAXu3BMf&fid=0x0:0xa78fb0d83860a551"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Ashmita Tuli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUouU9AAnMSq4UkxlABnEKzfEzNdgLG0xOKkJsJxDfSDx-WPwXL=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing warm pizzas and warm staff 👌👌 must give this one a try !! WORTH IT ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOoLbACs5nrb8QAdq8Bs69xh6RJSJw7qs0eJ0yZ&fid=0x0:0xa78fb0d83860a551"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Ugur Peker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUoG6NLmch4c4asAI616iXx1BUWhE1KVxCuzAXcdqHFnlinAQLs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best pizza around! Kind and very helpful stuf!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPup49vHP0KexaouAwMOz1GC4W8Do1LTRMCUbUQ&fid=0x0:0xa78fb0d83860a551"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Joey Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIncJBLfbVzRO24PRdfxE4-hovZn6C_s4RV_vqsGslULP8YEA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"They have quite a large selection of pizza 🍕 in the food court of Amazing Brentwood Mall.

One good thing is you can buy per slide, so you can try different types of pizza if you cannot make a decision, or when one pizza is not enough for you.

I had one slide of the vegetarian pizza today. It tasted quite good I didn't ask if it is vegan, though, like what kind of pizza they used.

Also, their prices are reasonable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5GoHb3bJ1CND8UHB8yygKPkhisL2h5LgAftYR&fid=0x0:0xa78fb0d83860a551"],"When":"2024-1-20"},{"Name":"Jamie Taylor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_N8v1B9UPaNMPBNbKNY_7VjfnChVQUlsiTZ5QWJRjOgRA6JyiOg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Is this a new fad that I haven't heard about yet? Why is there no cheese on my pizza? Honestly even one star is too high of a rating for this place.

Only two small patches of cheese per slice!! At least the pepperoni had tomato sauce on it..The hawaiian was just bread. The bottle of water that I got in my combo brought me more satisfaction than this garbage pizza. I should have just gone to McDonald's.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNURrcWhX_YLuL6dy8FbvAN43TTD193z3GvFneQ&fid=0x0:0xa78fb0d83860a551"],"When":"2023-7-8"},{"Name":"damla peker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-ZoZy3khuxsq7PzrWZgduJEJcmQh0RNvUeS0DhMd02d5BLWmc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Aglio Arrostito is my fav 🫠 Also the employees are always kind. Thanks for amazing pizzas and services","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOy6gncCY3XNvn-crITHS25lasiSmUR8AP5ZlR&fid=0x0:0xa78fb0d83860a551"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"anadhika khullar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKLLkDxY-3NKehaoZRfiFxNnxu8FvYVv5hwrfKVNdCTXse13g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love it ! It’s my favourite place to get some pizza . The staff is super friendly ❤️❤️. Their pizza  crust is so perfect , everytime i come to grab some pizza it’s always the same quality.
Highly recommended 👍🏻.
love it 💗.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNq7j3Bq8N4d9mEnW-myWxSlaHF64dtjUa777Wo&fid=0x0:0xa78fb0d83860a551"],"When":"2023-9-17"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Roy Ang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8-t_QDJ7jm6HpxKCmS3N8_0A7d711_oQ9bwWuFiMPiKDNXLvs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We used Bibik’s to cater a wedding reception for 50 people. Mona and the crew were fabulous. They met with us before to plan the menu, were able to cater to all our dietary restrictions, flexible with various options that allowed us to DIY a few things to save us a bit of money, but mostly the food was delicious! And we had a few Singaporeans/Malaysians in the crowd so you know the food had to be authentic in order to impress. And they did. I wholeheartedly recommend them.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sonia Autumn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvJPtbO1-dSRLvXGqBaJeLb8BFJQGCYT9qiU1IFB6SIjHGYK4-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you're looking for authentic Singapore/Malaysia food or goodies, Bibik's the only place to try in Vancouver. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jess Pang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcNg4I708h9atWjN_8p7DkmMkCGBINdNm2GkYCKMHT_wRB6F_Z6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friends and I thoroughly enjoyed our dinner here! The service was exceptional—attentive, friendly, and knowledgeable staff made us feel so welcome. The handmade bread, pastas, and pizzas were absolutely delicious; tasted comforting and had a homey touch. Price and portion are great. We'll definitely be back 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlCG08PbEMvSrdQxpklvZoJvs_mjnZilvxVmUF&fid=0x0:0xa10ffb34471be20e"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Anthony Plaxen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0TosyGAQWTqM_XvTHaXfq2jDGHv6ifKWBgTGcJKYnap3ceipL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a delightful experience we had at this Italian bistro. Have always wanted to come try out the food here at this restaurant tucked away in between apartments in Brentwood Burnaby.

We ordered a variety of pasta dishes and a pizza as well. The food was amazing all around and reminded me of the delightful experience I had in Rome. The pizza was done quite well with a good crust and toppings. My favourite dish was definitely the truffle lobster ravioli and the Mussels in tomato sauce special they had this evening.

The tiramisu at the end was superb. Really brought the evening all together and the staff were amazing.

We live locally and this is truly a great gem for the neighbourhood.  I’ll definitely be coming back again. Such a good experience! Truly deserves a 5/5 review and now I can see why this lovely place has a great rating.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXfZKM10Q54fwcRd9-2R3vEeKB7aXz-YwlOL_P&fid=0x0:0xa10ffb34471be20e"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"J K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKCNkk7erQWpfbHr--HgsVvFmQv79ft7cqUZwXODABc3snqFw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fresh ingredients and awesome food. Its so good.
Service is perfect.
I hear some customers and staff casually talking in Italian, which is always a good sign in an Italian restaurant.
So many people here, happy and enjoying their meal.
Reasonable price as well. Wow.
Highly recommend this place. Please, give this place a try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMW1U2bIY8EhzJ0Wf09CP-YQGbI3-ME-RoRz8lK&fid=0x0:0xa10ffb34471be20e"],"When":"2024-6-29"},{"Name":"Kayvan Arshadi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUtqkYvo86eAj8rJj_oqXYQkmSnA48Qyg8HQJma7QquO97NQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So amazing! Service was just as great as food I got a pasta off the menu that didn’t say anything about mushrooms, but tasted very mushroom like so I I told the manger very friendly guy by the way and he offered a free pizza was so sweet about the situation and made it way less awkward! Definitely recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_c2FplmkAf7pVDcEYC5xXjXSdn5JHGooNvr-E&fid=0x0:0xa10ffb34471be20e"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Oliver Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJyJu9QYfeFJ_C9Eq8heu11nE76-oVO3ja4cnhmwbFn57AMXw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This small bistro has a hidden gem! The owner is from Rome and is super friendly.

Had lobster Ravioli smoked salmon pasta and prosciutto pizza. All their pasta tastes fresh and flavorful. Typically I’m not a big fan of cream sauce but they made it very flavorful but not too heavy. Honestly they make better pasta than some fine dining places.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPe2pA7fkRaLmHF3pDvb5N91MaZwZ-7XlUHmKDK&fid=0x0:0xa10ffb34471be20e"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"Jin Zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKqeV5KNNEJorXduPot_us9nrDOiYTHdQw2xcn2ZTbseScfew=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The owner has great humor. He's very kind and warm. He basically offered AYCE garlic bread for us.
The restaurant itself is a hidden gem. It is in a quiet place with rays of sunshine and a decent view.
Food is delicious. The ones we ordered are healthy and light with rich taste.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBTJQ56G__GKcTS97BmuuwzwnJRvrRwBk_7fdv&fid=0x0:0xa10ffb34471be20e"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"Eric Le","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINTR7IbYGoOzPZOAWX5MjxEP_kldZiE-uedRnxq8rSDRoH2w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came hungry... the food quality is top.. taste so good I had to order more pasta to try.  Dessert is not highly sweet like other places. Just perfect in my low level sweetness.  Dessert.. I saw hugh selection of cheesecakes.. couldn't resist not trying them all.  Had to try the berry cake imported from Italy.  I will come back with an army so I can try every dish they have to serve...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3FmFUM_onC641nbTuz-tzJHGQqs2aRZPgZb2C&fid=0x0:0xa10ffb34471be20e"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"Jessica J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcWLoPRgPpipBF9OBBmD9v1iSQXk3vTEVNvC399Ly0k6q524o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"La Torre Bistro exceeded all of our expectations. The service was incredible, with attentive and friendly staff. We ordered the burrata, the lobster ravioli, a pizza and the tiramisu which were all delicious. We will definitely be coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMERXWFQ-BSwj2UnrccoMEwXSdWCcH1O2G-FAZ1&fid=0x0:0xa10ffb34471be20e"],"When":"2024-11-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"马尔柯","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4syA-Xl9wGd2fBI-MP9Hvp_Amxw0QMFGRxMFKAtkG4OfWZE1JQg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was Tuesday late lunch time around 1:00, not a huge line, only waited for less than 10 minutes. Price was decent and portion was good. We chose the combo so can try out different options. Ramen 🍜 was not a big portion, however for girls, it was enough. Small tables but comfortable. Recommend to give a try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwZBd1X6Mk6o7_z5FhYNJaDz5pE9heOxYIWZU2&fid=0x0:0xc619b0c4a7922e19"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"TS OS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrxJ8Fjd3bGSI8mWbF186RbFWyg_DW73VTS3OIkFaxPfXFBEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Located outer area in Crystal mall, this newly opened place offers ramen and some other Japanese dishes. Combo option was nice and we chose curry which wasn’t the best but still ok. Ramen tasted quite nice and fatty pork was better than lean. However this place accepts no cash which for me is one star deduction. Otherwise give this place a go.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqH7fmNTZaozqdcsOmxBmwMnImi-saDWq2w9-9&fid=0x0:0xc619b0c4a7922e19"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Andrew Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK13LuhtbcQQQ1wDmBa9J0Vwn9ABCTfxSFuyxqkVS3IT67IVQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hortin Ramin at Metrotown consistently delivers a fantastic dining experience. I was there for lunch. The ramen broth is rich and flavorful, with a perfect balance of savory and umami. I particularly enjoyed The One with chef recommendation, The tonkatsu base was comparable to ramen shops in.  The noodles were cooked to perfection, and the toppings were fresh and high-quality.
The service was prompt and friendly, and the restaurant itself is clean and inviting.  At the time of my arrival there was absolutely no wait but normally they are lineups. Please be aware.
Highly recommended for ramen lovers!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKXiRrYDKT0FeOUIH2oA2BfqoCuZW2Nc79c6OQ&fid=0x0:0xc619b0c4a7922e19"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Clara Chau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoMWRC0cDGP4nCpQ1_Zdm86daXS0A0KJbVAa9QczqqbfD7fWIZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was so excited to find out that Horin opened a location in Burnaby and came here with a friend for an early dinner. We arrived at 530pm and we were seated right away. Note that your whole party needs to be in the line with you before you can be seated! I ordered the Original (small) and my friend ordered The One (small) with both upgraded to a combo so that we could share an appy (gyoza) and dessert (matcha tiramisu) together. The cucumber salad is a must if you order the combo - the dressing is so simple (sesame oil with salt and pepper) but it's so delicious. For your ramen, you can customize the firmness of your noodles (I usually go firm as thin noodles become so soggy as it sits in your bowl) as well as the richness of your broth and spice level. It was my first time having the tiramisu and it was really good. It's different from a traditional tiramisu and uses what felt like sponge cake instead of lady fingers. Overall the atmosphere is much more relaxing than the downtown location and the quality of the food tastes just as good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP28TW46eLcQmJ6YdkxgPlAfymSWMy3q90JbPNO&fid=0x0:0xc619b0c4a7922e19"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Melanie E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUR0bJcxqNkJt-i1wxCH3EaQXevncA86panZszfT__NAs_0KWRp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finally! A good ramen place has arrived in Burnaby. Every time I drove by the place, I saw a lineup outside. My friend and I finally tried it out. Once you’re inside, the entire team of kitchen chefs greet you enthusiastically.

You won’t be disappointed. The ramen is tasty & fresh with several choices ranging from how firm you want your noodles to the type of pork. If you don’t like pork or you’re a vegetarian/vegan, this isn’t for you.

Food: 5/5 - We both ordered the house special ramen but had different choices of broth (rich or light broth). There’s also a combo add on you can opt for an extra $5.90. I ordered the Gyoza and salad with seaweed. They advertise the broth is cooked for 20 hours which shows in the broth. All were delish! The prices were reasonable. They offer a small or large portion which the price difference hardly makes a dent in your pocket book.

Atmosphere: 5/5 - nice vibe to the place and it’s clean. If you have more than a party of 4 people, it’s a longer wait. Note: all people must be physically there or they won’t seat you.

Service: 5/5 - the servers were friendly and came by frequently offering water. Service was quick & prompt.

I can’t wait to bring more family and friends here. They’re located outside the Mall on the south side of Kingsway. A side note: they do not accept cash. You can sign up as a member to collect points for a future meal discount.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPO0qHQECbvdjd-EFfC0XFPeO2hkiHOcKC3rbv8&fid=0x0:0xc619b0c4a7922e19"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"Mark Wilburn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCHSdWb7D69-sAW2twcPsddn_sx71vfPDorVfMCuZsg1ThCTBe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Horin Ramen (Metrotown)

The best Tan Tan Ramen I've ever tried was in Japan, at Michelin star Nakiryu.

This is the first time I've had ramen outside of Nakiryu with identical tasting noodles. And since we only tried the Tan Tan there, Horin has the best Tonkatsu Ramen we've ever tasted. Anywhere.

Tonkatsu Ramen 5 stars 10/10

However,  even up sizing, the portion was a little small for me. But they've attained perfection with both the noodles & the broth.

Tan Tan Ramen (Vegetarian); the noodles were as good as Nakiryu; which are flavourful, perfectly al dente and the best I've had outside of Japan. The soup base however, while flavourful,  wasn't quite as rich as Nakiryu, Afuri, or Hibiki Ramen  Yakitori Bar, but the noodles here are tied with the best (Nakiryu). 4.75 stars

Gyoza: nicely done with a crisp pan sear. 4.25 stars.

Overall 9.5/10, 5 stars. Fantastic noodles, best Tonkatsu Ramen we've ever tried, slightly smaller portions and very difficult parking (unless you were already shopping at Metrotown, which we fortunately were)
Can't wait to come back and try the curry and croquettes.

Last visit Nov 2025","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMytK1OXNgwc_iAlL80vUGeCAYFDtjMTtdX-P4X&fid=0x0:0xc619b0c4a7922e19"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"K’s coffee lover","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-385uQOflrqOxsV0QWsdIyhv-rxdZ7rLwLnLPmzpfPGzr9P6Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What sets this ramen shop apart is its unique pairing of homemade spicy sauce with rich pork bone broth. There are two portion sizes for the ramen: a small bowl with 100 grams of noodles and a large bowl with 130 grams. The restaurant also offers three types of char siu (roast pork): seared, regular, and lean, catering to different dietary preferences. Additionally, the broth’s thickness and saltiness can be customized to suit individual tastes. All ramen dishes can be upgraded to a set meal for an additional $5.90, which includes options like gyoza or dessert.

The gyoza arrived first and impressed with its juicy filling and wonderfully crispy exterior. When the ramen was served, we took our first sip of the broth, which was rich and flavorful, with a deep, savory pork bone taste. The seared char siu practically melted in your mouth, while the lean char siu, which wasn’t rolled before cooking, still had a satisfying texture. The egg was perfectly cooked, with just the right balance of soft and firm. The noodles had a firmer bite, though even the “soft” option retains a satisfying al dente texture.

For dessert, the yuzu sorbet was a delightful surprise—a generous scoop with a refreshing citrus flavor that complemented the rich, savory ramen perfectly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhQBUllWlqW70Lj1oEbwA5rK1BHmlirXtlgZqb&fid=0x0:0xc619b0c4a7922e19"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Vernessa Lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_HMcx5wd1O28ySlJt9n4oU_hrqSI6Z05JLm6P-8L--a68NBo5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"waited about 15 min in line at 6:40 ish
service is amazing! they greet you in japanese and thank you at the end of your meal in the same way. the ramen came very quickly. the chilli sauce had a really nice taste to it although it was a bit spicy at medium.
the broth is just the right amount of richness at medium. the yuzu sorbet had a real yuzu taste to it that i definitely recommend, as well as the sesame ice cream. will be back soon","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0igSqMBjXFOdwN6oMp1gmmXe-6_T8ZVHJZ7fU&fid=0x0:0xc619b0c4a7922e19"],"When":"2024-11-2"}]

title: Maruhachi Ra-men Metrotown
address: 〒V5H 2E9 British Columbia, Burnaby, Kingsway, Maruhachi Ra-men Metrotown
descriptions: Locals line up for hearty bowls of ramen & familiar Japanese sides at this informal restaurant.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dylan Hendricks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQA2q_i_cbvFJmt5oGxZ7BA4GKrRPCLdlqYIQQi_N7sjF5Ew=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place that specializes in simple, straightforward yet delicious ramen bowls. I had the spicy chashu tomagu pork thingamajig and it was delicious. The creamy, rich broth is an absolute winner and the noodles were served al dente and perfectly complimented the rest of the dish.

My only caveat is that for the price, the bowl is a touch light and doesn't leave you feeling stuffed like you would most pho or ramen places. However, its quality makes one forget about that pretty quickly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMl8T3vDmpVspoRe0XGil-LQlWnlmEb1DbgIcTj&fid=0x0:0x2ea298d5694d3331"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Marie N.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfdESgwvjwIIQeOUGB9sM00o0_7TYmoxrVTy0Np9d07ynrQVQ1IQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My family and I were so satisfied with the food here. The broth of the ramen was so delicious and we love the texture of the noodles!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUOWLSOcaZTLE_KAy-iMPKq7Qb74pmdb65m9Gt&fid=0x0:0x2ea298d5694d3331"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Andre Francoeur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK1DSoXh5_rYQOZ5QHBCWAOJ6SooV5Ud0trNVa9kplTRkql8g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had already been in the downtown and Burnaby area for 3 days on business and well fed. I dropped in here on my last night by myself and sooooo happy I did! It was the the most authentic and flavour meal I had during my 4 day visit!! The chicken broth is silky and buttery, the curry dishes pack a flavour punch and you get a good portion serving for the price. I even ordered a couple extra dishes to-go back to the hotel for midnight snacks. Lol.

On top of that, all of the staff was super welcoming, friendly and attentive. I will be back here hands down on my next trip back if in the area. 😋😋😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhy2I7OSupvfU-UkRGmMFLLDiaOylf_NkDndxq&fid=0x0:0x2ea298d5694d3331"],"When":"2024-6-27"},{"Name":"Evan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocItqym_b8p4Y-FW9783yYhbbkXgbWq5yo1i3Fyi_bB9_Q1tlIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The ramen here is alright, I would probably come back and give it another chance but here are the notes I write while eating it. I just remember how amazing the ramen egg was , I have been thinking about it ever since I had it. Side note:Its a not really savory type of ramen , but there's an other tonkotsu place nearby is your into that.

Soup :4/10
-Too salty, seaweed made it more salty
Noodles:6/10
-yellow ones would be better
Egg:10/10
-slayed
Meat:6.5/10
-Flavorful but over cooked
Add-ons:3/10
-No fried garlic
-No chili oil
Service: 10/10
-Staff came by frequently and asked if everything was okay","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjePmtBUW0BgrGoi0a516OGG7TiGczIUOly0ch&fid=0x0:0x2ea298d5694d3331"],"When":"2024-10-31"},{"Name":"J T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJhlRzWDXzdsN5IEg7ILK_EQ56zA9jcQ-fPPr3cS5cgV1YVlw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"2nd choice another try?

I think it has been a longgggg time since I last had a Maruhachui ramen from any of their locations. Original I was geared up to try Kamamarui Ramen around the corner for the first time but they hopped away for the Easter long weekend. (I think they are the last couple of ramen joints I still haven’t try yet).

Anyways, this Maruhachi is located on the same corner block as Boiling Point, Chatime, Meetrice etc, corner of Kingsway and Royal Oak in Burnaby. There are pay street parkings available and if you are lucky there are limited free parking at the back. Typical little ramen joint so usually there’s a little lineup.

Here were what I ordered this time around;

1. Goma-ae. It was a bit rubbery cause when “Yu choy” are preboiled, cooled and stored inside the refrigerator they tend to have that texture after a while.
2. Gyoza. Nice little crisp underneath but overall pretty basic.
3. Dashimaki. A little bland, I remember it used to be more flavourful?!?
4. Tamago ramen. The ramen texture was pretty good, the chashu was a bit dry more like boiled pork than chashu, the broth wasn’t hot.
5. Chashu tamago ramen. Everything pretty much the same as the tamago ramen except a few more slices of chashu. Once again, “cha shu” means BBQ NOT braised or boiled.

The service here was decently good and glad to see a full female crew managing this whole operation in a very organized manner.

As for the food; the food was pretty basic. Honestly, a lot of the ramen places not just this place should really understand the definition of “chashu”?!? Plus lightly seared sliced pork for soup noodles are always more aromatic and flavourful. And unlike beef or pork broth, the creaminess of chicken broth is hard to eat when it’s not hot. The exploration of other choices continue…

P.S. yeah not a bit supporter of businesses that don’t accept cash, cards only. Employee trust issues?!?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMaubGaNCH0gnUDsiJqv3nhoxHyg8WbhXOv2DMD&fid=0x0:0x2ea298d5694d3331"],"When":"2024-4-2"},{"Name":"Linh Tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbP3plInkqXVOA2XJc8czoQ80aWBGnT8WS-yMiUPgvNShtt-y90A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice little restaurant with simple decor and great staff. Yes, they're cheerful, fast, and welcoming. My husband had the aka miso ramen while I had the tamago (with 2 pieces of chasiu pork and a marinated soft egg). The flavor was on point, portions were great. I recommend you order the side fried garlic, best spent $1! Will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZJVIT20JArVu4MvRy3POHOsunSGqAp9v0Ap7C&fid=0x0:0x2ea298d5694d3331"],"When":"2024-5-5"},{"Name":"Peter Au","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwBxrbZVtlTM1OV2SDGm3NwMn7yUHEw1MaS3fh_B2utP_W4kON=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always seeing a line-up outside this ramen shop. Today, found it with no line-up, so drop it for a bowl. Came in, heard the waitress talking with fluent Japanese to the kitchen. Good sign. Not that this would  automatically translate to good authenticated food, but a better chance at least.

I was having the standard Tamago ramen. Noodle was good texture. Soup was authentic, base on my experience. The half-boiled egg was really soft inside. Chasiu was a bit dry but acceptable. Size was ok, actually bigger than a lot of downtown ones with higher price. $15 was very ok.

Good experience. May come back if no line-up.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRycImnZEiqZVE6P3MFMCe5PI1tmXd3zcwWkTc&fid=0x0:0x2ea298d5694d3331"],"When":"2024-5-4"},{"Name":"Muh Ruri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkStAcVhSLoWZluIOVQ74c2fLDnRh9SyZ_LHSDWUY1b4U3yJnx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Maruhachi Ramen, located near Metrotown, offers a variety of ramen options, but this review  is tan-tanmen focused. On one hand, the flavor profile was decent and notably authentic. Unlike some places that add peanut sauce, Maruhachi’s version stays true to its roots, avoiding that inauthentic twist.

However, there were several aspects that detracted from the overall experience. The amount of noodles was surprisingly low, and it felt like the abundance of bean sprouts was used to compensate for this shortage. This imbalance made the dish less satisfying.

Additionally, the lack of meat in the tan-tanmen was disappointing. For a ramen dish that typically includes flavorful ground pork, this omission left the bowl feeling incomplete. Another issue was the ball of black seaweed, which dissolved into the broth, giving it an unappealing burned black appearance. This visual aspect, coupled with the lack of substantial ingredients, made the dish less appetizing.

While the authenticity of the flavor was appreciated, the overall execution fell short. A more balanced approach with proper noodle portions, adequate meat, and a more thoughtful presentation would have greatly improved the dish. I would have preferred a more traditional tan-tanmen experience.

For those in the Metrotown area craving ramen, Maruhachi Ramen may still be worth a visit, but perhaps opting for a different menu item might provide a better dining experience","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDEgqd8uOEqU9Tx6bgTp2e779brcb77H5IMB6y&fid=0x0:0x2ea298d5694d3331"],"When":"2024-5-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Hiep Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMRHHZ7t798igHqhwEObqqiXXBYRe7_vTRRS3-gXG7fOgZlXSH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everytime I drive by this restaurant, I always see it busy. Finally my friend told me to meet him here to for lunch since he lives near by. The portions here are very good for what you pay. My meal was $19.99 , but I could only eat half,  yet I have enough left for dinner. There's free parking underground and across the street where Save On Foods / Winners is. Atmosphere was lively, decor was nice and modern with high ceilings. I would definitely recommend it here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvbNTcGIcPM44AeqCm9ZayqY9EPRPi5L2fKSwU&fid=0x0:0xd6c74052e9d83126"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"Wing Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3CwQO9cN_VmYBk6QsIpDB_ChUQLMcdHTqcHBMFHLumtEVmGxm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was pretty good. I really liked the spring rolls but the noodles felt a bit bland in the vermicelli bowl. The pho and soup tastes great but unfortunately both times I’ve been here I asked for no cilantro but still found cilantro in my bowl. I’m not allergic but cilantro is very over powering for me so I couldn’t really eat anything without tasting cilantro in the pho.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMApT9mDg9PQJnHBSGfgBRXJkWZxOIwAJDjH2wx&fid=0x0:0xd6c74052e9d83126"],"When":"2024-6-25"},{"Name":"maggie o","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9A5PydPe7Tcx0vvDAgMCxpdBCWS4_34QTKzuvzWDEq4oQ02l7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Got the special vermicelli (B1) here and the portion size is huge, I was only able to finish half of it despite being quite hungry. For $20 I believe the price is right.

I also ordered the iced coffee (D2) they have as I was hoping it'd wake me up like other Vietnamese coffees have in the past but it just tasted like a normal iced coffee, didn't do much in helping me wake up.

The service was okay, nothing to write home about.

Nice location!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYLXBP_Ven6LiddR_eftFVPk-PEFMQrhOV5A_m&fid=0x0:0xd6c74052e9d83126"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Pongo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXT-qQCE1uUwfmES1FGLIpAmkroUlDIcsJZMXejhRkO1uA9CxO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Compared to the average Vietnamese restaurant, the Viet Noodle Guy feel more contemporary. This place is good for a quick lunch, as the service is efficient. Pho is flavourful; no complaints. Perhaps it's the region, but pricing is a tad on the high side ($18 for regular size).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxUu61GWPncW3S8Z_laxCMfZCQDdeQx_UtnSvN&fid=0x0:0xd6c74052e9d83126"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Parto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzZ5HkfDCi8Op2fM63BdmnSxpWFy1ph9P9bSSWyOrfYukY4o12=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was pretty good and the servers were so polite. But the ventilation is terrible in the salon. We smelled like oil/food when we left and had to go back home to get changed. I hope they fix this problem, and I would go back for the food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOD5tLUtcufvncdMHkFb9wiNijknSlWU1iPksvJ&fid=0x0:0xd6c74052e9d83126"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Ben Mui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfFOXownwpYiZYSVjyQ--DAWb-j124t0Qh9shrZxTYCqTZaw2g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is probably the biggest portion of food I have gotten in a very long time. Definitely worth coming here. But most importantly the food tastes amazing!

Also underground parking is free for 3 hours, it's also right beside the restaurant. It's very convenient!
I'll be coming back soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_M1G6jup2sEktLS4-OCWoZ4nVRZV9IUi2UIAT&fid=0x0:0xd6c74052e9d83126"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Viv L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWBrWuuB6AOMX3D8N2mOyoxLwAW0k_LA_f1F7HHZvBhI_eRrPR=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We've been here several times for the vermicelli bowls (bún thịt nướng) and phở.  Both are flavourful and we love the portion sizes.  Spring rolls are always hot and crispy, worth it with the bún.  Could do with a few more pieces of tendon in the rare beef, tendon and tripe phở but there is more beef to make up for it.  They're pretty busy on the weekends for lunch, often there's a short line-up outside.  Staff are quick to find us a spot but there can be a 15-20 min. wait.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtD7G8mMyvR0dM6b0rPetwDBiwEhT_bZD_paaj&fid=0x0:0xd6c74052e9d83126"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Kristy Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEfZ2rjxNiODjhooQ3vu4wU52UFmMssx1nBEw-QrGtiP3D8nPb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Their dry noodles here are great and all the meat that comes with it is delicious, I would come back here just for that dish and the amount of food is gigantic, shareable between two people. Their soup noodles are okay, but I did not find it particularly amazing in comparison to any other pho place that I have been to and in their quest to be unique, it fell short because I most definitely did not like the texture of the noodles that they use in the pho. Service was okay, the atmosphere was not bad. I would come back for the dry noodles and the banh mi.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeWeP7wake9ra6o7FsS3srtJp-e5C7YrY5104d&fid=0x0:0xd6c74052e9d83126"],"When":"2024-5-10"}]

[{"Name":"Eric Jia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVayPVyMs8cXoTnLF-1wINmBGj4ROvmD5YPh1QKFm4CL7A4yV6mg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome place! Been there a few times, and the customer service is superb. Although the place is a bit expensive, the food is also very great too! Would recommend the ribs, the Korean Fried Chicken, bibimbap, and Japchae!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtgVqv5PJ1Lx-GbU6D8yPt2ZMIVaq_54v080VI&fid=0x0:0x9625eef0aab4798d"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Sinyo ganteng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVK6DhObLW3StVcJ_e9Ph42mdmAq5cSoW-d536hao-jSu7WAn8I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Awesome place to eat! customer service is top-notch!. very busy during lunch, greeting the door with a smile, and providing menus in seconds. Asking for recommendations, they tell customer on how spicy needed. Food came very fast, and the side order was incredibly delicious. Kimchi is so tasty. they come to refill drink without asking and ask if the soup is too spicy or not. During payment, they ask again if the food is too spicy and asking to come again. The price is very decent. I will come again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMATFpRqhCBCTJaKII0GFkJw5gLJDr6E-wXBSzm&fid=0x0:0x9625eef0aab4798d"],"When":"2024-6-21"},{"Name":"Kim Brownlee Personal Trainer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJc9pOgc45h3FEGxic5elsfHEOB-VZRyQ58pP8O6gEq3_ZRXWH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Lots of good food! Nice cozy restaurant. Staff were friendly and helpful. A couple of the dishes were a little too sweet, like the japchae and the hot pot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNO0iXQ4tU052kcdqgmNdjliF-oZUl2MJAMjTAr&fid=0x0:0x9625eef0aab4798d"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"Swimming Lion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoNuKoBPU8hDsJrOBlEDRPQawlWHi3C9rUvrLYtz7paaZM0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Decent food and good service

Price is reasonable and refillable sweet potato, kimichi etc. We always get the combo C for $79 and this price hasnt changed for a while. Our always go to korean resturant. Kids friendlg resturant equipped with booster seat, high chair.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXP6bh91g-57wjTp3hUxT2SHplzO_6v1QW7OuL&fid=0x0:0x9625eef0aab4798d"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Sugie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDWdt79qxiJSacIrFKVaPT5LiaSatXKch7NK7FAk4fqE5b4rQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered it through Uber because I wanted to eat Korean braised short ribs, but it was so delicious that I was impressed.
Jangmojib restaurant is always delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN10EAAEnNKNVz1QTBLcQszX7Gx_eKoTXH7hO0&fid=0x0:0x9625eef0aab4798d"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Selina Zhou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdh_K07G_35WE1XQolPePKtbRPCS7etPd4GO37eQJrOR8PInDd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The side dishes were some of the best I’ve tasted in Korean restaurants. The portion was plentiful, more than enough for two people. The prices were fair for the amount of food.

It was relatively quiet for a restaurant and overall a pleasant eating experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcVZtoEgeX9FWBX9o0LS9LP6YihvmjoiQCSCSt&fid=0x0:0x9625eef0aab4798d"],"When":"2024-5-31"},{"Name":"Linh Tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbP3plInkqXVOA2XJc8czoQ80aWBGnT8WS-yMiUPgvNShtt-y90A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had sundae (pork intestine) soup, LA grilled beef and japchae. The food was delicious but a bit oily. The staff were attentive. There can be some upgrades to the venue, it's pretty old and chairs are not comfortable. A plus point is their big parking lot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNP_lL6EJYD_7YOCQslvtOrqD-1Wf9gljJbrp0e&fid=0x0:0x9625eef0aab4798d"],"When":"2024-1-20"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Al W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcvpOwoDtOl-deAQtv8SVAt1e1Tdv2Nb1Vi8TaX3-PKN3UWaLI-A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The best item there was their chashu rice bowl and follow by their gyoza.  The deluxe mazesoba is good, it has a rice umami taste that might surprise folks.  Our tamago ramen was unfortunately below expectations, the ramen noodle was below average and the soup base was lacking favour.   The service and wait time was acceptable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3oq4Ck_TwPzDDLkGe4f_4EXz-zSX8m8AUy6pl&fid=0x0:0x194bae6812444fe2"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Joanna Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWolcjmld9gF3v6DkaAWVH8shgENhbGrrRuqb_2RSUD8H4muTAvMg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I tried the ebi mayo, the meat topped gyoza, and the deluxe mazesoba.

The atmosphere was really nice, service was great. Very attentive. The food was delicious.

They're very busy during dinner time, so plan accordingly!

Will come back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCwQQsL9MN8Cc3ZtdB_yS19XRlEzwf-_GPI0sT&fid=0x0:0x194bae6812444fe2"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Daniel Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFE7g6vnjf23CW6mDeh4anchF8fxBs6O5Nsx0bvhepuO3MVzWa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved dining here, beautiful layout and delicious food! Ordered off the tablet at the table, food and drink came in decent time. Mazesoba was absolutely delicious! Plum wine is a must try. Friendly and good customer service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCxmXyacNMNGHoDIg5W0F_KOVKl9i6ApDgq_r4&fid=0x0:0x194bae6812444fe2"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Leon Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPOnBvlGz2k_WzxOhCiURR3aRaAE5ffHXfUBJJ4GP7GBC5Wn8K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food and great atmosphere! They have some very good portion sizes, and they even do rice refills in case the carbs aren’t enough, which is complements the Mazesoba very well. My only complaint is that they used to put their bubble tea in cute bags, and the rice refill portions have gotten smaller, but I still highly recommend this place, especially their Hokkaido milk tea :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOw_O88UgeIP7Oq_q2EWK3cy_NLBgrBzm_WbJiK&fid=0x0:0x194bae6812444fe2"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Christine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMbb4rSx2yeLvBgC1qs9Q3xv5M2ENLkGN0MgNur7yErOCX2LNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I visited this place because I’m a big fan of soba, and I was especially curious to try their mazesoba, which isn’t something you find everywhere. Unfortunately, I don’t think I’ll be returning.

The interior is spacious, with plenty of seating, so there was no wait at all—we were seated immediately. Each table had a monitor for ordering, which was incredibly convenient since we didn’t need to wait for a server.

However, the taste of the food was quite confusing. I found myself adding small amounts of every seasoning available at the table, trying to make each bite more enjoyable. Unfortunately, it felt like a search for flavor with every mouthful (and not in a good way). They do offer free rice to mix with the remaining sauce after finishing your soba, but in my case, there wasn’t enough sauce left to make it worthwhile.

Overall, while the service and convenience were great, the food just didn’t meet my expectations. I don’t think I’ll be visiting again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBK6Lxerfy8BFuE1VvXLBIlNV7ji1lpU8Q1k_9&fid=0x0:0x194bae6812444fe2"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"SHI-CHEN JHOU","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRo4_NcRFVRqasfAbvVsDc6UqDYGVOrNyh2fiGSxhg6QlSiQAOSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice food and great friendly service.
They also have low carb option of noodle if u don’t wanna serve too much carb and sugar.
Ice cream is not really sweet but I like it.
The portion size is not really big ( u can upgrade to XL size for same prize) but it’s quite enough for a girl.

Became to my one of favorite restaurant at metropolitan area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMv-QWdQdI-CkWugDn6rPjKi7mpWST4Whb7u-a0&fid=0x0:0x194bae6812444fe2"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"M. A.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLB10KqeIl0fqiL0pGNdfKbos8ZnoBDkwk_kgO3yJezaC8LhTs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've never eaten at this Metrotown location before, and I truly enjoy the atmosphere. I placed an order for the Tamago ramen with level 1 spicy. It tastes good and is delicious. The pricing, in my opinion, is also fair. The staff is incredibly helpful and attentive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrX8luZNgGDjpHxYBDa7XHbPv45hW4bmB9vmgf&fid=0x0:0x194bae6812444fe2"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Daria Liukin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkJyqUukJ1Tp32CT1Y60hgwO8TEu98t8UrHjC4vSHU3XhtZR-hfA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first time trying mazesoba, and I highly recommend this place for anyone new to it. The waiter was incredibly helpful, explaining the menu and the ingredients in each dish. They genuinely recommended good options for first-timers, especially for those who are sensitive to spicy food. We thoroughly enjoyed the experience and the atmosphere, and we would definitely go again, especially on cozy days when you can watch the rain through the glass and enjoy a warm meal!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUvch9MxzytQHsnX5F7kfg5G6XDPvPxZYwu7nj&fid=0x0:0x194bae6812444fe2"],"When":"2024-9-16"}]
