[{"Name":"wah chi yip","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKBykHMUbkrtJ4cwRRXsjOnAzAcOzwrpq-XVjovUt6A3trFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It's still a good food court after the busy shopping. There are a lots of chain restaurants.  You should know what you can get.
The seating area is quite big and roomy.  But it will get super busy on weekend, you can get a seat if you are wait for a while.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-A0TIseDNS5yTNtkZRkJ2cAAv4NL8diR2lT2d&fid=0x0:0x31fd3dc52c0ce4e2"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Kasun Chanaka","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ0cnBSYxwFlFeFtLJXqasZxTv1BCI5DeE9A8Jgk8-096YcOA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It is an amazing place to have various types of foods and drinks (non alcoholic) covering most parts of the world. Chinese, Japanese, Indian, western and many other countries of food are available. Nice place to hangout with friends and family. Easy access.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPf_olxLnzSIbY1ye8EnMc37AmYUz7iMFxf3Cnt&fid=0x0:0x31fd3dc52c0ce4e2"],"When":"2023-10-16"},{"Name":"Lindsay Victoria Sarah Halkett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXiE1unVXAFDlZ5xVdUjAkjbqSt6362l1gFjlsI4npr_x6zlkhC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"~ wasn't happy with the Thai Express Thai soup with beef,,, lacked flavor and the meat was super chewy , tried to add all kinds of flavor but just was not happy with it. So I went n tried the chicken curry which was the same old chicken curry with basmati rice and Naan bread... still wanting a flavorful noodle bowl and veggies 😩  ~","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCe4LZh1pKzkCqUhDdiRErKY999zVh1wdhkJ2i&fid=0x0:0x31fd3dc52c0ce4e2"],"When":"2023-9-18"},{"Name":"Jakob Schmidt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgeN-BI2FD7doKOsV7ge4lNAIG3A31zObtODjG6FxxvBa-92Hb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Homeless dudes walking around in a dazed state eating garbage and freaking people out. It ain’t the Ritz folks. Wish that security could contain people who are clearly incapacitated by meds or drugs and are obviously not shopping.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ron S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVW7DrnKxu6XSeSt2OuGXE78Nj9Z7962qwoQmXCxG9FcZu7YRJI7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This place is a total joke ‼️
I was here at 5.17PM to get a simple icecap with a shot of expresso, at the counter all employees ignore me and there were no other customers , after my order my ice cap was at the expresso machine for at least 5 minutes and noone cares to bring over I had asked one she just waved and and pointed at the other employees to bring it over to me and noone acknowledge.
I had to wave again and tell them my ice cap is done and then was brought to me .

Hey Tim Hortons management tell me why is this happening.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Abhay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIAIsIbwrzVn1ybOdzMQRhmdxt0OZZtH-k2B40FLmLqgGl5rA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was nice experience having a small gathering and enjoying nd exploring various food options","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Riley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJldUiPp_jY1pfkGZhnUXKWesdsGVMZbDzw8x3judpb7DdpHg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pretty busy good food alright service","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"bhagya wijethunga","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUihL_AI7HdxpTYK00_ns8Vrb4GxdClNPGzwTT8pP9qTMOlQ527=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I like the cozy feeling in the food court","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"malik sk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKoxGxE6eA9zXjdpwVN2wBxGuvWyEQoMARSU3wD7dI_EOzK-IM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Are you tired of your life? Have you missed going to the hospital ? Would you like to spend more than 8 hours at the emergency room? Have you ever had food poisoning? If no this is your best option to ruin your day.

DO NOT EAT FROM HERE🤮🤮

*most of the five stars reviews are for a free meal
or whatever so don’t get scammed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFBYsmi7nAvtcbYxjoLD3Tl5EzzfTg0QS25Wqd&fid=0x0:0xd844dd14ce21ca3c"],"When":"2024-10-30"},{"Name":"Abi Education","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPa6ocYe9EJY6NasVHeaQzp6p1QPGPCD7FPDOS2Y9hufw253E=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"“I recently visited Hi5 Chicken and had a fantastic experience! They offer a wide variety of options that cater to different tastes, including some great vegetarian choices, which is a nice touch. The location is convenient, making it easy to stop by, and the employees are incredibly kind and welcoming, adding to the pleasant atmosphere. And, of course, the food was excellent – flavorful and satisfying! Highly recommend for anyone looking for a delicious meal in a friendly setting.”","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Daniel potter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6o71N1AZnqFnVDuHsYv4hJdv_iaF5aAAxyi5liFKVKLfLF3yRgA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent staff late night. He dealt with an irritated guy like a professional. The food was cooked to order at 3am! Excellent customer service and a clean restaurant. I appreciate your hospitality tonight !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSpCes5I2pj9HFjiYb3XqpO5wJdWM7vedEbM2b&fid=0x0:0xd844dd14ce21ca3c"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Nik Abakumov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW36MBTuKOOdtzhlN1Rd3_ywJK6UeM2sldXqxZ0ZKxrZepXTMV1iQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friend invited me to have something to eat and I was pleasantly surprised to discover they have vegetarian options! My friend enjoyed his chicken while I was enjoying my power plant sandwich which at the beginning I was even confused if it's a plant-based product - I even returned and asked them to double-check it for me since it was hard to believe it was a plant base product :) Thanks for the friendly staff, they said it is 100% plant-based, but they still double-checked that, so I appreciate such great service and food quality!

The place is clear and the people working there are so friendly, it was a great place to stop, especially considering how hard to find something to eat for my vegan and vegetarian friends.
Thank you guys!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shingo S. Ishida","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIvLRJ2o6WDRq4xKru6IZ9IVs3ADSsQljvLgoWkLqSQkkNDmQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came to this spot along Kingsway, almost across the street from Metrotown, on a Saturday evening around 7:30pm. It wasn't too busy and we were able to put in an order without waiting at all. A quick scan of the menu makes you think about other deep-fried chicken outlets like Church's, Kentucky Fried Chicken, and Popeye's Chicken. We ordered a chicken sandwich and a 10-piece order of regular (not spicy) fried chicken wings, with a Family/Large order of French fries. The service staff was friendly and courteous, and the food came out in a few minutes after we placed the order. We carried away instead of eating in the restaurant because we were trying to get back to the nearby Hilton hotel, but we would have ate the food there, given there were several tables and chairs inside the restaurant (they also have tables and chairs outside on a small patio, if the weather was nicer/warmer). All in all a decent service of deep-fried goodness, but the chicken wings seemed a bit pricey ($18-plus for an order of 10 wings that weren't really that big). Nowhere to park your car except along Kingsway (if that's possible) or one of the side/cross streets.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTQPb0F6Z6USIK75qpOJtj_9I3hehlP2fCZcgi&fid=0x0:0xd844dd14ce21ca3c"],"When":"2024-3-2"},{"Name":"Reda Escaros","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJ6JK_AzWcA5IOpU4A1k3FXEyBtcc9oS5vU3PaE4gVhERm-ZYh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent food quality and taste,  service is fast and efficient, the place is clean and tidy, nice patio with lot of space,  good dessert menu,  friendly staff,  convenient location close to skytrain and bus stops, parking at the strip mall next door is free","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxUu4JCP294YRDyssKYO0B0_NEr3q9u1PA-Vfk&fid=0x0:0xd844dd14ce21ca3c"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Jasmine Hue","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKqkEG8hdpj1GWbUCRuCfqshr_1LIMOmkiCQxVcwwWQuNuLbw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Our first time trying with friends. The fried chicken was delicious and fresh. We ordered 2 sets of daily special but not sure why the price was different?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcxnB6hv7CMR1kPaWxEBhiGq622jgsExa4Is21&fid=0x0:0xd844dd14ce21ca3c"],"When":"2024-4-21"},{"Name":"Aldin Riasat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVTmqxuagcIh9f1GkvhaY2lkCVJHdK7UtJzx3K2OwDK7QMIE7e=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Maybe I am just being bias but I really hold them in high regards as I still remember their random act of kindness on one of my delivery orders (I will leave the picture below). But yea I tried their fried and roasted chicken both with the large fries. I actually order them quite often in the weekends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFEijlnSVmDK0zyR8wWTdps13xmuoJ1WzxvUL6&fid=0x0:0xd844dd14ce21ca3c"],"When":"2024-6-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"D Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4D0pnJRuugp7xtOoI9Okhc1IdtNuzKocuzhsSBj3gUdos57g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The menu needs to be easier or bigger to read. Where is the english??? At least add numbers.

No, i dont wear glasses haha. 🤣
Yummy dishes. Friendly casual vibe.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQvXQdf2XFVtlRBcpooek2_ftqsf2aduPj-6NE&fid=0x0:0x508af482b715f32e"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Brian wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIecyvptBtaPU7d4m0H02OPlrGoOkqo7hrw-3q6pzNG-rRQ-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This noodle place is a hidden gem in the plaza. I have not tried noodles that can be so different from typical noodle houses. Flavored but not overpowering. Tried their cold noodle with chilli sauce, lamb with noodle soup, and stir fried noodle with beef. Have to go there again.

The restaurant only takes cash, be prepared before going.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8Fjw99TuoLATsdedjWKPZE9z0ag9yvZc11fw4&fid=0x0:0x508af482b715f32e"],"When":"2023-6-27"},{"Name":"John Pham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIJ56fcKUjwE6v16wGzOmm1b8pc391aqE85w_tk2sjoH8QyGFo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very tasty food! The owners were very helpful with the menu and patient with us. We came 30 minutes before closing and told us to don't rush even after closing! The food was very flavorful, highly recommend the beef cumin bao. The bread to meat ratio was perfect! The lamb noodle soup was very tasty too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQJuz5hmX_HyOQjQ2AnQoNWMnikogosos5c7TD&fid=0x0:0x508af482b715f32e"],"When":"2024-2-7"},{"Name":"Percy Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpYfKBRmcbCv3QlJ6bZXmv0ly8_CocIf_lBOXCAlxRrZaEag=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Small place located in a strip mall.   Nice lady took our order and served us throughout the meal.   The food was very tasty and not too oily.   We had the shredded potatoe, dumplings and two noodle dishes.   I love the thick flat noodles...  lookingnforward to my next visit to try other food items.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnj-_Xw26IPb3GrqFHG6jxbcYekq8t1Tu9puEm&fid=0x0:0x508af482b715f32e"],"When":"2022-9-7"},{"Name":"Linda Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKbm_M2si7-dsNFtTgBoE8eRYCks0e8XBB8KkK-5UTqWxSb-GHz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best Xi’an Cold Skin Noodles 西安凉皮 that makes it right. The Beef Cumin Bao is also very good. Not to mention how tasty the Lamb Noodle Soup was. This place deserves more attention.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7bX-RFMiqLt8eZS6dJqcGz_VZEbql1RLDyCIv&fid=0x0:0x508af482b715f32e"],"When":"2024-2-7"},{"Name":"John !","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUSnjJox_hXLvcEcTXiPHlmv3_09WuFz6OfnMk5e4bSDSttxB5J=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The burgers here is one thing you won't miss out on. However........the noodles were very well done! Nice spring and bounce in every bite, the flavour is nice but I somehow feel like they used to be better before......for those who don't know,  they used to be one of my top favourite places for noodles before they closed down. Now since they reopened....its pretty similar but not quite there yet....hopefully they can match what they served before. The cucumber dish was very refreshing though. It's a small place with very limited seating.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQ9CS8a3CAKRhvNy_OxlT62Khq75VuXhfuobAP&fid=0x0:0x508af482b715f32e"],"When":"2019-2-8"},{"Name":"Penny Rusty Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkGfXMIDqwS_yD1axTk6tkHoLsnybE2ErvKrHMoMIElMJWekI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"TerraCotta Boyz is a Chinese noodle shop located in the Old Orchard Shopping Centre in Burnaby. This smallish shop has a few tables on one side of the store and a stand-up counter on the opposite side. Their menu is fairly basic but odds are that you’re coming here for their noodles.

The server had recommended that I try their Spicy & Sour Pork Noodles in Soup ($12) so I took him up on his suggestion. I found that the soup was not overly spicy or sour but it is noticeable (especially if you’re unfamiliar with this combination of flavours). I did enjoy the texture and the varying thickness of the long and wide noodles (I need to work on my noodle pull technique). The dish also contained a small amount of thin beef, cut up tofu puffs, and veggies but it felt a bit sparse.

While I was waiting for my meal to arrive, I could hear a loud slapping sound coming from the kitchen… assuming it was from them making their noodles. Overall, I was a bit undecided about this dish so I made a note to come back here and try one of their non-soup noodles to see how that compared.

It actually took me about 4 months before I finally managed to come back for a revisit and this time I ordered the Fried Beef Sauce Noodles ($12). As expected, the English on the menu isn’t very descriptive but I wound up pleased with this dish. Again, there was the loud noodle slapping noise coming from the kitchen while I waited. And they had to ask me to move over to the counter because a larger party came in after me.

This bowl had a generous portion of long, broad noodles of varying thickness topped off with well-seasoned fried ground beef, sprouts, and a few pieces of veggies. You have to kind of mix it up before you eat and the sauce was only mildly spicy but I did think this turned out quite good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOoVqnGVt95tlYxcbm0O34WXMImenZz2Q1fGh6s&fid=0x0:0x508af482b715f32e"],"When":"2019-6-11"},{"Name":"Jim Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3tXWnX8xFhA_qZcSgIAVcjedjNVtb5Riz6aB4ltUNzTkDmgfU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food were served in plastic takeout containers. I felt like I was eating at Crystal Mall food court.

Only 2 people (husband & wife) working in this small restaurant. The woman server speaks Mandarin and very very little English.

Scanned the menu code on the table and there’s no option to place the order. Woman came by and I had to point to what I wanted on my phone.

Food was average and service was slow and poor. The woman server talked very loud to another table beside us.  Being that it’s such a small restaurant, the volume of their voices just echoed loudly.

Would not be coming back until I learn to speak Mandarin. This place only takes cash.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7hkhHvRsQ-ZQfCdpLakB4-ShvQ13yaRDiJVsL&fid=0x0:0x508af482b715f32e"],"When":"2023-1-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"sodapone","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWY2rbGU2q2bp5ygeHZvk_PXY8AsO2FtX9bLNM0E30QwB97JoAmw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The local arcade patrons often come here on Fridays after closing. For a large group like ours, it offers the right combination of being open late, having big tables for over a dozen people, and being reasonably priced. It's a solid all-around option that's great for big groups!

My only complaint is recent—starting in May or so they started using the t'order tablet ordering system, and this system is an absolute nightmare for very large dining groups—everyone has to pass around a heavy tablet and wait their turn, the servers have no idea who ordered what and have to ask and double-check with everyone anyway, and the bill can't be split more than six ways, forcing those six people to bear the brunt of 20 people's dinners. It'd be great if an exception to using this system could be made for groups over 8 in size.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBujabniHatHLuDFTNJgcTjkrLRslqgW9ca1OY&fid=0x0:0x9cb37b0e193557"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"20223501강다현","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL5BVhdneh8C4b6BJm0ZP4LwdmZqTC4PZLGs-Gi00jyQLPfnA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First the price is really reasonable,
and the servers were so kind as well. Also you can use the tablet to get order, it's so comfortable.
And the food was pretty good👍
My favorite menu was the chicken. It's amazing.
And the amount of the food was a lot.
But it was pretty difficult to find this restaurant, so I hope someone who watch this review can go this restaurant!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMD7nDuwuN0YlnmgUTttPeLpN8a2Iwyge3nniKY&fid=0x0:0x9cb37b0e193557"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Penelope L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKVhmjcdvTwTP_Ev8aAAkvlV4pYCCBQEctEVEyBKeEFJuvsqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is an absolutely amazing place with special 2item lunch , 3 item and 4 item.Plus there happy hour is 2pm-5pm & 8:30pm- closing with 20% off excluding certain things you'll have to check out the website or better yet come in and have a taste.The food is delicious with variety of rolls,  donburi, udon, combos. Definitely a great place and amazing customer services!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWMAoH8SqHQXuB8wVddAnUw19hnAonLX9sGbjb&fid=0x0:0x9cb37b0e193557"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"No.2 _","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzkacn00DkdEIvS5oADKRJc0BqHKki0uEOJzPbxPXpraGAwCNc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The combination of both Korean and Japanese food is great when one person wants sushi and other wants fried chicken. The atmosphere is also great since the seats are in individual booths so you can enjoy your food in peace. They also have lots of drink options so it would be great to come with friends for a little drink!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8gKit-R0JfnPUznYPpv88oA5aY3eYGs7CEyUc&fid=0x0:0x9cb37b0e193557"],"When":"2024-11-8"},{"Name":"Julian Piezas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxuPXvYqTxvTmeL7Q9ZGhPne-Xhk-MYMohRWh9Z0wwxYqsKJ3JbQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My gosh. Didn’t know i could have a 5-star experience on a quick stop in Burnaby between destinations.

$12.50 for ALL THIS chicken and a salmon-avocado roll. It’s the 2-Item Combo (separate from their 2-5pm Happy Hour 20% Off)
The salmon avocado is great in portions.
The chicken - perfect texture and flavour -
would make the Korean side of their business proud.
I also love how the server put this much sauce on the side instinctively - cause I defs needed it.

You can order on a tablet, and food was ready within 5 minutes. Lastly, writing this Google review could get you a free pop. 👀

Love this place - hope it keeps getting love over the years!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMb9IdUWRnqNxNHExQyxE10-xfrND_RCizdJsCs&fid=0x0:0x9cb37b0e193557"],"When":"2024-9-25"},{"Name":"Kia Anarna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLGHfqbY6QRtxOfZDafD9JkhAZLVl4b4P5_QhNx2zjC2B9PxA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My partner and I always go here to eat when we crave for sushi. We love the salmon aburi ++ their other rolls. The service is excellent, friendly staff and always ready to offer free tea. We always go here during happy hour (esp the late night at 8:30pm), really good value for money. I hope they can upgrade their interior but overall very clean and comfortable. There is free parking downstairs as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1rgihyZcqNBgAYaVqcKFr53f3Q8yYCRPrrW8x&fid=0x0:0x9cb37b0e193557"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Viena Bajic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdi91GoxwP9yFVcNNB0Tzapbiyob2wrd2PZVKhJUUjrwtSA8y9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Group of 5, everyone really enjoyed their food however our dishes came at vastly different times. Bento boxes are a great deal! Raw salmon was delicious! Service was really kind and we got seated right away. Digital menu was super easy to access and actually preferred as we didn’t have to wave down a server at every need! Overall around a 4/5! Also happy hour deal! 20% off!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPp6aKIwXp5em0Lc3N4SR6rKphFUO76Xx20siVb&fid=0x0:0x9cb37b0e193557"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"MG_FXV","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiigFyUNoiwP5bHSXlNRrOpnatj6VSziAvS6zd1X48n-qBzP4n=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the tablet to order the food. Complete menu, specials and ingredients without worrying what you're ordering. Option to call the staff of you need something. Sushi was delicious and soft. Crunchy fried chicken and tempura. Spring rolls are tasty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwe6j_6NeFnVsDJgOd2nGukEF52S9_6qoDHCXp&fid=0x0:0x9cb37b0e193557"],"When":"2024-7-25"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ying Ng (Nalylstyle)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXG5NfQHtnrYR1cCcHw2vrrGTZgugO-IaiPyWd-H1JDTJJGHik=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"My friend and I tried their Soy Garlic Fried Chicken Over Rice, and we had to pay extra for the pickled radish. I believe it should be included.

The soy garlic fried chicken wasn't bad, but it doesn't quite compare to Chicko Chicken.

In picture #1 and #2, you can see the difference in portions that we received, which is very upsetting. They should pack all the food with the same amount.

I don’t recommend it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsnESPdxGpUy9OesjI8Mo5CK2dcZmx4ru6iA-B&fid=0x0:0x3be260bcd3fcc50c"],"When":"2023-11-23"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow!!! The Rose Tteok Bokki is absolutely amazing tasting here. It’s creamy with mild tang and has sausages, fish cakes, and rice cakes in it! It’s like Asian fusion pasta! Even the golden fried chicken and honey garlic wings had perfect flavour and were all crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside. Easily one of my favourite Korean fried chicken restaurants!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdXP7NuBu3LgVkU8R7dyjYweJ1bJNjZDVFrPYL&fid=0x0:0x3be260bcd3fcc50c"],"When":"2024-4-3"},{"Name":"Karin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWZEffXi1IbvlFSK5_dapE4inDOb-tro8ROD_ZgTfKFhi8ljf-BA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Preordered take out and was very satisfied with my order.
The staff was friendly and welcoming.
Fries were hot and crispy at pick up. I bought one of their seasonal special deals and thought I got a good amount of food for what I paid for. Chicken pieces were very large , moist and flavorful. One small area of improvement is that a more evenly coating of sauce could be done for one of the flavours.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jenny Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQTFWIai1btc2OoM98-rGugBTXeS1i5naDVoOpe9pxEUpPO-k=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I’m pretty sure the recipe wouldn’t be like this.
I assume the cook didn’t follow the exact instruction or the owner didn’t  teach the person right. I’ll just order more chicken next time. Too much water no flavor. I was so excited to eat tteokboki and this is what I’m getting. So disappointed and super sad","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORLcCRdb2c-qo4qjY5BsAmi1yg3Cz9bl0NBwOl&fid=0x0:0x3be260bcd3fcc50c"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Richard Hwang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIesk8vVvdE8mKnevAymdo8mfet0IFH2x6CmjnwABU93TDqzA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was good in general. The fried chicken was crunchy. I got the golden and kalbi friend chicken and cheesling fries. I liked the Kalbi flavour more than the golden so I think I will be ordering more of that in the future. However, it felt a bit dried compared to the other location in Vancouver West which was more juicy. The order was accurate and the person at the front took the initiative to confirm the order with the receipt.

I ordered online for take out and the food was ready a little early, and I did not have to wait.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMehiqe9agK6a_81it2W3eH9fR657QjK6w-hc_b&fid=0x0:0x3be260bcd3fcc50c"],"When":"2023-8-21"},{"Name":"Garry Auguste","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8yCB2-rxVOZjTiSv-6de3IvaVL62ffZqWZx_Hk2X-Vg2OSARE8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you have not tried this place, you are missing out. I love cooking, I know taste. This is extremely good. The young female cashier who served today around 5pm was excellent. Nice and professional. This is my new favorite..😍😍","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"tutu fu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIfBH6Akb4Pfxk6BomAz0LNafc_srjQZ5iwr9XgFIUxFLGFYA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I eat almost every week. But this time tteokbokki really dry. And service not that good, no pickles, and change the box for chicken hard to bring back to my place. I like old white/red box which easy to carry. It not just happen once. It happen many time hopfully they will improve. But chicken alway good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkx6CTUNlxXhS_GHKJhCT0t2PvMEct99RF8Nqz&fid=0x0:0x3be260bcd3fcc50c"],"When":"2024-5-21"},{"Name":"P P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrqQn2R7yD4XVDPK-c61om1uFohhWM5nSQHwFsInaye-f9-dDwGg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Chicken and staff attitude was good, but paid & ordered 7 pcs only got 6!

Just doesn’t feel good when this happens. By the time I got home it was too cumbersome to return to the store to fix it. Impossible for customer to open the order on collection and count number of chicken pieces. These are times when you trust the store and staff to do their job right.

Tried to get in touch via their website leave a comment. Rather disappointing experience, no one even got back to me. Hope they sort out their staff and training to ensure a better experience.

For now, I would avoid or keep an eye on if they give you a piece or two less than you ordered.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSMAQnbP-CUz4bUwcaYZ00qL2yac_tKM9l0hzt&fid=0x0:0x3be260bcd3fcc50c"],"When":"2023-9-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kay Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6JX-nBO8BvC6G5rvW3GvOrXqqzU0kvEHexxnu_F_Pre_SjsW7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"the smell outside this indian restaurant was so tempting that we couldnt resist to give it a try! and it didnt disappoint us! the food really tasted good. we enjoyed this traditional indian restaurant so much!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAOfYu2kBWns0hZjqg4ilshzJblYt6hTLoSTW0&fid=0x0:0x2fc257e17e039763"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Ritwij Shastri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVUDhSeY1ZyoH05JuVWjwRdm6YTlPeomxVrjUNvQsu0n46t5KiZAw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Found this great little restaurant on facebook and had to try it. Great location, cozy atmosphere with rustic decor.
I ordered the Veg thali , which was absolutely delicious. The flavours were rich and perfectly seasoned.
Prompt service.
It’s definitely a must try. Probably one of the best in Burnaby","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNp1uOaazbBmz7k05jQ2LDSUsvGgu-ABsedE5qy&fid=0x0:0x2fc257e17e039763"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"kawaii hatchiko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLtom4JJghW2UnkOsI7GKr-J96yxZfSX4SBdkTaAQaNBfKVBVT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I use to order take out from here, it was nice to come back again. The samosas were hot and fresh. Just know not everything on the menu is available. The lamb chops were amazing! The fish tender and succulent. Worth a visit","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPq83bc_CVvZADZYpk2UUJH63FULf-xnedH2lSR&fid=0x0:0x2fc257e17e039763"],"When":"2024-5-25"},{"Name":"J Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVd_tJr5oIcl7HDPt8euPkTb-MCewXa0eEjRnWARG4tW4KUXRuu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Good: butter chicken is as delicious as i remembered it.
The GREAT: add-ons at no extra cost - the chips w the sauce (i can't recall what it is but it usually comes w shrimp pakoras); and the 4x pieces of Naan were a pleasant surprise. Left me completely stuffed and I rolled out of there.
The MEH: not busy on Fri lunch time but  they only came by once to fill up my cup w water. They appeared to be more focused on a larger table of 10-12.

They informed me that they don't do buffets anymore after COVID, which is too bad as they used to have a decent dinner buffet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWUWcCFOKtkXO9F3aFJARTPYuO_3Lp8yn5TTYn&fid=0x0:0x2fc257e17e039763"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Sally Rodriguez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYImJyCsPZ1U003tXN4fpaHQosVQMfmFbKD19gt9ySf-YRWw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The place is both beautiful and spotless, with exceptionally courteous staff. But the standout feature is the food! We tried both the vegetarian and non-vegetarian Thali, and each was delicious—the dal.. OMG was outstanding. The portions are just right for the price.

I've visited twice already and will certainly return!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnPYljJz3oWdkTT0kn40v42G6gbAfXxgC4sJtt&fid=0x0:0x2fc257e17e039763"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"You Cakes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW18sBMm2NvwATk7bxLgi_cf3iGPsWSCgjTEBKcMHVUdOOmMplJ5w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was delicious, good size portions, will be back next time. Thank you for the wonderful meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVXKQh85qeB8Nq2yan51gT6vdfqP98UULsCXXw&fid=0x0:0x2fc257e17e039763"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Brittany","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUaTw3mnOK8l8haAjS6bfO1ye0bRyF4XKnDg89neYDPBoOw4QlgPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Solid Indian restaurant along Kingsway.

Fish pakora - very fresh
Beef samosas - solid
Mixed plate - great presentation
Chicken biryani - delicious

We did everything "hot" tonight. Recommend a mix of hot and mild, so you can taste more favours..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3QuG7IbE3fwoGMurvNWGHeOmCCamL_Rao0wAw&fid=0x0:0x2fc257e17e039763"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Catherine Phillippe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIqjJG3OUskk26c4pIiKNlHJIRaZAp4-fbBiJPyiG2lbtBJdg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We wanted to go to Big Way Hotpot but both places had a huge line up. One sniff of the air and Saffron brought us in 😂 This restaurant has been around for a long time but we never got around to trying it and we were glad we did today. We ordered the 2 lunch special, butter chicken and chefs samples. It was delicious. I love the mango custard dessert. The service was very good. We felt like we were having fine dining Indian food. We will definitely come back the next time we're in the hood. Thank you for a delicious lunch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN--mWUdzrK5fEAZUq7VQoRp9x1iGDdTXU8ZjX6&fid=0x0:0x2fc257e17e039763"],"When":"2023-10-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Hillbillytc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV833YeKMKJfxtYeKhRHVRSrikZoFOcCapKBwyEFBOnxiCMeXAZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The atmosphere is nice for a walk in quick bite. The pizza is fresh and tasty. They have Gluten free options. And a dedicated place in the stone oven to cook it. The lady at the front was super friendly and knowledgeable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5BTtOcjPYvWa4bSTvZPADr4KdlAhju0mOmp7s&fid=0x0:0xd1bf2365b014db0c"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"rushil jalnawala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3AlNZ2gdbLpeC8gG3P-yOW5yUfYG5TFtfaYJBb0Jt2oEHa-k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place gives the true meaning to heaven on a slice. The crust is amazing thin light airy and just the right amount of char the toppings were excellent and not too overbearing!! Great great place! Also the slice deals and the prices are very reasonable","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkfng9elxkEE0VnCcO8xhG2_GxwN1WOVxcqWy1&fid=0x0:0xd1bf2365b014db0c"],"When":"2024-6-8"},{"Name":"Lister Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWbNvO55wOzkDRxCcJ-fMoCcdWyut5hlx-H_zUreRnwso9_V0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great for quick snack. Had the spinach and feta pizza. Nice chewy crust. About $5 slice","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhrHtAqGwPYwH1aAF0LTR0m0HmSPJZy4KgnO1r&fid=0x0:0xd1bf2365b014db0c"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Nüsh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCRwGXsjEfrXzIzFBvL2F2zTwBA8DSWWcbUXCXri8w15DHCaCe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Walked in and I asked the girl if anything was coming out fresh and she said pepperoni and vegetables, so I waited. When it came out it looked like a regular pepperoni but with onions and green peppers on top. It looked amazing to be honest, so I got two slices and walked outside to eat them. This pizza was really f’in good. Thin crust and the perfect sauce, topped with high quality mozzarella and then fresh ingredients. I was thrown back at how good it was. Will definitely come back and try different types. $4.50 a slice and way better than any other place around, this is high quality stuff. The staff/owners here are super nice and friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzk4hBiOFHuWpGRxxzLroKsN4VyGbaSn_yoxJG&fid=0x0:0xd1bf2365b014db0c"],"When":"2024-4-9"},{"Name":"Beastin Owt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKu4E5D3jfkuptNljtUpN1jW1w3cYVnYZLKQx9DrzwM_JgBqg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Bought a pizza because I had a slice the other day and it was pretty good.
Pizza smelt good, but sadly tasted very bland/flavorless and gave me quite and upset stomach. Definitely not going back thumbs down 👎
Original pizza slice* came from pizza garden in Vancouver, not from this location.
Pizza was from here though, when I told the manager he kindly offered another pizza at a 20% discount.

The pizza came with a 25% coupon with the box lol..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmk_9s2ztkTcueQI0N8eRl1fLKO8xojewF44bj&fid=0x0:0xd1bf2365b014db0c"],"When":"2024-4-2"},{"Name":"Paul Whishaw","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9A87wupkHt-ziDTT0E-evajYv-jT3pQVEqLz9y_Zg-9xgJDEqSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"When did pizza by the slice get so expensive? $4.50 a slice?? It’s good pizza but man. Small slice as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYk3FtICw_6MqwG4aYqOR_cdQJ3vMyIri3TqrH&fid=0x0:0xd1bf2365b014db0c"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"Ynod NO","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQTRiiCIvnvCbqe19IIOnEB_g52vQk3S__eZ69P47OCINUhDPg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Love Pizza garden's Neopolitan style pizza. Great selections. My only negative comment is that some pizza on display looks sad. May be sitting there for hours thus looking dry already. Their prices are reasonable for the quality of fresh pizza  you are getting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPsUhiKKE8fk9OXA-LvsD7zQwutbMfegcOl_QF&fid=0x0:0xd1bf2365b014db0c"],"When":"2022-2-1"},{"Name":"A C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI3z0-7uQXz4fUOTzpifqXdxVpuBsYWJzd_lSvoRUWc0jhq7w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Their pizza has changed lately..same pizza now just looks worse and tastes different. First picture with the sauce is how it looked last year. Second picture is now. Seems they care a lot less.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHKnYLu4Q3reXKBhzEoc3GMtx4PZhWwpayhSuE&fid=0x0:0xd1bf2365b014db0c"],"When":"2024-4-6"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lisa Chow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQ0YkaG9J_JoQukZS1TNisEzBidWZ2jFTgIzhR-m64c8YEOCEA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was around the area today with my hubby and we wanted to get something for lunch. I googled and found this restaurant. We ordered the #1 Chicken Lemongrass and #7 Deluxe Classic combos (the combo comes with a spring roll and a drink - we chose pop) for 12.20 each combo...pretty good deal nowadays. While we waited for our takeout order, they provided a sample of their new milk tea, that was nice 😋

We brought the order home and we split the sandwiches. The Chicken Lemongrass had great flavour and the chicken was moist and not dry. The Deluxe Classic was our favourite, I think the seasoned extra-lean pork belly really makes the sandwich and we loved the bread...it wasn't too doughy...the sandwiches had a good proportion of bun to filling ratio. We will definitely go back and bring the kids. The kids are picky with their sandwiches, but I have a feeling they are going to love the choices!

I normally take pictures of the food before eating, but they looked and smelled too delicious...so we gobbled them up. The spring rolls were good too, maybe could be a little crispier, but they were still good 😁

The restaurant is small, I think I saw 2-3 tables and they have parking in the back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jurn Loungsay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVGUNUeYDaAjjfujN_LwX7cZGrejhCIF_dzxjZoN2kTC2XBtA3mAA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you are a banh mi lover, you will definitely love Obanhmi. I absolutely loved it from my very first bite back in April, and I have been back there many times since!

I have tried A LOT of their banh mi's, including Lemongrass Chicken, Saté Beef, Deluxe Cold Cut, Vietnamese Xiu Mai, Halal Chicken, and Honey Garlic Chicken. I really loved them all, but my ultimate favourite is their Deluxe Cold Cut - I would say that I've ordered that the most!

I also must say that these sandwiches seem bigger to me vs other banh mi shops (big bonus)!
Each sandwich has it own unique deliciousness and all loaded with quality, housemade ingredients... Everything blends so well together. The baguettes are also perfectly baked!

Seriously, I have nothing but good things to say about Obanhmi. It has instantly become one of my top spots for banh mi!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQEWHGU30te1A4kpE49gl52xg72tBmTnh0cEbY&fid=0x0:0x187a4503ff662ec4"],"When":"2021-8-22"},{"Name":"Jas B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKP-qFEOMiF3CiK9fqBT3M4zkZ0xRu_RI2ADIF4QKQ7CX3_7Zsd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had the beef banh mi combo here. Easily one of the best sandwiches I've had. The bread was very fresh and they did not skimp on the the beef. The spring roll and coffee were both tasty as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3FjHiwUxvLvF4vv5syJieGbUQiqWoYl5aI0PX&fid=0x0:0x187a4503ff662ec4"],"When":"2022-3-18"},{"Name":"Tifa S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgg7WOcdDPOPa3bHd4kFaC4lwUR41UTrz0vqNjvSUQ5eZrhTxw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"For the love of baguettes and coffee! Extra strong coffee!! I'm obsessed!

Discovered them a year ago in their Surrey location while driving to whistler. It was still Covid era: it was a small takeout only location. Very small. I didn't know what to expect so I took a handful of banhmi and 2 bottles of their coffee plus a cup Togo.

First of all: the price!! So reasonable! It was all I thought about in whistler! There's no such coffee there or banhmi. Or for anything in that price range that taste good. I missed them on the way back too. But since then! I made sure to stop by on all my van city trip!

Same thing here: I flew into YVR from YYZ last week. I wanted some food but didn't wanna go into downtown at 5 pm. Luckily I found this on my way to dinesty dumpling!

This place was So much nicer than the other obanhmis ( Surrey and downtown Vancouver). Seems bigger. The guy that's working there was super nice too. Even pour me a coffee while I took a video!

This time around: I'm not messing around. I got 4 bottles of coffee (12 ozs) and 1 banhmi. Coffee matters! They have expiration dates on them and it's actually still good till tomorrow! Not bad at all. I've never stored Vietnamese coffee in fridge before. Mainly because they never came in a bottle nor have I bought as many!

Banh mi was good. Cafe sua da was even better! For the love of strong chicory ice coffee!! Yumm!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKBEKbPiuYoua7oR85JbEqeek3Wa6Oghg2Za9q&fid=0x0:0x187a4503ff662ec4"],"When":"2023-6-20"},{"Name":"Jonathan H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgzhgQVztAxyjnx8UlA7B3n_i6sm9N4u3qe72zv5RxG6qHFl07=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m glad we went here instead of driving all the way to Vancouver as we live at Metrotown. The banh mi was perfectly toasted had a nice crunch but soft insides. The fillings were delicious and I can’t wait to try their other menu items. Their Cafe Sua Da was also very delicious and not too sweet. This is our new go to spot for banh mi especially in Burnaby, will be back again.

** thanks for the reply! I do suggest cutting the jalapeños length wise to have a piece in every bite instead of cutting it round.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6ctLSxR47gCw_-KrreV6I65_hWbK7znnnbHB5&fid=0x0:0x187a4503ff662ec4"],"When":"2022-1-31"},{"Name":"Hsu Hung Lo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU45jA8M-_ubRAgkgKsN16MB4bG6aEN24hGaOgxd8eilZFaiydu=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nothing to say but awesome !! It’s not only yummy, delicious sandwich also the nice service. It’s a wonderful experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPq5IgHeK78LfyY-K9J5FwZyTdiJT_6UnbOjzOj&fid=0x0:0x187a4503ff662ec4"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Erica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJiBiehVBMqDRcQQk3J28lEnqLVQ-p5tIOA0Zlj3wvs65IUmg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Newest location in Burnaby with plenty of parking at the back. It’s quite hidden from the front (behind a bush), so if you’re driving, I’d recommend parking at the back as it’s a busy street (Kingsway) at the front. They already have several locations, but this was my first time trying them. Simple and clean interior with 2 friendly staff when I arrived in the morning to pick up my order. There was a line up (Saturday morning), so I would definitely recommend ordering ahead if you have a larger order and don’t want to wait. I ordered online through their website (they also have a point system, 10 points = 1 free banh mi) the night prior, and set the pickup for 10:15am on a Saturday. I was very impressed by how easy it was to order online, and how accurate the pickup time was - I also received an email update at ~10am notifying me that my order was ready.

My order:
Lemongrass Chicken: one of my favourites - tender and juicy chicken with pickled vegi’s on a soft bun (chewy outside).

Deluxe Cold Cut: classic banh mi, with several layers of Vietnamese ham & creamy mayo. This one does not come with pickled vegis, but it’s still one of my top picks.

Honey Garlic Chicken: unfortunately, I couldn’t really tell the difference between this and the lemongrass chicken, but it was still good.

Sate Beef: Pieces of marinated beef, subtly on the sweet side. Sort of reminds me of Soo Jerky, but it wasn’t dry.

Vietnamese Coffee (bottle & cup): strong, smooth and delicious. I preferred the bottle as I could save it for later (I mixed it with regular coffee the next day). The cup is ~$1 cheaper, and comes with ice, which waters down the taste if I don’t drink it fast enough.

Mango Smoothie: fruity and sweet, blended smoothly

Overall, I’d highly recommend the lemongrass chicken, cold cut and Vietnamese coffee. Super fast & easy to order online and reasonable prices too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuaMbhdJey1NtitMmUE4NjilxGMY_bQbBMnb_I&fid=0x0:0x187a4503ff662ec4"],"When":"2021-5-22"},{"Name":"Dan W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXA2DDdtmjRKhOMP_NF6SFGgRpZ6b61a-FYx2UfuhcRd6GJ649=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The sandwiches are savoury, crispy, and the ingredients are always fresh. I don’t understand why people still go to large sandwich chains when you have places like this. You really get a bang for your buck. Highly recommend.","Images":null,"When":""}]

descriptions: Small halal counter-serve doling out a variety of Syrian-style shawarma wraps plus falafel.

user_reviews: [{"Name":"sameen sidiki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL7xnBCJLlCsB6jMQ0Sc8WMcTVQwbVIdCIIfG_UgsWmiJfRdA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered biryani from here and it was absolutely amazing! The flavors were perfectly balanced, and the portion size was generous. If you’re a fan of biryani, this is a must-try. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPyjXHt957kxSa_uQih5CLPizwbPc_fjfidKpX8\u0026fid=0x0:0xf6d0719c0940ff0"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"Syma Mohammed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJf98UFLFjORufwE0bCctScWdzuAnl2oY9fLpHvglv8FyAaTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best shawarma in town.  The meat is NOT processed like all of the other shawarma/donair places.  Delicious roasted lamb, chicken and beef.  The chili paste, garlic sauce and hummus all made in house from scratch NOT condiments from a bottle.  Absolutely delicious unique flavours of the sauces combined with the roasted meat a must try!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPvnUE9I49XemZjOn2HJpigzMQZAuT7M3htjnt\u0026fid=0x0:0xf6d0719c0940ff0"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Nathan Lequiere","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKp9NljJnXpz_3frUKbZkXaGKO5qOIuXP6AlW5XVtjnb_IypA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered the chicken Shawarma, but when I tasted it, the chicken had a strong flavor of lamb. I even pulled apart the pieces to make sure it was chicken, but it still tasted like lamb. Since I’m not a big fan of lamb, I noticed it immediately. I ended up throwing it out after just two bites. What a waste of money.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kevin (KC)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrZpzDcm4xbgvb_oOynyP_bQvwIe7l-wMoPIs8L4UeVZ-waBkO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great tasting chicken shawarma! The chicken shawarma here is the closest to taste as the shawarma I've had in Qatar. Also, this place isn't too busy during lunch time and I was able to place an order fairly quickly.\n\nLocation is pretty good as well. Located in crystal mall on the Kingsway side. Easy to get to by transit but parking in crystal mall is a nightmare.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnSpoZG5Nro-zGExm_UDGXqgLxj2fo4sedZU9X\u0026fid=0x0:0xf6d0719c0940ff0"],"When":"2023-8-20"},{"Name":"Victoria Shier","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIbiQK7C9LIGcf0Q-H8RQ2MrJY0EN9lPR1W13v4TnNUHjdpRw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing wraps. Falafel made fresh to order. Delicious lamb and hummus. Can't wait to come back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shayne Farah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWv9NVrA6YcenSmR6yk-m-H3BPln3OnkNcfuusJQN_BU_anyDQTuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered a mixed wrap last Friday, I called in, was a lady who answered, said she would make it in 2-3 minutes, I was driving and was only 2-3 ,minutes away myself so gladly accepted, first of all there are always parking issues, but I still made an effort because it's Abdul's - one of the famous and most loved donair places. Dashed in, paid, got my food, drove away and pulled over in a car park to eat as I had to rush back to work. To my dismay the wrap was icy cold, except for the meat that was slightly warm, the whole wrap was not compressed nor toasted nor nothing!!! No salt, tasteless and to my dismay as soon I unwrapped the top half of the wrap the whole wrap split in half!!! I took a bite and realized the hot sauce was smudged just in the center only. Yikes!! I wouldn't even wrap a dog's food this way forget about giving it to a human! I used to go to Abdul's every time since he opened years ago, but I noticed since he is not in the store himself, it has not been the same. I sure did waste my time, my efforts and of course my money plus a good tip!!. The birds and crows ended up eating my food. I won't be recommending Abdul's no more to no one, all I can say is eat at your own risk!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWdZxaDAQo4iJBNVARlXVB70uca0BlY9AbPmJO\u0026fid=0x0:0xf6d0719c0940ff0"],"When":"2023-12-18"},{"Name":"Joe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKSJrBj-r91LdmNrlGC67zaBsHGBlwM-vwSdwCwZatMauXw9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I was very disappointed going here. I ordered a lamb platter and it did not look like any of the pictures and for the price was absolutely sub par. It seemed like I was given leftover meat from the day before, and the rice was not great to say the least. The meal cost $23.50 and you can get much better lamb platters for $18 at a lot of other places, including Crispy Falafel which blows this place out of the water.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Justin Hinchcliffe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWZhaLENH-mY-0PIbrh6zrTJHmUBcQdCZqaPfPl6KlhtuD6V-O=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been going to Abdul's for years. It's my go-to spot place for lunch at the office. Hands down the best Shawarma I've had, and it eating it never get's old, I keep coming back. The flavors are the best, with lots of protein. Abdul himself is very nice. Highly recommend.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Ray Taylor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI-hd5qYWJ-SgeewuJq4r0c4-js0gKvz-4Mwe-knw1cgbddmQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Wow. This is what happens if you give a good tip. See photos. 🙁

This is after he couldn't find our unit (we are in the front of the building!) 🙁

On top of that we were charged more than the menu stated. 🙁","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFUYLMHW9zK4iauBI1eiq34vNYRy3QWLpXdVd_&fid=0x0:0x3418662a53c266f3"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Ali Shooshtarian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXNkEbPVNqvGfRGo5hhMt5O4Cyr9gLTqDHDStczSfUDd-SBH9I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Had a semi good semi bad experience here. Staff and quality is good. Policy however is not.

I was told if I want to order pizza to dine in, I have to order indian food initially then I can order a pizza which didn’t make sense at ALL, so I had to sit on the takeout side of the restaurant which wasn’t pleasant to eat.

Staff behaviour and quality was good.
Will not be coming back for dining in!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcQaGLhAu6Y7hYnFqnyHVCE5vi4BXNlFEQy4lc&fid=0x0:0x3418662a53c266f3"],"When":"2023-12-7"},{"Name":"sophie XU","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocISXAhYAzYAkFrK6bWMfhL0gluZrV-1qOFtD-Ibik2B0bQ_1w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The chicken wings were overcooked, they got burnt, and now they taste bitter.the worst experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6V7-bqNhs46T-_zNDqN34kCptP9TAKaqi7Woe&fid=0x0:0x3418662a53c266f3"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"Sales Mann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJX7WQ3GexrFTpt_V1P2nT5iAOmqtEvfBWOCjOWILbF1sIXiA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I thought I would try this pizza after I invited my friend over for dinner. I chose Pizza Factory because it is local & close to my home.
I ordered the Super Hawaiian pizza.
There was nothing super about it.
Terrible, bland, and it tasted like every other run of the mill pizza place you never order from again. The box might have been tastier than the crust.
Pizza Garden is my usual and is a way better choice.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kyle James-Patrick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2KmLqnKw5OuLPD3VmvEWziRB1HxsCYMBA4SJkhviIYoPHiTXf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The first bite from the "Best Pizza in Town" makes a challenge to such a title, but all bites that follow sharply run in the opposite direction. This is cheap pizza, cheap ingredients, cheap layout (all toppings fall in the middle, no where near the edge) and very little care towards their product. The picture is the best I could make this pizza look, your eye will not be as forgiving.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6cB0Yjo3gvbO-mUZH_wzvGVtJrL9L__STPRYE&fid=0x0:0x3418662a53c266f3"],"When":"2018-2-13"},{"Name":"IT TL","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWr8cSlXyRC1vjQixgRUKkDCKB-2k4mn2zprMSJMtSdUEei0xc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great value pizza, friendly staffs, good place for family. Share kitchen with Indian restaurant next door.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJbNqWGcH7HLS_7SVJ5otk-fkM6kiMxTcAcEV0&fid=0x0:0x3418662a53c266f3"],"When":"2023-9-28"},{"Name":"Cody F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIWNT0-fxMbJi8bK1cs21mpkjzfhO1OPX5nU5hcaroSN9KCNg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Easily my favourite pizza place in the greater Vancouver area. It has a reasonable crust that holds together not like some cheap places that make it paper thin. Solid layer of cheese on the top. Quality ingredients. I've tried most of the pizzas on the menu and all are awesome. Black Knight or Hot and Spicy are winter favourites as they warm you right up. Also very reasonable price, it is nice and filling, always have leftovers.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Randy Geider","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXixuIAhbOSAEQpsR9--dEoTSt4EMdiHc_80VdlHR3qXbY1msI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I was just charged 27 bucks for a medium 3 topping pie. The explanation given was friendly and courteous,  but not believable. I have been a customer of the North Road location for more than 8 years. I have never paid more than 15 dollars. The delivery came to the Burnaby General Hospital,  which is not far. No compensation was offered. I won't ever order here again. Be sure to check Your price before ordering. Randy , friend of Amrit at North Road","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s a perfect XLB soup dumpling, freshly steamed to order. They are juicy with seasoned meaty flavour, a thin skin, and bursting with soup inside. In our opinion, it’s better than the Shanghai Dimsum House nearby which is also pretty good.

Their tofu soup is also light and nice with boiled dumpling water flavour in a good way. It’s not too salty and hydrating with no hint of MSG.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBP9CHiWRrPhCYSBSeFf6Yb_rhZYoTfcdgbqv7&fid=0x0:0x532844c7f99864eb"],"When":"2024-2-3"},{"Name":"Chris Opines","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWX4qcCpQRNQC7yUSmOQWSxDQxZMtoRtopbHiCqL3EZDhtGEJ8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Spent a few hours in the Crystal Mall on a Wednesday, and was so disappointed to see that Shanghai Dim Sum was closed for the day,  my favorite XLB shop.

Oh well, we ate some other delicious things, the standout was the shengjian bao, pan fried pork buns from Shanghai Fortune Cuisine.  It was lined up and everyone in the rooms seemed to be eating them.

Wow, they were good. Crispy on the bottom, tender on top, full of soup and pork.  Delicious.  Staff is friendly too!

I think I found a new favorite.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOv7IQDrHIOI702fur52KYxfXafiui_WkoEJ_md&fid=0x0:0x532844c7f99864eb"],"When":"2024-3-17"},{"Name":"Jack Hua","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDPgSyOFYl0n0kAmObr6MrnIE9VLYGEXAELDz-yNY8Y7PGIg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Most authentic Shanghaiese cuisine I have ever tried. Services is great. The food was wonderful. Very unique flavour top quality used in the dim sum. Everything was homemade and very fresh. 10 out of 10 would definitely recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sweets Fanatic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKT4q9vq4bFnKURKLo-IuFZkNgSUZrYyHCHwVq7PvVTaTofHHc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Their pan fried pork buns are amazing. Super crispy on the outside, soft inside and rich soup leaking out from the first bite. Was amazed each time I bit in.

Their spicy and sour soup was alright, but it didn't impress me like the fried buns.

Service was alright, the typical Chinese service where everything is rushed and fast at pace.

It's found in a food court so there really is no atmosphere, and the tables are quite full depending on what time you visit.

I definitely recommend the pan fried pork buns. Haven't tried the other options like the noodles, which I saw comments about it on google, but I think trying their combo soup and fried buns is a very good first time pick.

Food: 4.5/5
Cleanliness: no problem with the food.
Price: $

Comeback rate: 80%","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMc3Fxp7HXlN9P8hSw2Oa_KeZUhBmQanW9jkc12&fid=0x0:0x532844c7f99864eb"],"When":"2023-3-31"},{"Name":"Ski Goer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVm5nxmMWQ3WVNeq456be3NPpSfJyH772tw5Xr4nenCb6dcQSI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Definitely try their stream dumpling, pan fried bun, and beef roll. Recommend the beef roll. The dumpling wraps are handmade (thicker), don't expect they look as look as those from DinTaiFung, but the taste is fine. There is great tasting soup in the dumplings. The buns also have soup and totally did not expect that. Oh, don't get the combo if you don't want MSG tofu soup.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0mUVbDOeIDzSvkLplviEbzGSp2wg8m5keLUVS&fid=0x0:0x532844c7f99864eb"],"When":"2022-8-30"},{"Name":"Timothy Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXppglo6ZAetCQzplW2OLh2qI567m4ZgShYOz5i82egCmgzc4sM2w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"No atmosphere because it’s a food court.
Great food as always. The next best thing to flying back to Asia for delicious food. Price is reasonable with such high inflation. Takes around 10 minutes for soup dumplings. Highly recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmipUtE5pXdYKSViXCo-9amX9q-Rwe-zzGK4bo&fid=0x0:0x532844c7f99864eb"],"When":"2023-7-7"},{"Name":"Millie Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWG6lyJsvFpdy5fooM5ZYPrxE7rcUxLdtvq-7uAOHWC-RWcujOI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The Bun and dumpling is super juicy
On top of the bun is crispy
It’s palatable but the environment is not as good as eating in restaurent
But the price is reasonable as it is located in Crystal Mall Food Court","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCAR-Jfk8g83wDfpzmF4--hk9N7guk_oZKRlvp&fid=0x0:0x532844c7f99864eb"],"When":"2023-12-22"},{"Name":"Gordon Kwong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKjDehFqHA5ZT74ZkeWTLjTUZu8GTq7uesQO3c1SQIt6zn0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The pan fried pork buns were great, nice freshly made, crunchy bottom and a juicy pork filling. One of the best I've had and served super hot. The juicy buns were also good fresh and juicy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMoK-CY0OKK-XVTZf47AqNSk-PuKjzPpV9C7WMX&fid=0x0:0x532844c7f99864eb"],"When":"2022-5-8"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"alice w","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKfBFd5-MCz0iWhHQjADA6mFZoHPhSAyoSlVDQe971OUgYbxw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"5 Starts services and pizza 🍕🤗🤗👍the best one in the Metrotown food court is delicious and fresh","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7kKCYzf7ek_u9rd_8lug1sYezWbgaYaZrhUy6\u0026fid=0x0:0xeee8d5037ddb89c2"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"Karan Garg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNJ9F53oDQdIKs70KG79uKwPM7gyeviKKB5E1bDDtWrWzAql2U=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best Freshslice locations. It’s amazing to see how they are able to maintain such high quality of pizzas while having so many customers lined up. Food is always tasty and fresh and they have great customer service. Definitely looking forward to visit again :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Navneet Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUSsVoT0HVA6Qu9LQqike_yawFdm-LaGQ-RugXqp1li0_Fk7PE0vg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Adesh was so welcoming and treating everyone with a smile on her face… pizza was fresh and the staff was professional and friendly… thank you freshslice","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODuY8TREZg0TxikMfBjd6YVt08pSb0jTHHsf5y\u0026fid=0x0:0xeee8d5037ddb89c2"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Ali Kamalian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxJTS7pXkRBKzGKYjPHen9ksAb6styNO4G7Q0bcUHISMfS09U=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Thoroughly impressed with the food ,the atmosphere! \u0026 the staff specially the branch manager, very kind person. The pizza was delicious, with a crisp yet chewy crust and fresh, flavorful toppings.\noffering high-quality ingredients with very great price. I’ll definitely be back to try more of their menu!\nHighly recommended.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Charles Zhu (22Yeye)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ01H-mr5i2yT5Ch2GtsX3kZuojucb_HkJSSUYnGhKpNrVNAA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It is a great place to have Freshslice! Adesh is a wonderful staff in here. She is welcome, warm and patient to everyone! Definitely will come again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-R9smldYZ_wZ7QiGkIRY5LTtr7MOUGmfKCXlw\u0026fid=0x0:0xeee8d5037ddb89c2"],"When":"2024-4-20"},{"Name":"Sambhav Bansal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJY_PF8bANdRqkS_ECQM2tRg0i1bqQUvyQooVjW-DbtvMfjnNd=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Adesh has been a fantastic addition to the pizza store over the past 50 days. Her dedication to customer service, attention to detail, and efficiency in handling orders have greatly improved operations. Always friendly and professional, they’ve contributed positively to the overall team dynamic and customer experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Khloe Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ6C7c5sCisqNrsVZxo7fqEUkSpyoPQ-vVn44JJ34IqiNlYWw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was the best thin crust pizza that we’ve ever tried at this location. The freshness of the veggies with a little touch of perfection has made it more tastier. Thank you Simmi!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuzQ1n8_A3xGON46mDgg48U1qMNTnIsXxE7LIg\u0026fid=0x0:0xeee8d5037ddb89c2"],"When":"2023-11-13"},{"Name":"Raspreet Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocITqzSca8nT1kJ2I2PcVwZB4AoQwvzOMIVrxQuE-KKb0dlgprEr=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Adesh at Freshslice delivers very nice customer service.interaction with her was pleasant, and she brings a friendly, professional attitude to the job. She's attentive to customer needs, handles orders with accuracy.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a hidden gem Chinese crepe shop in the Crystal Mall food court that is a part of a juice shop. However, the Chinese crepes here also known as Tian Jing Jien Bing GuoTze are made with love fresh and hot by a Chinese Granny and indeed delicious! For just $6.50, you can get a savoury crepe made fresh filled with Chinese Long Donut, a fried egg, green onions, and sauces and spices. It tastes so good and is super filling making a great quick lunch and tastes like the streets of Asia. Would highly recommend for both taste and value.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9HahdQiD4J5z_Hfp63Jz82sz-6rsDwsrXTeqD&fid=0x0:0xe71f30e04eab056a"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The standard jianbing with milk tea was around $10. The basic jianbing came with either the Chinese donut or the crispy thing. I didn’t know I had to order the toppings separately otherwise it didn’t come with anything other than the jianbing. Not really value for money if you’re just eating egg and crispy thing. Was a bit disappointed. The milk tea was a good size. Wait was only around 5 minutes for a weekday evening.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNU6pSD5S_SGHVoQ1hQExFRIaBrODGEXk__jnxN&fid=0x0:0xe71f30e04eab056a"],"When":"2023-10-14"},{"Name":"Snaily","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJlbJ8J0xXQ2XR8ZZZXb4Dn8acK4QkurqXEPoF79rl3nwl4yQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The basic jianbing’ pricing is fine. The options with added on are Quite pricey for the location and offering.Took a long wait and I saw they made one of the jianbing with the egg not even spread out.

Asked for medium spicy and I did see them put on quite a bit of chili sauce but was not spicy at all.

The fried crisp stayed crispy and that’s a good thing. Overall a standard jianbing. Nothing wrong with the one I got.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrLZgNSPsMq4HXvJR5FSYJ0sqyOevuLXSklUOw&fid=0x0:0xe71f30e04eab056a"],"When":"2022-8-26"},{"Name":"Foodie Vancouver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6n06QAfqStqer1ZgBILsv-fiSHmrGRZuznSS1ny9iQFfb_Ognuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's the best-tasting chinese crepe I've ever had in Vancouver, and you can customize it with a variety of toppings such as sausage, shredded potatoes, and more. However, the beverage options are just average.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZYfoxVCJks8-aikjjfsLa4OHxxBYVQ2VPPmHs&fid=0x0:0xe71f30e04eab056a"],"When":"2023-10-24"},{"Name":"Brian Lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1inD5UgJe3GOa667vmEEl3vxIGfC-lhzkSxBIWvnxSnDj9qFBRw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Crepe at a reasonable price. Tastes good. Added cucumber for a refreshing taste.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPyiGYEuTvYT17rRUa1-H_RwmsCjazQ-49ltlsE&fid=0x0:0xe71f30e04eab056a"],"When":"2023-5-28"},{"Name":"Sean Elahi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJKFHnuUVe9OvYMD0RZK8PuCVyWyBRz-YxkDLB2Rn9PJDaOvw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The portion size is much bigger than I was expecting. The menu is a little confusing for people who don't understand Chinese however, you essentially pick between a crispy or donut-like wrap and then add toppings to it (in addition to the standard egg, cilantro, etc.) There also some add ons that aren't translated on the menu.

The people who run the stall are friendly but if you don't speak Chinese you're going to have a language barrier if you have questions.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Invidia Midnight","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAsDWEs0RHHj99GMWcPtWUvyMDyK44StwXUv--szaj5evO_JE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best jianbing (Chinese crepe) in Vancouver. Much better than places in Richmond. Been coming here all the time for almost 10 years and quality just keeps getting better. One of my favourite places to eat.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Liv","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIhpx96WVAOFfh1vYEHugZ-KSymfzS5upI-x7Ql_e88kXwcXg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Situated at the Happy Ice House stall, Mr Zhang has made-to-order jian bing/煎饼/Chinese crepes. I added Peking duck to mine which probably was not worth it, considering the duck costs more than the jian bing itself. Certainly a hard-to-find offering that scratched an itch but stick with the regular jian bing.","Images":null,"When":""}]
