user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ken T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUv4yXZDEzR9fFOh4M4OyxsvY9gd3Zd0cjdDFawsxiUP25Mkhk3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came across this place when we stayed at Metrotown Hilton. They have a Tuesday Fish Taco special, 2 tacos for $12. It’s a good sized taco and I was full. And it tasted great. Also, happy hour till 6pm each day, so got a pale ale for 7$. Really good. Worth a try if you’re in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOV9Nqp1TAVXXKycemoc1F5eEIu03iuIJXO2ZIb&fid=0x0:0xb145abbfc5dad1b6"],"When":"2024-6-26"},{"Name":"Sandra Grime","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1ivgSoxJ-xrqWT8dXtchwz0zajZXX5dEHZew29TWQjgG4nJM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was good, but pricey! But creative menu, food was fast, larger tacos & service was good! Came right when it opened, so maybe that’s why it was so fresh & quick!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4040ZN48QAKqYgkkJcBQXBOiJdZL0gytc7vEe&fid=0x0:0xb145abbfc5dad1b6"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Daniel Sung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ61DoMscspD7FnxbNGw4d3f5Af7KsUdL6bkhk3NlkyiWvRZg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Wow I never heard of this place before and also get to know their story. The food in general was very good, can’t beat the happy hour deals. Overall I would give this place a 4.5 stars rating. Service was great! Can’t wait to come here again and try their other locations as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNT-4BPkpdr-8feeYzJOZyM0vcUq5MohqTPrk1B&fid=0x0:0xb145abbfc5dad1b6"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"NAN2YVR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQ5_KvFBD8gj-xhnz7lmUbldeokzGhOZDgbZJNDYU_MzIWvii0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Visited Tacofino after having a bad experience at the Mount Pleasant location over a decade ago (I was very turned off)
The young lady at the counter was exceptional!
These tacos did not disappoint! I was surprised.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaVXRHW4meP-D1lR8LEo1uscz6qwqx4H0rb_9c&fid=0x0:0xb145abbfc5dad1b6"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Zuzanna Keough","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXI9EApIsiUU2Hb2kdxsJFPjs7PqJ-t3gJ1INY22Z3_seCRL5H1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Ordered the crispy chicken burrito and although I was surprised at how quickly it came, it was pretty underwhelming. Burrito was cold, super greasy, and lacked flavour; it could definitely use some fresh ingredients like red cabbage, cilantro, lime etc. I order a side of the lime crema and salsa verde and they unfortunately didn’t add much to the burrito. I’ve had some great burritos from the tacofino in Tofino but this one was not one of them. 😢","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgPWtudKbhRBzwTYd-7D1LTBupEtjL0w9kGZ1n&fid=0x0:0xb145abbfc5dad1b6"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Atena Razmpoush","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDTwnpwsyCMQv83dsdwlkz2BAvureQHzZZxo2_BIzfjtUBCR_R=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I came here twice.

The first time we ordered crispy chicken, tuna, cod, and chorizo tacos.
All were amazing, specially the chicken one!

The second time I ordered the crispy chicken and the Cod again. The taste was satisfying, but the quality of the fish and chicken felt a bit different, a bit low quality.

I will give it a try again in while to see if it was just by chance or it’s their new ingredient’s quality.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfsQ1oALDdh1boeuGfxV7M15GzKmut-9HSAdKj&fid=0x0:0xb145abbfc5dad1b6"],"When":"2024-2-17"},{"Name":"El B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1Jp_yyor94dWcxEABRdR-csu7LJ3E6mAmEDdXvZyVkvxhIa10=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Clean place and very spacious. Crew was pretty good too. The food tasted good. Parking is a bit tight, pay parking on the street or free at Metropolis Metrotown.  They have daily specials and woth trying new things. Overall had a good experience. Seating is mostly high chairs but there are some more comfy seats in the back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPj0hNfU_mt3_2g3OfLMLsI1Wiebuk_5o6R_mfT&fid=0x0:0xb145abbfc5dad1b6"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Luke Weng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXn1tdfwXfRnZVszKV8bZBNwooyRqfHv0VT8T0EAQWyUrqTrrO6aQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It's my first time at tacofino! I've heard so much about it and was so happy to finally try it out after church.

The ambience was lovely, beautiful interior, as well as nice staff! The food was also very good. The only thing is that the seating is very limited, and the food is a bit expensive too for the portion size

But all in all I'd still come back! Maybe there are other items that are more affordable. It's still a nice place to eat and chat.

4.5/5 ⭐!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLEemodFocBcL4MOaLoTZkwXaVimf_7NGmLix7&fid=0x0:0xb145abbfc5dad1b6"],"When":"2024-2-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Philly cheese steak made to order. I got the original which was $13+ tax. Bread was really nice and soft and meat had a lot of flavour. The size was not very big - about a regular hot dog style bun. Overall, it was just ok and I almost couldn’t tell there was cheese in the sandwich. Bit overpriced and  it’s mostly a self serve seating area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9TA8eFmuPWUYAvkHq66yxl3eD8K1ym9FQTvPH&fid=0x0:0xac3531c6b4a6f4ed"],"When":"2024-6-25"},{"Name":"Hsien Chih Shu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXT32DrVfiGKIMJsboF0f2_bKM3-NM-TxMQgT4fouAzt1CWeKcL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered the lobster shrimp one, the taste was great, the bun was crispy, and there were some veggies wrapped in the bread underneath the cheese. If not the price I’d visit more often.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMwFUvjuPx4dokAoVPbeEGS9JljLxGK-3N9YcR&fid=0x0:0xac3531c6b4a6f4ed"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Kym Manubag","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWARl0-96yyT7QuwxuiVCkWgWId5Aj6lYFjDUo7YF4M6NmNOECP=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So good!! Very underrated restaurant. Definitely try the ACC fries 😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrFFFeA5ner-ey1DYpZ0BE_5Xse2kUY3lUp9qI&fid=0x0:0xac3531c6b4a6f4ed"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"Harshit Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmG6gEgJpRvIOCqifAN4_INZ-2ntkQ1xNMdKJ9WVMUPHSfjtzlyg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Located on the 2nd floor, right under Cineplex and close to Winners store.
I bumped into this cozy little place a few days ago. I tried their bestsellers, The New Yorker & The Cowboy. Both were super yummy. The meat was juicy, just the right temperature and the sauce was, ohhhhh, so good!!
The quantity is a bang-for-the-buck. They even have a good seating area, sufficient for at least 10 folks. The music adds to the chill ambience of the place. The attendants were extremely courteous.
Must try for meat lovers. I am definitely coming back for sure. Highly recommended!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNf3cWZ4wS4AgFCbYgaBBHeUKHIWkMvqoweDwfl&fid=0x0:0xac3531c6b4a6f4ed"],"When":"2022-7-18"},{"Name":"Erica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJiBiehVBMqDRcQQk3J28lEnqLVQ-p5tIOA0Zlj3wvs65IUmg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Located right below Metropolis at Metrotown mall's Cineplex theatre (by the stairs). Only 2 tables open for dine-in, but feel free to order take-out or delivery.

My order:

-Japanese Style Cheesesteak: my personal favourite - juicy sautéed mushrooms & onions, aged cheddar, wasabi mayo and of course premium ribeye steak slices. It’s saucy, and the cheese blend enhances the flavour.
-Koagie (Korean Hoagie): Kimchi was good (not too sour or spicy), so I could comfortably eat it.
-New Yorker: the classic if you don't want to venture away from a
"normal Philly cheesesteak" - topped with fresh tomatoes and lettuce

Overall, the hoagie roll was soft on the inside, and a good chewy texture on the outside. I reheated mines in the microwave, and it still tasted good several hours later. These cheeseteaks are more saucy than the traditional cheesesteaks, which I personally enjoyed as every bite was filled with flavour. Very filling - best to share if you want to try different flavours. I also really liked their assortment of cheeses (no fake Cheez-Whiz stuff, sorry if you like that though), I think they use aged cheddar, provolone, and some others in a cheese blend. They definitely don't cheap out, and use a generous portion of tender/sliced prime rib steak. All cheesesteaks are made-to-order on a grill when you place your order.

-Onion Rings: skinny-style
-Deep Fried Pickles: good thick cut of pickles to breading ratio
-ACC Fries (Garlic Butter & Parmesan): classic thick cut fries with a very "potato-y" flavour
-White Chocolate Blueberry Milkshake: quite sweet, definitely for people that have a sweet tooth

Also, I definitely have to mention the house-made sauces, they're so good for dipping the onion rings, pickles, and fries (cheesesteaks were saucy enough, so I didn't need it there). My personal favourites were the roasted garlic aioli, smoke Chipotle BBQ (not to overpowering or salty), and mustard (real mustard seeds).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPy4x4SxlJVE85YyYd_JGDKxnrGdZkXh6kVcPFk&fid=0x0:0xac3531c6b4a6f4ed"],"When":"2021-3-11"},{"Name":"Juan Gonzalez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4GoYThNv5wZ68edmUBVHPnkYfRqW2G1JMSLTOd9tKMvLY81AloA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Two things are important about food service: how good it tastes and how much they serve you. This place checks both with full marks, it's a must go if you're ever in Metrotown. The atmosphere is classy and chill, the best view from any Eatery in the mall and the delicious sandwiches will make your day. Also they're not that expensive compared to other joints at Metrotown.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN96mdzqd-OCChwWk87t2fX8UOm8mj-e7qsuZHy&fid=0x0:0xac3531c6b4a6f4ed"],"When":"2024-1-16"},{"Name":"Dimitri Pelosof","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIfM58KLNF27k8gTDOAVxOk2C6YwnGFyNuoc3mVfuH_B24uvA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Big shot was so amazing the staff member truffle aioli sauce is bomb would definitely come back again best cheesesteak I ever had.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOB1N550TcmKkU4hbjaA_E1bPslT_EyeIYt90u&fid=0x0:0xac3531c6b4a6f4ed"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"tarneema propa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwd9dHiU9egWWKWk0jQDOep6xbwkVQ_SHmBqvP7L114SCcbxlJ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Recently the poutine which I always order from here is  not up to the standard. The quantity is less and the fries aren’t crispy like before. I do not remember her name but whenever my order is made by one Asian girl the order is perfect . However, unfortunately whenever the male worker makes it I always get disappointed.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"SJ Kwak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWLECfVhFzw3UImajK4duWa1rotww1Cfjc1bWi3JPYgw23toMh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I go to Metrotown often to eat, but this is the healthiest and most enjoyable meal I've had.
TIKI, YUZU, and KOKO are all delicious, The ingredients, including the vegetables, are very fresh and the ratio to rice is just right.
I think I'll come here often~👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsqvsiN1Z9n8V2WXBZMTRHFA5LQvmH7zJSouho&fid=0x0:0x7e7c7e258692f75b"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Jemma Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXCHgsvEOda8Euj2F1UAraubpKMT6WV7yVIZRrlelmuyGL9zw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bowl was full of flavour, variety of veggies and toppings and protein! I love that they don’t overprice their chicken, because I don’t eat fish, thank you! Looking forward to trying the other bowls with chicken and different sauces. The staff was very friendly. I really enjoyed this poke lunch, much better than the other poke places I’ve tried! (Some of them don’t even have chicken)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3m_XOgt7umAMi8Kg3ZR97-0JYgURpKRDswMjW&fid=0x0:0x7e7c7e258692f75b"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"Hye Young Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYtZQewHWsS6Wii6BMW5k2iV0tNbv0D_WAgNrxSvdbZp6ZeZq-Rg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Hula Poke Bowl in Metrotown and had a fantastic experience. The restaurant was clean and had a bright, welcoming atmosphere that made me feel right at home.The menu offered a great variety of options, catering to all dietary preferences with vegan and gluten-free choices. I ordered the classic poke bowl of the Koko with salmon, Kimch, and it was incredibly fresh and flavorful. The ingredients were vibrant and well-balanced, and the portion size was generous for the price.Service was top-notch; the staff was friendly and quick to help me customize my bowl exactly how I wanted it. I also appreciated the speedy service, as my meal was prepared in just a few minutes. For those visiting for the first time, I highly recommend trying the spicy Gochujang sauce—it added a perfect kick to the bowl. Overall, Hula Poke Bowl is a great spot for a healthy and delicious meal in Metrotown. I'll definitely be coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqkWf0hvAWSXxGvGes4ctX1Ipdhmf6vm7_FE9B&fid=0x0:0x7e7c7e258692f75b"],"When":"2024-5-24"},{"Name":"Su","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocItsH-SV0bfKKKu6qfT1W87B-UsOjX8GXGip3whqQWEPEJBqQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Poke is high quality with fresh ingredients, big portion and reasonable price. Hula poke Metrotown is the best in Vancouver","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsMhkPn8JQ1bAh_1GlGFEzPmuPfwQyZROPq_aO&fid=0x0:0x7e7c7e258692f75b"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Michelle Siaril","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvNHVR_L-5eCK2usU0kQoT055SV9vB2qDNPyrA7CmG9QXO2IM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Tried Hula after a shopping trip in Metrotown.  It’s more of a 3.5 stars for me. Tbh all the ingredients were fresh, and I enjoyed the different variety of bowls they have. That said, I really don’t think this qualifies as poke, it’s more like a salad with lots of poke toppings. With that said, I got the Tropical and really enjoyed the pineapple and toasted coconut flake toppings. Service was lovely and the ladies were super helpful and prompt.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpkcypnr1bin8othA6pAzttAcjYm2A4j7ZoYQ&fid=0x0:0x7e7c7e258692f75b"],"When":"2024-7-8"},{"Name":"Yerim H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWuhy3x2hMyII3cc8tq6eIIvlnRm388HHZ7ndz-menwfVVCqJLA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hula Poke is my go-to place for lunch. I appreciate their healthy ingredients and I'm sure it's definitely the best meal in the food court. Most restaurants just buy commercially available sauces, but this Hula Poke uses healthy, gluten-free ingredients and makes all the sauces directly in the kitchen, giving it a very unique and fantastic taste. I usually order Yuzu or Tiki with salmon as my protein and coconut rice as the base, and it's always so delicious. I also love their wild Ahi Tuna, so sometimes I choose both salmon and tuna for double the protein, or half salmon and half tuna without additional cost. The staff here always adds more protein than other branches, so I'm really grateful. Besides, other poke brands require additional costs for additional ingredients, but it's really nice that Hula Poke add ingredients at no additional cost except for Protein. I love that I can add my favorite expensive avocado for free. Friendly staff always provides kindness and best service, and their price is much affordable, which is $15.5 for all included. I really appreciate that Hula Poke is located in Metrotown Mall. Thanks a lot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZIg1W3ut52N52RQIThZx2hpqbHUjhjSYfadZx&fid=0x0:0x7e7c7e258692f75b"],"When":"2024-2-20"},{"Name":"Passion c","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKy9fOFfR9Fag40R8ofxdF5xkLC7WGpfnNlcNGr_VGtHeRIB2N_g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a great experience at this restaurant! I ordered the TIKI bowl with salmon and coconut rice, and it was delicious. The amount was just right for one person. I also tried the LAVA (like iced café latte) and YUZU tea, and they were both fantastic. The staff mentioned that there is no sugar in them, which was a nice surprise. The shop is right next to the food court, not inside it. The staff were kind and the food was delicious. I highly recommend it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2kjg3A1RpTLfkhSRtBUKKiF82wEwEJQeB8mh0&fid=0x0:0x7e7c7e258692f75b"],"When":"2024-2-9"},{"Name":"Gloria","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVD74LOIa8MWcISA9W4hyymCIUX6a5UMPTQTVWm5feeT6iBNTk4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"All "poke" bowls are made with careful consideration for health and unique luxury taste. Every time I eat "Hula Poke", I feel healthy, and my stomach feels comfortable. I can say it's definitely the best healthy option in the Foodcourt of Metrotown. I especially recommend their Tiki, Yuzu, and Koko (spicy Korea). "Tiki" is a truly special and amazing taste that I've experienced for the first time. "Yuzu" tastes like soy sauce based and is a bit salty, but you can ask for less sauce if you don't like salty taste. All "poke bowls" are always fresh and of good quality, unlike the cheap ingredients. The Metrotown branch (located near the entrance to the food court) is very friendly and clean and provides generous amounts of protein. So I always come here on purpose, and if I can't come, I order a poke bowl through "DoorDash". I am always very satisfied and recommend you to visit too.

Oh, I almost forgot to recommend their delicious "lava" coffee, so I'm adding it now. The latte is made with 100% plant-based coconut milk and is dairy-free, making it super healthy. I want to drink this lava coffee every day. The taste is so great and they make it one by one when you order. Definitely the best, you should try it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMb2Z7hwy9MUae1Xs9KXJfkiUGSb2b9UTDSA7ax&fid=0x0:0x7e7c7e258692f75b"],"When":"2024-2-11"}]

title: Crystal Cafe

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"YVR Duke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbrjJ5U6gKw7Gn1zE_GlxhUndims9WHlh7sVaHLXVrjOFlYd_B=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Typical food court’s Hong King style breakfast.  You can get beef rice noodle, Two-egg HAM (choice of luncheon meat, sausage or ham) and toast, and a cup of Hong Kong style milk tea or coffee.

Staff are friendly and very efficient when it is busy.  You can get your breakfast faster than when you are at McDonald’s.

Two-Eggs HAM and Toast

In food court, you cannot really choose how your eggs can be done.  Ham sausage and luncheon meat is not anything particularly high quality and the toast is typical Asian style white toast.

Satay Beef Rice Noodle

There is a expected taste on traditional Hong Kong style satay beef noodles, and it doesn’t really meet that standard.  There are two other healthier choices on menu.

Milk tea

The Hong King style milk tea served here is, i would say, quite average.  Not particularly good or bad.  it is authentic in a way, not the best type of authentic but average.

For under 10 dollars, here you can something somewhat fulfilling.  Somewhat comforting if you are from Hong Kong missing some home-style breakfast.

Nothing more you can ask for when tax is included and there is no tips expected.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuXjf1i_IA1cKnShEnuKm31NLDO1eg7oQo9xWv&fid=0x0:0xd18f33afebe493d6"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Cole Davis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAOU6XCX3s_R0vWndse-P-J59JZDVGZbi6kfyG2pJARhX4qsYzZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My go to in crystal for Asian and asianized western.

They have good food here, the ladies are friendly. Kind of.

I think they've been serving with the most consistent food quality and prices over the last decade.

I recommend their salted fish and chicken fried rice, a classic.

I'd likely come back again, because it make a great bite when you're finished buying groceries.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrr6mVl0DSzU3S_cZMhazZK0zwtK9K8AzELJu-&fid=0x0:0xd18f33afebe493d6"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"Lister Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWbNvO55wOzkDRxCcJ-fMoCcdWyut5hlx-H_zUreRnwso9_V0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very delicious Chinese food. $13 combo two choices plus rice and soup. Had spicy chicken and chives","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMv_lMZo1cf9TIgHxJkByf0vPJ0ke_hbmMHY2Hd&fid=0x0:0xd18f33afebe493d6"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Daniel Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrVd67d7uU974eU_qTUE2z9HO_CgJZEmwGwQZmsR3nz_Sy-AdO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I considered my self a Cantonese cafe expert and always love trying curry brisket on rice everywhere, this is really disappointing…

The “real deal” has a good portion of brisket and potato, mix with fragrant flavourful curry

The photos you guys see, have significant imbalance of beef brisket! 5 pieces including tendon and a piece of fat, the rest are just chopped bell peppers and onions. Curry is nothing but a yellow sauce

Do not recommend this for $15🥶","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXUONtxExyIZ22ZfbjdhkQkkm4e_dOwcyohIOY&fid=0x0:0xd18f33afebe493d6"],"When":"2023-3-3"},{"Name":"Phone suzanna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIovxXGSBbpRujzl74kbCvFOzJp7e0ULCdZBLR9HoOP6p92ew=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Horrible attitude from the older waitress. Had sweet sauce chicken noodles, got a small portion of meat with lots of noodles that tastes incredibly bland. It's obvious that they are trying to lower the cost. I would strongly recommend against eating here. NO THANK YOU!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cyrus Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIdRQimrQeVWgdU6NaWMloGGT9KPecvYQutRiBNNLVEWoWjyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The service was largely subpar, in the sense that they speak to you as though you owe them something. But what really concerned me was the food : the food was also rather disappointing. The curry chicken wasn't spicy and as someone who grew up with that dish in Hong Kong, I know for a fact that it wasn't suppose to taste like that. I really do hope this is just a separate instance, but the chicken I had that day was bland. The curry was the main source of flavor in the dish and unfortunately, the curry simply wasn't up to standard, whether in Vancouver or in Hong Kong.

As a redeeming quality, the portions were big for the price and you can split them into two meals, but I personally didn't do that cuz I think one meal like that was more than enough.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"John lender","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkcpQ1MYMsPpPJ3JDffI_rwr5iRvTie5E35hqQo57LwH2qf8Dv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I usually love this place but getting more expensive for breakfast now day. I bought combo A & B total $24.00 include cold drink

But for lunch item still ok $15.75 come with cold drink","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNI_D0SGN0sBsaQhJH3ppY1Tvd_n9oY7J9-sxcN&fid=0x0:0xd18f33afebe493d6"],"When":"2023-5-14"},{"Name":"Jade Chin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJWSVoZW1CCY-_xhdgdeWOnL28P_e39FAE_t38PKZ_hYo17g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Ordered take out. Beef brisket with glass noodles. The noodles are transparent and thick (not like Korean japchae). It was alright. But the disappointment is only 4 pieces of beef and one of them is utter fat and inedible. Also ordered the soy sauce rice noodles with beef. The noodles was good. A bit salty. But beef was so tough and inedible and few pieces. Giving 2 stars for the cold drinks, added 75c each. Had the milk tea and "Ying Yong". The drinks are good.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Fung May Chinese Cuisine

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Penny Rusty Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkGfXMIDqwS_yD1axTk6tkHoLsnybE2ErvKrHMoMIElMJWekI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered take-out recently. Prices are pretty good given the amount of food you get and the food was mostly good.

Pan fried rice rolls with xo sauce turned out well with nice wok hei. The thick Shanghai noodles were good too and had crunchy cabbage. Homestyle fried vermicelli was plentiful. The one thing which wasn't great was the beef brisket fried rice as the beef wasn't as tender as it could have been.

Also had their beef chow fun and their steamed crystal noodles with beef brisket. Good caramelization on the chow fun. The beef brisket wasn't too tender tho","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEqHsTrJiLRvkhqORTMuqYH8dl7aHDKl1OwXEl&fid=0x0:0xae3ceb6e10667c45"],"When":"2024-1-15"},{"Name":"P Cho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYpqZl0QdgyGKqddwQHa-7-E_YzR-3F5N0QWNoWwJUTu4Gt_QA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We have been coming here for many years and have always ordered beef chow fun.  I find that the quality is highly inconsistent - sometimes the dish is spot on, other times, the beef is lacking and taste is not there

Today our dish had an aftertaste to the noodles like the wok was not cleaned properly before making the food.

Although the owners are friendly, I am not sure we will come back again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1WVj2YqBlTg_AZNOBzOUmH388QkBbTDRSvxPD&fid=0x0:0xae3ceb6e10667c45"],"When":"2022-8-31"},{"Name":"Vero Vero","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJqM6z3NvGgp8fOHPNYXy_sxK1l4a3Acl0A1wGDJ4i1AfuQXig=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went there several times. There are so many menu so it was hard for me to choose what to eat. Today, I asked the staff about crispy noodle and seafood on the top. And she understood me right away. This heavenly food was only $11. I have never been to China but I can feel that this place offers the athentic Chinese cuisine. One day, I would like to try congee as well. Great portion, reasonable price, and delicious cuisine.
I would highly recommend this place for all","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMl-bIDaIhh0mH0mcT9s5EKlY4KjyoP0LWQl0hR&fid=0x0:0xae3ceb6e10667c45"],"When":"2021-1-23"},{"Name":"Danny Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8eoyUE6az-FmQo7i2mVq5z64Ow48sgKu1EmLZc0zWWN6DMy5asw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s legit my favourite Chinese fast food/take out. Prices have gone up slightly (who hasn’t) but pre-pandemic it was the best Singapore noodle / $. Cash only tho. Free hot tea on the side but you have to ask for the cup.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5ApTwYJrHpGFIugKmx01J1aNt8_7zeC3xl7l1&fid=0x0:0xae3ceb6e10667c45"],"When":"2022-8-11"},{"Name":"Danny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJT62w3eARNoG3Z5LNkvV1CNjtBT5AxzIMN0ghXuIj4LDPoLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Disgusting food.  The cashier is super rude and my noodles were burnt and a weird moldy taste.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bera C.Y.C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJV7yjUwO0Gn77CKHHNMw38WSAieB1XUStpcT3I39iltAtTLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Did not expect to find such delicious "Taiwanese Beef Brisket Noodle Soup" at a food court.  Fung May cooks every dish to order at the food court in Crystal Mall.  The beef, noodle and the rich soup base were very tasty, along with the pickled preserved vegetables.  Amazing food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpPCYKadoZNvcaxvYQdNGA_D5rcV1foQ1EzLXv&fid=0x0:0xae3ceb6e10667c45"],"When":"2019-4-19"},{"Name":"Marcus Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWoNr03HVzKs6bc_7KJRO7N6Ii2y72eZpk6lZjF5N_krVQLbLXs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good rice rolls and friendly staffs","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxf-RKeFBZrFOm7xz-fO5Qzng-UP-Xh7Cb2f8B&fid=0x0:0xae3ceb6e10667c45"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Paul Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVl2oVxJKLr_k_g4j5wg7lB9NsNfiBzRT5FNAPVPTrX-BeeOxpk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I have ordered soya beef chow fun to go. The taste and portion was okay.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNa61JbFQr7pMFrfSC6kAc83T71FJy6JPf-6TPu&fid=0x0:0xae3ceb6e10667c45"],"When":"2023-12-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Big Libby","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI-u3QE505INvUWP0nEKGMC6q8NSCyZJpGVM0PvxYfZNh8c2g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were in Burnaby and needed some quick food before heading your way catch a ferry. We were near Garlic and Chili, so we popped in for a quick bite. Just a few tables and a non-pretentious environment, which was fine with us. Food was hot and fresh and the tea was a nice surprise. We enjoyed it and obvious locals do as well, as they were doing a steady takeout as we ate.   Thank you","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_hK0fIJyaECsnfp4vyVJZQNg1T9H4ENU2uJ2S&fid=0x0:0xc5eb85bd59e48fe"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Y. Cherski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-7SLlKKRW0Rqcp9wRXFlvt6gbh0rtI7PMIroLgxETtGiPwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"There's something almost nostalgic about Garlic & Chilli. A reminder of the good old days when Chinese eateries were all about hearty, honest food at prices that didn't break the bank. No frills, no fancy decor, just generous portions of comfort on a plate. The lady who served us was warm and welcoming, making the experience feel a bit like stepping back in time. Sure, the food isn’t perfect, but that’s part of its charm. With rent prices soaring, these little mom-and-pop spots are becoming endangered species, so savor the experience while you still can.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrfn9Xfn54F3X18yFfCf_jciyUCbqicyV5RUvA&fid=0x0:0xc5eb85bd59e48fe"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Derek Shek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP9Pjija1abf8rOsOgAPBkesWOZ8sALAjyQJKt0I-DTaykDkHV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Garlic & Chili is a small, family-feel restaurant that offers some really tasty dishes. The sour spicy soup and house fried noodles are especially good—the fried noodles were delicious and flavorful. The only downside is that the restaurant could use better ventilation, as it can get a bit stuffy inside. If they improve that, it would be perfect. Overall, a nice spot for a cozy meal!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVFeykOztTX30cQ8UIBxIJB3IeKSv-l9I4dgqG&fid=0x0:0xc5eb85bd59e48fe"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Joseph B.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUyF4tz3RRUTabaBGLHduE-I1dIV54xL8fNNgSNa6fpXeLJHTdL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The kids and I enjoy the food from Garlic & Chili. We've been customers for some time. Everyone's tastebuds are different but we love the food. The vegetables taste fresh, we don't find anything overly salty, boneless pork is actually boneless with no fat, and portions are good for us. We have never dined in, but it looks clean and the service is always friendly. We also like the prices. Highly recommend. Ample parking outside as it's located in a strip mall. Convenient location so you can pick up items in the other stores. Photos: Beef Broccoli Chow Mein, Braised Tofu with Vegetables, Diced Chicken with Cashew Nuts, Sweet & Sour Boneless Pork, and Wonton Soup (10 pcs).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZerAymgau6wdCPV5QtQK9TZxuha5RJ8SHeqFv&fid=0x0:0xc5eb85bd59e48fe"],"When":"2024-3-31"},{"Name":"Kay Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9NhspsX8db0eJ6R3NGWpAO7MOpr78hz6YRrrNmW4A6H_UrJr1uA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service was great - I had the beef chow mein, chicken wings, and spring rolls.

The herbs and ginger/onion were really fresh, it tasted like home made cooking! I’m a huge Asian foodie and I’d order from here again.

I do think the prices are very affordable for the huge portions.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqZMIh7cfjVZ7mG2HdFTEspAPbCFqCmrIiksjP&fid=0x0:0xc5eb85bd59e48fe"],"When":"2022-8-7"},{"Name":"Great Di","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvtKCDUk1R5-a0NIOcGVw9f9-Bymad1Fi99baNhhqypCir3LIt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I'm a tourist and want to try Chinese food here, as an Asian, the food is just ordinary, too bland, no spiciness, the fried noodles are too dry and have no taste... maybe it's adapted to the taste of local people here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNL6GeATHA2xDJuCxTpfJDgkWCwuLeEq1ex3zDL&fid=0x0:0xc5eb85bd59e48fe"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"D D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVn-HmKGkiEXpPYEJdaFnX-Wk9npBuMky8Sv8ZSJcapzQOOPiN3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Since the pandemic we have  found the food much better in restaurant than take out.  This is literally a hole in the wall with limited seating so eating in is literally an in and out kinda thing.  We find the exact same dishes for take out does not have the same portion on meat compared to dine in. Sure prices have gone up but it's still cheaper than most decent Asian fare.  Chili & Garlic still satisfies our szchezuan cravings.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtEy662prIIAOegh2J3MkUJpbPIdqR_1L7d1PO&fid=0x0:0xc5eb85bd59e48fe"],"When":"2022-12-21"},{"Name":"Aa Aa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGR-YOfrs42P2VvMps3wWBpZ3R3wvnGZyU2FFwuO2XOcv4EqI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Authentic little chinese restaurant at a great price. A great hidden gem! Love the lunch specials and the house special chow mein. The value for the lunch specials in particular are very reasonable. They are definitely a top choice for a quick lunch when I am in the area.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jung Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKWx3xNhoIKyLy0c-G4nQS5AJ5P5Q2UAzSIcWaHkFgajlyb-A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I’ve gotten take outs here three times now, and this is personally one of top 5 pizzerias I’ve ever been to. So far I had the chorizo, chicken and grilled leek, and hot mama. I personally wouldn’t get the hot mama again because I found it overly salty for my taste, but that could just be me. The chorizo and the chicken and grilled leek is excellent though, I would eat that all the time if I could.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTVk80IALljwj9qSxwCxx4_Gpd_TkaaON7bNDa&fid=0x0:0xd155696a6ad550e1"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Raymond Blackmore","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV50ISsw20KNGusbrG20UKmZtsz-GtvLoXqyY0sfrOFC4GdcFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a tasty little pizzeria!! Went with my girlfriend for a lazy Sunday bite. Clean open interior with maybe 6 or 8 seats. Atmosphere was relaxed, staff was helpful, friendly and knowledgeable.

The pizza, though, was the star of the show (as one might hope)! We had the Funghi, which was juicy, flavourful, and full of earthy mushroom umami. The sourdough crust was chewy but crisp the way one would expect. Loved it.

We also had the Blue Pear and they really nailed the salty/sweet balance of that seep velvety gorgonzola flavour against the sweetness of the pear. So good.

100% recommend. Pies are about $18 to $23 in price, but feel fair given how loaded with toppings and rich with flavour they were. The truffle aioli dip was great and came in a nice deep cup. 5 stars!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHkpUyYZuQuRQsAE-Rf5ZCxvyfWwW9phhNHDu9&fid=0x0:0xd155696a6ad550e1"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Daniel Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFE7g6vnjf23CW6mDeh4anchF8fxBs6O5Nsx0bvhepuO3MVzWa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent Vegan Pizzas! They both tasted soo good I can still taste it after a week.
Friendly service on the phone and in person.
Dough tasted great just wish it was a bit thicker so the toppings wouldn't fall off when I pickup the pizza slice.
Overall excellent and highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6AFeel8-EiMxwDjJxtvy3kQgCPF6OFgIOqGsD&fid=0x0:0xd155696a6ad550e1"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"Lex","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIOoTFR1sL0065mPU_AeAGgpwzqHssyGAT0I917Apw20TmHTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My workplaces orders from Wild Flour at any opportunity we get. We have several employees with dietary restrictions and are constantly on the hunt for restaurants that serve gluten free and vegan options, but always end up coming back to Wild Flour. The pizzas are phenomenal, but the salads always steal the show in our office.

My personal favourite on the menu, is the Jenny from the Brocc salad. It’s so simple, but the flavours blend perfectly and people in our office often bring up their cravings for this salad at lunch time (months after we ordered lol). I also love the kale ceasar with the crispy croutons. Yum.

Highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYC1YqaX6sWJRXKR4TE9aoDQiHFLYU_UTqv7Ty&fid=0x0:0xd155696a6ad550e1"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Cheryl M.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIMvK1oZ3Uz0WPIQq0ZnEiz8b4FZIlGQ_bSk9Rf4Fj0c7LNXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We ordered by phone and picked up two pizzas from the new Langley location of The Wild Flour Pizza Co. We should have known that we were going to be very disappointed in the pizzas when we called and the person who answered the phone had to put us on hold while she checked to make sure it was ok for us to order more that 3 toppings on the ‘Build Your Own’ pizza. She said they would allow us to order and pay full price for each of the toppings but the cook would be putting on less of each ingredient. We said that we were paying for the ingredients so we wanted the cook to put them in our pizzas.
When I went to pick up the pizzas i thought I could smell a burnt odour but figured it must have just been the smell coming from the pizza oven. So I left a decent tip and paid for the pizzas.
I brought them the short distance home and when we opened up the boxes we were shocked to see what they looked like. My husband ordered 4 types of meat with mushrooms and pineapple. I had the gluten friendly crust with prosciutto, chorizo, mushrooms, pear and pineapple.
Well my husband’s pizza looked burnt around the edges of the crust and the meats were shrivelled and dry. It was hard to find any mushrooms and there were only a few pieces of pineapple. He said it was the worst pizza he has ever tasted.
My gluten friendly crust was not made in the restaurant (unlike another pizza restaurant that is nearby and is rather delicious). This crust looked and tasted like cardboard. There is no reason anymore to have bad gluten free products. I’m not completely sure how they managed it but they burnt the crust and all the topping seemed to be barely heated. I can only guess that they cooked the crust (burnt it) and then put on the precooked toppings.
Also, if you like lots of pizza sauce on your pizza then don’t order from this restaurant. You could barely see any sauce on either of the pizzas. They call ‘red sauce’.
I cannot recommend this restaurant. Check out my other restaurant reviews to see which pizza restaurant I do recommend in the Willoughby, Langley area. There are some great restaurants in Langley. This is not one of them. We will not be ordering from this restaurant again. Their location in Burnaby looks like it had great reviews. Perhaps this new location is going through growing pains. We thought we would try this pizza place rather than our favourite because it’s new. We think it was a bad mistake.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYWKvx8DMoU7TXdt7Cm0c1CBblWzJvFtTDSR2A&fid=0x0:0xd155696a6ad550e1"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"Rochelle Clarice","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPmL0BVmEcgub5kZzhoi7c4C1XKJmV2IlzFxr9evuuRLy9PEBEdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Outstanding! We ordered the Funghi  pizza and Butter Paneer pizza - both had well-rounded flavours but not over powering, wasn’t too oily, and the ingredients tasted fresh! Staff were friendly and efficient - about or less than 15 minutes for two pizzas. My only criticism is that the pizzas aren’t bigger and the slices were cut unevenly. Otherwise, fantastic and highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPi-1ZVe5_kJ4mWF_mZC-USHXPYY6pouGrn3TEs&fid=0x0:0xd155696a6ad550e1"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Tn23","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsGxbchcoLrkxVTBgH4SJUR2sfT2zAPoH5rGfegdO_5zjnqEz-eQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The Pizza here is amazing, especially the sour dough crust. The fungi is a must try and the butter paneer is great as well!

Not much space for dine in but this location is awesome for take out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP59wVRkYo5rKATJnsJjNBbyazfe7RC5uFAQgvP&fid=0x0:0xd155696a6ad550e1"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Guninder M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXG8PtH2OmGWVo6ojcV8teQbztUa0HaU-3qwzAIOG0oO7xsDti=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The pizza dough is amazing!! We tried the Hot Mama and Butter Paneer with herb and garlic dip.

Hot Mama had a good kick and paired well with the dip. Butter Paneer was great on its own. The caramelized onions in the paneer pizza were a perfection.

Only downside was that the middle of the pizza was a little too thin so heavier pizzas were a little chore to eat.

Will go again to try the other flavours.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7IL1_ha_4ZJVoT-bKZ7haWlTq1rzbyRmUzJt2&fid=0x0:0xd155696a6ad550e1"],"When":"2024-10-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"AH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbSDTBRb0i5Z-O9Llx_f4jUDvaC36Rpc_Ai8VCzOt_tM08rlqM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food and very big portions! I couldn’t finish the large pho. Service was very friendly and attentive. I’ll definitely come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOodkPNW9xVyDjLjLDXTIWrPWT668GjzyxXYkOK&fid=0x0:0x5a1ec635e47e44e3"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Donald L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSo8xtMVmoEtOrLlTs_t_iV1wVgKCai2cbgp_qeN4-Qr2Gxyk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really like the Vietnamese food here. It is delicious. Large pho has good portion of noodles along with beef brisket. We also like the lemongrass chicken with pork chop, comes with either a beef or chicken soup. Free street parking around the neighbourhood. The front entrance has a step which may make it challenging for wheelchairs. They do accept Visa/Mastercard but not Amex. I will definitely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAiYd4LPRIrnRpg4NfNe2jpBsAaDneflRcSiyU&fid=0x0:0x5a1ec635e47e44e3"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"Gloria Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXraEdtzs8pFLfqa5aLhzDZSAL1BhMjv_yg1eMqCSd7Gu8eIyoL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came by just before lunch on a holiday and was seated promptly. One table was there before us and it was about half full by the time we left (less than one hour).

The staff were welcoming and friendly, and the service was quick. We ordered the kids size pho for the kiddo, each of us had a banh mi, and I also had an iced coffee.

The pho was a hit for the child, and they loved the broth.

The banh mi were solid, balanced taste for a good price. The lemongrass chicken tasted good. The lemongrass flavour was subtle but there. The bread was a little stale, but not that noticeable.

I do wish they had the special banh mi with pâte and Vietnamese cold cuts, but they don’t. I settled for the grilled pork, but as it’s not my usual choice for banh mi, I found the taste a bit sweet for my liking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYPErRYRScZbCoB-B-rH8QRdDSqxextA83Oveq&fid=0x0:0x5a1ec635e47e44e3"],"When":"2024-5-21"},{"Name":"S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8uFSJcbQTrEEjCys2cjtAF4babUVY96Uqg-hJ0LaE6prB3Bfh9w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We enjoyed out broth for the pho.
Would prefer lime and not lemon.
Wanted to order the spring rolls but they are expensive.
Will come back and try other items on the menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKuMha30qjUlHff0aWnYmI-qpF5hjC_9EjxCDH&fid=0x0:0x5a1ec635e47e44e3"],"When":"2024-3-17"},{"Name":"Vinz T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlf4UX6_X5QccNE_C6bW6QyYxUtcav7aSLcQJKbJdCk8R_OgGg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pleasant environment and excellent service.
All the dishes we ordered were delicious. The soup of the noodles is so flavorful and rich, and the House Special Noodle Soup contains most types of meat, such as steak, brisket, tendon, tripe and beef ball. The spring roll is very crispy and is the favourite of our kids. The Vietnamese-style coffee with condensed milk is sweeter than usual but still worth trying.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5PiwW2D4UN9itlmXRMi_7GjWiJ4Lj7XJ4EDNu&fid=0x0:0x5a1ec635e47e44e3"],"When":"2022-9-10"},{"Name":"Michelle M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWeetN-W20mnzvtvgZG8vAeDlWwG6zd354oPCvc1I4B_3Cjy_PI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Came for lunch and the service was great. Got the Vietnamese coffee and a beef brisket pho but there was so much noodles and not much very thin beef slices. The chicken and pork chop on rice platter was ok sizes and grilled nicely. The disappointing item was the chicken wings. There was only 5 and there was honey mustard drizzled on top. Not the salt and pepper I was expecting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9w98dyjOXpxV7HorCnXR1SxnP1_DbU3trfNf5&fid=0x0:0x5a1ec635e47e44e3"],"When":"2023-4-19"},{"Name":"Harry Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVC_5ha5kkBIoownh6obr5ziv_zIpgXCp4SngWz9IVbgBCpYuO9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice neighborhood place.  Had the beef noodles in soups and combo plate along with spring rolls.  Broth was quite good and portions were a good size.  Service was quick and attentive.  Yes, I would come back again.

Drop me a comment or a like if you found this helpful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPYqIYIhSdOQ7jUaC8zJEdRInyHDM1Yf1dXT0_&fid=0x0:0x5a1ec635e47e44e3"],"When":"2023-3-18"},{"Name":"Lisa Stewart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWo79veLnsCvDCjha0TJoTathwJUFPajJepLVXdR9rXYCLOAi7D6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tammy is the loveliest host ever!!  She has made my family and friends very welcome the two times we have been lucky enough to dine here.  The food is so fresh and delicious!  Her and her family care deeply about the meals they are preparing and you can taste that right in the food.  The Chilli/ Garlic oil is worth going there for alone! The portions are great!  The prices are great!  This place is not to be missed.  However make sure you don’t go to late as they close at 8pm...and you will be sad you missed them!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcnYh-rBu10i_6iMUCS5wDaKMSKM7aZ55aMUkB&fid=0x0:0x5a1ec635e47e44e3"],"When":"2020-9-9"}]

title: Grand Chinese Restaurant
descriptions: Dim sum, handcrafted noodles & traditional Chinese staples in a relaxed outlet with a modern vibe.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ly N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKw0L0jYe90N4ohWKd88uMWm6NsNQzpLPKj2gx_NnIq7sCQAg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"3.5 stars overall.
The cleanliness of the place is questionable. The front door and glass was visibly dirty. It almost had us double thinking if we wanted to eat there.
Food itself was tasty for the most part. Service ok too.
If they clean the windows, doors and floor I think it would help get more customers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3aSFGBQWXDoCX1TC6SIJxivqKtihqs6GZRtvz&fid=0x0:0xc89539b1180dbe80"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Jane","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8nrypB1BIUZGTgS0dOSjZpVQC0W-qhvAfMyeULahnCiwiaWOe=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I was traveling back to the States and was looking forward to some good Chinese food thinking you can’t go wrong in Burnaby but I was very disappointed. Had the beef and broccoli and hand thrown noodles. The beef was not very tender. There wasn’t very much meat/broccoli or sauce to go with the noodles. I also had the shrimp and pork fried rice. There was  only small amount of shrimp, and hardly any pork, just dried ends of pork. (See photo.). Unfortunately, the food was very unsatisfactory.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2zj1coxfAzc8aEipvd6paPeVtJILy_fk1WLzc&fid=0x0:0xc89539b1180dbe80"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Ronnie Yeung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocITKRxomMsA566QxEk1eCQfKF1vWcqprY6eFzviF97ayusSHw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was craving for some hot food tonight and went into this restaurant. We both enjoyed the authentic taste of Chinese food. Definitely worth a shot!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOT8cRIxf3Jre6TJFh317U0KkKw6rKZtIcl02OG&fid=0x0:0xc89539b1180dbe80"],"When":"2024-6-5"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Solid and authentic Chinese food. Ordered takeout and the portions were great and comparable to the size when you dine in. Everything was fresh, the meat was juicy, and the food was filled with flavour. The honey garlic spareribs were delectable! Highly recommended! Sweet and sour pork is also spot on. Fried flat noodles lacked a little al dente bounce but still good. Delicious food and very satisfied.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9nOkLnq5QtcKyYr7Do2ubhuDazFz-T4JF7mfD&fid=0x0:0xc89539b1180dbe80"],"When":"2023-8-19"},{"Name":"Adriano Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXkrf0OR1Anlvv7G-SuYdhsu1ErG4Lckh8evrixwkYttUodQZABFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Was there  for dinner on August 4. Good selection of Cantonese and Szechuan dishes. Good taste and big portions on all the dishes we ordered. The only complaint is the lack of parking in that little strip mall in which all four tenants are eateries. My guests have to park in the Staples parking lot which is about 5 -7 minutes walk away.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCf8g5nOMj7kPIdfoXNK8hAf-9Kqg2h7R_NVzF&fid=0x0:0xc89539b1180dbe80"],"When":"2023-8-11"},{"Name":"adam w","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLLA7TwHDiSGkM6ObHom0pkEmoo-EnoqjtblTBernEHvYnAPw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Went today with two friends for lunch.
Service was poor, server was cold and impersonal.
I got the lunch special, noodles with beef and broccoli. The food had absolutely zero seasoning. They don’t even provide soy sauce or salt and pepper on the table to help make it more palatable.
Not a good experience overall.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dan Le-Tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIU55nGNO-JQ_VFmndfqCAupJibjN8FSOn_gorfXsMI0N6YxA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had the pan fried pork buns and it was really delicious. Some pan fried pork buns can be really greasy but this was not greasy at all. The bun was soft and pillowy while the pork was juicy and flavourful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHNHh696FjN7iYQYRAZr05uA4hxD7WETnVlSaN&fid=0x0:0xc89539b1180dbe80"],"When":"2024-6-4"},{"Name":"J Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVd_tJr5oIcl7HDPt8euPkTb-MCewXa0eEjRnWARG4tW4KUXRuu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Daughter APPROVED! We continued our dumpling tour as she found this place. The GOOD: steamed Shanghai soup dumplings are Top 3 in Metro Van area. My daughter ate most of them. The OK: pork dumplings are alright but soup ones are still best. Beef rice noodles tasted as expected - and is must have for me. The BAD:  I usually need a pop w my dumplings and $3.50 for a can of pop is waaay too much. That's the only down side IMHO.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgGc6BLA0uskVBCDRuSG24tZ3mhuqquGv8MY1h&fid=0x0:0xc89539b1180dbe80"],"When":"2023-7-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Shuk yan Chow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIkCU4v06HD-u4zS8GY5kITVERTXZzU5pkiYuC9upA0g8pF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Will see lots of figure in the bar area
Lunch special is nice ($14)
Deluxe sushi combo ($33) worth the price!

Would be more happy if there r more choices for the lunch special","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNgYFY21xDE8FCbf-RTtCFci-kSypKc1SUUBk&fid=0x0:0xc275387300bb3494"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Erica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUh3fEd3c7Qz7J80daKhFwS0w6Gog9YOVYUtlC7X3GBid9qw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The fish tasted very fresh and the sushi roll I ordered was delicious.  The location was so convenient as it’s right in front of Holdom station.  The staff were very friendly and attentive, so when I’m in the Brentwood area I prefer to come here over other sushi places. Perfect if you’re taking transit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN21aicbfouD_0H_5rUs4caTpnJDQW0Lp4VEHF9&fid=0x0:0xc275387300bb3494"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"Chloe Ta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5p0p1g-8mYVWw501moAVfD_r4ehYK907HwuE_DsXC1k3SrtOpgQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We came in when it was around 2~3pm and there was only us in the restaurant. Somehow it feels like the servers are just chilling rather than really focusing to deliver a really good customer service.
Food was fresh and good! Our salmon don was amazing and prepared really fast! However, the slices of each piece of salmon was not consistence..? You would be eating one slice and its really mouth-full while others are less! Overall the price was in a pretty good range, food was fresh, customer service is somewhat ok and the location is pretty perfect as its near to skytrain. I would come back here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmtzrzWtfWcMymAjSz5b8hCNPem7cuL-KyWZIi&fid=0x0:0xc275387300bb3494"],"When":"2023-9-6"},{"Name":"Kimberly Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPtfSeIaHLVSglqbdv_gHSGB6XQlp42foLT782_LoPeEWjD9dauw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food, service, and hygiene was amazing here! The salmon sashimi was so fresh and delicious, and the staff were very friendly and even gave us some cooked salmon on the house! It was such a great surprise for my friends and I. There were also hand sanitizer bottles at each table and menus could be scanned! We loved our experience here and would definitely come again! :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7OLoBO5nr32ts1S1Cnydie1EyMXp69xjM-BFx&fid=0x0:0xc275387300bb3494"],"When":"2021-8-10"},{"Name":"KAUREEN MENDIS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLyN8E1hRGHsFD3sxl5TysphBJITv6qUWNQDBxqDr6eTnHtBcu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved everything. Usually not a huge fan of Japanese cuisine but the food and service at this restaurant won me over. The ika karaage( fried squid) was out of this world. I fell in love with it. The karaage chicken and spicy agadashe tofu was also completely mind blowing. Really delicious food and good service. 10/10 would recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKOSAs5jCcDopONUMbOG3t1UFnvtMbma6X6WQG&fid=0x0:0xc275387300bb3494"],"When":"2023-12-29"},{"Name":"Alexis Zornio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCBLgZdwlKBtqKmhW38C2qCW9YQxwXlUfGi9rS5ID4AhehGZGr=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"How this place doesn't have 5 stars I don't know. It has remained unchanged for the last 10 years and the prices have not had a massive increase like everywhere else. This is the most fresh and high quality fish you can get especially in Burnaby but I would even say it competes with Vancouver and wins with the price. We love this place it always our go-to.
The Las Vegas roll is something I will always crave that no other roll delivers.
My husband loves the $5 Coronas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyoh3aioS8BgR0h1dCwbGs69_YYu8TkXcV4jEA&fid=0x0:0xc275387300bb3494"],"When":"2023-3-20"},{"Name":"Melanie E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUR0bJcxqNkJt-i1wxCH3EaQXevncA86panZszfT__NAs_0KWRp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We came here on the spur of the moment for a late dinner based on the reviews. We barely made the last call & ordered a mound of food. Our out of town guests were impressed by the ambience & tasty fresh sushi that they wanted to order more but no more final last call.

I understand that they had a long day & needed to close. Everyone’s favourite was the assorted sushi combo party tray!

Only steps away from the Holdom skytrain station. There’s metered parking out front which is free after 8 pm.

An ideal place for a quick snack or dinner. Did I tell you that not only is the sushi fresh but prices are reasonable! We’ll be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlYFbcby-Xzxd3tklTjtyO6ddVpBIRw0aXnPaY&fid=0x0:0xc275387300bb3494"],"When":"2022-8-12"},{"Name":"Łevi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfVUCddYkb-N0dZmsuXl0kNiRy5oYcV5exhETgT3aaLmc3kxyv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A delightful little sushi restaurant in the area. Everything was hot & fresh—
made to order. I highly recommend trying the gyozas as an appetizer. Prices are good, too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMw2HoDuV0DZIjVO0iygFjh4Lcn_apIYJoNlhh3&fid=0x0:0xc275387300bb3494"],"When":"2024-3-17"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Tim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9d61KT21EA64Ht62m6GUlGEqAzZMI1hBL9uaMir0kBH2c6WfYRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow - a new restaurant in the neighborhood and it's a gem. The atmosphere was really fun, the service was excellent and attentive, and the food... just wow. We had the tasty butter paneer, aloo gobi, and pani puri and left so happy and full. They have such a big menu and I'm looking forward to trying a little bit of everything.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkOIPljrJwcNZqkTKppYS9K1F7tIUnMTG-fYup\u0026fid=0x0:0x493b02ae97d163f8"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"beethalpreet kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKVLG4dSleWPPT8_uJBDK8gvtB4fQEZE4rf6QR27VuA0mFh0w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got the veg meal and dahi golgappe ! I loved it so much the Shahi paneer in the meal wasn't overly sweet loved the dal. Loved the chat as well. The staff was really nice. Shout out to Rishu she was really thoughtful and amazing. Would definitely go there again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrLvLMHWLlltvEnPuXchnsONq9DmluFymjMeg4\u0026fid=0x0:0x493b02ae97d163f8"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Sunil Pandya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVj4H3hBVSDRbMxJH4IQ4XkDJPYbePXu8wjpN2N-WX6oMBBsQU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A perfect place for Indian cuisine! I was a bit worried about the taste before ordering since they also serve non-veg options. However, I was pleasantly surprised that the vegetarian dishes had no trace of non-veg influence. I thoroughly enjoyed the delicious food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORm1_cejmslDJYp-gihYgh-Jkz1jODsHFwtvvg\u0026fid=0x0:0x493b02ae97d163f8"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"Yana Karpova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXG0tIvbOverek4bTshzzkoWCsR-ewzyvLPg1Ugb73zbINf6vw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Thanks for the great service and delicious food. The girl who served us today was very friendly and served us professionally. I also want to thank the kitchen, the flavors were perfectly balanced and always making everything fresh. They were absolutely amazing! If I have the chance to be in Burnaby, I always visit your place. Also I really enjoy your butter chicken paneer, 6 months ago I first tried this dish and it was in your restaurant, and since then it has become for me the most favourite dish in Indian cuisine. I can't wait to come back and try more dishes. Keep up the great work!\nI definitely recommend your place 100%","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hrishikesh Kilaje","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxD_ndpxkAo0Y96wJ9RxxuT1rbahI-K8f6XC6mZAQ_nT1vySHB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Haven’t tried everything here yet but my god the momo here are ridiculously good, one the best I’ve had. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAfqpm3iq9_06S_fAjZ3slXiA_8jKh_AYYEY6T\u0026fid=0x0:0x493b02ae97d163f8"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"ᇫ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlngfQVtGilUz62ScjKSTnwc5UnbrCxqB5h7iWhaVLUWtSTDz7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best garlic Naan and butter chicken iv ever had, please eat here you won't regret it","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkXa4WtPE1-AQA1hUA_AI1AXmO_2mKOsDRERro\u0026fid=0x0:0x493b02ae97d163f8"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Ess November","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWuPJ8X9jOZ2CtOO2jCad-r9UmiPcylLXs6WZsf1PzrAZBsBSHw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time at Tasty Planet Indian Cuisine. I had already packed a lunch, but wanted something to go with my food on the side. I ordered the Fish Pakora and was pleasantly surprised at how crunchy the outside batter was after my first bite! Not your typical fish Pakora. Very crunchy outside and perfect texture inside. The meal came with a side of pickled/ seasoned raw onions with green sauce and tartar sauce - the tartar sauce was very good as well - creamy not watery. I didn’t try the green sauce. Top notch customer service as well. Highly recommend this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3voicfWO_Hrzv-9_RXjNXPZzsajL_feTnhKQF\u0026fid=0x0:0x493b02ae97d163f8"],"When":"2023-10-23"},{"Name":"CY Siu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWM3Ctylp7Mrn5uab0RojAoPMaVbcTi3Moq_j_tgDTvPUHYdsdr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Review is based on takeout only. the service was relatively quick and food comes piping hot. The naan is very well done - not burnt, good thickness and texture ($2.25 each). Got the eggplant Bharta ($15) and wow does it have kick but well done on the smokey component. Well done dishes with amp amount of flavouring and content. Would not call this overly oily either as I've experienced worse. Good spot to go to.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdP2zgnv0RTZDEPwIfj5JUzhMUeThNN8NkRAuj\u0026fid=0x0:0x493b02ae97d163f8"],"When":"2023-2-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ryan Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQl1j9sZTOT0V9bUqpH9in_0GIVVfG0l3j5RhhcMAIo39qi9zA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice and delicious pho in north Burnaby. although they offer a free spring roll for a google review. But this is my honestly review of this restaurant.

This is my first time to dine in here, the waitress is kind and willing to help, just a little bit clumsy of serving water and make a calculate mistake on my bill.

The pho noodles style here is quite thin and soft. the broth is taste good and little bit sweet. Maybe it was too cold last night, I think the soup is not hot enough.

The spring roll that they offer is also delicious and rich of veg inside.

The price is reasonable and I think nobody will chose the small bowl of noodle since it's $1 different.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOp0strfoRI1si4U3cuR-nPjqWUDrHYKgt2Wb8S&fid=0x0:0x58e5f0963217fd70"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Christian Fox","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU20an-QvwyGxXGb13SO-MusZ7gZpwUncLUr6dt_nZDUm98MQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The restaurant is very cozy and a gem in the neighborhood.  The Pho is always consistent with use of fresh ingredients eg. Beef Brisket (cooked same day) and the side accompaniments, Bean sprouts and Thai Basil, are always fresh.

The servers are attentive and kind.  Very pleasant experience.

Excellent place for Pho in Burnaby.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3W08u_AKnfuPWthDdns7lx-c1cDTe6PR2rBs&fid=0x0:0x58e5f0963217fd70"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Elmira Nazari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUS8psOPde-fgvVYsglTVKj-j9hpNdB1347mGr_T9d11yAStREO4w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have 2 Pho spots and always scared to try other ones just to be disappointed, but I've added this place as my top 3. They also have Thai options, WIN! Service was prompt and kind.
Broth had lots of flavour and not overwhelmed with cinnamon like some places. Spring rolls were filled generously with meat and veggies. Really large portion of fresh pad thai.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_k7aH-r5EUFKS4JEW7M7iw-gJvwtsn5r1fQGv&fid=0x0:0x58e5f0963217fd70"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Dvir M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxK6vUXIZPF_mBYpyYRstLoQm3iHWCiUkMzdVCeCCrurOmcIbk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I’ve been here several times. I love the food. They know how to make really good Vietnamese food. I took the salad roll and lemongrass chicken bun mi. Both were super good. However, barely chicken inside. Other than that I love it 100%. Hopefully they’ll be more generous next time. Thanks 🙏🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPz46CaZUEJeVMU8-twfnFyok_4hs65KBnE0RqU&fid=0x0:0x58e5f0963217fd70"],"When":"2024-10-31"},{"Name":"Christina D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKdbzCgX2mAlkgoRDRpQdmyhvqkcWi1Q4oMSB2c7X4rmlkfGg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came in here for dinner with my boy. Had the pho and spring roll combo.
Pho is really tasty and the spring roll was really hot, big in size and has a nice crunch. Prices are really good considering location and quality. The service (I was served by Thanh) here is better than the average pho restaurant.

The restaurant tables and decor were good, I would eat here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbVsjAm87DpvbfL7SbVv-dz0EEJrGfq8GlOt9o&fid=0x0:0x58e5f0963217fd70"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"Eunice Kang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlsHbSmcRyUuJJGqE1MZDtwYbpv2RFuCHOGBesAS00UC1MAwtH=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their broths are always flavourful and have a nice clean aftertaste. The meat is super soft as well! First time having their pad thai, and its super nice as well!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPO8L8bcne0DIjnZ-zp4ZC9sDAPsQe_yaNX21yR&fid=0x0:0x58e5f0963217fd70"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Danisa Cordero","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIMCX92B7SrH1edJscWs4uyruKFwHXVwC2oFR3g_oimVPGYjw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I come here all the time and they have never disappointed me. The food is delicious, the servers are nice and my friends I love coming as a group, would definitely recommend to cure your pho cravings","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrPBnpjuEl3hQq5U4pOHPr6k6zU8qsDOlYL68L&fid=0x0:0x58e5f0963217fd70"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Erin English","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXO0YoNguqt_btF0BX4C4uwguANlM0glxwZQ2wjhgMWE-tIML0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pho D'lite is an absolute delight. We visit every week because the food is delicious, and the service is top-notch and consistent. The staff are friendly and warm, and they remember our order every time we come. They have the best soup I've ever had. We will continue to visit faithfully!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXpkmmXckHVxcRPCYIcJRLHpkXzrTwG52zCYNs&fid=0x0:0x58e5f0963217fd70"],"When":"2024-8-10"}]
