user_reviews:
[{"Name":"JP","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX90NeQebsEGfp9rJe7B7QdUfdncEkOmwFrEw8C0EIB0z7Jl9-uUg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"For lunch, I had deluxe sashimi, a BC roll, a dynamite roll, agedashi tofu, and tempura udon. Everything was fresh and delicious. The place felt a bit small inside, but it was still a nice lunch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQZAJmr2pGQVvB6e28Fm02FJDjJkZrNZ93IMN6&fid=0x0:0xe5db119dd1d731d1"],"When":"2024-11-8"},{"Name":"Nick (Neek)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1vFxY7J8TeGvCzfbDb-8G1ZKZ5NRu0re3I-xGPfKYIH_u9Mgytw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sushi U is of my my favorite go-to sushi restaurants nestled in Burnaby. The workers are always respectful and kind to customers. Service is consistent, and the ingredients are of high quality. The BC Roll is probably the best I've had out of all the sushi restaurants I have visited. This restaurant is a must try when in the neighborhood. 5/5 Easily.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwOX33E9RcysgFk4_GLOhmdw63Ba0C1w2xaTMj&fid=0x0:0xe5db119dd1d731d1"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"April Sigurdson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJNLC9p7eSwn9PCgESEMIkZhRdgMERvM28shS4v3pbpKEgRGvI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best sushi order I ever had! Service was amazing 😍
The only place I've seen that has Salmon belly sashimi which is my favorite!
And the spider roll had the perfect balance of ingredients and flavors even the batter on the crab was crispy but not too thick.
Waitress was so friendly and kind.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlDQNXn-IctnnoIleQncCXpYYySX8fEGW5ZwHD&fid=0x0:0xe5db119dd1d731d1"],"When":"2024-3-2"},{"Name":"Rosie Lawrence","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKFulqUZaK6VzP0tQXQI7sRm8eHzodPzolWjlT6Lsd05kZmJg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The sushi was absolutely delicious😋Every dish I ordered was tasty and fresh, and the staff were incredibly friendly. I'll definitely come back to this place whenever I crave sushi!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrYYfGPcdJWl36lbE5a4m-C7al_QWwe5F_4Rjv&fid=0x0:0xe5db119dd1d731d1"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"John Baek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7igYtQcsNIq0vAMXNsyKwBxt0vRD3K1mycx8f82TOMbpDHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I tried the teriyaki chicken bento box, which was very good. Place was clean and service was top notch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCHtHwK-Ql4Mx-gNuiajT9eq1iLRgbhiJ08e4g&fid=0x0:0xe5db119dd1d731d1"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Nick Sabatino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJGbN7f3wystTCAVQASd5Vvr9_NUag9PT288S7i9IqZU_Cd2A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very quaint, great service, food was fresh, tasty, great prices, alot of variety, I have been here numerous times, it was always on point. A hidden gem! They always play modern music, I enjoy it every time! highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMI0OVoFOwxwPwnHsrMhP7MvjkEcTx4quuO7TzC&fid=0x0:0xe5db119dd1d731d1"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Anthony Plaxen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0TosyGAQWTqM_XvTHaXfq2jDGHv6ifKWBgTGcJKYnap3ceipL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been coming here over the years and it’s one of my favourite local sushi spots! The food is great, the staff are friendly and it’s reasonably priced!

I always get the dynamite and BC rolls here, today I tried the Dragon Roll and the Crispy n Crunch roll and it was really tasty, crunchy and delicious. I’d highly recommend the dragon roll with eel, it’s nice!

Will come back time and again for good cheap local eats.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTtUP6INe7wnfYrXHlQMRnU5BoVlkyXStLokSf&fid=0x0:0xe5db119dd1d731d1"],"When":"2023-10-4"},{"Name":"Andy Chiang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6Ytd6jvLjiUIKjc2DLdidLuwgHbgPUD4GPhFuPOLEoqlZ2vbh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cool little sushi spot in North Burnaby with very good service and sizeable portions at a decent price.

Their bento boxes are very generous n terms of food quantity, and definitely the best bang for your buck.

The chairs need a little bit of a fixing, as many are wobbly or feel like they could break soon.

Overall, if you’re in the area and craving for sushi, it’s a decent spot with good value.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7G1MRfZEJVB81pdhtFunjKF0LggGhdRVN0TX_&fid=0x0:0xe5db119dd1d731d1"],"When":"2023-9-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Marnie Eudela-Umlas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXg_gVRD_Hd9V3XIUh6_P71KHCryea9xsHYGqrZHTuXW_jdxEU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our first time here as a friend celebrated his birthday. We loved everything from the drinks to their food plus excellent and friendly service. Great location too as it’s just inside the Grand Villa Casino. We will surely be back :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN6yA1G1aTzxwJyBU9jqMZq6vAxDuNRK3r9CtNB&fid=0x0:0x8226ce27978bfe27"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Nil Aykut","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhZtbw_LVFttqXyro7Gb_jlgozMvYHIdP0FAxizl3IB5HAyWA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We had an early dinner on a weekday, there was only one other table  and a large group at another table. Unfortunately we had to wait until the group’s order was complete so quiet a bit of waiting for food at an almost empty restaurant. We had a burger, Nashville sliders and Korean fried chicken. The only food we did not enjoy was KFC as it was overcooked and chicken was totally dried up. We could have asked it to be changed but unfortunately all the servers were busy with the large group so we didn’t bother and just asked the bill at the end. Burger and chicken sliders were really good. Our server was nice and apologized for the delay. I would like to try the patio on another day but little scared to go at a busier hour.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCuW-SS2Jul49XEXpMEcuBydI06BPdt7XYyYhs&fid=0x0:0x8226ce27978bfe27"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"Najd Dean","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnxDCQc6vnjjCAul-9ITPy3U_yiIjGDMr3pgwtcu0zBrQzM8s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great live music, dance atmosphere & friendly service. The food is delicious too. tried the surf and turf and was very happy with it. Don't get the short ribs. There are barely any ribs there. We turned them back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPyhqL2AEwjyqgL6s7Ug6wN2BM-Tra6JIC_DfY&fid=0x0:0x8226ce27978bfe27"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"A.J. Canadian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0mITu_1OR_MuXzhVIkPjHjZnimy2Y-mI64r72OA1Zbucah6-N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Personas, a great restaurant located in Grand Villa Casino in Burnaby. It has an easy to sit surrounding bar with bar seating. Inside is a  restaurant with comfortable spacious seating. The food is trendy and fusion based. They have happy hour from 3 to 5 and have daily specials. I enjoy Personas for happy hour when in the casino or area and enjoyed reserving space for staff and event parties. Friendly staff and good service. Recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOPo50oxsdK6KpAlDO9CeJ8ekO8OKpaBTYBMkh&fid=0x0:0x8226ce27978bfe27"],"When":"2024-4-12"},{"Name":"D D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVn-HmKGkiEXpPYEJdaFnX-Wk9npBuMky8Sv8ZSJcapzQOOPiN3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"2024 OCT - decided to check out Personas after not returning for years.  Found it quite quiet on a Saturday at lunch but was pleasantly surprised by the great service and food.  Chicken wings were meh but all other items were good.

2019 - Ever changing wait staff with the exception of a few that have been there a few years so service is mostly a miss unless you have the veterans serve your table.  The new waitress claimed so many food items were not available and wings flavours have diminished to only a few (have no idea if it's true) so we won't be back anytime soon even though it's in our hood at work.  Food quality is also a hit/miss ... mostly miss these days.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxydE6ujV9dnwcSJmhJWLUZWYFx3ymfmaYNXAj&fid=0x0:0x8226ce27978bfe27"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Evangeline Dalaya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVh6HgPE8PXFXtsvmH2vvn1nsy3lNWAduhT_pNqcs2QaQGPNZ6E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here with some friends and we didn't make a reservation so we sat at the bar. Christian was very friendly right off the bat. He was very conversational and helpful. The food was really tasty and most of all I really enjoyed the live music.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBrvIwmJwfX6MtSGHlj-fUG3-TDKkFD_Zhqq6c&fid=0x0:0x8226ce27978bfe27"],"When":"2023-4-24"},{"Name":"Al Bargen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8xTxqG6tPWhGc0QegM6wyo0xNMPM_xIBay4Ptn6A_Ngn2l7QR6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We’re staying at the hotel, and decided to try this place for lunch. Frankly, just looking for the type of food one could find at a decent pub. We ordered the tuna burger, and hamburger. Frankly, both were really good. A minor inconvenience was requesting no onions, yet somewhere, someone forgot about that request. Overall, the food was good. At approximately $20 each for the burgers, you could select a wide range of sides with your meal that did not include an up charge, like two or three dollars more for yam fries. This was a nice touch. I would not hesitate to go back to this restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjYJnYxGmPw16OHHfaWVj69h4TH4iA-Ngzzqm2&fid=0x0:0x8226ce27978bfe27"],"When":"2022-11-13"},{"Name":"Christina Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIOUijLkxOces0qCf3cFxiMxYQ5LQfJNEJ0sj2BxLEAbs5B0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Summer patio is a delight!

Food is OK for a casino restaurant, but can be on the pricey side for the fancier entree meals. Sticks with the sandwiches and starters.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkXaJyWLh4-74JaCoRp4e9jx-EyyQ6zDPr3SiI&fid=0x0:0x8226ce27978bfe27"],"When":"2023-8-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mona Zad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMR4E2eGeCM0YXIbpTdTSJbxtosgSXZZMVun99jHaxXCgVa1_f=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing Food, Great Vibes, but Bring a Jacket!

This was our second time having lunch at Cockney Kings Fish & Chips, and it didn’t disappoint! The food is absolutely amazing. We tried all types of fish, and both the cod and haddock were outstanding—perfectly crispy with a lovely texture and no fishy smell whatsoever. The onion rings and shrimp were equally scrumptious—just chef's kiss!

The atmosphere is warm and inviting, and the staff are incredibly friendly, making the experience even better.

The only thing to note is that it can get quite chilly inside, so be sure to bring a jacket! Still, that minor detail won’t stop us from coming back for more. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjF4iv5GqIHf5hRpmQfPdGYCLBofY-YcgTIWTP&fid=0x0:0xa1a7c30f727a03a6"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Emi T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL81E7KLAtl_tUMHz8dj38QVOhXHAA4dbz6FkLirrYRqL5xQg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My first time and it didn’t disappoint.

Service was great. Everyone was friendly from the chef to the waitresses.

I had cod fish and chips and the batter for the fish was so light. It was delicious …
Will definitely visit again

There was plenty on the plate to fill me up.

Thank you Cockney king!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPctxIsDioCNHtDpxAAYhY1f2Srus9964yhVyRT&fid=0x0:0xa1a7c30f727a03a6"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Ben","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMdO75c7pKtmWW4Inq6x5zLFzAwsYbogaKQDevnQjFKArZ4r_c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"While the food was decent, the decor is definitely due for a refresh. One notable limitation is that the grilled or steamed options are not available for the All You Can Eat package, which might be a disappointment for some. However, they do offer a floured option for those that don’t enjoy the thick batter. With a bit of renovation and menu tweaking, this place has the potential to become a real catch!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMT1_kV1QcmbYhbztkHnj5WVueGond2RB10ZwS_&fid=0x0:0xa1a7c30f727a03a6"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Joey Carter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVxJhmegLxZTiNK1kFjGHgDdGo3bbkfdT-9_i2VmsPV6_ZjTD9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The fish is all always cooked to perfection and it's very affordably priced..
I felt like I was back in my childhood when you got your fish and chips wrapped in newspaper..
Nostalgically captured by this place..
It's great for all occasions.
Family work friends. It really doesn't matter the event .the atmosphere is viable and will accommodate everyone.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN6pbCVrVGO0oDrs2Xy0YqT1XV7VZa-HasmmoBO&fid=0x0:0xa1a7c30f727a03a6"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Foodie Vancouver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6n06QAfqStqer1ZgBILsv-fiSHmrGRZuznSS1ny9iQFfb_Ognuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place serves the best fish and chips in town! The fish is perfectly crispy on the outside while staying tender and flaky on the inside. The portions are generous, and the prices are very reasonable, making it a great value. The deal gets even better from Monday to Wednesday when they offer an all-you-can-eat option, making it an even more cost-effective choice for a satisfying meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6uXzZ8wfbtm4C0qJdjNtHefRqPWpvhf8olfVq&fid=0x0:0xa1a7c30f727a03a6"],"When":"2024-8-26"},{"Name":"Ziyang Jin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJ6AdinZcjtoXL5RVBKETTmPtxiX1CtA4EGUCvUVB-pkrbpcQq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The fish and chips are really good! The pre-course bread is cold. I like the chips there. The restaurant is a bit crowded and busy since it is very popular.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMP54T11GaWwVmBwL2WhWvNP6MSHAcIP46eFGo4&fid=0x0:0xa1a7c30f727a03a6"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Rozmin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlHgq5dFC4msgLTk2rCaaFQuUCiFzXX2Xk3zNnCe7rKAwcWE4ajQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very friendly, very nice, great at making people feel welcome.  Fish and chips are really good,  but I cannot handle the grease, so that's on me.   I took it to go,  but I think it's better in the restaurant.   Chips were a little soft when I got home.   Again,  on me.   After a while I'll go and try in the restaurant and see if it's better.   Staff are lovely though.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Fanny Yuen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXm8EoBzG77BIIjdpRb_CFwMHE1opsPQ_grOt4OaM_e6SqT8dAD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got the Cod Family Pack and an extra piece of salmon for our family dinner last night. They only started packing my orders when I got there to maintain freshness. Service was fast and efficient. The batter got a bit soggy when I got home but still had a nice crisp to it. The flesh was soft and succulent, and went perfectly well with the tartar sauce. The chips were pretty good as well. Really enjoyed everything and definitely going back for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQ2d3XbJrt_ZXxPCKSWt1fGikVcwHHkfNZBz_2&fid=0x0:0xa1a7c30f727a03a6"],"When":"2023-9-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"W L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK3lEbwV8e2v5in0IhnFqBGUt83IWuJaaihBPoKpdmjx1Wi-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tried the $10 Pho during happy hour.  Also ordered the spring roll and the rainbow chicken.  The spring roll was crispy and delicious.  The rainbow chicken tastes great even without the lime sauce.  Will definitely go back to try more dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTQuYis62Wvb_VpPhPCg3gjc_p-oiMF0-lea2r&fid=0x0:0xcd9bae5f68e59356"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Kanako Sakurada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYybgPjG_d3LYq66Ui47Ocd_2PMrfkKaju5V_L0IyVTR19lQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Excellent happy hour deal (2-6 every day)! Tried $10 pho, $5 spring roll, and $4 drink deal. They were all more than decent with generous portion size. We particularly liked their spring roll a lot. Also liked that they gave us free jug of warm tea free.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9le0i_sy3m1-kYadhnOt9crkjza-Xvk5UYoeB&fid=0x0:0xcd9bae5f68e59356"],"When":"2024-10-31"},{"Name":"Sasha M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXh8nfuiWKfW5815uBhVa2xwuowINKYBPJxDxKXb1cHS2RsR51R=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The restaurant had a cute aesthetic, but both the food and service could use some fine-tuning. We ordered the caramelized prawn and pork belly, salad rolls, the Saigon crepe, and the betel leaf-wrapped beef skewers. Unfortunately, I didn’t enjoy the caramelized dish at all—the shrimp didn’t complement it, and the flavor and texture weren’t appealing. The salad rolls didn’t seem very fresh, though the sauce was nice. The Saigon crepe looked fantastic with its beautiful presentation and assortment of greens, but it lacked flavor and wasn’t worth ordering. As for the beef skewers, they just tasted like regular sausages, so unless that’s what you’re looking for, I’d skip them. Service was okay, though they forgot to put our drink order through. Also, if you’re not a fan of eating dinner to EDM club music, this might not be the best spot for you. I might come back to try their phở, but I’m not sure I will. Overall, for what turned out to be an expensive meal, I was left disappointed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFnyTLBS0iecfp3Wjz252MqvEwjHYnTQfrQ5QO&fid=0x0:0xcd9bae5f68e59356"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"Jessy J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLHNRFw0Z_JgaU0TxGr1Pv5X-w9V6JzR0bnCuTDlGr_7pfsbx_k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice trendy environment for a pho restaurant. We had 5 people and coming on a weekend for dinner and were quickly seated.

We ordered a special happy hour dish with bao and meat inside. It was tiny but delicious!

Spring rolls were deep fried and super yummy.

Pho was ok and small in size giving there’s only one option for size.

Rice dishes were lacking something though. We had 3 rice dishes with pork chop, chili chicken and short rib respectively. The meat seemed dried and the rice texture is different and I think it’s similar to broken rice if you like that texture. But I personally didn’t enjoy it as much.

Basil lime soda is a must! It’s real good!

Chairs had no backing and as trendy as it looks it’s a bit hard to sit.

Servers were busy and a bit too busy to come check on our table.

So over all I would rate it 3.5 star but rounding up.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-v8R11-vaCk0u4vKzrPpwC-QM7_GRWCaf0Vhg&fid=0x0:0xcd9bae5f68e59356"],"When":"2024-11-15"},{"Name":"Alan Chow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPt71-6y5q0wv-VYS50vtwi4S1OxdUfdlrfEZSOhPCLCUyk_sRiA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This Vietnamese restaurant is located on Hastings Street, which is very convenient for taking buses or self driving.

At Happy Hours, offer $10 beef pho at a very attractive price. The beef pho did not decrease in quality due to low prices, and the amount and ingredients were full, and the taste was also good.

However, with too many customers, it is necessary to repeatedly urge them to complete the bill.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGD6I_IodVrLPKhGo62fH6sb_HSK2aP_MvJjGk&fid=0x0:0xcd9bae5f68e59356"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Gloria Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXraEdtzs8pFLfqa5aLhzDZSAL1BhMjv_yg1eMqCSd7Gu8eIyoL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came in at 5 pm on a Saturday and was seated promptly. Happy hour is until 6 pm for seven days a week. We ordered a happy hour pho, both happy hour baos, a happy hour spring roll, the regular carpaccio and the regular wings.

No complaints about the food or service. Would come back for happy hour pho and beer any time.

Really liked the crunch in the carpaccio, but a little on the sweet side. The wings definitely needed the sauce.

It’s a bit loud in the restaurant, but not the worst that we’ve been to.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLvVItjXksiUnj0dM-YP8qD7aCRjnn2Ygr4uAM&fid=0x0:0xcd9bae5f68e59356"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"candy L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgq2OgnXFRsC1icGye-CTgUf_6kEV0cPoOgzI7ANMes5eDT-Xz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I discovered this restaurant through Instagram, especially since a few well-known foodies have featured it on their pages. Their $10 happy hour pho has drawn a lot of attention, often with people lining up to try it. I’ve always thought it would be a good idea to try their pho for just $10, but I never had the chance until now. This weekend, I happened to be in Burnaby, so I decided to visit.
The restaurant’s walls are quite interesting, adorned with vibrant, colorful paintings of Vietnamese culture and people. When we arrived, there were only a few tables occupied, but the wait for our food was still relatively long. Unlike typical Vietnamese restaurants, there were no sauces on the tables, though they did provide a large pot of tea.
We ordered two of their house special soups: Mami’s ‘Real’ Tomato Crab Noodles and the Can Tho Satay Noodles. The crab noodle soup was delicious—not too oily, with a rich, aromatic broth. The crab and pork meatballs were tender and flavorful. However, I wasn’t a fan of the satay noodles. While the broth had a nice satay flavor, the beef slices were overcooked and a bit dry, which didn’t complement the satay taste at all. I ended up only tasting a bit of the soup and meat and didn’t finish it, which was a bit disappointing overall.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPma2zwtAJyNbTVRcifVSC6TaY5paqMXQg6JINC&fid=0x0:0xcd9bae5f68e59356"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Peter Lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWr0VtxYWL_1hzqRKVbnWoHq8x04Iqx72RF9Y2igxgc1xItxY1HPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my first time visiting this restaurant.  The food portion is great. Food is delicious 😋  I will definitely come back again next time. Happy Hour is another bonus.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM41G1PORQEZ8clEdr3mTm1Yo5NJl-skSLq2fm2&fid=0x0:0xcd9bae5f68e59356"],"When":"2024-12-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Michelle M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWeetN-W20mnzvtvgZG8vAeDlWwG6zd354oPCvc1I4B_3Cjy_PI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came to get the special fried cat fish and talapia salad roll and was not disappointed. It was huge and came with plenty of garnishes and the nem nuong and spring rolls adds so much flavour in the rolls. Highly recommend this dish but you have to preorder before you go.

Service is amazing, the owner is attentive and super friendly. We will be back for more food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWgEzKVFkBsyENP-0HGTO5Bxl_hUYDlxZ33F_z&fid=0x0:0x297c29da31d94ee6"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Leon Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPOnBvlGz2k_WzxOhCiURR3aRaAE5ffHXfUBJJ4GP7GBC5Wn8K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Some decent pho at a nice location in Burquitlam. Though unfortunately, I just find their taste alright, and it's definitely on the pricier side of pho. Though I really liked their fried chicken wings, and would highly recommend it :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMl5MKUPzNwpnZtagrI-M8dTJCauMJU_BtHemVz&fid=0x0:0x297c29da31d94ee6"],"When":"2024-5-1"},{"Name":"Ronan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCM0R1wYAh-VWCLLx01FT-k67KqlOcIpmV3maAeao6WAtYaMc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Oh my god.

This was literally the best chicken Banh Mi (viet sub) I've ever had. Absolutely blow away. Came in to pick up a quick late lunch and I did not expect to have my world rocked. For a really fair price I received the freshest bread, flavourful freshly cooked chicken, crisp and delicious vegetables, and a rich yet not overpowering mayo based sauce.

I feel so lucky I stumbled onto this place. I wrote this as soon as I got home.

I feel like I must spread this news to others.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Eduardo De Santiago","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXX7zoZ8q1k7OzwCyqJe0YbJehpsK5rr3AuTOdc0o_j870zolV8Sg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Second time here after 2-3 years since my first visit. I'm disappointed. Mediocre service at best, the spring rolls tasted off, small portions, chicken lemon grass was very thin. The price does not match the flavor.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Y. Cherski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-7SLlKKRW0Rqcp9wRXFlvt6gbh0rtI7PMIroLgxETtGiPwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This concept is indeed something rather unusual. Quite frankly, I wasn't sure in the beginning since I had numerous previous bad experiences with places trying to mix several cuisines. But you know, it turned out to be a pleasant dinner. The menu is very extensive, and we decided to try dishes from both worlds, so to speak. Pho was very decent, can't complain. The sushi dinner box was pretty solid with a good choice of sashimi; however, the tempura batter was pretty thick, almost like for fish and chips. All in all, it was a good experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwQCthwDApYtzmxUsukq45Na1SqZa5VTK-mBFi&fid=0x0:0x297c29da31d94ee6"],"When":"2020-9-11"},{"Name":"Duncan Lu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIXADclZZZ4M3CqJwUtKNK51Od96IV2dMqYnhE9sjQ2_mWiZA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Underrated local spot.

Most things on the menu are quality but I would recommend the fried fish salad roll (order ahead), dry mixed noodle, and any meat that comes off the grill.

Owner is also fun to talk to and makes you feel at home.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nguyệt Phạm (Moon)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3ByLSnjgYi9BN71aQCDwEPqA9OaPalAsQbbxJnilOg_VJ-Ko=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The dishes were amazing, they’re so flavourful. Definitely will comeback!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONh7V1tXMs1i2oyU6_ytyetCdtZ9NrSZWucbKj&fid=0x0:0x297c29da31d94ee6"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Zack Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-_szqoOD2SmzZoWzwSOj6GNx9-wKgxcDZ5n9loOezHcDheCs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The short of it - Food was below average with a salty pho broth devoid of any depth. Service was lacking and portion sizes were small for the price.

Full review - I ordered a small beef pho but the broth was unfortunately just salty and lacked any depth or proper flavor from the herbs/spices that's traditionally used in Pho. The noodles were overcooked and the meat was just average in quality. Price-wise, at $15+, the portion size was the smallest I've ever seen for a bowl of pho in Vancouver. You can get MUCH better for a lesser price just 2 blocks away in the Lougheed area. Try Pho 99 or Pho Capital.

Service-wise, there were 2 staff I interacted with - a girl in her 20s that managed the place and a middle-aged man who's supposedly the cook. Upon seeing me walk in, she didn't bother greeting or even looking at me but grabbed a menu and nonchalantly asked me to sit anywhere. From ordering to payment, it was almost as if she didn't want to be there and/or was standing in for someone else, with almost 0 regard to customer service. The cook brought me my food, and did so without even a word or a greeting; one could fairly assume he's mute.

I don't know where the other reviews are getting this excellent service, delicious food or big portions they speak of, but clearly my experience today was lacking. Ignoring all else, even for just the food, I'd say just avoid this place altogether and go 2 blocks south for a MUCH better experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObIwvv1rxQJFdQ1i3f5MU6vbrRIaevH7z4QUU&fid=0x0:0x297c29da31d94ee6"],"When":"2024-1-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Brian Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI_J6IFhwvFNdDYQi4Tu4tPzIlOFCv5BhF-JgtsgPZXlbTZAg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I went to White Lotus under the recommendation of a friend. Restaurant was decently clean for an asian establishment but cramped with inventory stashed everywhere. Staff was average as expected.

As I was running short on time, I decided to grab takeout. An iced coffee, banh mi and a spring roll/pork vermicelli. I ended up waiting over 20 minutes for a simple order.

On the drive home, I tried the iced coffee and it tasted like water. The banh mi flavour was ok but the bread was hard and a little stale. The vermicelli was by far the worse. It literally looked like someone’s doggy bag leftovers. For a $16 vermicelli, even post covid, I feel is unacceptable. Needless to say, I do not recommend at all.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuwgrJk35qUKbHxo3MdD1P2_sN2BWTMjMmzzPG&fid=0x0:0x2771c935a3b398e1"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Cindy Ly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIzge4iM_AthUe2Y8lEMYg2Y2ExA0fMxlIza7QeGpuo6ooWkw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I didn't hear much good things from this restaurant but wanted to try myself.  I ordered the Bo Ne which is like a Vietnamese breakfast on a hot plate. I liked most of the components when eaten with the fresh French bread. My SO ordered the lemongrass chicken and porkchop on rice.  Chicken was deep fried but had no flavor. The porkchop was better ...cuz I could taste the lemongrass. Spring rolls were also OK.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmALYBn0ORenroDWLPSeKIpG3Ecft_6BsVikAx&fid=0x0:0x2771c935a3b398e1"],"When":"2023-12-28"},{"Name":"Roy Pavithran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUisVEx1KPdsNvsiDSaj5xrPz4-TDKiLVGBnR6psffAhZ3qSzUY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Randomly found this place. Loved the food. So flavourful and done right 👍🏻. Would definitely go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOoNjDZY-J-ZVETWK2ijesnztqKWNlpW06PUqJa&fid=0x0:0x2771c935a3b398e1"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Alice Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXTPkRrQ6W1dz8By5LftDR2vLe9Oipjh9hCv9PREFtaQ99ibTK7vQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their Bun Bo Hue - Spicy Beef Noodle Soup is very good and authentic taste. The staffs were very nice and friendly. I will come more often to try other foods 👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOC69MXiJHYkqK5_sCjCpAFO88sCCbS-OascgKa&fid=0x0:0x2771c935a3b398e1"],"When":"2024-4-19"},{"Name":"Savannah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVn2CD0vRivO2-5giVteHZMjb-4fmhyLsD9FrkqVRezsAZo_yk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such good Vietnamese food!

The staff were so kind. The food was very flavourful. I got take out and the presentation was still on par. I could not get enough of the food, seriously so delicious.

I recommend White Lotus Cafe for your next dinner spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnQkFRP6gunHjrJuDay9eY1arnpbKnbB6AcLQ&fid=0x0:0x2771c935a3b398e1"],"When":"2023-6-28"},{"Name":"Jason York","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2KL5JJiTZL1QVt_3AcqILQXXBIuqDWdYOdj3lYENvavlAma6S8A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Try the Beef Stew, it's rich and flavourful... I recommend getting a baguette with it to dip (the baguette has a crunchy exterior, but not so crunchy that it cuts the inside of your mouth, and the inside is super fluffy and moist.... One of the best baguettes I've ever had at a Vietnamese Restaurant... I'm sure the Banh Mi are amazing here).

Decent prices, great food, fair portion sizes.  Highly recommend as a regular go-to spot for lunch.

I do wish they offered the Vietnamese Spring Rolls (made using rice paper wraps and deep fried), but I understand that takes a lot of time and effort.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnKaC36cDhCyyAa-FnB87pM2iq0L6fHLdZbIps&fid=0x0:0x2771c935a3b398e1"],"When":"2023-4-2"},{"Name":"Ally","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqFYAadl94hU3u4qsTOP-DsDPFgI5gKdALBiWpnDIYxP3FLc3dOg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really really enjoyed this place. Their food is great and pricing is also very reasonable. They have the Vietnamese breakfast platter similar to lunch lady but in my opinion has much more variety and authentic ingredients. The service is great and they had so many dishes that were brought me nostalgia of my grandmothers home cooked meals. Their bread is really fluffy and soft although the outside was a bit hard and sensed it wasn’t made that day. Breakfast platter and rice plates are the way to go.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKp6dC4SvrpGUINPtz5pNlb5RwCVhTIdtqN0h2&fid=0x0:0x2771c935a3b398e1"],"When":"2023-1-4"},{"Name":"Angela Couldwell Torres","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJt98BQmMncCE40rgFoHcbinh47GJllePvqjkPeRh6C9PUoJw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Recommended by friend. My son had satay pho with rare beef. I had the appie platter. Was very good, didn't try pork pattie on plate but son said tasty & good sear on it. He liked his pho too. Will be back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2PIinWkAS1JJ4ynjAlS-LqTjUn56Ub3dj4_jZ&fid=0x0:0x2771c935a3b398e1"],"When":"2024-1-20"}]

title: Okoman Restaurant
descriptions: Modest Japanese operation offering hot dishes plus creative sushi rolls in a low-key setting.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ryan Southammavong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVh8o-pxWVIlQNZDf2Nte8EUhfgdUx01mnokoWB28zeukk7BRY5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Oh my goodness, if I lived near Okoman, I would come here every day.

Came here on a whim, and was blown away at the taste and portion sizing for the price. It was so good, we forgot to do the spin the wheel promotion because we were too busy eating 😂

Service was also very friendly, and ordering was quick and painless.

Would highly recommend visiting. I know I'll be back for more 👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzzQ_5pO8c0fY-ftie4ptuuKBEKiIUkq6XWx-4&fid=0x0:0x686607091da421b1"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Tenzin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxWJE35WyXsGx2oe4qvB4MhP82OK4K0qg20emdDAzgOrvEHD_-6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I don't usually come here often, but since this restaurant is under new management, I thought, why not give it a try? The food was great, and the atmosphere was fantastic. The only issue was that the soup was a little watery, though it still tasted good. The prices were reasonable, and the server was kind and friendly. Overall, it was a wonderful dining experience.

Also they have this 'Spin the Wheel' for 1 per table, at the moment where you can get it for free. I got spring rolls. Get it before it's too late.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvM8QM1GVktuZ0DYo19WtMad2g8EHmVpuQIXnL&fid=0x0:0x686607091da421b1"],"When":"2024-7-11"},{"Name":"Vernessa Lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_HMcx5wd1O28ySlJt9n4oU_hrqSI6Z05JLm6P-8L--a68NBo5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"server was rather forgetful and we were constantly pressing the service button.
food was decent but the bc roll was half cold half hot. salmon kama was hot and sizzling which was really good. they do not have hot water, only tea and cold water.
nabeyaki udon portion is huge, with 2 shrimp tempura. toro nigiri was mediocre.
croquettes were also decent, but the sauce was a little too salty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0MmlwbmfnHltpDEqK1013XLunzcud1ajcgMnG&fid=0x0:0x686607091da421b1"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Rizz Jiwani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTew7dK9q3uANEsUytYwhG0VuweSPyGMBtmXvYQ48PFOlnL59z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food and service were both fantastic. The salmon and tuna sashimi were incredible, as were the udon and crispy chicken don.

The team was very accommodating and they have these cute booths that seat up to six. They serve ice cold draft Asahi as well as bottle Sapporo.

To top that off their tempura ice cream was delectable.

You can't go wrong at Okomon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEoWDpNml3Q1SRRdvDDVaZl7vkh2seGX-Ia807&fid=0x0:0x686607091da421b1"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Kathryn Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJKgB7jdBXIyD5Uu7vwaGmE7lPWFMIsY-rVf4MQwWgM20Sc9js=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"the tuna and salmon tasted really really fresh, and the tempura was one of the crispiest we've had! we were seated in a booth so the atmosphere was great and felt private. i appreciate that the music wasn't too loud that we could carry a conversation easily. the staff were super friendly and accomodating to our request (we don't like cucumbers). one of the only places to get sushi in the late evening and we're looking forward to coming back to try other dishes! 💯💯","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOerbVz6XYbpKHWXUYhlZBAq-IdkA7S9ZiaTBrq&fid=0x0:0x686607091da421b1"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Wilson Tsang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVufk0Ck6GGcvT3lCx4gca1TgL9QQkht7NZnhrHDLA-bKOs5wY1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Spicy Chirashi Don was delicious and the Grilled Salmon Kama (neck) was crispy on the outside and full of yummy fatty meat on the inside. The kids had a party tray 1 and loved it. BC roll had crispy salmon skin inside. Highly recommend for a family sushi night! Currently there is a spin the wheel promo for doing a google review.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4QNVJ5KJbHswtv-rpEbOQmhXq2iiLWsFBNuyZ&fid=0x0:0x686607091da421b1"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Sigma Queen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKBdBcCgBD6K_lzj4alsWx8tk4UEtmeKyVu37zccdoxGExITg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a gem of a place. I understand it’s under new management which may be why it isn’t at least a 4.5. The portions and quality were amazing. We each ordered a bento box and had enough for a second meal. Eat in, they have cute Japanese style booths. Worth a visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvr7ET1FZTi4B8askY2dA93iyyUnCYSh7ouekp&fid=0x0:0x686607091da421b1"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"Ron Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4C9fuu3Pgu102q3bAxHKivkiOQqwqKjJditkVdy4zIZ628gCE7g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"These are the items I ordered
Toro sashimi 5 PC's
Tuna gomae
Black dragon roll
Df chicken gizzards

Came around noon and lots of seats available, server was pleasant and fast.

Toro sashimi was delicious, portion size was comparable to other places.

Tuna gomae was average, I find the portion size a bit small.

Black dragon roll was beautifully presented, ingredients were fresh, will order again.

Chicken gizzards was dry and hard, probably will try the squid tempura next time.

I sat in a booth and the dining environment was cozy and private.

Music was at the right volume.

Plenty of parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYlZyu9JAw-ru5ql6iGeJJnFjS8D9hGMiQ8_5H&fid=0x0:0x686607091da421b1"],"When":"2024-7-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Taha Rana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvkg4h5sHYdPTTUvMGr5Ud3Br1PeSfw04_pdtFZLfwqdlzD0w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently ordered from Pizza Art, and in my opinion, it’s the best pizza place in Vancouver. The flavors are mouthwatering, and the pizzas arrived at my door piping hot, thanks to their impressively fast service. Not only is the food excellent, but the prices are also very reasonable for the quality you get. I highly recommend Pizza Art to anyone in Vancouver looking for amazing food, great value, and top-notch service. You won’t be disappointed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZdMJpVwyDVMBoiIvbMf17TPN6S1RWppFICw6Z&fid=0x0:0x76b8930cd5c9555c"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Vinos Hussein","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxLtCv5eMd7wQwArLYuM-f4KJiYda5OXU7ncG5snDbcZBCX4bM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I visited this place for the first time and was disappointed with the food quality. Unfortunately, it seemed like they warmed up old food, which affected the taste and freshness. Hoping they'll improve their food handling and preparation for future customers."

Or, if you want a concise version:

"Disappointing first visit. Food tasted old and reheated. Hope they improve their food quality","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUk6UMAq_WguYJJyEK3qRgsEGeA9I9oIlq1keg&fid=0x0:0x76b8930cd5c9555c"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Rene Gonzalez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJ3ZH_qUkSLgPD9auCI270E3xiDxiNYPNzskd1zZQmwECCVpbV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great place! The pizzas are really good. The place is small so you may order in advance. And you don’t need to wait.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1H0FDUr-JJYdiPhkjQbjQk8v86mXDae_A_goi&fid=0x0:0x76b8930cd5c9555c"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"fahim kobar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-IDVaMHp3yv6UGzzKL36SRavxrP6iP06-M_NNasY5ZwdBqAG3=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"In my opinion, it has the highest quality and most delicious pizza. My kids and I love its pizzas. It has good staff, especially a lady named Sayeda, who is very kind and friendly. I recommend it to everyone.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sadaf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcNefkpZxsIb5pxyoPEU29o4uowkCf5KmZzg9jwvJP-vSiwX98=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I moved recently near Pizza art and went to try this place randomly. Their pizza is a must have! I tried their chicken tandoori pizza and it was delicious! Even the corner of pizza tasted good! They served in fresh even at 10pm night! Plus their garlic dip tasted very well!
I did not quietly liked the hot wings though! The sauce was good but the chicken had an awful smell! But do try out the pizza!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPG2zviz1OAeo3QPPf-Fa3vhn6HilDVl5RcNlye&fid=0x0:0x76b8930cd5c9555c"],"When":"2023-7-10"},{"Name":"Sadam Niazi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJCQexg6cCjcIhr-mFNr1s8vz2wQKNVr33tx8IjK253IdjZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pizza Art is hands down the best pizza spot around! The food was amazing, with fresh ingredients and perfectly baked crust. What made the experience even more special were Saida and Sendi—Saida provided exceptional service, and Sendi made sure the pizza was top-notch. Highly recommend this place for a great meal and friendly atmosphere!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hamidreza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNMQAJz_-70SwSmNjXROQjFeSm699Odx9NUs0t_jGWS4x3do7EmQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"After waiting an hour for my order, it arrived with a missing item. Instead of offering proper compensation as a gesture of goodwill, they only provided store credit for the missing food. A little basic customer care goes a long way!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Feyzullah 35","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRgIQbIL93tAhW1xxJKdSNzosUaoeLyzlB-mIBArE73ygQgYJ0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pizza Art is amazing! This is my second visit here, and everything is just perfect. The pizzas were loaded with fresh ingredients and their flavors were exceptional. Moreover, the staff provides extremely friendly. They fulfilled all my requests quickly and accurately. I would highly recommend this place to everyone.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3P5jv3wpxQtDCrcuJrtIe5jm9CEmPBO_ttC7a&fid=0x0:0x76b8930cd5c9555c"],"When":"2023-9-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"helia azad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVL0oNnAUx_tWjUSI4W6cVxaN-ZKdPS1tV3z8Q09IRAzXgVEW8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am so grateful for this restaurant to have made our wedding dinner so spectacular. Shakiba has done a lot to make it extra special. This is our top 1 Iranian restaurant in Lower Mainland. Such a great costumer service. Their Koubideh and Joujeh Kabab which we ordered tasted like the best restaurants in Iran.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdhQfbhTyQ1TcaWcDQ--C_Kf-LY9WVtbFdcZ4B&fid=0x0:0xe86da6703e55e28a"],"When":"2024-2-12"},{"Name":"Ethan S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXiEvWL_EmGbw7lQnpt_RQwPNPKLiSE6o_ykgcB7esIpvLOzZ00=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered the vasiri kebab for takeout. The food was nicely packaged in a container. Generous amount of food, especially the meat portion. The rice was a bit dry to my liking but could just be my preference. When I picked up the food the restaurant had good atmosphere and setting. Overall would reorder when I crave kebabs.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOf1YEwdTeAaHiuRMHIQ0yBuUiVCEwfT3qyrVLk&fid=0x0:0xe86da6703e55e28a"],"When":"2023-7-3"},{"Name":"Mojgan C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUNQdX0o-yiYGAfPntN7LgWcnsDUW0pZ6gq07bo-q0bNGM-MX2TVA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I ordered food through Ubereats and such a disappointment. The meet was uncooked and not eatable. The eggplant stew was so tasteless with big uncooked meet pieces.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXjTkweE9aGB9LZdL2IUDu1cL-vEJgIBiPFa22&fid=0x0:0xe86da6703e55e28a"],"When":"2023-6-15"},{"Name":"S Man","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLn28ZSzxsRWx-BXlwIwUrPV4yTq9Mq3Vc9B8eaa--gvAlCn6pq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Its a take out so we are mainly talking about food which is good. I never had any issues. Happy customer! Yay!
However if only they could be more organized. I picked up my order once to only get called out to return it as it was the wrong order, it was a hassle! Another time they forgot to include the olive dip and had to be refunded. Hassle! You pay, you get your food and you want to eat in Peace!
I've seen the young lady at the front on her phone all the time. I know it's not your dream job but if it's paying your bills get more serious and pay attention. That's my rant. Overall I'm happy they are in my neighborhood and I can eat good now! Lol
Merci","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Masih","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0xSIhIGS0oedvbjEAVVJdYz4m74SaNila5kB_oETeHG8sWabGmA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Noon and Rayhoon persian restaurant delivers high quality, generous portions, and affordable prices. It stands out as the premier choice in the Burnaby area, surpassing competitors like Suren and Cazba.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"M P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLwAW1Vk6SfsLn-RC66Qt4gVb2t4qqApft1zeLBCr811unVdmM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This was the second time I ordered from you
However the first time which was for 3 weeks ago was a pleasant experience and this time was a bad experience.  The kebab was too dry and hard to chew. Koobideh was too thick. Rice was dry. And also usually all the persian restaurants serve sumac and few other things for takeout however our meals didn't have anything. So disappointing tonight.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Amin Eyalati","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8t0AZ34i9OvQdM42ePdxy01MTumlOwCLxp-9QoL96NuQvcA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best persian food in town by distance! I have tried almost every other persian restaurant! This one doesn't disappoint 👏 generous portions, nice packaging and great food presentation. Super tasty! Friendly staff and welcoming atmosphere! Highly recommend! Keep up the great work","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bhagya Karu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJGvd-O_FOtedcwwCG6zllKuUFFKwmoEuvi2eMEjfJU10pj8g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food, and great portion sizes. Prices are reasonable. Overall one of the best Persian restaurants I have ever been to..","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Brayden M.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPBZNPVNqHW8dSCFike-NLUMkuCrsmT6ZW7ysivwMhyRbgUxkL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Thank you Fatburger for a great lunch today! The place is sparkling clean with nice decor (though the outside is unremarkable), and the staff were great.\nMy Classic Fatburger tasted amazing, and came stuffed with toppings like lettuce, pickles, tomato, and barbeque sauce, all free. The meat is crispy, the fries are hot and fluffy, and their classic milkshakes are creamy and satisfying.\nWe will definitely be coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTfEcwdVZUsAYQDbRydKumDtnC6WYRqOfeLdaD\u0026fid=0x0:0xde4abeef51a36651"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Solé","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL6tW3qBOM-tqXIBTR7vgyrHGmxwXbtOn_lvp4ZZcBoF7gUPCA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic place to have a burger and milkshake, but this location is especially nice. The cashier and cooks were beyond friendly, had excellent service and great product knowledge. This is a really nice burger joint for affordable lunch and great service. I would 100% recommend this Fatburger location above all others. Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4P1T2FVUFviGMc9FWpt9RnJWsVK_Y7BGNTeYR\u0026fid=0x0:0xde4abeef51a36651"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"Ricardo Mora","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQVp_1Kdmb6xiATtz_yqfTFWm44W3Jnav4oY8-Mi5roQX200DIOw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been with my family multiple times on this location and EVERYTIME THE EMPLOYEE  GURU , has been really friendly making us feel special guests,  willing to give us the best service,  he is a valuable person and employee. Great service from him","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVSQTFw2KWSbHiywUesceHSAVXgONbtux9CzR-\u0026fid=0x0:0xde4abeef51a36651"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Harshdeep Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJbXinlEZ-TileUDHV87fKTOhQFy-EGTsw7U4CoP0Tz2wn2zg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a wonderful experience today at the restaurant the person ( Guru )taking my order was brilliant person. Their Oreo shake and the curly fries are my absolute favourite, although the fries today were a little extra cooked but everything else was awesome.😇","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Emilie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINBA2dcaLJpvKBu6WUpF-u40Klx2AHogwLxG_SrDai5QuKr-hO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"They presented a satisfying normal fast food cheeseburger closest u can get to in n out not cheap though. The decorations are funny","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzfooFwqFexu9UYDHqSNhW6Vmc8ha8JI_RnPBx\u0026fid=0x0:0xde4abeef51a36651"],"When":"2024-7-8"},{"Name":"Carol Wal.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmaEoaKXJ-LJbZu9x6VXOl8dM3-bKZExckrX8F7_7T88DDxKbn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a positive and happy team! Love this restaurant! Great service \u0026 tasty food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdlvBLFHqDNNs5vYTiZBDz_1dE0Wx15jDvo-MQ\u0026fid=0x0:0xde4abeef51a36651"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"John Robison","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK4kCw5ZvQ_VI0D9I8u8Ld1ecjqqyJS6Qo2jOg9sJX2WrKYDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"It had been many years since I had visited this location.  It's definitely not held to the standards of the Broadway store or Walnut Grove Langley location.  The food was good but the the place needs a good cleaning. Garbage was overflowing.  The man trying to clean the tables needs training.  The fountain pop machine needs the lines flushed. The back of the chairs may have never been wiped. The floors needs a steam clean. Was really disappointed.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jatinder Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI0WZp7gmpMCWfNRgyXjn2UckTRtKJ3mss4wPerJE9LKsU9Gw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered 8 hot boneless wings but they gave me 6chicken tenders tossed in hot sauce. At least they should have informed me that they were out of regular boneless wings. I ended up throwing it away.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBwm1jchkvZouKSqCotcSvxQUTBb7nQhucka7b\u0026fid=0x0:0xde4abeef51a36651"],"When":"2024-7-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Charmaine H.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZsUZPMo_fWyRKGOsCfgoFkzE2WCAA6dK-4Yv43wXpchCV7vCc9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"After a road trip, I was craving comfort food, and nothing beats a good bowl of congee. We ordered the house special congee and the mixed beef rice roll pot—everything was absolutely delicious and hit the spot. The service was quick, the food was flavorful, and parking was easy to find. I’ll definitely be back to try more dishes!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJ1DVe7fhCWgC8iGo0RxshzIJ_8KTX_wZ-8Iio&fid=0x0:0x80b70cd79853b88"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Esther","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWm4MrcOMcE-MmdjBoKAjDTfZHS26hzehvqwvBxROz7rHTb9kPKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered their chicken and beef roll.
Tbh the chicken and beef were very fatty. The chicken was mostly skin, and the beef was so fatty. I wish it was leaner. I ended up not eating the meat.
The rice roll was incredible though. Big portion and the soy sauce is also amazing🤩
There’s a 25 cent extra if you pay with card and spend below $25.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLsISXk8KoYCP7UTv77mFZGOkhVcFq1Otnpp-K&fid=0x0:0x80b70cd79853b88"],"When":"2024-11-21"},{"Name":"Robert L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-9tmacw2d7mEoS9jo6IRNi8WC5iGvlOPyb07RToKkYebkGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice to have a good congee option outside of Richmond, quality of food is fresh and hot, quality of service is quick and accommodating, and dining area is maintained very clean. We enjoyed the old-school chinese music. Very asian local kinda restaurant. Simple menu, congee, rice roll and most importantly instant noodle with spam and eggs. Sometimes the simplicity good. Only con, their hk style lemon tea is Nestea with lemon. Not OG hk lemon tea. But not enough to deserve a drop in rating. Spicy wonton is good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhdZEjK_SwHGN0TnvzNAcprcfAhA2NQrjQBOJD&fid=0x0:0x80b70cd79853b88"],"When":"2024-4-28"},{"Name":"Tracy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJTZ9WS5t-EwmmGYfwb8oxU5Ml1l5GP8QXsDp7QRvBqsNy2-w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good place for comfort Chinese food! Had a good assortment of congee, rice noodles and stir fried noodles. It’s a no fuss restaurant and the price is really decent. We ordered 4 dishes and a drink for $50 Including tip!

We ordered congee, shrimp and beef rice roll, Chinese donut and the siu mai and rice roll with peanut and hoisin sauce, and lastly an iced lemon tea which was plenty for 2 adults and 2 kids.

A note is that they do accept credit and debit but it has to be over $20! Overall I enjoyed it and we will probably be coming back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVun7qNRq5BgA7NwxknEY4An3Kpfk_Fb3gPq3c&fid=0x0:0x80b70cd79853b88"],"When":"2024-4-28"},{"Name":"Penny Rusty Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkGfXMIDqwS_yD1axTk6tkHoLsnybE2ErvKrHMoMIElMJWekI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It seems like there are a lot of rice roll places popping up around town and I'm not opposed to it.

Tried the shrimp and beef rice rolls which were petty good. We were intrigued by the shu mai rice rolls and they turned out exactly like you would expect... Mini shu mai dumplings on top of plain mini rice rolls with a hoisin/peanut sauce. While the dumplings themselves weren't anything to write home about, the dish actually worked.

They did forget our spicy wontons order so we had to ask them about it. When it arrived, it didn't seem too spicy. Fortunately, they have spicy chili oil at the table that you can add to your dishes.

Update: March 2024. Revisited for breakfast recently and tried their pan fried radish cake (along with a shrimp and scallop rice roll and a mixed meat rice roll). Love the crispy bottom of the radish cake and the soft inner parts.

Update Jul 2024: Revisited and ordered the shrimp and beef rice roll, bbq pork rice roll,  and potstickers. Really liked the potstickers (and the black vinegar dipping sauce). Liked that the bbq pork was chopped up instead of just being big pieces.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKLWDGEvGhFnMAjKWeAxC2C70r7wrvSD3nKM43&fid=0x0:0x80b70cd79853b88"],"When":"2023-5-7"},{"Name":"Keekee Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWycy2aaMjXu8DrA0EFyYYbM6_UkdUarXUrCZG-_abxm8QV1jLr=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love my neighbourhood cheung fun & congee place!  The best comfort food you’ll need after a long week or on rainy cozy weather, like a warm fuzzy hug!  They also have bomb fried noodles dishes & rice roll hot pot!  & may is the kindest person x","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQ-TYXQOi90lbo5lwqboRMVmtUSb5wzATBGN-H&fid=0x0:0x80b70cd79853b88"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Anthony Plaxen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0TosyGAQWTqM_XvTHaXfq2jDGHv6ifKWBgTGcJKYnap3ceipL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came in for lunch today, I have always wanted to try this place out and I was in the mood for some rice rolls.

Nice little place in Burnaby, I have to say for rice rolls and congee it is just okay, not spectacular but okay and more than decent.

They have a special combo before 11:30, congee and any rice roll for 15$ which is a good deal. Quality of the food is average-good and the congee was okay, nothing too extravagant or anything. This is a good place if you want rice rolls and don’t want to drive all the way to Richmond. I would give it a 4/5, the toppings on the rice roll could use a bit of work! Friendly staff though!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3ZZD1TyETtP0NgTh9EbYqbhlq2HCvsmddGisO&fid=0x0:0x80b70cd79853b88"],"When":"2023-7-26"},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It seems like restaurants specializing in Chinese rice rolls are gradually popping up more and more these days. Most of them seem to be in Richmond; when we heard of May Rice Roll & Congee in North Burnaby, we had to go check them out!

Shrimp and Scallop Rice Roll
Doughnut Stick Rice Roll
Sliced Fish Congee
Sliced Fish & Beef Congee
Chinese Doughnut

The rice rolls here were not as smooth, slippery and thin as other rice rolls we've had. These weren't bad though. They're a pretty good option for anyone who lives in Burnaby and doesn't want to drive all the way to Richmond. Chinese Doughnut and Congee were both very nicely done. It's a solid place to go to for these Chinese comfort foods.

Service: Good
Parking: Free parking on the street
Location: 4530 Hastings St., Burnaby","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvSzSvY3lMSeErOCecK2t108E_hDl7vuHcPnTy&fid=0x0:0x80b70cd79853b88"],"When":"2023-5-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Janice Laurence","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgGiARtxUUGR63l9LM545vDhLCLuOK2x7cRBEC-4lmilyhcS2H=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This Pokerrito is no longer accessible and needs to install a ramp for wheelchair users.  I just tagged them on Instagram.  Let's see if that works. Accessibility should not be ignored.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2vEFfTh3AHvphXlj1OwO8TyafdOpfnPnY9n9J&fid=0x0:0x235e024e9ba1823e"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mahalo iā 'oe !! A flawlessly delicious experience as always at my favorite one-stop Poké shop in Van! Iwill never, ever get sick of chowing down on that super yummy spicy Wakame from pokerrito, my favorite and a game changer for sure!
I went for my standard BYOB Tofu Poké Bowl with all the veggie toppings. That thing was super tasty, awesome mix of flavors with wholesome ingredients and a very plentiful generous portion at a very reasonable price. Even via UberEats, the portion and flavor is exactly on point with what I have had when visiting in branch. The taste and grade of the poke scoops was incredible, fresh and vibrant, I cannot describe how yummy this was. I also especially S/O digged their Wasabi Basil dressing, never seen it before and a must have topping for the perfect Poke.
The staff are super talented at making delicious grub and also super nice people. Remember your Pokkerito rewards so get saving for those scoops ya'll!
Support BC businesses!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJ79seYLCN-OKfP954FlCcw_CDQDsmOjZNj02r&fid=0x0:0x235e024e9ba1823e"],"When":"2022-7-7"},{"Name":"Timothy Perry","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUi6Xk3qO-5AzktIK326wyx_c_Jk8qdsOt_-BhbZT_azikAIMQo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been here few times and it’s an absolutely amazing poke place. I always build my bowl and get all the toppings I need and it never disappoints. Really good food for a good price. I tried their chicken, salmon sockeye and shrimp and it’s just amazing. A must try place for poke bowl lovers. Check out if you’re in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkRixghUhx37atYIc4vspD_8iMKAkZ6exEfZNg&fid=0x0:0x235e024e9ba1823e"],"When":"2023-5-30"},{"Name":"Maryam BG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYOocnrrI0wz1xy1UzzrfX002uyW86PfiNNhxdXyfBusTbUhlS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great customer service, she was patient with my questions and provided information about the menu options, the wrap was delicious as well!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1WdxXoXogILXZaiGoVnN8dAPGJidFwICC9Jwp&fid=0x0:0x235e024e9ba1823e"],"When":"2024-4-26"},{"Name":"Nina An","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL6F9XSydfDTa2mYP-dTECmF7atQ7uDmOV71aP5eyZXoLhW-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hands down the best poke place in town. 😍I usually order the bowl but today I felt like switching it up a bit and they did not disappoint! Still a great portion with guaranteed fresh ingredients :) Don’t forget to add crispy onions!! 😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLeorrL_cnChGeup195gMdbClnP7Q8jKJESFYr&fid=0x0:0x235e024e9ba1823e"],"When":"2022-6-17"},{"Name":"Harmony L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX97YbJGgDhkixIysmAg7LhUzPTaejTdbO1bqSQ6PGEFlgRkbJniA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I ordered a Build your own Bowl online with their Grand Opening promotion. The interior of the restaurant is bright and clean with a few tables for dine-in.  I ordered Salmon and Albacore tuna for my proteins and opted to have it torched for extra $1 but sadly they did not torch my protein :(
All the ingredients were fresh and tasty and I quite enjoyed my poke bowl but missing an option that I had to pay extra for was really disappointing. Another thing I would like to suggest is to dice up the jalapeños into smaller pieces as having a giant slice all in one bite is a bit too intense. It would be more enjoyable with diced jalapeños throughout the bowl and not whole slices that just kill your tongue in one bite lol.
I would recommend to try but some improvements could be made :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvUVbgviEsjm0LwApalpBAn7S5U0b-fU_GaQBS&fid=0x0:0x235e024e9ba1823e"],"When":"2022-6-5"},{"Name":"Sarah Alencar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVb28kDusXrFF3n8b8p62yi1D-DXvRa876XYguUWAxIia0-g5MH=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food! I just got obsessed with it! Employees also very nice!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlldbL_ityrgo8-riAh7y6F0OfgVAWaZzt8TwO&fid=0x0:0x235e024e9ba1823e"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"Could Be Anyone","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDAY50cq8NO-5jug61JWxmHG47SdtUaIM2tQjh7NIRoIRAN-Gn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m so happy that instead of a sushi they opened up a poke place. The portion are huge even if you take a regular bowl. Food is fresh and of a great quality. A bit pricey (~20$ a bowl incl tips). Perfect for take out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNv4vUNTLGoTLsagKcvBlOM3c0hTxw-xpMOnGe&fid=0x0:0x235e024e9ba1823e"],"When":"2022-9-24"}]
