user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Johnny C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMH8aFZIGB5a7CFStbNQ6JGT0sYgxOttD7xMtIebcz8N9tnSzq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I had dim sum here.  Dim sum food quality was OK / average.  With the price I paid per dish I expected higher quality food.  The fancy BBQ pork  buns that resemble teddy bears was more of a novelty item.  Taste like a regular oven baked BBQ pork bun.  Like most Chinese dim sum restaurants, tea is charged per person.  I gave this restaurant 5 stars for atmosphere and cleanliness.  Washroom is relatively clean.  Restaurant is bright and new.  Street parking is pay parking.  There is an adjacent parking lot to the restaurant but not sure if that is for Delta hotel or for Grand Neptune Restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOTZ21uuiJ0axzAv3c1Ca7BR5eQHUzp_rrikX_&fid=0x0:0xe6f3e47e2e7b6766"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"William Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmQdctlbM12t5Occdf84xI_X4OatAdUnoO7Mf5nuujaBWYasmgPA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is delicious and you get what you pay for in portion size (ie. expensive but big).

Parking is still the same parking lots next to the restaurant and casino as it was for Grand Dynasty.

Service has been pretty good so far in that they take orders and bring food pretty quick. Occasional tea refreshes too.

The dining room is always busy but the wait for a table has never been long so far. Grand Dynasty has always been a long lineup, even with a reservation.

This restaurant seems more like a Neptune Palace than your average Nepture restaurant so hopefully they keep up this service level and food.

This is definitely one of my regular dim sum restaurants.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjkcG0ltUkHx7QUH68WSxNU2erZGnMJK9bRzyM&fid=0x0:0xe6f3e47e2e7b6766"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Michelle M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWeetN-W20mnzvtvgZG8vAeDlWwG6zd354oPCvc1I4B_3Cjy_PI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m not really a huge fan of dimsum but this is somewhere I don’t mind coming back to. Large spacious and clean restaurant and the service doesn’t suck. They were efficient and nice. My absolute favourite is the hello kitty lava bun, it was oozing with salted egg yolk filling. So be careful it’s very hot and squirts out fast.

Presentation is beautiful and everything is delicious and authentic. There was a truffle dumpling which was delightful. Will definitely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0QJj__o3v99WSD-oWU4xGB2karHcU-GX61S8e&fid=0x0:0xe6f3e47e2e7b6766"],"When":"2024-6-3"},{"Name":"Eric Kai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCOLk8-mjvhpSR12EJotpxRvjvIiQ_UdrC5p4HYR6W4YWF1IXW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Ever since the Neptune group took over this location, the quality and atmosphere changed for the worse. The food doesn’t taste as good as before but they use animal shaped food to lure the kids. I came for dim sum and one of the manager came and asked if we want soy sauce chicken coz the chicken was good. We said yes and he then further asks if we want lobster and crab, which is when we start to feel uncomfortable. We were there for a casual dim sum, not to spend big bucks on seafood. Turns out the HALF chicken was $33.80. Which is 3x the price of any other dish we got. We had 3 adult and 1 child and end up spending $45 per person including including the child. It is also worth noting they charge 2% service fee if you pay by credit card. This is just bad service. You can charge more per dish, but don’t nickel & dime me like this. We probably should have asked the price before saying yes, but we still feel cheated and will refuse to go to any of the Neptune affiliated restaurants.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHJBK1SUSeyncwMo5-bHD34FFT1z8tMHuvUciZ&fid=0x0:0xe6f3e47e2e7b6766"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"Penny Rusty Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkGfXMIDqwS_yD1axTk6tkHoLsnybE2ErvKrHMoMIElMJWekI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Newish addition to the Neptune restaurant group and located in the former Grand Dynasty location at Grand Villa.

Our first visit was for dim sum. Most items were top notch as can be expected from Neptune and included a light passion fruit mousse which was not too sweetor too tart. The deep fried taro dumplings with pork and fried shrimp had the prefect creamy consistency. Steamed bean curd wraps had big shrimp filling inside. Also enjoyed the chiu chow dumplings and the baked bbq pork buns with cookie top. Rounded out our meal with the lychee and mango rabbit and the Chinese donut rice roll (liked the green onions but the Chinese donut wasn't crisp enough).

Update: Feb 26, 2024
Back in late February, Grand Neptune was heavily promoting a special AYCE king crab at $200/person. We obviously couldn't eat that much king crab to make it worthwhile so we went with their ala carte pricing of $26.99/lb. That pricing is the best I've seen in years and was only available for a week.

This was one of the better king crab meals that I've had for a long time. We opted to have it prepared steamed with garlic for the legs, spicy fried knuckles, and with baked Portuguese rice in the shell. Each dish was great but we were really impressed with the rice... creamy and full of shrimp, scallop, and king crab meat. We added a dish of stir fried pea tips in garlic sauce and they were nicely prepared and crisp to the bite.

The king crab was 6.75lbs which worked out to $182.18 + $25.88 for preparing it and and extra $38.80 for the Portuguese fried rice (well worth the price).

Update: Mar 10, 2024 Another visit for dim sum...
Chiu chow dumplings $9.80 had large filling contained in the thin wrapper.  Mango pudding was sweet and refreshing $8.35. Deep fried pork dumplings (aka footballs) had a nice crisp which contained the mochi-like texture surrounding the pork filling $9.8. The bean curd wrap dumplings $10.80 had big filling a well and turned out perfectly.

Pan fried shrimp and chive dumplings $10.80 were good but I actually liked it better when I mixed it with the ginger and green onion sauce that came with the crab. Oh, did I mention they did a good job of convincing us to get their crab special?

I mean, $20 for a ginger and green onion crab is a pretty good deal. Even though the crab wasn't huge, it was well prepared.

We also wound up ordering the strawberry coconut bunny $7.95 as they had a guy carrying these around to the tables. It was cute and jiggled to the touch. Not much strawberry flavour tho.

Update September 2024:
Ordered the steamed spicy beef tripe which was both tender and spicy. Eggplant with shrimp paste was good too. Chiu chow dumplings, pan fried turnip cakes and mango gelatin rounded out our meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyo79tWWIJJqGPzTOtzV4wp_Y7hJ-oHOtJSSV5&fid=0x0:0xe6f3e47e2e7b6766"],"When":"2024-3-14"},{"Name":"Ping D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-_KBk5-yIGzGmKAkX1L-6QPRrz_RZKkgRnIY4il5exhoL_sw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Large menu selections and appealing dim sum. Definitely a good place for special occasions. Service seems better than other usual dim sum but food is quite pricy. Dim sum platter needs to be ordered in advance; it’s a fun experience but I doubt if I will get it again due to the pricing reason.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNv3hOIcVehRG8kpjFE2z8_pqThHw0A2SEUkUZ1&fid=0x0:0xe6f3e47e2e7b6766"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"James Kwok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3dZyNZwwn2bgVt-Xa9iDAC2YxhzhlYZ37ZgUsshLxACOu5uFSYg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We had two tables of 24 people attending dim sum lunch in this restaurant. Location, parking are easily accessible. Dim sum are traditional with medium prices. Although there was no surprises , but it is a good place to have dim sum.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZbHsnRe-eWZdJqG8BvR9iYtH7HOX7M6xHUh6C&fid=0x0:0xe6f3e47e2e7b6766"],"When":"2024-6-19"},{"Name":"Hiep Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMRHHZ7t798igHqhwEObqqiXXBYRe7_vTRRS3-gXG7fOgZlXSH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for dinner for my wife's birthday and we were very happy with the quality of food. We were here 2 weeks ago for dim sum and it was very good also. When my teenage girls like the food then it makes things easier! We booked the private room each time since it was available so it was extra cozy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvF5Ol1jK0HGBb6oC4OoLWJvFNFuQrfDcif3EE&fid=0x0:0xe6f3e47e2e7b6766"],"When":"2024-1-19"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ted Gould","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfi4q0CQOsJEAVRYDXJEdKJ_Mk-Kyp_l5OYNZB3Fn501cTzfk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The same chef rums the show, but their presentation and prep game has definitely leveled up! They were very good the last couple of times we've been here, but the delicious meal today had a fresh  premium feel to it. Loving this, it might have become our favourite Burnaby Pho!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2to7GNNobCb4DFaZNChVoUrbr2lUF8OmFJAKd&fid=0x0:0x2bf2f49774396076"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Melinda W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqFa91nGQX9-WVxFZ-rAUul10GF70bhWZFQZe97ymoPVUZrvFxnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This restaurant was rated 4.7, but honestly I think it is overrated.

The food, in general, is not bad. I quite like the Traditional Pho because the broth came steamy hot and it was flavorful. The meat and meatballs tasted ok and the portion was reasonable.

The chicken and beef skewers was my second favorite. They were grilled just right so the meat was still juicy. The dipping sauce could be better though. It was rich in peanut flavor but nothing else.

The chicken wings were very small compared to those served in other Vietnamese restaurants. They tasted alright, for the record. The batter was not too thick and the meat was tender.

The most impressive thing about this restaurant might be the variety in its menu. It serves Vietnamese, Thai and Chinese noodles plus some other food.  So what you look for is choices, this is it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNseGqWkCWEiBcqCa9Ijmw7i0rqfzEVvbOevco_&fid=0x0:0x2bf2f49774396076"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"Ben Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLByaKCpGbuY489WAdVXd-pZWeXBz9NdVZAA2yg17Co0zS8zQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Checked out the house special fried rice: lots of toppings, and with prawns and flakes of fish. Was a tiny bit too salty for my own taste (crab paste) but overall no complaints. Good Thai iced tea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPprkr0XFtXH0p3HBnRQwRc2Ed_ZSKRmgCxKvv1&fid=0x0:0x2bf2f49774396076"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Jessy J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLHNRFw0Z_JgaU0TxGr1Pv5X-w9V6JzR0bnCuTDlGr_7pfsbx_k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Came in for dinner with the family and just felt disappointed it was not as nice as we would hoped.

Service was slow. And it was barely any greeting or thank you at the end.

Was not busy. It was maybe about 4-7 tables seated while we were there.

Their Large pho has very small portion of noodles. My kids finished it in less than 5 min. And we asked for an extra order of noodle (plain noodle) and that took about 15 min.

There was no refill of water until we were all down our dinner (which was about 45min later).

The menu was big and maybe it’s too big that the servers cannot handle.

I had a Thai green curry and the ingredients seemed different. No bamboo shoots or onions or peppers. And the eggplants were fried too dried. However, the sauce was good.

They have 3 sizes of Pho , small, regular and large. We got a large one but feels very small (noodle portion) was just about a small bowl.

Serving dishes are nice.

Salad roll has a “non traditional” peanut sauce which was not my favourite. More on the sour side.

Overall I would give them another chance but they may need to find a way to make the servers want to be there. They seemed stressed to work there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4gnJ8T9nwgmW-n3ckKepds7ufIGG3sAi72-B2&fid=0x0:0x2bf2f49774396076"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Percy Yiu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJcDuh4ChoM6pg2ilGI5bwOVAYv7IYwoHP17UfdcRW_ysPB0g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had an awesome dinner here!  Got the grilled beef, chicken, and spring roll vermicelli & lemon grass chicken on rice with egg.  Both were super tasty!  Very clean viet / Thai restaurant and it’s open late!  Will come back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvcTYMvz1TRGKwJyqboucVBdhIYVs09BvS25v0&fid=0x0:0x2bf2f49774396076"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Anito Pookino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLqEDkp5ONz5PA7ODrupm52ENAJzIJ740hTdqZPeHgzTmxC7w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The waitress we had wasn’t very attentive. She wasn’t friendly and was not helpful when we were asking about the dishes. She looked like she didn’t want to be there. She also didn’t say anything when she placed the food down. She just walked away. We didn’t get any utensils for our grilled chicken rice dish. To top it off, there’s barely any meat in our food. Salad rolls were mostly vermicelli noodles. Bbh and pho had beef balls and Vietnamese ham but very little brisket. The tendon was inedible, undercooked and hard/chewy. Not to mention there was a dead fruit fly in my broth. We’re never coming back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwW_MZQ8b7ufbglmuv-GsKtflVm6EylmvrTafb&fid=0x0:0x2bf2f49774396076"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Gio Lisuardi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIDK0W7oqMMrGb8bxhB875zH5sp-fEarUGK2o9kPN-A-yzHmV2=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice place with great music and food! We ordered the pho and house special fried rice, both were very good and great portion size also! Highly recommend ordering their appetizers as well, especially their beef satay and Vietnamese spring rolls. 10/10 recommend!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSHAFTS2O6dEHQIDeIHtYRJGDFQQhe5tzaE78e&fid=0x0:0x2bf2f49774396076"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Caroline P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZngfTd73NeJ25oW1c9jXgnEkYFaCWVEKEMtVlUuYzNIQaqg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We went at unusual time and had a great meal. Ordered rare beef pho, dried tofu, pad thai, and vermicelli bowl. All delicious 😋  not my first time and will keep coming back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSZ2mIQS0oyktKAQ2vlHd0NvYF8g7kn4KDHBZU&fid=0x0:0x2bf2f49774396076"],"When":"2024-10-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Hajin Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJiBaU0sX6zMQoXyKSI4-03K-IPgVTxZAxMKa_0RS2NViFoRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dined in at 5:30 p.m on Thursday. I ordered golden fried chicken as boneless. The texture of the fry was very crispy while the inside was very tender.

I also liked the pickled radish on the side very much. It tastes like a bit of sour and sweet flavour. If the chicken is a bit too oily, then I recommend eating with the pickled radish.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONHzI_XxVMOrB4E2spSgSioWL7-9pDH1r1wZol&fid=0x0:0x3b7973de3bc5f583"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Esther","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWm4MrcOMcE-MmdjBoKAjDTfZHS26hzehvqwvBxROz7rHTb9kPKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered their soy chicken wings. It was amazing. Not too sweet, not too salty. The crispiness is just perfect. There are 7 pcs total. I ordered them online. I would definitely come back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOj_MR9VaBbzffUrIIpnCMNI415YluiWK7CF2mv&fid=0x0:0x3b7973de3bc5f583"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"noora wah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKN6GzAxbb71v-_KTq88FKukCFY3E43j0-JayR5g16_xgWYMA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food here never disappoints! One of the best Korean BBQ chicken I had. Just keep in mind it takes some  time to prepare the food. Overall amazing restaurant, definitely give it a shot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNdzls9EkDafyUKNO5mUcZXXsI2fJmnfYj17uYR&fid=0x0:0x3b7973de3bc5f583"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"Manami Elahi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEaGa8Kc2yEFB0Nq7XfbcQdFIuexPL3SQ8tB5-f-Eja3WbGtpi=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely my favourite spot and I believe THE BEST CHICKEN FRY money can buy! Moreover the staffs are impeccable! The way they treat the customers make us feel like coming back again and again. Trust me I come every week 😂 And yes I have to recommend ‘ Bailey ‘ (Heistings branch) who helped us with our meals. She is really professional and sweet! Highly satisfied by her service. Thank you overall! Keep up the good service BBQ Heistings!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-eePYq7OGufglNOOW80L9asQEgCJIOEjjjohz&fid=0x0:0x3b7973de3bc5f583"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"َAzi Gh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJl3_PAZh4QSsKpeyL89kzuEO31Qj9dwWEIIgNSSOOvLgIYTds=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's simply awesome, I ordered rose duck bokki and cheese duck bokki both were unimaginably good. Also, traditional Korean chicken was really good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNxv08JYK4WH36CX-QxhnRWW8B8Q3_s25UemqO&fid=0x0:0x3b7973de3bc5f583"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Aswathy Suresh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKR4DNly6qkrVukYEpwNeGLo6K3j-A3IXF_3S8Thv5C4UG9m5MDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great food and variety of Korean chicken flavours. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"BR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKvHcZB7xb4n8CF1jxejOIwoYqPKN4SdZc0qIjcZcbAYMjdkneNA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I recently visited Bin 4 Burger Lounge and tried both the Bin 4 BC beef and Bin 19 wagyu burger, but both were disappointing. The patties were overcooked, dry, and had a texture that suggested the meat had been frozen and reheated in a microwave. Despite the manager’s insistence that the burgers were juicy, they were as dry as a leather saddle found in the Sahara Desert. On the bright side, the sides and dipping sauces were enjoyable and added a nice touch, but the overall experience fell short of the premium quality I expected.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYoBXfaTiAG8dXv53S3zSYyGVT3NtBZqm5Grm3&fid=0x0:0x37e0badfec615773"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"H S Madan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUTu4oMkDk1Z3MjNV_7rONLy371tsTTJL-xX0jcQ-rhkA8blIkVlg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went for dinner with a friend. Great customer service.  The servers attentive but not overbearing. I tried a different burger than usual. The angry burger, not as big of a fan as the Big Dipper. They make good drinks and have a good happy hour.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfx0Cjoo8NMikv3RNWqxBFExeyE4gRGKYRh01K&fid=0x0:0x37e0badfec615773"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Thomas Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUITuDRjw9J9Us45xAUXKSfp8lG2sJ2s04TW_lNAi_G6a5d62ur=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bin4 is going to now be one of my go to spots! When you go after 9pm all burgers are 50% off with the purchase of a drink. This deal really feels like good value and makes the food taste even better. Our server was knowledgeable, concise and friendly. The burgers were delicious as well. We were told a table for 2 would be a 20 minute wait, however it only took about 10 minutes. Great experience overall. Would definitely go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMaXsAYIFZMscfihlZVtm9YMZDgXivfGM1wT7hs&fid=0x0:0x37e0badfec615773"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Hyejin Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxmpr7FWXMJqHRsBv5DODkOQBS3knAjvplMlXBCEswBGZElLIF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Extremely Disappointing Experience

I visited this restaurant with high expectations, as the server, Tinna, was very nice and provided excellent guidance throughout. However, the food—specifically the burger—fell completely short of expectations.

I ordered the "The Big Dipper," and while it looked visually appealing, the first bite was utterly disappointing. Despite the use of Brant Lake Wagyu Beef, the patty was dry, overcooked, and flavorless. Honestly, it was the driest burger I've had in the past 10 years living in Metro Vancouver—worse even than a day-old burger from Wendy's. It was so dry that I couldn't believe it had just been cooked.

The situation only worsened when a male staff member, who appeared to be the manager, came over—not to apologize, but to offer an explanation. He cited BC regulations, claiming that burger patties must be cooked to medium-well. However, what I received wasn't even medium-well—it was overcooked to the point of being inedible. He also insisted that the burger looked "juicy" to him, which was absurd. If this was the result of following regulations, then I wonder how other burger restaurants manage to serve juicy patties while adhering to the same rules.

In the end, the male manager waived the charge for the burger, but he offered no apology—just excuses. I have to ask: was this burger truly worth selling? Was it something to be proud of? This meal completely ruined my evening. In the 30 minutes we spent at the restaurant, the only thing I managed to eat was the truffle fries.

This was an incredibly disappointing experience. If this is the standard for the burgers and service at this establishment, I will not be returning to Bin4.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9WW2pYrkwOp27gx0H9ltMpvx0Hz9Jqk3uH_af&fid=0x0:0x37e0badfec615773"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Abster","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLblDdaXM3P5dLALJmhM2ZaQhcLRR8T_uEtXh193o0J0BeuZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"WOW, what an experience. I got the Blackened Chicken with Cheddar Salad through Uber Eats for $23.50, expecting a hearty, satisfying meal. Instead, I was served a “chicken breast” so thin, it was actually thinner than the cheese slices in the salad. Seriously, how is that even possible? If you’re going to charge $23.50, at least make it feel like I’m eating actual chicken, not something that’s one step away from dissolving in the dressing.

But then we get to the root of the problem—literally. Along with my salad, I received a lovely surprise: a giant root covered in mud. Apparently, the “farm-to-table” concept here skips the crucial step of washing the ingredients. Maybe I was supposed to be charmed by the authenticity of dirt in my meal?

This was a disaster from start to finish. Thin chicken, muddy roots.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOiW-HevzaE0n9UFir6Ni7qNiOSLli_f-jSQQ4S&fid=0x0:0x37e0badfec615773"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"mo mp","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5PCaSpKxxaEFa5TlF8cw5g3dBgpV1qAn1IYhAD5HYr_z2gBw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bin 4 Burger Lounge in Burnaby offers a gourmet burger experience that’s hard to beat. Whether you’re a burger enthusiast or just looking for a great meal, this place should be on your list. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkjsWDnOO_l_auf1wUc-WpGAiwgZHfU2Pbm8Y&fid=0x0:0x37e0badfec615773"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Atena Razmpoush","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDTwnpwsyCMQv83dsdwlkz2BAvureQHzZZxo2_BIzfjtUBCR_R=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice staff and environment.
Food was great for the %50 after-9 pm deal.

Basically everything would need to be improved to become satisfactory for the regular price of the menu.

Definitely recommended after 9 pm!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuOQ361VcJeTAYgPYb8Xo55PwvtxWdFUstvZ-v&fid=0x0:0x37e0badfec615773"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Ashkan Nasiri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-JEZ1jWsb7enCt4yumpx4fdvKlObYU6pn_nrU8YtZpLBFoLvS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was great. It was one of my top 5 burgers. Pieace of advice: order half-half sides. They have a good variety of sides. Also, the dips were delicious, and one free on each order isn't enough. Get alteast 2 extra dips. Definitely will go again if I crave burgers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwmBbF_7BXI8Ta7CaL-1tW6iU4LxPKKdF8a3-q&fid=0x0:0x37e0badfec615773"],"When":"2024-11-11"}]

[{"Name":"Ombretta H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1ZXtiFNwE2MHcctQg0MRG2gpseFgWXQH128nezXrU5XvDIdDx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went Saturday as part of a larg group. We had excellent service, and everyone was pleased with the food. I enjoyed a delicious mousaka. The Greek soda is fantastic for non alcoholic options (designated driver). Will cme again for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvdN5ELJqP_k7MyJ0sSqDRe0F71gEQnQk7JayZ&fid=0x0:0xde50f4cd4e4fa23d"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Achim Klor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3sgxLkESu4wato-WkaOtXDjmbfhFJFom1KDVKHuEZpbwoJ8tX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful dinner experience, best lamb souvlaki I've ever had. Plus the service is exceptionally good and authentic, not over the top "tip-nice."

Shout out to Mikaela and Suzette (My Captain, My Captain).

Cheers","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Earl Flormata","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHEYR5crfzT5mFZF5yY6PmVwTawXCmDPm3U8WVZUqH5mb8rOP9MA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Arni Psito was solid. Served without a bone so easier to eat, but then didn’t get the satisfaction of watching “fall off” the bone - although it had great consistency. Missed the little bit of crust/char on the top though from before.

Keftedes appy was good for happy hour.

The chicken souvlaki was also decent.

Also this is probably the best Ekmek in town now.

Service was a little on the slow side. Possibly new server that didn’t have as much experience. Friendly but didn’t refill water unless asked.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSgo_8484u721DLbobJ6dg1Npu8Ldyp1Rdd3Ku&fid=0x0:0xde50f4cd4e4fa23d"],"When":"2024-4-2"},{"Name":"Hillbillytc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV833YeKMKJfxtYeKhRHVRSrikZoFOcCapKBwyEFBOnxiCMeXAZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The atmosphere is very pleasant. Close to bus stop. The waiters knew her allergies really well. They have lots of GF options. We just wanted a snack so did not order much mine was a Gyro with out the pita. The lamb could be a little bit more moist, but still good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4kURfEBQoaaoCHHB8GQsu64nBIV99lv4_US-0&fid=0x0:0xde50f4cd4e4fa23d"],"When":"2023-4-8"},{"Name":"Evangeline Dalaya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVh6HgPE8PXFXtsvmH2vvn1nsy3lNWAduhT_pNqcs2QaQGPNZ6E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We came here on Mother's Day without a reservation and were lucky to have a table open up within 5 minutes. I found the service to be a little slow, our server didn't come by our table much to check in. The food was great overall. The chicken souvlaki was a little lack luster and flavourless. It didn't taste marinated to me at least. The butter backed shrimp was amazing and I highly recommend. The Greek salad was nice as was the dessert. I would come back here again in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8UTlgZckuS7mpFMK-bBY195Qvchnhz84LQ1eI&fid=0x0:0xde50f4cd4e4fa23d"],"When":"2022-5-15"},{"Name":"Alli L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7M-K_wMLVOHyWDXpjXXk3pyMIn-Cv8yGLpMXYPKQoyxLDNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tried this place for the first time today and I’m so glad I did! Seriously some of the best Greek food I’ve ever had. The chicken gyro was delicious, the chicken was so moist and tender and flavourful. Tzaziki was really good too, as were the greek salad and the pita. Will definitely be a returning customer.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Diana L.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIW2kdRGGLj1j8iotZR8u_6cJvN47azaqWmh-dWmP_2e6mQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came here for a party a few years ago and been meaning to come back. It’s a bit far for me but overall it’s a nice restaurant. Family owned restaurant. Great service. Good food. The prices are decent. It can take some time to get your food but the ambience is nice. No AC but they have lots of fans. Street parking, easy to find spots.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpxGBvJwJIzCW4uQiucdIkyBX9LJh_8ipfXRA&fid=0x0:0xde50f4cd4e4fa23d"],"When":"2019-8-16"},{"Name":"Linda Gross","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbK2ySaXFqfovTnWbc47avtLj6xcEfGORfgShmPzK3yxW6tDU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We’ve been coming here for more than 15 years … have never found a better plate of calamari, anywhere! The plate in the photo is already half-eaten, couldn’t wait! 😆. Rest of the menu is fantastic, lamb shoulder falls off your fork, filo pastry on my Spanikopeta always light and flaky.
BEST OF ALL is the family who runs this delightful spot - the sisters are amazing and imbue their warm character on all their staff. I can’t recommend Sfynaki enough - just go!! ☺️Linda & Mike Gross","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOz-6dH5WguobDwLe-GLztB27mwi4o-g0FE7mx9&fid=0x0:0xde50f4cd4e4fa23d"],"When":"2023-5-31"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kelvin Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYlOJ0ZWKycRqx5ZOzHhnjusnD1vSd-Gno_8IQ4mNi6hmtCYtiSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an incredible dining experience at Olove Greek Kitchen! The highlight for me was their amazing selection of dips. We tried the trio of eggplant, fish roe, and fig dips. Each one was bursting with flavor and paired perfectly with their fresh bread. The fish roe was my favourite because it was strong pungent with a subtle sweetness

The fried shrimp wrap in filo was absolutely divine, hitting the spot with its crispy, savory goodness. I also loved the marinated olives and the fresh, flavorful vegetables that came with the dishes. Everything tasted so vibrant and well prepared.

The lamb shoulder required a bit of patience, but it was well worth the wait, tender, juicy, and full of rich flavors. As for the chicken wrap, it was so delicious that I’m craving another one just writing about it now!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvvy2t4MlrEJcd12oVVkK7s52lTx3eYGgt5X1i&fid=0x0:0x35abd2f1d1f1288f"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"Anthony Plaxen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0TosyGAQWTqM_XvTHaXfq2jDGHv6ifKWBgTGcJKYnap3ceipL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really delicious Greek food! I’ve always walked by this place in North Burnaby and we decided to finally give it a try for dinner!

We ordered a variety of dishes, the trio of hummus and dips, lamb chops, chicken and the moussaka.

The dishes were superb! They all had really good flavours and tasted fresh and yummy! The moussaka was great, it’s very heavy and umami like tasting, and had great filling! The eggplant was super soft, sweet and cooked very well. The lamb chops were nicely marinated same with the half chicken too.

The best part was the calamari and the trio of dips. The calamari was nice and crunchy and wasn’t overly oily at all. Further, the fish roe and hummus were so good. Highly recommend getting it with extra pita!

Really thoroughly enjoyed this place, very good tasting Greek food. Definitely will come back. Friendly waitress too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAM86fcr-G-68yHvL72zszjC_ZHBVxucshu_Ro&fid=0x0:0x35abd2f1d1f1288f"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Anthony Nevistic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJDnd1vcqg4ycQHEUHy6yCkP6W7tOjZt_0TSQlClre0HC0ILpw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Greek Restaurant by far. Not only is the food really good but very consistent. It’s authentic what you would eat in Greece not like majority of the Greek restaurants you find here in Greater Vancouver. I always order the Roast Lamb dinner with their Risotto both which is amazing with pita bread. Have ordered their Calamari as well which is also very good. On top of all that the owners are very good down to earth people.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Earl Flormata","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHEYR5crfzT5mFZF5yY6PmVwTawXCmDPm3U8WVZUqH5mb8rOP9MA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good Greek food. Friendly owner. The desserts were so-so but the main entrees were good. Chicken souvlaki was cooked well. Most places dry out the chicken. The lamb shoulder was moist but didn’t have that crispy crust that some other places have. The flavours were great. Cool ambiance with the blue lights. We’d come back to try more dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7l0rHPrbmn8PyGu-74q350OZcBsRNLpobIDO5&fid=0x0:0x35abd2f1d1f1288f"],"When":"2024-3-18"},{"Name":"Eleni G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJhQjKwbP_u6juG8S4IN6LcfKOE0ozKgA0bF8uQlJ6kPPebMA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my most favourite Greek restaurant in all of Metro Vancouver. It’s authentic and everything on the menu is delicious and cooked to perfection. Nikos, the owner, is extremely hospitable and always has a great joke to share! The atmosphere is cozy and makes for a romantic dinner or an enjoyable night out with friends. I would recommend this spot to anyone!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pezhman Lali","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIuOygEcDuAefSG14LGyPMJPKPuhYCj7IjXLU_fNPVePaaROw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a fantastic experience at OLOVE Greek Kitchen! The food was delicious, the service was absolutely amazing, and the vibe was so friendly and welcoming. The atmosphere made us feel great, and we left feeling happy and satisfied. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"K W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVerGSMVZq5pPiETKXh_wr8CdqRuI6f0r01YGBB82mTJNdyt-A_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Hidden gem in North Burnaby, with a nice cozy atmosphere and friendly staff! We ordered the dips to start and liked tasting the differences among them. For the mains we had the roasted chicken and moussaka which we enjoyed. Finished off with fig ice cream which was refreshing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZ7soK4lWzq468fSPj6XthDTYUhy3DY9gOF72U&fid=0x0:0x35abd2f1d1f1288f"],"When":"2024-3-21"},{"Name":"Elaina Tosoff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVavFuXHb_HsYdAYPZ_DX68cLGTuWA510pOlrMrG6YXPmjoasSw0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an impromptu dinner here with my daughter last night. I have ordered takeout from here in the past but this was my first time eating in. Everything we ordered was a winner. The service was incredibly friendly and they were super accommodating with my 5 year old's preferences. I will definitely be recommending this restaurant to my friends and I'll be sure to return to eat with my family again soon :)","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Siri Khan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLtCxXKSoi7D-btF6sV4LSCBa1SFjMseCXGGnXSW_rxCRk8wI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food tastes delicious. The reason for not giving 5 stars are: unevenly cooked of risotto rice, no golden beets in the salad as described in menu (cost$16), and green beans in the carbonara doesn’t really elevate anything to the dish. Overall it’s pretty good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-zxBfN4kar7tXLd8Bx281_G9NKqSfp_gPB4pm\u0026fid=0x0:0x882be5b74465152"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Sahar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBY-Z-iMI6PMaZxLg89SnfqLn30XBbCcxC3R7JCsX8LYBddmXi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Great spot for a celebratory dinner with a twist! Baci's live music had the dance floor hopping with some serious ballroom enthusiasts 🕺🏻💃🏻🪩. Fun atmosphere, especially if you're in the mood to move!  Service was friendly and attentive.  While the set menu dishes were decent, they left room for improvement. Same goes for the margarita - might be worth exploring the wine list next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrWYp4nACXBTbPZzYTEXPs30C8stnKvjjsouIW\u0026fid=0x0:0x882be5b74465152"],"When":"2024-4-21"},{"Name":"Glenn Bailey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWndFCIwfeV3RzQyUjP2WgHtV4U0_hrjZ8FgFIVjCkFvIp3PQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely love this place. Foods always great I’ve eaten here four times and I don’t know why anyone could write a negative review. The food is very fresh. The people that served us are incredibly friendly and we always have a great time. This place should be Much higherGoogle review at least. I eat around a lot and it’s yummy.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Wun Tun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJRX8y0CFiE6nMEK8WbNNliTbzoWixhnMbLndMuv6xykpVccF8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lots of staff on hand made for a pleasant evening out.  The 3 course meal had good portion size and the atmosphere was made more special with the live music that night. I think they have it only Fridays and Saturdays.  The manager was friendly and our waiter was awesome!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Wen S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLfKekcgGrSM5orE3YNPLTTzg5L68GHdpR3eDy-Cv34Kb5a-w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Authentic Italian cuisine, nice food, nice atmosphere.  We like most of the food we ordered, except the fish was over cooked. The mussels sauce was super nice! Great dinner!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJVUTrBIWwlE8uUypYsAUaIczJPD1iAIZ0hRXv\u0026fid=0x0:0x882be5b74465152"],"When":"2023-12-28"},{"Name":"Tara McIntosh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJc8Ami9AIkXpAKLCNFllrVTjYiyfYn7jKE081Tr1VUWQkOOg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We took our family for our anniversary dinner and the food was absolutely incredible!! The service was also very attentive,  warm and friendly.  We had everything from prawn platter, a variety of pasta, pizza, veal scaloppine, and more. The wine was lovely as were the cocktails. We  will be back again and again! Atmosphere is elegant.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Karina Graham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFzcd9BkjrLObv797ZKxoEMvK1Ix708KbaS0k-Lm701pKOh33ABQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went for my brothers' joint birthday party, and we had a great time! The dirty gin martini was fantastic. Sometimes they have a live band! I've been coming infrequently for years and always leave feeling full and happy! Great staff and fabulous italian classics. Thanks for having us =)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcTjfKzkW3PZrjiYtMGS6BvHDNk7cxXIVJwB6H\u0026fid=0x0:0x882be5b74465152"],"When":"2024-4-8"},{"Name":"Hassan Makhlouf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYREoqUkazVJoJhrGCrjS5g1lIMahzFkhsZA1Ir7O3A-YofJyb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice atmosphere, nice food and nice vibes.\nParking is available behind but it gets busy so easy. Food were great and staff did their best to ensure food is distributed correctly in full place. DJ and songs are amazing and you will enjoy dancing there after finishing your dinner. It’s a good romantic experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOH1RhvP_BccBI0R8TA2LEYu_UBE6EohBGjIlK2\u0026fid=0x0:0x882be5b74465152"],"When":"2023-2-20"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"mahesh nandwani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWNF-5hvw4aOh0fqy4HB8nf8fWmTh5VJAVHjDHlshTviuAhfyP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything was good. Food came quick too. Pizza was thin and the crust was just right! The truffle mushroom pasta was really good. Just the right amount of truffle. The carbonara was a little dry for me, but it was good. Overall, it was a good dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNG7mxxHsg_3iIv7VFpkWshXAjUVFXE0zb_7mUv&fid=0x0:0x9a90b512282ae02b"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Munro Stuff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj0Wcuk6ox5dfAeJ4fAaMbhX_F-nzzt3p5oc_f0hBd0NpbGSM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome dinner in this light-filled space. We were lucky enough to stumble in during Happy Hour - the Bright & Stormy cocktail was delish, and the Pizza Diavola (discounted regular menu item) was SO GOOD, with really tasty and not greasy Italian salami. The Rigatoni Fume was creamy and smoked, an unusual combo. Will definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNADpq2fVgfBwZxdUJQpkVd5iV8U3B5HhmdGTE0&fid=0x0:0x9a90b512282ae02b"],"When":"2024-6-26"},{"Name":"Anju","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3NBFx2EqwPeNoEkV2MebyCIf0Znuxcr0FFtfaRAHKwPRpguQHlw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing vegetarian pasta. We loved it. The pizza was a bit bland but the pasta was perfect! They have vegan options available also. The focaccia was dry and thin. I would recommend this place for the pasta, it was delicious","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN6c5699imZo9jGWWL1TH7ynC9C5pWw4OgE3N_K&fid=0x0:0x9a90b512282ae02b"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Percy Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpYfKBRmcbCv3QlJ6bZXmv0ly8_CocIf_lBOXCAlxRrZaEag=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a great meal and great service.  We went for an early dinner and was promptly seated.  Since we didn't have reservations, the hostess asked if we could return the table in an hour and a half.  That was plenty of time and we were never rushed during our dinner.  We ordered 2 salads, meatballs and two pizzas.   We asked our server if we wanted to take out two pizzas when should we order.  She asked us what we wanted and she would put in the order and time it so it would be ready when we finished.   She was spot on.  It was ready a couple minutes before we finished.  The salads were fresh and had the right amount of dressing.  The meatballs were flavourful and moist.  The pizzas were good.   We liked the pizza sauce and the toppings were done right.  We had two servers serving us and they did a great job taking care of us with smiles.  Looking forward to our next visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOB-i5WTI-nnEQ_3ur5FE4iwUJoTRLNnWifL4Aq&fid=0x0:0x9a90b512282ae02b"],"When":"2023-10-3"},{"Name":"Margie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJxX5puAJO5vuw-aBlCbSNpH19j9F3WiKykRZTmy7nEkjLpvQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went for an early dinner in a Saturday evening. Bustling restaurant, service was prompt, and friendly. Food spectacular - great thin-crust pizzas,    fresh cheese/charcuterie board, big serving of warm meaty olives of 3 types- none too pungent. Having just come from Europe recently, this place does Italian food well! Simple decor, great food and wine. Highly recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vanessa Forouzan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1_cocFm7SjkDDohlmX_tdPTKxFzhHUmYQsRX-gBS4JxUCl0nwTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had my first experience at Sopra Sotto Pizzeria, and it was absolutely delicious. We tried two pasta dishes and a Caesar salad, and everything tasted incredibly fresh. As someone who’s particular about Italian food, I can confidently say they got it right. I’ll definitely be coming back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Annie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLYwWBJGFFoWJDvjk8xYcO3gdBUA-3rtLEahpuETRb60w-efg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"In terms of food, the salad was overwhelmingly salty. I couldn't taste anything else except for salt. The pasta tasted undercooked and chewy. The pizza was good though.

The service was non-existent. Surprising because there were 4 servers for 10 tables. No one came by to refill our waters, no one asked us if our food tasted ok and it felt like we were forgotten.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMawhhGWczbHRydjOtyU-TiwPM1OB6oTmV7ov3O&fid=0x0:0x9a90b512282ae02b"],"When":"2024-2-18"},{"Name":"Penny Rusty Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkGfXMIDqwS_yD1axTk6tkHoLsnybE2ErvKrHMoMIElMJWekI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tried to visit this location last year but accidentally made reservations at their Commercial Dr location. Finally visited this location in mid January.

Nice Caesar salad. Also got the tagliatelle al ragu with their signature bolognese sauce.

The spaghetti alla carbonara with pecorino romano cheese and guanciale (pork jowl) was quite creamy. The combination of the cheese and cured pork did make this a very salty dish tho' and did detract a bit.

Ended our meal with the Dolce Amore panna cotta gelato.

Overall, good food. The menu isn't huge but they do serve pizza here too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqBssjmas8sAZQHrbJ3K7Ur0rmhIpLIbVloSLN&fid=0x0:0x9a90b512282ae02b"],"When":"2024-1-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lory A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1Z_TgwzLNJgZuSE3FXerP-I9shSYaXwARL0MCGORSihjphj5NFg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I lived in Vietnam for a few years, so I was very happy to find this place- it just felt like being back home.

The lady in the front is very nice and always makes sure you have what you need. The portions are very large for the prices and the food is amazing, it feels authentic.

I've been there two times and hope to come back many more! Totally recommend it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOE6s-Nyj9m8ghizsNMuCXESnTlec5zQFgCR5wR&fid=0x0:0xb2758cd8bc22c228"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"David 04 Make the World a Better Place","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXmkrAyRsAwad4uDl0EKEwpsCVMLq51IOxmbley55h_iwJzGo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I’m reviewing only the pho.

First, the noodles felt a bit clumpy and weren’t very enjoyable. The broth was too thin, with what seemed like a higher water ratio than at other places. After eating, I noticed a lingering taste that seemed heavily influenced by MSG.

In terms of price, it could be considered affordable for a meal. However, given the quality, I wouldn’t say it’s particularly cheap, especially since there was very little meat included.

As for the service, I’d rather not comment.

I’ve only tried the pho a few times here, so I can’t speak for their rice or fried dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0sAx4cbdY7cIbKK4nne80TyzSuzSR1n3eh7w&fid=0x0:0xb2758cd8bc22c228"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Dylan Hendricks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQA2q_i_cbvFJmt5oGxZ7BA4GKrRPCLdlqYIQQi_N7sjF5Ew=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nifty well-managed Vietnamese restaurant that resides on the 2nd floor of two story commercial units... blink and you'd miss it. Thankfully, this establishment has been well received over the years and the word of mouth has been widespread, allowing the place to thrive!

I got Hue's spicy noodle soup, along with the Vietnamese spring rolls. The soup has a rich, flavourful broth with generous chunks of meat. Service was great and attentive, and weirdly enough the view over Burnaby Hastings from the window seating was somewhat pleasing.

I look forward to visiting again and checking out more of the menu.

Thoroughly recommend for fans of Vietnamese!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhaH7OPLvDZjyu4h9MYacT3mjBwuvdqH9kj6_r&fid=0x0:0xb2758cd8bc22c228"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Anito Pookino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLqEDkp5ONz5PA7ODrupm52ENAJzIJ740hTdqZPeHgzTmxC7w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"My first experience here was pretty good. Large bowl of house noodle pho had the nicest cuts of brisket I’ve ever seen for a good price of $14. There was so much rice noodles though I can’t complain especially when I was hungry. Broth was good, I didn’t feel thirsty after drinking it.
I came back with family for my second visit and the older skinny Vietnamese lady was very rude. I’ve never seen anyone place food down so aggressively. She slammed down my parents pho bowls and just left. When my sister’s and my order came, she just shoved the plates in our faces.
I don’t know what her problem is but she ruined our dining experience, so unprofessional and obnoxious the way she treats people.
The other lady with shoulder length hair and glasses was nice wish we had her instead. My rice dish was alright, I found the rice to be too mushy","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPc8N_6J8jaax9gbhPejHbC2TPP9s1Oj9YUWUAB&fid=0x0:0xb2758cd8bc22c228"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Yuki Sio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHpQVwJjXzzlKrjZFCGyRKIi_-KawDzqC-wb4nA-UwDGbfvjU7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was a chilly day, and we were feeling pretty hungry. We wanted something warm and filling, so we decided to stop in for a bite. We were so pleased with our meal and our decision! :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNc7QyfBbUNp4hZW6vss_HO_YviZbHmb4wS_2Zs&fid=0x0:0xb2758cd8bc22c228"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Gordon Kwong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKjDehFqHA5ZT74ZkeWTLjTUZu8GTq7uesQO3c1SQIt6zn0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Comfortable clean and welcoming restaurant. Pho soup was pretty well flavored but lemon grass chicken, although tender and nice lemongrass flavour, didn't have that roasted charred caramelized texture that adds flavor. Vermicelli bowl with pork was also good but also lacked that roasted taste. Missed toasted onions as a garnish and red chili in the fish sauce dip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZSu5n65MnhmVJjbEs3lFrBVqCU0x8j7UjR0_D&fid=0x0:0xb2758cd8bc22c228"],"When":"2024-5-25"},{"Name":"NN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWveMvGobCJlvOaVQ63o7qJlGt3Osfm-B4efuBk6RGEMDx62cJg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice little pho place. The owner was friendly and welcoming. Pho was tasty and affordable. Cash and debit only.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6cKjwMTn-MNTAHN83ZmLTcDUiutZeACEDLkgS&fid=0x0:0xb2758cd8bc22c228"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"The Huy Tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKy8qYpSPujBenGtUGClNcHyf4btBPPUQqiOD3GKyCzxzUFglULQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pho Pasteur is an excellent restaurant with outstanding food quality. I was very impressed with the rich flavors and high quality of each dish, especially the pho. The service here is very good, with friendly and efficient staff. The restaurant’s atmosphere is spacious and clean, creating a comfortable feeling for diners. This is definitely a place worth visiting for anyone who loves Vietnamese cuisine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbOrXdm8EQUDfW7ibN17L8bSRrrahq1PtyTmMc&fid=0x0:0xb2758cd8bc22c228"],"When":"2024-7-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Christine Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkB4dvOmGlgUXv4nPa1bFiSBAzjpEWbU0k5_3eMXMgA7r07DZg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The ordering process was a bit confusing and the food took a while to come out. Overall, the sandwiches were tasty and they didn’t skimp out on sauce (keep napkins nearby). The bread to filling ratio was good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgbd1u6sFNGasitvneesIKs4_c_Sz1Uowp-UI5&fid=0x0:0x582d32342ab5b625"],"When":"2024-6-26"},{"Name":"Anthony Plaxen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0TosyGAQWTqM_XvTHaXfq2jDGHv6ifKWBgTGcJKYnap3ceipL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great selection of lunch and to-go meals. Third time I’ve had the short rib sandwich with sun dried tomatoes and onions, and I have to say, it really hits the spot when you’re hungry. Great sandwiches and at a decent price considering that lunch meals cost about 15-20$ these days. I’ve also had the porchetta sandwich before and it was really delicious as well as the gnocchi in the counter. Highly recommend this place if you’re looking for a quick snack in the Hastings area. The Short Rib sandwich is my recommendation.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPPqXEEBDBLbyEjG0_-dM2QzhzG1llbIT9QmUs&fid=0x0:0x582d32342ab5b625"],"When":"2023-9-16"},{"Name":"Trang Vu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI0CVoOgItX335D01CZq7OO6VLE984pMZh_AVudGHmC2lXR-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Super disappointed with the $20 brisket sandwich. Better off going to Subway. Will still be hungry after. Too much mustard, sauerkraut, the driest brisket and soggy foccacia. I'd take it off the menu. Not wheelchair or stroller friendly tight narrow entry and inside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPePME8M2ByRLt3Gkj0vy4KsYFVud2roactTQ9q&fid=0x0:0x582d32342ab5b625"],"When":"2024-5-19"},{"Name":"Adrian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVR5gN5YToMIo_jvrxolTjumuBU9lrQVwdHkRUQRL9P_BA3zW65tg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Ordered the Beer Braised Shortrib Sandwhich. Bread and complimentary toppings were good.

The main component which is the Short Rib was mainly Silver Skin / Tendon as seen in the picture. Leaving fat on is fine and understandable as it adds flavor but leaving the Silver Skin on the meat that is meant for a Sandwhich is not good as it's inedible and shows a lack of care in the product. As well it's not a small piece that was missed it was large and obvious.

Their other Sandwhiches looked nice, so maybe this is the off one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdiorkMF5Vr6PONwMwy2A_aKO5jUVFSW6CPL65&fid=0x0:0x582d32342ab5b625"],"When":"2023-7-28"},{"Name":"s m","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI6w1OOyJqSooR6Cg-sM-SF5YGOM0STR8HoTDN7TjbbjxAmXg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food is very good and staff is very engaging but not alot of room to move around as its quite cluttered. The prices are way too high for a return visit unfortunately. I know times are tough financially for restaurants and small businesses but times are tough for customers too. A sandwich and small pre made lasagna cant cost $30","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"anin setyo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVP-1Zx5Ymcf5w0jV0csFBE_1yJV29kzJo2l4p7xBavL1gcOrzlmQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We used to love their burrata sandwich and one day they just changed the recipe.  They changed the bread and it became really salty and inedible in my opinion. People/service was nice though","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alessandra Martins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjmnb24PfeI2EAmIYAEMHjqYeVnfde0V6fuP_YXnnf6sloyMJ5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Thank you for the service and the red orange drink recommendation. I really enjoyed the pizza and the snacks from next door","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3aO6pCOk0DAaobhF-MvkxJLd4OsEyoxz-Eu-o&fid=0x0:0x582d32342ab5b625"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Warner Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDWKsyLtafyGfK7Q7w1ml3mxeAbc-FKoRYJ5e-a9yHsAmwQ441=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great selection of handhelds , pastas, ready-to-go meals, soups/stocks and desserts. I usually pop in for the Roasted Porchetta sandwich. The crunch on that skin is exceptional. I’ve also had their All Natural Italian Hot Pork Sausage sandwich and this too is mouth-watering. Beware, these sandwiches are messy but well worth it! One sandwich I’ve been meaning to try is their Steamworks Beer Braised Beef Short Rib sandwich, ugh that sounds amazing!

Their selection of hot foods & ready to go meals varies, and are also decently priced.

Food order queue (when it gets busy) is actually at the back of the Cucina, though staff are usually friendly and will assist you wherever.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZ1oY9Y3JSVMKTB40913G0DZK-5Gre9y6a-REB&fid=0x0:0x582d32342ab5b625"],"When":"2022-4-1"}]

descriptions: Neighbourhood haunt for pizza & bar bites plus pitchers of beer with sports on big-screen TVs.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lester Lis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTJVB-fVhuyq30MQcWI_uMK2Jlvq5m6dkD_alMa8ySke9C54Fb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife and I visited for a Friday night pizza date and had a really great experience!
The place was quiet at 6PM so we had it all to ourselves which made us wonder how it'd go...

Well, we were glad we came! The Volcanic Hawaiian and the The Joint Fully Loaded were both awesome. We got them as "half/half" on a large and, I have to say, they load up the pizza topings really well.

We also got hot wings and pesto bread sticks. I think the wings are baked or air fried? They tasted great! And the bread sticks were, unsurprisingly given the pizza, really good as well!

I liked the touch of having popcorn served as a little snack... But I have to say we didn't have much because we knew we were going to have a nice big meal!

Atmosphere is also really great. I found it interesting how it was sort of split into a "hockey" side and a "creative/music" side. Im assuming the owner is both an athlete and musician! It's really well decorated in there.

They also have board games on site if you want a pizza and board games night for this upcoming rainy fall, winter and spring weather!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjQgeJtsrgFLJcu443qbyKCnAjY2v69MYoSQY&fid=0x0:0xd1090a24cc146d1"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Matthew Sands","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkLq2RGqkAWkC6dQ5dvaGCsuAIMbVAtKrvL1o5dIubNWJMNFg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this place. I have been coming here for a month now while my daughter takes classes next door. I love the Olivetti pizza with mushrooms. Sean or Shawn not sure which spelling is an awesome conversation while I eat my pizza and drink a craft beer or two. I met the owner today and he is cool as well and will help us out with a large pizza order for our school PAC welcome back night. The deal is the best around. I highly suggest checking this place out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgIwts8_OCGKXNYbrJbqVdzeYim4YxOIyySmtv&fid=0x0:0xd1090a24cc146d1"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"Karen R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDV_xh-2FRTt60Dk8cmOVYbJK862izxJKbtP4b4MrmUNx8NdUF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went there for pizza and wings last night and it was great.

We got a large pizza (two flavours), hot wings with jalapeno ranch, and peat cheesy bread.

The pizza had so many toppings and a lot of cheese (see the cheese pull picture 🥹), the crust was crispy and thick enough to handle the toppings, but not so thick that it enters the pan or deep dish doughy zone.

The cheese bread with pesto was great. The pesto was very flavorful and garlicky.

We got hot wings which were crispy hot wings. They were very juicy and hot.

I need to try the pasta and nachos next time. Once it was too late (lol) I heard the penne bolognese was amazing and I wished we got it. I did not have the same regret once our food came!!! I need to see how cheesy the nachos will be based on how cheesy the pizza was.

The atmosphere was very cool and relaxing. One side had a lot of sports memorabilia, the other side had a lot of music references and collectibles. There was also a hockey foosball table!!

Last but not least, we got some complimentary popcorn while we waited for our food. I love little details like that.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPo1w-aky-RjSiySNL5uI6YJxSHIDzaB2tX0bHp&fid=0x0:0xd1090a24cc146d1"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Alejandra Molina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK8kcvk326k8yv9uSFuxGMgLPfWM3WneAabeKSn2GNv-8TFDA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super tasty pizzas, probably some of the best we’ve ever had. The atmosphere it’s really nice and service was nice","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhegRztmQq8TouNMtORnZ7WM0BDWoyT1x8EoZg&fid=0x0:0xd1090a24cc146d1"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"alfredo fontaine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV96Lqwch3BNdXVJ-poDgOnvD8EE1jyvO-GhMVxw-ZDNVTk3zEc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The place is amazing and the Sean and Nash the best human beings of the world. I really enjoyed my pizza and keep those guys forever, they honestly take care of this bussines. I am thankful for the beautiful hospitality that they shared with me. Send you a hug guys, Alfredo the Cuban guy 🇨🇺","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Teresa le Noble","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJm-34IVpqschKCte8jJLkUCIXyzP-xRA6zwJED-VEglgeoVw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So good!! We’ve lived in the area for so long and always ordered the generic pizzas and I’m so glad we found this place! So much better! Loaded pizzas, tasty, fluffy and tasty crust. Yes please. Our new favourite place for pizza! Definitely give them a try!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Clayton Robertson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXj0iZlquSixWW1525sxLiJGg7e-N7o94_mND_Fe0IAO6eHbsc1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best pizza I have had in Vancouver!

I got the 2 for 1 pizza special which I chicken bacon ranch and the joint fully loaded. I paid a couple extra dollars for extra toppings on the fully loaded pizza  and told them to load it up in which they did!

Their lasagna and spaghetti was also delicious as well and great for the 2 for 1 deal.

Thanks Stan’s! See you in a couple of weeks!🤝💪🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP364d2qgz8NoKJ1WU_6p2AttleeEgKCaytGM3a&fid=0x0:0xd1090a24cc146d1"],"When":"2023-7-7"},{"Name":"James Sloan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVA-agu3VJJ1b4cH3FSrybrAm4sxkh85afsrr_K0JW7gzoYvVjz1g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Somehow every time I order from here, while hoping it may return to its late 2010s glory, it gets worse. Fewer and fewer toppings, the thinnest layers. Higher prices and fewer toppings. It used to be a thick pizza and the big meat feast was just that. I get more value and quality from Fresh Slice and Pizza Factory. Stan’s used to be the best in the city. Now it’s a bit of a rip off. I’ll try again next year.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Chicko Chicken Burnaby Hastings

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"D. King Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVB1pTIZKXMEaom2kveXGwQIOnn9G4OdGsfjUgp4EjbBifUBYM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Chicko Chicken started my Korean fried chicken obsession. I probably order from Chicko more often than I should, but it’s delicious every time. Great portion too. I can usually get two meals out of one half-and-half take-out order. Their shake-shake fries are awesome too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4_sxEKu4nVUx8CSwaTLwxSUV_me8AaOOBKNGc&fid=0x0:0xe3b27f83dc6eab84"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Jeff Hsu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKfjc_R7aVAPRo0VyI6oU0tZO5pupl1x44BfxvOpJdRP-s0Rg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It's pretty good, you get a lot of chicken even in the half order, good value too.

The chicken was very juicy with some tendony bits but that's to be expected of dark meat. I wouldn't really describe it as crispy, it's more of a crunch that I haven't experienced in other Korean fried chicken places with larger patches of batter instead of a fine crust.

The yangyeom sauce I think is a little heavy on the honey or whatever they use to sweeten it, the spice level is just right for a non-chili head.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsjIhSKY0No1iZk2yWTO9AnGmfVr216i9SyGJk&fid=0x0:0xe3b27f83dc6eab84"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Meghan M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK3la8m51sF4RETDMMvfI97eATj8wqBPfdHRcDCMaUG1TbH=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered half half from this store. Each piece of chicken was with yellow, maybe fat. some of them tasted fishy. I was wondering whether they have been processed with ginger or other spices to get rid of unpleasant smell. I also ordered in Robson last week, why did their chicken taste good and without yellow? I used to really like Chicko Chicken and ordered many times. Really upset this time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNizJs1OqEon-_WBVMO9ogcIM4RqZ7SGVnuvOk&fid=0x0:0xe3b27f83dc6eab84"],"When":"2024-4-14"},{"Name":"R B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI1qxegFBBQ8rxSsaWI50kF0e80bMSeqRC65vXsJWOEx8xPeQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Love this place so much! Their chicken is amazing and love the flavors of the sauce. I’m giving it only 4 stars because I really wish they offered steamed rice as a side.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Al F.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUS_pmj-RSU2YyeFbV9ka-UGajZNlP_A8B4P0sccqxwqhzcA-Ny=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always delicious .
I get 2 meals out of a 1/2 order
Decent price for a really good quality meal 😋😋😋
Definitely one of my favourites.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSKzgz7ZqXn3eZLdxLdnKroJ1hmHWdFxNIRFct&fid=0x0:0xe3b27f83dc6eab84"],"When":"2024-6-15"},{"Name":"Nathaniel Christopher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWefJ3eHP2a4X3E9qBf-dpyYxDjjpOxQPNSWxmC72sdcs1WOYbn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"At long last the Heights finally has a go-to chicken place! My buddy and I had dinner her tonight and we both agreed it was the best Korean chicken we have ever had. I ordered the original chicken which was very tender, crispy and not-at-all greasy or gristly. My friend ordered the buldak chicken (not pictured) which was very spicy and incredibly flavourful. Today was their first day and I have no doubt that I will be coming back in the months and years ahead. Welcome to the neighbourhood! :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNz9pvMemZEQedKGMHvDSmG2lUcHI9UBxi5Fv6r&fid=0x0:0xe3b27f83dc6eab84"],"When":"2022-5-4"},{"Name":"Ben","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLUPgdSyWZ3aTWwwnESZaSRJf8t_y_oBRQlEfjK-SB4dJfKj64=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was my first time to having Chico. I got the original and sweet & spicy half and half for pickup. The sweet and spicy was quite salty personally, but original was really good and super crispy. I would try next time just original chicken and sweet & spicy sauce on the side. then It would be really great","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfJX_2eU-KOsqJuMdhtoBigC526w6EHuXLuFQC&fid=0x0:0xe3b27f83dc6eab84"],"When":"2023-4-23"},{"Name":"Trish Hunt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUF1eLBQJNwTX1z59Hmu-gKdSGBgcnPRSsF1j5GTBewdMFJHNU1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I tried Chicko Chicken for the first time a few days ago after having walked past it several times since it opened. I can't handle spicy, so I ordered the original flavour option (the person taking my order was very pleasant and helpful).

I got a half order of boneless chicken, which was larger than expected—good value for the money. However, I found it to lack flavour. The coating was nice and crisp, but I wanted more salt /pepper.

I found some pieces a bit fatty, which is never pleasant. And a dipping sauce would have been a welcome addition. They have several flavour options, which likely have more seasoning.

Overall, it wasn't awful, but I probably won't revisit. That said, it's worth a try if you're craving crispy fried chicken.","Images":null,"When":""}]
