user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sahand M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKh1Ty24GcVc9aSntX21P1KTHr3LwaLy0IF-Jxg5aq-0s186w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Berlin style donair is phenomenal. The use a home make pocket bread that is perfectly crispy on the outside and flaky on the inside. They stuff it with a delicious combo of red cabbage, lettuce, and tabouleh, followed by fried and a generous amount of meat. The highlight for me was the garlic and spicy red pepper spreads. They use high quality ingredients that all come together really well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_ZeKLkso6Rrr0RCTOcqjK8mTcIihamAn0pJFn&fid=0x0:0x9eaaa7a775bf84d5"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"Niki Ahmadpour","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwggyo4TIOZ6_D6Ue0eGM7Bl6RxBX8qkAAJJc_MGqSa1ChffwkcQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Unfortunately, we haven't found a doner spot in BC that truly brings back the memories of Istanbul's iconic doner, but Parsly Doner is the best I've come across here. The meat had a pleasant flavor, though it could have been a little juicier. The bread was perfect—soft and fresh.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwHNJPLfOrKKKRqK891z5mZnz7E_1a7jNidGkh&fid=0x0:0x9eaaa7a775bf84d5"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Erkan Esgin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJknQpvAh6E5aBqL8CP__DXE1SNlgEVsBjdMQEb5hm3cS8seA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently ordered meals for a family gathering of 16 guests from Parsley Berlin Style Döner, and I cannot express how incredible the experience was. From start to finish, everything was handled with care and professionalism. The staff was outstanding, assisting me through every step, from taking my order to ensuring everything was completed flawlessly.

The food itself was absolutely phenomenal! Every single guest raved all night about how delicious, fresh, and surprisingly light the meals were. The portions were generous, more than enough to satisfy everyone at our gathering, and the quality was beyond impressive.

Parsley truly made our evening special with their exceptional service and amazing food. I highly recommend them to anyone looking for a stress-free and flavorful dining experience, whether for a large gathering or a small meal. I’ll definitely be back for more. What an amazing experience!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Geetanjali Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKh9Ov2Z3hsuOg1P3FT9FYCqfyu-QHeiXAQo55vH8AkoBiQOw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"To start with, the girl over the counter Gurjot, has zero customer handling skills, how about saying " I apologize for what you faced" than saying "You are Wrong, you do not know how to order " No listening but arguing and putting her baseless point forward. I had ordered delivery of 3 Donair Box with Falafel and Fries, such huge disappointment to see it came with just falafel and fries "NO pickled cabbage no Tomatoes" when the menu on UE shows it does. It was completely dry to consume even with the dressing. This place has been so high on ratings and food quality, however today worst on Customer handling skills and poorest on food quality and sad looking food. Above all I feel the girl over the counter has no regard to the feedback provided and was ready to pounce me instead, zero fact checking skills in her. Parsley Donair please look into the matter for your own business sake!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLIh4u7iqFAhYr9GuVJBAEUz_buGe6IJ7yOnlG&fid=0x0:0x9eaaa7a775bf84d5"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"ulearn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVqdbbGKqtOlB_UPwPQj-3KwX4ez-IUE9Zs16_kfn3C4jmbXC5ag=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This is my second time I went. This time it was lunch. I ordered the falafel with fries. While waiting for the food, it appears they were going to be giving me old fries. Not knowingly, I took my phone out, and the chef decided to throw the fries out as I was going to take a photo of the sad looking fries of 6! A new batch was made...but extra ones too that were kept at the side... At least I got a fresh batch.

I wished they did NOT put the sauce all over my food. Had I known, I would have asked if they could put it in a container. A little messy with no utensils. Falafel was tasty. The fries were fresh. I wished the sauce was on the side though.

The first time I tried, it was for dinner around 6pm, they didn't have any more falafel.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgITGWJDoJX-3BPz3fREBy78sEZSDb2IC6peLX&fid=0x0:0x9eaaa7a775bf84d5"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"S K (OxtailGravy)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIINjUguJePPet75HTnX-unbS8rsk4LQ_Ku9eCz7eh0Wy--ZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great experience? Loved the service, atmosphere was great considering it was in a mall. Food was too notch, fresh and flavourful. Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1PSFyrqkEZmi4uBOcW0wbbANTUwfEvtypnSjo&fid=0x0:0x9eaaa7a775bf84d5"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"William Ting","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVROj5tKGe8MbrrNOhk8-59eVUA_x7_lmH6eRP-mRZLTzD9H6iPlA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Berlin doner sandwich is really good. You can’t find this type of sandwich much elsewhere. Give it a try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN91nXEAh1gRFXO1lioTq_QIzaktov9CqfgpFdf&fid=0x0:0x9eaaa7a775bf84d5"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"Fox hmp","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQDamDUP5o_LpyAHYzMLSTM2wh8oeibxwZqA9_fJNfLvrII5o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tried the Parsley Berlin Style Doner-Kebab and was a good experience! I would say the food was acceptable but a bit pricey. The best things about this place was the atmosphere and the business looks like is running by a family and they cook the fresh ingredients when you’re ordering something.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1E4CvfhpSJRgo7cr-_gJlx0AMvEpjaLQ3fKh2&fid=0x0:0x9eaaa7a775bf84d5"],"When":"2024-2-22"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"June Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKzXV1QDFZAt3cJmi78pgqSEDqp_rNv0wK7gXZ37UjNfgDZDg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"From appetizers to desserts, this restaurant exceeded all our expectations! Every dish we tried was bursting with flavour. Staff was friendly and attentive. Also love the romantic ambiance. It was definitely a memorable dining experience. Can’t wait to come back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPH5C1VtnRZkRxdcB-5V-i8P0C3rd-9jam9_Yrj&fid=0x0:0xb17651381d7f6e0a"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tonight’s dinner at Portobello was quite fun! We invited some friends to join our family for dinner, and I could say it was good value for a lovely evening. The service was decent, around 4/5. We opted for the set menu, which included the soup of the day, with some guests choosing chicken and others going for the pasta option.

The soup was just mediocre which was a clear soup with ravioli but was nice as a warm starter. The chicken with white sauce and vegetable was fantastic—I loved it! The pasta, on the other hand, was a bit underwhelming :(; the tomato sauce was quite dry, and the shells didn’t impress. We had wanted to order the seafood pasta vongole with wine and olive oil, but they informed us there were no mussels in stock, so we were told to better go with another set menu in pasta by the male server which was a downer.

Overall, considering the value and the romantic ambiance, I wouldn’t hesitate to return, as it lived up to my expectations.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODQvOTe6UVHmkyM4kFv-74y5ZVyA7WWt-3Z1r5&fid=0x0:0xb17651381d7f6e0a"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Frank Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQVWxm34ym1TrKqTzJ1sgwmIkqBJFbxPkNGLXl8eGbEIS8IN0S=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was an unforgettable experience with inviting decor set the perfect tone for a cozy Italian meal at Portobello. The food was outstanding. I highly recommend their Carbonara, one of my favorite!

The service was attentive and friendly. Portobello is the place to go for authentic Italian cuisine with a welcoming atmosphere and top-notch service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZd5_QSRB49S1bD2MnT2Z1XYpQAzCpfb_BFW_n&fid=0x0:0xb17651381d7f6e0a"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Andy Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL1_8YDLEJRcgtfrvcNriMfE724aSIUklGzO73zcn1JlXuZuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best italian restaurants I’ve ever tried. Fantastic food with service that treats you like an old friend. The food comes from another world, flavourful and cooked to perfection. The most wonderful carbonara we’ve ever had. Highly recommend their Prosciutto & Melone and Calamari as well. All at a very reasonable price!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO74gSNzMcz3QlWxWtxxthN6oZ5uvewacTH4Laj&fid=0x0:0xb17651381d7f6e0a"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"Teresa T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ5EAyNfj8Et2CMX51ghXiuDj71_F3D7PTjQ7rpqEbXHPn0fw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an incredible dining experience at this Italian restaurant! The appetizers, especially the fresh mussels and burrata, were delicious. The pastas were outstanding—Penne Con Polpette was tasty, and the Carbonara had a perfect, rich flavor balance. Both the veal and chicken were juicy and tender. The atmosphere was beautifully decorated with perfect lighting, giving it a romantic and comfortable vibe. Friendly staff and excellent service made the evening even better. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipON6swbTKZhk2gVnw807-ie1-6T4BeybZWIB6iC&fid=0x0:0xb17651381d7f6e0a"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Tony Ren","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVIVfJOcRNb-xi5kgq0bY8zRtxoAvgtMyvXT1RVKLhFpgm6g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The dim lighting and soft Italian music create a romantic atmosphere. All food amazing and the service was impeccable and friendly . One of our best dining I ‘ve had in a long time highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNY9ZJWLiGhE2zGpM3KPeQ86_Fe45IlFQsAocgV&fid=0x0:0xb17651381d7f6e0a"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"John Fiket","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVB8QQuEZHdtQtE7ZJY78cE9pWkbTy4AS7Is6sqb9z6C27TpJl=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fifth time in Portobello, and the service again was exceptional! This time we had the Cioppino Di Mare and Prosciuto with Melone. Gorgeous.

Usually will get a Veal Milanaise, off menu. Accommodating and warm.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQhkBBPDPnubpobACjBURf4zWTdfOPnGCPy-Xv&fid=0x0:0xb17651381d7f6e0a"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Nikki Sy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBjATsJMmB41G9yqWFoEPo05_lPP8oOi4rOJgcyxBVDlQkbFzp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went here for my birthday. The pasta and seafood are delicious. I highly recommend this restaurant and will definitely  come back again to try other  menu. Sometimes they have promotions like 3 course meal but it wasnt available anymore the time i visited them.
The chef came out and sang a happy birthday for me. Appreciate this gesture. They are open only for dinner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgC7EFc0O3uv0zOtjKRc0RCe0ss0p0cIJYFfMC&fid=0x0:0xb17651381d7f6e0a"],"When":"2024-5-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Bailey Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpdFLjs8_vQ_jRhE8_6FCg522FWJ1KNmcD1VTguoUB4ZsQyxslyw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"FRESH fish, quick service, and delicious all around! Shen sushi is my family’s go-to sushi spot in Burnaby! Very friendly staff! The hamachi had really great marbling and was the perfect balance to the creamy uni and ikura 😍 so good!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO68ynTfifSYFiAXpv8b-6Kwu9Uus1k7Pun4moL&fid=0x0:0xf38887354d6fc6c0"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"D&C Bobeldijk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXplHpUffVr2w2xP633S5wz6NSCNWAC0DAewnz32JeUK7wseT8P=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"With so many Japanese food options on Hastings, this is THE place to go eat or order from.

The food quality is TOP notch, the service is awesome, the variety of offering is great, pricing is on par with other restaurants.  And the value is outstanding.

Consistently providing great sushi, we’ve been order or dining in for the past 2 years.
Our favs are the staples: Avocado roll, Tuna roll, Sockeye Sashimi roll, Tuna & Sockeye Sashimi etc.

And for fun try the DejaVu or Geisha Roll when you can… LOVE IT","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlIfKTS9SQLrfJtW_VK2liCSWAdeX9qbWzC7v4&fid=0x0:0xf38887354d6fc6c0"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Nick (Neek)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1vFxY7J8TeGvCzfbDb-8G1ZKZ5NRu0re3I-xGPfKYIH_u9Mgytw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The sushi here was pretty good. A little on the pricier side for signature rolls, but the quality makes up for it. All of the cuts of fish were fresh, and the flavors blended well together. Although it may be a bit pricey, I really recommend getting the Red Dragon Roll.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOO6Ee9_lzEVH8bdJ_CgZqvjNHZ7jViHZtIxiAG&fid=0x0:0xf38887354d6fc6c0"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Melissa Denise","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmPJUZyg5bbjNmbLw_9Zpw5GxBBDSB1XEPNgj4DHq-_lkoMwmALg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I love Japanese food and this place comes off as very authentic.

The restaurant is small so you may have to wait for a table during peak times. Really cute decor and a huge menu. I'll definitely need to come back and try more things!

The miso soup was nice, hot, and flavorful. The gomae was fresh and unique from other places I've gone to. It's like they added something citrus to it? It was really good!

I had various types of nigiri for my main course. The sashimi was sooooo yummy!

However, I had the chicken oyako don and I found it lacked flavour. It was almost flavorless. Only good thing was that it was a huge portion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipML3aB4U_BC5Ruc6fQjiJmdPJN2oDM2HS5i67yV&fid=0x0:0xf38887354d6fc6c0"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"Milad Hakimi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJS3tct7xdR_FQg-khxqYfaH1AaaOQttjGkVsM1Uxloq07E-lf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Updated:

I also recommend the chicken curry don. The volume was adequate, chicken was crispy, and curry was delicious.

Previous Review:

Great place for sushi!
My wife and I have visited here three times and enjoyed our meals very much.

My wife loves the mixed veggie rolls and yam tempura roll. She likes the way the yam remains hot and crispy in the roll.

I have tried Grouse Mountain and Maple rolls which kinda looked and taste the same. They were both awesome. The crunchy crumbs sprinkled on top of the rolls complement the softness of the fish and give it a more pleasant bite :)))

I had also tried Kastsu don here but it didn’t live up to my expectations. So I strongly suggest their sushi not Katsu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgAPUyy9qS7IiqeW0uZvX4pDIA7O9Xc1t_07As&fid=0x0:0xf38887354d6fc6c0"],"When":"2024-5-1"},{"Name":"Cici N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUu7mZH8nBSPWe5_6B2A2PSU2g63qgAyuimOI-E5DNsDjTWmKYW6w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this place! It's probably the best sushi spot on burnaby. Large menu with unique flavorful rolls and great varieties of food. Affordable prices!! Cozy atmosphere!! Friendly staff! Food came out at a good pace","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPoVMqxIrws7uSqYoNauep3vq-_9I5Xkys-w2Ni&fid=0x0:0xf38887354d6fc6c0"],"When":"2024-2-3"},{"Name":"Simon Blizzard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3d4fwUCBSt_Mht_8fKEduAFdxHa2yGgbV-a0ZdghLFNvdhwuX1w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The sushi was so good, especially for the pricing. Only thing I didn't love was the sunrise roll (?) because i think it had a bit too much mango but everything still slapped hard. would def come back and get other stuff too","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeS_45adfsEB-0lXE35i0R3ztmdXqr9cROROKe&fid=0x0:0xf38887354d6fc6c0"],"When":"2024-5-15"},{"Name":"Kerry Guo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpp3aak52U_8OVEHMzCSWI7wrdmHczN6ZSFUZnLaja9_uZqg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The onion was burned to dark, and the whole fried vegetables tasted bitter. I can’t really eat it after several tried. and I asked the server if this is normal, she said because of onion is the first layer, so it’s normal like this. I told her it’s literally bitter the whole meal because of the burned onion. she said she can replace the onion for me😂 that’s so funny because the whole meal got ruined due to the onion and she only wants to replace the onion for me. I rejected and said I don’t wanna pay for this, she mentioned the vegetable only few dollars and in the end she reduced $1 off… fine… she didn’t even apologize and sounds like onion should be like this…  Uni taste not very fresh as well. Won’t come back anymore!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPF-XeECtPxeykP49zL6zWEk8aJK73U36iMdBxO&fid=0x0:0xf38887354d6fc6c0"],"When":"2024-7-23"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Grace Mckay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK4ixyY2jH64Gch5kvhqZoMutW6bOSFlpvVppEcIp8QdygR2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you are visiting Burnaby Lake, you should consider grabbing lunch or dinner. El Comal is a 2 minute drive from the lake. Authentic food, great flavor and generous portions at a reasonable price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZFacqzKPabXxVyxXtx3VUbV7TSD6lIlExplxg\u0026fid=0x0:0xaf0d05ce0b53a855"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"Mitchell Wiebe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJDZlR2Y-60m-4tpVKJv3UeUVUv0HQULjd0jgLmcBlZB1dBFg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had the burrito combo with a coke, with tip it only cost $20. So much food and the favour was on point! Will absolutely come back here again and try something else on the menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOM5xpHDMVqrvhqn7GrmEW07q8gNHeOxV71OkFh\u0026fid=0x0:0xaf0d05ce0b53a855"],"When":"2024-5-31"},{"Name":"Hayden R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQGohyquZMJ3e4ehgNCyKdYRsTNhcaSXUapQbU8keSoz_2Iw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Food is decent. Poor value. About $16.40 for burrito with small sides of rice and beans (in take-out box), compared to a mucho burrito at Mucho Burrito for $1 more. El Comal has about 4 filling items and 3 topping sauces, compared to 9-10 items and unlimited sauce that Muchos offers (including guac) and about 3 to 4x the meat (as pic shows).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1uSb42UMEXeZVUJwn61UpQD8JEqcNqoUT1Ktq\u0026fid=0x0:0xaf0d05ce0b53a855"],"When":"2023-11-13"},{"Name":"Anthony Plaxen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0TosyGAQWTqM_XvTHaXfq2jDGHv6ifKWBgTGcJKYnap3ceipL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Many years ago this place had fantastic takeaway and good food. Decided to give it a try after many years, the food is decent. I ordered a burrito combo with rice and beans, the beef burrito was okay, personally liked the churri sauce on the side it was well balanced. The beans and rice could use a bit of work, a bit off par. Decent food at a reasonable price, although hard to get to due to construction on Winston road. 3/5 stars.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvpB_HN2rxieH-f9EI7MVy__bHpZ0gTKFOfyMM\u0026fid=0x0:0xaf0d05ce0b53a855"],"When":"2024-2-3"},{"Name":"James Basnett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXM2U6QuObKCSf4ncWP3_Lv03EnxxoNEKa9VcgdHOYjL1eAjPC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Chicken burrito was great. Service was very friendly and stayed late for us.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIcYJZEQe469mmUCZBpVbwLkcdrznuR-dGSID1\u0026fid=0x0:0xaf0d05ce0b53a855"],"When":"2024-6-20"},{"Name":"Gabriela Sandoval Wolff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMFrorPFHMAYx6n8sN9SHEnC-xHBzcnSvKt8m30IkkbsTZUdmA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"What kind of business is only open for 5 hours from Monday to Friday? My mother and I have been here twice on the weekend and it has been closed. This was our preferred place for Mexican products as they had great quality tortillas and delicious tamales and other items for take-out. I understand that this is due to new ownership, but I would guess that a lot of business is being lost by being closed on the weekend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"RTD Clockers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLLrQ_EHRODytUYjKKiXvfYolp7PL3stY-1Yx8GhLVj__EBNg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Showed up at 4:30. Sign says open until 5. Apparently the kitchen closes “around 4 sometime”. Would be fabulous to know that somewhere instead of wasting time\nDriving around hthe kitchen for absolutely nothing 👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shu Oshika","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNnLC-zcgklDKB8PAEQhhwl4dGl91ZJ-2WcrxF-MjzXBhPmzoDCA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"OK, though I am not so fond of Mexican foods.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONdXzdsw2AhcjNn_4a1y12LGV25DmX1CuLo3E1\u0026fid=0x0:0xaf0d05ce0b53a855"],"When":"2024-8-22"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Jamie Magpantay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCEuUYQ-qh5OxbQ_YKFPHbNnCCikca7H8mw4Y4p1OEISn5scL0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great hidden gem in Burnaby! I had the classic breakfast and it was delicious! Will come back to try more items soon. A nice family run diner with lots of parking and ample seating. Great to have a place like this in the neighbourhood amongst the overpriced fancy breakfast chains","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyZUhe9hZIhuBYYyq7AqIuA0jlobEZAUsSlCg4\u0026fid=0x0:0x906340cce3a87910"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"JP","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX90NeQebsEGfp9rJe7B7QdUfdncEkOmwFrEw8C0EIB0z7Jl9-uUg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an omelet and French toast, and they were both delicious and reasonably priced. The place is run by a Korean couple, which gave it a warm, cozy atmosphere. Compared to Denny’s and IHOP, I actually thought it tasted even better.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdCK3LKcnjqHHoC_AbpGuhPTSGeKTgFqbjbTxV\u0026fid=0x0:0x906340cce3a87910"],"When":"2024-11-8"},{"Name":"B W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJp85P5JohieEKJOfTMzyjH1aTNit_eIhBL3dFVyxf0xS2BxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Missus and I have passed by Astro’s many times on the way to Costco. The diner style eatery is run by a Korean couple and the ordering and delivery of the food was very prompt. We have tried both the breakfast and lunch (French toast, classic breakfast, clubhouse and turkey sandwich). The food is not bad and is good value for the dollar compared to others. If in the area, we will drop by again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbvGwoRDyYkAgVOc-GlU6S4lDCSgpK6y0JAQex\u0026fid=0x0:0x906340cce3a87910"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"Parm Mann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHE0u-97kqTOD4PGwD81615zKrG7blg3TjYeRy2oRRaTlPZt0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Rare poutine served with ketchup. Good quantity for the price. I came in the morning and they still indulged my Poutine request. Solid taste, nothing incredible but goes the job as well as one can hope. No cheese curds is what it is but the cheese tasted quite good","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM81SC04E2PMQt0R7vzRVOyqze71R7tqLX2SihN\u0026fid=0x0:0x906340cce3a87910"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Jake Maxim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBjxlJeIgfTzkZdhvFXRGr5bxciNoyk6AdIrCffARRZ8c_jnkivQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Small diner where an older Korean couple runs the place. Great if you want cheap, quick diner style food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdKNvQbaz3GiGQL8RodRimklJP7VKxbkxznCbh\u0026fid=0x0:0x906340cce3a87910"],"When":"2024-5-22"},{"Name":"MIke Hill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGQ7Y3daqUwQlyp2dK2OM3ecauPeUQ7C3IiJ83CVvAoSbirGv8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Easy to find my first impression is good looked like a mom and pop’s kind of place  the portion is very good  vary fresh and fast if you come here in the winter, I would wear something warm because it’s full of beautiful windows but that makes it a little cold.\nI will be back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdTaF_MCGyHEiaIWB2STZ3zP3Y24yang-8-xDn\u0026fid=0x0:0x906340cce3a87910"],"When":"2023-3-6"},{"Name":"Brian wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIecyvptBtaPU7d4m0H02OPlrGoOkqo7hrw-3q6pzNG-rRQ-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tried their lunch Teriyaki Beef with rice and Curry Rice with Fried Chicken, they are okay.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIQ98Hp6rtDAQAHNvyu8bt7k3KnGFXTkGMuGrh\u0026fid=0x0:0x906340cce3a87910"],"When":"2024-3-25"},{"Name":"Desiree Baron","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-bppP1u1CWXi-Iv6q7E8SuU5PXj49B9vRTQzIVAr12xQgMZ8a=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Stumbled across this place while killing time before going to a course early in the morning. Delicious French toast , reasonably priced, would definitely come back.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Busan Daeji Gukbap Korean Restaurant

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Melinda W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqFa91nGQX9-WVxFZ-rAUul10GF70bhWZFQZe97ymoPVUZrvFxnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Gukbap (rice in soup) is always my favorite. That's why I wanted to try this restaurant for a long time.

I ordered the spicy pork bone soup set for lunch. The soup is very tasty with the big pieces of pork bones in it. I would have given it a 5 stars if the pork bones were more tender. These were a bit too chewy by my standard.

I came to the restaurant at 11:30am so it was pretty quiet. The servers came over to check in with me a few times to see if the food was ok with me. I'm proud to use my limited Korean to tell them 너무 맛있어요 (very delicious!)!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuNEX20n76l-l5ctGj3kSCGc2CZGq-xpKiScut&fid=0x0:0x4a403e9e1d8106e6"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"Kelsey P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQSKE90gC9ubGjvWepPY5_IEJ5Qi8mlbTU7GLQl0JdpW4lsg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came in with my son, we passed at least 4 restaurants before settling here, it is amazing. A1!

We ordered the fried boneless chicken, they give a sweet and sour sauce with it and it is to die for. They also accommodated my son with complimentary snacks while he had to wait.

The service is spectacular. We had the sweetest waitress, she has been so kind to my son as well. Family restaurant, date restaurant, casual, business meeting, this place is suitable for most occasions.

Highly recommend. !! So happy I live close by, will be coming back 10/10","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzigleUc-y_OQA93f8VrOeIV_UZxCw_-qbEatH&fid=0x0:0x4a403e9e1d8106e6"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Allison Sun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqF8Xp1V516Y5QvErsfRLKhcbJNk6UYTa-800Uydr2MqBcdHg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been here like 20 or 30 times…like the food, like the staff, like the atmosphere, and price, too! Not a very fancy place, but a very warm, chill, and relaxing restaurant that you want to come everyday after a long-day work! Highly recommend:)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPP3K9OC47QBjjUl6dU-RzXOha632B-AYfsd6fx&fid=0x0:0x4a403e9e1d8106e6"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"Sung Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJf0aKO-Q3-Wo5fFixg_Bl6b17fDXK9kXA_IaKcFWVoWnLllQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Visit for 4 people. No reservation. Several visits personally. Consistent taste and service has been noted.

Decent price and service for the price you pay. Servers are generally attentive, but Korean style. Press the "bell"

Side dishes are okay, slight decline since the covid, understandable as the ain dish price has not gone up as much as some other places.

Overall, I would revisit as the soup tastes very good and the contents of the soup is hearty. I would return again and again.

Try their soup, if you need some hearty soup for the hard day you've had! (Korean style comfort food for you.)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuO_WqeyoyMNrm-KPzPhJzktOLrVijCIdnZLME&fid=0x0:0x4a403e9e1d8106e6"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"Linh Tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbP3plInkqXVOA2XJc8czoQ80aWBGnT8WS-yMiUPgvNShtt-y90A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We ordered via Uber eats once and I liked the soup so we visited the store today. Sundae (Korean blood sausage) soup with pork intestine was as good as I remembered, rich with hearty texture, you just need to add a bit of salt to make it perfect. Fried chicken is not very impressive, despite the fact that we like the teokbokki, the batter of chicken was just too thick. The takoyaki is too floury, it's very difficult to find any octopus. Pan chan (side dishes) are pretty poor compared to other Korean restaurants. The restaurant is old, the furniture is torn out, and there is some serious cleaning up needed for the female toilet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3AuJBKhwMIYvUnzkk7MsptjqlgbX6hGMsVeZ1&fid=0x0:0x4a403e9e1d8106e6"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Jason York","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2KL5JJiTZL1QVt_3AcqILQXXBIuqDWdYOdj3lYENvavlAma6S8A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Open until 2am!
We ordered the "Bul-Jokbal" which is a spicy flame grilled boneless pork feet dish (this is the reason I came here), super delicious but not very spicy.
The bbq short ribs never disappoint.
We also got the 3-person pork bone soup which was MEGA big...if I were to estimate, the pot it came out in was approximately 4 liters big!
Then we also got the pork intestine stuffed with glass noodles...an acquired taste and texture, but mild (not for everyone).
We were 5 people and the bill came out to approximately $200. We were absolutely stuffed and had leftovers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsfyeqZJ2YVfcZt-A-bM3rHvnr0_PMI1crsgjc&fid=0x0:0x4a403e9e1d8106e6"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Chowchow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL5zTlemnCuzSzg0SiodpOjq3GIMb3zLWmnHmu0Lpx1dVNrYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered the pork bone soup hot pot and it’s no disappointment!!! Very thick broth and very tasty 😋 would recommend to everyone! The place is slightly old and the server seemed to be very busy but I’m okay with it as long as the food is good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqLwZdKXF2oK7YeUdnGV4FLOly5OOJFY8-wTix&fid=0x0:0x4a403e9e1d8106e6"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"skr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIcuhU2CLfpC2Z6zhqf2JvPfEX3PFzkuNqk6OK8TD1kgxyFdg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The servers called the cops on me because I refused to follow their “law” requiring customers to pay a specific amount as a tip. We were a group of nine. After we finished eating, they demanded an 18% tip, without letting us to choose from the machine, claiming, “It’s our law, you must follow.” I explained to them that I would pay my bill with the desired amount of tips. It’s not a law in Canada. One of the servers was raging and telling me "We served you with the side dishes, you must pay the tips". I asked "Will you charge the customers 50% tips because it is your law?" The server was shocked. The cop arrived, who stated, "If you don’t pay the tips, you are not committing a crime. We can’t do anything to you." I ended up paying 15% instead of 18%. I will never come back to this restaurant. Horrible service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYK-dzPdOP7Z-0fuy_nxz5CoSZSJVl8dqB4s3P&fid=0x0:0x4a403e9e1d8106e6"],"When":"2024-11-17"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Anthony Plaxen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0TosyGAQWTqM_XvTHaXfq2jDGHv6ifKWBgTGcJKYnap3ceipL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good Korean taiyaki located in Korea town on the Coquitlam Burnaby border. When it comes to a choice over the sweet bean or Bavarian cream filling, I’d always choose the Bavarian cream taiyaki. I’ve also had their pancakes before they’re also quite good. Very hot and fresh and the prices are quite reasonable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3krBrapwf2L9feWwcYDeG9s-zEkKeD9fcZhrJ&fid=0x0:0x1561fa74d69dfcef"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Jacqueline Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIhcQScJBfI45a62J6HUgF8LhdTwX2F9dikSt8Dr0-Uf_ISbg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The taste is ok. I tried the red bean paste, the paste is not as thick as before. Also, the price went up, it was $5 for 4, but now is $5 for only 3. And two years ago, it was even $5 for 5…… -_-","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6Wqh_opUScTWSeRV0cN1rt4IrJOjh3fRrgjxr&fid=0x0:0x1561fa74d69dfcef"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Grace Yeung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ6UDIJXqin-o0SaR4T4xXC8b2KEUXvJX54Vkfh3BUJ8CHo2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The taiyaki is made to order and very fresh, with three flavors to choose from. However, the filling is quite sparse, and the waiting time is extremely long.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_D1-TtoMn6mPauYzr_ayGutYcADWDjHyxsQVB&fid=0x0:0x1561fa74d69dfcef"],"When":"2024-11-15"},{"Name":"Essa Rachel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZ6j_jWinwNVrCO5bgIprXmdvywonQ98dUmRn4cU19tpNII5MJ1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We tried one of everything. Our favourite was the cinnamon brown sugar pancake!

Very hot and no waiting - treats are fresh off the grill. We tried the taiyaki place upstairs as well but this one won out by a long shot (although the other one was good, it was double the price and long wait as the taiyaki were made to order).","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Y L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV236YiWDAw91lf0BivhX8vPLApY6lFjId9AQG1MMNy3GQCimu9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's like I am back in Korea! Delicious waffles. If I lived close I would go everyday. The texture of the waffle part is chewy and soft. The filling inside is not too sweet and tastes perfect!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMte5lD2TKUNi5_oNsQJMelDg15uqqDFlx4frrn&fid=0x0:0x1561fa74d69dfcef"],"When":"2023-11-5"},{"Name":"Jackie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvUQ9aJ1wSufelDKgqON2H6lO7iMGLWM2g-QyJYoOznHaBLkrZTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Find this little cart just to the left of Han Nam Supermarket under the concrete stairs.

Amazing taiyaki that are so fresh hot and delicious! I tried the custard and the veggie and they were both awesome.

4 taiyaki for $5 - such a deal!

Service was super nice and let me know it was a 7 min wait for them to be made.

Warmed the leftovers in the oven and they were just as good that evening.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNQgJz5LESPjHP9sSnOYT8mwtHnO61etX2iIEc&fid=0x0:0x1561fa74d69dfcef"],"When":"2023-3-1"},{"Name":"Wing Wing Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUM-NblQ23wPMIDbEZG4qLeVHUJU9mowQi7hKxpBL0edQSZtY9w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited this food truck around 3 pm and found a long line of eager customers, which was a testament to its popularity. The food didn't disappoint; it was truly tasty and well worth the 30-minute wait. It's worth noting that they close when they sell out, so getting there earlier is a good idea. The friendly owners added to the pleasant experience. With reasonable prices, this food truck is definitely worth a try. Plus, the proximity to Hannah Market next door means you can do some grocery shopping while you wait, making it a convenient stop for a delicious meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-_P466hCGDqORcn7OtEbICqmO7PUqz5bzrTOU&fid=0x0:0x1561fa74d69dfcef"],"When":"2023-10-9"},{"Name":"TIM C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsL9NSrG8jjAVNG-x9rN6XSoaFI_Viwwt29jo0hKnGaLtx37Tb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Passed by them few times, always have a line, but they were out of the fish, finally got to try it today, we ordered all 3 flavours of the fish.

Taste 1/1*
Love it!! Fresh red bean, wife absolutely loved the custard, and mother in law loved the veggies…I liked all 3 😂
As the guy was marking down our order, I saw that we were the only customer who ordered veggie flavour, so I said ‘your veggies aren’t very popular hey’, and the guy awkwardly laughed after saying ‘yes’…
But hey it was gooood, they are missing out!!

Value 1/1*
4 smallish medium sized tasteful fish for $5, worth it!!

Service 1/1*
Friendly with good expectation, was told 25min and that’s how long it took.

Cleanliness 1/1*
It’s a good truck

Overall/Revisit 1/1*
100% sure the wife will be asking to drop by again soon

Paying for ambience? NO
Above and beyond? 0/+1*","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcM9ia3iWZzDZQEZ34VL3KcWl_cDkYua-3xX4j&fid=0x0:0x1561fa74d69dfcef"],"When":"2023-11-15"}]

title: House of Tofu Soup
descriptions: Unassuming eatery dishing up Korean specialties like kimchi stew, bibimbap & tofu soup.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Alcohol","enabled":true},{"name":"Healthy options","enabled":true},{"name":"Small plates","enabled":true},{"name":"Vegetarian options","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true},{"name":"Seating","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true},{"name":"Cozy","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"Groups","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true}]},{"id":"children","name":"Children","options":[{"name":"Good for kids","enabled":true},{"name":"High chairs","enabled":true},{"name":"Kids' menu","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Paid street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Gohar Nazem","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFYnIcjZPmZKMu-9fEZ2kwaY5TZZuMqso5l-wwpjm-2Lk-kFhW=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"House of tofu soup is my favourite soup spot in the city. The soup tastes incredible every time. Another favourite is the mandukee (rice cakes and dumplings) the sauce is to die for and tastes so good! I alternate between the dumpling soup and the mushroom soup which are soo tasty for vegetarians. I have gone with friends that have the beef dishes and enjoy those too. The side dishes are a nice touch.
If you’re worried about parking, don’t be. There is plenty in the plaza right next to the restaurant and is short walking distance. I would park at the plaza rather than wait for a spot to open up right in front of the restaurant.
They’re always kind and try to seat people as soon as possible. I’m always happy to wait for a good meal like this","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHjdlvDgPb9BI92oygXAHkgZgnWDaHc0b8OvrM&fid=0x0:0x960bf3828f972ae7"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"San Wayne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjFb2dB41O9n_VFwgfqlyajgDnGhNggu7YKnObZ04VikDc3OZS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We ordered beef tofu soup, cold noodles and hot plates chicken. The beef in tofu soup is very beef. The tofu is very good. Sorry I don’t like the cold noodles personally.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAojgcfrx6akqOTQMhvk_pINWm2xSzQgAvNsaW&fid=0x0:0x960bf3828f972ae7"],"When":"2024-8-26"},{"Name":"Nelson Mah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMvSq7-l8Kje4bUGcJFo_gjx31JEZujbDf7RAmASmnqxtIa8Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is pretty good. Cold noodles tasted well, and the food itself was mild enough for people who can't eat spicy to handle (with option to go spicier)

There is limited space and parking. Best to go earlier or skytrain too. Also appreciate they stay open later.

Perfect alternative to the Korean BBQ restaurant on the other side","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFtQzLHuxw2m0ae1XTpPdjYmyIHzsZX5iI8ubQ&fid=0x0:0x960bf3828f972ae7"],"When":"2024-6-2"},{"Name":"Jessica Dhaliwal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOeC5VCbc6g3HH3dxXpDS9bE993HEKMDVI3SjHX2aNdHbQOJHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great experience with the food which was healthy and I found regular spice pretty spicy so seaweed helped. The server should have communicated more about the menu as we were choosing a vegetarian tofu soup option instead of rushing us. We asked if we could pick mushroom AND kimchi but weren't told the meal comes with kimchi anyways and someone at the table didn't know the egg should be opened into the soup right away so communicating that would have been nice too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-wupAknLN1_v7pGmojChbku3iA76xRieLzCMJ&fid=0x0:0x960bf3828f972ae7"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Ian Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJPXqdCYowBQ_CfYk2HQttHh7IDBeUHX7Du1VtrT_RMZb6-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food is awesome! Tofu soup is gorgeous. Only the thing I hope to change is size of the soup bowl. It’s small. Also, only few appetizers are available. Parking spots are more available at underground parking lot","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqLHcYXt9YhhOuys1kcdnkXgKYoubnieL5oSw&fid=0x0:0x960bf3828f972ae7"],"When":"2024-3-20"},{"Name":"Kristy Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEfZ2rjxNiODjhooQ3vu4wU52UFmMssx1nBEw-QrGtiP3D8nPb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Honestly not bad as far as authentic Korean food goes, although not the best I’ve had. For some reason, they would not let me order a raw egg in my soup as an add on, but did give me the raw egg on the side and I had to crack it into the soup myself. The soup itself was good with the egg and their meat is very very tender. I really enjoyed it. However, the mandu and the tteokbokki was quite overcooked. Would come back again as a comfort food spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP53FzyX4-blR15SxuwXJZtfZ-R1mc7PT_bkknN&fid=0x0:0x960bf3828f972ae7"],"When":"2024-3-21"},{"Name":"K’s coffee lover","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-385uQOflrqOxsV0QWsdIyhv-rxdZ7rLwLnLPmzpfPGzr9P6Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice place to enjoy Korean tofu pot where provide different choice from beef, pork, seafood to vegetables.  Each tofu pot comes with Korean pot rice and few Korean side dishes.  Overall experience is above average. Just beware of limited parking space.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOatEwHfpeyeAIL91Z-wry72X5GZoMgC4N8DInu&fid=0x0:0x960bf3828f972ae7"],"When":"2024-5-2"},{"Name":"Kayla Ok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2ZPW-HOTvhKWxZVs_tiGZng-PPQOf1u70Mg0ytQnqF8DWQ4ac=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really enjoyed coming here! The atmosphere was quiet so I could hear the other person at my table. The soup was the perfect amount of spice and I loved that you can crack an egg in the soup when it’s still boiling. We also ordered the fried dumpling which I recommend! The sides were also very good. Our server was very friendly:) I would come here again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_5wo9Ra8WNoI1pKWpYntuU9NnvnhrVvwrZOqM&fid=0x0:0x960bf3828f972ae7"],"When":"2024-3-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sree Gayathri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI84NcO8kc5mEWnzzLdMD_WI59CSjkN8JOZ3ouUQ-xyEBGIhjc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Please Check properly if the food is cooked.
I ordered a skewer and 3/4 was completely raw and pink inside.
Stay safe and check before consuming.
Be careful before eating","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1n9jbvqRdG5XfgnIDsh6YzYsVvfzz-64FKks_&fid=0x0:0x998dc626551f3b6b"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"Reza Mansouri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTdK2hm81HGTtthigh7khA1UvxR-CdRQr4JJHDCJnKAK5hDeweGA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What do you want from good food? It is one of the best places where you can eat tasty chicken with late cheese and mango cake. It is a wonderful combination. Don't miss it if you like it. Eat a delicious and different chicken. This is the best choice. As a tester, I went from Southeast Asia to the Middle East, Europe, and America. This was one of the best.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Selena Di","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpeYx0Hy_h2KTOyIkW4-1JaPj6jgnO27OxLHg2-s4kfI5B0x9Tqg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went there with another family so ordered the family platter, 1 whole chicken + 3 sides + 2 chicken skewers. We liked the Mango flavoured whole chicken a lot. It was juicy and flavourful. But the chicken skewer is rather dry. I love love love the shack sauce. So good. A bit mixed up of the order when I ordered green salad but got quinoa salad, but they resolved it quickly. And there’s also Cheesefactory cheese cakes!

Foods were served on paper plates, not a big problem but their garbage hole is so small to the plate size… I had to fold in half to throw it away… hope they could make it easier for the customers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOr8nWE4AHIooC1-17yhP_SsfESAaJFuJTHqwx7&fid=0x0:0x998dc626551f3b6b"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Thomas Wilczynski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJD24Or0RUBGSuMLrdcePCdBXv8sl7ZLUknVBIS-JYZ_nACiVt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great first impression for me! My meal was very tasty and very filling. I want to go back and try something spicier from the menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2ntvbn0xMhDGIX4x_Z1RmYMEKfkLd8wBkUZes&fid=0x0:0x998dc626551f3b6b"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"AL SULEMAN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLpVQoqd5U5Y9Q8NfpA-vTP1h8kTKdJ7K8PAEXWltDiSPy8nQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was very nice and airy in their upper floor patio Hastings and Sperling loc in BBY. They sat up a nice big table for 10 for us. Food was very tasty and perfectly cooked - service was great and timely. Staff very courteous and friendly. Manager personally came out to the patio to check if everything was to our satisfaction. Have been here before and will definitely come again. Thank you PERI much! 😝","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDTLH-rPpNbcdck7Ig1aYTUn5F0pMlddWo-J5U&fid=0x0:0x998dc626551f3b6b"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Payal Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJDXkC2L7o4TVaW-I_uwMBFw9iimU0c9OSo6V4GkgYE4mPMEw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This 5 rating is for Ferzaneh who made initiatives to call me and confirm the flavour for my order and accommodate my request","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPytuOoOd-Th6S01MBXqQX-HPR1G9-_Ve7OPmjj&fid=0x0:0x998dc626551f3b6b"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"jobanjeet singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKtc9sRN_71lmMvHHkfxie8IUkWRki-63LgShGuEu2ZJwzmX6Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good cheesecake options here . Food is good here too . Mango key lime cheesecake is yummy too 😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3wk8ZkZYT-HjsuBvwyrpsEQbZMxo6V9UZT61d&fid=0x0:0x998dc626551f3b6b"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Sarthak Arora","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWCKFhBKUSOumna3xMimrr47IsaztJdDUXfRGTSOCMGPWFFvSXIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had chicken and rice, so worth it! We were feeling a little adventurous, so the staff made us try their Perri Nero sauce and although it was super hot - we couldn’t resist not try as the flavour. You do need a drink along, but so worth it if you’re feeling it! Overall, awesome food and staff - will visit again!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tony Yeung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDgP0FbxtdcC7t0qPbwyQ3hu176jEqn0o8-kJrQX6QLoTnPIyo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"4.5 star overall .  Small mom and pop place but food was great. The lamb shank was particularly superb and might be better than most high class restaurants - and for less than $25.

Not a place for ambience.  Only quality food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOq1-AAvCbWXz1O4PzNXZowS4GrbGzyoRqH4LSy&fid=0x0:0xcfb7cbaeb63afe9b"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"良言夕","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVicqa49l__XzwWVogAzq7JFf-1Wv4AF32j-NkZx809y0LzZ6U=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The special is super good!!!!! The best I have ever had. I was recommended the special platter over the wrap and I love it immediately. Will definitely come again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN94cHOyoegvryZdx8SqNuRlbEi0b7MuvVZIHXq&fid=0x0:0xcfb7cbaeb63afe9b"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Kingramen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU35K9K-3WDR1LhMOarmobzfUiY3qJQT45Dn4vfHiWAkp32qFPGKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Reliable and good quality food in the neighborhood. Mixed meat plate was filling and good price for the portion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPELMCw3rBjuOwz2zC3pg43-XV8jExjQO8SYL6x&fid=0x0:0xcfb7cbaeb63afe9b"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"T Mills","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1vhnYWGwlVcFjhg90gzqPSVKn9-HdFXK_2IFUPDDyfLqaeik2=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome, family owned business! I live in this neighborhood so it's been a staple of mine for a while. Even if I didn't live close, I would still come back for the lamb on the regular. I honestly should have written a review sooner, but after yesterday, I had to. I ordered my meal over the phone to go pick it up. When I got there I was given an order that ended up not being the right one. Once I got home they called me and informed me of the error. I said I would come back, since it's close and just a minor inconvenience (which had never happened before). Then he offered to drive it to me. It was greatly appreciated, since I was in the midst  of getting my daughters' food ready. He got here and handed me my order. I tried to give back the other (untouched) order, but he told me just to keep it.  What a kind gesture. Thanks guys.  It's all about the little things. See you again soon.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ridley Wallace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxzvoraIf2rwq-X_5j7Ny6r-uYa33PWCAaBOw4QFWhY5zhGi-c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been coming to this spot for about 5 months now and it’s still the tastiest meals over and over again.

They have both platters and wraps, chicken beef, lamb or falafels.
I find myself ordering the Turkish special platter but will usually get the mixed platter.
They have a handful of other food items that I haven’t tried yet including coffee and tea.
Do yourself a favour and get the Turkish special platter. It’s worth it.
Spicy..  always !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5GhOB0aii5AR0XVY7wVZfJ0Xi8uVcPj_C5Qg0&fid=0x0:0xcfb7cbaeb63afe9b"],"When":"2024-5-15"},{"Name":"Ousie Shajan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLX7-gRAhUv0NVlqs9EnWgSB8_3EL0vq7wVgodVC_wg7S00Mw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Without a doubt, the best beef Donair I’ve had in Vancouver. The meat is perfectly seasoned, and they’re generous with the portions. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Adam Warner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUaOtTRoOLa_w0SPH5Z3lpH3PpDVKctB7DLjA9UwU660C9c0G0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is absolutely awesome. I recently moved out of the area and the mixed donair is something I can't find anything close to in the okanagan. Just tons of flavour and good level of spice. This place doesn't stand out from the street but once you try the food you will keep coming back. The staff are super friendly and while some people say it's slow, it's not at all. They do make it once you order so it takes a few minutes but that's part of the reason why it's so good. 10/10. It's already on my list of places to visit next time I'm at the coast!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"albert kwan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsHKujcWZYAEKVj8WRxklcAIZC2JYUJMgd5yPsw97gKzNedLBR3g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a deli counter style take away restaurant that has seating for around 15-20 but is it ever delicious. Every time I've been here I leave stuffed full of hearty and healthy good food. I want to recognize it with a review. Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTOKyFsB0DHFP8R0tiAjjX1g67Vhksf15HszIR&fid=0x0:0xcfb7cbaeb63afe9b"],"When":"2023-12-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"V Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-Qz_zR8NAjeqpRnuANXJcQGSLJzNuS-ETk_THk3z82H5rG6U=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Overall a solid place. I ordered a cup of latte. While I feel the flavour and milk steaming could've been better, it was still a decent cup. I like that they have no tip as a default so you don't need to press anything if you don't want to tip. I'm sure people are feeling more fatigued these days with tips and would appreciate it. The bathroom could be cleaner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjOouTPehfuOKCJ5QRuWCOalChnKTdQnz5-PCi&fid=0x0:0x778986f5635d3347"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Conor Whyte","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMdI4_ZGUMJFwplOdkinu1I_usGONki2DpQ6wr_spSbc4yhe2F=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent cafe with a strategic location nearby Brentwood Shopping Centre.
Food was expertly prepared, and coffee was super freshly roasted. Highly recommend this cafe! Today was our first time to visit.

맛있는 치킨브리샌드위치와 모카였습니다.

Note for the previous commenter: It is important to open seating for customers that are coming in to eat. If you are spending excessive time in the cafe, it hurts their business as it limits available seating for arriving customers. This is not a large cafe!
There are signs everywhere explaining the 2hr limit. This is more than fair in my opinion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuA-marRZTavANuOGqkJ3naD1qW0n8VpZk89yo&fid=0x0:0x778986f5635d3347"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Joey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJl9szXFCvkqiDIj8ffgxhpU02VBcZUaH8smB2SMyI4TIXdsaA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious matcha latte, refreshing iced tea, and perfect Basque cheesecake. sesame tiramisu surprised me! Cozy and delightful cafe.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPr2FtWRPH8lg9ErCfR3Tmz6rKb-yKeT4wTSdAR&fid=0x0:0x778986f5635d3347"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Lin Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-AOGsPLTQGmNweeMhJKvZ5lorslTGkT0xLfg-fKE2grd81A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Have this weird policy going on: 2 hours limit on weekend and holidays. One of the servers just dropped this tag on my table and I hadn't even finished my cup of coffee (dine in and tips paid). Understandable, but still feel it's a rude policy and make the customer feel bad. Never saw this kind of policy in any cafe I have been, just a warning to those who want a place longer than 2 hrs to study /work. It's a good spot in brentwood, but will never come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxArbsw15FxaRyST2ulNHhnatYFMb6gTwvGJ_g&fid=0x0:0x778986f5635d3347"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Maxim Borzenkov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5du_PkAVH4Z1D5yn5ceof8nx4Vb5Gh-oa_Y_0G13tOUKmBqAiog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent coffee and tasty sandwiches, the chicken brie being a standout favorite. Cheesecake is absolutely delicious, though I wish the slices were a bit larger. I miss being able to order the sandwiches on DoorDash. Overall, a great spot for a tasty meal and dessert!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMeaVVfDOeEwlk_63rdT45vESLd8iugZh1J-uoB&fid=0x0:0x778986f5635d3347"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"Vic Yung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjSUFpvFSwHsCrywPzGZzN7WDhV8Ljlj3YECw07iwjqMR_leW5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went on a weekday afternoon and most of the tables were occupied. Ordered an iced matcha latte and the staff made sure to ask if I wanted it sweetened or unsweetened. The ice melted a little quickly but the flavor was strong and not too sweet. Started about an hour and staff didn't rush anybody out.

Would recommend for a casual coffee meet up.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOp4AKcSCITqptgpgL6kivA1850i6Hr18B-e7x3&fid=0x0:0x778986f5635d3347"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Younghye Park (Catherine)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIlC7OG0gAlaejgRUHppa_X4qZ3rSw-pu7iWpa-i4UqOnRBghI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"been here so many times and everytime I went, the staff were always friendly and kind. the foods are pretty good with decent prices. Good place to study/work as well. Love this place!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMReHqMF2jAhRluHwMjl6ODiGfn88QZFcj3yMkZ&fid=0x0:0x778986f5635d3347"],"When":"2024-6-1"},{"Name":"Marcus Molina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0VJnjNpbeDzNmeiSJg9kR2Htb5wEtrtRAu317vPzeMfxaeoo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The cream puffs were great but what they're really known for is their basque style cheesecake. It was incredibly creamy and the perfect balance of not too sweet but not too bland. In my opinion, this is one of the best cheesecakes in all of Metro Vancouver.

Also tried the apple grapefruit sparkling lemonade and that was so refreshing and good.

If you're looking for some high quality desserts in the Brentwood area this is the place to go.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSiv_KihY1Fe3T4ViIhGFkf_0-15QP8wJgewP_&fid=0x0:0x778986f5635d3347"],"When":"2023-1-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ashkan N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKGC9QpVpAYzkuU2nETbRxXDGZW6ZxU4DFK0Bytd5fdamCstw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had an excellent experience with this location. We placed a large delivery order, and the owner personally delivered the food, which was a wonderful touch. The service was outstanding, and we particularly enjoyed their amazing fried chicken and fries. We will definitely order from them again and look forward to visiting in person.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDvpzApCOOW4vzRGKiNNlg85D49_Y4-azXS_MQ&fid=0x0:0x1d3f24bc3ca4a38c"],"When":"2024-5-8"},{"Name":"Noor Vasaya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKz1hmX24fo8rfKADKyNy6yz0dPt6VHYbGvnxGUnNYAEtbSv9eP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I tried Hi Five Fried Chicken for the first time yesterday, and it was fantastic! The chicken was fresh, juicy, and absolutely delicious. My daughter doesn’t eat much fried food but loved it too. The staff were incredibly friendly and helpful, which made the experience even better. Even though it’s about 20 minutes from my place, their 24-hour service has officially made this my go-to spot for late-night snacks!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anthony Plaxen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0TosyGAQWTqM_XvTHaXfq2jDGHv6ifKWBgTGcJKYnap3ceipL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"A spot to check out that’s opened 24 hours, got the 10 piece drumstick order through a coupon. Chicken was okay, it was a crispy but I found it to be a bit overly oily in my opinion. Worth it if you have a coupon. Still my preference would be Churches Chicken.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOg7AIfS1TZTz6IO9njRXtMlFeXv5E93zekjR3_&fid=0x0:0x1d3f24bc3ca4a38c"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Newaj Pluto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBf1c6YOayF8U3qq90YLVZvVGsA0duhYGF9FB01ifNiX9hxLY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I used to be a loyal customer at Hifive, but I’ve decided to stop ordering chicken from them. Over the past four months, I’ve consistently been served chicken that is flavorless, not crispy, and has tough, hard meat. My friends have experienced the same issues, and one of them even got sick after eating their chicken. This is extremely disappointing, and it’s clear that their quality management has become a complete disaster.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lee Leon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-Pwe_hwNvXwfueYblZSENmqHy_ngKuwXFqL5MKUMfNAIvBU4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered on uber eats…
Honestly I dont know how to put this
Chicken was super dry.
We ordered the spicy one but there was ABSOLUTELY no flavour at all.
We also felt sick after eating the chicken.
We have no ill intention but I hope these guys improve their chicken game.
Will improve the score if they improve","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joey C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVONws43kRXQQZVKUY_4MVYuG_XVH3tG7L-3VGHgoEAT3rINBjk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've ordered from here twice now.  The chicken is delicious!!  Super moist and you can order all drums.  The chicken was very well seasoned and was not greasy at all.  The skin was nice and crispy.  The entire family loved it.  We got both the spicy and the regular and they both were good.  The spicy had a nice kick and was not achieved by some thick hot sauce.  It was in the breading.  The chicken was cooked fresh and took no time to come out.  The guy working was so nice.  Thanked everyone for their business and even gave everyone free chicken fingers.  Not sure if he was the owner but he was very nice and friendly.  I would definitely come back again for the chicken and great customer service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPE_hsul-ji79f-OJbHE8zaJclAllrboMicn1ck&fid=0x0:0x1d3f24bc3ca4a38c"],"When":"2021-12-27"},{"Name":"Iven Tse","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWqYBm_0Md_dEh21ObcpKYh8NezukBMGE0J5wxrlAZNMPCyxCi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Unusually bad service today on so many levels. Where shall I start? Ordered a three piece combo, for take out. and later when getting ready to eat, I opened the box and found only two pieces. Then, one of those two pieces was a half-drumstick - literally half of it was broken off! (In the photo is the bone of a whole drumstick - looks deformed!)When I went back to ask what they can do, she said I can only have a two piece. Basically, to compensate for me having to spend as much gas just to go back there I was not even breaking even. Then, to begin with,  I was told I could choose a fountain drink or bottled pop as part of my combo, so I chose the bottled pop. I noticed how we an Additonal charge of 50 cents on the till. The cashier did not say it was “extra” just that I could choose between the two. So, I said never mind then. I will have a fountain drink. Then she goes “oh, that’s out of order, have a bottled drink then. Hmmm, it was what I wanted after all but kinda makes you wonder about her saying “you can choose” between them. Why did I give two stars vs one? The one normal piece of chicken I actually ate, it was quite good.

Update: Because this place is so convenient I went again, but yet again, I was disappointed. Similar to last time it was poor service and substandard chicken. The three pictures added is a view of the tough leathery surface of a chicken thigh underneath the crispy skin.  When I complained and showed the piece to the lady at the counter, she  said “but you ate most of it and then found out?”  Hmmm. So I peeled back more of the crispy skin to show her the full scope of the tough surface. Only then did she reluctantly give me a replacement piece. Not sure about how common this is, but never have I ever gotten chicken like this anywhere else - not Churches, not KFC, and certainly not Jollibee.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBYPI4xcDnG-LCCaS3ORoEnGsXJaRElj3bGDNG&fid=0x0:0x1d3f24bc3ca4a38c"],"When":"2022-8-7"},{"Name":"Evangelina Y. McNally","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKL0fS3IMozMVvaVfFkYlE3QjMIz3nKKw-vxinqWChhQwDRudM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My partner and I stopped to get them a snack. They ordered the chicken breast sandwich. Came home, they took a bite and immediately felt off. When we looked the chicken was completely raw and cold inside. It looked like they just seared the chicken and put it in a bun. This needless to say was off putting, super gross and can result in extreme sickness. I understand we are eating at a fast food restaurant but I at least expect the food to be cooked or there to be a system for temp checks when an order comes in especially with chicken, you’re not supposed to eat chicken “rare”

Never have had a problem before but we definitely won’t be back after this experience. We were issued a refund and a bunch of excuses. Last time we order from this place. Look before you leap.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6TUAU7JO9Aay-DqKvCF3C-NqbAuavmgA4q2pv&fid=0x0:0x1d3f24bc3ca4a38c"],"When":"2022-11-13"}]
